354a1(rgyud 'grel): kyang de bzhin te/ /'dod pa'i las su 'ang mthun par sbyin/ /khru tshad nyi shu rtsa lnga la/ /rigs kyi dkyil 'khor lnga rnams dang/ /bar khyams bcas dang khro bo dang/ /mos dang sbyor bas rnam par phye'o/ /drug dang brgyar gnyis
354a2(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa la/ /bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis rnam par brgyan/ /mdza' ma'i gong du shes par bya/ /brgyad dang bzhi la nges par ni/ /stangs sbyal gnyis kyi dkyil 'khor te/ /phyag rgya dgu gnyis mtshan mas gdab/ /gang 'dod de ni phyir bar bya/ /shin tu phra ba gzhan
354a3(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor/ /gtso bo thugs te rigs ldan pa/ /rnam pa'ang rim pa'i skabs su bshad/ /pad+ma'i rgyu la kha dog sgyur/ /bcu drug phyag rgyas legs brtags pa/ /rnal ma cig dang lnga lnga ldan/ /ye shes rang bzhin shes par bya/ /kha dog sum ldan rnal ma dgu /ras
354a4(rgyud 'grel): bal las brtags sku gsung thugs/ /gtsang ma'i snod du legs bkod de/ /nyi ma zla ba'i gdan dag la/ /thugs las ye shes 'bru grangs bzhin/ /phyogs bcu dus bzhi mdun grangs te/ /mchod sbyar gsol ba gdab par bya/ /sbyor ba'i ye shes grangs
354a5(rgyud 'grel): mnyam dang/ /rdo rje gsum byin nges par bstim/ /dngos po rang bzhin mnyam byas nas/ /cung zad mchod pa rtag par bya/ /phyogs mtshams legs par phye nas ni/ /so so'i tshad bzhin rgyas par dgye/ /mchog gi thig bran bzhi bcu bzhi/ /legs
354a6(rgyud 'grel): par kha dog phye yang rung/ /rta babs brgyad po cha mnyam zhing/ /'khor lo la sogs nyis 'gyur yin/ /rdo rje lag chu har bcas pa/ /rta babs phyed dang gsum du dbye/ /mtshan nyid rgyan gyis brgyan pa yi/ /grogs gsal ldan nam byin
354a7(rgyud 'grel): rlabs la/ /gnyis med ye shes thig gdab bya/ /ye shes dam tshig la mnyam bstim/ /kha dog dbyings dang ldan pa 'am/ /pho brang nyams dgar sgom par bya/ /oM sarba sho ta ni hUM phaT/ /sku gsung thugs dang thig thams cad/ /
354b1(rgyud 'grel): 'khrul pa dag pas gdab par bya/ /'da' ba med pa'i dam tshig yin/ /oM badzra su tra sa ma ya ma tri ka tra ma hUM phaT/ ye shes rdo rjes mdor bsdus lnga/ /dam tshig rjes su rim gsal dbye/ /ye shes skud pa'i sngags mtshan nyid/ /skud pa chad pas slob dpon 'chi/ /
354b2(rgyud 'grel): phyogs 'khrul pas ni gnyis ka nyams/ /rgyun chad lam la gnod par 'gyur/ /de phyir mkhas ldan sgrims te bya/ /kun tu rgyas par gyur pa dang/ /ting 'dzin ldan pas ye shes la/ /ye shes thim par des mchod de/ /dam tshig phyag rgya mu yis gshegs
354b3(rgyud 'grel): de nas gang yang nyes pa med/ /rab gnas ldan pa'i thig 'gongs na/ /bde gshegs sku la btab dang mtshungs/ /sangs rgyas chos las ring 'gyur phyir/ /h+ri'i sgra'i phyag rgyas 'dzul bar bya/ /rin chen lnga las byas pa'i tshon/ /in tra nI la zla 'od
354b4(rgyud 'grel): bzang/ /spu sha ra ga bya ru bzang/ /ma ra ga ta las byas dge /de bzhin 'byor pa gzhan dag bsdu/ /mtshams sems khro bo la sogs phyir/ /kha dog nyi shu rtsa lngar ldan/ /snod rims ma 'dres dag byas la/ /hUM sogs yig 'bru cig kyang lnga/ /kha
354b5(rgyud 'grel): dog rje su 'thun byas te/ /yongs gyur nyi shu tsa lnga'i lha/ /thabs dang shes rab ldan par sgom/ /phyogs bcu dus bzhi sku gsung thugs/ /yon tan 'phrin las ye shes lnga/ /stims pas yongs gyur dngos po lnga/ /sku gsung yon tan 'phrin las
354b6(rgyud 'grel): thugs/ /ye shes rgyu las grub pa yi/ /dkyil 'khor rdzas su brtag par bya/ /chos rnams bdag sems rtogs byas nas/ /byang chub sems nyid dag pa'i phyir/ /shin tu dkar ba'i mdog tu bstan/ de rtogs bya phyir dag pa'i mdog /chos
354b7(rgyud 'grel): rnams sems su sngon chags pa/ /pad+ma rA ga zhes brjod de/ /chags dang chags par bya ba med/ /chags med phyir na dmar po'o/ /yon tan gter ldan zad mi shes/ /thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas yin te/ /dbyings nyid mi zad gter gyur
355a1(rgyud 'grel): bas/ /kha dog gser gyi mdog tu bstan/ /'khrul snang phyin ci log rnams la/ /thugs rje chen po'i byin rlabs kyis/ /dbyings sdud las rnams rdzogs mdzad pas/ /kun tu las kun ljang gu'i mdog /de bzhin nyid
355a2(rgyud 'grel): kyis dbyings nyid la/ /cis kyang mi tshugs bcos su med/ /kha dog nag po'i dngos dang bzhin/ /de nyid mtshon phyir mthing gar bstan/ /ma mthong rmongs la ye shes sogs/ /bstan phyir tshon lnga dgye bar bya/ /sman pa rnams la lnga'i phyir/ /
355a3(rgyud 'grel): rigs kyi ye shes lngar shes bya/ /oM a sarba pa tsa ratna sa ma ya hUM hUM/ /'bru bcu zung ldan sor mo lngas/ /spu zhing snun pa ltar byas la/ /rdul tshon spyad ba'i sngags phyag rgyas/ /bag med gyur pa'i mnyes pa yang/ /bshad pa'i rjes su
355a4(rgyud 'grel): shes par bya/ /de dag bri ba'i cho ga ni/ /chos can dbang phyug thig bteg la/ /dad par dbang ldan phyogs nas bskor/ /de nas zhal dang thob pa rnams/ /'bru ldan rdo rje thal khu tshur/ /phyag rgya ting 'dzin ldan par bri/ /lte ba rtsibs
355a5(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan bzhi la/ /rtsibs bzhi 'khor lo mu khyud bcas/ /kha dog so sor sgram par bya/ /gru chad bzhi dang gru bzhi'i/ /bar khyams sgo khyud ldan par bya/ /'khor lo gcig gis yongs rdzogs pa/ /dkyil 'khor gnyis la rtag par
355a6(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /rdo rje 'phreng ba'i rim pa gnyis/ /kun la nges par sbyar bar bya/ /ye shes rin chen rim brtsegs tshul/ /thams cad sems phyir chad pa med/ /rdo rje nor bus mdzes pa yi/ /ka ba phyag rgya'i gdung bzhir sbyar/ /gzugs la
355a7(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa'i mchod pa lnga/ /bar snar khams su khrigs par bya/ /zhabs dang pad+ma'i rin chen snod/ /gnam 'phyong las byung za ra tshags/ /chu 'phyang shar bu bya khyud dag /rim bzhin kha dog mdzes par bya/ /rin chen ldan pa'i
355b1(rgyud 'grel): dpag bsam shing/ /rtsa ba la sogs rnam phye ba/ /phyi rol yongs su khyab par bya/ /'khor gyi gtso bos yongs bskur ba'i/ /mchog gsum la sogs rnam mang ba'i/ /brgyan dang mchod par ldan pa bri/ /rnga yab lhab lhub 'phreng ba yis/ /nges par phyogs
355b2(rgyud 'grel): bcur 'khrigs par bya/ /rdo rje me rib lag chu ha/ /thams cad kun tu khyeb par sbyar/ /dbang phyug chas ldan bsam gtan bya/ /dkyil 'khor rnam pa gsum dag tu/ /gzhung nyid kyis ni gsal bar gsungs/ /yan lag brgyan rdzogs gzugs sku
355b3(rgyud 'grel): nyid/ /nyi zla pad+ma rim bzhugs pa/ /dkyil 'khor sku'i mtshan nyid yin/ /phyag rgya gsal bkod thugs dkyil 'khor/ /tha sogs yang na hUM muM ni/ /mchod dang bri sogs phye ba ste/ /dkyil 'khor gsum du shes par bya/ /rigs kyi dbye ba gzhung
355b4(rgyud 'grel): gzhan 'gyur/ /rang sngags tidtha badzra ldan/ /gang yang rdzogs par ting 'dzin bya/ /mchog la sogs pa khro bo'i tshogs/ /rdzogs dang rgyad dang phye nyid ni/ /tha ma'i dus su hUM nyid ni/ /dza la sogs pa chung ngu'i yum/ /gang yang kha dog mtshan mar ldan/
355b5(rgyud 'grel): mkhas pas rab tu sgrim par bya/ /rab gnas yugs ni gsum yin te/ /bum pa rin chen las byas pa/ /lto dang mgrin par ldan pa ni/ /zha grum la sogs skyon spangs pa/ /kha dog ldan pa'i ras kyis kri/ /sna tshogs ljang gu rdo rje ldan/ /bdud rtsi la ?
355b6(rgyud 'grel): bcud ldan pa/ /mi 'chi thabs sbyor rang gnas kyis/ /ye shes rdo rje'i chu dag ni/ /thams cad las la 'jug par bya/ /gzhan yang yab yum 'brel pa'i rgya/ /nges par gdan dang ldan par bya/ /bdag nyid las kyi lhar zhugs pa/ /so so gang yin bskyed
355b7(rgyud 'grel): ? sbyar/ /yan lag rdzogs nas mchod sbyar la/ /rab sngags zhal sgor zlas pa bya/ /nges par khro tshogs byin ldan pa'i/ /yongs gyur byang sems ye shes rtsi/ /dbang bskur ba'i mchog tu gsungs/ /lha dbang la sogs sprul pa rnams/ /rang
356a1(rgyud 'grel): bzhin 'ja' tshon lta bu'i sku/ /nges par 'od du gyur pa yin/ /thams cad las ni bdags phyogs te/ /gzhan ni rang gi phyogs su'o/ /dbus kyang phyogs kyi dang por bshad/ /gnyis pa slob bur shes par bya/ /dgos pa'i yo byad rab
356a2(rgyud 'grel): bsogs la/ /las kyi dkyil 'khor las rim sbyar/ /khrus byas dri dang ldan pa'i bu/ /nges par gnas su thal sbyar nas/ /sbra de sems lnga bskyed par bya/ /de la lan du sbyin bya ba/ /e ma'o bde gshegs snying po las/ /rang gi rnam rtog las kyi
356a3(rgyud 'grel): sprul/ /sna tshogs lus dang longs spyod dang/ /gnas dang sdug bsngal la sogs ba/ /bdag dang bdag gir so sor 'dzin/ sus kyang ma bcings bcings med de/ /bcings par bya ba yod ma yin/ /bcings med rnam par grol med de/ /ye nas lhun
356a4(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs sangs rgyas chos/ /khyod la rab tu bstan par bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor don dang yon tan rnams/ /gsal byas rab tu spro ba bskyed/ /rdo rje nges drangs hUM 'od zer/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rab gnas bya/ /de bzhin yan lag ldan pa la/ /rdo rje'i
356a5(rgyud 'grel): go chas khyab par sbyar/ /so shing ku sha srung skud chu/ /byin la las sbyar mtshan ma rtag /gang bzhig ngan par gyur pa la/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin sbyor byas te/ /mche ba'i phyag rgyas bsrung bar bya/ /oM badzra yak+Sha kro ta sa ma ya daM taM hUM phaT/ /bar chod kun
356a6(rgyud 'grel): las grol bar 'gyur/ /thams cad thams cad de bzhin pas/ /drag po me yis zlog par bya/ /las rjes shis par brjod par bya/ /dkyil 'khor la sogs gang byas pa/ /rab gnas ye shes mi ldan rnams/ /sog dang bri ba'i nus pa med//
356a7(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin mkhas zhes rab sgrims te/ /bcos bu'i ras ni sna tshogs dang/ /brgyan 'phreng la sogs bro bas bskor/ /bum chu cung zad dbus bsdus la/ /rgyas pa'i sbyin sreg shar du sbyar/ /mchod pa'i rgyan rnams rgyas par dgram/ /
356b1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i rnam lnga lags byugs pa/ /tsandan dkar dmar du duM bar/ /n+ya gro d+ha dang bar ba ti'i/ /shing shun phye mas phyi bar bya/ /de dag la sogs bum chu rnams/ /dngos men gzugs brnyan las shes bya/ /rang gi dkyil 'khor legs mchod la/ /stong nyid ye shes
356b2(rgyud 'grel): gsang sngags kyis/ /sku gsung thugs sogs chos thams cad/ /gang yang mi gnas mi dmigs par/ /mig yor tshul du sbyor ba yis/ /nam mkha' ni nam mkha' sgom/ /e sogs 'bras bu hUM nyid las/ /dkyil 'khor gdan dang ldan par bya/ /rnam pa'i
356b3(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor rjes dag tu/ /yab yum las byung dngos po gsum/ /rjes su 'thun par gnyis skyed la/ /yi ge 'am gdan sngags phyag rgyal/ /sku gsung thugs ldan byin gyis brlab/ /ye shes gsal stims gzi brjid bskyed/ /rang gi bum pa 'am
356b4(rgyud 'grel): cig shos kyis/ /dbang bskur dbu rgyan ldan par bya/ /smon lam ye shes lnga 'bras bu/ /bu dang sems can thams cad yin/ /rin chen las byas dbu rgyan sogs/ /mdzes pa'i rgyan lnga dbul bar bya/ /rin chen 'phreng ba dbu rgyan dang/ /gdub bu
356b5(rgyud 'grel): do shal sku rags dag /'byor ba'i dad pas bdag 'bul na/ /gnyis med rgyan du bzhes su gsol/ /rjes mthun smon lam longs spyod sku/ /cod pan thabs dang shes rab kyis/ /gnyis kyi mdza' la mi gnas pa'i/ ting 'dzin smon lam ldan bar bya/
356b6(rgyud 'grel): thur ma snyan gzhar rmad tsher dang/ /chan pa gser byas chems shing dngos/ /dang po skyon bsal spu bregs la/ /shAkya'i dbang po las la sbyar/ /mngon shes gnyis dang shangs dag ni/ /sems kyis rnam grangs de bzhin te/ /rtsi yis chos kyi ro
356b7(rgyud 'grel): myong zhing/ /ma 'dres ston pa'i mchog 'gyur ro/ /shin tu mnyam gzhag thob pa dang/ /dus gsum zug rdu dag 'gyur sra/ /shin tu mdzes par gyur pa las/ /seng sogs gdan rnams dbul ba dang/ /nan tan gus pas phyag bya'o/ /sa
357a1(rgyud 'grel): pa la sogs ma lus pa'i/ /phyag gnas smon pa sngon bzhin bya/ /dug sogs rin chen snod ldan pa'i/ /chu gtsang la sogs sku khrus gsol/ /thugs rje lhun rdzogs sangs rgyas gzugs sku la/ /sri zhu gus phyir ras kyis sku phyis
357a2(rgyud 'grel): pas/ /las dang nyon mongs bag chags kun bsal nas/ /spyod lam rnam par dag pa'i sgo thob shog /yon tan lhun rdzogs sangs rgyas sku gzugs la/ /rin chen mdzes pa'i me tog dor byas pas/ /log lta'i nyon mongs tha ba kun bral te//
357a3(rgyud 'grel): lta bas mi ngoms mdzes pa'i sku thob shog /mchog tu rnam par dag pa'i sku mnga' ba'i/ /sangs rgyas sku la gdugs mchog 'di phul bas/ /dam tshig sdom pa'i nyes skyon kun bral nas/ /ye shes thugs rjes ma lus skyob par shog /
357a4(rgyud 'grel): rang rig thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la/ /mun pa snang byed mar me 'di bltams pas/ /ma rig 'thibs pa'i mun pa kun bsal nas/ /sangs rgyas la sogs spyan lnga thob par shog /snyigs ma lnga nyid 'bras bu yongs rdzogs pa'i
357a5(rgyud 'grel): rgyal ba'i sku la dri chab 'di phul bas/ /gdung ba zug rngu mya ngan kun bral nas/ /'od zer mdza' yas 'gyed pa'i sku thob shog /dug lnga ma spangs sku lngar rnam dag pa'i/ /bde chen sku la dam rdzas 'di phul bas/ /kun tu bzang po'i
357a6(rgyud 'grel): spyod lam yongs rdzogs pa'i/ /kun nas yongs su smin pa'i sku thob shog /chos rnams longs spyod yongs su rdzogs pa yi/ /rgyal ba'i sku la gtor ma 'di phul bas/ /rdzas su spyod pa'i gdung ba kun bral nas/ /gsang ba'i longs spyod
357a7(rgyud 'grel): yongs su rdzogs par shog /ye shes spyod yul yongs su dag pa yi/ /rgyal ba'i sku la mchod pa 'di phul bas/ /khams gsum dug gsum rtsad nas dag 'gyur te/ /sku gsum lhun grub zhing khams dag par shog /thabs dang
357b1(rgyud 'grel): shes rab 'du 'bral med pa yi/ /bde chen sku la 'ga' na 'di phul bas/ /spyod yul byang chub sems su rnam dag nas/ /mdza' yas snyoms par 'jug pa thob par shog /mdza' yas ldan dang bral ba med pa'o/ /gnyis med sku la 'dod yon lnga phul pas/ /
357b2(rgyud 'grel): mdza' la zhen pa'i gdung ba kun bral nas/ /bde ba chen po'i thabs rnams rdzogs par shog /gzi brjid khyad par 'phags pa'i dkyil 'khor la/ /bla re la sogs lhab lhub phul byas pas/ /log par lta ba rnams dang yongs bral nas/ /'bar ba'i rgyal
357b3(rgyud 'grel): po thub med 'grub par shog /byams mgon sku la snyoms pa'i dkyil 'khor la/ /rin chen ldan pa'i na bza' 'di phul bas/ /thabs rgyags pa'i spyod lam kun bral te/ /gzi brjid khyad par 'phags pa'i sku thob shog /gling bzhi'i dkyil 'khor rin
357b4(rgyud 'grel): chen ldan/ /dpag bsam shing dang rdzing bu mdzes/ /sa gzhi khang par byin brlabs pa/ /lha dang lha mo me long ldan/ /lhag pa'i ting 'dzin mchod par bya/ /'phags pa'i nor bdun zhing dag pa'i/ /smon lam rjes su gdab par bya/ /bu dang chung ma
357b5(rgyud 'grel): yul khams dang/ /bran dang bzhon pa de bzhin te/ /sems dang rdzas kyi 'khor gsum po/ /yongs su dag par bya ba ni/ /tshogs kyi mchog tu 'di 'gyur ro/ /'dod yon lnga sogs mchod pa dag /mkhas pas gnas su stobs par bya/ /glu dbyangs
357b6(rgyud 'grel): tshigs su bcad pa dang/ /gar thabs rol mo nges par sbyar/ /bden pa'i mthu yis bskul byas la/ /'dod pa yongs su ma rdzogs par/ /nam yang bstan par bya ba min/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya bastsit+ta shtha badzra/ sa la sogs la phyag rgyar byas//
357b7(rgyud 'grel): rnam grol rim pa thob gyur na/ /dag pa'i ye shes kyis sbyangs nas/ /smos ci dgos te de nyid yin/ /mnyam pa'i sgrub rdzas chen po dag /ye shes bdud rtsi byin rlabs nas/ /bdag dang mnyam pa'i tshogs la dbul/ /zhing gyur mchog dang
358a1(rgyud 'grel): mchog bran rnams/ /'dab bzhi la gnas sa bon drug /nyi zla'i steng du mkhas pas bzhag /ye shes lnga 'am gsum gyis sbyar/ /khro bor gsal ba'i nga rgyal gyis/ /'bru lnga lag gi 'od 'phros pas/ /mi shigs thig
358a2(rgyud 'grel): le hUM dkar po/ /rdo rje'i lam byung mkha' dbyings bzhag /dbang skur sbyor ba'i cho ga yin/ /dpe byad mtshan rdzogs sku nyid la/ /gtsug tu rnam par rgyal ba bzhugs/ /zla rlung sbyor bas 'og min du/ /rgyal ba'i sras su dbang bskur nas/ /
358a3(rgyud 'grel): dus gsum mchod pa chen por sbyar/ /de ltar rgyal ba kun byas kyang/ /bsgral ba'i dngos po gang yang med/ /phung po lnga po bshig pa la/ /gzugs ni 'byung ba'i bag la zha/ /ma zhig na yang 'byung ba yin/ /rnam shes med pas
358a4(rgyud 'grel): bsad byas kyang/ /gnas pa nyid na dngos med pas/ /sems kyi rang bzhin de la ni/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas dgrar langs kyang/ /sus kyang zin cing sed pa med/ /'o na thugs rjes gang bsgral na/ /phyin ci log las zlog byas nas/ /
358a5(rgyud 'grel): ting 'dzin sngags dang phyag rgya dang/ /shin tu goms pas dbang bskur te/ /byang chub zhing la dgod par bya/ /de rtsam la ni sgral zhes gdags/ /lha mo klu mo rigs ngan mo/ /dbye ba 'am yang na mi dbye bar/ /rang rig shes rab byin rlabs
358a6(rgyud 'grel): la/ /bde gshegs dkyil 'khor kun bkod de/ /bdag nyid rig pa'i lhar bsgoms la/ /gnyis su med par ldan par bya/ /yum gyi pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor du/ /bde ba thugs kyi dkyil 'khor sgro/ /sangs rgyas sprin tshogs ma lus
358a7(rgyud 'grel): la/ /dbye ba mnyam mchog gi sbyin pas bstim/ /phyogs dus dkyil 'khor mnyes pa dang/ /'gro ba ma lus bde thob nas/ /slar yang gnyis med dbyings su bstim/ /chags med tshul gyis rol par bya/ /de ni tshangs mchog rgyal po yin/ /
358b1(rgyud 'grel): sbyin sreg rnam pa bzhir gsungs te/ /sa dang rab gnas rnam gnyis dang/ /bde ba sbyin pa'i dus nyid du/ /dbyibs dang kha dog mtshan ldan pa'i/ /lhag pa'i dkyil 'khor rnam bzhi ru/ /zhal du gyur pa'i me bos la/ /las bzhi mchod pa rab tu sbyin/ /mchog
358b2(rgyud 'grel): tshogs rnam bzhi ltar grangs bzhin/ /skabs bzhin rgyas par mchod par bya/ /de nas lhag pa'i dkyil 'khor du/ /'jug pa'i cho ga bshad par bya/ /dbang phyug 'jug dang bzod par gsol/ /khrus dag dri dang lus dbul dang/ /bgegs skrad lhar
358b3(rgyud 'grel): slab dam tshig sbyin/ de nyid dpog dang chu nam bya/ /bsgrag dang rin chen dor ba dang/ /lha dbab pa dang nan tan dang/ /mig dbye dkyil 'khor legs bstan dang/ /tshogs mchog yon tan rnam bco brgyad/ /'di yis yon tan rdzogs par 'gyur/ /
358b4(rgyud 'grel): rgyas pa'i mchod pa legs sbyar nas/ /dbang gos ldan pas dbang phyug yin/ /gzhan dag gzhan gyis mdzes par bya/ /shar sgor 'dug ste dkyil 'khor gyi/ /lha rnams mngon byas rin chen ldan/ /'bru lnga rdo rje dam tshig gis/ /sngags kyi sku
358b5(rgyud 'grel): gsung thugs yon tan/ /'phrin las ye shes gnyis med sbyar/ /oM ye shes rgyal po sku gsung thugs/ /yon tan 'phrin las smad po che/ /de nyid du ni mnyam sbyor bas/ /phyag rgya chen por bdag sbyor cig /oM badzra sa ma ya hUM/ oM badzra sa ma
358b6(rgyud 'grel): ya ho/ /skul ba'i dam tshig rjes dran pa'i/ /'od zer gzi brjid ldan par bya/ /rang bzhin gnyis med gyur pa'o/ /rdo rje ye shes thob byed pa'i/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ /pho brang snying po'i dkyil 'khor 'dir/ /bdag gis slob ma
358b7(rgyud 'grel): gzhug par bya/ /bzod pa mdzad de dgongs su gsol/ /'dzum bcas snang ba thob par bya/ /shin tu bzang po 'dra bo rnams/ /dri'i chu yis dgag par bya/ /snyim ba me tog ldan par bya/ /ras sogs dmar po'i gdong yogs la/ /bu khyod ci la dga' zhes dri/ /skal bzang
359a1(rgyud 'grel): dag gis lan slan pa/ /'khor lo'i drung du dkri bar bya/ /thal sbyar gus dang bcas pa yis/ /phyogs bcu'i sras dang bcas pa la/ /dbang phyug sangs rgyas dag ltar bdag /ma 'ongs rang bzhin sems can la/ /dgos
359a2(rgyud 'grel): pa gsum phyir lus dbus bya/ /mchog gi yon sbyin snod du 'gyur/ /tshe srung sbyor ba'i khro tshogs kyis/ /bar chod nges bskrad mtshams gcad la/ /sgrib sbyang rnam shes cho ga yis/ /hUM las sems dpa' 'am gzhan yang rung/ /mtshan
359a3(rgyud 'grel): ma rdzogs pa'i bsam gtan bya/ /dam tshig chen po bdud rtsi lnga/ /rang bzhin 'bru gsum sku gsung thugs/ /gzi brjid ldan pa'i byin rlabs la/ /dam tshig sdom pa mchog ces bya/ /snying gar rdo rje bstan byas la/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba 'di/ /dam nyams
359a4(rgyud 'grel): ma 'dres med pa la/ /nam yang smra bar ma byed cig /theg pa chen po ston byed pa/ /rang la snyas dang smad mi rung/ /sku gsung thugs la rtag gnas shing/ /ma lus sems can don gyis shig /tsandan dkar dmar sbyar byas la/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rab gnas bya/
359a5(rgyud 'grel): 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu/ /dam tshig 'das na sreg par byed/ /rdo rje khro bo chen por 'gyur/ /rdo rje chu 'di btung bar gyis/ /oM badzra yak+Sha hUM/ de lta bas na bu khyod kyis/ /dam tshig 'di dag srung bar gyis/ /de bzhin pas na dngos grub pas/ /rdo
359a6(rgyud 'grel): rje bdud rtsi chu 'thung zhig /oM badzra ud ga da ya hUM/ lan gsum byin nas rab bsgrags pa/ /thabs dang shes rab sems nyid kyis/ /rtag tu dogs pa med kyis la/ /'dod pa lnga'i yon tan spyod/ /gzhan yang stong khams thams cad na/ /shes rab
359a7(rgyud 'grel): dbyings dang 'dod yon gzhan/ /rab 'bring tha ma thams cad spyod/ /gzhan yang dam tshig nyams pa dang/ /skye bo gang zhig dam la gnod/ /brtul zhugs can gyis 'dir drongs la/ /snying la khrag chen btung bar gyis/ /sems nyid theg par rab nges
359b1(rgyud 'grel): na/ nyon mongs 'dod lnga kun spyod kyang/ /pad+ma la ni 'dam bzhin te/ /byas la mi gos sdom pa rdzogs/ /dkyil 'khor yid la mngon sbyar la/ /'dod pa 'am yang na gzhan yang rung/ /dor de 'brel ba'i legs bstan bya/ /rang gi dam tshig hUM dang bcas/ /dam tshig phyag
359b2(rgyud 'grel): rgyas lan gsum bstan/ /lcags kyu ho yis dgug byas la/ /nyas legs 'phrin las gsal byas la/ /phyag rgya bstims la bstan par bya/ /'od zer thur mas dbye byas la/ /badzra tsaShu bra be sha phaT/ /'khor lo mngon pa'i nga rgyal bya/ /gser sogs mtshon byed nges blangs la/ /chos rnams
359b3(rgyud 'grel): thams cad gnyis min pa'i/ /dbyings su thims pa'i 'od zer gsal/ /cig dang spros pa thams cad med/ /dkyil 'khor spros med zlum po'i tshul/ /rang rig ye shes mya ngan 'das/ /ye shes sgyu dang 'bras bur ldan/ /dkyil 'khor 'khor lo yongs kyis bskor/ /thugs
359b4(rgyud 'grel): rje'i byin rlabs spros pa yin/ /ye shes bzhi'i dkyil 'khor spro/ /sku gsung thugs dang ye shes lnga/ /byin rlabs ya mtshan bsam mi khyab/ /rang snang ba'i thabs las byung/ /bsod nams ye shes tshogs rdzogs phyir/ /mdza' dbus med par rgyas par gnas/ /
359b5(rgyud 'grel): stong smon mtshan med 'od gsal 'jug /de phyir ye shes sgo bzhir shar/ /sa rnams khyad par bkod pa'i phyir/ /der 'gro lam stegs brgyad dang ldan/ /rang bzhin ye shes 'od gsal phyir/ /nyi zla brtsegs pa'i gdan 'bar zhing/ /ye nas rnam par dag pa'i
359b6(rgyud 'grel): phyir/ /ma chags pad+ma 'bar ba'i gdan/ /zad med ye shes gter 'gyur bas/ /yid bzhin rin chen 'bar ba'i gdan/ /'bras bu'i chos rnams yongs rdzogs phyir/ /seng ge la sogs bstan pa yin/ /ye nas mnyam nyid mi 'da' i phyir/ /rta la'i ljon shing
359b7(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin gnas/ /thams cad la ni dbang sgyur phyir/ /'jig rten lha chen rnams kyis bskor/ /thams cad rang bzhin dag pa'i phyir/ /sgyu 'phrul bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyis/ /thams cad lha nyid rtag tu sbyor/ /thams cad ma lus dkyil 'khor mchog /mtshan
360a1(rgyud 'grel): nyid legs par shes par bya/ /rang gi lha'i 'bras bu'i/ /gzhi phyir mchog tuAng nan tan bya/ /bskal pa mnyam pa'i ye shes te/ /gter na nye bar 'byung ba'i/ /ya mtshan chen po 'byung bar nges/ /dad med nyams na phung bar 'gyur
360a2(rgyud 'grel): lha spangs dge spyad don med pas/ /gang zhig phyag rgya 'di spangs na/ /nyon mongs ngan song gnas su skye/ /byang chub 'bras bu thob mi 'gyur/ /bla med 'gro ba'i rgyun chad nas/ /rigs chad nyid du gnas par 'gyur/ /bdag nyid lha dang mnyam sbyor bas/ /yon tan
360a3(rgyud 'grel): chung yang 'grub par 'gyur/ /gcig dang du ma yongs bral ba'i/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad 'grub par gsungs/ /de nas rigs kyi bu mchog des/ /rgyal srid dang ni rang gi lus/ /bu dang chung ma nor gyi dbyig /rab tu gces dang yid 'thad dbul/ /
360a4(rgyud 'grel): dbang phyug longs spyod lngas mchod na/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad mchod pa yin/ /nye ba'i dkyil 'khor smos ci dgos/ /nyes pa thams cad dag par 'gyur/ /dbang dang dngos grub 'dod pa yis/ /'di ltar shin tu nan tan bya'o/ /sgyu 'phrul dra bas
360a5(rgyud 'grel): legs zhugs pas/ /phyogs bcu dus bzhir gshegs pa'i/ /dkyil 'khor kun tu zhugs pa yin/ /rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i/ /'khor lo sngon du bzhugs pa'i/ /bsod nams bstan pa gang yin pa/ /phyis byas de bzhin lung
360a6(rgyud 'grel): bstan phyir/ /sgyu 'phrul bde chen dkyil 'khor bzhi/ /gtang dbyal gnyis sam yang na lnga/ /byas te dad ldan rab zhugs na/ /'dod pa yid 'ong mchog la sogs/ /sngon byas pa dang mnyam par 'gyur/ /gang zhig 'di la mos gyur pa/ /sangs rgyas
360a7(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor thams cad kyis/ /phyogs dus kun nas thams cad du/ /nye ba'i sras su dgongs par 'gyur/ /rdo rje 'dzin par rigs nges shing/ /gdon rnams zlog cing ngan song sbyong/ /longs spyod 'du ba rnam pa gnyis/ /ye shes spyan gyi
360b1(rgyud 'grel): gzhi ru nges/ /de la sogs pa mdza' yas mchog/ byang sems dkyil 'khor zab mo'i dbang/ /phan tshun rgyu dang 'bras bu ni/ /phyi nang gsang ba nyid du gsungs/ /lte snying dbu mgrin yan lag bcas/ /rnam shes gcig gi rten gzhi ste/ /ye shes rnam pa bzhi bcu
360b2(rgyud 'grel): gnyis/ /gzhi dang rgyu phyir phyi rol don/ /dbang po yul dus gsang ba'i gnas/ /byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor nyid/ /ma lus 'dus pa'i thig le che/ /khams la sogs pa'i pad ldan pa'i/ /kun rdzob nang gi don du bshad/ /tha dad min las tha dad pa'i//
360b3(rgyud 'grel): rang nyams bde ba'i ye shes ni/ /cig ces 'di zhes brjod du med/ /gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du med/ /gsum tshogs sna tshogs 'byung zhing 'phro/ /byin rlabs sna tshogs mdza' yas mchog /don bsdus dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu gnyis/ /ye shes phyag 
360b4(rgyud 'grel): rgya gsal 'gyur ba/ /bcu gsum la sogs mthar phyin pas/ /'bras bu nyid duAng 'di shes bya/ /bden gnyis byang chub dbyer med pas/ /dngos po ming gis rdzogs par 'gyur/ /de dag nges pa'i ming bstan pa/ /snying po thams cad dus gsum gyis
360b5(rgyud 'grel): gang yang yan lag 'khor du 'gyur/ /rgyu 'bras rnam par spang bar bya/ /rang rig mdza' dbus med pa'i dkyil/ /ye shes bzhi 'phro 'khor lo'i tshul/ /'das pa dag tu dkyil yin te/ /'jig rten sna tshogs 'khor du gsungs/ /ting 'dzin rang bzhin
360b6(rgyud 'grel): don shes bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dkyil nyid de/ /rigs bzhi lha dang lha mo dang/ /khro bo khro mo 'khor yin te/ /lhag pa gnyis sogs don du gsungs/ /bco brgyad khams gsum snying po nyid/ /de dag 'khor de bde ba'i khams/ /ye shes de bzhin
360b7(rgyud 'grel): lta de bzhin/ /byang sems rnam gnyis mthar thug phyir/ /nges tshig las dang ngo bo yin/ /dngos por gnyis pa mchog yin te/ /rgyu rkyen ngo bo 'bras bu dang/ /las rim skyon yon brgyad shes bya/ /ngo bo snod kyi mtshan nyid kyis/ /dbye ba rnam pa lnga ru 'gyur/
361a1(rgyud 'grel): bdag gzhan nus pa gnyis kyi las/ /nying lag lnga phrag gnyis dang cig /de dag phyi rol don shes bya/ /bde sogs spyod pa gsang bar 'gyur/ /rang gnas rang rig ye shes gsal/ /bcu dag bum pa'i rnam pa yin/ /dbang
361a2(rgyud 'grel): po mchog ni rgyal mtshan 'gyur/ /ma lus sems phyir longs spyod do/ /khyab pa'i mkha' 'gro srung bar byed/ /thabs dang shes rab bde ba'i lam/ /yan lag yan lag bcas g.yon bcings/ /kun tu 'phyo ba cod pan mchog /dbu 'am 'dud pa bcud
361a3(rgyud 'grel): ldan 'phreng/ /rdo rje phung sogs bzhi bcu gnyis/ /nyi shu rtsa lnga 'byung ba'i dngos/ /'phra rags thabs dang shes rab mtshan/ /rnam pa sum cu de bzhin te/ /phyogs mtshams srung bar byed pa'o/ /phung po 'byung bcas dkyil 'khor cig /rang bzhin
361a4(rgyud 'grel): lhun gyis grub de nyid/ /sngon byas rgyu 'bras dbyer med la/ /yang dag rdzogs pa'i bde chen po/ /rdo rje sku phyir bstan pa yin/ /sgyu gnyis rang bzhin mtshungs pa ni/ /ngo bo bzhin du grangs 'jug ste/ /sgyu'i 'khor lo gdugs su gsal/ /reg sogs
361a5(rgyud 'grel): las kyi yum du 'gyur/ /phyag rgya grangs kyi rab 'bring rnams/ /rang bzhin rgyu las rkyen slong dang/ /ting 'dzin byed pas dbang skur 'gyur/ /kun la rgyas 'debs phyag rgya yis/ /rnam shes rang bzhin ye shes lnga/ /khams lnga bde byed rang
361a6(rgyud 'grel): bzhin ni/ /sku gsung 'phrin las yon tan thugs/ /spyod yul yongs 'gyur rgyu 'bras kyi/ /snying po mchog tu de gsungs so/ /phung sogs rtsa dang khams rnams kun/ /rang bzhin 'khrul pa'i tha snyad du/ /sna tshogs snang la gnas pa med/ /
361a7(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin ye nas zlum pa ni/ /las dang ngo bo dbang du 'gyur/ /'chad sogs las kyi mtshan nyid lnga/ /yan lag dbang po'i dkyil 'khor lngas/ /las thams cad la dbang sgyur zhing/ /rlung la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor lnga/ /snying sogs
361b1(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa las dkyil 'khor/ /sgra dbyangs gsung gi gsal byed dang/ /mi shigs thig le rang gi lha/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid yin/ /'di dag las su spyod byed kyang/ /rang bzhin ma skyes sems kyi phyir/ /bsgo dang bsgo bar bya ba med/ /chags med tshul
361b2(rgyud 'grel): du rang bzhin gnas/ /gsum pa'i rang bzhin bshad bya ba/ /ma bcos rgyun gyi skad cig mas/ /de yis ma byas gang yang med/ /'das dang ma 'das thams cad kun/ /rigs pa nyid du thams cad 'dus/ /sems dang chos su dbyer med par/ /mdza' bzhi yongs
361b3(rgyud 'grel): bral bde chen po/ /so sor zhen pas de nyid snang/ /dngos po ming gis 'thad pa nyid/ /snang byed rgyu yang de bzhin nyid/ /rang bzhin bde ba gnas pa'i lam/ /brgyud pas bde ba myong bar byed/ /rang bzhin gnas pa'i don du bstan/ /byin rlabs thabs kyis
361b4(rgyud 'grel): spang ba'i phyir/ /thams cad spyad cing blang bar bya/ /ma lus sems phyir gnyis med pas/ /gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam bral te/ /mdza' rnams ci la'ang mi gnas pas/ /rang rig 'od gsal thams cad mkhyen/ /rang rig snang ba ma skyed phyir/ /sku dang ye shes
361b5(rgyud 'grel): bsam mi khyab/ /rang nyid lhun gyis grub pa ni/ /rgyu 'bras snga phyi ma yin pas/ /rgyu'i dus nyid 'bras bu'i mchog /de bzhin nyid du shes pa yang/ /sna tshogs zhen las grol bar zad/ /yang dag nyid la ye rdzogs phyir/ /dngos po ming gnyis 'thad
361b6(rgyud 'grel): par 'gyur/ /de phyir dus gsum 'gyur med pas/ /bsten pa zhes su gsungs pa yin/ /'bras bu rgyu la mi gnas na/ /phyogs gcig rgyu dang rkyan dag gis/ /kun nas slong bar rigs ma yin/ /'ching bu nor bur dbang bskur yang/ /de la rin
361b7(rgyud 'grel): chen mngon rtags? med/ /chos dbang sems la yod pa ru/ /kun bzangs rdo rje sems dpas gsungs/ /dbang mchog rang la med 'gyur na/ /bskur bas thob par mi 'gyur ro/ /dang po la sogs sems rims lnga/ /gong nas gong du rgyun
362a1(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa/ /phyogs gcig rgyu ru spyir bshad de/ /rkyen dang thun mong 'brel zhes bya/ /rkyen bzhi snod kyi mtshan nyid gnyis/ /chags gnyid rang phyogs chad dang ni/ /yi dags gti mug rtsod pa dang/ /nyes pa du ma'i rgyud shes
362a2(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /dregs skur phrag dog le lo yis/ /nyams sgrib dngos grub mi 'byung dang/ /'bras bu kun kyang yal bar 'gyur/ /zhe sdang snying rje las ring ba/ /theg pa chen po rigs ma yin/ /khe drags longs spyod kyis phyogs pa/ /bsam bya ring ?
362a3(rgyud 'grel): spong bar 'gyur/ /sgra'i nga rgyal nyams pa'i gzhi/ /don ni nges pa ldan par gsungs/ /nan tan dam tshig mi byed pa/ /thar pa'i lam las ring bar 'gyur/ /de dag thun mong spang ba'i rigs/ /rang bzhin gnyis kyis skal med dang/ /bus ??
362a4(rgyud 'grel): gnyis ma ning sogs/ /thar lam gnyis las ring bar 'gyur/ /rtse ba nan tan ldan pa dang/ /skyon zlog yon tan nyid du 'gyur/ /ci la'ang yid rings ldog pa med/ /skye gnas sems la rkyen thub pa/ /rmad par gyur pa'ang blang bar bya/ /dad pa'i tshul ?
362a5(rgyud 'grel): snang ba ni/ /phyogs gcig rkyen du nges par bshad/ /ting 'dzin sngags dang phyag rgya dag /dkyil 'khor rdzas dus la sogs pa/ /nus mthu mang po snang bar 'gyur/ /shes rab ting 'dzin nogs dang ldan/ /log spangs yang dag dug dang ldan/ /man ngag
362a6(rgyud 'grel): brtul zhugs snying rjer ldan/ /las dang man ngag rgyun ma chad/ /rgyud goms las sbyor ma mthong dang/ /dngos lnga rdzogs phyir nyams ldan pas/ /de nyid de la snang bar 'gyur/ /rim pa skabs kyi tshul dag gis/ /ltos nas rgyu 'bras go 'byed pa//
362a7(rgyud 'grel): de ma thag pa'i mtshan nyid do/ /ting 'dzin la sogs rim bshad pa/ /mchog sogs phyag rgya gang yin las/ /rang gi rab gnas cung zad mchod/ /rang bzhin gsal bar byed pa dang/ /snang byed la sogs dbang skur byed/ /rtog tshogs sems phyir ma
362b1(rgyud 'grel): skyes pa/ /thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin lam/ /ting 'dzin phyag rgyas dbang bskur nas/ /las rnams byed par dbang bskur ba'o/ /rnam shes nam mkha' i ngo bo nyid/ /sems phyir mtshan ma ma skyes pa/ /mi bskyod yab yum rang bzhin las/ /ting 'dzin thugs su
362b2(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur nas/ /dngos grub las rnams mngon byed shog /hUM badzra g+h+rig /muM dwa du shwar sto/ /a bi shin tsa hUM/ mig gzugs sems phyir ma skyes pa/ /sa snying yab yum rang bzhin las/ /ting 'dzin sems dpas dbang sgyur nas/ /spyod yul yongs
362b3(rgyud 'grel): su dag byed shog /kshi hi rA dzA ya/ hUM la se sa ma ya stom/ /a bi shin tsa hUM/ reg shes rtag pa ma skyes sems/ /gshin rje yab yum rang bzhin las/ /ting 'dzin 'joms pas dbang sgyur nas/ /gdul bya ma lus thar byed shog /ya mAn+ta krid hUM/ badzra
362b4(rgyud 'grel): da ra ma hA kro ti shwo ri dzwa la ni hUM phaT/ yid chos rang rig ma skyes pa'i/ /kun bzang yab yum rang bzhin la/ /ting 'dzin phyag rgyas dbang sgyur nas/ /ma lus kun gyi byed por shog /gsang sngags ldan par byin byas la/ /gnas stim rang gi phyag rgya
362b5(rgyud 'grel): gsal/ /shin tu rdzogs par dbang bskur bya/ /mgo lce snying lte g.yas zur la/ /zla ba oM sogs 'dru lnga dgod/ /sku gsung yon tan las byin bsdu/ /sku sogs phyag rgyar gsal bar bya/ /oM bde gshegs sku'i ngo bo las/ /mi shigs
362b6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje rgyal po'i gtso/ /sngags dang phyag rgya ldan pa yis/ /rdo rje'i sku'i ngo bor shog /oM sarba ta thA ga ta mahA kA ya badzra swa b+hu ba ad ma ko haM/ oM bde gshegs gsung gi ngo bo las/ /mi shigs rdo rje chos kyi dbyings/ /sngags dang phyag rgya ldan pa
362b7(rgyud 'grel): yis/ /rdo rje gsung gi ngo bor shog /oM sarba ta thA ga ta mahA bag badzra swa b+hA wa adma ko haM/ /hUM bde gshegs thugs kyi ngo bo las/ /mi shigs rdo rje thugs kyi thugs/ /sngags dang phyag rgya ldan pa yis/ /rdo rje'i thugs kyi gtso bor shog /oM na ma
363a1(rgyud 'grel): sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA tsit+ta badzra swa b+ha ba adma ko haM/ swa mi 'gyur ba'i zhing khams las/ /ma skyes pa'i 'bras bu shar/ /ma bsags pa'i 'bras bu 'byung/ /cir yang 'gyur ba'i ye shes kyis/ /rang dbang thabs kyi sgyur bar shog /oM sarba
363a2(rgyud 'grel): ta thA ga ta mahA pu tsa badzra swa b+hA ba adma ko haM/ ha thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i/ /'dod chags chen po'i ting 'dzin las/ /las sngon kun tu grub snang bas/ /ma lus mnyam par sbyor bar shog /na ma sarba ta thA ga ta mi hA a nu ra gadz+nyAn? badzra swa b+hA ba
363a3(rgyud 'grel): adma ko haM/ rin chen rab gnas las byung ba'i/ /rin chen mdzes bas dbu brgyan cing/ /rigs lnga 'dus pa'i bum chu sbyin/ /thabs shes 'brel pa rigs lnga'i dngos/ /bdud rtsi'i rgyun las de bzhin skyes/ /oM chos nyid mnyam pa chen po las/ /  
363a4(rgyud 'grel): ye shes gsal bas rnam par dag /chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyis/ /skye med chos la dbang thob shog /oM mahA shAn+ti? tA dz+nyAn badzra swa b+hA sa adma ko haM/ /oM dag cing gsal ba'i rang bzhin te/ /skyon med sems nyid rin po che/ /me long lta bu'i ye shes kyis
363a5(rgyud 'grel): srid pa gsum la dbang sgyur shog /oM mahA a ta ti sha na badzra swa b+hA ba adma ko haM/ swa khams gsum re skong rgyal po ste/ /yon tan rin chen gter gyi mchog /mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis/ /'gro ba'i re skor rgyal por shog /oM mahA sa ma na ha
363a6(rgyud 'grel): dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba adma ko haM/ nyes pa'i skyon bral dri ma med/ /skye 'gag med pa'i dngos grub ste/ /so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyis/ /srid gsum nyes dmigs sel bar shog /oM mahA pra ta pra be sha ya dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba adma ko haM/ ha dbyings
363a7(rgyud 'grel): kyi dkyil 'khor mthar phyin cing/ /grub pa las kyi bye brag las/ /bya ba nan tan ye shes kyis/ /skye 'gro dbyings su sgrol bar shog /oM mahA kri ta a nu ta na badzra swa b+hA ba adma ko haM/ rin chen ra ba gnas 'phreng ba bcing/ /traM gzungs dang ting
363b1(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin rgyu 'bras chos/ /byang chub phyogs rnams shes rab brgyan/ /mi 'jigs stobs dang dpe byad mtshan/ /'bras bu rdzogs par dbang bskur ro/ /oM ratna ma le a bi shin tsa traM/ /ha khyung gi gshog pa rab sdebs pas/ /klu rnams zil gyis gnon pa ltar/ /
363b2(rgyud 'grel): srid gsum yon tan rdzogs mdzes cod pan mchog /tshe mchog bdud bzhi zil mnan dbang thob shog /oM sarba ta thA ga ta mahA gu hya badzra ma le badzra a bi shin tsa hUM/ rab gnas chos 'byung ye shes dngos/ /kha dog gnyis ldan dbang bskur bya/ /las
363b3(rgyud 'grel): mchog rab gnas rdo rje'i go /g.yog pa'i tshul gyis sbyin par bya/ /mi shigs ye shes rdo rje ni/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi ya lad de/ /khyab pa'i tshul gyis dra ba yin/ /dbang mchog dam pa sbyin par bya/ /oM badzra raksha a bi shin tsa hUM/ /rdo rje rab gnas las
363b4(rgyud 'grel): byung ba'i/ /rgyal mtshan rin chen tog ldan pa/ /de'i lag par sbyin par bya/ /hUM sku gsung thugs kyi bdag nyid che/ /log pa'i lta ba zil mnon mtshan/ /thams cad tshar gcod rin chen rgya/ /yon tan mngon byung dbang bskur ro/ /oM badzra ke du a be
363b5(rgyud 'grel): shin tsa hUM/ mi bskyod rab gnas rin chen gdugs/ /snying po ldan par slar gnas bya/ /hUM gnyis med ye shes rtog bral ba/ /rmongs sogs sems phyir rang bzhin stong/ /log 'byung rgyu 'bras ma gsungs pa/ /thugs rje skyob par dbang bskur ro//
363b6(rgyud 'grel): oM ratna ts+tshe traM a bi shin tsa hUM/ /sangs rgyas rab gnas lha mo'i tshogs/ /rol pa'i tshul du gus stabs bya/ /oM bza' dang bca' dang btung dang bgo /rang sems rnam dag brgyan pa'i phyir/ /gnyis med rol pa'i dbang bskur bas/ /bdud rtsi
363b7(rgyud 'grel): yid bzhin sku grub shog /oM badzra to ru a bi shin tsa hUM/ /sbyor ba las byung leb rgan bruM/ /gang yin rnams su 'khor lo'i khang/ /nyi zla'i gdan du sems byung b+h+ruM/ /lnga gnyis zung las 'khril sbyor skul/ /ye shes spyan drangs cung zad mchod
364a1(rgyud 'grel): yongs gyur de'i phyag rgya gsal/ /nyan byed 'khor lo'i gzhal yas su/ /gsal ba'i thig le ngo bo nyid/ /traM gi phyag rgya'i tshogs mchog las/ /rin chen dkyil 'khor gsal spro bstim/ /traM gsang ba'i gsang chen gsang mchog gdan?
364a2(rgyud 'grel): gsang ba kun la snyan par bya/ /gsang ba'i don nyid brtag pa la/ /gzhan du smra bar bya ba min/ /gsal ba 'khor lo'i gzhal yas su/ /gsal ba'i thig le'i ngo bo nyid/ /rigs gang yi ge'i tshogs mchog las/ /rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gsal spro
364a3(rgyud 'grel): bstim/ oM dus gsum rgyal ba'i sras chen po/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje zung/ /rgyal ba thams cad mnyes mchod la/ /rgyal ba kun dang mnyam par sbyor/ /lag pa 'khor lo'i gzhal yas su/ /gsal ba'i thig le'i ngo bo nyid/ /hUM gi phyag rgya'i tshogs mchog
364a4(rgyud 'grel): las/ /las kyi dkyil 'khor gsal spro bstim/ /oM khyed ni rdo rje las yin gyis/ /las rnams ma lus kun byon zhig /pho nya'i 'du 'phro nang po kun/ /khyod kyi dgos pa byed pa yin/ /smra byed 'khor lo'i gzhal yas su/ /gsal ba'i thig le'i ngo bo
364a5(rgyud 'grel): nyid/ /h+ri'i phyag rgya'i tshogs mchog las/ /chos kyi 'khor lo gsal spro bstim/ /oM chos kyi rgyal po bla med kyis/ /dad ldan skyes bu ngoms par byos/ /rab 'bring tha ma'i blo can la/ /mthun par gsang sgrags gzhan du min/ /bskyod chen 'khor lo'i 
364a6(rgyud 'grel):  gzhal yas su/ /gsal ba'i thig le'i ngo bo nyid/ /oM hUM swa oM ha rnams las/ /dkyil 'khor lnga dang khro 'phreng sgom/ /rigs lnga'i dkyil 'khor gsal spro bstim/ /thim 'gyur dbyings nas byed por 'bar/ /oM phyogs bcu dus bzhi thams cad kyi
364a7(rgyud 'grel): sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje che/ /dkyil 'khor kun gyi byed pa po/ /dkyil 'khor kun gyi sbyin pa spyod/ /glegs bam 'phreng ba rgya gram ljang/ /'khor lo rdo rje dril bu sbyin/ /cung zad rab gnas gsal ma byas/ /dkyil 'khor bsgrub thabs gsal
364b1(rgyud 'grel): bar dbye/ /shin tu 'phra ba'i dam tshig mchog /sor bzhi 'am yang na mdzub gang la/ /rigs kyi dkyil 'khor legs par brtag /bcu drug phyag rgya phyi rim gsal/ /spyod lam kun gyi rgyud 'thun pa/ /bcud dang nyes par ldan pa la/ /zas srung gos rje dam tshig sbyin/ /las
364b2(rgyud 'grel): dang 'gag sogs legs par bslab/ /byin rlabs mchod pa chen po bya/ /gnyis med ye shes ror ldan pas/ /khrus sogs ldan pa'i bu rnams la/ /mdzem pa'i nyes dmigs sngar shes bya/ /ting 'dzin ldan pas thogs med sbyin/ /bde dang mtshan mo brtag
364b3(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ /bar nas phyag mthil phrad dkyil 'khor/ /phyi rol nang gi tshul du bshad/ /rig pas me tog dor bar bya/ /dogs med bde bar ldan pa gang/ /sdug bsngal las grel zhes dbugs 'byung/ /thun mong rigs mthun rtog med kyang/ /ud+pa la dkar
364b4(rgyud 'grel): nag phyed dkyugs ldan/ /phyogs dang bla 'og 'bring du bshad/ /dri mchog spos dang chu rlung bdag /lto ba 'phra zhing rgyas pa yin/ /zla ba mang bas nyung bar 'gyur/ /yan lag pad 'da' i phyag mtshan can/ /shin tu mnyes shing gzi brjid ldan/ /khong yongs dal
364b5(rgyud 'grel): ba gus dang ldan/ /skabs phyed snyan smra dang che ba/ /sngon nas shin tuAng brtag par bya/ /las sbyor bshad pa bzhin shes nas/ /rin chen la sogs 'dod yon gyis/ /mnyes pa'i me tog dor bar bya/ /sems kyi dkyil 'khor legs bstan la//
364b6(rgyud 'grel): rab gnas las kyis rgyas par bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa' yab yum du/ /bdag gam yang na gzhan gyis brlabs/ /rlung khams dang po shes pa yis/ /dus dang rab gnas 'bras bu ni/ /gnyi ga la yang shes par bya/ /bde ba myong ba de
364b7(rgyud 'grel): bzhin te/ /mnyam par sbyor zhes dus nyid yin/ /gnas kyi ye shes bcu drug po/ /tshogs sbyor ba sogs dang po nas/ /mthar phyin sangs rgyas sa nyid de/ /gnas bzhin de bzhin dbye ba las/ /gnyis pa'i gnyis par rab dga' sogs/ /pha
365a1(rgyud 'grel): rol phyin dang sa mtshan nyid/ /mtshungs phyir rdzogs par bshad pa yin/ /de dag thabs kyi mtshan nyid ni/ /bla ma'i zhal las shes par bya/ /dbang po ma lus bcud 'dus pa/ /phyag rgya'i sems sogs thams cad kyi/ /rang bzhin
365a2(rgyud 'grel): gnyis med ma skyes pa/ /dang po byed phyir mi thob ste/ /de nyid gang la bstan gyur pa'i/ /rgyal mtshan mchog ni dbang por gsungs/ /sngon bshad shes bya'i mchog gyur pa/ /gang dang ldan de shes bya'i yul/ /rten can rang bzhin bdag nyid phyir/ /'dres
365a3(rgyud 'grel): pas de nyid gsal 'gyur ba/ /rnam shes thugs ni rdo rje sems/ /thams cad 'byung ba'i gter nyid dang/ /thams cad 'gro ba'i gnas nyid de/ /de yis ma bskyed gang yang med/ /'khor der mya ngan 'das pa'i rgyu/ /de las thams cad skye zhing
365a4(rgyud 'grel): 'byung/ /kun gyi phyag rgya'i rgyu yin te/ bde ba'i byang chub bsgrub pa'i rdzas/ /de la thabs kyi lus zhes bya/ /ye shes rang bzhin lus bstan pa/ /thams cad bdag phyir gnyis med cing/ /shes bya shes byed ma skyes phyir/ /thams cad mdza' 
365a5(rgyud 'grel): stong rang rig nyid/ /stong pa'i stong pa'ang chen por gsungs/ /gang nas ma 'ongs gar mi 'gro /'gro dang 'ong bar bya ba min/ /shin tu rtag dka' mi dmigs la/ /mdza' dang dbus su rtag tu med/ /gzung 'dzin bral ba'i rang rig nyid/ /
365a6(rgyud 'grel): dmigs med tshul du de snang ngo/ /dbyings dang dbyings kyi ye shes kyang/ /rang rig kho nas tsam du zad/ /'das dang ma 'das bdag yin pas/ /kun la smon cing chags su med/ /sems dang byang chub dbyer med pas/ /sems can ma lus thams cad
365a7(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /dus gsum chos rnams thams cad gsal/ /rnam par rtog pa mi mnga' ste/ /de yis mi mkhyen ci yang med/ /'od gsal thams cad mkhyen dbang du/ /kun bzang rdo rje sems dpa' gsungs/ /gang zhig cung zad ma lon pas/ /
365b1(rgyud 'grel): rjes su mthun pa'i yul nyid la/ /khyad par cung zad nyi ldan ma/ /yul gyi dkyil 'khor gsal bar bya/ /gang gis de dag nyams lon pa/ /lha mdzes rin chen mchog tu gsungs/ /rdo rje nyi ma thabs kyi rgya/ /de zla bsil byed shes rab dngos/ /gnyis med
365b2(rgyud 'grel): bde ba mdza' bral la/ /gdags pa yod phyir zung 'jug sku/ /ri dags nor 'dzin spyi gzugs ni/ /ji ltar ltas pa der snang ste/ /rang gi ngo bo bstan du med/ /yod la rtsal na sgro brtags 'gyur/ /med la rtsal na skur btab ste/ /yod med gnyis
365b3(rgyud 'grel): las rtsal byas na/ /de ni lung du ma bstan 'gyur/ /rkyen bral rang dbang ye shes ni/ /thams cad lhun grub rang dbang 'gyur/ /gar yang ma chags pad+ma bzhin/ /phung sogs ye shes phyag rgya dag /bsam gyis mi khyab bsam bral bas/ /
365b4(rgyud 'grel): rang rig nyid du rang gsal bas/ /gcig dang du ma yongs kyis bral/ /gdul bya'i bsam pa rdzogs byed kyang/ /gdul bya bdag phyir dmigs su med/ /de nyid shes rab thabs su rdzogs/ /tshogs gnyis nges rdzogs mchog ni/ /gdong nas
365b5(rgyud 'grel): dus gsum 'gyur med de/ /gang zhig rkyen gyis ma bskyed phyir/ /bstan 'gyur dbang gis mchog tu gsungs/ /dgos pa rang bzhin don min te/ /rgyu rkyen sgribs g.yog dbang du gsungs/ /shes rab thabs kyi ye shes tshogs/ /thig
365b6(rgyud 'grel): le bsam yas ye shes che/ /bdud rtsi bsil dro 'jam pa'i dbyangs/ /rtsa gnas pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor du/ /gong thabs rigs pa rlung mthu yis/ /bde ba thugs kyi dkyil 'khor spro/ /'od gsal 'pho bas kun la khyab/ /bde ba nyams pas
365b7(rgyud 'grel): kun tu thim/ /bzhi bcu gnyis sogs phyag rgya che/ /gzugs mdzes skyod pas phyogs bcur g.yo/ /snying po'i thig le mnyam sbyor bas/ /bde ba'i ye shes rol mo yis/ /ye shes dgye la mchod pa 'bul/ /thag pa med pa'i bsod nams
366a1(rgyud 'grel): kyis/ /ye shes sgyu ma rang snang ba/ /rol mo'i dkyil 'khor mdza' yas mchog/ gsang ba'i thig le nyid kyi dbyings/ /de ni sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos/ /phyogs bcu dus bzhi sngon rdzogs pa'i/ /sku gsung yon tan 'phrin las thugs/
366a2(rgyud 'grel): ma lus bdag nyid zhal mthong ba/ /dbang bskur mchog nyid dam pa yis/ /dkyil 'khor la gnas dkyil 'khor nyid/ /rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor lhun gyis grub/ /rgyan du dkyil 'khor ma lus thogs/ /rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor mnyam sbyor bas/ /
366a3(rgyud 'grel): thugs rje dkyil 'khor yongs kyis 'byung/ /zhi dang spyod yul de bzhin te/ /ngo mtshar cho 'phrul rmad kyi chos/ /gzhan nas yod 'ongs ma yin te/ /thabs la bstan pa'i shes rab nyid/ /de lta bu'i dang du byung/ /shes rab dbyings kyi de bzhin nyid/
366a4(rgyud 'grel): thabs kyi phyag rgyar gyur pa'i phyir/ ye shes la ni ye shes rol/ /ye shes rol pa nyid kyang gsog /rgyal ba sngon byung skyob pa dang/ /byin rlabs ston pa de bzhin te/ /bya byed nus mthu'i gzi byin gyis/ /sgyu ma rdo rje btsan po mchog /ther zug
366a5(rgyud 'grel): rgyun las rab grol ba/ /ngo bo nyid rtag rdo rje'i sku/ /dmigs pa kun las rab grol te/ /rdo rje de bzhin nyid du son/ /de nas yang dag rdzogs pa'i/ /yon tan ma lus bdag tu gsal/ /sa sogs lta ngan las grol ba'i/ /rang sems
366a6(rgyud 'grel): ye shes mdza' dbus med/ /yon tan bsam yas dngos grub kyang/ /rang gi ngo bo bstan par dka' / /'du 'bral med gzungs bde ba che/ /rjes su 'das dang ma 'das rol/ /phyogs bcu sku gsung yon tan ni/ /du ma cig bral tshul snang
366a7(rgyud 'grel): la/ /dus gsum chos kun bdag cig phyir/ /mngon mkhyen thad ka'i dmigs yul grol/ /de la sogs pa mdza' yas mchog /thabs chen thabs la byung ba'i sku/ /de ni byang chub rdo rje'i mchog /snod bcud rim pa'i mtshan nyid ni/ /
366b1(rgyud 'grel): sems skyed las kyis dang rnams la/ /gnyis kyi nang du ban gdags bya/ /bdag gzhan don byed brtson 'grus ldan/ /gnyis dang gsum du phye ba yis/ /las kun dngos grub thogs pa med/ /brtul zhugs rnam pa gnyis ldan pas/ /gzhan gyi longs spyod
366b2(rgyud 'grel): thams cad bya/ /'bras bu rgyun la ming brtags pas/ /rigs dang mnyam pa'i brtul zhugs kyi/ /las thabs nyams dang ldan pa la/ /'od gsal ye shes thams cad mkhyen/ /bdag nyid kyis kyang gtang bar bya/ /de bzhin de nyid nyams thob pas//
366b3(rgyud 'grel): sems mdza' 'gro 'od la gnas te/ /sa rnams slar la zlog pa ni/ /'khor ba nyid dang spang du med/ /dbyer med kun bzangs sa la 'god/ /dngos grub zhing gyur dbang phyug ni/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid de/ /'bad pas mnyes par mi byed pa/ /
366b4(rgyud 'grel): bskal par sbrebs dang mun nag sogs/ /bde bas rab tu brel 'gyur zhing/ /thabs dang shes rab la sogs lam/ /shin tu ring bar 'gyur ba yin/ /nus mthu byin rlabs bde gshegs lung/ /nor bu rgya mtsho mkha' lta bu/ /sa bcu sems dpa' 
366b5(rgyud 'grel): chen pos kyang/ /nus mthu gzu lums ma yin phyir/ /gus pas rim par blang ba rnams/ /gang zhig dbang rnams ma thob pas/ /nyan pa la sogs rtsom pa rnams/ /'bras bu med cing klag par 'gyur/ /thabs dang shes rab bde ldan pa'i/ /
366b6(rgyud 'grel): 'bras bu rgya las gzhan med phyir/ /bdag dang gzhan gyi bde spong ba/ /bskal ba bye ba mdza' klas par/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnyed mi 'gyur/ /sems nyid sangs rgyas ngo bo'i phyir/ /lam yang gzhan na yod ma yin/ /rmongs pas gzhan
366b7(rgyud 'grel): na rnyed mi 'gyur/ /thabs dang mi mthun sman pa'i don/ /zhi spyod bde bas bde 'tshal ba/ /bde ba 'dod pas rgyab kyis phyogs/ /shin tu lam ring sngon spyod pa/ /'di la mi shong phra dog mchog /gang yang phan pas dbang bskur ba'i/ /dus 'di
367a1(rgyud 'grel): phyin chad rgyal ba'i sras/ /ngan song thams cad med pa dang/ /mtho ris thar pa'i bdag por 'gyur/ /las thams cad la thogs med pa'i/ /dngos grub kun la dbang byed pa'o/ /dbang phyug chen po nyid du nges/ /lha mig la sogs
367a2(rgyud 'grel): mngon byas nas/ /lus dang longs spyod bcas pa yi/ /rigs 'dzin sa la rab gnas nas/ /'jigs med kun tu bzang por sbyor/ /yum dang sgeg mo la sogs pa/ /de nyid byin gyis rlob bar 'gyur/ /thams cad mkhyen pa rang rigs gis/ /
367a3(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas nyid dang spyod yul cing/ /de la sogs pa bsam mi khyab/ /yon tan rdzogs shing rdzogs mi 'gyur/ /kye ma'o ye nas gsang ba'i chos/ /thams cad kun la rang bzhin gnas/ /ngang gis bdag snyam ma rtogs pas/ /kun la yong?
367a4(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin gsang/ /gzhan du min la shin tu gsang/ /don nyid kyis ni gsang ba'i sku/ /mnyam pa'i rdo rje can gyi gsungs/ /de phyir gsang ba'i don mchog 'di/ /lta ba dman la bstan byas na/ /dus min par ni srog zad nas/ /mgo 'gas
367a5(rgyud 'grel): snying yang tshig par 'gyur/ /khab len kyis ni lcags sdud ltar/ /mi 'dod bzhin du dbang med par/ /ngan song bskal par myong bar 'gyur/ /de bas rdo rje gsang mchog 'di/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i thugs rje yis/ /chos la skyon yod ma
367a6(rgyud 'grel): yin te/ /sems can don du shin tu gsang/ /theg pa dman dang phyin ci log /de la gsang bstan gyur na/ /rang bzhin gsang don mi shes par/ /'phral gyi spyod yul de dag la/ /shin tu nges pa don bzung nas/ /gsang don de nyid
367a7(rgyud 'grel): log par khrid/ /ma rtogs de nyid dmyal bar 'gro /de bas rab tu gsang bar bya/ /gsang ba spel bar byed pa yang/ /smra byed lce la zhing rmo zhing/ /sdug bsngal chen po myong bar 'gyur/ /de phyir rdo rje lce yod kyang/ /theg pa dman dang
367b1(rgyud 'grel): ma 'dres dang/ /skye bo phal la smra mi bya/ /gang yang sbyor ba mi shes sems blangs chags sogs rang bzhin rmongs dbang dang blangs pa/ /rgyal zer nges par dbang 'gags bzod dka' skyed sogs bcu'i cig 'khrul 'khor nges ltung ba/ /de nyid rigs
367b2(rgyud 'grel): ldan cung zad dang blangs bde zlog thabs sbyor cig gis grol thar zhing/ /tshe sogs mang thob rgyu 'bras kun rdzogs thabs rgyal 'di dka' 'gro mang byang chub shog /sgyu 'phrul dra ba rdo rje las kyi rim pa zhes bya ba/ dngos po gnyis pa rdzogs so// //
367b3(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan 'das/ dpal kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dad brtson ldan pa'i slob ma yis/ /ri mo'i dkyil 'khor chen po ru/ /nus dang phan pa'i dbang thob nas/ /brtul zhugs ldan pa'i bu mchog la/ /ye shes rang gnas rdzogs bya'i phyir/ /sor bzhi
367b4(rgyud 'grel): 'am mdzub gang tshad ldan la/ /nyi shu rtsa lnga rab bsnyams te/ /gdan dang phyag rgya yi ge sogs/ /rgyud bzhin mkhas pas byin gyis brlabs/ /blo ldan sngon nas shes bya ba/ /bcu drug nyi shu lnga gnyis tshad/ /yon tan bcu gsum rab ldan zhing/
367b5(rgyud 'grel): mnyen drang skra ring sems ma'i tshul/ /gsang ba'i gter du ming gis bzung/ /'o ma'i spos chus mgo lus bkru/ /tsan dan gur gum a ka ru zer lo/ /gon pan 'dzaM ti shing tsha yis/ /dri zhim dang ldan chab kyis slubs/ /gsal ldan ma 'am
367b6(rgyud 'grel): byin brlabs pa'i/ /kha snying pad+ma la sogs la/ /gsang yum lnga dang khro mo'i bzhi'i/ /dbyibs dang kha dog gsal bar bya/ /rang gi mchod pa legs sbyar la/ /yum dang 'dzom ma sems ma yis/ /ji ltar 'dod pa'i las bzhin mchod/ /zad med gter
367b7(rgyud 'grel): la longs spyod phyir/ /rin chen snyim pa bkang nas ni/ /rdo rje sems gtso khyed la 'dud/ /thar lam chen po de 'dod de/ /mgon po dpa' o skyabs song zhing/ /theg chen khang par zhugs pa dang/ /mkhyen rab gsang ba bdag la gsol/ /bu 'dir
368a1(rgyud 'grel): shog cig ci bde bar/ /las spyod rim par 'gro ba dang/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje zung/ /rdzogs pa'i ye shes bde chen la/ /dmigs pa med par gnas phyir du/ /ser sna spangs pa'i dang yid kyis/ /gtong zhing
368a2(rgyud 'grel): rang sems brtan par zung/ /ye shes rang gnas rdzogs dbang sbyin/ /'dod pa'i dngos pos rol pa'i/ /phyag rgya bzhi ldan 'gyur ba dang/ /rgyal po'i phyag rgya lnga ldan pas/ /stong gsum yungs 'brur 'jug tshul gyis/ /dbyings nas dkyil 'khor
368a3(rgyud 'grel): spyan drang mchod/ /shes rab thabs kyi phyag rgya las/ /bde ba'i 'bru tshogs gsal ba'i rgyun/ /rdo rje lam nas padmor skyil/ /'khyud dang bzlog pa'i bde ba yis/ /sangs rgyas sprin tshogs ma lus la/ /dkyes mnyam mchog gi sbyin bas bstim
368a4(rgyud 'grel): sgo 'byed bde bas gyen du bskyil/ /de nas dbang phyug chen po des/ /mi 'gyur sgron ma sgul bskyod cing/ /sems kyi thig le sgro phye ste/ /tshangs pa chen po dbyangs bzhes nas/ /go 'byer rdo rje ljags brkyang nas/ /grub pa'i nyi zla snying po ste/ /dkyil
368a5(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje lce yis blang/ /rtse nas bstims shing dkyil 'khor bsgyur/ /tshangs pa sgo ba 'di gsungs so/ /nga ni rgyal ba kun gyi bla/ /thig le byang chub sems chen po/ /nga ni khrag 'thung kun gyi rje/ /ye shes rol ba'i 'byung gnas gter
368a6(rgyud 'grel): ba ni spyi dpal bla na med/ /skyon bral thabs kyi rgyal po yin/ /sems kyi dkyil nas drangs pa'i chu/ /khyod kyi lce la phab pa 'di/ /snying gi dkyil du bzung bar byos/ /rigs kyi bu mchog 'di phan chad/ /rdo rje sems pa'i thugs mchog
368a7(rgyud 'grel): zung/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gtso bo yin/ /byang chub sems dang mnyam pa'i phyir/ /sems dpa' kun gyi mchod gnas yin/ /rigs kyi bu mchog ding phan chad/ /phyi dang nang dang gsang ba yi/ /bstan pa'i phyi nang zab mo kun/ /
368b1(rgyud 'grel): sems kyi dkyil du bsdus nas kyang/ /rdo rje lce'i sgo phye ste/ /bdud rtsi sman mchog dam pa 'di/ /dad ldan skyes bu ngoms par byos/ /gdul ba'i phyag rgya 'di yang spyod/ /phyi nang snod bcud rnam par dag /rnam dag chen po nyid kyi lam/ /byed spyod thams cad
368b2(rgyud 'grel): tshogs gnyis rdzogs/ /'gro don bde chen padmo sbyin/ /sems kyi chu ni 'thung bar bya'o/ /rnal 'byor chen pos dam du bzung/ /yungs kar tshad tsam rdo rje sems/ /gnas ngan len pa gsum sbyangs te/ /hUM nyid ring po mtshams sbyar nas/ /thams cad bde
368b3(rgyud 'grel): ba chen po'i dbyings/ /dge sdig las kyis ma bcos shing/ /bsgom zhing bsgrubs pas mi 'byang pa'i/ /rnam dag sems kyi rin chen gter/ /rdo rje snying po ye shes kyis/ /khro rgyal kun gyi gtser gyur cig /sh+rI ma hA su kha badzra bo d+he hUM ho oM/ /rdo rje
368b4(rgyud 'grel): snying gar legs bzung la/ /bden pa'i tshig ni 'di skad bsgo/ /oM mi 'gyur ba'i ye shes nas/ /ma brtsal phyin pas bde ba'i mchog /ma bltas gsal ba ye shes spyan/ /gong na med pas kun gyi rje/ /ye shes rang gnas brdal ba la/ /mi 'gyur
368b5(rgyud 'grel): g.yung drung sa bon shog /oM mahA gu ya/ /b+h+ruM dz+nyA na maN+Da la/ /dz+nyA na g+hu ya sid d+hi/ sarba adma ko haM/ ye shes rang gnas su 'dod pas/ /thig le mtshan ma legs snyed nas/ /khrus dang mdzes par dbul bar bya/ /ye shes rang gnas rgyal pos
368b6(rgyud 'grel): byin brlabs te/ /rdo rje zla ba'i 'od zer gyis/ /rdo rje dbyings phyug rab byas te/ /rin chen snod du mdzes pa'i dkyil/ /rang gi sems nyid yungs kar bsam/ /phab pas thig le dbang bskur te/ /g.yas g.yon gung mo rin chen chos kyi sku/ /shes
368b7(rgyud 'grel): rab thabs kyis rdzogs par 'gyur/ /'di dang skye ba thams cad du/ /dngos grub bde 'di ma spong zhig /rgyal bas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas khyod las byung/ /spangs na rdo rje dbyings phyug bstsal/ /bkug dang sdom pa
369a1(rgyud 'grel): ma shes na/ /rdo rje bskal pa mdza' klas par/ /chos sku thob par mi 'gyur ro/ /gsang ba'i don mchog 'di dag ni/ /lta ba dman la bstan byas na/ /dus min par ni srog zang nas/ /mgo 'gas snying yang tshig par 'gyur/ /khab
369a2(rgyud 'grel): len gyis ni lcags sdud ltar/ /mi 'dod bzhin du dbang med par/ /bskal par ngan song myong bar 'gyur/ /de bas shin tu gsang bar bya/ /de skad gsang ba'i las gnyer gtad/ /de nas rigs kyi bu mchog des/ /ye shes rang gnas rdzogs
369a3(rgyud 'grel): bya'i phyir/ /dgug dang dkug pa'i thabs 'di bstan/ /bde chen bzang po'i mtshan ldan pas/ /rang bzhin ldan pa'i chos sku ste/ /bcu drug thabs dang shes rab gnyis/ /longs spyod rdzogs sku gcig cha yis/ /gnas pa med par rol zhes bshad/ /chos
369a4(rgyud 'grel): nyid thabs dang shes rab las/ /rtsa ba ni 'ong ba ni sa bon drug /mdor sdus snying po chos kyi sku/ /de'i phyir chos kyi 'khor lo'o/ /dur khrod brgyad po kun bsdus ba'o/ /bcu drug gcig dang bzhi dgyes pa/ /khams gsum khyab pas sprul sku'o/ /me dang rdo rje
369a5(rgyud 'grel): dbyings phyug gnyis/ /mnyam du gnas pas drag par bshad/ /rlung ngan bkug pa'i gzhung dbyings te/ /sa bon yang gis spro byed pa/ /las ni mthur du sel ba ste/ /bud med rgyud la gtu mor bshad/ /zla brgyas pa'i thig le gnyis/ /chos la thig
369a6(rgyud 'grel): ler bskul ba bzhin/ /de sogs mang po bkug pa kun/ /rdzogs pa'i skyed par bla mas gsungs/ /rang bzhin thig le mtshan rdzogs pa/ /yi ge med par byin brlabs pa/ /dbyings phyug med par byin brlabs pa/ /snang ba thob par 'gyur bas na//
369a7(rgyud 'grel): thabs dang shes rab gang yin ? sku/ /bkug dang rlung phye phyi nang can/ /gsang snod gsang sgo sdom pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /mi rtog dngos po thob par bshad/ /dang po'i sa la reg par nus/ /de phyir rdzogs pa'i yi ge med/ /chos sku thob par the tshom
369b1(rgyud 'grel): med/ /yangs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan kun/ /'bad pa med par shugs kyis 'byung/ /gsang dbang pad mar ldan 'gyur nang/ /chags pa med pa'i tshul gyis su/ /pha rol phyin bcu rgyu 'bras rdzogs/ /sa bcu rim gyis bgrong byed rdzogs/ /kun tu 'od gsal
369b2(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma spyan yang rdzogs/ /thabs dang shes rab sa yang rdzogs/ /yang dag rdzogs chen thabs dang ldan/ /shes rab bla med yang dag rdzogs/ /bsod nams ye shes tshogs chen rdzogs/ /'di ltar snang ba'i rnal 'byor pas/ /g.yeng ba med par zhugs byas te//
369b3(rgyud 'grel): brtson 'grus yu ba gcad pa des/ /gdon mi za bar 'grub ces gsungs/ /dbang bskur gnas pa gang thob pa/ /dus 'di phan chad rgyal ba'i sras/ /tshe ring bde ba phun sum tshogs/ /ngan song thams cad mid pa dang/ /mtho ris thar pa'i bdag por 'gyur/ /'jigs
369b4(rgyud 'grel): med kun tu bzang por sbyor/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i dbang gis gal po'o/ /rdzogs so// // */ /rgya gar skad du/ a b+hi shiny+tsa arthan ya hi sa du nA ma/ bod skad du/ dbang gi don nges par 'byed pa/ /gsang
369b5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i ye shes chen po la/ /sgyu ma'i rig ba'i thabs ldan pas/ /mos rnyed mngon du gyur pa'i sa/ /gnyis med gsal 'byams dang bas 'dud/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba rdo rje sems/ /rgyud rgyal rgya mtsho dbang gi don/ /thams cad rgyud du ma bstan pa/ /bdag
369b6(rgyud 'grel): gis gsal bar brjod par bya/ /rang bzhin thob bya dbus gter gyad nor bzhin te/ /gzhan ming bdag la gnas 'gyur kyang/ /rang gi rang bzhin mi? mthong yul med shes bral brtag par gsal mthong nus med phyir/ /nam mkha' i ri bong can dang bya dang
369b7(rgyud 'grel): mdzub mo lta bur bskul bral tshig gis ni/ /phan nus gsang rig brtan don rang gnas lam blos rim bgrod man ngag lung gis mtshan/ /rgyal sras mchog bzhin ldan 'gyur brgyad bdun dbang skur rang gis non dbang sgyur ltar/ /snod ldan chos bzhi ldan
370a1(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur mdo lnga bco brgyad dbang bskur lam bgrod sa non thabs/ /grangs mdo rnam pa'i lus bzhag gnas lugs lam thabs 'bras mthar phyin yul rnam bkod de/ /bra sran 'bras bzhin med na mi 'byung phyir
370a2(rgyud 'grel): na thog mdza' bar dus gzhan min shes/ /thog ma'i mtshan nyid bshad bya ba/ /snod kyi thob bya pan tsa ste/ /til mar bzhin du ye gnas pa'i/ /ngo bo lnga pa'i dang po nyid/ /rgyu'i dus na rdzogs pa ni/ /bum pa nang gi rtsa bcud de/ /bde ba'i 'khor lo
370a3(rgyud 'grel): gdung ba sel/ /gsang dbang rtsa sdong rgyal mtshan go /dngos po sems phyir longs spyod do/ /la la ra sa g.yas g.yon gnyis/ /bden lam spros ldan g.yas g.yon bsdus?/ /lus kun khyab pa cod pan te/ /dbu ma char yang mdud ldan 'phreng//
370a4(rgyud 'grel): dpung sogs rtogs pa rtsa ba 'bring/ /'byung chung rtsa lnga gtso bor rags/ /'phra ba'i mtshan nyid yul de bzhin/ /rnam smin lus kyi phyogs cha bcu/ /phyogs mtshams bsrung byed khro bo ste/ /phra rags tshul gyi stangs dbyal lo/ /yid chog
370a5(rgyud 'grel): chags bsogs rnam drug po/ /bya byed sprul sku'i phyag rgya ste/ /rgyas par brgyad cu rtsa gnyis so/ /gzugs nyid rgyu 'bras bcud ldan la/ /stangs 'byal bcu'i ngo bo ste/ /gsang chos lus kyi mtshan ma rnams/ /las kyi sgo bsrungs brgyad
370a6(rgyud 'grel): gyur ba/ /sdud pa'i phyag rgya shes par bya/ /rnam shes ye shes lnga ldan pa/ /dbu brgyan rigs lnga lhun gyis grub/ /rnam lnga khams bcud snying po lnga/ /phan dbang rang bzhin gnas pa'i don/ /lam dus mtshungs pa'i 'di zhes bshad
370a7(rgyud 'grel): gnyis pa'i ngo bo nyid nus gnas la/ /nyan sogs las kyi dkyil 'khor lnga/ /rna dbang rnam shes dkyil 'khor nyan/ /yan lag lnga la rab 'byam ste/ /sgra sogs las la dbang sgyur zhing/ /rang bzhin gnas pa'i don du bstan/ /myong dbang
370b1(rgyud 'grel): 'chad pa'i mtshan nyid de/ /sgra dbyangs yi ge sgyur phyir ro/ /sgrom mdo rlung sogs las bzhi'i dbyibs/ /snying gi thig le bsgom lha ste/ /snod bcud kun gyi bdag po dang/ /bsam pa'i las la sbyor phyir ro/ /las su 'di dag byed spyod kyang/ /rang bzhin
370b2(rgyud 'grel): ma grub sems med phyir/ /bsgom dang bsgom par bya med phyir/ /chags med tshul du rang bzhin gnas/ /rang bzhin gnas don gsum pa ni/ /tha snyad gnyis sdud byang chub sems/ /ma'i tha snyad kun rdzob don/ /yul ming ma mthong gsang ba'i
370b3(rgyud 'grel): ming/ /snang byed thabs kyang de bzhin te/ /rang bzhin bde ba gnas pa'i lam/ /khu ba rgyud pas bde myong ba/ /rang bzhin gnas lugs gsang ba'i dbang/ /thabs dang byin brlabs 'brel ba'i phyir/ /brtul zhugs ldan pas spyad cing blang/ /bzhi
370b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i gnas lugs 'di bzhin te/ /tha snyad rig phyir mdza' bral bas/ /'dzin dang bzung ba med pa'i phyir/ /rang rig gsal bas khyab gnas pa'o/ /lnga pa bde chen brtan pa nyid/ /rang rig rkyen med rang gsal ba/ /sku dang ye shes ngo bo nyid/ /rang
370b5(rgyud 'grel): nyid lhun gyis grub pa ni/ /rgyu 'bras rim pa'i dus bral ba/ /rgyu'i dus nyid 'bras rdzogs pa'o/ /thob bya rgyu la mi gnas na/ /phyogs dus rgyu dang rkyen dag gis/ /kun nas slong thob rigs med de/ /bu? sran 'bras su dbang bskur yang/ /de la 'bras bu snang
370b6(rgyud 'grel): ba med/ /dbang mchog rang la gnas par ni/ /dus gsum rgyal ba'i lung las gsungs/ /dbang rnams rang la med 'gyur na/ /bskur bas thob par mi 'gyur te/ /gdod nas ldan phyir mtshungs pa ste/ /gzhi'i phyir thog mar bkod pa yin//
370b7(rgyud 'grel): lus gzhan bar ma'i mtshan nyid ni/ /ngo bo dbang lnga thun mong du/ /lus ni bcu dang drug gis rdzogs/ /snod dang dkyil 'khor skur ba'i dus/ /rang gi ngo bo des tshig dang/ /bskur rdzas thabs dang rgyu dang rkyen/ /gnas dang sgrib spong thob pa'i tshad
371a1(rgyud 'grel): chos dang dgos ched skyen yon gyis/ /mdor bsdus lus kyi mtshan nyid bzhag /phan ba rgyas pa'i don bstan pa/ /phan dbang bcu la mos dang na/ /de nyid sbyin pa'i snod du bstan/ /rgyas 'bring dkyil 'khor ri mo ru/ /las
371a2(rgyud 'grel): kyi gzhung rdzogs phan dbang bskur/ /dang po sems bskyed 'jug dus su/ /rdzas kyi dbang bcu rdzogs par sbyin/ /ngo bo'i mtshan nyid bstan pa ni/ /mtshon bya dbang dang mtshon byed de/ /mtshon bya bdag la rdzogs pa ste/ /mtshon byed rab gnas
371a3(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa'i rdzas/ /thob bya gang yin ngo bo ste/ /rgyu rkyen 'dzoms pas bskur ba yis/ /bdag la nus bskyes rno la ngar brtags bzhin/ /bdag la phan phyir ming du brjod/ /rdzas ni rnam bcu'i ngo bo nyid/ /las kyi rim pa rgyas pa yis/ /bskur
371a4(rgyud 'grel): ba'i thabs kun gsungs pa yin/ /mtshungs ldan lhan cig rgyu yin te/ /mtshungs pa rang bzhin gnas pa nyid/ /lhan cig byed pa rdzas bcu dngos/ /phyag rgya rang gi mtshan nyid dang/ /gdugs la mi bskyod rab gnas te/ /bum pa rang gi
371a5(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems/ /dbu brgyan rang bzhin snying po 'bras/ /'phreng ba cod pan rin chen pad/ /go cha rgyal mtshan rdo rje sems/ /bza' btung snang mdzad rab gnas ldan/ /dngos su las sbyor lhan cig rgyu/ /rkyen ni rgyu dang bdag po dang/ /de ma
371a6(rgyud 'grel): thag pa dmigs pa bzhi/ /slob ma'i yon tan bcu drug nyid/ /chags gnyis rang phyogs chang dang chung/ /dregs bskur phrag dog le lo med/ /snying rje ldan zhing kheng sems med/ /longs spyod mi chags nan tan ldan/ /yid ring ldog med
371a7(rgyud 'grel): rkyen thub cing/ /dang ba'i sems ldan thob pa'i rgyu/ /dkyil 'khor bskur rdzas dus nyid dang/ /ting 'dzin sngags dang phyag rgya yis/ /nus mthu mang po snang ba nyid/ /bdag po'i rkyen du brjod pa yin/ /dngos bcu skad kyi tshul dag gis/ /
371b1(rgyud 'grel): snga phyi ltos nas go 'byed ba/ /rgyu 'bras tshul de de ma thag /lta ba ting 'dzin nongs ldan zhing/ /log pa'i lta 'bras byin brlabs can/ /las dang man ngag rgyu ldan pa/ /dngos rdzas rdzogs pa'i slob dpon ni/ /rim pa nod pa'i yul du gsungs/ /gnas ni spyi?
371b2(rgyud 'grel): dang khyad par te/ /gnas ni phyi dang nang gnyis te/ /phyi rol ri dang yul phyi dang/ /sgrub khang sa nas lo rgyus can/ /blang bya de bzlog nas/ /de bzhin nang la stems gnyis/ /spyi dbang lus la bskur ba ste/ /brgyad par snying po dbu brgyan bum/ /
371b3(rgyud 'grel): gdugs dang cod pan 'phreng ba gos/ /go cha lus te rgyal mtshan lag /bza' btung ngag gi lam la'o/ /phyag rgya spyi po 'am snying ga ste/ /gzhag pa'i gnas dang bstim pa'i gnas/ /de bzhin khong adu chud pa gces/ /sgrib pa spong lugs spyi khyad
371b4(rgyud 'grel): par/ /las dang rnam smin phyogs cha re/ /skye gnas brgyad spong spyi'i ste/ /khyad par bkur gnas spyi dang sbyar/ /dpang thob ces pa'i tha snyad ni/ /spyad rgyu mngon sum thob pa yang/ /go mi 'gog cing rig la snang/ /tha mar sangs rgyas thob byed cing
371b5(rgyud 'grel): nus pa gang skyes thob pa'i tshad/ /chos dang chos ni nyan bshad/ /phyi rol drang don mnyan bshad rung/ /dkyil 'khor la sogs mtshan nyid bshad/ /brod dang g.yang sa shes phyir ro/ /dgos ched spyi dang khyad par ro/ /nus sgo 'byed dang sa
371b6(rgyud 'grel): bgrod phyir/ /skabs kyis rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur/ /khyad par rang gi don du'o/ /skyon ma mgo 'gas chos mi thos/ /yon tan tshe ring bde ba thob/ /'di dang phyi mar thob pa'o/ /nus pa'i snod ni bdag dang gzhan/ /gnyis ka'i don byed brtson
371b7(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa/ /khyad par snod ces bstan pa ste/ /bcu drug mtshan ldan spyi'i snod/ /phan bzhin ri mo'i dkyil 'khor dang/ /yan lag lnga sogs dkyil 'khor te/ /slob ma'i dus su nus dbang bskur/ /phan pa thob pa'i dus nyid du/ /ngo bo
372a1(rgyud 'grel): mnyam bya bsgom bya sogs/ /dbang po yan lag gnas gsal ba'o/ /bdag gzhan don la nus gsal ba/ /rdzas ni glegs pam rgya gram dang/ /'khor lo phreng ba rdo rje dril/ /'byung ldan don yod snang mdza' yas/ /yi dam
372a2(rgyud 'grel): rigs lnga'i rab gnas ldan/ /thabs ni dbang sogs gnas lnga ru/ /so so'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor bskyed/ /rgyu ni rnam grangs bshad bzhin te/ /bdag gnas mtshungs rgyu la sogs pa/ /lhan cig rgyu ru bshad pa yin/ /nus la dad ldan
372a3(rgyud 'grel): rgyu'i rkyen/ /bdag po yan lag tshogs pa'i mthu/ /de ma thag pa nus rim lnga/ /bltos nas 'bras go 'byed pa'o/ /dmigs pa mtshan ldan man ngag can/ /byin rlabs ldan pa pha nyid do/ /gnas ni rna ba snying lag dang/ /lce dang yan lag rnam
372a4(rgyud 'grel): lnga'o/ /mgrin pa phan dang nus ming ste/ /khyad par phan dang nyon mongs dang/ /tha mar rtog pa 'jil bar byed/ /thob pa'i tshad ni nus pa lnga/ /bdag dang gzhan dang gnyis ka'i don/ /spyod sgo ma 'gags thob pa'i tshad/ /chos ni nges grol nges
372a5(rgyud 'grel): bshad rnams/ /snang byed man chad nyan du rung/ /dag pa gsang ba'i sgo 'byed dang/ /bsgom dang dbugs phyung rjes su sbyar/ /don gnyis mthar phyin bya phyir ro/ /skyon ni dbang med las brtson dang/ /de nyid glags ba'i rgyu ru 'gyur/ /
372a6(rgyud 'grel): yon tan don mthar phyin byed pa'i/ /thams cad la ni thogs med pa'o/ /gsang ba'i dbang zhes brjod pa'i snod/ /spyod pa'i brtul shugs ldan pa yis/ /dam rdzas rnams la mdzem med pa'o/ /dkyil 'khor sor bzhi mdzub gang ste/ /phyi rol
372a7(rgyud 'grel): nang gi tshul du dbye'o/ /dus ni nus thob rdzogs slob ba'o/ /mtshan nyid bar mar 'jug pa yi/ /ngo bo rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur/ /khu? ba ye shes ro ldan pas/ /mi rtog myong ba'i dus ldan pa'o/ /thob bya rang gi ngo bo yi/ /thabs dang shes rab
372b1(rgyud 'grel): gnyis med drug /bla ma'i nyi zla ro ldan pa/ /ma thob rab tu snang med gsang/ /de nyid byin pas snang med pa/ /bde dang mtshan ma skyes pa ni/ /dbang zhes tha snyad brjod pa yin/ /rdzas ni dngos dang nus pa ste/ /dngos ni nyi zla byang chub sems/ /bskur
372b2(rgyud 'grel): thabs chen mchog gsal ba la/ /nus pa skyed phyir thob pa shun/ /las kyi rim pa thabs brjod de/ /sor bzhi pa nas che mchog bar/ /mtshungs rgyu sngar bshad gnas lugs de/ /lhan cig byed rgyu ro ldan sems/ /rkyen ni brtul zhugs dang sems
372b3(rgyud 'grel): rgyu/ /yan lag tshang zhi'i nus pa dag /sbyor mnyam ldan pa'i slob ma'i yul/ /skad cig las rim go 'byed pa/ /de ma thag pa'i mtshan nyid do/ /gnas ni gzhan dang stim gnyis so/ /sems kyi dkyil nas drangs pa'i chu/ /khyod kyi lce la phab pa ni/ /
372b4(rgyud 'grel): snying gi dkyil du gzung bar byos/ /gdams pa lce nyid gnas bskul nas/ /yungs kar tshad tsam sems 'od kyis/ /rang rgyud sa bon bsreg sbyangs phyir/ /rnam smin sgrib pa phyogs gnyis dang/ /khyad par dag gi skyon spyangs pa'o/ /thob tshad khu bas bsku? ba'i dus
372b5(rgyud 'grel): 'od gsal phyogs bde mtshan mthong ba'o/ /bde dang mtshan ma bu'i rtags/ /dpe don mtshon bya byed par shes/ /chos ni rdzogs rim ma lus dang/ /gdams ngag dpog pa man chod nyan/ /'dzin pa'i nyes dmigs gnas brgyad bshad/ /yon tan sdu
372b6(rgyud 'grel): bsngal las grol bstan/ /'chad par gyur pa de bzhin no/ /gsum pa dbang gi rgyu phyir dang/ /tsha'i dngos grub thob phyir ro/ /skyon ni chos rnams mi thos dang/ /rim pa gong du bgrod pa 'gag /khyad par bzhi pa'i dbang sgo 'gags/ /tshe ring 'gyur pa'i
372b7(rgyud 'grel): nus med pa'o/ /yon tan rgyal ba'i sras 'gyur nas/ /sgeg mo yum sogs byin rlob 'gyur/ /zab mo rnams kyi thun mong ste/ /khyad par man ngag snod du 'gyur/ /bzhi pa'i dbang gi snod bstan pa/ /rig pa'i brtul zhugs ldan pa'o/ /sems kyi
373a1(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor legs bstan la/ /rab gnas sngar bzhin rgyas par bya/ /dkyil 'khor nang gi rtsa gnas dang/ /pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor bstan par bya/ /thun mong 'jug par gsang bar gcig /bzhi las ting 'dzin gsal
373a2(rgyud 'grel): ba dang/ /rdzogs rims ting 'dzin las rlung dgag /stong du gyur pa'i dus nyid du/ /thig le mtshan ldan lag tu gtad/ /ngo bo shes rab ye shes ni/ /mtshon bya mtshon byed rnam pa gnyis/ /dpe dang don gyi bde ba yang/ /rgyu 'bras 'byung
373a3(rgyud 'grel): zlog skabs su shes/ /brag gdung gnyis phrad 'od gsal bde/ /bzlas bas lhan cig dag bral du/ /skyes pa'i gcig rig gsal ba yis/ /gsal ba mi rtog nyams rnyed pa'o/ /rig pa spros bral shes rab nyid/ /ma 'gags mi rtog
373a4(rgyud 'grel): gsal ba nyid/ /thabs kyi gsal bya dbang du brjod/ /rdzas kyi skabs kyi phyag rgya'o/ /zla ba ldan pa gtad pa'o/ /thabs ni bden pa'i tshig bzhin te/ /zab mo'i theg par grol byed pa'i/ /mi slu thabs kyi man ngag sbyin/ /don nyid mngon byed
373a5(rgyud 'grel): bden tshig go /rgyu ni bshad bzhin rnam pa gnyis/ /rang rig gsal rig mtshungs pa'i rgyu/ /bden tshig sbyin pa lhan cig byed/ /bcu drug phyag rgya zla ldan pa'o/ /las dang dgag sogs slab goms pas/ /zla ba'i thig le gnyis bstan
373a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /rig pa'i shugs dang ldan sems bus/ /thob bya thob phyir rgyu'i rkyen/ /byed pa'i sdom pa la sogs dang/ /cha dang bsod nams ting 'dzin byin/ /phyag rgya'i yon tan 'joms pa'i mthus/ /bde ba skyed phyir bdag po'i rkyen/ /shes
373a7(rgyud 'grel): rab ye shes nyams len pa'o/ /bu la snang ba'i byin brlabs can/ /de lta'i yin dmigs pa'i rkyen/ /shes rab ye shes 'pho ba'i chas/ /rgyu 'bras go 'byed ma thag /bden tshig sbyin zhing bde snang ba'i/ /gnas ni rig pa'i pho brang ngo
373b1(rgyud 'grel): thams cad rngos pa'i dngos bral bas/ /rang rig gsal phyir shes bya'i phyogs/ /nyon mongs sgrib pa dka' nas sbyangs/ /sa bcu sems la gnas par sbyong/ /shes rab ye shes thob pa ni/ /brag gdung lta bur phyed myong 'phrad/ /de la brten nas rigs
373b2(rgyud 'grel): gsal ba/ /gsal la rtog med nyams myong la/ /rgyu 'bras byung tshul rten can no/ /de nyid thabs lon rten med de/ /gzhi phyir phyag rgya 'bras mi nyam/ /rjes su 'jug par bshad pa yin/ /bzlog skabs nyi zla nang 'dres dus/ /lhan cig dga' 
373b3(rgyud 'grel): bral gnas su zin/ /de'i bde ba rtog med gsal/ /rten dang rten 'jug bshad bzhin no/ /gsang ba bshad khyad par thabs kyi mchog /'od gsal bde dang thabs rnams mnyam/ /bstan pa'i dbang la sbyang phyir dang/ /sangs rgyas mthar thug bya phyir nod
373b4(rgyud 'grel): shes shes pa shes ma rnyed na/ /rdo rje bskal pa mdza' glags par/ /'od gsal bde ba med par ni/ /nam mkha' i chu skyes bzhin de skyon/ /skyon bzlog yon tan nyid du 'gyur/ /grangs kyi lnga pa'i ngo bo bstan/ /mthar thug bde ba chen po'i dbang/ /snod
373b5(rgyud 'grel): ni mnyam pa'i brtul zhugs ldan/ /dkyil 'khor lnga bzhi thun mong ste/ /dus ni phyi dang nang gi ste/ /phyi rol sa bcu mthar phyin dang/ /shes rab ye shes thob pa'o/ /nang gi sa rlung rgyu ba'i dus/ /ngo bo bden gnyis dbyer med pa'o/ /ye shes chen
373b6(rgyud 'grel): po thob bya de'o/ /des tshig rnam grangs lnga par brjod/ /don dang ngo bo bstan bde chen/ /gnyis med bde ba mdza' bral ba/ /grub dang bde ba gcig par bde/ /ngo bo 'gyur med brtan par brjod/ /de nyid rten dang brten can dang/ /mtshon bya mtshon byed
373b7(rgyud 'grel): dpe dang don/ /dngos dang lngas? 'jug rim dang zlog /de ltar grangs don shes bya'o/ /rten can pa ni nyo me dag /zla bar 'dres pa kha sgyur zlog /sa lu yu sbu bas chu 'dren bzhin/ /goms pas ri mos drangs pa'i rgyus/ /chu mar bzhin 'dres bden ba de
374a1(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /rgyu las skyed phyir rten can te/ /ngo bo mtshon phyir dpe ru brjod/ /phyag rgya bral yang nyams med pa'i/ /gnyis med ye shes gsal ba ni/ /rten las 'byung ba'i rten med de/ /rjes 'jug rnal 'byor brda' zhes
374a2(rgyud 'grel): brjod/ /sa bon gnyis 'dres skyes pa ni/ /rgyu 'bras rim pa'i dbang du brjod/ /thig le bsgyur bas mthar phyin dus/ /skyes ba brjod pa'i dbang du brjod/ /rdzas ni phyag rgya nyi ldan pa'o/ /bskur thabs bzlog pa'i man ngag dang/ /bde ba rin chen
374a3(rgyud 'grel): tshim sbyin pa'o/ /bden gnyis dbyer med bdag gi sems/ /ye nas gnas pa mtshungs zhes bshad/ /nyi zla ldan dus sbyin pa'i las/ /rim pa lhan cig byed pa'o/ /mnyam pa'i brtul zhugs rab ldan zhing/ /brtan pa'i dpal ldan dad pa'i bu/ /rgyu'i rkyen du
374a4(rgyud 'grel): brjod pa yin/ /bzlog pa'i ral rims man ngag tshogs/ /bde ba'i gzhi phyir bdag por brjod/ /brtan dbang nyams dang tshor ldan pas/ /bu la snang bus pha nyid yul/ /rim gyis bzlog pa bcu gsum po/ /thig le 'phos pas go 'byed pa/ /rgyu 'bras
374a5(rgyud 'grel): tshul de de ma thag/ gnas ni khyad par thun mong ngo/ /sa bcu mthar phyin byang chub sems/ /rigs la gnas pa'i shes rig 'phra/ /'phra ba'i 'phra dang shes sgrib gnon/ /mun dang snang bzhin ma gsal dag /tshad ni skabs kyis gnyis 'gyur te/ /
374a6(rgyud 'grel): skad cig ma dang rgyun dbang du/ /zung 'jug bde ba gsal ba ste/ /dpe don cha gnyis dbye ba shes/ /chos ni 'bras bu pad+ma spyad/ /mthar thug ma lus mnyam du rung/ /thig le nyi zla dbyer med pa'i/ /bdag gzhan bde ba spong ba ni/ /bsal ba'i
374a7(rgyud 'grel): rnam grangs ji snyed pa'i/ /mthar phyin mthing skyon zhes bya/ /yon tan ma lus lhun grub pa'i/ /mgo lus kha lce bye bas kyang/ /dus tshigs mi mthun mang brjod kyang/ /zad byed phyir rdzogs mi 'gyur ro/ /tha ma'i don gyi mtshan nyid ni/ /lam
374b1(rgyud 'grel): gyis bsgrubs pas 'bras bu ste/ /lam du rgyu dang 'bras bu ste/ /bdag yul gnyis kar shes par bya/ /phyag rgya ma la cig rtsar te/ /pha la rim pa'i dbang du brjod/ /rim pa'i las 'bras skad cig ma/ /bcu drug dag bzhi mchog la bzhi/ /gang bral rtsa lnga
374b2(rgyud 'grel): tshogs sbyor lam/ /gnyis pa'i gnyis sogs tha ma rab/ /sa bcu 'og gsal bcu gcig ste/ /pha rol phyin dang sa mtshan nyid/ /mtshungs phyir dpe don bde bar sbyor/ /'pho ba yod phyir lam gyi 'bras/ /bzlog pa'i skabs su yang de bzhin shes/ /skabs
374b3(rgyud 'grel): kyi 'bras bu 'ang 'di bzhin te/ /phan pa'i dbang bskur dus 'di nas/ /rgyal ba'i sras 'gyur lha'i ming/ /'khor lo sgyur sogs longs spyod ldan/ /dam pa'i gsang sngags spyod bskal ldan/ /brgyud nas kun bzang nyid du 'gyur/ /de yang spyod dang khyad par ro//
374b4(rgyud 'grel): nus pas lha mi nor 'grub ste/ /bdag gzhan las rnams mthar phyung bas/ /bsod nams tshogs rnams mngon rdzogs te/ /bgrod nas sku gsum tha mar 'grub/ /gsang ba dbang thob 'bras bu nyid/ /'od gsal phyogs kyi bde ldan pas/ /khams gsum
374b5(rgyud 'grel): kun da'i zhing khams mthong/ /de phyir bde dang mtshan ma brtag /bzhi pa'i dbang gis 'bras bu ni/ /sa rims kun tu 'od thob nyid/ /rten pa'i rgyu ni brag gdung ste/ /sangs rgyas dang po de 'bras bu/ /yang na nyi zla 'dres bzlog bde/ /skad cig rgyun gyis dpe don thob//
374b6(rgyud 'grel): lnga pa'i 'bras bu mdza' thugs/ /nyi ma zla ba 'phrad pa'i rgyud/ /gsum pa'i bde ba'i ye shes ni/ /myong la mi 'dzin pad+ma spyan/ /rtsar gnas lhar gsal 'khor lo yis/ /lhar gsal mi 'dzin shes rab thabs/ /'gro don lhun 'char thabs kyi sa/ /rang
374b7(rgyud 'grel): 'byung chen po ye shes sa/ /lam 'dres mi phyed kun bzang sa/ /dngos po nyid du mtshon pa'i dpe/ /skad cig rgyun dus bshad bzhin no/ /skabs su 'phros pa dbang gi don/ /de dag tha ma'i spyod yul te/ /brnyan ma'i dkyil 'khor las kyi yum/ /dngos su
375a1(rgyud 'grel): rten pas dman don te/ /'bras bu 'ang mtshon pa'i bde ba skye/ /dus kyang skad cig dbang tsam ste/ /slob ma bshad pa'i snod ldan pa/ /bla ma rim pa'i drod thob pas/ /kun na byin brlabs skye bar 'dod/ /blo 'bring ting 'dzin dkyil
375a2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor du/ /slob dpon ting 'dzin gral non pas/ /drod thob slob ma dbang bskur ba/ /drod thob sa la sbyar phyir sbyin/ /rig pa'i lha mo dag dang sbyor/ /'bras bu dngos su rigs 'dzin thob/ /blo rab rigs 'dzin sa thob pa/ /bla ma bde bar gshegs
375a3(rgyud 'grel): nyid de/ /rang bzhin dkyil 'khor chen po ru/ /rigs 'dzin sangs rgyas nyid sbyar phyir/ /ye shes phyag rgya mos dang sbyar/ /'bras bu yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /rin chen rgya mtsho rdo rje sems/ /sgyu 'phrul pa'i rgyu nyid las/ /byed pa yab
375a4(rgyud 'grel): yum sbyor pa yis/ /dbang bskur chos bshad 'khor rnams kyis/ /rgyud rtogs sngon byung shes par bya/ /dkyil 'khor tha mar phyin pa'o// //sgyu 'phrul rgya mtsho'i dngos lnga nyon mongs pa/ /rig pa'i kyi gnas bsrungs
375a5(rgyud 'grel): te bsdus pa'i/ /man ngag thabs mchog 'di thob don rtogs nas/ /lam gnyis rnal 'byor ma lus mthar phyin no/ /de ltar thabs lam don phye nas/ /kun gyi theg chen don mthong ste/ /dug gi nad sel bde rnyed ltar/ /nyon mongs nyid kyis grol bar
375a6(rgyud 'grel): shog /dbang gi don rab tu 'byed pa rdzogs so// //slob dpon chen po sangs rgyas gsang bas mdzad pa'o// // */ /rgya gar skad du/ tsi ta bi du nA ma/ bod skad du/ thugs kyi
375a7(rgyud 'grel): thigs pa zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ma byas lhun rdzogs khyab gsal 'jigs med kun ma spangs/ /mi phyed gcig snang ma lus rang rig nyid du sgrol/ /swa ti ka bzhin dngos lngas mngon par rdzogs pa'i sku/ /zhar
375b1(rgyud 'grel): byung lnga gnyis bco lnga'i bdag nyid che la 'dud/ /gsum gnyis go lo mchod byas nas/ /bcu bar lnga gnyis gcig gsal bas/ /'dir min lnga'i rig pa nyid/ /'bras bcas pa tra shas bshad bya/ /bcu pa'i bcu drug nyams rnyed pas/ /sku bzhi'i dkyil
375b2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor khams thig le/ /ji bzhin shes pa de nyid las/ /chos lo gyen du rim pa bzhin/ /spros bcas med dang ldan bsgoms pas/ /khyad par thabs kyis rims bskul nas/ /rim par skye ba'i ye shes ro/ /lha mig dag pas shes par bya/ /
375b3(rgyud 'grel): yi ge lnga dang gsum gnas su/ /mi dmigs ye shes rtags yul can/ /skar zla'i dkyil 'khor las byung ba/ /gnyis med thabs kyis rten shes na/ /gnyis med sems kyi snang ba'o/ /brtags bral shes rab 'od gsal pa'i/ /phyi nang kun
375b4(rgyud 'grel): gsal rang rig dngos/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes che/ /me long lta bu'i rgya tshogs snang/ /thun mong sdig las grol bar 'gyur/ /de nyid stobs 'gyur rnal 'byor che/ /dkyil 'khor gsal ba'i thig le nyid/ /phan tshun rgyu 'bras tshul
375b5(rgyud 'grel): shes pas/ /chos khams g.yas g.yon tshul rigs lnga/ /rnam shes bdag po rten 'dus rnams/ /g.yas g.yon rims bzlog brgyad gnyis shes/ /dpung gsang lte khro de bzhin te/ /bya byed hUM phaT gsal bar bya/ /rang mtshungs lha nyid
375b6(rgyud 'grel): drangs mchod bzlas bcu gsum drug gi dkyil 'khor gnyis/ /shes rab thabs la rnam par brtag /thabs lam rol mo'i mes bzhu pa'i/ /dkyil 'khor las byung gsang thig le/ /bya byed gnas su lhag pa'i ro/ /gsal bas kun kyang
375b7(rgyud 'grel): ye shes blta'o/ /'od zer snying po nyi ma dang/ /ye shes thig le mnyam sbyor bas/ /shes rab snying rje gnyis med pa'o/ /bde ba chen por lhun gyis grub/ /gur gum bzung bslabs goms las kyis/ /bde chen yig gsum gnas bzhugs
376a1(rgyud 'grel): na/ /gsang sngags ngo bor rang gsal ba/ /dgyes pa chen por stobs par bshad/ /yungs kar ltung med bde ba yis/ /ye shes skad cig rim skye pa/ /rang bzhin rang snang chos kyi sku/ /sprul pa sna tshogs ro ldan pa/ /bdag 
376a2(rgyud 'grel): gsal 'dzin bral pad+ma can/ /gsang thig rang gnas rang rig pa/ /me la shing bsnan ji bzhin du/ /'khor lo kun gyi gzhir gyur las/ /dkyil 'khor ma lus dngos yin phyir/ /lam gnas kun tu spros thim pas/ /bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis nyi shu
376a3(rgyud 'grel): lnga/ /ma lus snang bas/ zhi khro 'dres mas thabs shes sogs/ /gdul bya bsam bzhin dbang bsgyur ba/ /rang bzhin dkyil 'khor mdza' yas rdzogs phyir ro/ /sangs rgyas snying po kha sbyor las/ /dkyil 'khor lnga sogs bsal med snang/ /
376a4(rgyud 'grel): rgyu tshul 'thun pas don byas kyang/ /bya byed gang yang dmigs mi 'gyur/ /rang bzhin mnyam rdzogs thig le pa/ /shes rab gsum mthar lam rim gyis/ /dus gsum kun mnyam lhun gyis grub/ /gcig dang du ma'i mdza' bral bas/ /
