376a5(rgyud 'grel): thams cad tshul nyid 'di 'dra shes/ /lam 'dir gnas la sras bcas ril/ /thugs rjes ring nas byin rlob mdzad/ /bskal mang bsal bas 'di thob ste/ /rgyal ba ma lus mdzad dgongs phyir/ /gang yang 'da' 'gyur rigs ma yin/ /de nas
376a6(rgyud 'grel): thams cad phyag rgya 'dis/ /blo ldan chags bral dang du mkhyen/ /'dod tshol bsam mang thabs shom dang/ /dam nyams g.yo rgyus tshod len zhing/ /bka' gcig la spel bka' rkus pas/ /srog chad dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal thob/ /rdo rje
376a7(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' nyid kyang sdad/ /lhar bcas rnal 'byor smos ci dgos/ /de bas rab tu snod brtag bya/ /sgyu 'phrul thugs kyi thigs pa rdzogs so// // */ /rgya gar skad du/ g+hu yA b+hi du u pa de sha/ bod skad du/
376b1(rgyud 'grel): gsang ba'i thigs pa'i man ngag/ dpal kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang la yod pa rnam pa brgyad du shes/ /gang la ci 'dra de nyid bsres pa yin/ /rnam bzhi bye brag drug las brgyad dkyil na/ /don dam snying po de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang la snyoms
376b2(rgyud 'grel): 'jug de la yod pa la/ /de la yod de de la blta bar bya/ /gang las byung ba de las byung ba yin/ /de las de byung de nyid kho na'o/ /gsang ba'i shes rab thig le dbyings/ /bcu drug gnyis kyi dkyil na bzhugs/ /shes rab thabs kyi snyoms 'jug la/ /
376b3(rgyud 'grel): kun tu rgyas btab dkyil 'khor yin/ /bdag nyid chen po lnga blta zhing/ /thur du 'phro zhing gyen du 'bar/ /bde ba chen po'i mchod pa yis/ /gong gi snying po bskul bar byed/ /de 'od thig le mnyam sbyor bas/ /lnga gnyis drug gi dkyil na 'o/ /bde ba
376b4(rgyud 'grel): chen po'i ro yis ni/ /dgyes pa chen por rtogs par bya/ /shes bya 'byung zad bsod nams kyi/ /de nyid sgyu mar rang snang ba/ /gzigs mo'i bde ba mdza' yas kyis/ /bde ba chen po'i 'ben la phog /bcu gsum gnyis kyi dkyil 'khor lo/ /de'i
376b5(rgyud 'grel): thig le mnyam pa'i dbyings/ /kun gyi dngos yin kun gyi gtso/ /bcu dang bzhi ni mngon rdzogs pa/ /gsum dang gnyis su yang dag gnas/ /kun gyis dngos por bdag gyur pa/ /de la dbang skyur dam pa yin/ /nying lag nas pa gnas nyid
376b6(rgyud 'grel): la/ /de la gnyis rdzogs lhun gyis grub/ /thams cad de'i rgyan du che/ /gnyis rdzogs thig le mnyam sbyor bas/ /snying rje chen po yongs kyis 'char/ /bcu bzhi'i sems can 'dul ba la/ /sgyu ma'i sems can sgrol ba yi/ /rnal 'byor
376b7(rgyud 'grel): chen po 'od ldan spyod/ /'di la rtag tu gang 'dug pa/ /sangs rgyas sras dang 'khor bcas kyis/ /thugs rje nyi ma shugs las 'byung/ /de la bde byed bde ba sbyin/ /bskal pa rdul snyed grangs med du/ /thos bsam sgoms pa rab mdza' las/ /'byung
377a1(rgyud 'grel): pa bde ba chen po yin/ /slob dpon rten byed kye 'di lta/ /gang la gang med gang la'ang/ /de la de med de la'ang/ /dmyal bar bsreg dang sdug bsngal che/ /de bas gzhan du bstan mi bya/ /gsang ba'i man ngag thig le 'di//
377a2(rgyud 'grel): thig le chen po 'di snang bas/ /sems can kun gyi rang bzhin la/ /bde ba chen po snang bar shog /gsang ba'i thigs pa'i man ngag /slob dpon bi ma la mi tras mdzad pa rdzogs so// // */ /rgya gar skad du/
377a3(rgyud 'grel): ma hA yo ga pradz+nyA pra be sha tsak+Shu u pa de sha nA ma/ /bod skad du/ rnal 'byor chen po shes rab spyan 'byed kyi man ngag ces bya ba/ /dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dkyil 'khor gtso bo skyes bu'i mchog /dam pa lha phyir phyag 'tshal
377a4(rgyud 'grel): nas/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud don mchog /rang bzhin rkyen gyis mngon bya'i phyir/ /rgyud gsum snang ba rnal 'byor gsum/ /bya byed tshul gnyis bdag nyid dang/ /tshig don dang ni de nyid can/ /rgyu 'bras thabs tshul 'brel phyir gsum/
377a5(rgyud 'grel): shes thob byed pa bar tshul la/ /ngo bo rkyen bshad thabs dang dbye/ /rim par mi brjod 'dir brjod pa/ /dang po bar mas mthar byed pa'i/ /lam gnyis thun mong rgyu dang mchog /mchog la phyir dang nang la'ang/ /thabs dang shes rab lam
377a6(rgyud 'grel): gnyis kyis/ /nges byed sngon la stong 'og thabs/ /cig shes gtsor byed spyi blugs rim/ /bzhi bral lngas dbul las bzlog pa'i/ /rnal 'byor che la mos rnams kyi/ /shi sha'i don phyir mdo tsam brjod/ /phun sum tshogs pa
377a7(rgyud 'grel): lhun grub rnams/ /gsang dbang mchog gis 'byin byed pa'o/ /sngon byas thabs mchog chags mchog don/ /sangs rgyas zhabs kyis gsungs par shes/ /thos bsams sgoms pa'i mnyam sbyor gyis/ /rang 'byung kun nam lhun
377b1(rgyud 'grel): grub phyir/ /bsum gyis grol byed lam bshad pa/ /mtshan nyid gsum la gcig bzhi gsum/ /gtso mchog mtshan nyid dang po bshad/ /lam kun gzungs su bya phyir ro/ /de la brtag bya thabs ngo bos/ /nges tshig rtags kyang dang/ /khyad pas
377b2(rgyud 'grel): gol sa yon tan skyon/ /spyan mchog lus su rnam par bsgrags/ /'ching grol byed pa lhun rdzogs kyang/ /dbang spyan mchog dang bral ba yis/ /srid rgyu 'bras bu ming tsam snang/ /dang po chu bo bzhi rgal ltar/ /snang ba gcig la gnyis tshul snang//
377b3(rgyud 'grel): ngan shos bdag gzhan stong phur snang/ /de de rim par grub ma grub grub/ /mdza' i don rnams cir 'gyur brtag /mthong byed thabs kyang rgyud pa dang/ /rtags kyis mtshon cing gtan la 'bebs/ /dman la rgya gsum goms pa yis/ /brtan
377b4(rgyud 'grel): nas brtags spyad klung zhugs mthong/ /bsgom pa lam du bstan par bya/ /rim par skye la the tshom med/ /shes bya dam pa rtags mtshon pa'ang/ /rang bzhin rtags dang 'bras bu'i rtags/ dang po rang gi rigs pa yis/ /cho 'phrul snang ba'i 'byung
377b5(rgyud 'grel): ba dang/ /phyogs dang kha dog la sogs kyis/ /mtshon nas ji bzhin nyid rtogs byed/ /sems can ma lus thams cad la/ /ye shes lnga yis kun khyab kyang/ /rang gi rnam rtog bsgribs byas te/ /ye shes lnga'i don ma mthong/ /ma
377b6(rgyud 'grel): mthong rmongs pa thams cad la/ /ye shes mtshan nyid bstan pa'i phyir/ /dkar dang dmar dang ser ba dang/ /ljang gu la sogs nag por bstan/ /'di yis lhun grub rtogs par cos/ /cig shos mthar phyin ye shes kyi/ /dkyil 'khor
377b7(rgyud 'grel): rten dang brten can ltar/ /snang ba'i gnas brgyad gdan sogs dang/ /rten cing rgya bzhi rgyan sogs mtshungs/ /gtan tshig rgyas par lus bzhag na/ /tshad ma bka' gzhung gtan tshigs dang/ /sgra mthun don spags gtan tshigs
378a1(rgyud 'grel): kyis/ /gzhal bya bdag nyid tshe sogs blta/ /tshad ma bka' la dag mnyam grangs/ /rtogs pa bzhi dang bden gsum dag /skabs kyis bya thabs mthar 'gyur yang/ /byed la gtsor brjod dag pa yis/ /snang ba mi spong 'bras bu byed//
378a2(rgyud 'grel): mnyam pas mnyam byed bdag nyid che/ /rtogs pa rnam bzhi'i gtan tshigs kyis/ /mi zad rgyun gyi 'khor lor byed/ /bden pa gnyis med zung du 'jug /ldems dgongs man ngag gtan tshigs kyis/ /skabs kyis don nyid mthong bar byed/ /dngos po
378a3(rgyud 'grel): lo rgyus gtan tshigs kyis/ /bdag nyid chen po smos ci dgos/ /rang bzhin gtan tshigs lhun grub 'jug /'on tang tha dad don la med/ /sgra mthun don spags rang dang spyi/ /mtshan nyid gzhal mdza' bral ba'o/ /chos kun rang dang spyir btags pas//
378a4(rgyud 'grel): ma skyes thams cad mkhyen pa'i don/ /rnam pa kun ldan stong par snang/ /de phyir sku gsung thugs su snang/ /dngos kun gcig dang du mar bral/ /mdza' gsum dang ni bzhi bral lugs/ /khyad par can gyis de nyid mthong/ /de yang ma spangs bral bar
378a5(rgyud 'grel): brjod/ /rnam par dbye dang mtshon pa'i dpe/ /de bzhin nyid du the tshom med/ /shes rab spyan gyis ngo bo nyid/ /gnyis kyi ngo bo skabs 'jug kyang/ /rgyu 'bras phyir na cig shos la/ /yul med rang rig mngon sum pa'o/ /bye brag 'dod gzhung gtan
378a6(rgyud 'grel): tshigs kyis/ /zhor brjod bcu gsum rnam grangs tsam/ /mthong byed nges tshig mthong lha gnyis/ /sgros bral skur med don chen po/ /sa lu phub khrod snang med bzhin/ /yul med rang gsal nyams rnyed la/ /mthong zhes tha snyad brjod par ??
378a7(rgyud 'grel): de phyir blta dang blta med pas/ /chos kun rang rig nyid snang ba/ /me long lta bu'i tshul bzhin du/ /mi rtog gsal bas nges tshig 'grub/ /de ltar skyes mchog su ldan pa/ /dam la rub cing snying rjer ldan/ /pha la drin skye man ngag 'tsho'o/ /mi skyo
378b1(rgyud 'grel): don brtson chags bral 'byung/ /spyod zhib nyam nga g.yang sa med/ /de yod dmigs dang ldan pa'i rtags/ /rnal 'byor che la phyir rgyu dang/ /mu stegs zhor 'byung rig byed dang/ /ngo bo rgyur smra phyogs lung rten/ /bdun sde mnyam 'jog la sogs kyis/ /reg min do las gzhi
378b2(rgyud 'grel): nas spags/ /lta spyod mi mthun smos ci dgos/ /bskal par sbyangs pas don mthong pa phyin chad mi ldog sa la gnas/ /spyod sogs las kun pha rol phyin/ /gzungs kyi dam par rgyal bas gsungs/ /shes rab spyan dang ma ldan na/ /dkar phyogs lha mi stegs
378b3(rgyud 'grel): tsam las/ /spyad kyang mi thob 'chi bar 'gyur/ /nag po'i las spyod smos ci dgos/ /tshig tsam lta la rten byed cing/ /dam med sbyod cing sgo dgu yi/ /nyod pa byed de thar bar dka' / /stegs dbang tsam gyis rnyed dka' bas/ /sgra 'dul bdud bzlog brtson
378b4(rgyud 'grel): par 'bod/ /de med nam yang thar mi srid/ /spyod dang skyon bcos mi bzod cing/ /lci dang gdung med 'dod thob nas mi khur spongs byed rigs ma nges/ /ltung byed de dang ma phrad cig /de bzlog snod ldan dpal du shog /des kyang de bzhin 'tsho bar
378b5(rgyud 'grel): shog /rab rig sel byed thur 'dra 'di/ /dman phyir brtson byas gzhung 'gal skyon/ /rgyal ba rigs 'dzin mchog gsum la/ /bzod gsol gnyis med dang du bshags/ /dal ba'i dge rtsas 'gro ba rnams/ /mi ldog spyan ldan sangs rgyas shog /
378b6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje sems dpa' sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i shes pa'i mtshan nyid bshad pa// //shes rab spyan 'byed ces bya ba/ bi ma las mdzad pa rdzogs so// //lta ba dang theg pa la sogs pa'i khyad par bsdus
378b7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i bsgyus? byar/ /bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nu dang/ /rdo rje chos la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems can phyin ci log gi lta ba grangs med pa'i mdo rnam pa bzhir 'dus te/ /phyal ba dang/ rgyang phan dang/ mur thug
379a1(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ mu stegs pa'o/ /de la phyal ba ni chos thams cad la rgyu dang 'bras bu yod med du ma gtogs te/ kun tu rmongs pa'o/ /rgyang phan pa tshe snga phyi yod med du ma gtogs shing/ /tshe gcig la btsan phyug dang/ mthu stobs bsgrub pa ste/ 'jig rten gyi
379a2(rgyud 'grel): gsang tshig la brten pa'o/ /mur thug pa ni chos thams cad ni rgyu dang 'bras bu med pa ste/ tshe gcig la skyes pa'i chos thams cad kyang glo bur du skyes la/ mdza' chad par lta'o/ /mu stegs pa ni/ chos thams cad la kun tu btags pa'i bdag rtag pa zhig yod par
379a3(rgyud 'grel): lta ba ste/ de yang rgyu med pa la 'bras bu yod par blta ba dang/ rgyu 'bras log par lta ba dang/ rgyu yod pa la 'bras bu med par lta ba'o/ /'di dag ni ma rig pa'i lta ba'o/ /'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam la yang rnam pa gnyis te/ mtshan nyid kyi theg pa dang/ rdo rje'i
379a4(rgyud 'grel): theg pa'o/ /mtshan nyid kyi theg pa la yang rnam pa gsum ste/ nyan thos kyi theg pa dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' i theg pa'o/ de la nyan thos kyi theg pa la zhugs pa'i lta ba rnams ni/ /chos thams cad la mu stegs la sogs
379a5(rgyud 'grel): pa yis sgro dang bkur bar btang ba'i ye med par blta ba dang/ rtag pa la sogs pa yod par lta ba ni/ thag pa la sbrul du mthong ba med/ phung po dang/ skye mched dang/ khams la sogs pa 'byung ba chen po bzhi'i/ rdul phra rab dang/ rnam par shes pa
379a6(rgyud 'grel): ni don dam par yod par lta ba dang/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi sgoms pa'i rims kyis/ /'bras bu rnam pa bzhi grub pa yin no/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la zhugs pa rnams kyi lta ba ni/ chos thams cad la mu stegs la sogs pas/ sgro dang
379a7(rgyud 'grel): bkur bar kun tu rtags pa'i bdag rtag pa la sogs pa med par lta ba ni nyan thos dang mthun/ de la khyad par du gzugs kyi phung po chos kyi khams kyi phyogs gcig la bdag med par rtogs shing/ rang sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu thob pa'i dus na yang
379b1(rgyud 'grel): nyan thos ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen la mi ltos par/ sngon goms pa'i shugs kyis rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba bcu gnyis kyi sgo nas/ chos nyid zab mo rtogs nas/ rang sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu 'grub pa yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' i theg pa la/ zhugs pa rnams
379b2(rgyud 'grel): kyi lta ba ni/ kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byad ba'i chos thams cad don dam par ni rang bzhin med pa yin la/ kun rdzob tu ni sgyu ma tsam du mtshan nyid ma 'dres par yod/ pha rol tu phyin pa bcu spyad pa'i 'bras bu sa bcu'i mas kyis bgrod pa'i mdza' / bla na med
379b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i byang chub tu 'grub par 'dod pa yin no// //rdo rje theg pa la yang gsum ste/ bya ba rgyud kyi theg pa dang/ gnyis ka rgyud kyi theg pa dang/ rnal 'byor rgyud kyi theg pa'o/ /de la bya ba rgyud kyi theg pa la zhugs pa rnams kyi lta ba ni/ don dam par
379b4(rgyud 'grel): skye 'gag med pa las/ /kun rdzob tu lha'i gzugs kyi skur bsgom zhing sku'i gzugs brnyan dang/ thugs mtshan dang/ bzlas brjod dang/ gtsang sbra dang/ dus tshigs dang/ gza' dang rgyu skar la sogs pa/ gtsor yo byad dang rgyu rkyen 'tshogs pa'i mthus
379b5(rgyud 'grel): 'grub pa'o/ /gnyis ka rgyud kyi theg pa la zhugs pa rnams kyi lta ba ni/ don dam par skye 'gag med pa las/ kun rdzob tu lha'i sku nyid rnam pa bzhi dang ldan par bsgoms pa'i ting nge dzin dang/ yo byad dang rgyu rkyen la sogs pa gnyis ka la yang brten nas
379b6(rgyud 'grel): ?? pa'o/ /rnal 'byor rgyud kyi theg pa la zhugs pa rnams kyi lta ba ni/ rnam pa gnyis te/ rnal 'byor phyi ba thub pa rgyud kyi theg pa dang/ rnal 'byor nad pa thabs kyi rgyud kyi theg pa'o/ /de la rnal 'byor phyi la thub pa rgyud kyi theg pa la zhugs pa rnams kyi
379b7(rgyud 'grel): lta ba ni/ phyi'i yo byad la gtso bor mi 'dzin par/ /don dam par skye 'gag med pa'i lha dang lha mo dang/ de dang 'dra ba'i rgyud yongs su dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis/ 'phags pa'i gzugs kyi sku phyag rgya bzhi dang ldan par bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i gtsor
380a1(rgyud 'grel): byas pas 'grub po/ /rnal 'byor nad pa thabs kyi rgyud kyi theg pa la zhugs pa rnams kyi lta ba ni/ rnam pa gsum ste/ bskyed pa'i tshul dang/ rdzogs pa'i tshul dang/ rdzogs pa chen po'i tshul lo/ /de la bskyed pa'i tshul ni/ /ting nge 'dzin rnam pa
380a2(rgyud 'grel): gsum rims bzhin du bskyed cing/ dkyil 'khor rim bzhin bkod nas/ bsgoms pas 'grub bo/ /rdzogs pa'i tshul ni/ don dam par skye 'gag med pa'i lha dang lha mo'i rnam par mi rtog /dbu ma chos kyi dbyings las kyang ma g.yos la/ kun rdzob
380a3(rgyud 'grel): tu gzugs kyi sku yang gsal bar bsgom zhing/ mnyam la ma 'dres par bsgoms pas 'grub po/ /rdzogs pa chen po'i tshul ni/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos thams cad dbyer med par sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi
380a4(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin ye nas yin par rtogs nas bsgom pa ste/ /de yang rgyud las rdo rje phung po'i yan lag ni/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lnga ru grags/ /skye mched khams rnams mang po kun/ /byang chub sems dpa' i dkyil 'khor nyid/ /sa chu spyad
380a5(rgyud 'grel): dang mA ma kI /me rlung gos dkar sgrol ma ste/ /nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma/ /srid gsum ye nas rnam par dag /ces 'byung ste/ 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos thams cad ye nas ma skyes la/ bya byed nus pa'i sgyu ma
380a6(rgyud 'grel): bde bar gshegs pa yab yum bcu la sogs pa'i rang bzhin ye nas yin pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis mya ngan las 'das pa ste/ chen po lnga ni yum lnga'i rang bzhin yin/ /phung po lnga ni rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas la/ rnam
380a7(rgyud 'grel): par shes pa bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' bzhi'i rang bzhin/ yul bzhi ni mdzes pa lha mo bzhi'i rang bzhin/ dbang po bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' bzhi'i rang bzhin/ /dus bzhi ni mchod pa'i lha mo bzhi'i rang bzhin/ lus kyi dbang po
380b1(rgyud 'grel): dang/ rnam par shes pa dang/ yul dang/ de las 'byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ni khro bo bzhi'i rang bzhin/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni byang chub kyi sems kyi rdo rje kun tu bzang po'i rang bzhin/ yul chos 'dus byas dang/ 'dus ma byas ni kun tu bzang
380b2(rgyud 'grel): mo'i rang bzhin te/ de dag kyang ye nas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i rang bzhin yin gyi/ de lam gyis bsgrub pa ni ma yin no/ /de ltar phyogs bcu dang dus gsum dang/ khams gsum la sogs pa/ 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos
380b3(rgyud 'grel): thams cad rang gi sems las gud na med na/ ji skad du/ rang gi sems so sor rtogs pa ni/ sangs rgyas byang chub de nyid do/ /'jig rten gsum po de nyid de/ /'byung ba che rnams de nyid do/ /zhes 'byung ngo/ /ji skad du/ chos thams cad ni sems
380b4(rgyud 'grel): la gnas so/ /sems ni nam mkha' la gnas so/ /nam mkha' ni ci yang mi gnas so/ /zhes 'byung ba dang/ chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'o/ /chos thams cad ni gzod ma nas rnam par dag pa'o/ /chos thams cad ni yongs kyis 'od
380b5(rgyud 'grel): gsal ba'o/ /chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis mya ngan las 'das pa'o/ /chos thams cad ni ye nas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'o zhes gsungs so// //'di rdzogs pa chen po'i tshul lo/ /rdzogs pa chen
380b6(rgyud 'grel): po'i tshul ni/ rtogs pa rnams bzhi lam gyis yid ches pa ste/ de la rdzogs pa chen po ni bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs rdzogs pas/ 'bras bu chos lhun gyis grub pa'i don no/ /tshul ni don la 'jug pa'o/ /rtogs pa rnam bzhi ni/
380b7(rgyud 'grel): rgyu gcig par rtogs pa dang/ yig 'bru'i tshul gyis rtogs pa dang/ byin gyis brlabs par rtogs pa dang/ mngon sum par rtogs pa'o/ /de la rgyu gcig par rtogs pa ni/ /chos thams cad don dam par ma skyes pas/ so so ma
381a1(rgyud 'grel): yin pa dang/ kun rdzob sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid kyis so so ma yin pa dang/ ma skyes pa nyid chu bzla ltar sgyu ma sna tshogs su snang zhing bya ba byed nus pa dang/ sgyu ma nyid ngo bo med do/ /ma skyes pas kun rdzob dang/ /don dam par
381a2(rgyud 'grel): dbyer med pas rgyu gcig par rtogs pa'o/ /yig 'bru'i tshul gyis rtogs ba ni/ /chos thams cad ma skyes pa ni a ste gsung gi rang bzhin la/ ma skyes pa nyid sgyu mar snang zhing bya ba byed nus pa ni oM ste sku'i rang bzhin/ de ltar rtogs pa'i
381a3(rgyud 'grel): rig pa ye shes sgyu ma mdza' dang dbus med pa ni hUM ste thugs kyi rang bzhin du rtogs pa'o/ /byin gyis brlabs par rtogs pa ni/ dper na ras dkar po la dmar pos byin gyis brlab pa'i mthu rtsod la yod pa bzhin du/ chos thams cad sangs rgyas
381a4(rgyud 'grel): bar byin gyis brlob pa'i mthu yang rgyu gcig pa dang yig 'bru'i tshul gyis mthus byin gyis brlabs par rtogs pa'o/ /mngon sum par rtogs pa ni/ chos thams cad ye nas sangs rgyas par gnas pa de yang lung dang man ngag dang 'gal
381a5(rgyud 'grel): ba yang ma yin la/ lung dang man ngag gi tshig tsam la rten pa yang ma yin la/ rang gi rig bas blo'i gting du yid ches par mngon sum du rtogs pa'o/ /lam gyi yid ches pa ni/ rtogs pa rnam bzhi'i don rig pa de nyid rnal 'byor pa'i
381a6(rgyud 'grel): lam yin te/ de yang rgyu bsgrub pas 'bras bu 'byung ba'i dus la ltos pa lta bu ni ma yin gyi/ rang gi rig pas mngon sum du rtogs shing yid ches pa'o/ /de la mtshan nyid gsum gyis don mthar phyin par 'gyur te/ rtogs pa rnam bzhi'i
381a7(rgyud 'grel): tshul rig pa ni/ shes pa'i mtshan nyid do/ /yang nas yang du goms par byed pa ni/ 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid do/ /goms pa'i mthus mngon du gyur pa ni/ 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid do/ /mtshan nyid gsum gyi 'brel ba dang/ dgos pa dang/
381b1(rgyud 'grel): dgos pa'i yang dgos pa'o/ /de la 'brel ba ni kun nas nyon mongs pa'o/ /rnam par byang ba'i chos su brtags pa thams cad ye nas sku gsung thugs kyi bdag nyid/ rang bzhin gyis sangs rgyas pa'i dbyings dang/ byin gyis brlabs yin pa'i don rtogs
381b2(rgyud 'grel): pa ni shes pa'i mtshan nyid do/ /de bla na med par sangs rgyas su 'grub pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir dgos pa'o/ /dgos pa ni kun nas nyon mongs pa/ /rnam par byang ba dang chos dang/ sman lnga dang bdud rtsi lnga la sogs par btags pa thams cad/ ye nas
381b3(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas pa'i mnyam pa chen po la blang dor med par spyod pa ni 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid do/ /de ni bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas su grub pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir dgos pa'o/ /dgos pa'i yang dgos pa ni/ /kun nas nyon mongs pa dang/ rnam par byang ba'i
381b4(rgyud 'grel): chos dang/ sman lnga dang/ bdud rtsi lnga la sogs pa'i khyad par du brtags pa thams cad/ ye nas sangs rgyas pa'i mnyam pa chen po'i ngang du/ blang dor med par srid pa'i 'khor ba nyid ye nas bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas pa'i rang bzhin/ mya ngan las
381b5(rgyud 'grel): 'das pa'i mtshan nyid lhun gyis grub pa yin pas/ 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid de/ sku gsung thugs mi zad pa rgyan gyi 'khor lo mngon du gyur pa ni/ dgos pa'i dgos pa'o/ /de la bsnyen pa dang/ nye ba'i bsnyen ba dang/ bsgrub pa dang bsgrub pa chen
381b6(rgyud 'grel): pos/ /don lhun gyis grub bar gyur pas/ rnal 'byor la brtson par bya'o/ /de la bsnyen pa ni/ byang chub kyi sems shes pa ste/ de yang chos thams cad ye nas sangs rgyas pa'i rang bzhin du da lam gyis bsgrub cing gnyen pos bcos su med par
381b7(rgyud 'grel): rtogs pa'o/ /nye ba'i bsnyen pa ni bdag nyid ltar shes pa ste/ de yang chos thams cad ye nas sangs rgyas pa'i rang bzhin yin pas/ bdag nyid kyang ye nas lha'i rang bzhin yin par shes kyi/ da bsgrub ba ni ma yin par rtogs pa'o/ /bsgrub pa 'di
382a1(rgyud 'grel): ni yum bskyed pa ste/ de yang yum chen mo nam mkha' i dbyings las/ nam mkha' nyid yum chen mo/ /sa chu me rlung bzhir snang/ bya ba med pa'i yum ye nas yin par rtogs pa'o/ /bsgrub pa ni thabs dang shes rab 'brel pa ste/
382a2(rgyud 'grel): de yang yum chen mo lnga'i shes rab dang/ /yum kyi nam mkha' stong pa nyid las/ phung po lnga'i sangs rgyas thabs kyis yab/ /smon pa med pa ye nas zung du 'gyur ba'i 'brel pa las/ byang chub kyi sems sprul pa tsam bral du gyur pa'i rang bzhin/
382a3(rgyud 'grel): ye nas sangs rgyas pa'i don sgyu ma la sgyu ma rol cing bde mchog sgyu ma'i rgyun la/ bde ba'i dus nyid na/ mtshan ma med pa'i don mi dmigs nam mkha' dang snyoms pa ni/ klong du gyur nas lhun gyis grub pa ste/ bdud rnam bzhi yang brtul bas
382a4(rgyud 'grel): mthar phyin pa'i don 'grub pa'o/ /chos thams cad gzod ma nas rnam par dag pa'i yid bzhin gyi gzhal yas khang/ rgya yongs su ma chad 'khor lo/ ye nas bla na med pa'i dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa yang/ thabs kyi theg pa'i gsung du
382a5(rgyud 'grel): thos pa ni mig phye ba'o/ /don rtogs pa ni dkyil 'khor mthong ba'o/ /rtogs nas goms par byed pa ni/ dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa'o/ /zhugs nas mngon du gyur pa ni/ dngos grub chen po thob pa'o/ /de ltar tshul 'di ni rdzogs pa chen
382a6(rgyud 'grel): po'i mthar phyin pa'i don/ yi ge 'khor lo tshogs chen gyi sa la lhun gyis 'jug pa ste/ skyes bu blo rtsal rab kyis/ ye nas sangs rgyas pa'i don la ye nas sangs rgyas par rig pas gom pa drag dal du 'gro ba yin gyi/ phal gyis bya ba ni
382a7(rgyud 'grel): ma yin no/ /phal gyis thog te ji ltar bsams kyang/ bden zhing bzang zhing yid ches par mi 'gyur ro/ /yid ma ches pa dang/ phal gyi blo la dka' zhing bden pa dang/ bzang par ma shes pa'i nyams dang sbyar nas/ kun kyang de dang 'dra
382b1(rgyud 'grel): snyam ste/ yo rdzun zhes skyes bu rab la yang bskur pa 'debs shing sun 'byin pa'i blo skye bar 'gyur bas/ rab tu gsang ba'i phyir/ gsang ba'i thigs pa zhes bka' stsal to/ /de bas na chos thams cad ye nas sangs rgyas pa'i don rtogs pa'i blo ma skyes
382b2(rgyud 'grel): kyi bar du/ theg pa 'og ma 'gro ba'i don byas nas/ gdul bya mi za bas/ slob dpon gyis 'khor ba'i skyon dang/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i yon tan dang/ theg pa thams cad la mkhas par byed pa yin gyi/ phyogs 'ga' tsam shes pas slob dpon
382b3(rgyud 'grel): gyis gzung du mi rung bar yang rgya cher 'byung ngo/ /lta ba'i khyad par dka' thub pa dang/ brtul zhugs kyang bye brag du 'gyur te/ dka' thub med pa ni 'jig rten phyal ba dang/ mur thug go /dka' thub yod pa ni rnam pa bzhi ste/ rgyang phan pa dang/
382b4(rgyud 'grel): mu stegs pa ste/ 'jig rten pa'i dka' thub dang/ nyan thos kyi dka' thub dang/ byang chub sems dpa' i dka' thub dang/ bla na med pa'i dka' thub bo/ /de la phyal ba ni rgyu 'bras la rmongs pa'i phyir dka' thub med do/ /mur thug pa ni chad par lta
382b5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i phyir/ dka' thub med do/ /rgyang phan pa ni tshe 'di'i khyad par dag bsgrub pa'i phyir/ gtsang sbra la sogs pa'i dka' thub can no/ /mu stegs pa ni/ bdag tu brtag pa cig yod pa de dag par bya ba'i phyir/ lus sun 'byin cing/ me lnga rten
382b6(rgyud 'grel): pa la sogs pa'i dka' thub dang/ brtul zhugs log par spyod pa'o/ /nyan thos kyi dka' thub ni/ 'dul ba las sdig pa ci yang mi bya ste/ /dge ba phun sum tshogs par spyad/ /rang gi sems ni yongs su gdul/ /'di ni sangs rgyas bstan pa
382b7(rgyud 'grel): yin/ /ces 'byung ste/ dge ba dang mi dge ba'i chos thams cad /kun rdzob dang don dam pa gnyis ka so sor yod par lta bas dge ba ni spyod/ /mi dge ba ni spong ba'i dka' thub dang/ brtul zhugs spyod pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' i dka' 
383a1(rgyud 'grel): thub ni/ /byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa' i sdom pa la/ skyen du 'tsham par tshar mi gcod/ /rdzu 'phrul la sogs sdig mi byed/ /snying rje ldan zhing byams phyir dang/ /sems dge ba la nyes pa med ces 'byung ste/
383a2(rgyud 'grel): snying rje chen pos zin na dge ba dang mi dge ba'i chos gang spyad kyang/ sdom pa nyams par mi 'gyur bas/ /byang chub sems dpa' i dka' thub ni/ /snying rje gzhi bzung nas spyod pa'o/ /bla na med pa'i dka' thub ni/ /dam tshig chen po'i mdo las
383a3(rgyud 'grel): kyang dang sangs rgyas theg pa rab nges na/ /nyon mongs 'dod lnga kun spyad kyang/ /pad+ma la ni 'dam bzhin te/ /de la tshul khrims phun sum tshogs zhes 'byung ste/ chos thams cad ye nas mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir/ /snying rjes ni rten du med la/ zhe
383a4(rgyud 'grel): sdang ni spang du med/ de ltar ma rtogs pa la/ thugs rje mi 'byung pa yang ma yin te/ ji ltar lta bas ye nas/ ye nas rnam par rtog pa bzhin/ dka' thub dang brtul shugs kyang de ltar rnam par spyod pa'o/ /lta ba 'phreng ba'i gsang rab
383a5(rgyud 'grel): 'di/ /dmu long rang phye mig med ltar/ /shes rab thabs kyi rtsal 'chad ba'i/ /skyes mchog yod na phrad par shog /man ngag gi rgyal po lta ba'i 'phreng ba rdzogs so// //bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu
383a6(rgyud 'grel): bzang po dang/ rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gnyis bsdus ma lus sems nyid la/ /lta ba'i bya byed gnyis med cing/ /rang gi ngo bo 'ang ma grub pas/ /lta ba med pa'i lta ba ni/ lta ba'i dam pa kho nar 'dod/ /rmongs pa'i lta
383a7(rgyud 'grel): ba dngos dmigs pa/ ldongs pas nam mkha' bsnyags pa rnams/ mtshan nyid mdor bsdus bshad par bya/ /rgyu rkyen las kyis ma byas pa'i/ /gser go las byas rdzas rnams kun/ /ming dbyibs dngos las tha dad kyang/ /ngo bo
383b1(rgyud 'grel): gser du gcig pa ltar/ /rang byung rang snang byang chub sems/ /spros bral rang rgyud min pa'i yul/ /med sgyu brtags chags bsgrubs 'grub snang/ /rig phyir phyi nang dngos kun tu/ /rang snang mtshan nyid so sor yang/ /sems phyir rtog sde 'od gsal
383b2(rgyud 'grel): ba'i/ /sems nyid 'ba' zhig kho na pas/ /cir yang snang la gzung du med/ /sna tshogs gnyis par mi phyed pa/ /bdag bzung 'jug rdo rje'i sku/ /cir snang ma spangs dngos mi dmigs/ /sbrul rdzogs chos sku ma 'dres gsal/ /de sogs
383b3(rgyud 'grel): lhun grub byang chub sku/ /ma nor ma bcos kun 'byung ba/ /de la de bzhin dbyings zhes bya'o/ /cis kyang ma bsgribs ye shes mchog /thams cad ma 'dres ye shes gsal/ /dngos po thams cad de nyid de/ /rgyud dkyil rdzogs chen
383b4(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas sogs/ /rang bzhin ngo bor de brjod de/ /'khor ba dkar dag rin chen gling/ /mya ngan 'das zla brjod med pa/ /tha snyad ci yang min pa ste/ /ming grangs gdul bya'i ched du zad/ /de ltar rang rig rang snang bas/ /gang la cir snang dus
383b5(rgyud 'grel): nyid na/ da lta bya lta byed gnyis med pa/ /mthong ba med pa'i mthong yin yang/ /nges pa'i rkyen gyis ma nges dang/ /spyi'i snang gnyis rtags gsum du/ /rang blo'i rgyun las grub pa'o/ /bshad pa bzhin du rang snang la/ /ma rig bdag lta brtags
383b6(rgyud 'grel): pa yis/ /zhar blos gus na 'dug pa dang/ /rdzas bems snang ba'i brtags pa gsum/ /goms pas nyams su skye ba nyid/ /log rtog rgyun la rtag gnas pas/ /nyon mongs las kyis cir snang ba'i/ /dngos kun log rtog tsam nyid las/ /
383b7(rgyud 'grel): 'phra dang zab pa yod min pas/ /'khrul pa'i snang ba zhes su gsungs/ /rang bzhin shes spangs zlog pa'i phyir/ /chos nyid bya byed rigs pa gnyis/ /rang bzhin las kyis tha dad do/ /snod bcud rims sbyar theg bsam yas/ /dgongs
384a1(rgyud 'grel): gsung brlabs 'byung du ma las/ rang bzhin cha 'thun gol ba gnyis/ /bye brag du ma'ang gnyis 'dus te/ /rim lta byed bo rtag pa gnyis/ /bdag dang dngos po rkyen las 'byung/ /'jig mdza' spong pa'i chang lta'o/ /mos ba chung ngu? ba dag ni/ /sems
384a2(rgyud 'grel): ni gzhir snang skad cig mi'o/ /rgyun la lta ba gnyis ma grub/ /so so'i ngo bo phra rab ni/ /bdag dang 'jig rten gzhir 'dod pa/ /chos tsam 'phags pa'i spyod yul la/ /yor bor rnam par shes pa yis/ /mu rdzas lta bur lkog gyur pas/ /spang phyir rjes su
384a3(rgyud 'grel): 'gog byed pa'i/ /gzhan dag 'dzin pa cha mdun yang/ /'phra mo phyogs chas ma grub phyir/ /dngos po'i ngo bo mdza' stong yang/ /stong pa'i rgyun gyis stong ba'ang/ /so so 'chi yis 'ching bar 'gyur/ /phyogs rtogs pa yi gzhung dag kyang/ /don ni rgyud bcas chos tsam min
384a4(rgyud 'grel): rnam rig skad cig ngo bo nyid/ /dngos nyid snang phyir sems tsam ste/ /rmi lam khang sogs ji lta bar/ /dngos po thams cad skad cig ma'o/ /gang yang de snang dus nyid la/ /snga phyi kun bsgribs da lta nyid/ /cig phyir cha shas rnam pas stong/ /nyi shar chu shel
384a5(rgyud 'grel): bai DUr sogs/ /brtag par dka' ba'i ye shes nyid/ /de lta'i rgyun du rang gnas pa'o/ /rjes su 'jug par byed pa ni/ /mi rtog ting 'dzin zhes bya'o/ /mi gnas theg chen gzhung gsum mdo/ /gzhan gyi dam pa'i don de nyid/ /phyogs gcig la gnas
384a6(rgyud 'grel): yang dag min/ /rkyen snang se gol cha'i phyir/ /gnyis bral smra ba'ang rigs pas 'gal/ /gang yang rang grub ma yin te/ /lag sor tshogs kyis dngos min bzhin/ /brgyad phyed gzhan dbang snang ba yang/ /mthun snang la sogs rigs pa bzhis/ /
384a7(rgyud 'grel): nges par yod par kun bsgrib 'dod/ /'dus snang don byed rgyu tsam la/ /chos dang ldan pa zhes brjod kyang/ /ngo bo mthong ba ming tsam phyir/ /rang gi mtshan nyid brjod bya min/ /gzhan snang rgyu dang grangs bral dang/ /bdag gzhan gnyis sgyus mi skye phyir//
384b1(rgyud 'grel): gang yang rang gi ngo bo stong/ /dus gsum du yang ma grub pa/ /rang bzhin ngo bos stong pa nyid/ /ma byas mi 'gyur ma reg cing/ /ngo bos brjod med rigs bzhis nges/ /shes bya bden gnyis ngo bo nyid/ /mun snang bzhin du 'thad min la/ /lo ma mtshon bzhin gzhan las min/ /
384b2(rgyud 'grel): gang yang gnyis las 'da' med pa/ /mdza' las 'das phyir dbu mar 'dod/ /theg pa mchog la bye brag ste/ /dmigs pa 'phra mo bya ba nyid/ /rang sems mdza' bzhi yongs bral la/ /rang rig ye shes gzhan las min/ /rkyen snang glang pa'i ye shes kyis/ /mthong pa'i dngos
384b3(rgyud 'grel): po mthong 'jam rtsub/ /drug phyed rigs kyi dkyil 'khor du/ /mthong ba rnam par dag ces bya'o/ /dag pas ltas na kun kyang gtsang/ /rtogs pas bsams na ci yang 'grub/ /dngos kun rang rig mtshan nyid de/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyis/ /lugs bskur bzhin
384b4(rgyud 'grel): du snang bar 'dod/ /ye shes byin brlabs snang ba nyid/ /sdeng ma chung par rims lta zhing/ /snang stong rim gyis brtan par byed/ /cho ga las dang rdzas bsogs pa/ /rnal 'byor gnyis dbang smra gzhung ni/ /thams cad sems kyi brlabs snang phyir/ /de nyid mdza' stong
384b5(rgyud 'grel): rig gsal bas/ /rgyu rkyen ma byas mdza' bral ba'i/ /rang bzhin chos kyi sku nyid do/ /kun gzhi sems btun tshul bzhin du/ /chos sku snang ba'i byin rlabs rol/ /rdor sogs rigs lnga'i dkyil 'khor du/ /sangs ma rgyas pa med pa ni/ /rang bzhin stug po
384b6(rgyud 'grel): bkod pa'o/ /rkyen lam rnal 'byor rnam gnyis kyis/ /mngon byas lhun grub rnal 'byor ni/ /byin brlabs ya mtshan bsam yas kyang/ /rnal 'byor gsal ba mnyam par 'dod/ /rnal 'byor gsum po rims snang ba/ /gcig rang du mar smra ba ni/ /rang
384b7(rgyud 'grel): rig nyi ma'i snying po nyid/ /dngos gnyis las sogs byed pa'i phyir/ /cho 'phrul gnyis las mi zhan pas/ /dbang sgyur thabs kyis rgyal bar 'dod/ /cho 'phrul yul sems tshul nyid kyang/ /thabs dang shes rab mtshan nyid de/ /phung sogs yab yum dkyil
385a1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor ni/ /rgyud min rang bzhin snang ba nyid/ /gnyis med byang sems ngo bo las/ /'khor ba'i mtshan nyid rang gis med/ /sman gyi rgyal po ma ki tas/ /gang la reg pa sman du 'gyur/ /dbang sgyur man ngag la gnas pas/ /dug sogs
385a2(rgyud 'grel): byang chub lam du 'gyur/ /thabs kyis dbang sgyur ma chags pa'i/ /thogs med shes rab spyan snang bas/ /rnam gsum ting 'dzin rims bsgoms yang/ /dbang sgyur sems kyis cho 'phrul las/ /rgyu 'bras rim pa med par 'dod/ /rjes yo? thob 'jug
385a3(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor gzhung/ /ma skyes rang rig ye shes ni/ /rtsal rdzogs rol pa rang snang bas/ /grangs mdog ma nges sku gsung thugs/ /rang snang phyag rgya bsam mi khyab/ /kun bzangs ril phyir blang dor med/ /gang yang sems la gzhan min bas/ /rang bzhin cir
385a4(rgyud 'grel): yang ma skyes phyir/ /rtogs pa'i smra bsam yul bral ba/ /kun gzhi bzang mo'i mnga' klong las/ /cir yang snang ba yum gyi dbyings/ /rang snang rol ba bsam yas kyang/ /b+ha ga'i klong las g.yos med de/ /'du 'bral med pa'i bde chen po/ /sangs ma rgyas
385a5(rgyud 'grel): pa cig med pa'o/ /mang nyung grangs kyi lha rnams kyang/ /chu la nya ldang tshul snang bzhin/ /'od kyis ting 'dzin shugs kyis 'gro /gang zhig 'di las gnas gyur na/ /dam tshig spyod sogs gtsor ma gsungs/ /rang bzhin nyid mthun rang bzhin rdzogs
385a6(rgyud 'grel): de phyir lta sogs khyad par 'phags/ /rnal 'byor ming gsum gzhung nyid/ /dngos po de nyid ji lta ba/ /de bzhin ma log mngon byed pa/ /spyi min rang gi mtshan nyid du/ /rang rig mngon sum gsal dus na/ /rang snang mdza' bral rgyun las grol//
385a7(rgyud 'grel): ye shes nam mkha' dbus mdza' med/ /de bzhin nyid gshegs yang dag rdzogs/ /tha snyad gnyis kyi chos rnams ril/ /mnyam rdzogs bdag nyid chen po'i brgyan/ /las yon lhun grub byed dang bral/ /dngos de nyid kyang mdor bstan na/ /chos sems
385b1(rgyud 'grel): ye nas gnyis su med/ /thams cad ma 'dres yongs rdzogs pa/ /cir snang ci yang ma yin te/ /btsam bzhi byas dngos ltar 'dod pa'i/ /dngos po rnam drug la sogs pa/ /gang yang min phyir nges tshig ldan/ /yul bral gnyis med rang mi dmigs/ /kun bzang
385b2(rgyud 'grel): nyid kyis bstan dka' la/ byed bo chos can skad cig dang/ /sgyu snang rtogs pa'i rigs snang dang/ /brlabs dang cho 'phrul rtsal snang ba/ /'di la gdod nas yod ma yin/ /rig pa bzhi snang brlabs sogs pa/ /bltas pa tsam ste bye brag med/ /rgyu nyid rdo rje rkyen
385b3(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin/ /des na skye med 'gags sogs stong/ /bdag las gzhan pa mi snang zhing/ /bdag kyang 'di 'dra mi dmigs pas/ /snang med stong pa chen por gsungs/ /gnyis bsdus brjod snang thams cad kun/ /mi 'gog sems la gzhal med pas
385b4(rgyud 'grel): 'dogs snang brtags par rung ma yin/ /rnam pa kun ldan stong chen po/ /sangs rgyas pas kyang sngar sangs rgyas/ /snang gsum grags pa'i chos rnams kun/ /'di las brtags nas brtags snang phyir/ /thams cad kun snang gzhi rtsar bshad/ /gang
385b5(rgyud 'grel): la'ang gdod nas yod min pas/ /brtags rnams kyi bus khyi tshul gsungs/ /dus gsum chos kun gcig khyad med/ /sngon med phyis med gdod nas byung/ /thams cad sems gsal de bzhin nyid/ /ma byas rgyun min phyogs med gsal/ /ye shes
385b6(rgyud 'grel): ming bzhi'i rang bzhin nyid/ /mdza' bral bsam pa'i yul 'das pas/ /thig le chen po gcig tu nyid/ /ther zug rgyun las ye nas grol/ /don dam nor bdun gzhan 'dod pa'ang/ /gdul bya'i ngo bo 'dod pa min/ /gang yang dam par mi lta na/ ci bsams
385b7(rgyud 'grel): skyon med bya lam dang/ /rgyu shes slu ba med pa bzhin/ /'di la gol sa yod ma yin/ /mnyam rdzogs bdag nyid chen po'i phyir/ /bden pa gnyis kyi snyad las 'das/ /bzhi gnyis spros bral chos kyi dbyings/ /rang bzhin gyis stong de bzhin nyid/ /gdong
386a1(rgyud 'grel): nas skye ba med pa'i dang/ /rigs bzhis nges pa don dam dngos/ /bla med mi gnas nges par 'dod/ /de nyid rang rig kho na'i phyir/ /stong nyid ye shes ngo bo las/ /byin brlabs snang ba gzhir gyur pas/ /yid bzhin nor ltar rim snang ba/ /rjes thob
386a2(rgyud 'grel): la sogs theg pa'i gzhung/ /bden gnyis mnyam pa nyid kyi dbyings/ /dngos kun ma bcos sems gsal ba/ /ma nor ma bcos de bzhin nyid/ /'bras bu lhun gyis grub pa'i dang shes bya khyad 'gyur don dam gsum/ /de sogs bltos brtags brjod bram ba'o/ /ming
386a3(rgyud 'grel): bzhi sogs mtshon shes bya nyid/ /ye nas yin zhes ye shes kyang/ /gnas 'gyur lam dang 'bras skabs su/ /rgyu yis gnyis dang bzhir 'dod pa/ /yul phyir rgyu 'thun skabs cig ma'o/ /rnal sogs stong nyid ye shes dang/ /don shes skabs kyi ye
386a4(rgyud 'grel): shes bzhis/ /don drangs kyis kyang khyad par 'gyur/ /kun ye rang rig shes gsal ba/ /cis kyang ma bsgribs nges pa'i tshig /rang byung rang rig dbyings mi gnas/ /skabs ming bzhi phyir gcig med la/ /chos kun ma 'dres bdag gsal phyir/ /ye
386a5(rgyud 'grel): shes rnam grangs bsam mi khyab/ /yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi'ang/ /ye shes yul med cang mi shes/ /ma lus bdag gsal rtog med pa/ /ye shes ming gnyis dngos gcig pa'o// //gang gis don 'di mthong gyur
386a6(rgyud 'grel): na/ /de bzhin nyid gshegs kho na'i phyir/ /ji bzhin pa'i dngos de bzhin/ /rtogs gnyis grol ba'i ye shes sku/ /ngo bo nyid rtag brjod las 'das/ /brtags sogs thad ka'i chos kun yang/ /sems phyir yod min ma dmigs pas/ /blang dor
386a7(rgyud 'grel): byed dang don gyis bral/ /'du shes rang bzhin ye shes kyang/ /'du shes thams cad 'byung mi 'gyur/ /rang 'byung ye shes mngon byes pa'i/ /nyi ma bye ba 'od brdal yang/ /dus dang rnam pa thams cad du/ /sangs rgyas par bya byed med pa'i/ /chos
386b1(rgyud 'grel): ni rdul tsam yod min pas/ /sangs rgyas med pa'i tshe rabs gsungs/ /bskal pa'i grangs dang tshe rabs su/ /dman pa'i blang dor ci byas dang/ /'bring gis dmigs pas grol thob dang/ /don 'di nyams su myong na/ /brtags pa nyid las ma gtogs par/ /spangs
386b2(rgyud 'grel): thob ngo bo gdong nas med/ /dngos drug dmigs rang gzhan don gyi/ /'du shes rgyun dang bya las grol/ /bdag gi mu mdza' yas sangs rgyas/ /ji bzhin der gyur kun bdag rdzogs/ /de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag rdzogs/ /de sogs tha snyad tsam du zad/ /dman
386b3(rgyud 'grel): 'bras sku dang ye shes mchog/ dngos nyid shin tu rnam dag dang/ /gnyen med don bzhin rnam par shes/ /ming gsum ldan 'di mchog gi gzhung/ /tshogs brgyad la sogs chos kun dang/ /dngos cig bsal bas tha dad pa/ /dngos med ye shes sna tshogs
386b4(rgyud 'grel): can/ /dngos nyid chos kun ldan bral min/ /don 'di rnal 'byor mngon sum mo// //mchog gis rang rig mngon sum du/ /rang grol gsal thob gnyis las 'das/ /ngo bo bsam rdzogs ril dang bral/ /sangs rgyas kyis kyang bstan
386b5(rgyud 'grel): dka' ba/ /dman don gzhung gis gal rdzogs/ /de'i rjes 'jug tshang dag kyang/ /dngos de nyid la rnam med kyang/ /rang bzhin las kyi rtsal rim pas/ /bcos phyogs sbyangs rgyud thabs rtsal gyis/ /mi bzlog rim pa sngon bya'i phyir/ /gtan tshigs bzhis
386b6(rgyud 'grel): sogs rims bkod pas/ /dngos de nyid shes kun smra yang/ /btsal bral bya med don ma rig/ rjes sogs ltos ltas kho nar snang/ /rtse mchog gzhung gi tshad gsum nyid/ /bzhi sogs so so'i tshad ma yis/ /dngos de nyid sogs gang de nyid/ /gnas min
386b7(rgyud 'grel): tshad dang de ru mdza' / /spangs pa'i rang rig gang yin pa/ /khyu mchog mdo ris lta bus tshad/ /de phyir lam kun mkhas spyod yul/ /nam mkha' rmad sogs rjes mthun par/ /myong ba'i nyams bsdur mi 'gal rigs/ /tshig spangs yid ches tshad
387a1(rgyud 'grel): mar? gsungs/ /ma lus sems phyir snang mi 'dzin/ /ci yang min phyir cir mi gnas/ /thams cad bdag phyir thob spangs med/ /bdag gzhan don bral cang mi 'gog /lha bsgom 'bras bcas gtan tshigs mod/ /rgyas par mdo bzhi me long
387a2(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /nges bdun nges zin gtan tshigs drug /tshul kyis nges pa bcu gnyis sogs/ /gzhung mdo tshad mar lta bar bya'o/ /gzhung ngan grib ma lta ba'i long thug bzhen/ /mi lus ma 'dres gzhung nub rmongs don du/ /la shan me long 'di ltas bsod nams gang
387a3(rgyud 'grel): 'gro kun dngos po'i de nyid mdon byed shog /las shan lta ba'i sgron ma zhes bya ba/ bzhad pa rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so// //pad+ma'i spyan la phyag 'tshal nas/ /lta ba'i rim pa bshad par bya/ /'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten 'das/ /gser
387a4(rgyud 'grel): gyi rdzas ltar cig la snang/ rnam grangs rnam pa lnga gsum gnyis/ /shes nas bzhag dang bslang bar bya/ /thams cad byang chub snying po'i klong/ /pad+ma 'khyil ba'i rang bzhin la/ /rang gi rtog rnyog ri bos mnan/ /rang rgyud rkyen gyis log snang ba/ skye bo
387a5(rgyud 'grel): ba dang mu stegs pa/ /drug dang rtag chad snang bar 'gyur/ /dmus long tshul du skye be bas/ /mtho yor mi ltar brtags snang ba/ /dmyal ba'i rang sems me sogs snang/ /yi dags sdig sems mi gtsang snang/ /byol song ma 'grogs gyen thur snang
387a6(rgyud 'grel): mi la mthong yul 'di nyid snang/ /de bzhin lha min go mtshon snang/ /lha la dge sems rin chen snang/ /cir yang snang phyir mthong mi bden/ /skye po rtog pas phrogs pa yi/ /snang 'phrul phyi nang lta bur snang/ /brtags pas brda'i tha snyad shar/ rkyen gyis lag?
387a7(rgyud 'grel): tshul mu stegs pa/ /khrid byed drug gi ston pas bslus/ mdor bsdus mu stegs chad pa la/ glo bur tsam snang mdza' med de/ /rtag pa byas snang dngos por 'dod/ /de yang rgyu med rgyur smra ba/ /rang bzhin rgyur 'dod dbang phyug rgyu/ /ngo bo nyid la rgyu
387b1(rgyud 'grel): smra dang/ /rdul phran rgyu ru 'dod pa dang/ /byed po rgyu ru 'dod pa log /gzhan yang mu steg zhar byung ba/ /phyi rol pa dang yang dag par/ /gsang sngags pa dang gsang chen pa/ /gnyis gsum lnga rnams rgyu'i tshul/ /gsum gnyis 'bras bu'i tshul snang ba/ /bdag
387b2(rgyud 'grel): tu 'dzin pa'i gzhi la lta/ /'jig rten 'das pa'i lta pa'ang/ /cig shos lta pa las 'phags pa/ /nyon thos rang rgyal mdo sde dang/ /kri ya u pa ya dge dang/ /de bzhin yo ga'i theg pa dang/ /ma hA yo ga'i theg pa dang/ /a nu yo ga'i theg pa dang/ /a
387b3(rgyud 'grel): ti yo ga'i theg pa'o/ /chos tsam lta ba'i nyan thos pa/ /mdo sde pa dang bye brag pa/ /phyi rol rdul la rtsod byed cing/ /shes pa skad cig snang bar 'thun/ /de bzhin rang rgyal theg pa pa/ /phyi rol bcu gnyis sgyu ma tsam/ /rdul yang phyogs chas ma grub
387b4(rgyud 'grel): 'phags/ /shes pa skad cig rjes 'thun 'dod/ /mtshan nyid theg pa'i 'di rnam pa gsum/ /rnam rig pa dang rnal 'byor pa/ /de bzhin mdo sde dbu ma'o/ /rnam rig phyi rol tho yod mi/ /sag mo rta ltar med bzhin du/ /rang rig rnam shes 'khrul
387b5(rgyud 'grel): snang 'dod/ /don dam ye shes skad cig 'dod/ /rnal 'byor dbu ma'i kun rdzob mthun/ /don dam stong pa ma skyes 'dod/ /mdo sde kun rdzob sgyu ma tsam/ /yul rnams logs nas snang bar lta/ /dam par mdza' gnyis bral pa yi/ /dbu ma chen
387b6(rgyud 'grel): por 'dod pa'o/ /kri a don dam chos nyid lta/ /kun rdzob rang rig yon tan lta/ /rigs gsum dkyil 'khor snang bar lha/ /skyo pa'i 'khrul pa med par 'dod/ /gnyis ka rgyud kyi 'dod pa ni/ /lta spyod gong 'og rjes su 'thun/ /yo gas don dam rnam
387b7(rgyud 'grel): dag pa'o/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes su/ /rtogs pa'i byin brlabs lha snang ba/ /skye bos de ltar mthong bar 'khrul/ /ma hA yo gas don dam du/ /rang rig gnyis med de bzhin nyid/ /rtogs pa'i cho 'phrul drug sogs pa'i/ /lhar snang dang la
388a1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor ba med/ a nu yo gas don dam du/ /bde chen rtogs pa'i rig pa'i rtsal/ /kun rdzob lha'i dkyil 'khor snang/ /de phyir skye bos rtags pas 'khrul/ /a ti ye ga bden gnyis bral/ /thams cad rang rig rang byung ba'i/ /ye shes
388a2(rgyud 'grel): mdza' gsum bral ba la/ /brtags pa gnyis po gdod nas med/ /de phyir gser la gser mthong ltar/ /ji bzhin ma nor bden mthong yin/ /mnyam nyid rang bzhin ma nges pas/ /ji ltar brtags pa de snang phyir/ /dngos por brtags pa yod min de/ /yod
388a3(rgyud 'grel): na kun la mthun snang rigs/ /de phyir rang sems so sor snang/ /brtags pa cig yul cig med pas/ /'khrul pa snang bar the tshom med/ /des na gzhan dbang gdod nas med/ /rtog sems 'gro ba so so sems/ /gcig na dge sdig rnam smin te/ /ma spyad
388a4(rgyud 'grel): kun gyis myong bar rigs/ /de min yang dag don mi rung/ /rnam smin thun mong ma gyur phyir/ /cig min de nyid ma skyes pas/ /tha dad du yang mi rung ste/ /gcig dang tha dad las grol ba'o/ /dngos po sna tshogs brtags pa'i/ /ming las grub pa'i
388a5(rgyud 'grel): gtan tshigs med/ /de phyir mtshan nyid ci yang med/ /ma grub pa las yod rtogs pa/ /sgyu ma'i skyes bu shes gyur gyi/ /rgyal ba nyid kyis mi mkhyen no/ /snang ba spyod yul ma grub phyir/ /dmigs pa'i shes pa yod mi rung/ /spyod yul ma skyes ye
388a6(rgyud 'grel): shes phyir/ /bsgom bya'i chos nyid bung na med/ /sems kyi ye shes mdza' bral phyir/ /bsgom pa po yang ga la yod/ /de ltar bsgom mkhan dngos med na/ /mi gnas mi rtog 'jug pa su/ /nam mkha' lta bu rang gsal ba'o/ /rang sems yo gi
388a7(rgyud 'grel): de lta'o/ /ci yang yid la mi byed na/ yang dag don la phebs pa'i rigs/ /lus ngag ma skyes gzhi med phyir/ /skyil krung smra tsad kha na med/ /de bzhin sems kyang dngos bral bas/ /rtog spangs sgom pa'i khar mi 'ong/ /de ltar rtogs pa'i sgom pa po//
388b1(rgyud 'grel): yal bar 'dug pa nam yang med/ /ci phyir bdag nyid de phyir te/ /rang rig dbyings lam g.yos pa med/ /rtog pa'i mtshan ma bzang ngan dang/ /ci skyes dgag par mi bya zhing/ /de don dran pas bral ba'ang yin/ /rang byung rang bzhin ngas smre'o/ /dper na kun?
388b2(rgyud 'grel): mo tshor ma thag/ ma skrad bros bzhin sdeng gis zhi/ /lta ba'i shugs las 'byung ba'i phyir/ /ched du tshor ba rten mi dgos/ /de mi blo'i skad cig tu/ rnam rtog rang gi de nyid lta/ /byis pa'i shes pa ldang mi nus/ /rmugs pas don nyid mi gsal ba'o/ /bying rmugs
388b3(rgyud 'grel): rab tu bying rmugs dang/ /shin tu bying dbang du mi btang/ /de bzhin rgod pa'ang rnam pa gsum/ /le lo snyoms las sman la sbyor/ /dogs pas gol ba lhung ba gnyis/ re ba rtags dang 'bras bu'o/ /'khrul pa 'jug tu mi btub dang/ /lus kyi bya byed spyod la dga' 
388b4(rgyud 'grel): dag ci co smra la dga' / /yang dag don la ring ba'i phyir/ /bya byed grong yul gtam mi glan/ /sbyin dang cho ga'i las mi bya/ /dge ba las kyang g.yeng 'gyur na/ /sdig las mi bya smos ci dgos/ nyams dang g.yo dang goms pa dang/ /brtan pa'i nyams dang sbyar
388b5(rgyud 'grel): bar bya/ /don du 'di nyams bstan du med/ /de rtogs yang dag nyams dang ldan/ /de tshe phyi nang gsang ba'i drod/ /phyi nang rtags kyang rim par 'byung/ /skyes kyang dga' brod sems ma skyed/ /med kyang de la mi dga' med/ /de dag g.yo dang thob brtan na//
388b6(rgyud 'grel): rim 'byung gsangs na dngos grub myur/ /klungs gsum ldan pa'i skyes mchog la/ /seng ge lta bu 'jigs tshogs bral/ /zas dang nor gnyen ma chags shing/ snying rje chen po ma bral na/ /chos nyid dang yang 'phrad pa'i rtags/ /ci spyod don las ma nyams
388b7(rgyud 'grel): na/ goms pas las su rung ba'i rtags/ /'di ldan dbang po byed btsums med/ /snang ba gang yang mi skyo zhing/ /yid la bya ba med phyir ro/ /lus kyis rim par bzod thob dang/ /tshes brgyad spong len med pa dang/ /gang la yang nyon mongs mi skye na
389a1(rgyud 'grel): 'di yang sa la bgrod pa'i brtags/ /yid la byed med dgag snang med/ /'du shes ma bzung rang gsal la/ /gang yang nyams su mi len cing/ /sems kyis mngon par ma phyogs shing/ /dmigs med tshul du rang snang ba/ /tha snyad tsam du sgom
389a2(rgyud 'grel): zhes brjod/ /yang dag don gyi sdeng med par/ /tshig tsam lta la khungs phyung zhing/ /bya med chos la blo gtad nas/ /rtsid chos phaT ral spyod byed pa/ /rgyal ba'i bkas kyang mi skyob ste/ /dmyal ba'i 'bras bu the tshom med/ /rtogs pa'i mtshon rtogs brgyad ldan na
389a3(rgyud 'grel): skyes bu de ni rgyal ba'i sras/ /sdeng med lta ba mthong 'dod pas/ /rang gis nga rgyal snyems byed pa/ /ri bos srog chags gnang pa ltar/ /nan yang thar pa'i khar mi 'byung/ /gsang sngags pa'i sgor zhugs nas/ /yang dag don la mi 'dud par/ /mi chos zang
389a4(rgyud 'grel): zing las byed cing/ /rang dbang yod bzhin dbang med ces/ /smra zhing gsang don yal 'jog pa/ /phyi ma gar 'gro rtol med par/ /gal med le lo las byed pa/ /e ma rang 'joms dpa' bo de/ /rgya mtsho 'jings kyi pha 'od ltar/ /thugs rje zhags
389a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i spyad thag yan/ /rang gis rang slus snying re rje/ /le lo can la thar lam med/ /lta ba'i rim pa yi man ngag /dka' ba dpal brtsegs kyis mdzad pa/ snang ba bcu bdun rdzogs so// //dpal kun tu bzang po'i sems kyi rang
389a6(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gang yin pa de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rgyu 'bras lus kyi rjes 'brang rig pa yis/ /gang zag blo dman rnams kyi don phyir du/ /rin chen g.yu ltar dgongs mdzes kun khyab don/ /theg dgu'i lta rim skas kyi gdang lta bu/ /kun bzang dgongs don
389a7(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje sems la stan/ /nag rdzun bdag blo mun par shar/ /'jam dpal bshes gnyen kun dga' la sogs pa/ /phyi rabs rdo rje 'chang gral 'byung ba'i mi/ /sa gser lta bur mi 'gyur brtan pa'i blo/ /dad ldan rgyal ba'i thugs dang 'dra rnams
389b1(rgyud 'grel): khyer/ /skal ldan dbang phyug rgyal ba'i gdung 'tshob pa dad can rnams kyi btsas su bzhag pa yin/ /shin tu rnal 'byor mchog gi mchog /'phags pa las kyang 'phags pa'i don/ /gser gling rin chen lta bu'i mchog /'di la sgrib byed chu 'brang dang chu srin nya ming lta bu'i
389b2(rgyud 'grel): dgra/ 'jig rten 'das pa'i rgyur zhugs pa'i/ /theg pa che chung rim pa dang/ /yo ga bzhi sogs gol sgrib rnams/ /so so'i khyad par rtogs chud nas/ /mi gnas mi spong theg pa'i mchog /lhun po bzhin 'phags rtse rgyal nyid/ /che ba rtog phyir khyad par dbye/ /sprul
389b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i gsung rab rgyu yi don/ /'dul dbang blo bzhin grags pa dag /bsdu ba che chung gnyis bcos so/ /chung sdus nyan thos nga rgyal te/ /nyan thos 'dod pas gnyis su 'gyur/ /mdo sde pa dang bye brag pa'o/ /rang gi shes rab lta ba'i dngos/ /spyir na yang dag lta ba
389b4(rgyud 'grel): nyid/ /mi rtog sdug bsngal stod bdag med/ /mi rtag la sogs dngos su 'dzin/ /kun rdzob bye brag 'dod gzhung nyid/ /snod kyi rdzas rnams dngos po 'di/ /rdul phran sil bu phan tshun bas/ /ma 'dres ne sing lta bu ste/ /mthu yi stobs kyis 'dus par 'dod/
389b5(rgyud 'grel): don dam shas pa skad cig ma/ /re rer yod par 'dod pa'o/ /mdo sde kun rdzogs phra rab rnams/ /'dus pa'i rnam pa gcig tu 'dod/ /don dam shes pa cig par 'dod/ /spyod pa rang don 'ba' zhig pa'i/ /de la dbu mas skyon brjod pas/ /yul sems
389b6(rgyud 'grel): dngos su 'dzin bcas bas/ /dngos ltar 'jog pa'i nyan thos khyor/ /'khor ba 'di las mi 'das pas/ /'bras bu skyon du 'gyur ba nyid/ /bka' i bden pa rnam bzhi las/ /dngos por 'dzin pas bka' don 'gal/? /'jig rten dngos su 'dzin rgyu 'di las
389b7(rgyud 'grel): mya ngan 'das pa thob 'dod pa/ /las dang 'bras bu 'gal ba'i phyir/ /khyod kyi 'dod pa bden pa min/ /rang rgyal nyan thos don dam 'dra/ /kun rdzob snang ba'i khyad par ni/ /gzugs kyis bsdus pa'i chos rnams kun/ /rten 'brel rgyu rkyen dbang sgyur
390a1(rgyud 'grel): nas/ /rmi lam tshul de logs na med/ /des ni kun rdzob khyad par 'phags/ /spyod pa lus kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis/ /gzhan don shes 'ga' la'ang spyod pa'o/ /dbu ma'i theg pa bstan pa ni/ /yul rnams rmi lam ma grub na/ /
390a2(rgyud 'grel): de dang 'dra ba'i shes pa'ang rdzun/ /de min rdzun gyi yul nyid la/ /don dam bden pa'i shes pa nyid/ /skye zhing dmigs par rigs pa min/ /des na rgyu 'bras 'khrul 'khor te/ /rgyu 'bras mi mthun 'gal ba yod/ /rdzun rgyus yang dag 'bras mi
390a3(rgyud 'grel): thob/ /de phyir phan tshun spangs te 'gal/ /bsdu ba theg pa chen po la/ /theg pa phyi nang rnam pa gnyis/ /phyi pa rnam par rig pa pa/ /kun kyang rang rig yul med 'dong/ /de yang rnam bcas rnam med gnyis/ /rnam bcas dbyig gnyen thog /
390a4(rgyud 'grel): med gzhung/ /yul ltar snang ba 'di dag kun/ /rab rib sku mthong rmi gzugs 'dra/ /shes pa 'khrul pa'i gzugs brnyan phyir/ /de yang de'i ngo bor 'dod/ /rnam med shan ta rak+Shi ta/ /rjes 'brang zhes pa'i 'dod pa ste/ /rang rig gnyis med
390a5(rgyud 'grel): shel ltar dag /de nyid dam par yod par smra/ /chos skyong 'khor bcas 'dod pa ni/ /gzugs brnyan gzugs la sogs pa'i yul/ /gang ltar snang yang sgo lnga yi/ /mi rtog shes pa rnam pa lnga/ /rjes 'jug ngo bo 'brel par 'dod/ /brtag
390a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i 'khor ba'i chos rnams ni/ /yod de shes pa ngan rgyu bsog /de ltar bsgrub pa byed pa po/ /de la nang pas skyon brjod pa/ /rang sems gnyis med shel lta bu/ /dag par lta bas dngos bcas skyon/ /yul rnams 'khrul snang rdzun rgyu dang/ /
390a7(rgyud 'grel): shes pa rang rig don dam nyid/ /ngo bo gcig par 'dod pa ni/ /phan tshun spangs te 'gal bar 'gyur/ /de min yul brdzun shes pa'ang rdzun/ /mdo da dbu mar brjod pa ni/ /yul rdzun phyir na shes pa rdzun/ /ngo bo gcig phyir de ltar 'gyur
390b1(rgyud 'grel): rang rig gnyis med don dam min/ /skad cig rgyun tu yod phyir ro/ /gal te kun rdzob tsam duAng/ /yul sems gnyis su med 'gyur na/ /tha snyad chad par 'gyur ba ste/ gzugs sgra yin min la sogs pa/ /nam du shes par mi 'gyur ro/ /nad pa rnal
390b2(rgyud 'grel): 'byor dbu ma ni/ /kun rdzob rdzun pa tsam du yang/ /yul sems gnyis med yul snang sems/ /kun rdzob rnam rig ji lta bu'o/ /don dam ma skyes stong par lta/ /de la mdo sdes rgal ba'i tshig /kun rdzob rdzun pas mi 'gal la/ /don dam shes pa yod 'dod
390b3(rgyud 'grel): na/ /yul rnams rdzun bzhin shes pa'ang rdzun/ /rang sems gnyis med don dam na/ /'bras bu la'ang dgos med 'gyur/ /yul la snang du rung mi 'gyur/ /lam gyi stegs su 'ang mi 'gyur dang/ /'bras bu grub par mi 'gyur ro/ /brtag bya rang rig don dam
390b4(rgyud 'grel): de/ /gal te rgyu las ma byung ba'i/ /rang rig gnyis med dag pa 'am/ /rgyu la brten nam rang byung ba'i/ /go bur bar ram rang byung ba'i/ de dag de bzhin rig pa med/ /mdo sde dbu mas kun rdzob tu/ /yul sems rdzun pa sgyu ma tsam/ /snang ba'i yul sems so sor
390b5(rgyud 'grel): 'dod/ dam pa'i don du gnyis su med/ /dbu ma phyi mo pa rnams ni/ /don dam gtso bo mi dmigs lta/ /kun rdzob mdo sde rnal 'byor gnyis/ /gang la rung ste spong mi phyed/ /de kun byang chub spyod pa'i mchog/ rgya cher gzhan don rdzogs bar byed/ /gzhan la dmigs
390b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i mtshan mo'i tshul/ /sbar ba lta bu'i bdag don 'byung/ /de la sngags kyi kri ya bas/ /brtsad pa khyed kyi bden pa gnyis/ /so sor lta ba bden med de/ rgyal ba'i ye shes gnyis med la/ /re mos snang pa'i rgyus mi 'grub/ /de phyir rgyu 'bras 'khrul te
390b7(rgyud 'grel): 'gal/ /gal te kun rdzob sgyu ma cing?/ /don dam bden dang tha dad na/ /don dam bden par cig mi rung/ /cig la snga phyi snang mi rigs/ /shes pa gnyis kyi yul 'gyur bas/ /snga phyi re mos 'gyur snang phyir/ /lhan cig mi snang skyon du 'gyur/ /
391a1(rgyud 'grel): gal te ngo bo cig min na/ /phan tshun spangs te 'gal 'gyur zhing/ /bsod nams dang ni 'brel med de/ /des na sangs rgyas sku mi 'grub/ /thams cad don dam 'ba' zhig na/ /tha snyad tshad par 'gyur ba ste/ /sgyu ma tsam du
391a2(rgyud 'grel): 'ang snang mi rigs/ /'bras bu nyid la'ang tshogs mi 'byung/ /lam gyi chos suAng mi rung ste/ /bdag gzhan don kyang 'gag par 'gyur/ /gal te bden gnyis dbyer med na/ /rang gi tshig rtsal mi 'gal snang/ /kun rdzob bden par cig ce na/ /don dam mtshan mar
391a3(rgyud 'grel): snang mi rung/ /de min don dam dang bsgoms nas/ /rjes la sgyu ma snang zhe na/ /don dam mtshan ma'i sa bon tsam/ /rigs pa ma yin gzhan yin na/ /kun rdzob rang bzhin can 'dod na/ /sgyu ma tsam duAng mi rung 'gyur/ /de bas dmigs pa'i shes pa'ang//
391a4(rgyud 'grel): cig la phyed byed bden rdzun 'gyur/ /khyed kyang bya byed med 'dod ces/ /bsod nams ci nus spyod byed 'khrul/ /des na da dung shed ma bye/ /byis pa gtso mchog khyed rnams kyis/ /gsang ba nga la reg mi nus/ /de phyir khro bo ye shes sku/ /don dam rang
391a5(rgyud 'grel): nyid snang par 'dod/ /snang ba'i don dam dbyer med pa/ /mdza' yas ma bsgoms chos nyid dag /grub ba bya phyir rjes 'thun spyod/ /de la rgyu 'bras 'khrul mi 'byung/ /longs spyod rdzogs pa'i bka' lung rgyud/ /yo ga phyi pa rim pa gsum/ /bya byed rgyud dang
391a6(rgyud 'grel): rnam pa gsum/ /gdul bya'i shes rab dbang pos phye/ /de dag lta spyod khyad par 'gyur/ /bya byed kri ya'i don dam du/ /kun kyang dag pa'i chos nyid la/ /mdza' i dri ma ye nas med/ /kun rdzob rang bzhin rigs gsum sku/ /kun kyang dag phyir dug
391a7(rgyud 'grel): gsum gsum/ /lha'i dkyil 'khor yin par 'dod/ /ma grub tshul nas 'jig rten chos/ /mthun par bya phyir rje khol lta/ /dam tshig cho gas rdzogs byas nas/ /bshags dang mchod sted drug ldan pa'i/ /bzlas pas sdig sgribs dag pa'i
391b1(rgyud 'grel): sems/ /chu dang lta bur grub shar ba/ /lha mchog rgyu phyir lhas rtsal smra/ /khrus dang spyod pa'i gtsang sbra slang/ /'di la yo gas rtsad pa'i don/ /kun rdzob lha dang rje khol na/ /chos nyid ngang la bzang ngan 'gyur/ /rang bzhin dag par cig mi 'gyur/ /kun
391b2(rgyud 'grel): rdzob don dam tha dad na/ /lha yang ye shes sku min te/ /bsgoms pas 'bras bu snang mi rigs/ /don dam dag rtogs kun rdzob tu/ /khrus dang gtsang sbra ci zhig sbyang/ /gal te bden pa re mos na/ /gsang ba'i don duAng mi rung la/ /rgyu 'bras mi mthun 'gal
391b3(rgyud 'grel): ba 'byung/ /ma grub cha yis khrus byed ces/ /lta spyod ya cha bdud kyi las/ /gnyis ka rgyud kyi 'dod pa ni/ /spyod pa bya ba'i rjes 'thun par/ /lta bas rnal 'byor rjes 'jug phyir/ /rigs dang lta bas khyad par 'gyur/ /'di la yang yo gas bcad
391b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i tshig /spyod pa gol bas lta ba gol/ /lta spyod ya cha bdud du 'gyur/ /de min rigs la nges med pas/ /grub pa'i 'bras bu thob mi 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor phyi ma'i 'dod pa ni/ /rang rig dngos stong mtshan ma gnyis/ /dbyer med dbyings dang
391b5(rgyud 'grel): ye shes sa/ /byin rlabs rdo rje dbyings kyis/ /shar lta grogs po'i tshul du mchod/ /ma grub tshul gnas 'jig rten dag /grogs la brten nas nor 'tshol mtshungs/ /spyod pa ting 'dzin gtsor byed pa'o/ /'di la nad pas skyon brjod pa/ /
391b6(rgyud 'grel): gnyis med rnam dag ye shes la/ /rgyud nas bskur snang bden zhe na/ /rgyu'i ye shes skad cig 'gyur/ /de men 'byung 'jug cha yis na/ /bden pa res 'jog skyon 'gyur bas/ /ye shes sku ru mi rung ste/ /lhan cig mi gnas 'gal bar
391b7(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur/ /grogs po'i tshul tu lta byed bas/ /tha dad bdag tu tha dad de/ /'brel ba med pas mi 'grub dang/ /des na don nyid la yang skyon/ /gnyis pa yod 'gyur cig ce na/ /rang la grogs su ltar mi rigs/ /des na bdag nyid chen
392a1(rgyud 'grel): po'i don/ /rang gi shes pa mthong ba min/ /ting 'dzin rtsor spyod dngos po mdza' / /ji snyed bral ba'i theg chen med/ /de min rgyal ba nyid du 'gyur/ /dam rdzas 'dod yon sman? pa rnams/ /chu yi mtshon bzhin sbyong mi nus/ /de phyir gnyis med
392a2(rgyud 'grel): don la skyon/ yang na shes pa gnyis 'gyur bas/ /cig la rgyud gnyis ldang mi srid/ /des na khyod kyi lta spyod rdzun/ /lhun grub bka' lung spyod rdzogs gsum/ /thog mar bstan pa'ang rnal 'byor che/ /lus kyi dngos po gnyis sdus rnams/ /rang rig nyid
392a3(rgyud 'grel): phyir snang ba kun/ /ye nas ye shes sku gsal ba/ /dkyil 'khor gnyis drug la sogs shing/ /snang ba nyid nas rang bzhin med/ /des na mdza' i skyon dang bral/ /snang stong bral ba'i de bzhin nyid/ /ngang las rig pa'i lhar bskyed pas/ /tha mal rtog tshogs
392a4(rgyud 'grel): ma spangs dag /gser 'gyur mun snang ji bzhin pa'o/ /cir snang rang gi rig pa'i phyir/ /lta dang lta ba yongs kyis med/ /ting 'dzin ye shes bskur shar bas/ /sus kyang ma byas byed med de/ /ngo bo gzhan nas 'ongs pa'ang med/ /des na bdag nyid chen
392a5(rgyud 'grel): por lta/ /spyod pa bzang ngan gtsang sme sogs/ /gang la chags sdang blang dor med/ /bde myong mi 'gog mi 'dzin phyir/ /tshogs gnyis rgyun tu tshogs par byed/ /de la'ang rjes su rnal 'byor pa/ /skyon brjod khyod kyi lta ba'i don/ /mnyam nyid snang
392a6(rgyud 'grel): stong dbyer med dag /yin na rig pas bskyed mi dgos/ /ye shes sku yang 'dus byas 'gyur/ /gal te bdag gis bskyed bas na/ /snga bar bdag nyid ma grub bam/ /de min thug pa med par 'gyur/ /yang na bdag nyid dkyil 'khor nyid/
392a7(rgyud 'grel): tha dad ye nas 'brel med pas/ /skyed du 'ang mi btub 'grub mi 'gyur/ /spyod pa blang dor med ce na/ /de nyid gtsor spyod blang dor nyid/ /rnal 'byor mchog gi brjod pa ni/ /mnyam nyid bdag nyid chen po ni/ /rang la rang gis sgom ci dgos/ /bdag
392b1(rgyud 'grel): gis bdag la 'ang dmigs rung na/ /mdzub mo rang la reg par rigs/ /tha dad rang gi tshig gis 'gal/ /gal te mi sgom bya med na/ /rnam gsum rim pas smos ci dgos/ /thams cad bdag la ma'i skus/ /gzer la gzer bzhin 'byung mi rigs
392b2(rgyud 'grel): yul med don la gtsor len pa/ /de nyid dmigs lta rtsa ba'i don/ /khyod kyang gal te lhun grub na/ /spyod dang phrin las dang len 'khrul/ /bya ba med pas spyod do zhes/ /de nyid ched spyod thabs rten 'khrul/ /snang stong ye nas dag 'dod na/ /bsgrib
392b3(rgyud 'grel): pa gnas 'gyur dri ma'i tshul/ /blang dor med pa'i spyod byed na/ /de nyid dang len snyoms sam ci/ /kun kyang rang rig sems yin na/ /dbugs phyin dkyil 'khor skyed ci dgos/ /las bzhin 'gro don rtsal ba yis/ /lhun grub mdzad pa ga la mthong//
392b4(rgyud 'grel): gu 'jo'i spyod dang ma bral phyir/ /rtsol ba'i chu por byid pa yi/ /rjes 'jug rnal 'byor 'dod pa yi/ /snang srid bzang mo'i mkha' klong la/ /ma skyes dkyil 'khor kun bzang shar/ /shar ba nyid na shar ba med/ /yab yum sras bcas bde chen po
392b5(rgyud 'grel): lhun rdzogs sa la skad cig gis/ /snying po dran brjod skur shar ba'o/ /'di la rim pa'i rtsol ba med/ /rgya mtshor nyi zla shar ba 'dra/ /don gnyis ma rtsal rdzogs par byed/ /spyod pa blang dor med par spyod/ /de ltar ma nus nyams mi lta/ /de lta mgong
392b6(rgyud 'grel): mas skyon brjod pa/ /thams cad bde ba chen po la/ /ma 'dres yongs su rdzogs 'dod na/ /mtshan ma'i skye skyed snyoms snyam ci/ /khye'u bzhi rtog 'byung mi 'gal lam/ mtshan mas 'gro don rdzogs 'dod nor/ /yab yum 'byed dang kha dog grangs
392b7(rgyud 'grel): rtsol ba bde chen don de 'gal/ /de phyir bye brag mthong ba med/ /gal te ma grub pas byed na/ /rgyu 'bras 'khrul te 'gal bar 'gyur/ /don gnyis ma brtsal rdzogs she na/ /skad cig dkyil 'khor bskyed ci bya/ /rang gi bcings pa'i smongs
393a1(rgyud 'grel): pa khyod/ /bya byed don la btang snyoms byed/ /de nyid rtsol ba ma yin nam/ /spyod yul bral la dmigs par byed/ /de nyid yul dang yul can mod/ /bsam med ngang? la gsal bar 'dod/ /de nyid bsam spyod gtogs pa'i gzhi/ /bsgrub med
393a2(rgyud 'grel): ngang la don du gnyer/ /de nyid re dogs rtsa ba yin/ /de lta'i spyod yul bems po yin/ /klong chen ngang la thigs mi 'gyur/ /de dag skabs kyis rang rang gi /lha la zhen pas ldongs pa yin/ /ltung ba'i phyir na gol sa che/ /des na gol bsgrib thun mong ste/
393a3(rgyud 'grel): lta ba dmigs kyis dbul ba dag /ye shes nyid la bdag tu 'dzin/ /rang la rang nyid yul du byed/ /don la don nyid rjes su 'breng/ /ye shes nyid la gsal bar 'dod/ /bdag la bdag nyid spyod mdza' 'tshol/ /zin pa'i don la bsgrub par byed/ /
393a4(rgyud 'grel): bya bral nyid kyi bya ba med/ /bsgrod med lam la bsgrod par byed/ /mi dmigs pa la dmigs par byed/ /kye ma'o thugs rje'i gnas su rung/ /deng sang dus kyi gang zag rnams/ /ma rig ling tog ma sol bas/ /lta ba'i la shan ma phyed cing/ /lta ba'i
393a5(rgyud 'grel): mche ba ma mthong bas rgyud lung man ngag goms pa yis/ /rmangs dang rje dang rgyal 'dra la/ /kun rdzob mi mnyam don dam mnyam/ /de skad smra ba'i dmus long dag /khrel 'bru ma thub sa gzhi che/ /ma mthong tshul dang mtshungs pa'o/ /mig lta brtan
393a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i 'di dag gi /bza' bral ngang las gnas mi 'gyur/ /de nas bskal ldan skyes mchog pu/ /ma bgrod sa la gnas bya'i phyir/ /rdzogs chen nga'i don la ltos/ /yod med stong pa'i mdza' la thung/ /kun gyi sku mchog ye shes zhal/ /
393a7(rgyud 'grel): 'dongs pas rmongs 'khrul dug gsum gyi/ /snying khrag 'thung zhing kun gzhi nyid/ /gtan nas phung byed nga la thung/ /zang ba'i dus na bskal pa'i me 'bar ba/ /mi zad 'jigs gzugs mnga' ba nga la 'dud/ /bskal pa'i chu chen rab tu 'khrugs
393b1(rgyud 'grel): ba 'bum/ /'jigs byed des kyang ljags kyi mdza' ma snubs/ /khrag mtsho mdza' med bskams la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /thor rlung drag pos 'jig rten kun g.yeng ba/ /des kyang de'i ba spu'i cha tsam bskyod mi nus/ /zil gnon sku tshad mnga' ba nga la thung/ /
393b2(rgyud 'grel): g.yo dang mi g.yo thams cad kun gsol ba'i/ /'jigs byed nga lta bu la ji skad bya/ sangs rgyas thams cad gsol bas nga ma zhos/ /byang chub sems dpa' gsol bas kha byugs tsam/ /nga rung 'gro kun gsol byed sgribs shing skems pas nga la thud
393b3(rgyud 'grel): 'on kyang ma sgrod rdzogs pa nyid du 'gyur/ /lhag pa'i rnal 'byor lugs nyid kyis/ /bslab pa med pa'i bslab pa nyid/ /bslabs rnams 'jigs byed bslab pa'i mchog/ dngos po spyod cig mdza' mi tshol/ /don la mngon du 'dod pa med/ /gza'?
393b4(rgyud 'grel): dang la gza' mi byed/ /bya med don la de nyid kyang/ /che du len cing rtsol ba med/ /rang sems ci la'ang 'brang pa dang/ /'dod pa'i sems dang ye nas bral/ /de nyid las ni 'gyur ba med/ /thig le chen po rgyal ba'i thugs/ /brtags na med la bsams na
393b5(rgyud 'grel): snang/ /dngos med cha lugs kun la ston/ /rang bzhin cig tu ma nges pas/ /rdzas kyi rnam pa cig tuAng/ /log mthong drug dang yang dag dgu/ /cir yang snang ba'i ngo bo nyid/ /rang bzhin med pa'i rang bzhin can/ /'di 'dra rgyal bar brjod du med//
393b6(rgyud 'grel): gal te brjod kyang thabs mi 'gyur/ /sna tshogs snang ba nga'i sku/ /ji skad grags pa nga'i gsung/ /dran rtog rig shes nga'i thugs/ /sna tshogs snang la ngo bo med/ /che ba lnga yis ye nas 'phags/ /thig le drug dang rang bzhin ldan/ /khams gsum
393b7(rgyud 'grel): bde sdug nga la rdzogs/ /de la bde sdug ngang gis bral/ /dus gsum rgyal bar nga nyid shar/ /de la byung shar gdod nas med/ /gza' ltas med pa'i rta mchog la/ /de nyid du yang lta ba med/ /gal te gdod nas dmigs lta mod/ /thams cad mkhyen pa
394a1(rgyud 'grel): sgom pa'i mchog /ngo bo nyid ni dmigs su med/ /snang ba med pa'i chos nyid ni/ /ma rtsal gzhag na bsgoms pa yin/ /de la bzhag par bya ba 'ang med/ /bya byed don la yid mi rtog/ de ltar gang shes ting 'dzin mchog /dmigs pa'i
394a2(rgyud 'grel): skyon byung 'gog mi byed/ /don la gsal bas 'bad mi dgos/ /drod rtags snang la re ba med/ /thams cad bdag nyid chen po'i phyir/ /snod bcud 'jig rten bde sdug bsngal/ /nyi zla 'od gsil byed 'dod pa'i/ /ji srid cir snang spyod pa kun/ /
394a3(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid chen po'i mdzad spyod pas/ /de nyid gsal par spyod pa ste/ /de la spyod dang mi spyod med/ /'gro don rgyun du ma byas rdzogs/ /yang dag sa la ma song phyin/ /tshogs gnyis ma bsags lhun gyis rdzogs/ /ma bsgral stong gsum gnas su stobs/ /ma
394a4(rgyud 'grel): phul mchod pa kun la thim/ /ma blangs dngos grub rang la shar/ /ma bsrungs dam tshig nyams pa med/ /mnor thams cad rang dbang sgyur/ /ma ltas lta ba kun tu gsal/ /ma bsgoms ting 'dzin yengs pa med/ /ma bcos rnam rtog sgyu 'phrul bral/ /
394a5(rgyud 'grel): ma bsgrubs 'bras bu bdag nyid che/ /ma spyangs dus gsum 'du 'bral med/ /ma sbyangs bsgrib pa ye nas med/ /ma bzung thugs rjes kun na bsnubs/ /des na byas zin bya ba med/ /bya ba gang yang 'gog pa med/ /de lta sus rtogs byas pa'i mchog /
394a6(rgyud 'grel): bya med brtson 'grus bar chad med/ /skyes mchog gar zhig 'di ltar ltos/ /thams cad snang ba nga'i sems/ /theg pa mtho sman ji snyed pa/ /nyi 'od lta bur nga la snang/ /bskal bar dge spyad rtsol byas kyang/ /nga dang ma phrad sangs mi rgya/ /des na sdeng
394a7(rgyud 'grel): chen don la ltos/ /mthod? pa nyid na chos kyi sku/ /go ba'i yul na bde ba che/ /de la 'jig rten rang bzhin med/ /de nyid rnam dag 'jig rten yin/ /bdag nyid chen po don ni nges par ston/ /ji bzhin byang chub snying po la/ /bsgrub bya lhun rdzogs bla
394b1(rgyud 'grel): med pas/ /nga zhes mang du snyad par zad/ /don du nga la 'di 'dra zhes/ /dngos gzhir bstan par nus pa med/ /brtan g.yo dngos por 'dzin byed cing/ /rtag chad gnyis kar slong zhen pas/ /snying po'i don la gol bar gsungs/ /shin tu rnal 'byor chen po nyid/ /dngos por
394b2(rgyud 'grel): zhen dang gdong nas bral/ /'jig rten phal bar lhung sa med/ /rtag chad gnyis la mi gnas pas/ /mu stegs lta la gnas pa med/ /stong nyid don ngam ma skyes pa'i/ /phyogs la bya bral mi lta bas/ /mthong med lta bas nga mi mthong/ /mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i sku mi
394b3(rgyud 'grel): bsgom/ /gnyis med don la gtsor mi 'dzin/ /skur bskyed 'gro don mi rtsom pas/ /yo ga phyi nang sar mi lhung/ /bya med ngang la bya ba'ang rdzogs/ /rtsol ba'i dus na gdug pa'ang med/ /de nyid don la bdag 'dzin na/ /de ltar lta ba 'di rtog pa'o/ /snying rje med pa'i
394b4(rgyud 'grel): gang zag rnams/ /deng sang dus na'ang 'byung ba dag /kun bzang tshig tsam smra byed cing/ /sdeng med don dang mi ldan par/ /de ltar lta ba'i 'dir rtog pa'o/ /rgyu 'bras don la yid 'byung zhing/ /tshig tsam lta la rten pa dag /sdeng med spyod rtsing 'chol ba'i rgyus/
394b5(rgyud 'grel): bskrul bar bskal pa ci spyad kyang/ /snying po'i don dang 'phrad mi 'gyur/ /des na zab mo'i spyod pa mnos/ /ci spyad kun bzang spyod par 'gyur/ /sdeng chen don du gar ldan pa/ /rnam par dkar spyar spang mi bya/ /bsam gtan ro mchog rlung gnas kyang/ /'gro
394b6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i bla ma spyi bos bkur/ /stong gsum sangs rgyas sa shes kyang/ /snying rje'i don dang bral mi bya/ /skye shi med pa'i sdeng ldan yang/ /sems can sbom 'phra'i srog mi gcod/ /'du 'bral med pa'i don snyems kyang/ /'jig rten 'phyo g.yem las mi
394b7(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /rang bzhin ma nges don shar yang/ /don du mi 'gyur brdzun mi bya/ /bdag nyid thig le'i ngang gnas kyang/ /pha rol rdzas la bskam mi bya/ /khro gtum ngang thung 'khrul pa'i bdud/ /snang ba'i yul nas bya ba med/ /de nyid ngang la de med phyir/ /
395a1(rgyud 'grel): rjes 'jug de yang de bzhin no /de bzhin mi spyod de dag gang/ /rag sha yag sha'i rgyud 'dzin bas/ /theg chen rigs su gang chud pa/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i ming ci yod/ /sangs rgyas khas ches spyang thag yan/ /bya byed rnal
395a2(rgyud 'grel): 'byor mchog spyod bas/ /spang med shes nas dkar phyogs kyang/ /ched du bya ba med ce na/ sdig las mi bya smos ci dgos/ /lhun grub spyod dang bya bral spyod/ /thugs rje chen po'i mdzad spyod dang/ /nam yang bral bar ma byed cig /de ltar
395a3(rgyud 'grel): rtogs dran spyod pa'o/ /gol sgrib ltung gnas g.yang sa yang/ /spang du med thig le'i dbyings/ /lhung dang ma lhung tha snyad bral/ /chos nyid don la ma bcos na/ /me dang dud ltar ltung sgrib 'byung/ /gang du 'du shes ma skyes pas/ /grol dang ma
395a4(rgyud 'grel): grol ming ci yod/ /kun du rgyu la 'jigs pa 'byung/ /phyin pa med na 'jigs dang bral/ /des na gang la dogs mi bya/ /re ba'i sems tsam spyod de bzhin te/ /de dogs med pa'i don ched bstan/ /gang dag dmigs pa dngos 'dres pa'i/ /ling thog
395a5(rgyud 'grel): bsal phyir thugs 'dra 'dis/ /rab rib nad bral rdzogs chen sku/ mngon mthong kun gyis mchog thob shog /pho dreg phyi la ngang 'thung 'khrug /bcos dka' gdung bral gdong 'das can/ /dad med chags bcings slu brid mkhan/ /sems
395a6(rgyud 'grel): med yal 'jog rnal 'jog byed/ /lci ba'i sems bral rang gar spyod/ /byil ma nor chung mtshang rdzogs po/ /lce mkhan thabs 'bru zol pa la/ /snying sgor byung yang bstan mi bya/ /g.yu'i thang ma kras dgu rdzogs so// //

395b1(rgyud 'grel): spangs pa yi /ye shes rang rig gsal ba'i mkha' dkyil nas/ /dkyil 'khor spro dang 'gro don sprul pa yi/ /ma lus thugs su chung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i gzhung lugs las/ /'gro ba'i rnam par rtog pa'i phyir/ /ye shes skyed ba'i
