395b4(rgyud 'grel): dang longs spyod stong la sbyin/ /slob dpon mnyes bar byas pa dang/ /sgyu 'phrul ba'i dkyil 'khor du/ /dam tshig rnams ni rdzogs pa yis/ /'dod dang g.yeng ba kun spangs te/ /dka' thub spyod bas ma gsungs par/ /ting 'dzin mthun
395b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sa phyogs su/ /rab bde'i sten la 'dug nas ni/ /byams dang snying rje dga' ba dang/ /btang snyoms mang po rab bsgoms nas/ /sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir/ /sku gsung thugs ni bsgrub bya zhes/ /bdag nyid bsam pa
395b6(rgyud 'grel): bstan byas te/ /rang nyid sa bon 'od zer las/ /sprul pa mchod pa'i cho gas spros nas/ /mdun du dkyil 'khor tshogs rnams dang/ /bla ma phyi sogs rnams kyis mchod/ /de nas sdig pa bshags pa dang/ /skyabs 'gro la sogs byas
395b7(rgyud 'grel): nas ?? ?? pa'i phyir/ /sna tshogs rdo rje hUM las skyes/ /rdo rjes bzhir bsam par bya/ /rnam rtog 'du shes kun spangs nas/ /bgegs kyi sbyar ba yang mi 'gyur/ /de bas rnam rtog bgegs yin par/ /
396a1(rgyud 'grel): yang dag rigs pa nyid kyis gsungs/ /e ma ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyis gsang/ /skye ba med las thams cad skyes/ /skyes pa nyid na skye ba med/ /oM mahA shU n+ya ta dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba ad ma ko haM/
396a2(rgyud 'grel): de ltar stong nyid rab gsal nas/ /snying rje yum gyis slangs nas ni/ /sa bon shin tu gsal bar 'gyur/ /rab tu brtan 'gyur a kar las/ /shin tu phra ba'i a rnams spro/ /phyogs bcu gang bar gsal 'gyur pa/ /bsdus kyang 'phel
396a3(rgyud 'grel): 'grib med par bstan/ /de las ming tshogs gsal 'bar kun/ /spro zhing bsdu ba de bzhin no/ /'di ni rdo rje dngos grub kyi/ /brtan 'byung ye shes rgyu yin no/ /de nas mdza' dang dbus med pa'i/ /'og min chos 'byung bsam par bya/ /de nas
396a4(rgyud 'grel): yaM las byung ba yi/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor bsam par bya/ /de steng yi ge ram las ni/ /me'i dkyil 'khor bskyed par bya/ /de yi steng du 'aM bsams te/ /de las chu'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /chu'i dkyil 'khor steng du ni/ /khaM las ye shes/
396a5(rgyud 'grel): sa gzhir brtag /b+h+ruM bi shwa bi shud d+ha/ /b+h+ruM las ye shes gzhal yas khang/ /ye shes rin po che rang bzhin/ /rgya rnams yongs su ma chad pa/ /bsod nams ye shes tshogs rgyas pas/ /kun tu gru bzhir gnas par 'gyur/
396a6(rgyud 'grel): lhag pa'i ye shes glo 'bur mdzes/ /thams cad ngo bo gcig pa'i phyir/ /rtse mo kun tu 'dus pa yin/ /ye shes sna tshogs las grub pa'i/ /rin chen la sogs bye brag gi /bsam mi khyab pas spras par 'gyur/ /rnam par
396a7(rgyud 'grel): thar pa'i sgo khyud la/ /rnam thar brgyad kyi rta babs ldan/ /kun nas skor ba'i kha khyer la/ /rol mo sna tshogs sprin dpung bzhin/ /phyi dang nang med kun tu nang/ /'khor lo rtsibs bzhi mu khyud bcas/ /gru chad bzhis brgyan par 'khyams
396b1(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu gnyis kyis brgyan/ /dbus su mi 'jigs seng ge'i khri/ /brgya byin gyi phyogs glang po'i gdan/ /rdzu 'phrul rta ni gshin rje'i phyogs/ /dbang gi rma bya chu lha ste/ /thogs med mkha' lding gnod sbyin phyogs/ /rang bzhin 'od
396b2(rgyud 'grel): gsal nyi zla dang/ /chags med pad+ma so sor mdzes/ /gzhan yang nyi zla pad+ma dang/ /gdan ni sum brtsegs dag tu gnas/ /seng ge'i gdan gyi dbus su ni/ /dam pa'i yi ge sa bon bsam/ /de nas padmo rdo rje brtag /so so'i snying pos mtshan par bya/ /de la/
396b3(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas sku ni spro/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jigs rten khams rnams su/ /sems can don ni mdzad nas su/ /phyag mtshan yongs su gyur pa las/ /kun bzangs yum dang ldan pa ni/ /zla ba'i 'od ltar dkar zhing sdang/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis brgyan
396b4(rgyud 'grel): gyis mdzes/ /sangs rgyas lnga yi dbu rgyan can/ /'od zer sna tshogs 'phros pa las/ /sprul pas sems sna don rnams mdzad/ /kun tu bzang mo 'jo sgeg tshul/ /in+d+ra nI la'i kha dog 'dra/ /rgyan dang dbu rgyan yab dang mthun/ /phyag g.yas rdo rje thugs
396b5(rgyud 'grel): kar bstan/ /g.yon pa dril 'dzin yum la 'khril/ /dbu ni 'jo zhing 'dud pa'i tshul/ /de nas yongs su skyong nas ni/ /gnyis med chags pa sbyor ba'i sgras/ /de bzhin gshegs pas kun bsdus nas/ /yab la de bzhin gshegs rnams thim/ /
396b6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje lam nas byung nas ni/ /yum gyi pad+ma'i mkha' dkyil du/ /byang chub sems kyi 'phro 'du las/ /ye shes dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa yi/ /de nas rjes su chags pa yis/ /sems can ma lus bsdus nas su/ /dkyil 'khor phyi rol 'khod nas ni
396b7(rgyud 'grel): de dag 'jug par gsol ba 'debs/ /gsol ba brjod pa'i tshig gsan nas/ /thams cad dkyil 'khor 'jug par 'gyur/ /bdud rtsi 'od kyis reg ma thag /thams cad rang nyid sangs rgyas shes/ /de ltar rgyal pa'i byin brlabs kyis/ /rang lus
397a1(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas shes nas ni/ /ngo mtshar tshig kyang brjod par byed/ /e ma rdo rje phung po yan lag ni/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lnga ru grags/ /skye mched khams rnams mang po kun/ /byang chub sems dpa' i dkyil 'khor nyid
397a2(rgyud 'grel): sa chu spyan dang mA ma ki/ me rlung gos ni sgrol ma ste/ /nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma/ /srid gsum ye nas sangs rgyas zhing/ /thams cad ma lus chos so cog /sangs rgyas nyid las gzhan ma yin/ /sangs rgyas nyid la gzhan pa'i chos/ /
397a3(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas nyid kyis mi mnyes so/ /de ltar ngo mtshar tshig brjod nas/ /de nas yid bstan bya ba'i phyir/ /gnyis med kun tu bzang po yis/ /ched du brjod pa 'di dag brjod/ /e ma phyogs bcu stong khams ye nas dpen/ /srid pa gsum
397a4(rgyud 'grel): nyid dag pa'i zhing/ /snyigs ma lnga nyid bde ldan gnas/ /phung po lnga nyid mngon sangs rgyas/ /thams cad mchog gi snying po bas/ /gzhan du rgyal bas chos mi btsal/ /nyid la'ang gzhan zhes bya ba'i chos/ /btsal? kyang rgyal bas
397a5(rgyud 'grel): mi mnyes so/ /de nas rgyal ba sangs rgyas rnams/ /so so'i zhing du 'khod par byas/ /yongs sbyangs gsung gi yig 'bru ni/ /yab kyi thugs kar thim gyur nas/ /yum gyi pad ma'i chags blan gyis/ /yab yum gnyis med dkyil 'khor
397a6(rgyud 'grel): thim/ /de ltar rgyal ba snyoms zhugs nas/ /bde ba'i 'bru tshogs mngon dran te/ /rgyu cig pa dang yig 'bru'i tshul/ /byin gyis brlabs dang mngon sum pa/ /rab tu gtogs pa rnam bzhi yis/ /thams cad mngon rdzogs rgyal
397a7(rgyud 'grel): por nges/ /de ltar rtogs pa rnam bzhi yis/ /rgyal ba'i sku ni mngon bskyed pa/ /in+d+ra nI la'i kha rog 'dra/ /sku gsung thugs kyi dbu gsum ldan/ /ye shes drug gi phyag nyid la/ /rdo rje pad+ma ral gri ni/ /g.yas kyi phyag na
397b1(rgyud 'grel): bsnams par mdzad/ /dril bu 'khor lo rin chen 'bar/ /g.yon gyi ye shes phyag na bsnams/ /g.yas pa'i rdo rje'i thugs kar bstan/ /g.yon pa dril bus yum la khyud/ /thabs dang shes rab zhabs gnyis ni/ /mnyam pa'i brtul zhugs skyil krung
397b2(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs/ /mdun dang rgyab med kun tu zhal/ /mtshan dang dpe byad kun gyis sbras/ /'od zer 'phro ba'i tshogs chen las/ /thub pa'i dkyil 'khor sna tshogs 'phro/ /rgyal ba'i rigs lngas dbu rgyan bcings/ /sna tshogs rgyan rnams kun gyis
397b3(rgyud 'grel): brgyan/ /btsun mo snang ba'i dbyings phyug ma/ /gzhon tshul 'khril ldem shin tu chags/ /cha lugs la sogs yab dang mthun/ /g.yon pa dril bu thugs kar bstan/ /g.yas pa nyi ma las la 'khril/ /phung po dbang po rnams shes kun/ /
397b4(rgyud 'grel): rnam smin oM du shes par bya/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid du bsgom/ /spyi bor yi ge oM bkod de/ /lce la a ni rab tu gnas/ /snying ga ste ba chu sor na/ /hUM dang swA hA rim bzhin dgod/ /mig dang rna ba sna dang lcer/ /k+Shi traM traM?  dzaM rim bzhin bas
397b5(rgyud 'grel): me thIM? hUM ? dang bzhi/ /mig sogs phyi rol rim bzhin bsam/ /de ltar yi ge rnams la ni/ /rgyal pa'i sku'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs/ /ye shes sems dpa' i thugs ka nas/ /'od zer rnam pa mang po 'phros/ /phyogs bcu'i sku gsung thugs
397b6(rgyud 'grel): bsdus nas/ /bdag gi mdun du bzhugs pa la/ /tshig bshad pa'i yis gsol ba gdab/ /oM ye shes rgyal po'i sku gsung thugs/ /yon can 'phrin las smad po che/ /de nyid du ni mnyam sbyor pa'i/ /phyag rgya chen por bdag sbyor
397b7(rgyud 'grel): cig go?/ bdag gi sku gsung thugs su la ni/ /rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor zhugs par gyur/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA kA ya badzra swa b+hA ba ang mi ko haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta mahA bA ga badzra swa b+hA phra?/ ang? ma ko haM/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta mahA
398a1(rgyud 'grel): tsit+ta badzra swa b+hA ba adma ko haM/ /de ltar sku gsung thugs gsum du/ /nga rgyal dbang du skyes nas ni/ /yum gyi sku'i dkyil 'khor dgod/ /gzugs sgra dri ro reg la sogs/ /rnam smin muM du shes par bya buM kyi dkyil 'khor nyid du bsgom
398a2(rgyud 'grel): sbyi bo mgrin pa gnyis su ni/ /laM dang maM ni rim bzhin bsam/ /snying ga lte ba chu sor ni/ /muM dang pyaM dang taM rnams dgod/ /mig dang rna ba sna lce la/ /hUM traM h+raM a rim pa bzhin/ /mig rna sna lce'i phyi rol tu/ /dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): rim bzhin sgom/ /sku gsung
398a3(rgyud 'grel): byin brlabs yab ji bzhin/ /de nas yum ni byin brlabs bya/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM swAhA lnga/ /gnas lnga dag tu bsgom par bya/ /de ltar yab yum sku rdzogs nas/ /dkyil 'khor chen bo rnam sprul phyir/ /gnyis med chags pa'i sbyor don du/ /
398a4(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje pad+ma byin gyis brlab/ /hUM las rdo rje rab tu shes/ /oM las 'byung ba'i nor bu bsam/ /a las pad+ma skyed par bya/ /oM na ma sarba ta thA ga ta a nu rA ga badzra swa b+hA ba adma kohaM/ bsnyen pa dang ni nye bsnyen pa/ /bsgrub pa dang ni bsgrub
398a5(rgyud 'grel): chen po/ /yum gyi pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor du/ /bde ba thugs kyi dkyil 'khor spro/ /byang chub sems kyi byin brlabs las/ /tha sogs yi ge sprul par 'gyur/ /sa bon mtshan mas sku rnams rdzogs/ /sum cu drug gi dkyil 'khor du/
398a6(rgyud 'grel): de nas 'gro ba rmongs pa la/ /bstan phyir dkyil 'khor gdon par mdzad/ /badzra d+h+ring?/ /muM d+ha du shwa ri/ /mi bskyod yab yum ston nas ni/ /bdag nyid la ni thim par 'gyur/ /oM dzi na dzi ka /swa rad na d+hika /oM a ro lig /ha prad nya d+haM ga?
398a7(rgyud 'grel): la b+he sha ra ti/ mi mo ha ra ti/ spaM ra ga ra taM/ taM badzra ra ti/ k+Shi hi ra tsa ya/ traM a ka ra pa ya/ h+ri pad+ma da ma/ dzi ku ru pa na h+ri/ hUM la se sa ma ya twaM/ traM ma le sa ma ya ho/ /h+raM gi ra ti ra ho hi/ a nir ti ra ga ya mi/ /me dar ni swAhA
398b1(rgyud 'grel): thliM? swa raM pa ya swAhA/ hUM swa ra tsa ya swAhA/ muM sh+ri aM ra ga ya swAhA/ dza du ba pra be sha ya/ hUM pus pa a be sha ya/ baM di ba su ki ni/ ho gande tsi ta he/ /hUM ya mAn+ta krid phaT/ hUM big+hA nAn+ta krid phaT/ hUM padmAn+ta krid phaT/ hUM pradz+nyan+ta krid phaT/ oM badzra d+ha ra
398b2(rgyud 'grel): mahA kro ti shwa ri dzwa la ni hUM phaT/ oM ratna d+ha ra mahA kro ti shwa ri dzwa la ni/ hUM phaT/ oM pad+ma da ra ma hA kro ti shwa ri dzwa la ni hUM phaT/ oM karma d+ha ra mahA kro ti shwa ri dzwa la ni hUM phaT/ hUM hUM hUM badzra tsi ta oM/ /a a a badzra pa tra sa ya a/ so so'i sngags
398b3(rgyud 'grel): kyis ston nas ni/ /brgya byin la sogs phyogs su gnas/ /mthing ga dkar po ser leb rgan/ /lhang gu'i mdog tu tshor ba yi/ /gtso bo gdan la rdzogs pa'i tshul/ /'khor rnams sems dpa' i tshul du bzhugs/ /so so'i sku mdog yab dang
398b4(rgyud 'grel): 'thun/ /'khor lo rgyal po rgyal mo dang/ /g.yas nas mthong thos snom pa dang/ myong dang btsun mo'i tshogs su bcas/ /gru chad la ni mthong byed dang/ /thos byed myong byed snom byed rnams/ /btsun mo yi ni tshogs dang bcas/ /mdun dang
398b5(rgyud 'grel): rgyab tu byed pa dang/ /bya ba dag ni gnas par bstan/ /sgom khyung bzhi la 'joms pa ni/ /btsun mo'i tshogs dang ldan par gnas/ /yab yum bzhugs tshul phyag mtshan ni/ /'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan/ /hUM sgreng rtse mor rdo rje 'bar/ /
398b6(rgyud 'grel): zla gdul 'bru sbas dril bsil zhing/ /'khril pa'i tshul gyis chos la bstan/ /'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan/ /muM sgreng rtse mo dril bsil 'bar/ /nyi ma 'bru lnga las su 'khril/ /btung de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis lta/ /'bru bzhi spas nas thugs
398b7(rgyud 'grel): kar? bkan/ /oM sgreng rtse mor 'khor lo 'bar/ /zla btul 'bru sbas dril bsil zhing/ /'khril pa'i tshul gyis chos la bstan/ /'bru bzhi sbas nas thubs kar bkan/ /lam bsgreng rtse mo'i dril bsil 'bar/ /nyi ma 'bru lnga las su 'khril/ /btud de
399a1(rgyud 'grel): 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis blta/ /'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan/ /sa rtse 'bar ba rin po che/ /zla btul 'bru sbas dril? bsil zhing/ /'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos la bstan/ /'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan/ /maM sgring rtse mo dril bsil 'bar/ /nyi
399a2(rgyud 'grel): ma 'bru lnga las su 'khril/ /btud? de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis lta/ /'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan/ /oM sgreng rtse mo padmo 'bar/ /zla btul 'bru sbas dril bsil zhing/ /'khril pa'i tshul gis chos la bstan/ /'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan/ /sbaM sgreng rtse mo dri ? ?
399a3(rgyud 'grel): 'bar/ /nyi ma 'bru lnga las su 'khril/ /btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis blta/ /'bru bzhi sbas nas thug skar bkan/ /haM sgred rtse mo ral gri 'bar/ /bzla btul 'bru sbas dril bsil zhing/ /'khril pa'i tshul gyis chos la bstan/ /'bru bzhi sgras nas thug skar
399a4(rgyud 'grel): bkan/ /ti sgreng rtse mo dril bsil 'bar/ /nyi ma 'bru lnga las su 'khril/ /btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis blta/ /ud+pal klu shing la sogs mtshan/ /mdzes tshul mnyes pa'i yo byad 'dzin/ /las la 'khril zhing chos la bstan/ /dbu rnams 'byo
399a5(rgyud 'grel): zhing 'dud pa'i tshul/ /gong gi phyag rgya chen po bzhin/ /gnyis med dbyings kyi dang du 'khril/ /bya byed khro bo'i phyag rgya ni/ /rgyud las gsungs pa bzhin du brtag/ mnyen lcug 'khril ldem gzhon tshul can/ /gsal 'tsher lhun sdug gzi brjid ldan/ /'od zer
399a6(rgyud 'grel): 'phro ba'i tshogs chen po/ /'bar ba'i 'phreng ba 'khrigs pa ste/ /mdza' dbus med par khyab pa yi/ /'od zer 'phro ba'i tshogs chen po/ /dkyil 'khor bsam yas lhun grub gnas/ /dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs pa la/ /rgyal ba yongs su mnyes par
399a7(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur/ /mnyes nas sems can don bya zhes/ /dkyil 'khor dam pa bstan gyur kyang/ /sems can ma rig gis bsgribs pas/ /dkyil 'khor mthong ba'i skal med 'gyur/ /rgyal mchog thugs rje skyes nas ni/ /de nas gnyis med sbyor bar 'gyur/ /
399b1(rgyud 'grel): de nas byang chub sems 'phros bas/ /i sogs yi ge mngon par byung/ /sa bon las ni phyag mtshan 'bar/ /de las thub ba'i sku rdzogs te/ so so'i snying po brjod pas 'dzin/ /mkha' dbyings sku gsung thugs gnas nas/ /'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcur
399b2(rgyud 'grel): spros/ /oM mu ni kri swAhA/ /oM mu ni hUM druM swAhA/ /oM mu ne sruM swAhA/ oM mu ne braM swAhA/ oM mu ne k+ShaM swAhA/ /oM mu ne ye swAhA/ /'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcur ni/ /'dul pa bzhi yis 'gro don mdzad/ /ltam dang rab tu byung sogs dang/ /mngon par sangs rgyas
399b3(rgyud 'grel): bdud 'dul dag /'khor lo bskor dang cho 'phrul ston/ /mya ngan 'das sogs thub pa yis/ /sbyod pa rjes mthun ston par mdzad/ /mngon shes drug po'i cho 'phrul gyis/ /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du ston/ /sku dang gsung dang thugs rnams kyis/ /bye brag sna tshogs ston
399b4(rgyud 'grel): par mdzad/ /'gro ba yongs su 'dul ba bzhin/ /byin brlabs 'dul ba ston par mdzad/ /so so'i bsam pa'i bye brag gis/ /lha dang mi'i theg sogs pas/ /theg pa lnga rnams so sor ston/ /rjes su bstan nas 'gro btul te/ /'gro la sangs rgyas sar bzhag nas/ /
399b5(rgyud 'grel): slar byon bar 'khyams thub drug bkod/ /de ltar dkyil 'khor rnams spros la/ /khyab par kun tu bltas nas ni/ /sgya ma bzhin du dmigs nas kyang/ /so so'i yab yum bye brag la/ /lus kyi dkyil 'khor rdzogs par dgod/ /sku gsung thugs ni byin
399b6(rgyud 'grel): gyis brlabs/ /gtso bo yab yum bzhin du bya/ /ye shes yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir/ /rigs lnga'i dbu brgyan kun la bsam/ /thub drug lus kyi dkyil 'khor dang/ /byin brlabs dbu brgyan ma gsungs so/ /thugs kyi sa bon 'od zer gyis/ /phyogs bcu'i
399b7(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor sbyan drang ste/ /phyogs dus dkyil 'khor bdag nyid che/ /mi dmigs thugs kyi dkyil 'khor la/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad spyan drang ngo/ /oM a ha hi b+ha ga bA na/ /mahA ka ru ni kra tri sha ho/ /sa ma ya hi/ dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): rang gi mdun du
400a1(rgyud 'grel): mngon par bsam/ /zhabs bkru la sogs byas ni/ /oM dang muM gnyis rtse sprad de/ /'bru brgyan rnol te rtse ba sbyar ba/ /rgyal ba kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /bde ba chen po sbyin pa'i rgya/ /de nas tshig 'dis gsol ba gdab/ /oM ye shes rgyal
400a2(rgyud 'grel): po sku gsung thugs/ /yon tan 'phrin las smad po che/ /de nyid du ni bdag sbyor bas/ /phyag rgya chen por bdag sbyor cig /oM badzra sa ma ya hUM/ oM badzra sa ma ya hoM/ /oM badzra sa ma ya ho(rgyud 'grel): dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): rang snang dbyer med dkyil 'khor la/ /'jug pa'i
400a3(rgyud 'grel): mtshan nyid mnyams 'byor bas/ /phyogs dus kun nas gshegs pa yi/ /bsnyen pa'i dkyil 'khor rab tu rdzogs/ /nye bar gyur pa'i dam tshig mchog /de ltar ye shes dkyil 'khor dang/ /dam tshig dkyil 'khor mnyam sbyar bya/ /dkyil 'khor
400a4(rgyud 'grel): kun la mnyam ltas nas/ /sgyu ma mig yor lta bur bsam/ /de nas lha rnams mchod pa'i phyir/ /chos kyi dbyings dang mnyams spyor zhing/ /mchod pa'i phyag rgya chen por bsgom/ /bdag gi snying po'i sa bon las/ /'od zer mang po'i zer
400a5(rgyud 'grel): 'phros te/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /mchod pa'i tshogs rnams kun bsdus te/ /bdag nyid kyi ni thugs kar thim/ /rdo rje'i lam nas byung nas ni/ /byang chub sems nyid mkha' dbyings nas/ /byang chub sems kyi 'od zer pas
400a6(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa'i lha mo'i tshogs spros te/ /rgyal mchog dkyil 'khor mchod par byed/ /de nas lha mo'i tshogs rnams kyis/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor la/ /dgyes pa'i glu 'di blangs par bsam/ /oM phyogs bcu dus bzhi rdzogs
400a7(rgyud 'grel): pa yi/ /ye shes dkyil 'khor thig li che/ /bsod nams dkyil 'khor sku yi tshogs/ /sna bstod? thig le kun tu rdzogs ho/ /oM rdo rje bsod nams thig le che/ /rdo rje ye shes dkyil 'khor ldan/ /rdo rje sgra chen mdza' yas pa/ /rdo rje
400b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyal po thig le che ho/ /oM sku gsung thugs kyi rdzogs pa che/ /yon tan 'phrin las kun tu rdzogs/ /ye nas lhun rdzogs kun tu bzang/ /'dus pa'i tshogs chen thig le che/ /oM mi dmigs rgyu 'phral mnyam pa'i dbyings/ /mdza' yas can? nas sna tshogs
400b2(rgyud 'grel): 'phrod /mdza' yas kun nas lhun gyis thim/ /sna tshogs sku gsung thugs chen po/ /ho/ /oM phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten rdul snyed du/ /rgyal ba'i don rnams rdul phran snyed/ /sprul pa rdul phran bsam yas kyis/ /skad cig yud tsam lhun gyis 'grub
400b3(rgyud 'grel): ho/ /oM thams cad ma lus thams cad sku gsung thugs/ /sku gsung thugs kyi bdag nyid che/ /sku gsung thugs kyis kun tu khyab/ /sku gsung thugs kyi thig le chen ho/ /de ltar rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ni/ /skyed pa yongs su rdzogs byas te/
400b4(rgyud 'grel): slar yang bdag gi thugs kar bsdu/ /de nas gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom/ /bde ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor ni/ /gtang sbyar gnyis sam yang na lnga/ /byas te dad pa ldan bzhugs nas/ /'dod pa yid 'ong mnyam par 'gyur/ /cho ga lnga ni ? ?
400b5(rgyud 'grel): byas shing/ /yo byad lnga ni rdzogs par ldan/ /sngags kyi yan lag lnga rdzogs pas/ /ma nyams 'jug la rab brtson na/ /zhag ni sum cu phrag drug gam/ /bcu gnyis bcu bzhi bcu drug gis/ /dbang sgyur rigs kyi dam pa 'grub/ /da? tsha?
400b6(rgyud 'grel): bcu drug tshun chad kyis/ /sku lnga lhun gyis rdzogs pa ni/ /ye shes thig le de nyid la/ /ye shes thig le nyid snang bas/ /bsam gyis mi khyab mdza' yas mchog /phyogs bcu dus bzhi rdzogs pa yi/ /zhing khams rnam dag gzhal yas
400b7(rgyud 'grel): dang? ? rgya dang bral ba'i gzhal yas khang/ /'khor lo'i gdan dang rol mo'i tshogs/ /dkyil 'khor ma lus bsam yas kun/ /mthong nas nye bar bsnyen pa dang/ /rgya chan gsung las don 'byung ba/ /mthun pa'i ye shes rang snang pa'o/ /gcig
401a1(rgyud 'grel): dang du ma bral ba yi/ /mdza' dang dbus med de bzhin nyid/ /sangs rgyas kyis kyang mi gzigs te/ /rang byung ye shes gnas med snang/ /log par rtogs rtags rnam dag cing/ /ye shes dbyings las mi zhan phyir/ /thugs rje chen
401a2(rgyud 'grel): pos 'brel bas na/ /'gro drug dus gnas ma lus snang/ /de ltar rgyal mchog dpal ldan pa'i/ /dkyil 'khor gsang ba sgrub ba'i phyir/ /dkyil 'khor ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis/ /dkyil 'khor la ni dkyil 'khor bsgom/ /dkyil 'khor
401a3(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor las byung ba/ /thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor mchog /gsang ba'i thig le dkyil 'khor dbyings/ /'byung ba shes rab rigs kyi yum/ /chen po rigs kyi de bzhin te/ /byang chub sems ni rdo rje'i cho gas/ /dbang po
401a4(rgyud 'grel): yul du rig pa rnams/ /kun tu bzang po'i dkyil 'khor la/ /bdag nyid chen po lhag pa yi/ /thugs kyi ye shes lngas ltar shing/ /snying po'i thig le mnyam sbyor bas/ /bde ba'i ye shes rol mo yi/ /ye shes dgyes la mchod par
401a5(rgyud 'grel): 'bul/ /zag pa med pa'i bsod nams kyis/ /ye shes sgyu ma rang snang ba/ /rol mo'i dkyil 'khor mdza' yas mchog /gsang ba'i thig le nyid kyi dbyings/ /de ni sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos/ /phyogs bcu dus bzhi mngon rdzogs
401a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i/ /sku gsung yon tan 'phrin las thugs/ /ma lus bdag nyid zhal mthong ba/ /dbang bsgyur mchog nyid dam pa yin/ /dkyil 'khor la gnas dkyil 'khor nyid/ /rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor lhun gyis grub/ /rgyan du dkyil 'khor
401a7(rgyud 'grel): ma lus thogs/ /rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor mnyam sbyor bas/ /thugs rje'i dkyil 'khor yongs kyis 'byung/ /phyogs dus dkyil 'khor 'dul ba'i mgon/ /sgyu ma'i dkyil 'khor sgrol ba'i phyir/ /bya byed med pa'i dkyil 'khor
401b1(rgyud 'grel): sbyod/ /ye shes rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor la/ /thos bsam sgom pa'i mnyam sbyor gyis/ /rang byung sku lnga lhun gyis grub/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /'da' bar mi mdzad dam tshig mchog /gang zhig 'di las mos gyur pa/ /sangs rgyas
401b2(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor thams cad kyis/ /phyogs dus kun nas thams cad du/ /dkyil 'khor ma lus bsnyen pa yi/ /nye ba'i sras su dgongs par 'gyur/ /gsang ba'i ye shes bsgom pa'i gnas/ /mkha' dkyil dang ba'i dbyings nyi zla/ /ye shes rgyal
401b3(rgyud 'grel): po yab yum bsgom/ /gang zhig glang chen myos 'dra'i sems/ /mnyam par bzhag pas btul nas su/ /sngags dang phyag rgya rab bstan pa/ /dngos grub ya mtshan chen por 'gyur/ /ting nge 'dzin las langs nas su/ /spyod lam rnam pa gnas
401b4(rgyud 'grel): nas kyang/ /snang ba'i dngos po so sor snang/ /lha'i dkyil 'khor nyid du lta/ /yang dag sgyu ma la sogs tshul/ /zas la sogs pa bza' ba ni/ /rgyal ba'i byin brlabs mngon bsdus nas/ /bdud rtsi lngar ni byin brlabs te/ /lce'i dbang
401b5(rgyud 'grel): po rab sbyangs nas/ /ye shes dkyil 'khor thugs kar ni/ /rgyal ba'i tshogs rnams tshim par bya/ /dam tshig nyams pa tshul bzhin bshags/ /yang na rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi/ /byin brlabs kyis ni rnam par sbyangs/ /sems can thams cad
401b6(rgyud 'grel): mthong ba na/ /snying rje byams pa'i sems bskyod de/ /sangs rgyas nyid du bya'o zhes/ /smon pa'i sems ni khyad par can/ /blo can gyis ni rtag tu bya/ /de ltar dus bzhi'i nyin mtshan du/ /rnal 'byor tshul la gnas pa yin/ /bdag gis mi shes rmongs
401b7(rgyud 'grel): pa gsal don tu/ /sgyu 'phrul gsang don sgrub thabs 'di byas te/ /bdag blo chung bas nor dang 'khrul mchis pa/ /'phags dang mkhas pa rnams la bzod par gsol/ /'di las bdag gis dge ba gang thob pa/ /'gro ba blo zhan rnams kyis chos
402a1(rgyud 'grel): kun ni/ /stong nyid sgyu ma lta bur rab rtogs nas/ /ye shes gnyis med sku gsum thob bar shog/ //sgyu 'phrul dra ba me long lta bu'i sgrub thabs/ /slob dpon chen po dza na dza yas mdzad ba'o/
402a2(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs so// //*/ /rgya gar skad du/ satwa badzra ma ya dzwa kra ma pra ba nA ma/ bod skad du/ rdo rje sems dpa' sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i 'od kyi rim pa zhes bya ba/ /dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal
402a3(rgyud 'grel): sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyud dag gis/ /mthar phyin lha'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /bsgom thabs rim pa mdo tsam zhig /legs par btus te bstan par bya'o/ /ma rtogs pa dang log par rtogs/ /phyogs rtogs yang dag nyid ma rtogs/ /'dul
402a4(rgyud 'grel): ba dgongs pa gsang ba dang/ /rang bzhin gsang ba'i don rnams ni/ /yi ge sgras brtags mi tshogs la/ /brten pa'i tshig gis rab mtshon la/ /khong nas gab sbas don 'byin pa/ /ston ba rdo rje thugs gnas phyir/ /mnyes pa'i thabs
402a5(rgyud 'grel): kyis zin par bya/ /thos bsam bsgom la rab sbyangs pa'i/ /shes rab mig ldan rnams kyis bzung/ /snod ldan ngang? tshul bzang la bstan/ /lus dang longs spyod gtod la sbyin/ /gang la gsang chen 'di yod par/ /me mar mur gyi dong
402a6(rgyud 'grel): dpogs shing/ /sdu gri'i so dag gtams pa la/ /'dzogs pa bu dag 'gro bar gyis/ /khod na gnas pa'i yang khod du/ /lcags kyi sgrom bu kha bsdam mo/ /slob dpon ngas par mnyes byas shing/ /sgyu 'phrul ri mo'i dkyil 'khor du/ /dbang rnams
402a7(rgyud 'grel): thob par byas pa dang/ /ston pa mchod brtson rtogs pa gsal/ /dam tshig sngags dang phyag rgya rnams/ /ma nyams shes shing yo byad ldan/ /sngags dang cho ga yan lag kun/ /tshad zhing lam la goms 'dod pas/ /khe grags 'dod g.yeng
402b1(rgyud 'grel): kun spangs te/ /dka' thub gdung bas mnyes par/ /gnas dang longs spyod ci bde dang/ /ma nyams blo ldan tshogs par bsgrub/ /ri bo dben pa'i gnas mchog ni/ /me tog shing dang bkra shis bya/ /snyan pa'i sgra ldan bar chad med/ /chu bo nung nas shar
402b2(rgyud 'grel): 'bab cing/ /bar snang mtshams sam dgra ni nyung/ /rnal 'byor sbyod la dogs med pa/ /yo byad btsal sla mchog yin te/ /yon tan bzlog pa spang bar bya/ /bsam spyod mthun pa'i sa phyogs der/ /sa'i bya ba rgyas byas la/ /stong byed mgon rnam

403a1(rgyud 'grel): bzhin 'dug /rang gi snying gi sa bon zad/ /'phos pas bde gshegs mdun grangs 'bul/ /bla ma kun gyi yab phyir bsam/ /phyi bsogs nang gi lha mos mchod/ /phyag 'tshal mchod bstod bshags ba dang/ /yi
403a2(rgyud 'grel): rang skyabs gsol sems bskyed bsngo/ /mos pa'i dkyil 'khor mchod zin nas/ /sems phyir bdag la bsdus par bsam/ /bar chad bgegs rnams bsal ba'i phyir/ /stong chen gsal ba'i rig pa nyid/ /skad cig sa bon rang gi lhar//
403a3(rgyud 'grel): gsal bas hUM skul 'phro 'du las/ /zhe sdang rdo rje gsal ba yi/ /thugs kyi sa bon 'od zer las/ /mtshon cha rim spros bar chad bskrad/ /slar 'dus rim bzhin steng 'og gur/ /dzwa la raM gyi me dpung 'bar/ /ji tsam lcogs par mtshams

403a7(rgyud 'grel): dngos po dngos med pa'o/ /oM ma ha shu n+ya ta dz+nyA na badzra swa b+ha ba adma ko haM/ /de las snying rje chags pas bskul/ /lus dang ngag sems chos thams cad/ /gang na 'ang ni mi dmigs pa/ mig yor tshul du sbyor ba yi/ /nam mkha' la ni nam mkha' bsgom//

403b5(rgyud 'grel): bzhir ldan lta babs brgyad/ /sti gnas lam gyi bgrod phyir ro/ /'bras bu yon tan brgyad rdzogs phyir/ /rta rkang chu skyes rin chen sgrom/ /snam 'phyo bzhi las drar tshags/ /rin chen sgril 'chang shar bu khyud/ /rims bzhin dbyibs mdog mdzes par

404a1(rgyud 'grel): g.yas g.yon ljon shing dang/ /dpag bsam shing zung rtsong rtsong 'phel/ /dril bu g.yer ga theg sgrogs pa/ /bkra shis bya snyan sgra sgrogs ldan/ /yid bzhin rin chen brgyan bskor bas/ /rin chen phung po bzhi gnyis ldan//

404a7(rgyud 'grel): 'bar bar 'gyur/ /yongs gyur 'phra mo kun phro 'dus/ /phyag rgya chen po rdzogs par bskyed/ /tha snyad bdag phyir bdag las skyed/ /bde gshegs rigs las shar ba'i phyir/ /rgyal ba bdag gi sras gyur te/ /sgyu'i 'khor lo bskyed pa'o/ /

405b4(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ oM badzra kro ta mahA ba la hUM phaT/ kro ti sho ri tsan ta mu ne hUM/ /de ltar dkyil 'khor gsal ston pas/ /so so'i gnas su rgyas par 'god/ /gdan la rdzogs dang sems dpa' i tshul/ /'joms dang thub pas brgyad skum bzhengs//

405b6(rgyud 'grel): lho nub byang chub yi dags byol/ /byang dang byang shar lha min dmyal/ /mdun rgyab bya byed yab yum gtso/ /sgo khyud bsrung ba khro bo bzhi/ /bskal pa'i me la khro zung bcu/ /phyogs mtshams srung ba'i tshul du gnas/ /de kun byin
405b7(rgyud 'grel): dbang? nus ldan pas/ /'gro don bya phyir tshul bzhin bsam mo/ /oM mahA shu n+ya tA d+he? na badzra swa b+hA ba adma ko haM/ oM ma ha a ta ri sha dz+nyA na badzra swA b+hA ba adma ko haM/ oM mahA sa man+ta dz+nya na badzra swA b+hA ba adma ko haM/ oM ma hA dwa ta
406a1(rgyud 'grel): bra be sha dz+nya na badzra swa b+hA ba adma ko haM/ mahA kri ta a nu ta na dz+nyA badzra swa b+hA ba adma ko haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA kA ya badzra swA b+hA ba adma ko haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta mahA bA ga badzra swa b+hA ba adma ko haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta mahA tsi ta badzra
406a2(rgyud 'grel): swa b+hA ba adma ko haM/ dkyil 'khor dbang bskur thim par 'gyur/ /byin brlabs rab tu gsal bar 'gyur/ /rin chen smug po gnas cig tu/ /mtshon gang sems dpa' 'od ldan pa/ /thugs kyi sa bon brlabs pas bskor/ /kun gyi
406a3(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid dkyil du bsam/ /thub drug sprul pa rang byung phyir/ /byin brlabs dbu brgyan ma gsungs so/ /mthing kha dkar po ser le brgan/ /ljang gu kha dog gsal 'tsher 'bar/ /sems dpa' rnams ni rigs kyi tshul/ /gser dang
406a4(rgyud 'grel): dkar mthing ser nag dang/ /dmar nag dung ka thub pa'i sku/ /sngo ser dmar ljang sgo bsrungs sku/ /khros pas bsrung phyir rtsa gnag pa'o/ /mthing ga hUM chen rnam rgyal dkar/ /dbyug pa sngo la gshed mthing gnag /mi g.yo ljang sngo
406a5(rgyud 'grel): rta mgrin dmar/ /'dod rgyal dud ka bdud rtsi ljang/ /khams gsum dkar ljang stobs chen dung/ /kho bo rnams ni khro dang mthur/ /kun kyang dur khrod chas ldan par/ /me dpung 'phros 'dus ldan pa'o/ /sku'i mtshan nyid dgu ldan ti//
406a6(rgyud 'grel): mnyen lcug 'khril lnga ma gzhon tshul can/ /gsal 'tsher lhun sdug gzi brjid ldan pa'o/ /rdo rje 'khor lo rin po che/ /pad+ma ral gri dril bu 'bar/ /gso gzungs 'phel ba'i phyag rgya ni/ /sor rtser 'chang ba thugs kar bstan//
406a7(rgyud 'grel): ? ? can pad+ma dri/ /rdo rje lcags kyu mda' gzhu brgya/ /rin chen myu gu nyi ma dang/ /rgyal mtshan sor 'phreng 'dzin pa dang/ /pad+ma kha 'byed ral gri dang/ /'khor lo 'dzin dang lce 'dzin pa/ /ral gri rdo rje 'phreng ba dang/ /mche ba
406b1(rgyud 'grel): khu tshur bcangs pa'o/ /me long pog phor lcags kyu 'phred/ /rin chen me tog zhags gsil yab/ /pi pad mar me lcags sgrog gdongs/ /gar 'dzin spos dril rma bya bum/ /gseg gshang par bu pi bang dang/ /go cha mdung thung po ti brtsegs
406b2(rgyud 'grel): rin chen sgrom bu me dang chu/ /kun bzang mnyam bzhag ye shes 'phro/ /yum 'gyur mnyam rdzogs pad mo dkyil/ /yang na rdo rje dril bu nyid/ /lcags kyu zhags pa po ta ho/ /'khor lo nri mgo rdo rje stir/ /zhugs gling dang ni drang srong nyid//
406b3(rgyud 'grel): zhing dbyug gshin rje kaM bzung ba/ /ral gri ba de bral stir dbyug gshog/ /ba dan lce spyang brgyad ber ma thogs/ /rin chen mgo bo gsum gyi dbyug /rdo rje rtse gsum nri 'go dang/ /thod bshol gtun shing g.yas g.yon thogs/ /
406b4(rgyud 'grel): yang na phyag drug sngon par rol/ /khro mo'i g.yas ni gtso la 'khyud/ /g.yon pa rag ta ston pa'o/ /phyogs dus dkyil 'khor bdag nyid che/ /mi dmigs thugs kyi dkyil 'khor las/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad spyan drang ngo/ /rang  
406b5(rgyud 'grel): snang dbyer med dkyil 'khor la/ /'jug pa'i mtshan nyid mnyam sbyor bas/ /phyogs dus kun nas gshegs pa'i/ /bsnyen pa'i dkyil 'khor rab tu rdzogs/ /nye bar gyur pa'i dam tshig mchog /ha hi ba ga bAn/ /mahA ka ru nika tri sha
406b6(rgyud 'grel): h+rI?/ /sa ma ya sto/ dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM paM ho(rgyud 'grel): /oM a hUM swA hA/ /ba ba ba ba ba dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra sa sa sa sa sa ma ma ma ma ma/ ya ya ya ya ya/ oM aM hUM swAhA/ oM ye shes rgyal po sku gsung thugs/ /yon tan 'phrin las rmeng po che/ /de nyid du ni mnyam
406b7(rgyud 'grel): ? ?/ /phyag rgya chen po bdag sbyor cig /oM badzra sa ma ya stwoM/ oM badzra sa ma ya hUM/ oM badzra sa ma ya ho/ /sgo bzhir byin bstim brtan byas la/ /gnyis med phyag 'tshal tshogs phyir mchod/ /mi bskyod nyi ma'i dkyil yi ge/ rin chen
407a1(rgyud 'grel): zla ba'i dkyil yi ge /lnga gnyis zung du spros pa las/ /sbyar ba'i phyag rgya 'byung ba'i rgyu/ /bskyed chen 'khor lo'i gzhal yas su// /tshom bu dkyil 'khor gsal bsgoms na/ /bsgul bskyod thams cad
407a2(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya yin/ /'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar skan/ /hUM sgreng rtse mor rdo rje 'bar/ /zla btul 'bru sbas dril bsil zhing/ /'khril pa'i tshul gyis chos la bstan/ /'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar skan/ /muM sgreng rtse mor dril gsil
407a3(rgyud 'grel): 'bar/ /nyi ma 'bru lnga las su 'khril/ /btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis lta/ /rigs bzhi kun kyang gtso bo bzhin/ /g.yas g.yon mdzub mo oM laM la/ /'khor lo dril bu 'bar bar bsam/ /the 'od gnyis la sba
407a4(rgyud 'grel): maM ste/ /rin chen dril bu rab 'bar ba/ /srin lag g.yas g.yon oM pa ste/ /pad+ma dril bu rtse la 'bar/ /the chung ha tiM ral gyi dril/ /'bru sbas bkan dang bstan 'khril pa'o/ /yang na rtsa skyed sngags kyis so/ /g.yas
407a5(rgyud 'grel): g.yon sor rtser hUM traM trI/ /a sogs zung bzhi nyi zla ste/ /rims pa sams gung mo rtse sprad pa/ /sems dpa' rdo rje yab yum mo/ /mdzub mo rtse sprad rin chen no/ /srin lag rtse sprad chos rdo rje/ /the chung rtse sprad las rdo rje/ /
407a6(rgyud 'grel): the bo mdzub mo rdo rje 'dzin/ /the bo gung mo rgyal ba 'dzin/ /srin lag the bong chags pa che/ /the chung the bong legs pa mchog /g.yas rol hUM dza ho dang swa/ /mdzub mo gnyis sbyar rin chen mchog /gung mo gnyis sbyar
407a7(rgyud 'grel): rin chen don/ /srin lag gnyis sbyar rgyal mtshan te/ /rdo rje gzhad pa the chung sprad/ /taM dang he du sta rims bzhin/ /mdzub mo steng 'og rdo rje chos/ /gung mo steng 'og 'jam dpal mchog /srin lag steng 'og 'khor
407b1(rgyud 'grel): lo mchog/ /the chung steng 'og rdo rje smra/ /h+ri baM traM dang hi bzhi bsam/ /mdzub mo rgya gram rdo rje las/ /gung mo rgya gam rdo rje bsrung/ /srin lag rgya gram gnod sbyin mchog /the chung rgya gram khu tshur ro/ /haM hUM a baM sor rtser bsam/ /dza dang ho la sogs pa'o//
407b2(rgyud 'grel): gar du sgyur bas rdo rje 'chang/ /phyag rgya brda tshig chen po 'dis/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor byed par snang/ /rang bzhin dkyil 'khor phun sum tshogs/ /glu gnyis phyag rgyar ldan pa yis/ /sa ler gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor 'bebs/ /phyag rgya
407b3(rgyud 'grel): spros pa chen po ni/ /gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam gnyis po/ /dag par gsal bas phyag rgya yin/ /yi ge so sor gsal ba yis/ /gar du bsgyur bas mya ngan 'das/ /gseg par pi bang go cha dang/ /po ti sgrom dang me chu rgya/ /ji
407b4(rgyud 'grel): ltar gnas bzhin bca' ba ste/ /lcags kyu zhags pa dril bu sgrog /yi ge gsal bas bzung ba'i tshul/ /khro bcu g.yas g.yon nyid hUM gis/ /gar du sgyur zhing rim bzhin gsal/ /dpal dang zhal gsil gsol mchod bya/ /mnyam
407b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i bsgrub rdzas chen po dag /bdag dang mnyam pa'i tshig la 'bul/ /lha yang rtag tu mchod byas na/ /bdag dang gnyis su med par 'gyur/ /bza' dang bca' dang btung dang bgo /longs spyod lnga ldan thams cad ni/ /dkyil 'khor
407b6(rgyud 'grel): la ni dkyil 'khor thim/ /shes par rab spyad na/ /ngo mtshar 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor mnyes/ /ri rab chen po'i gling bzhi la/ /gnas pa'i sems can ma lus kun/ /bdag nyid chen po rtogs pa yis/ /dbyibs su yang ni sba bar bya'o/ /
407b7(rgyud 'grel): 'khril ba'i mchod chen mnyam sbyor bas/ /bdag nyid mnyes pas mnyes par bya'o/ /srid gsum sems can thams cad la/ /dga' ba chen po khyab par 'gyur/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta a nu ra ga swa b+hA ba adma ko haM/ /thig le 'dres pas phyi
408a1(rgyud 'grel): nang gi /lha mo spros te bdag nyid mchod/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta mahA pu tsa badzra swa b+hA ba adma ko haM/ /mchod pa'i phyag rgya tshan po ni/ /sems kyi yid bzhin sprin tshogs kyis/ /snod dang bcud kyis dngos po kun/ /ji ltar 'dod
408a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sems phyir dbul/ /'bras bu don gyi dgyes bya'i phyir/ /glu'i mchod pa tshul bzhin mchod/ /'phags bstod sems can grol bya'i phyir/ /dung dang zangs dang mud rtsa ra/ /pi bang gling pu ke ko ta/ /pheg rdob rdza lnga pi bang dang/ /dgu
408a3(rgyud 'grel): po rgyud mangs sgra sgrogs sbyar/ /rgyal po 'khor bcas dgongs gsol te/ /tshogs phyir mchod pa rgya mtsho 'bul/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug nyams chags bshags/ /las la don phyir 'phrin las bcol/ /grub pa'i 'dod don gsol ba
408a4(rgyud 'grel): gdab/ /phyi dang nang gi phra mo yis/ /rnal 'byor bsgrub phyir bzlas par bya/ /phyi rol yan lag brgyad ldan pa'i/ /dam tshig ye shes yig gsal bas/ /rnam gsum 'khrul tshul gyis bzlas/ /oM hUM badzra satwa hUM/ badzra pra ban hUM/
408a5(rgyud 'grel): muM badzra gang na/ hUM/ oM badzra tsa tra ma da la oM/ oM badzra ga na da pa sha laM/ swa rad na pra pa ni swaM/ /maM badzra gan d+ha pa sha mi/ /aM pad+ma pra pa na aM/ /paM badzra gan d+ha pra pa na paM/ /haM khang rtig sna pra ba na haM/ /taM badzra ga na da pra pa na pa sha taM/
408a6(rgyud 'grel): yang? na bskyed dang zlas thun mong/ /nang du yab yum zhal sprod/ /dgra bcom med pa'i zlas pa yis/ /dbus kyi rtsa nyid 'phro 'du'i lam/ /zhal nas zhal dang mkha' nas mkhar/ /skor bas drug log bde myong du/ /bsnyen pa grangs dus
408a7(rgyud 'grel): mtshan ma yis/ /thabs kyi mchog tu de gsungs so/ /rims par goms dang nyams ldan pas/ /rdzu skye'i tshul du skad cig gis/ /yongs su rdzogs par skyed byas te/ /de goms grangs med slob byed pas/ /bdag gzhan yas kun
408b1(rgyud 'grel): byed pa'i phyir/ /skabs kyis dang por brjod pa yin/ /de goms rigs 'dzin tshe la sbyor/ /bcu gnyis bcu bzhi bcu drug gis/ /dbang sgyur rigs kyi dam pa 'grub/ /lus dang phung por bcas pa yin/ /tshe la dbang ba'i rigs 'dzin 'grub/ /rig pa 'dzin
408b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i tshe nyid kyis/ bla med kun tu bzang gyur pa/ /lhag ma bcas dang lhag med pa'i/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i tshal nyid kyis/ /'di dang bar mar sbyor ba ste/ /dpir na khyud dang seng ge bzhin/ /rnam smin rgya mdud grol ma thag /bar ma ye shes sgyu ma'i sku/ /
408b3(rgyud 'grel): mngon mtho rig pa'i sa la gnas/ /de tshe bcu drug tshun chad kyi/ /sku lnga lhun gyis rdzogs pa ni/ /ye shes thig le de nyid la/ /ye shes thig le nyid snang ba'i/ /bsam gyis mi khyab mdza' yas mchog /mngon 'gyur chu dang nyi zla bzhin/ /de nas longs
408b4(rgyud 'grel): spyod bde ldan pas/ /tshogs gnyis rdzogs phyir yo byad lngas/ /sna tshogs mchod pa rgyas mchod pa/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug longs spyod de/ /sems phyir hUM gis longs spyod pa 'am/ /ye shes rol ba'i tshul 'chad pa/ /tha mal 'dzin
408b5(rgyud 'grel): grol de la sbyor/ /de phyir 'byor pa nan tan bskyed/ /bdag nyid mkha' 'gro 'dul byed pa/ /dbang phyug rgyal ba rigs lnga yi/ /bsam dang ldan pas lhag ma nyid/ /gzhung bzhin btsal te tshim byas la/ /rjes su mthun pa'i las stsol te/ /rang
408b6(rgyud 'grel): rang gnas su las dgye'o/ /rtag chad mdza' las grol bya'i phyir/ /dkyil 'khor rims bzhin snying la bsdu/ /mi dmigs dang las gtso bor bskyed/ /bskyed pa'i rdzogs par bstan pa'o/ /bar chod rgyun las grol ba'i phyir/ /rgya gram
408b7(rgyud 'grel): go dang khro lus byung/ /de nyid 'gro don nus ldan phyir/ /dbang bskur dbu rgyan cod pan ldan/ /bdag nyid spyod lam 'gro 'dug nyal/ /longs spyod bus bzhir mnyam langs tshe/ /rig phyir thams cad dkyil 'khor ltar/ /gsal byas
409a1(rgyud 'grel): tha snyad zhen las 'das/ /phyag rgya chen po nyid du 'gyur/ /de phyir le lo gnyid sbyangs 'bad/ /de ltar ting 'dzin skyod ldang na/ /rdzogs pa'i bsam pa sbyor bya ste/ /dkyil 'khor ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis/ /dkyil 'khor la ni dkyil
409a2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor bsgom/ /dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor las byung ba/ /thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor mchog /gsang ba'i thig le nyid kyi dbyings/ /'byung ba shes rab rigs kyi yum/ /chen po rigs kyi de bzhin te/ /byang chub sems ni rdo rje'i tshogs/ /
409a3(rgyud 'grel): dbang po'i yul dus rig pa'i rnams/ /kun tu bzang po'i dkyil 'khor la/ /bdag nyid chen po lhag pa'i/ /thugs kyi ye shes lnga lta zhing/ /snying po'i thig le mnyam sbyor bas/ /bde ba'i ye shes rol mo yis/ /ye shes dgyes la mchod pa dbul/ /zag pa
409a4(rgyud 'grel): med pa'i bsod nams kyis/ /ye shes sgyu ma rang snang ba/ /rol mo dkyil 'khor mdza' yas mchog /de la sogs pa'i gdams ngag ni/ /bla ma'i zhal las shes par bya'o/ /de goms 'khor lo'i rims bsdus te/ /ma ha'i sgra la dmigs te 'dug /
409a5(rgyud 'grel): de'i ngang las nang bar dus/ /skad cig lha kun rdzogs bsams te/ /bstod mchod la sogs rgyas par bya/ /rdzogs pa nyid du sbyor ba yis/ /na ta'i sgra yang mi dmigs sbyar/ /stobs 'gyur thams cad ye shes sras/ /skad cig rig la gsal mthong
409a6(rgyud 'grel): pa/ /rdzogs pa'i rdzogs par bshad pa yin/ /bdag nyid nam zhig 'pho ba'i tshe/ /ye shes sku nyid gsal bstan la/ /'pho ba'i sems stobs drag po yis/ /bar ma ye shes gzugs skur sbyor/ /de ltar goms pas snga ma bzhin/ /tshe dang
409a7(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya lhun grub rigs/ /nges thob rdzogs pa'i sar sbyor ba/ /ye shes lha mo rol spyod dang/ /gsang ba'i rdzogs sku byin brlabs kyis/ /skad cig lhun grub sa la 'gro/ /log par rtogs brtags rnam dag cing/ /ye shes dbyings las mi
409b1(rgyud 'grel): zhan phyir/ /thugs rje chen po 'brel pas na/ /'gro drug dus gnas snang ba yang/ /mtho dman kun gyi gzugs snang yang/ /bla med byang chub skur snang ba/ /me long lta bu'i tshul bzhin du/ /sna tshogs kha dog dbyibs su snang/ /lhun grub sku las ma g.yos
409b2(rgyud 'grel): bzhin/ /so so ji ltar 'dul ba bzhin/ /rtog pa rnams la 'khor ba'i lus/ /thar pa'i cha ston rgyal po dang/ /tshangs dang lha chen tha dad snang/ /thar pa rnams la dag ba'i sku/ /nyan thos rnams la dgra bcom lus/ /rang rgyal rnams la bse ru'i
409b3(rgyud 'grel): tshul/ /mos spyod mdo sder shAkya'i tshul/ /byang chub sems la rdzogs longs spyod/ /lhun grub rnams la rdo rje dbyings/ /zhi khro 'dul ba'i tshogs chen la/ /so sor mthun byas kun tu snang/ /dper na me long chu zla bzhin/ /'gro 'ong med la kun tu
409b4(rgyud 'grel): gsal/ /so sor mthun byas kun tu snang/ /dper na me long chu zla bzhin/ /'gro 'ong med las kun du gsal/ /gsal nyid sgyu mas mig yor tshul/ /tshul nyid dbyings las g.yos pa med/ /thar pa skul zhing ngan song sbyor/ /zhi ba phyogs cig shes bya sbyor/ /
409b5(rgyud 'grel): sa bcu mnyam par sbyor byed cing/ /tshogs gnyis yang dag rdzogs byed pa'i/ /rgyal ba'i rgyal ba nyid kyi sku/ /kun tu rin chen lta bu'o/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyud kyi rgya mtsho las/ /gsang bas 'o ma'i tshul bzhin 'od kyis skas/ /rim pa'i bsgrub thabs
409b6(rgyud 'grel): gsal byed yi ge 'di/ /shes chung phyogs shar bdag gis legs par btus/ /'di la nongs 'gal ra chod gyur pa dag /mi dmigs sems kyi dag pa'i klong du gshags/ /de lta'i dge rtsa lam gnas rnal 'byor kun/ /bskyed rims mthar
409b7(rgyud 'grel): phyin yang dag zhen grol nas/ /kun gyi thar lam mngon gyur don rdzogs te/ /mdza' yas 'gro don tshul bzhin byed par shog// //sgyu 'phrul dra pa'i skyed pa'i rim pa ting nge 'dzin/ /dkyil 'khor lnga'i dbang du sbyar ba 'od
410a1(rgyud 'grel): kyi rim pa zhes bya ba'i man ngag /slob dpon sangs rgyas gsang bas mdzad pa'i man ngag /'od kyi rim pa rdzogs so// //rdo rje sems la phyag 'tshal nas/ /rdo rje chos kyi phyag rgya che/ /'jug
410a2(rgyud 'grel): dang dmigs pa las 'das pa'i/ /bsam gtan bsdus pa 'di bshad do/ /sgyu 'phrul dra bas dbang bskur ba'i/ /rgyud dang bden pa'i dbang thob pa'i/ /sngags pa blo ldan dben dga' bas/ /sngon du bya ba kun byas te/ /bar chad rnam gsum med
410a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i gnas/ /rnyed nas cig pur gnas par bya/ /rang gi gzugs brnyan mdun bzhag la/ /slob dpon rgyal po rdo rje chos/ /zla ba dza yis spyan drangs thim/ /bdug sogs mchod de thal sbyar la/ /rdo rje slob dpon sangs rgyas dpal/ /dus gsum
410a4(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /mngon sbyar yid kyis rnam sprul pa'i/ /dag pa'i mchod pa bzhes su gsol/ /dngos grub chu bo gcod pa'i bgegs/ /nyes byas ma lus bshags par bgyi/ /phyogs bcu'i 'khor gsum dag pa'i?
410a5(rgyud 'grel): chos/ /ma chags spyod la rjes yi rang/ /dag pa mdza' bzhi dri ma med/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems bskyed do/ /mchog gsum rten pa'i zhing gyur la/ /gnyis med yid kyis skyabs su gsol/ /tshe rabs bsgrangs pa'i las rnams
410a6(rgyud 'grel): kun/ /bsdus te byang chub mchog tu bsngo/ /sgrub rdzas pad+ma'i 'brus sbyangs la/ /zla 'bru'i steng du h+ri zin par/ /h+ri yis nam mkha' i bdud rtsi dbab/ /sngags zlas bdud rtsi dkyil bar bya/ /oM badzra tsi ta sa ma hUM h+ri tha/ /dngos
410a7(rgyud 'grel): rnams nyid na dngos med par/ /rtog pa'i smra bsam yul las 'das/ /de bzhin nyid dbyings ye shes te/ /de phyir dngos po dngos med pa'o/ /de bzhin nyid du gsal brtan nas/ /skyes pa'i phyag rgya rig pa nyid/ /a
410b1(rgyud 'grel): ma sbyar te bstan pa dang/ /'od 'phros don byas byin brlabs te/ /gang ba'i nyi zla pad mor bcas/ /bstan pas gzhal yas rang gi sems/ /sngon po hUM nyid rig pa'i dngos/ /dbyings la dbyings kyis bris bas te/ /gzugs dang bral bas kha
410b2(rgyud 'grel): dog med/ /'od kyi phyogs kun sems su byas/ /slar 'dur lta bar bcas par grol/ /rnam lngas rdzogs pa'i phyag rgya yin/ /brtan nas khams gsum skus bkang ste/ /dril bu thabs dang shes rab sku/ /zhal gsum phyag
410b3(rgyud 'grel): drug yang na gnyis/ /shu dz+nya ta sogs brgyad pa'i sngags/ /rdzogs pa'i tshul du rdzogs dbang bskur/ /zla stengs sgo gsum gsal ba'i 'bru/ /bsdu ba'i sbyor bas rlung bsdus te/ /dngos po sgo gsum phyag rgya gsum/ /dkar dmar
410b4(rgyud 'grel): thing ga dkyil yi ge /phyogs bcu khyab pa'i hUM 'od zer/ /skras bskul thams cad rdo rje bzhengs/ /rtse mo lcags kyus spyan drangs la/ /e ha hi zhes dgug ste bstim/ /hUM dza spo ta ho yis gzhug /mchod de rdo rje'i zlas pa bya/ /khams
410b5(rgyud 'grel): gsum dbang phyug mun gnas la/ /spro ba gsum gyis gsal gdab bskul/ /rdo rje gsum dngos 'dus pas stim/ /rdo rje chos kyi gzi 'drar 'gyur/ /zla drug de bzhin lo zla bzhi/ /rig pa'i brtul zhugs la gnas te/ /brtson
410b6(rgyud 'grel): 'grus yu ba bcad pa bzhin/ /rdo rje nyid 'gyur the tshom med/ /dbang po rnam gnyis byin brlabs 'khyud/ /rdo rje khu bas mkha' bkang ste/ /thig le ba spu'i bu ga nas/ /'dod pa drug dang tshim pa bzhi/ /spros nas ma lus bdag
410b7(rgyud 'grel): nyid mnyes/ /pu tsa badzra sngags kyis thob/ /de bzhin mnyam pa'i bsgrub rdzas dag /ye shes bdud rtsis thim par dbul/ /dngos po 'bru gsum blangs nas su/ /rdo rje lce gzhag dngos grub 'gyur/ /oM phyogs bcu dus bzhi rdzogs
411a1(rgyud 'grel): pa yi/ /ye shes dkyil 'khor thig le che/ /bsod nams dkyil 'khor sku yi tshogs/ /snang stong thig le kun rdzogs ho/ /oM rdo rje bsod nams thig le che/ /rdo rje ye shes dkyil 'khor ldan/ /rdo rje sgra chen mdza' 
411a2(rgyud 'grel): yas pa/ /rdo rje rgyal po thig le che ho/ /oM sku gsung thugs kyi rdzogs pa che/ /yon tan 'phrin las kun tu rdzogs/ /ye shes lhun rdzogs kun tu bzang/ /'dus pa'i tshogs chen thig le che ho/ /oM mi dmigs sgyu 'phrul mnyam
411a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dbyings/ /mdza' yas kun nas sna tshogs 'phro/ /mdza' yas kun nas lhun gyis thim/ /sna tshogs sku gsung thugs chen po/ /ho/ /oM phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten sdul snyad du/ /rgyal ba'i don rnams gdul phran snyed/ /
411a4(rgyud 'grel): sprul pa rdul bral bsam yas kyis/ /skad cig nyid la lhun gyis grub/ /ho/ /oM thams cad ma lus sku gsung thugs/ /sku gsung thugs kyi bdag nyid che/ /sku gsung thugs kyis kun tu khyab/ /sku gsung thugs kyi thig le che/ /ho/ /hUM
411a5(rgyud 'grel): badzra d+h+ri ka /muM da du shwa ri stwaM/ /spyod lam rnam pa gsum du yang/ /'bad de yengs pa med sems shing/ spyod yul mtshan nyid thams cad la/ /thig le 'am yang na lha mo drug /nyid du sbyor bas mthong thos med/ /dmig rgyu la sogs
411a6(rgyud 'grel): mtshan ma lnga/ /bstan pas nyes pa'i rtsa ba med/ /'dri mchog dkyil 'khor bri la sogs/ /skabs 'dir gags yin slang mi bya/ /de ltar goms rtogs rigs mchog des/ /ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub/ /rigs 'dzin sa la
411a7(rgyud 'grel): gdon mi za/ /rgyud las rmos ba'i yon tan rnams/ /tshe 'dis mngon du gyur pa yis/ /bsod nams ye shes tshogs rdzogs te/ /yi ge 'khor lo tshogs chen mnyes/ /'di ltar bsgrubs shing sgom byas na/ /'bras bu mngon
411b1(rgyud 'grel): du ma byung yang/ /tshe rabs skye ba thams cad du/ /las ngan kun tu skye mi 'gyur/ /theg pa sman par yong mi skye/ /bde gshegs 'byung dang skol mi 'gyur/ /sdug bsngal thams cad yong mi 'byung/ /lha mi mtshan rdzogs yongs su 'grub/ /mthar
411b2(rgyud 'grel): ni skye med rdo rje'i sar/ /'grub 'gyur the tshom med ces bshad/ /sgyu 'phrul phyag rgya bsam gtan rdzogs so// //rgyal ba kun tu bzang po'i sgyu 'phrul las/ /ngang pas 'o ma blangs pa'i dpe bzhin du/ /rab
411b3(rgyud 'grel): 'bring kun gyis nyams su slang ba'i tshes/ /gab sbas mngon du byung ba'i man ngag 'di/ /'phangs med ser sna spangs las ma rtogs pa/ /dam med chags pa'i 'khor dang ma prad cig /slob dpon bi ma las mdzad pa rdzogs so// //
411b4(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi bdag /ye shes rgya mtsho rab zab thugs/ /dkyil 'khor yid bzhin 'byung ba'i gter/ /nor bu rin chen yon tan mdzod/ /rdo rje'i yid la phyag 'tshal lo/ /e ma'o bde gshegs snying po las/ /rang gi rnam rtog
411b5(rgyud 'grel): las kyis sprul/ /sna tshogs lus dang longs spyod dang/ /gnas dang sdug bsngal la sogs pa/ /bdag dang bdag gir so sor 'dzin/ /sus kyang ma bcings bcings med de/ /bcing par bya ba yod ma yin/ /rnam rtog bdag tu 'dzin
411b6(rgyud 'grel): pa yis/ /nan gyis mkha' la mdud pa 'dor/ /nyon mongs 'khor ba'i rgya dral nas/ /byang chub mchog la dgod pa dang/ /ma 'ongs sangs rgyas blo ldan don/ /bla med ye shes bskyed pa'i phyir/ /rgyud kyi don bsdus snying po 'di/ /ma nor
411b7(rgyud 'grel): btus te bstan par bya/ /ri bo 'dus pa'i rtse rnams dang/ /dben pa chen po'i sa phyogs dang/ /tsan dan nags tshal me tog tshal/ /yid 'ong bkra shis sems dga' ba'i/ /bdag dbang bar chad med pa'i gnas/ /der ni ting 'dzin
412a1(rgyud 'grel): bsgom par bya/ /bdag dang mdza' yas sems can rnams/ ye nas sangs rgyas yin mod kyi/ /rtog pa'i dbang gis 'khor ba las/ /byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed do/ /e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos//
412a2(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang/ /skye ba med las thams cad skyes/ /skyes pa nyid na skye ba med/ /e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyis gsang/ /'gag pa med las thams cad 'gag /'gag tsam nyid
412a3(rgyud 'grel): na 'gag pa med/ /e ma'o ngo mtshar smad kyi chos/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyis gsang/ /gnas pa med las thams cad gnas/ /gnas pa nyid na gnas pa med/ /e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyis
412a4(rgyud 'grel): gsang/ /dmigs pa med las thams cad dmigs/ /dmigs pa nyid na dmigs pa med/ /e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyis gsang/ /'gro 'ong med las 'gro dang 'ong/ /'gro 'ong nyid na 'gro 'ong med/ /
412a5(rgyud 'grel): bsgrub pa'i gtsor ni ting 'dzin pas/ /ting 'dzin 'di 'is byed par 'gyur/ /mun la snang 'byung ji bzhin du/ /'gyur bas gser 'gyur sman gyi tshul/ /rtog pa'i dbang 'gyur ting 'dzin yin/ /de ltar ting 'dzin rims bzhin bsgom/ /dngos
412a6(rgyud 'grel): rnams nyid na dngos med pas/ /rtog pa'i smra bsam yul las 'das/ /de bzhin nyid dbyings ye shes te/ /de phyir dngos po dngos med do/ /de bzhin nyid de spros med kyang/ /rang bzhin kun tu snang ba'i dbyings/ /sems can rnams la
412a7(rgyud 'grel): snying rje'i phyir/ /nam mkha' la ni nam mkha' sgom/ /dngos po med las dngos po sprin/ /sna tshogs rnam par 'byung zhing 'gyur/ /bzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid ni/ /chos rnams kun gyis rtsa ba yin/ /sems nyid yi ge rang bzhin de/ /yi
412b1(rgyud 'grel): ge yid bzhin rin chen sprin/ /yi ge'i mchog ni sgom par bya/ /a rab tu brtan 'gyur a dkar las/ /shin tu phra ba'i a rnams 'phro/ /phyogs bcu gang bar gsal 'gyur nas/ /byang chub sems su byin brlabs te/ /bsdus kyang 'phel 'grib
412b2(rgyud 'grel): med par bstan/ /de las ming tshogs gsal 'bar kun/ /spro zhing bsdu ba'ang de bzhin no/ /'di ni rdo rje dngos grub kyi/ /brtan 'byung ye shes rgyu yin no/ /de las rgyal ba'i bzhugs gnas bsten/ /dbang chen dkyil 'khor rim bzhin bsgom/
412b3(rgyud 'grel): e yaM baM su laM raM bruM bi shud+d+he/ /ye shes phyogs bzhi dbus brtags te/ /dkyil 'khor bsam yas lhun gyis grub/ /lhag pa'i ye shes glo 'bur can/ /rdzogs chen rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /kun 'byung dkyil 'khor chen por
412b4(rgyud 'grel): spyod/ /'khor lo rtsibs bzhi mu khyud bcas/ /gru chad bzhis brgyan par khyams dang/ /kun tu gru bzhi sgo khyud ldan/ /rol mo sna tshogs sprin phung bzhin/ /dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis brgyan/ /seng ge glang chen rta dang khyung/ /nam mkha' lding
412b5(rgyud 'grel): gi khri chen la/ /nyi zla pad+ma rin po che/ /a ka kha ga g+ha nga/ tsa tsha dz+nya dzha nya/ ta tha da d+ha na/ Ta Tha Da Dha Na/ pa pha ba b+ha ma/ ya dra ra la sha Sha sa ha k+Sha/ i a'i u a'u e i/ o aau/ /A nyid sna tshogs bar snang ba'i/ /ka la sogs pa bzhi bcu
412b6(rgyud 'grel): gnyis/ /sgra'i ming gis thams cad bsdus/ /mngon rdzogs rgyal por de nyid des/ /de las spro dang bsdus pa yis/ /so so'i phyag mtshan gsal bar 'gyur/ /de las phyogs bcur rab spos pas/ /rgyal ba rnams kyi thugs dam
412b7(rgyud 'grel): bskul/ /de dag slar ni 'dus pa dang/ /hUM badzri dreg /oM dzi na dzig /swa ratna drig /oM a ro lig /ha pra dzA d+hig /suM d+ha du Sha ni/ laM d+he sha ra ti/ maM mo ha ra ti/ laM ra ga ra ti/ nyaM badzra ra ti/ k+Shi hi ra tsa ya/ traM a ga ra ba ya/ h+ri ha
413a1(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma ba d+ha ma/ dzi ku ru pa na h+ri/ hUM la se sa ma ya stwaM/ /traM ma le sa ma ya ho/ /h+ri gir ti ra ho ya haM/ a na ri ti ra ga ya mi/ me d+ha ra ni swAhA/ thI ni swa roM pa ya swAhA/ /hUM swa ra tsa ya swAhA/ /muM sh+ri oM ra ga ya swAhA/ dza du
413a2(rgyud 'grel): pa pra be sha /hUM pus ba a be sha /baM di pa su ki ni ho gan de tsi ta ho/ /hUM ya mAn+ta krid phaT/ hUM prad dz+nyaM ta krid phaT/ hUM pad+man+ta krid phaT/ hUM big+h nan ta krid phaT/ mahA badzra d+ha ra mahA kro ti shwa ri dzwa la ni hUM phaT/ oM ma hA ratna da ra ma ha ko ti shwa ri dzwa la ni
413a3(rgyud 'grel): hUM phaT/ oM mahA padmo dar ma ha kro ti shwa ri dzwa ba? ni hUM phaT/ oM mahA kar ma da ra mahA kro ti shwa ri dza ma ni hUM phaT/ hUM hUM hUM badzra tsi ta oM/ /a a a badzra ba tra sa ma ya oM/ oM mu ne krid swAhA/ oM mu ne hUM truM swAhA/ /oM mu ne sruM swAhA/ /oM mu ne braM swAhA
413a4(rgyud 'grel): oM mu ne k+ShaM swAhA/ oM mu ne ye swAhA/ /gdan la rdzogs dang sems dpa' i tshul/ /'khor lo rgyal po rgyal mo dang/ /g.yas na mthong thos snom pa dang/ /myong dang btsun mo'i tshogs su bcas/ /gru chad la ni mthong byed dang/ /thos byed myong byed snom
413a5(rgyud 'grel): byed rnams/ /btsun mo'i tshogs dang bcas par gnas/ /bar khyams la ni thub pa drug /mdun dang rgyab tu byed pa dang/ /bya pa dag ni gnas par bstan/ /sgo byung bzhi la 'joms pa ni/ /btsun mo'i tshogs dang ldan par gnas/ /rdo rje
413a6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo rin po che/ /pad+ma ral gri dril bu 'bar/ /ud pal klu shing la sogs mtshan/ /rin chen myu gu ral gyi 'bar/ /pad+ma dkar po rdo rje 'bar/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rin chen snye/ /gzugs mdzes rin chen 'phreng ba dang/ /pi bang gar
413a7(rgyud 'grel): mkhan mchog nyid de/ /me tog 'phreng ba spos mchog dang/ /mar me byug pa la sogs pa'i/ /las la 'khril zhing chos la bstan/ /dbu rnams 'byo zhing 'dud pa'i dus/ /gong gi phyag rgya chen po bzhin/ /gnyis med dbyings kyi nang du 'khril/
413b1(rgyud 'grel): sgo bzhi khra bo phyag rgya ni/ /mi mgo gdengs dang rdo rje gnon/ /thong sbrul chen pos gnon pa dang/ /rdo rje rgya gram las kyis gnon/ /lcags kyu zhags pa po ta ho/ /sgo bzhir gnas pa de dag kyang/ /'dud tshul 'khril ba gong ma bzhin/ /thub drug phyag rgya
413b2(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs te/ /mdor bsdus phyag rgya drug tu bstan/ /sreg par dang ni pi bang dang/ /go cha po ti rin chen sgrom/ /me dang chu ru rab tu bstan/ /yum ni dmigs med chos kyi dbyings/ /kun bzang mnyam gzhag ye shes 'phro/ /yum 'gyur
413b3(rgyud 'grel): mnyam rdzogs padmo'i dkyil/ /gzhan yang phyag rgya sna tshogs te/ /yang na de bzhin gshegs nyid dam/ /yang na rdo rje thal mo nyid/ /mthing ga dkar po ser leb brgan/ /ljang gu la sogs sna tshogs pa'i/ /mnyen lcug 'khril ldem gzhon
413b4(rgyud 'grel): tshul can/ /gsal 'tsher lhun stug gzi byin che/ /'od zer 'phro ba'i tshogs chen po/ /'bar ba'i 'phreng bas 'khyil ba ste/ /mdza' dbus med par khyab pa ste/ /dkyil 'khor bsam yas lhun gyis grub/ /phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gsal
413b5(rgyud 'grel): ba dang/ /dbang bskur byin brlabs tshul bzhin bya/ /oM mahA shu n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba ad ma ko haM/ oM mahA a ta ri sha dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba ad ma ko haM/ oM mahA sa mAn+ta dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba ad ma ko haM/ oM mahA prad ta pra be sha dz+nyA na badzra
413b6(rgyud 'grel): swa b+hA ba adma ko haM/ oM mahA kri ta a nu rtan dz+nya na badzra swa b+hA ba adma ko haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA ka ya badzra swa b+hA ba adma ko haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma bAg badzra swa b+hA ba adma ko haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta mahA tsi ta badzra swa b+hA ba adma ko haM/ /oM
413b7(rgyud 'grel): sarba ta thA ga ta mahA a nu ra ga badzra swa b+hA ba adma ko haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA bu tse badzre swa b+hA ba adma ko haM/ /sangs rgyas lnga yi cod pan can/ /rin chen dbu rgyan 'phreng ba dang/ /dpung rgyan se mo do la sogs/ /mdzes pa'i rgyan ni
414a1(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs kyis/ /dbang mchog des ni dbang bskur ro/ /de ltar rtog pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /dus bzhi phyogs bcu gang nas kyang/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnyed mi 'gyur/ /sems nyid rtogs pas sangs rgyas te/ /sangs
414a2(rgyud 'grel): rgyas gzhan du ma 'tshol cig /dkyil 'khor kun tu rab sbyor bas/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /'di ni gsang chen nges pa yi/ /'bras bu lam du gyur pa yi/ /rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus la/ /'di las gsang ba'i nges
414a3(rgyud 'grel): don med/ /btsal kyang rgyal bas mi rnyed do/ /kun ni phyag rgya chen po'i mchog /ma 'gags rnam pa cir yang ston/ /'dul ba mdo sde chos mngon dang/ /dam tshig bsgrub dang? bsgrub pa dang/ /sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rgyud/ /phyogs bcu kun tu rab grags
414a4(rgyud 'grel): pa/ /gsang ba'i snying bo las 'phros te/ /rang bzhin gsang ba'i snying po 'di/ /sde snod kun dang rgyud kun gyi/ /'byung gnas bstan la nges par 'bebs/ /phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor spyan drang phyir/ /gsal ldan ma'am byin rlabs la/ /stong gsung
414a5(rgyud 'grel): yungs 'brur gzhug tshul du/ /dbyangs nas dkyil 'khor spyan drang mchod/ /e hye hi b+ha ga bAn mahA ku Ni ka dri sha /sa ma ya stwaM/ dza hUM baM ho zhes brjod pas/ /thams cad ma lus 'dus pa dang/ /sku gsung mnyes par bya ba'i phyir/ /bstod dang
414a6(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa tshul bzhin bya/ /oM phyogs bcu dus bzhi rdzogs pa'i/ /ye shes dkyil 'khor thig le che/ /bsod nams dkyil 'khor sku'i tshogs/ /snang stong thig le kun tu rdzogs ho/ /oM rdo rje bsod nams thig le che/ /rdo rje ye shes dkyil
414a7(rgyud 'grel): 'khor ldan/ /rdo rje sgra chen mdza' yas pa/ /rdo rje rgyal po thig le che ho/ /oM sku gsung thugs kyi rdzogs pa che/ /yon tan 'phrin las kun tu rdzogs/ /ye nas lhun rdzogs kun tu bzang/ /'dus pa'i tshogs chen thig le che ho/ /oM mi
414b1(rgyud 'grel): dmigs sgyu 'phrul mnyam pa'i dbyings/ /mdza' yas kun nas snang cho gas spro/ /mdza' yas kun nas lhun gyis thim/ /sna tshogs sku gsung thugs chen ho/ /oM phyogs bcu 'jig rten rdul snyed du/ /rgyal ba'i don rnams rdul phran snyed/ /sprul pa rdul phran bsam yas kyis/ /
414b2(rgyud 'grel): skad cig nyid la lhun gyis grub ho/ /oM thams cad ma lus sku gsung thugs/ /sku gsung thugs kyi bdag nyid che/ /sku gsung thugs kyis kun tu khyab/ /sku gsung thugs kyi thig le che ho/ /mchod pa'i phyag rgya chen po 'di/ /sems kyi yid bzhin sprin tshogs kyis/ /
414b3(rgyud 'grel): phyogs bcu thams cad sangs rgyas zhing/ /mnyen 'jam reg na bde ba dang/ /sna tshogs rin po che'i gzhi/ /mdzes bar bris shing spras pa dang/ /kun 'byung rin chen phung por 'bar/ /dbyings legs rdzing bu bro mchog bsil/ /rin chen khang pa sna tshogs dang
414b4(rgyud 'grel): rgyan dang dpag bsam ljon pa'i tshal/ /glu dbyangs tshigs su bcad pa'i sgra/ /bla re rgyal mtshan na bza' gdugs/ /do shal dpung rgyan se mo do/ /bza' dang btud pa'i mchog rnams dang/ /rang la mdzes par brgyan pa yi/ /lha dang lha mo rdul snyed kyi/ /
414b5(rgyud 'grel): bro gar la sogs bsam yis kyis/ /phyogs bcu nam mkha' i khams bkang nas/ /dkyil 'khor kun la rgyas par 'bul/ /skal ldan gsal ba'i khyad par gyis/ /rims kyis yang na cig car du/ /chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam sbyar zhing/ /mchod pa'i phyag
414b6(rgyud 'grel): rgya chen por sgom/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba mngon rdzogs pa'i/ /dbang po yul du gang 'gyur ba/ /thabs dang shes rab ldan 'gyur zhing/ /mnyam pa'i dang nyid rtogs gsal na/ /thams cad byang chub mchog gi rgyu/ /bskyed chen 'khor lo'i gzhal yas su/ /
414b7(rgyud 'grel): thabs dang shes rab thams cad kun/ /gsal zhing 'od zer 'phro bsgoms na/ /bsgul skyod thams cad phyag rgya yin/ /'di ni spyi rgya chen po ste/ /bla med chen pos 'di skad gsungs/ /gsang bya de nyid nges pa yi/ /snying po phyag rgya 'da' ka ba'i/ /
415a1(rgyud 'grel): mi skyod nyi ma'i dkyil yi ge /rin chen zla ba'i dkyil yi ge /lnga gnyis zung du sbyar ba las/ /sbyor ba'i phyag rgya 'byung ba'i rgyu/ /oM dang muM gnyis rtse sbyar te/ /'bru brgyad bsnol te rtse sprad pa/ /rgyal ba'i kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /bde
415a2(rgyud 'grel): pa chen po sbyin pa'i rgya/ /'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan/ /zla btul 'bru sbas dril gsil zhing/ /'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos la bstan/ /'bru bzhi spas nas thugs khar bkan/ /muM gyi rtse mor dril bsil 'bar/ /nyi ma 'bru lnga las mu 'khril/ /btud
415a3(rgyud 'grel): de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis lta/ /'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan/ /oM bsgreng rtse mor 'khor lo 'bar/ /zla btul 'bru sbas dril bsil zhing/ /'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos la bstan/ /'bru bzhi sbas pas thugs kar bkan/ /lam gyi rtse mor
415a4(rgyud 'grel): dril bsil zhing/ /nyi ma 'bru lnga las su 'khril/ /btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyi lta/ /'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan/ /swa rtser 'bar ba rin po che/ /zla btul 'bru sbas dril bsil zhing/ /'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos la bstan/ /
415a5(rgyud 'grel): 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan/ /moM gyi rtse mor dril gsil 'bar/ /nyi ma 'bru lnga las su 'khril/ /btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis lha/ /'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan/ /aM ni rtse mor pad+ma 'bar/ /zla btul 'bru sbas dril bsil
415a6(rgyud 'grel): zhing/ /'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos la bstan/ /'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan/ /paM bsgreng rtse mor dril bsil zhing/ /nyi ma 'bru lnga las su 'khril/ /btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis lta/ /'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan/ /
415a7(rgyud 'grel): haM bsgreng rtse mor ral gri 'bar/ /zla btul 'bru sbas dril bsil zhing/ /'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos la bstan/ /'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan/ /taM bsgreng rtse mor dril bsil 'bar/ /nyi ma 'bru lnga las su 'khril/ /btud de 'dzum
415b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i mdangs kyis lta/ /de ni rgyal pa thams cad kun/ /dgyes pa chen po bskyed pa'i phyir/ /phyag rgya'i mchod pa chen po yis/ /de la mchod sbyin dam pa ni/ /thog mar bdag nyid rtogs bsgoms sgral/ /de nas gnyis med blo yis ni/ /blo ngan sems can
415b2(rgyud 'grel): snying re rje/ /gnyis su med par bsgral bar bya/ /zhing 'gyur mchog dang mchog phan rnams/ /nyi zla'i dkyil du mkhas bas bzhag /nga rgyal lag gi 'du byed bsgom/ /hUM du gyur par rnam par dag /dbyings su thim nas phyag rgyar gsal/ /skur gyur
415b3(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer 'phro bar brjod/ /gtsug tu rnam par rgyal ba bsgom/ /ngo mtshar ngan 'gror thar pa'i lam/ /shes rab mchog de byin rlabs nas/ /thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa/ /padmo la ni rdo rje zhugs/ /'khril pa'i mchod chen mnyam sbyor pa/ /
415b4(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid mnyes pa kun la mchod/ /ye nas skye med de bzhin nyid/ /sgyu mar snang ba'i mig yor tshul/ /sbyor sgrol bya ba kun byas kyang/ /rdul bya tsam yang byas pa med/ /mnyam pa'i sgrub rdzas chen po bdag /bdag dang mnyam pa'i tshogs la
415b5(rgyud 'grel): 'bul/ /bza' dang bca' dang btung dang bsgo/ /longs spyod lnga ldan thams cad ni/ /dkyil 'khor la ni dkyil 'khor thim/ /sgyu 'phrul dra bas mngon rdzogs pa'i/ /dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i ting nge 'dzin/ /bro gar phyag rgya'i 'phro 'du yis/ /
415b6(rgyud 'grel): 'dzul lam nam mkhar 'gro bar 'gyur/ /glu tshig sgra'i phyag rgya yis/ /chos kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /rgyan dang bgo ba'i phyag rgya yis/ /'bar ba'i rgyal po thub med 'grub/ /bza' dang btung ba'i phyag rgya yis/ /yid sbyin sku dang
415b7(rgyud 'grel): bdud rtsir 'gyur/ /A li kA li'i phyag rgya yis/ /thams cad thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /shes 'jug mtshan nyid 'byor pa yis/ /'bras bu smin byed rgyu dang rkyen/ /nus mthu can du gang gyur pa/ /rigs 'dzin rgyal ba'i
416a1(rgyud 'grel): zhing du grags/ /phyogs bcu de bzhin gshegs pa yi/ /bde gshegs yon tan rmad bo tshe/ /gzhan na yod pa ma yin na/ /lha srin la sogs smos ci dgos/ /rnal 'byor las su rung rnams kyis/ /phyag rgya chen po rdzogs
416a2(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur zhing/ /gsal ba'i yid gnyis med pas na/ /dkyil 'khor chen po rab 'bar 'gyur/ /rang snang dbyer med dkyil 'khor la/ /'jug pa'i mtshan nyid mnyam sbyor ba/ /phyogs dus kun nas gshegs pa yi/ /bsnyen pa'i dkyil
416a3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor rab tu rdzogs/ /nye bar 'gyur ba'i dam tshig mchog /cho ga lnga ni rdzogs byas nas/ /yo byad lnga ni rdzogs par ldan/ /sngags kyi yan lag lnga rdzogs pas/ /ma nyams 'jug la rab brtson na/ /zhag ni sum cu phrag drug gnas
416a4(rgyud 'grel): bcu gnyis bcu bzhi bcu drug gis/ /dbang sgyur rigs kyi dam par 'grub/ /de tshe bcu drug tshun chad kyi/ /sku lnga lhun gyis rdzogs pa ste/ /ye shes thig le de nyid las ye shes thig le nyid snang ba/ /bsam gyis mi khyab mdza' yas
416a5(rgyud 'grel): mchog /phyogs bcu dus bzhi rdzogs pa'i zhing/ /zhing khams rnam dag bsam yas dang/ /rgya dang bral ba'i gzhal yas khang/ /'khor lo'i brgyan du rol mo'i tshogs/ /dkyil 'khor ma lus bsam yas kun/ /mthong nas
416a6(rgyud 'grel): nye bar mnyes pa dang/ /rgya chen gsung las don 'byung ba/ /mthun pa'i ye shes rang snang ba'o/ /gcig dang du mar bral ba yi/ /mdza' dang dbus med de bzhin nyid/ /sangs rgyas kyis kyang mi gzigs te/ /rang byung ye shes
416a7(rgyud 'grel): snang med snang/ /dbang mchog dam pa ma thob par/ /bsgrub kyang cung zad 'grub mi 'gyur/ /oM phyogs bcu dus bzhi thams cad kyi/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje che/ /dkyil 'khor kun gyi byed pa po/ /dkyil 'khor kun gyi
416b1(rgyud 'grel): spyad pa spyod/ /slob dpon mnyes par ma byas shing/ /dbang rnams thob par ma byas par/ /nyan pa las bsogs rtsom pa rnams/ /'bras bu med cing brlag par 'gyur/ /dbu rgyan cod pan 'phreng ba dang/ /go cha rgyal mtshan phyag rgya dang/ /gdugs
416b2(rgyud 'grel): dang buM ba bza' btung dang/ /snying bo lnga yis dbang bskur na/ /dus 'di phyin cad rgyal ba'i sras/ /ngan song thams cad med pa dang/ /tshe ring bde ba phun sum tshogs/ /mtho ris thar pa'i bdag por 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis 'grub pa'i
416b3(rgyud 'grel): gzhi/ /rdo rje dam tshig chen po ste/ /bla med mi spang bla ma bkur/ /sngags dang phyag rgya rgyun mi gcad/ /yang dag lam du zhugs la byams/ /gsang ba'i don phyir smra mi bya/ /de ni rtsa ba lnga rnams te/ /bsgrub dang srung ba'i dam tshig mchog /
416b4(rgyud 'grel): gti mug chags dang zhe sdang che/ /nga rgyal phra dog mi spong ngo/ /dkar rtsi dmar rtsi dri sha chen/ /dag pa'i snod chu mi 'dor ro/ /yan lag bcu'i dam tshig ste/ /ye nas dag nyams rtogs pas spyad/ /gsung zhing bsgrub pa'i dam tshig lnga/ /
416b5(rgyud 'grel): rtsa ba yin te rigs med 'gyur/ /mi spang mi 'dor lnga nyid ni/ /yan lag dam tshig 'da' ka ba'o/ /mnyam la mnyam par sbyor ba yi/ /mnyam pa'i dam tshig la gnas na/ /mnyam rdzogs chen po thob 'gyur bas/ /'das na sangs rgyas
416b6(rgyud 'grel): ma yin no/ /rtsa ba nyams pa phyal ba dag /gso la nye bar mi brtson na/ /skad cig yud tsam smra ma byed/ /nyams 'gyur nyes pa brjod mi lang/ /rtsa ba'i dam tshig nyams pas na/ /bsgrub pa thams cad log par 'gyur/ /yid du mi 'ong
416b7(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs pa'i/ /'bras bu mi 'dod bzhin du 'du/ /yan lag dam tshig nyams gyur na/ /'bras bu med cing ngan song lhung/ /dam tshig 'di ni rdo rje che/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid yin/ /dkyil 'khor ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis/
417a1(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor la ni dkyil 'khor bsgom/ /dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor las byung ba/ /thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor mchog /gsang ba'i thig le dkyil 'khor dbyings/ /'byung ba shes rab rigs kyi yum/ /
417a2(rgyud 'grel): chen po rigs kyi de bzhin te/ /byang chub sems ni rdo rje'i tshogs/ /dbang po yul dus rigs pa'i rnams/ /kun tu bzang po'i dkyil 'khor la/ /bdag nyid chen po lhag pa yis/ /thugs kyi ye shes lnga lta zhing/ /snying po thig
417a3(rgyud 'grel): le mnyam sbyor bas/ /bde ba'i ye shes rol mo yis/ /ye shes dgyes pa mchod par 'bul/ /zag pa med pa'i bsod nams kyis/ /ye shes sgyu mar rang snang ba/ /rol mo'i dkyil 'khor mdza' yas mchog /gsang ba'i dkyil
417a4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor nyid kyi dbyings/ /de ni sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos/ /yang dag don gyi snying po 'di/ /bskal pa zhing gi rdul snyed du/ /shin tu sbyangs rab gnas shing/ /dkyil 'khor ma lus brnyes pa'i sa/ /'bras bu gsang chen 'di yin te//
417a5(rgyud 'grel): shes rab mig ldan rnams kyis zung/ /snod ldan dang tshul bzang la bstan/ /lus dang longs spyod stong la sbyin/ /gzhan du nams kyang sbyin mi bya/ /rmongs la byar bar gal te byin/ /dus med par ni srog zad nas/ /bsregs dang sbebs
417a6(rgyud 'grel): la yun ring gnas/ /rang snang dbyer med dkyil 'khor du/ /thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nyid la bsdu/ /hUM hUM zhes ni rab brjod pas/ /chos kyi dbyings su thim par 'gyur/ /de nas snying po dran tsam gyis/ /phyag rgya chen por gsal 'gyur nas/ /
417a7(rgyud 'grel): go sgo mtshams bcad lus bsrungs te/ /de nas rnal 'byor chen po ste/ /'gro sdod 'dug nyal bzhi por ni/ /srog gi phyir yang mi gtang zhing/ /spyod lam kun tu ma nyams par/ /bdag nyid chen por rtag par bsgom/ /rgyud kyi don las
417b1(rgyud 'grel): btus pa yi/ /rin chen dra ba mngon rdzogs pa'i/ /ma 'ongs rnal 'byor thams cad dang/ /mdza' yas sems can don gyi phyir/ /bstan pas bsgrib pa kun byang nas/ /bla med byang chub thob par shog /na mo rin chen mngon rdzogs zhes bya ba mthar phyin
417b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /rdzogs so// //de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi bdag /ye shes rgya mtsho rab zab thugs/ /dkyil 'khor yid bzhin 'byung ba'i gter/ /rdo rje yid la phyag 'tshal lo/ /e ma'o bde gshegs snying po las/ /rang
417b3(rgyud 'grel): gi rnam rtog las kyis sbrul/ /rang 'byung ye shes bskyed pa'i phyir/ /rgyud kyi don bsdus snying po brtsam/ /thos bsam bsgom la rab sbyangs pa'i/ /shes rab mig ldan rnams kyis bzung/ /snod ldan dang tshul brtan la bzang/ /lus dang longs
417b4(rgyud 'grel): spyod gtong la sbyin/ /slob dpon mnyes par ma byas shing/ /dbang rnams thob par ma byas par/ /nyan pa la sogs rtsom pa rnams/ /'bras bu med cing brlag par 'gyur/ /mnyam la snyam par sbyor ba yis/ /mnyam pa'i dam tshig la  
417b5(rgyud 'grel): gnas na/ /mnyam rdzogs chen po thob 'gyur te/ /'das na sangs rgyas ma yin no/ /dus bzhi phyogs bcu gang nas kyang/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnyed mi 'gyur/ /sems nyid rtogs pa sangs rgyas pas/ /sangs rgyas gzhan du ma
417b6(rgyud 'grel): 'tshol cig /gang gis glang chen myos 'dri sems/ /mnyam par bzhag pas brtul nas su/ /sngags dang phyag rgyar rab brtan nas/ /dngos grub la mtshan chen por 'gyur/ /dgon pa dben pa'i sa phyogs su/ /tsan dan nags dang me tog
417b7(rgyud 'grel): tshal/ /yid 'ong bkra shis sems dga' ba'i/ /rang dbang bar chad med pa'i gnas/ /bdag dang mdza' yas sems can rnams/ /ye nas sangs rgyas yin mod kyang/ /rtog pa'i dbang gis 'khor bas na/ /byang chub mchog tu sems
418a1(rgyud 'grel): bskyed do/ /e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang/ /skye ba med las thams cad skyes/ /skyes tsam nyid na skye ba med/ /'gag pa med las thams cad 'gags/ /'gag tsam nyid na
418a2(rgyud 'grel): 'gag pa med/ /gnas pa med las thams cad gnas/ /gnas pa nyid na gnas pa med/ /dmigs pa med la thams cad dmigs/ /dmigs pa nyid la dmigs pa med/ /'gro 'ong med las 'gro dang 'od/ /'gro 'ong nyid na 'gro 'ong med
418a3(rgyud 'grel): bsgrub pa'i gtso ni ting 'dzin pas/ /ting 'dzin 'di yid byed par 'gyur/ /gser 'gyur sman dang mun sel bzhin/ /rtog pa'i dbang 'gyur ting 'dzin yin/ /de phyir ting 'dzin rim bzhin sgom/ /dngos po rnam gnyis dngos med pas/ /
418a4(rgyud 'grel): rtog pa smra bsam yul las 'das/ /de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes te/ /de phyir dngos po dngos med pa'o/ /de bzhin nyid ni spros med kyang/ /rang bzhin kun tu snang gi dbyings/ /sems can kun la snying brtse'i phyir/ /nam mkha' la ni
418a5(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha' sgom/ /gzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid ni/ /chos rnams kun gyi rtsa ba yin/ /sems nyid yi ge rang bzhin pas/ /yi ge yid bzhin rin chen sprin/ /yi ge'i mchog ni bsgom par bya/ /a/ rab tu brtan 'gyur a dkar
418a6(rgyud 'grel): las/ /shin tu phra ba'i a rnams 'phro/ /phyogs bcu gang bar gsal gyur nas/ /bsdus kyang 'phel 'grib med par bstan/ /de las ming tshogs gsal bar snang/ /spro zhing sdu ba de bzhin no/ /'di ni rdo rje dngos grub kyi/ /
418a7(rgyud 'grel): brtan 'byung ye shes rgyu yin no/ /e yaM khaM suM laM raM 'bru bi sha bi shu de/ /ye shes phyogs dbus blos brtags te/ /dkyil 'khor bsam byas lhun grub ni/ /rdzogs shing rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa/ /kun 'byung dkyil
418b1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor chen por spyod/ /'khor lo rtsibs bzhi mu khyud bcas/ /lhag pa'i ye shes glo 'bur can/ /gru chad bzhis brgyan par 'khyams dang/ /kun tu gru bzhi sgo khyud ldan/ /rol mo sna tshogs sprin phung bzhin/ /dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu gnyis kyis mdzes/ /seng+ge
418b2(rgyud 'grel): glang chen rta dang khyung/ /nam mkha' lding gi khri chen las/ /nyi zla pad+ma rin po che/ /a ni skye med de bzhin nyid/ /ksha ni thugs kyi ye shes shar/ /de las cho 'phrul gsum gyis bskyed/ /kun bzang mnyam gzhag ye shes 'phro/ /yum 'gyur mnyam
418b3(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs padmo'i dkyil/ /phyag rgya chen po'i sku gnyis rdzogs/ /bdag nyid sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje'i bdag /phyogs dus dkyil 'khor bdag nyid che/ /kun bzang ye nas yin pa'i phyir/ /thabs dang shes rab dgyes sprin las/
418b4(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems chogs rgyu 'khor lo/ /'bras bu rgyal ba smin 'grub byed/ /ngo mtshar ming tshogs bzhi bcu gnyis/ /ad ka kha ga g+ha nga/ tsa tsha dza dzha nya/ Ta Tha Da Dha Na/ ta tha da d+ha na/ pa pha ba b+ha ma/ ya wa ra la/ sha Sha sa ha/ k+Sha/ i a'i/ u
418b5(rgyud 'grel): a'u/ e i/ o aau/ a nyid sna tshogs par snang pa'i/ /ka la sogs pa bzhi bcu gnyis/ /sgra'i ming gis thams cad sdus/ /mngon rdzogs rgyal por de nyid nges/ /de las rkyen gyi sngags kyis bskul/ /sgyu 'phrul dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu
418b6(rgyud 'grel): gnyis/ /dra ba'i dkyil 'khor mngon rdzogs pa/ /'dus ma byas nyid 'dus byas kyi/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor 'byin pa dang/ /dbang med rgyu rkyen 'tshogs pa'i mthu/ /de nas bcom ldan dgyes chen rigs/ /lhun gyis grub par bya ba'i phyir/ /rang snang
418b7(rgyud 'grel): dbyer med dkyil 'khor la/ /'jug pa'i mtshan nyid mnyam sbyor ba/ /rang gi dang tshul der bzung nas/ /bskul tshig 'di yang rab tu brjod/ /oM ye shes rgyal po sku gsung thugs/ /yon tan 'phrin las smad po che/ /de nyid du ni bdag sbyor
419a1(rgyud 'grel): bas/ /phyag rgya chen por bdag sbyor cig /thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i/ /ye shes zer gyis lus rtog sbyangs/ /gser zhun lta bu'i sems dag las/ /gsum gyis byin rlabs 'od kyi 'bru/ /thugs kar thim nas sku yi dbyig /rdo rje'i ?
419a2(rgyud 'grel): byung yum gyi mkha' / /chos sku byang chub sems su gnas/ /lha rnams so so'i snying po'i sgra/ /bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis sgra byung bas/ /byang chub sems su cig par thim/ /de nas snying po dran tsam gyis/ /aksha gsung gi phyag rgya gnyis/ /cho ga gsum gyi sbyor ba
419a3(rgyud 'grel): yis/ /phyag rgya chen po'i sku gnyis rdzogs/ /'bru gsum 'bru lnga byin rlabs dbang/ /rdo rje padmor byin rlabs te/ /hUM las rdo rje rtse lnga oM/ /pa las pad+ma 'dab brgyad aM/ /rdo rje chags pa tshul bzhin bskul/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta a nu ra ga badzra swa
419a4(rgyud 'grel): b+hA ba adma ma ko haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta mahA su kha badzra swa b+ha ba ad ma ko haM/ yum gyi pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor du/ /bde ba thugs kyi dkyil 'khor spro/ /gzhal las thig gtab snying po dgod/ /de las spro dang bsdu ba yis/ /thugs kyi phyag rgya bzhi bcu
419a5(rgyud 'grel): gnyis/ /de las 'phra mo'i spros bsdus pas/ /so so'i sngags kyis bskyed cing gdon/ /hUM badzra drig /muM da ru shwa ri/ oM dzi na dzi ga /laM d+he sha ra ti/ /sra rang na drig /maM mo ha ra ti/ a a ro yig /paM ra ga ra ti/ ha prad nya drig /taM badzra ta ti/ k+Shi hi ra tsa ya/ hUM
419a6(rgyud 'grel): la se sa ya stoM/ traM a gar ba ya/ traM ma le sa ma ya stoM/ h+ri ha hUM pad+ma b+hA d+ha ma/ /h+ri girta ri ho haM/ dzhaM ku ru pa na tri/ a nir tir ga ya mi/ me dar ya swAhA/ dza du pa pra be sha ?? swa ram ya swAhA/ hUM pus pa a be sha ya/ hUM swu ra rtsa sa ma
419a7(rgyud 'grel): ya/ /paM di pa su ki ni/ muM tra aM ra ga ya swAhA/ ho gan d+he ci ta ho/ /hUM ya man ta krid phaT/ oM badzra dar mahA kro ti shwa ri dzwa la ni hUM phaT/ hUM prad nya ta krid phaT/ oM rad na dar ma hA kro ta shwa ri dzwa la ni hUM phaT/ hUM pad+ma mAn ta krid phaT/
419b1(rgyud 'grel): oM pad+ma dar ma ha kro ti shwa ri dzwa la ni hUM phaT/ hUM big nan ta krid phaT/ oM kar ma dar mahA kro ti shwa ri dzwa la ni hUM phaT/ hUM hUM hUM badzra tsi ta oM/ a a a badzra badtra sa ma ya oM/ oM mu ne traM swAhA/ oM mu ne hUM gruM swAhA/ /oM mu ne sruM swAhA/ oM mu ne
419b2(rgyud 'grel): braM swAhA/ /oM mu ne ksha swAhA/ oM mu ne ye swAhA/ gdan la rdzogs dang sems dpa' i tshul/ /'khor lo rgyas po rgyal mo dang/ /g.yas nas mthong thos snom pa dang/ /myong dang btsun mo'i tshogs su bcas/ /gru chang la ni mthong byed dang/ /thos
419b3(rgyud 'grel): byed snom byed myong byed rnams/ /btsun mo'i tshogs dang ldan par gnas/ /bar khyams la ni thub drug dang/ /mdun dang rgyab tu byed pa dang/ /bya ba dag na gnas par bstan/ /sgo khyung bzhi la 'joms pa ni/ /btsun mo'i tshogs dang ldan par
419b4(rgyud 'grel): gnas/ /rdo rje 'khor lo rin po che/ /pad+ma ral gri dril bu 'bar/ /ud pal klu shing la sogs mtshan/ /rin chen myu gu ral gri 'bar/ /pad+ma dkar po rdo rje 'bar/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rin chen ste/ /gzugs mdzes rin chen 'phreng ba dang//
419b5(rgyud 'grel): bi bang gar mkhan mchog nyid de/ /me tog 'phreng dang bdug spos mchog /mar me byug pa la sogs pa'i/ /las la 'khril zhing chos la bstan/ /dbu rnams 'byo zhing 'dud pa'i tshul/ /gong gi phyag rgya chen po bzhin/ /gnyis med dbyings
419b6(rgyud 'grel): kyi dang du 'khril/ /sgo bzhi khro bo'i phyag rgya ni/ /nri mgo gdengs dang rdo rje gnon/ /thong sbrul chen pos gnon pa dang/ /rdo rje rgya gram las kyis gnon/ /lcags skyu zhags pa po ta ho/ /sgo bzhi gnas pa de dag kyang/ /'dud tshul 'khril ba gong ma
419b7(rgyud 'grel): bzhin/ /thub drug phyag rgya sna tshogs te/ /mdor bsdus phyag rgya drug tu bstan/ /sreg par dang ni pi bang dang/ /go cha po ti rin chen sgrom/ /me dang chur ni rab tu bstan/ /yum ni dmigs med chos kyi dbyings/ /kun bzang mnyam bzhag ye
420a1(rgyud 'grel): shes 'phro/ /yum 'gyur mnyam rdzogs padmo'i dkyil/ gzhan yang phyag rgya sna tshogs te/ /yang na de bzhin gshegs nyid dam/ /yang na rdo rje thal mo nyid/ /mthing ga dkar po ser leb rgan/ /ljang gu la sogs sna
420a2(rgyud 'grel): tshogs pa/ /gnyen lcug 'khril ldem gzhon tshul can/ gsal mdzes lhun tug gzi byin che/ /'od zer 'phro ba'i tshogs chen po/ /'bar ba'i 'phreng ba 'khrigs pa ste/ /mdza' dbus med par khyab pa yi/ /dkyil 'khor bsam yas lhun gyis
420a3(rgyud 'grel): grub/ /oM ma hA shu n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra b+hA ba ad ma ko haM/ oM mahA b+har sha dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba ad ma ko haM/ oM mahA pra ta pra be sha dz+nyan badzra swa b+ha ba ad ma ko haM/ oM ma hA sa man+ta dz+nyan badzra swa b+ha ba ad ma ko haM/ oM mahA kri ta a nu ta na dz+nya na badzra swa
420a4(rgyud 'grel): b+ha ba ad ma ko haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta mahA kA a badzra swa b+ha ba ad ma ko haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta mahA bAg badzra swa b+ha ba ad ma ko haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta mahA ci ta badzra swa b+ha ba ad ma ko haM/ sku gsung thugs dang ye shes lnga/ /dbang dang byin
420a5(rgyud 'grel): brlabs kun bsdus thim/ /dkyil 'khor shin tu gsal bar 'gyur/ sal sogs pa'i phyag rgya byas/ /rnam grol rim pa thob par 'gyur/ /dag pa'i ye shes kyis sbyangs na/ /smos ci dgos te de nyid yin/ /phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor
420a6(rgyud 'grel): gsal skyed la/ /dbang skur byin brlabs rdzogs byas la/ /stong gsum yungs 'brur 'jug tshul du/ /dbyings nas dkyil 'khor spyan drangs mchod/ /phyogs dus dkyil 'khor bdag nyid che/ /mi dmigs thugs kyi dkyil 'khor las/ /
420a7(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor thams cad spyan drang ngo/ /rang snang dbyer med dkyil 'khor la/ /'jug pa'i mtshan nyid mnyam sbyor ba/ /phyogs dus kun nas gshegs pa yi/ /bsnyen pa'i dkyil 'khor rab tu rdzogs/ /nye bar gyur pa'i dam tshig mchog /
420b1(rgyud 'grel): oM e hya hi b+ha ga bAn ma hA ka ru ni ka tri sh+ra ho/ /sa ma ya stoM/ dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho/ oM badzra sa ma ya oM/ aM badzra sa ma ya aM/ hUM badzra sa ma ya hUM/ swa badzra sa ma ya swa/ ha badzra sa ma ya ha/ oM badzra sa ma ya hUM/ oM badzra sa ma ya stoM/ oM badzra sa ma ya ho/ /dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM bo ho? ?stoM gdongs? dngos grub?
420b2(rgyud 'grel): gsol/ gnyis med thim bzhugs brnyes par bya/ /sgyu 'phrul dra bas mngon rdzogs pa'i/ /dbang po yul du gang gyur pa/ /mnyam pa'i dang nyid rtogs gas ya na/ /thams cad byang chub mchog gi rgya/ /skyong chen 'khor lo'i gzhal yas su/ /thabs dang shes rab thams cad kun/ /
420b3(rgyud 'grel): gsal zhing 'od zer 'phro bsgom na/ /sgul bskyod thams cad phyag rgya yin/ /gsang ba'i de nyid nges pa las/ /snying po'i phyag rgya 'da' dka' o/ /mi bskyod nyi ma'i dkyil yi ge /rin chen zla ba'i dkyil yi ge /lnga gnyis zung du spros pa las/ /
420b4(rgyud 'grel): sbyar ba'i phyag rgya 'byung ba'i rgyu/ /oM dang muM gnyis rtse sbyor te/ /'bru brgyad bsnol te rtse sprad na/ /rgyal ba kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /bde ba chen po 'byin pa'i rgya/ /'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan/ /hUM bsgreng rtse mo rdo rje 'bar/ /zla
