420b5(rgyud 'grel): gtul 'bru sbas dril bsil zhing/ /'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos la bstan/ /'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan/ /muM bsgreng rtse mo dril gsil 'bar/ /nyi ma 'bru lnga las su 'khril/ /btung de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis lta/ /'bru bzhi spas
420b6(rgyud 'grel): nas thugs kar bkan/ /aM bsgreng rtse mo 'khor lo 'bar/ /zla btul 'bru sbas dril gsil zhing/ /'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos la bstan/ /'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan/ /laM bsgreng rtse mo dril gsil zhing/ /nyi ma 'bru lnga las
420b7(rgyud 'grel): su 'khril/ /btung de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis lta/ /'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan/ /swa bsgreng rtsa mo rin chen 'bar/ /zla btul 'bru sbas dril gsil zhing/ /'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos la bstan/ /'bru bzhi sbas 
421a1(rgyud 'grel): nas thugs kar bkan/ /maM bsgreng rtse mo dril gsil 'bar/ /nyi ma 'bru lnga las su 'khril/ /btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis lta/ /'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan/ /aM sgreng rtse mo padmo 'bar/ /zla btul 'bru
421a2(rgyud 'grel): sbas dril gsil zhing/ /'khril pa'i tshul gyis chos la bstan/ /'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan/ /phyaM bsgrang rtse mo dril gsil 'bar/ /nyi ma 'bru lnga las su 'khril/ /btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis lta/ /'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs
421a3(rgyud 'grel): kar bkan/ /ha bsgreng rtse mo ral gri 'bar/ /zla btul 'bru sbas dril bsil zhing/ /'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos la bstan/ /'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan/ /taM bsgreng rtse mo padmo dril bsil zhing/ /nyi ma 'bru lnga las su
421a4(rgyud 'grel): 'khril/ /btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis lta/ /mchod pa'i phyag rgya chen po ni/ sems kyi yid bzhin sprin tshogs kyis/ /phyogs bcu thams cad sangs rgyas zhing/ /mnyen 'jam reg na bde ba dang/ /sna tshogs rin po che'i
421a5(rgyud 'grel): gzhi/ /mdzes par bres shing spras pa dang/ /kun 'byung rin chen phung por 'bar/ /dbyings legs rdzing bu ro mchog bsil/ /rin chen khang pa sna tshogs dang/ /rgyan dang dpag bsam ljon pa'i tshal/ /glu dbyangs tshigs su
421a6(rgyud 'grel): bcad pa'i sgra/ /bla re rgyal mtshan na bza' gdugs/ /dor gal? dpung rgyan se mo do/ /mdzes pa'i brgyan rnams sna tshogs dang/ /bza' dang btung ba'i tshogs rnams kyis/ /rang la mdzes par brgyan pa yis/ /lha dang lha mo
421a7(rgyud 'grel): rdul snyed kyis/ /bro gar la sogs bsam yas kyis/ /phyogs bcu nam mkha' i khams bkang nas/ /dkyil 'khor kun la rgyas par 'bul/ /skal ldan gsal ba'i khyad par gyis/ /rim gyis yang na cig car du/ /chos
421b1(rgyud 'grel): kyi dbyings dang mnyam sbyor zhing/ /mchod pa'i phyag rgya chen por bsgom/ /thob mar bdag nyid rtogs sgoms sgral/ /de nas gnyis med blo yis ni/ /blo ngan sems can snying re rje/ /gnyis su med par bsgral bar bya/ /gsal ldan ma 'am byin
421b2(rgyud 'grel): brlabs la/ /thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i/ /'khril ba'i mchod chen mnyam sbyor zhing/ /bdag nyid mnyes par mnyes par bya/ /mnyam pa'i sgrub rdzas chen po dag /bdag dang mnyam pa'i tshogs la dbul/ /bza' dang bca' dang
421b3(rgyud 'grel): btung ba sgo/ /longs spyod lnga ldan thams cad kyis/ /dkyil 'khor la ni dkyil 'khor thim/ /oM phyogs bcu dus bzhi rdzogs pa yi/ /ye shes dkyil 'khor thig le che/ /bsod nams dkyil 'khor sku'i tshogs/ /snang stong thig le kun rdzogs
421b4(rgyud 'grel): ho/ /oM rdo rje bsod nams thig le che/ /rdo rje ye shes dkyil 'khor ldan/ /rdo rje sgra chen mdza' yas pa/ /rdo rje rgyal po thig le che ho/ /oM sku gsung thugs kyi rdzogs pa che/ /yon tan 'phrin las sku ru rdzogs/ /ye nas lhun rdzogs kun tu 
421b5(rgyud 'grel): bzang/ /'dus pa'i tshogs chen thig le che ho/ /oM mi dmigs sgyu 'phrul mnyam pa'i dbyings/ /mdza' yas ye nas lhun gyis 'phro/ /mdza' yas kun nas lhun gyis thim/ /sna tshogs sku gsung thugs chen po ho/ /oM phyogs bcu 'jig
421b6(rgyud 'grel): rten rdul snyed du/ /rgyal ba'i don rnams rdul phran snyed/ /sprul pa rdul phran bsam yas kyis/ /skad cig yud la lhun gyis grub bo/ /oM thams cad ma lus sku gsung thugs/ /sku gsung thugs kyi bdag nyid che/ /sku gsung thugs kyis
421b7(rgyud 'grel): kun tu khyab/ /sku gsung thugs kyi thig le che ho/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba mngon rdzogs pa'i/ /dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i ting nge 'dzin/ /bro gar 'du 'phro phyag rgya yis/ /'dzul lam nam mkhar 'gro bar 'gyur/ /glu tshig sgra'i phyag rgya yis
422a1(rgyud 'grel): chos kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /brgyan dang bgo ba'i phyag rgya yis/ /'bar ba'i rgyal po thub med 'grub/ /bza' dang btung pa'i phyag rgya yis/ /yid bzhin sku dang bdud rtsi 'grub/ /A li kA li'i phyag rgya yis/
422a2(rgyud 'grel): thams cad thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /de'i zlas pa 'phrul che ni/ /rnam gsum tshul gyis ma 'khrul bar/ sngags zlas 'phro 'du rgyun mi bcad/ /'dris gsal bstan pa mchog gis bya/ /shes 'jug mtshan nyid 'byor pa'i
422a3(rgyud 'grel): gzungs/ /'bras bu smin byed rgyu dang rkyen/ /nus mthu can du gang gyur pa/ /rigs 'dzin rgyal ba'i zhing du grags/ /bsnyen pa rdzogs nas dkyil 'khor kun/ /hUM zhes brjod cing thugs kar bsdu/ /skye med mnyam rdzogs dbyings su
422a4(rgyud 'grel): bstim/ /stong pa'i go chas lus bsrung ste/ /spyod lam kun tu btsal med par/ /dkyil 'khor ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis/ /dkyil 'khor la ni dkyil 'khor bsgom/ /dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor las byung ba'i/ /thugs kyi
422a5(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor mchog /'gro dang 'dug dang nyal ba dang/ /mnyams pa'i dbyings na gnas/ /de yis byang chub snying po len/ /cho ga sngags dang yo byad rnams/ /rnal 'byor tshogs pa'i yo byad kyis/ /zhag ni sum
422a6(rgyud 'grel): cu phrag drug gam/ /bcu gnyis bcu bzhi bcu drug gis/ /dbang sgyur rigs kyi dam pa 'grub/ /de tshe bcu drug tshun tshad kyis/ /sku lnga lhun gyis rdzogs pa ni/ /ye shes thig le de nyid la/ /ye shes thig le nyid snang bas/ /
422a7(rgyud 'grel): bsam gyis mi khyab mdza' yas mchog /phyogs bcu dus bzhi rdzogs pa yi/ /zhing khams rnam dag gzhal yas dang/ /rgya dang bral ba'i gzhal yas khang/ /'khor lo'i rgyan dang rol mo'i tshogs/ /dkyil 'khor
422b1(rgyud 'grel): ma lus thams cad kun/ /mthong nas nye bar bsnyen pa dang/ /rgya chen gsung las don 'byung ba/ /mthun pa'i ye shes rang snang ba'o/ /gcig dang du ma bral ba yi/ /mdza' dang dbus med de bzhin nyid/ /sangs rgyas kyis kyang mi gzigs
422b2(rgyud 'grel): te/ /rang 'byung ye shes gnas med gnas/ /phyogs bcu dus bzhi mngon rdzogs pa'i/ /bde gshegs ye shes rmad po che/ /gzhan nas yod 'ong ma yin te/ /lha srin la sogs smos ci dgos/
422b3(rgyud 'grel): /rgyud kyi don las sgrub pa'i thabs/ /rin chen dra ba 'di bsdus pas/ /bcom ldan kun bzang sku gsung thugs/ /sems can kun gyis 'thob bar shog /dra ba chung ngu rdzogs so// //
422b4(rgyud 'grel): thams cad ngo bo mnyam nyid sku/ /bde chen gar dbang sku gsung thugs/ /mi zad rgyan gyis 'khor lo'i/ /he ru ka la phyag 'tshal te/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyud dag las/ /lha'i rnal 'byor rim pa zhig /sems can ye shes
422b5(rgyud 'grel): bskyed pa'i phyir/ /legs par bsdus te bstan par bya'o/ /slob dpon mnyes par ma byas shing/ /dbang rnams thob par ma byas par/ /nyan pa la sogs rtsom pa rnams/ /'bras bu med cing brlag par 'gyur/ /yi
422b6(rgyud 'grel): ge sgra btags ming tshogs la/ /brten pa'i tshig gis rab mtshon te/ /khong nas gab sbas don 'byin pa/ /ston pa rdo rje'i thugs la gnas/ /'di ni gsang chen nges pa yis/ /'bras bu lam du gyur pa yin/ /rgyal
422b7(rgyud 'grel): ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus la/ /de las gsang pa'i nges don med/ /kun gyi phyag rgya chen po'i tshogs/ /thos bsam sgom la rab sbyangs pa'i/ /shes rab mig ldan rnams kyis bzung/ /snod ldan ngang tshul can la
423a1(rgyud 'grel): bstan/ /lus dang longs spyod gtong la sbyin/ /gzhan du rnams kyang sbyin mi bya/ /rmongs la 'phyang bas gal te byin/ /dus min par ni srog zad nas/ /bsregs dang sbrebs par yun rings gnas/ /gang gis
423a2(rgyud 'grel): glang chen smyo 'dra'i sems/ /mnyam par gzhag pas gtul nas su/ /sngags dang phyag rgya rab bstan na/ /dngos grub mtshan chen por 'gyur/ /dur khrod chen por rab dben pa'i/ /ri bos bskor ba'i lcug ma dang/ /
423a3(rgyud 'grel): me tog 'phreng bas brgyad pa 'am/ /bde ba'i gnas su 'dug nas ni/ /'dzin pa'i dbang gis sdug bsngal zhing/ /gdug pa srid gsum gdul ba yi/ /nga rgyal chen po bstan pa'i phyir/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i ting 'dzin
423a4(rgyud 'grel): bsgom/ /e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyis gang/ /skye ba med las thams cad skyes/ /skyes pa nyid na skye ba med/ /stong pa nyid du rab bsal ba'i/ /snying rje'i yum ni bsgom par bya/ /
423a5(rgyud 'grel): nges pa las ni rdo rje che/ /de las dpal chen ha ru ka /'bar ba chen po gar dgu yis/ /'jigs pa yi ni dus ltar drug /baM hUM bi shwa ri shud de/ /dur khrod chen po rab 'jigs pa'i/ /khrag gi rgya mtsho 'khrugs
423a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dkyil/ /keng rus chen po ri rab kyi/ /steng gi 'bar ba'i klong dkyil na/ /ye shes 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang/ /phyogs bcu rgya yongs ma chad pa'i/ /phyi dang nang med kun tu snang/ /'bar ba'i
423a7(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi la/ /gru chad bzhis ni rnam par brgyan/ /gru bzhi sgo khyud bzhi dang ldan/ /'bar ba'i bar 'khyams gnyis kyis mdzes/ /thod sprul sna tshogs nyi mas brjid/ /'bar ba'i 'phro ba mang
423b1(rgyud 'grel): bo 'khrug khyu mchog ma he gzig dang stag /gtum pa dom gyi sbar bas ni/ /dbang phyug la sogs lha chen bzung/ /bdag nyid sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje'i bdag /khro rgyal ye nas yin pa'i phyir
423b2(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nas ni/ /khro mo dbang phyug mngon phyung ste/ /hi hi dgyes pa'i gzi mdangs kyis/ /rin chen pad+ma rgyas mdzad nas/ /gnyis med 'khril ba'i dgyes pas bstim/ /byang chub sems sprin 'phros pa
423b3(rgyud 'grel): las/ /hUM hUM hUM /bi shwa badzra kro d+ha /dzwa la man d+ha/ phaT phaT phaT /ha la ha la hUM/ 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu dag /mdza' yas khyab par khro bo yi/ /dkyil 'khor stong gsum 'jig rten
423b4(rgyud 'grel): tsam/ /phyogs bcu'i rdul snyed 'thon par 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes chen po/ /dbu dang phyag zhabs stong khams kyi/ /rdul snyed mtshon cha 'jigs pa de/ /dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir gyur/ /
423b5(rgyud 'grel): 'bar chen klong gi 'khor lo dkyil/ /dbang phyug che dang dur khrod kyi/ /bdag po dregs pa khyo shug gi /gdan la brkyang bskum tshul du bzhugs/ /khro bo dkyil 'khor sprin phung yang/ /dpal ni khrag 'thung
423b6(rgyud 'grel): chen po dang/ /rin po che dang pad+ma dang/ /lus su gyur te phyogs bzhir bzhugs/ /de kun 'jigs byed chen po yi/ /cha lugs rngam pa'i nga ro yis/ /'bar ba'i klong na dbu gsum pa/ /
423b7(rgyud 'grel): phyag drug zhabs bzhi dri ma dang/ /gnod sbyin srin po gshin rje la sogs pa'i/ /khyo shug bsnol ba'i gdan la bzhugs/ /btsun mo khrag 'thung chen mo rnams/ /so so'i sku la 'khril te 'khod/ /de
424a1(rgyud 'grel): nas dgyes te ha brjod pas/ /byang chub sems kyi sbyin dag las/ /dkar mo'i tshogs dang rkun mo dang/ /rmongs mo dang ni thal byed ma/ /spos mo dang ni gtum mo dang/ /dme sha can dang ma tshogs ma'i/ /tshogs rnams rang
424a2(rgyud 'grel): gi lag cha dang/ /ngo mtshar chas nas rngam mthon te/ /'bar chen 'khor lo'i shar mtshams nas/ /'khor bar 'jigs pa'i gzugs kyis 'khod/ /de nas dgyes te he brjod pas/ /seng gdong ma'i tshogs dang ni/ /stag dang wa dang khyi dang
424a3(rgyud 'grel): bzhad kaM ka ru ra bya 'ug gdong che/ /tshogs rnams rang gi lag cha dang/ /ngo mtshar dag tu chas nas 'thon/ /'bar ba chen po'i 'khor lo yi/ /phyi rol shar gyi phyogs dag nas/ /'khor bar rngam pa'i mdangs kyis 'khod/ /de nas dgyes
424a4(rgyud 'grel): te phaT brjod pas/ /rdo rje sring 'gro ma tshogs dang/ /gdong mo 'jig rten ro langs ma'i/ /tshogs rnams rang gi lag cha dang/ /ngo mtshar chas nas 'jigs mthon te/ /dkyil 'khor sgo bzhir rngam gzugs nas/ /dgyes pa'i sprin
424a5(rgyud 'grel): las phyogs bcu nas/ /phaT ces grags pas thams cad khros/ /de nas dpal chen kho bo'i rigs/ /lhun gyis grub par bya ba'i phyir/ /rang gi ngang tshul de bzung la/ /skul tshig 'di yang rab tu brjod/ /oM sngon gyi thugs dam chen po ni/
424a6(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten ma lus thams cad kun/ /rgyal ba'i zhing du sbyor bas ni/ /phyag rgya chen por bdag sbyor cig /thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i/ /ye shes gzer gyis lung rtog sbyangs/ /gser zhun lta bu'i sems dag la/ /gsum gyi byin
424a7(rgyud 'grel): brlabs 'od kyi 'bru/ /thugs kar thim nas sku'i dbyig /rdo rje lam 'byung yum gyi mkha' / /chos sku byang chub sems kyi gnas/ /lha rnams so so'i snying po'i sgra/ /hUM ha ho phaT ces byung nas/ /byang chub sems su gcig par thim/ /de nas
324b1(rgyud 'grel): snying po dran tsam gyis/ /gsung gi phyag rgya gnyis rdzogs nas/ /'od zer 'phro 'du'i sbyor ba yis/ /thugs kyi phyag rgya rab tu 'bar/ /de las 'phra mo'i sku spro bsdu/ /phyag rgya chen po'i sku gnyis rdzogs/ /oM mahA shu n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba ad ma ko haM /
324b2(rgyud 'grel): oM mahA a da ri sha dz+nyA na badzra b+ha ba ad ma ko haM /oM mahA pra ta pre be sha dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba ad ma ko haM/ oM ma hA sa mAn+ta dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba ad ma ko haM/ oM mahA kri ta a nu ta na dz+nyA na swa b+hA ba ad ma ko haM /oM sarbaM ta thA ga ta ma hA ka ya swa b+hA wa ad ma
324b3(rgyud 'grel): ko haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA bAg badzra swa b+hA ba adma ko haM/ oM sarbba ta thA ga ta ma ha tsi ta badzra swa b+hA ba ad ma ko haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA a nu ra ga badzra swa b+hA ba ad ma ko haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA pU tsa badzra swa b+hA ba ad ma ko haM/ rdo rje pad+mar
324b4(rgyud 'grel): byin rlabs pa /hUM las rdo rje rtse lnga ba/ /ba las padmor gyur pa'i dbus/ /ma las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsam/ /sha ta pa la sogs pa yis/ /bskul ba dag kyang tshul bzhin bya/ /bsnyen pa dang ni nye bsnyen po/ /bsgrub pa dang ni bsgrub
324b5(rgyud 'grel): chen po/ /yum gyi pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor du/ /bde ba thugs kyi dkyil 'khor spro/ /sangs rgyas sbrin tshogs ma lus la/ /dgyes mnyam mchog gi sbyin pas bstim/ /de las dkyil 'khor gsal bar dgod/ /oM oM sarba ta thA ga ta/ ma hA
324b6(rgyud 'grel): sh+ri he ru ka ma tsam d+ha sarba duSh+Tan ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hUM hUM hUM phaT/ /oM badzra ma hA sh+rI he ru ka ma hA tsan d+ha sarba duSh+Tan/ ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hUM hUM hUM phaT/ /oM ratna mahA sh+rI he ru ka /ma hA tsan d+ha sarba duSh+Tan ta ka na d+ha ha pa tsa hUM hUM hUM phaT/ /
324b7(rgyud 'grel): oM pad+ma mahA sh+rI he ru ka/ mahA tsan d+ha sarba du stan/ /ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hUM hUM hUM phaT/ /oM karma ma hA sh+rI he ru ka mahA tsan d+ha sarba dustan ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hUM hUM hUM phaT/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA kro ti shwa ri sarba dustan hUM phaT/ oM badzra d+ha ra
425a1(rgyud 'grel): ma hA kro d+hi shwa ri dzwa la ni hUM phaT/ oM ma hA su rya ratna ma hA kro ti shwa ri bi da ma hUM phaT/ oM h+ri shwa ta sa ma ya/ mahA kro ti shwa ri ka'i hUM phaT/ oM sarba a mo ga ma hA kro d+hi shwa ri bi shwa hUM phaT/ oM badzra ke'u ri ha/ badzra
425a2(rgyud 'grel): tsi'u ri ha /badzra pra mo ha/ badzra pe ta li ha/ /badzra bu ka si ha/ badzra ka sa ma h+ri ha/ badzra tsan d+ha li ha/ oM badzra sing ha mu ka he/ badzra bya gri mu ga te/ badzra si la mu ka he/ badzra sho na mu ka te/ badzra kri ta mu ka he/ badzra kang ka
425a3(rgyud 'grel): mu ka he/ badzra khwa kha mu kha he/ badzra u lu ka mu ka he/ oM badzra arya te dza te da dza/ badzra a mu ka hUM/ badzra lo ga baM/ badzra pasmi pa la ya ti ho// //b+hyo b+hyo b+hyo b+hyo b+hyo b+hyo b+hyo/ b+hyo b+hyo b+hyo b+hyo b+hyo b+hyo b+hyo/ b+hyo b+hyo
425a4(rgyud 'grel): b+hyo b+hyo b+hyo b+hyo b+hyo/ b+hyo b+hyo b+hyo b+hyo b+hyo b+hyo b+hyo/ /sa la sogs la phyag rgya byas/ /rnam grol rim pa thob par 'gyur/ /dag pa'i ye shes kyis sbyangs na/ /smos ci dgos te de nyid yin/ /phyogs dus dkyil 'khor bdag nyid che/ /mi
425a5(rgyud 'grel): dmigs thugs kyi dkyil 'khor las/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad spyan drang ngo/ /rang snang dbyer med dkyil 'khor la/ /'jug pa'i mtshan nyid mnyam sbyor pas/ /phyogs dus kun nas gshegs pa yi/ /bsnyan pa'i dkyil
425a6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor rab tu rdzogs/ /nye bar gyur pa'i dam tshig mchog /oM ru lu ru lu hUM b+hyo hUM/ e hye hi a na ya badzra/ dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): hoM raM/ oM badzra kro ta sa ma ya hUM/ oM khro la khros pas zhi mdzad pa/ /thugs rje khro dpal rngam pa'i tshogs
425a7(rgyud 'grel): 'bar ba'i byin rlabs rmad po che/ /de nyid du ni bdag la gsol/ /oM badzra kro ta sa ma ya stoM/ /oM badzra kro ta sa ma ya phaT/ oM badzra kro ta sa ma ya ho/ /a li u li ta la ta pa te/ traM stoM kho go na/ rau ti kha raM yo gi ni kha hi hUM ha
425b1(rgyud 'grel): hi phaT/ smug nag sngo nag ser nag dang/ /dmar nag ljang nag 'jigs pa'i sku/ /dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad/ /ko rlon gos ni sna tshogs gon/ /rngam pa'i sgra chen 'jigs par bsgrogs/ /sprul dang thod rlon nyi zlar bcas/ /stong gi 'jig
425b2(rgyud 'grel): rten 'khor yug bcas/ /rdo rje dung chen gang ba dang/ /ral gri dgra sta gshol la sogs/ /rang gi lag cha sna tshogs dang/ /btsun mo 'jigs pa'i tshogs dang 'khril/ /gnas dang yul gyi phyag rgya dang/ /sgo bzhi'i phyag rgya rab mdzes shing/ /
425b3(rgyud 'grel): slas dang byi mo bran mo'i tshogs/ /bcu gnyis dang ni brgyad kyis mdzes/ /rang gi stan dang lag cha dang/ ci bgyi zhes te chas te gnas/ /de ltar dkyil 'khor gsal bkod nas/ /mdza' dbus med par khyab pa yi/ /'jig rten drug gi
425b4(rgyud 'grel): phyogs bcun/ /'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor gsal bar snang/ /hUM gtum chen dus mdza' i me ltar 'bar/ /'od zer nyi ma 'bum gyi gzi/ /khro gnyer glog stong 'gyu ba bzhin/ /mche ba zang yag za byed che ho/ /hUM rnam pa'i nga ro 'brug
425b5(rgyud 'grel): stong ldir/ /tug? chen ri rab 'bum snying skad/ /a a ha la'i gad rgyangs che/ /dbyugs pa'i thur rlung g.yeng ba che ho/ /hUM/ khros pa'i shes rab 'od po che/ /ye shes dkyil 'khor kun tu gsal/ /'bar ba'i ye shes kun tu 'joms
425b6(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs ye shes thig le ho/ /hUM khros pa'i rgyal po sprin chen po/ /khros pa'i rgyal po char chen 'babs/ /dkyil 'khor yid bzhin 'byung ba'i gter/ /sna tshogs khros pa'i thig le che ho/ /hUM bdud kun gyi ni bdud chen po/ /bdud kyi
425b7(rgyud 'grel): bdud de bdud rnams 'joms/ /'jigs pa'i tshogs kyang 'jigs par byed/ /'jigs byed chen po thig le che ho/ /hUM rdo rje brag chen sra ba'o/ /rdo rje chu bo bdud chen po/ /rdo rje me ste kun 'bar che/ /rdo rje rlung chen thor rlung che ho/ /
426a1(rgyud 'grel): yan lag ma nyams yo byad ldan/ /cho ga rdzogs par shes pa yi/ /rnal 'byor tshogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi/ /nges par legs pa'i dgos pa 'grub/ /khro bo khro mo'i tshogs chen po/ /pho nya phyag nyan bka' 
426a2(rgyud 'grel): nyan tshogs/ /ci bgyi las sogs tshogs rnams kyis/ /dngos grub las rnams rdzogs par byed/ /de nas dkyil 'khor thams cad kun/ /rang gi snying gar bsdu ba ni/ /hUM hUM zhes ni rab brjod nas/ /'dus pa de nyid ci bder spyod/ /de ltar dkyil 'khor
426a3(rgyud 'grel): bsdus nas kyang/ rnal 'byor bdag nyid chen po yis/ /spyod lam kun tu ma nyams shing/ /lha nyid du ni rtag tu bsgom/ /phung po lnga nyid khro rgyal gtso/ /chen po lnga nyid dbang phyug yum/ /skye mched khams rnams ma lus kun/ /thugs
426a4(rgyud 'grel): rje rngam pa'i dkyil 'khor tshogs/ /rgyu gcig pa dang yig 'bru'i tshul/ /byin gyis brlabs dang mngon sum par/ /rab tu rtogs pa rnams bzhi yis/ /thams cad mngon rdzogs rgyal po che ho/ /phyogs bcu dus bzhi rdzogs pa yin
426a5(rgyud 'grel): sku gsung yon tan 'phrin las thugs/ /ma lus bdag nyid zhal mthong ba/ /dbang sgyur mchog nyid dam pa yin/ /bsgrub pa'i thabs 'di bsdus pa yis/ /bsod nams bdag gis gang thob pa/ /dpal chen kun bzang sku gsung thugs/
426a6(rgyud 'grel): sems can kun gyis thob par shog /de kho na nyid snang ba dam pa brgyan rdzogs so// //dpal gyi dpal gsum nyid ldan rdo rje lta bu'i ye shes 'dus ma byas/ /ma btsal lnga rdzogs skyon bral mi shigs dbyangs
426a7(rgyud 'grel): nyid ye shes 'du 'bral med/ /lnga yis grub nyid gnyis med dang gsal/ /mi g.yo mi sems sems chen po/ /'phrin las bzhi bcom dpa' bo rang nyid lha'i lha la gnyis med mos/ /gsang ba'i bdag po mngon gshegs nas/ /lha klu
426b1(rgyud 'grel): gnod sbyin srin po dang/ /mi las skal ldan 'dus pa la/ /dbang pos ji ltar lung bstan dus/ /rgyal bu rigs can ltas shar ba/ /'brel ba snang la mngon brtags pas/ /thugs kyi sgrub pa mngon rtogs te/ /de nyid sgo nas de nyid grub/ /bstan pa'i dngos
426b2(rgyud 'grel): grub de nas thob/ /don dam bcud kyis de nas rgyas/ /'dod pa'i bsams pa de ru 'grub/ /smon pa'i lha dang de ru 'jal/ /de nas rdo rje gdan stengs kyi/ /'dzam gling shar gyi phyogs mtshams su/ /pho brang dam pa rin chen nang/ /bkra shis dam pa'i khang
426b3(rgyud 'grel): pa ru/ /ku ku ra tsa in+t+ra bo ti dang/ /sing da u pa ra tsa dang/ /sras mo 'go ma sa la sogs/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i dbang thob nas/ /tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mngon bsgrubs te/ /rdo rje 'chad sar mngon du gshegs/ /de phyir sangs rgyas mtshan thob pas/
426b4(rgyud 'grel): dam pa'i rigs can dra ma dang/ /de rjes ma 'ongs skal ldan phyir/ /stong phrag brgya'i rgyud dag las/ /gshegs shul lam mchog 'dir bsdus te/ /snyigs ma'i rgyud drag dus kyi tshe/ /dus kyi 'dul phyir bstan par bya'o/ /spyan bzangs 'gro
426b5(rgyud 'grel): mthu med pa yi/ /dmigs bu bral ba'i nyams stor bas/ /bgrod cing phyin par mi nus bzhin/ /rtsid po rmu dgod rang nyams kyis/ /gsang ba'i snying por mi 'gyur te/ /bud shing me tog 'bras bzhin 'gyur/ /de bas bla ma lung bzhin bskur/ /brtag
426b6(rgyud 'grel): spyo zha gcod bzod bya ste/ /mthong ba'i gdung ba khur mi lta/ /de kun yum gyi don du bzod/ /dka' bas bsten na rdo rje rgyal/ /nyams snang mthong zer thob 'gyur te/ /de tshe rgyud chen gzhung gi yon/ /phul na thugs kyi nying khu ster/ /de yis bzhon
426b7(rgyud 'grel): pa bzang 'gro bzhin/ /gsang ba'i rdzu 'phrul stobs zhon pas/ /mthong 'jug mthar phyin bzhi bgrod nas/ /ye shes snying po'i gnas su phyin/ /de bas rdo rje gnyer ldan pas/ /rgyang drung sems spra mkha' 'gro yi/ /gsang sngags ltas ston spyo ba
427a1(rgyud 'grel): yis/ /ci nas brtags te bzang ldan na/ /mi ldog brtan byas rtas pa yi/ /shi sha gang yin lag tu gtad/ /ngan ba'i ltas mthong mngon shes pas/ /'dod pa 'phro mo'i rgyur byed dang/ /khe dang grags pa che ba'i rgyu/ /
427a2(rgyud 'grel): byed cing bcung chen 'dzag dang 'go /ma chags ma rungs byed pa dang/ /zang zing mdza' gtong dbus 'ching dang/ /g.yon can ngo dga' lhag sprang skur/ /lkog na rang dgar byed pa dang/ /dag la rigs nges bsam mi nges/ /bud med 'dod
427a3(rgyud 'grel): bas byal ba dang/ /mun ldog phrad par 'dod spyod snyeg /pho mo gtad trar ma sngags la/ /skal bar dri bzhin 'khor 'gyur yang/ /thugs kyi bde ba spro mi bya/ /'tsham par skur bstan gcan 'phran bzhin/ /de men pe sbrel g.yang 'gyur
427a4(rgyud 'grel): bzhin/ /'dod khes 'bogs shing bcas 'phyar bas/ /ma gtogs spros na dur khrod gling/ /brgyad kyi mkha' 'gro bzhin 'dus nas/ /sha za srog la 'bebs shing lhung/ /de ltar brtags pa'i skal ldan phyir/ /rang bzhin ye
427a5(rgyud 'grel): shes rang gnas dang/ /der mthong der 'jug rnal 'byor bzhi/ /bar chad med bsgrub rnam par smin/ /sbas sgyur phyag rgya lhun grub lam/ /mngon byas rim pa brjod par bya/ /de la dang po nyid spros pas/ /de nyid de yis shes
427a6(rgyud 'grel): bya ba/ /phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i rang bzhin 'di/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid/ /'khor ba sems phyir bdag med pas/ /de phyir de bzhin gshegs bsam yas/ /'khor ba'i rang bzhin mi dmigs phyir/ /mya ngan
427a7(rgyud 'grel): 'das ba yod ma yin/ /de ltar rigs dang rgyud med par/ /byang chub mchog gi ngo bo la/ /so so'i rang bzhin nges shes na/ /yang dag lam gyis bcos su med/ /yang dag gshegs dang log rtog gnyis/ /ngo bo nyid kyis gnas gyur na
427b1(rgyud 'grel): de la bcos shing bsgyur du med/ /'ching bu rin chen bzhin mi rigs/ /de bas de lta 'di bzhin pas/ /ma rig log rtogs zhags pa'i rgyus/ /las dang nyon mongs rgyu rkyen gyis/ /bcu gnyis 'khor lo gnas su skyar/ /rten dang 'dod pa tha dad pa'i/ /
427b2(rgyud 'grel): bde sdug gdung pas nyam thag bral/ rtsom med bzhi dus kun du nyams/ /rang bzhin nyid las nyams pa med/ /de lta'ang rgyal po phru gur 'khyams/ /de bzhin rigs la 'gyur med pas/ /shul don rang las gzhan med phyir/ /'phrul
427b3(rgyud 'grel): dga' i tshul gzhan nya dang zer du min/ /de'ang rnams gsum gnas tshul gzhag /'bru lnga gnas pa'i thabs chen po/ /'gro ba kun la rang gnas te/ /dkyil 'khor bzhi dang srog shing gsum/ /gnas na ka la sgra dbyangs ldan/ /e raM
427b4(rgyud 'grel): ma ya mkha' ldan dang/ /snying po rlung sgrom gnas na yod/ /de yis tan+t+ra 'byin par byed/ /de don de na chos nyid dang/ /ye shes yon tan las nyid dngos/ /rnal 'byor lam rim rang bzhin ldan/ /snod kyi 'od dbyibs 'phrin las bzhi//
427b5(rgyud 'grel): thig le bsnyen bsgrub rang bzhin ldan/ /bzhi brgyad kshi ra ma dal/ /ra ya g.yas g.yon sbyin sreg ldan/ /gnas bzhi 'byung ba las bzhi ste/ /gsang ba'i mkha' la rang bzhin ldan/ /gnas rten rtsa dang thig le la/ /bcu dbang lnga gsum
427b6(rgyud 'grel): dbang rnams ldan/ /gsang ba nang gi 'dod yon dang/ /dam rdzas lnga ldan mchod pa ste/ /de dag rang gnas mi 'du ba/ /rang bzhin gsang ba'i sa ma ya/ /rang bzhin phyi nang gsang ba yi/ /'du byed sprod pa dang gi gnas/ /chags pas
427b7(rgyud 'grel): 'khams? 'grub? cig shes kyi/ /rang bzhin ye shes 'grub byed pa'o/ /rdo rje phung po yan lag kun/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sngar grags sogs/ /dngos kun chags dang ngang tshul gyis/ /las dang ngo bo 'bras bur gnas/ /chu zla sgyu
428a1(rgyud 'grel): ma sprul pa bzhin/ /phung po khams dang skye mched rnams/ /bzhi rdzogs phyag rgya ma 'dres gsal/ /cir yang 'gyur zhing cir yang 'grub/ /bar ma lam dang 'bras bu rnams/ /gang yang rigs rgyud rtag med pas
428a2(rgyud 'grel): sems phyir kun kyang de de dang gzugs gnyis mtshan gsum yod dang med/ /gnas ris sde cha yod min sogs/ /gnyis yul bral bzhin de ldan pa'i/ /don mchog lnga 'bras ye shes dbyings/ /bdun dang gsum phyir don dam la/ /dpag
428a3(rgyud 'grel): bsam shing dang rin chen ltar/ /de kun ngo bo nyid rgyur gnas/ /'jig rten brtan g.yo la sogs pa/ /snang ba nyid na ngo bo med/ /de nyid chos sku chen po yin/ /rang bzhin ngang gis de ltar gnas/ /de las gzhan ba'i thob bya med/ /kun
428a4(rgyud 'grel): kyang smin zin bgrod pa med/ /de nyid lam gyi'ang ngo bo ste/ /'jug gnas 'byin bas che ba yin/ /phyogs bcu ma lus thams cad la/ /rang 'byung chen pos kun tu khyab/ /rang 'byung de nyid dngos med par/ /kun gyi phyag rgya'i
428a5(rgyud 'grel): rgyu yin phyir/ /de lta bu'i dang du nges/ /de bzhin nyid dbyings ye shes te/ /thabs kyi phyag rgya kun gyi rgyu/ /ming grangs med pa'i rgyu nyid dang/ /yongs su rdzogs pa zhes kyang brjod/ /gsum pa dngos por zhen pa'i/ /mya ngan 'das dang
428a6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor ba'i chos/ /ye nas rigs rgyud rtag min pas/ /so so'i gzugs sgra dri ro reg /chos kyi bye brag tha snyad kun/ /'ja' snang mkha' ltar ma 'dres shig /'dus ma byas pas 'dus byas snang/ /'dus byas snang ba rdo rje nyid/ /rgyal
428a7(rgyud 'grel): 'gros mi mdzad pa bcos pas/ /rang bzhin rang gis dbyer med pa'ang/ /de min zhen pas sgrol phyir las/ /tha snyad gnyis par bsam brjod 'das/ /yul dang shes par snang ba yang/ /rang 'byung ye shes rang snang zad/ /rgyu 'bras
428b1(rgyud 'grel): snang yang gnyis pa med/ /phyi nang gsal ba'ang nang nyid dang/ /de ltar ye shes rang snang ba/ /lam dang 'bras bu kun dngos pas/ /'brel pa bdag phyir thabs chen pos/ /mngon byed rang las 'byung bar zad/ /ye shes rang la gnas pa'i le'u ste dang po'o/ /lhun
428b2(rgyud 'grel): grub dang la phyag btsal nas/ /dang por lam mchog bshad par bya/ /gang dag rang gnas mthong 'dod dgos/ /dus snod rgyu rkyen thabs grangs dngos spyod yon drod rtags tshad dang skyon/ /yan lag spros pa'i rtsa bar gzhag /bsam gyis mi khyab ma mthong bar//
428b3(rgyud 'grel): bsam med dkyil 'khor 'jug byed pa/ /blun po mun sprul blo can de/ /long ba'i grong khyer chen por 'gro /de bas ma rig gi ling thog dmig /ldongs pa rdo rje thur ma mkhan/ /mnyes thob sngon byas gzhung thos pas/ /spyan phyed dkyil 'khor mthong bya
428b4(rgyud 'grel): dgos/ /de yang rang bzhin sbyangs pa yis/ /snod du gyur pa'i nye ring phyir/ /rims dang cig car bzhi cha yis/ /phye bas rnal 'byor chen por 'jug /bskal pa zhing gi rdul snyed du/ /shin tu sbyangs la rab gnas pa'i/ /shes rab mi ldan 'dir 'jug
428b5(rgyud 'grel): phyir/ /ring ba'ang rims dang cig car pa'o/ /snga ma 'ang tan+t+ra gzhung nyid las/ /sa rnams khyad par bskor ba yang/ /gsang ba'i snying por 'gro ba'i lam/ /theg pa bzhi'i nges 'byung la/ /theg pa gcig gi 'bras bur gnas/ /lam stegs
428b6(rgyud 'grel): sngon? du rdzogs par sbyor/ /de phyir ma nges rigs mchog nas/ /mun pa'i shes pa pa ste gnyer/ /rang bzhin sgyu yis smyung bar gnas/ /phal pa'i sems brgyad mthar gnas tshe/ /snying po rang bzhin mtshungs pa dang/ /gshes gnyen mgon la
428b7(rgyud 'grel): phung? gnyis thos/ /yon tan mthong dang skyon mthong dang/ /kyis zer da yis skyon rmongs phrod dang ba/ /gnyis pa'i sgyu ru gsungs pa yin/ /de bdag gsang tshogs dmigs pa ste/ /skad cig 'phel ba de ma thag /drug las rtswa me bzhin g.yos 
429a1(rgyud 'grel): ste/ /bzhi'i theg pa dang bor zhog /bden zer de nas rims bzhin bgrod bya ste/ /rgyu nas rkyen gyis 'phar ba de dang zer/ /rnal 'byor rgyud la gnas pa la/ /'di ston mgon la lung thos pas/ /de ji bzhin du gnyis
429a2(rgyud 'grel): dang bzhis/ /mchog gi g.yo ba'i sems 'byung 'gyur/ /bzhi des khong du chud smos pas/ /lhag par gzugs brnyan 'jug par byed/ /mchog gi dam tshig de ru byin/ /rigs nges gyur la phan pa bcu/ /nus pa gnyis kyi byin
429a3(rgyud 'grel): brlabs bzhag /rang gi spyan mchog byed pa brtson/ /rgyu'i dkyil 'khor mthong bya'i phyir/ /thos bsam dam pa len par byed/ /kha cig dus mdza' i cig car ba/ /bskal pa rdul snyed sngon song nas/ /thun mong de rnyed sbyangs pa'i
429a4(rgyud 'grel): mdza' / /sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i don zhugs ba'ang/ /sngon byas 'di che nges 'byung ba/ /rims kyis sbyangs la cig car drod/ /la la dbang po rno ba dag /theg pa chen po gnyis 'jug ste/ /ma sbyangs sgrub pa gsum phyir gyi/ /mtho brtan
429a5(rgyud 'grel): myur rno rgya che yang/ zab mo sgyu'i gang zag de/ /nyid kyang rkyen dang de rim pas/ /phye bas rgyu 'bras chen po rnams/ /ma nges 'jug dang 'di nyid do/ /de de 'ang rang sems brtan pa'i dngos/ /bshes gnyen rnams dang ngo bos
429a6(rgyud 'grel): 'bral/ /de ltar bya byed snod bcud du/ /chen po'i lung dang 'brel ba dang/ /mgon dang bya byed thugs rjes 'brel/ /de phyir mchog lung rdo rje rnams/ /dang 'byal byed phyir rgyu rkyen drug /ldan bas ma nges 'jug pa ni/ /dbang po
429a7(rgyud 'grel): ji bzhin mos rkyen gyis/ /rgyu 'am bya ba 'am gnyis ka'o/ /rnal 'byor theg par sbyor bar byed/ /de nas de bzhin 'dir 'jug pa'ang/ /sngon bzhin g.yo smon 'jug sems sbyor/ /gnas pas mthar phyin byed pas ni/ /
429b1(rgyud 'grel): ltos pa ring ba'i dus nyid do/ /ma nges sa nas 'brel rgyu rkyen/ /ldan pas rnal 'byor mchog sbyor ba/ /mun pa'i zer tshul rtswa me bzhin/ /g.yo smon 'jug pa sngon bzhin te/ /bdud ldan pa'ang tan+t+ra yin/ /gzhung gi dang tshul rang bzhin sogs/ /snod yon ldan pa bslab
429b2(rgyud 'grel): pa la/ /gnas pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po ru/ /'jug pa bzhi'i yan lag mchog /dang po ched du gnyer bar byed/ /gang de thos pas tshol ba'i tshe/ /rgyu gnyis rkyen gyis bzod thob pas/ /rang bzhin rang gis bzod thob pa/ /res smon sems kyis
429b3(rgyud 'grel): nyan brtson sbyor/ /gang dag mnyan bsam shes rab tshe/ /nyan cing thos 'dzin bsam pa dang/ /bsam pa'i tshe na stag spyod pa/ /gnyis po 'di dag shes pa'i rgyu/ /mkhan po lung dang man ngag bcas/ /lhan cig byed pa'i rkyen du 'dod/ /rang bzhin
429b4(rgyud 'grel): bdud dang mtshungs ldan pa/ /cig shes rgyu ru nges pa yin/ /de ltar ldan pas spyan tshol tshe/ /gtan tshigs rnams kyis smal byas te/ /nor pa'i shes rab dmigs gsal nas/ /ma nor dmigs nas blang bar bya/ /gzhi dang gtan tshigs grub pa'i
429b5(rgyud 'grel): don/ /rnam gsum lnga pa'i bzhi ru gzhag /yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas ston pa/ /sku lnga 'dul ba'i 'khor rnams la/ /gsung lngas bstan pa de kho na/ /gtan pa phebs shing gzhan byed pa'o/ /de nyid dngos lnga tshul dang tshig /brjod pa lngas
429b6(rgyud 'grel): mtshon byung ba bzhi/ /de la gtan tshigs dngos lnga yis/ /brda' sprong rjes su 'jug pa bstan pa'ang/ /bsregs bcad brdar ba'i gser bzhin du/ /dngos lngas legs par btags te dbab/ /de yang yongs su brtags bzhi'i/ /dbang po yul
429b7(rgyud 'grel): dang snang ba kun/ /yul rnams yod pa ma yin te/ /kun gzhi rnam par shes pa nyid/ /dngos po sna tshogs par snang bas/ /'khor dang 'das dngos zhe sdang brtag /'jig rten 'di na ci yod pa'i/ /ming dang mtshan mar 'dzin pa yi/ /log rtog
430a1(rgyud 'grel): so so rang spyi'i mtshan/ /ji ltar gnas par spyad par bya/ /dngos gnyes zhen dngos dus gsum chos/ /skad cig gcig la kun rdzogs phyir/ /de dngos mthong ba yang dag par/ /rigs bzhi kun kyang de ltar shes//
430a2(rgyud 'grel): kun brtags shes pa bar mar 'gyur/ /spyi'i yul lus med grib ma bzhin/ /med pas mi btub rang nyid la/ /mi btub mdzub mo bzhin dogs pa/ /gnyen po med pa dag min zhing/ /bar ma'i yul phyir nges tshig 'grub/ /de ltar lnga yis
430a3(rgyud 'grel): de de la/ /de de'i rang bzhin rtag bya ba'ang/ /rtog dang ldan pa'i mi rnams la/ /dngos po sna tshogs sems gsang sngags/ /des lung yin phyir chos tshur ston/ /brjod dang 'dra bar brda sprod pas/ /ngo bo nyid kyis bshad pa'i phyir/ /
430a4(rgyud 'grel): ma 'ongs don du gtan tshigs nges/ /yod ni sa gnas mi ldan pa/ /rang bzhin shugs kyis skye med don/ /ma btsal ngang gis snang byed pa/ /brjod med de nyid brjod dang 'dra/ /gang dag gzugs dang rnal 'byor gyis/ /mthong thos la
430a5(rgyud 'grel): sogs rang bzhin brda'/ /dpa' o brda' dang dgongs pa dang/ /rang gi ting 'dzin gyis brda' sprod/ /dper na sa 'og gser rlangs dang/ /me long nyi ma'i rang bzhin du/ /kun kyang rig phyir rang bzhin drod/ /rang bzhin ngang gis
430a6(rgyud 'grel): brjod 'drar snang/ /kun kyang brag ca'i sgra bzhin phyir/ /grag stong dbyer med rdo rje gsung/ /sgra thos nyid kyis de nyid du/ /so sor ma brtags 'jal bar byed/ /so so'i skad du brda' sprod ltar/ /tshig sbyangs med pa'i dag lta bu/ /
430a7(rgyud 'grel): mos spyod grol bzhin brjod pa yis/ /brda sprod yongs su grol bar byed/ /dang po rgyud la tha dad phyir/ /gang mos grol ba yod mod kyang/ /thos bsam sgom pa'i mnyam sbyor zhing/ /rang 'byung kun ngam sgrub byed phyir/ /mi dmigs ngang las dmigs
430b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i/ /cho 'phrul tshig gis mtshon par bya/ /gsung lnga thos pa lnga tshul yang/ /rjes su tshig gis mtshon par bya/ /ngo bo snang tshig rang snang tshig /ldem dgongs tshig dang bkri drang rgyud/ /'dod rkyen tshig dang rdo rje tshig /rang rig mngon gsal tshig gis mtshon/ /thams cad
430b2(rgyud 'grel): gsang sngags ngo bo'i phyir/ /mdza' dbus med pa de bzhin nyid/ /dbyer med ngang du gnas pa la/ /ye shes rtogs pa'i don bya'i phyir/ /phyogs dang dbus su gnas par bya/ /kun la de bzhin sbyor bar gyis/ /yi ge tshig dang sgras spangs pa'i/ /brjod
430b3(rgyud 'grel): med dang du gnas pa ni/ /gsung nyid rang bzhin med pa yi/ /chos rnams thams cad ye nas dag /thams cad thugs su gyur pas na/ /sgra dang tshig la gnas pa min/ /'das dang ma 'das thams cad kun/ /yang dag shes pas rab brtags nas/
430b4(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin med par cir yang snang/ /snang ba nyid na dbyings yin te/ /de ltar rtogs pa'i ye shes ni/ /kun la dbang sgyur rang dbang can/ /thams cad tshig gi sgra ltar gnas/ /'di ni ye shes gsung mchog yin/ /chos rnams bsam gyis mi khyab
430b5(rgyud 'grel): ste/ /mdza' dang dbus med kun tu khyab/ /khyab dang khyab med rdo rje sku/ /sgra skad sna tshogs sgrags pa yang/ /dngos po med las dngos po'i sgra/ /ji ltar pi bang lag thogs na/ /sgra ni sna tshogs 'byung 'gyur yang/ /dngos po med de bzhin nyid/ /byang chub
430b6(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' i 'khor rnams la/ /de bzhin gsung mchog mi smra ste/ /sku yis chos rnams 'jal bar ston/ /me long bzhin du sku la snang/ /chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun/ /ming dang tshig tu brtags nas ston/ /ji snyed mang po'i don brjod
430b7(rgyud 'grel): kyang/ /rdo rje'i gsung la spros pa med/ /spros med de nyid sna tshogs pa'i/ /kun la brda 'jal? ye shes gsung/ /sgra dang ming tshig kun las 'das/ /thams cad pad ma chags med pa'o/ /dbang po rnam gnyis bsrungs pa yis/ /mkha' la nyi zla dus
431a1(rgyud 'grel): gcig 'char/ /mi 'jigs tshul du zil mnan mthong/ /de phyir gtan tshigs las las brjod/ /de lta mod kyang bsdu na gnyis/ /bzhi rjes mi dpyod cig rjes dpyod/ /rnam gnyis tshul gyis mthong bar byed/ /dbang
431a2(rgyud 'grel): po gnyis dang mthun sbyar ba'o/ /de la snga mas go bya ba'ang/ /sems can ma lus thams cad kun/ /ye nas byang chub snying por gnas/ /de phyir dpyad pa'i bya byed med/ /tshig dang yi ger mi mtshon te/ /sangs rgyas kyis kyang rnyed par dka' 
431a3(rgyud 'grel): rgyal ba'i sras po cang mi gsung/ /ma gsungs pa nyid rgya cher bshad/ /bshad dang nyan pa gnyis ka med/ /dpyod pa zhugs na rtog pa'i gzhi/ /rtog pa zhugs na dmigs pa'i rten/ /dmigs pa zhugs na 'dzin pa'i gzungs/ /'dzin pas zin phyir
431a4(rgyud 'grel): grol mi 'gyur/ /de bas gser lta gser bzhin du/ /bdag phyir bya byed ma dmigs pas/ /rtog dpyod dmigs 'dzin mi tshal ba/ /de brjod nyid kyis de nyid mthong/ /sus kyang ma bcings bcings med de/ /bcing bar bya ba yod ma yin/ /bcings
431a5(rgyud 'grel): med rnam par grol med pas/ /grol bar mi 'dod bcings dang bral/ /so sor gang la rtog med pas/ /so sor snang ba kun rtogs phyir/ /so sor rtog pa'i mchog yin te/ /brtags pa med pa'i bla dags yin/ /kha cig phyin mas grol byed pa/ /brjod pa'i
431a6(rgyud 'grel): dngos po spyod yul la/ /so sor rtog pa gtan tshigs rkyen/ /don dang mthun dang mi mthun pa/ /phyi ma mi mthun mtshon byed ltar/ /chos kun mdza' las 'das pa las/ /mdza' rnams gang yang dor med pas/ /'di ltar 'di'o zhes bstan med/ /rang gi ngo bo
431a7(rgyud 'grel): bstan par dka' / /'on kyang yin min 'dzin grol phyir/ /mdor na ji ltar brtags bsams bzhin/ /'gyur bas kun gyi ngo bor snang/ /de mtshon ci yang yin pa'i phyir/ /sems chos ci yang ma yin no/ /de phyir ma yin kun yin pas/ /ci yang yin no lhun
431b1(rgyud 'grel): gyis grub/ /mdza' kun phyogs su mchad phyir/ /mdza' dang bral phyir ma bral ba'o/ /gang yang ma spangs mi ldan pas/ /ma bral phyir na bral zhes bya/ /ngo bos phebs pas rgyas par 'gyur/ /cig shos mthun par ston ba'ang/ /bye brag bsdus pa kun khyab
431b2(rgyud 'grel): gsum/ /de ltar rnam par bsam yas pa/ /cha tsam brjod pa 'di lta mod/ /chos rnams yongs kyis dag pa yi/ /rnam bzhi'i tshul gyis don rtogs mngon/ /snod bcud rgyud rnams dag rtogs shing/ /mnyam nyid lhag pa'i mnyam nyid kyis/ /dkyil 'khor
431b3(rgyud 'grel): kun tu bzang po'i zhing/ /rgyu gcig pa dang yig 'bru'i tshul/ /byin gyis brlabs dang mngon sum pa/ /rab tu rtogs pa rnam bzhi yis/ /thams cad mngon rdzogs rgyal po che/ /nyid las dbang sgyur nyid spyod phyir/ /bdag dang gzhan dang rtog pa'i rgyun//
431b4(rgyud 'grel): rnam dag bla med theg pa'i mchog /'das dang ma 'das thams cad kun/ /yang dag shes pas rab rtags nas/ /rang bzhin med las cir yang snang/ /snang ba nyid na dbyings nyid yin/ /gshegs sku sgyu mar snang ba dang/ /log rtog sgyu mar snang ba
431b5(rgyud 'grel): gnyis/ /bzhi rtsa med de rang bzhin stong/ /rigs dang rgyud du rtag tu med/ /rigs dang kha dog dbyibs med las/ /phyi nang snod bcud thams cad snang/ /snang ba nyid na chos kyi sku/ /cir yang 'gyur zhing thams cad grub/ /nyon mongs rang dang spyi bstan
431b6(rgyud 'grel): pa/ /mtshan nyid ma nor don rtogs na/ /rnam par byang ba'i lam du 'gyur/ /de phyir rang spyi'i gtan tshigs zhes/ /mdza' dang dbus med du mar bral/ /gang yang ma yin de bzhin nyid/ /dbyer med pa'i tshul rtogs phyir/ /mdza' dang brul ba'ang de
431b7(rgyud 'grel): bzhin no/ /'byung ba chen po lnga rnams la/ /rang bzhin med par gzhig bya'i phyir/ /gcig la yang lnga lngar dbye bya zhing/ /mUM gyi dbyings su thim par bya/ /muM nyid smra bsam yul las 'das/ /nam mkha' bzung du med pa ltar/ /snang srid thams
432a1(rgyud 'grel): cad de dang 'dra/ /rten sa gnyen khrus rten med rlung/ /gsal sreg me ltar shes par bya/ /de bzhin phung po dbang yul lnga/ /nyon mongs kha dog la sogs pa/ /don dang ngo bo cig ma 'dres/ /de phyir de yi mtshon rtogs byed//
432a2(rgyud 'grel): gtan tshigs gtan tshigs brjod pa rnams/ /bsgrub bya gang yin shes don la/ /nges tshig ngo bo mtshan nyid sogs/ /gang nas 'bebs kyang rgyas par bya'o/ /thams cad 'jigs byed dam tshig dang/ /shes pa'i dam tshig ldan par bya/ /thams
432a3(rgyud 'grel): cad ma lus don 'byung ba/ /tshig gis mtshon pas gud na med/ /sgra nyid don gyis dngos po med/ /don gnyis sgra las gud na med/ /ming tshig sgra la mi rten par/ /blo'i ting du go bar byos/ /gsum bzhi lus don brjod bya ba/ /sngags mchog bla na
432a4(rgyud 'grel): med pa yi/ /mtshan ma kun tu ma brtag par/ /mnyam pa'i dang du thams cad shes/ /kun kyang mnyam pa nyid yin pas/ /'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i/ /so so'i lta ba brjod mi bya/ /dag cing blang bar bya ba med/ /spyir ni log rtog bsam
432a5(rgyud 'grel): yas pa/ /ye nas yod pa ma yin te/ /so so'i 'dzin rtog bag chags kyis/ /bzung 'dzin dra bas bsgribs 'gyur te/ /ci yang med las cir yang snang/ /byang chub snying po'i gzhi las gol/ /bden min ma grol bcings pa dang/ /dus dgras
432a6(rgyud 'grel): 'joms bskus mi rtag dang/ /'phags lam bral dgos brtson rar chud/ /sdug bsngal mi 'jil rgyu phyir 'khrul/ /de bas mnyam nyid ma rtogs pas/ /dug lnga 'jogs spyod rgyud lngar 'khor/ /dge bcu dag la gtsor len cing/ dge dang
432a7(rgyud 'grel): mi dge mi nyams bas/ /lha dang mi'i skye gnas te/ /mnyam nyid ma rtogs 'dod khams 'khor/ /mnyan pa'i don nyid ma rtogs shing/ /tshad med bzhi dang bsam gtan bzhi/ /rim pas so sor bdag 'dzin cing/ /gzugs rnams
432b1(rgyud 'grel): kun la bdag du rtogs/ /'di ni tshangs gnas rim par skye/ /mnyam dang gzugs med ma rtogs nas/ /ming bzhi med par ma shes na/ /skye mched bzhi la gnas 'gyur ba/ /srid pa'i rtse mo'i sa ru skye/ /rtag chad gnyi gar blo zhin pa/ /don gyi snying po nyid
432b2(rgyud 'grel): las gol bar gsungs/ /sa dgu dag pa'i ye shes ni/ /sa dgu ma spangs dang du bcom/ /gnyis med me rtogs thams cad la/ /bden bzhi'i dngos po yod lta zhing/ /spong dang mi spong byed 'gyur na/ /'di ni nyan thos sa pa yin/ /las dang nyon
432b3(rgyud 'grel): mongs thams cad la/ /mnyam pa'i don du ma shes shing/ /rten 'brel rgyu 'bras yod zin na/ /'di ni rang sangs rgyas kyis/ /mnyam pa'i don nyid mi shes shing/ /kun rdzob don dam gnyis 'byed la/ /chos dang gang zag bdag med na/ /'di ni
432b4(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sa pa yin/ /bla med theg pa'i nang nas ni/ /don dam du ni dbyer med 'ang/ /kun rdzob tu ni thams cad la/ /dag dang ma dag gnyis kar 'dzin/ /thabs kyi theg pa chen po ni/ /rnam par byang dang sdug bsngal dag /kun rdzob tu yang dbyer med/
432b5(rgyud 'grel): lta ba mthon sman de tsam mo/ /thabs kyi lta spyod chen po ni/ /bla med theg pa las 'phags pa/ /don dam du ni skor 'dun no/ /kun rdzob tu ni mnyam rdzogs so/ yang dag skyes mchog dam pa yis/ /don dam kun rdzob dbyer med pa/ /yang dag nyid du rab tu
432b6(rgyud 'grel): rtogs/ /mnyam pa nyid las ma g.yos bzhin/ /thabs kyi phyag rgya chen por ston/ /thabs dang shes rab rnam par dag /thams cad dag cas bya ba'ang/ /dngos po gsal dag ma yin te/ /snang spyod nyid na rnam par dag /de phyir kun rdzob brdzun mi lta/
432b7(rgyud 'grel): gnyis med mnyam pa ma shes pas/ /don dam dag pa chos nyid tsam/ /ye shes bzhi yon kun rdzob ltar/ /re bsgom bya ba las kyi sa/ /lhun grub mnyam pa ma mthong bas/ /chos sku rnam dag ye shes dkyi/ /byin brlabs rdo rje dbyings sprul
433a1(rgyud 'grel): pas/ /blang dor byed pa rnal 'byor sa/ /de ltar mngon rtags dmigs phye na/ /ma nor don gyis grub mdza' ni/ /theg pa mthon dman thams cad dang/ /'jig rten lta ba thams cad kun/ /ye shes chen por rab rtags nas
433a2(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin med las cir yang 'grub/ /rang bzhin nyid la mnyam pa med/ /mnyam pa'i don nyid ji lta bu/ /mnyam nyid rang bzhin gang yang min/ /kun yin ngo bo 'di 'drar med/ /mnyam dang rtogs pa gang yang med/ /byang chub sems zhes brjod pa
433a3(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /gang nas ma 'ongs gar mi 'gre /rtog med rang rig kho na tsam/ /sangs rgyas sems can sems la gnas/ /byang chub sems rnams thams cad ni/ /shin tu brtag dka' gting zab pas/ /ma dmigs mi dmigs dmigs? su med//
433a4(rgyud 'grel): sems nyid de nyid ji lta bu/ /byang chub de ni sems yin no/ /sems dang byang chub dbyer med pas/ /sems can ma lus thams cad dang/ /dus gsum chos rnams thams cad yin/ /yod las btsal ni sgros brtags te/ /spro btags brgya?
433a5(rgyud 'grel): du ltung bar 'gyur/ /med las btsal na bkur btab ste/ /bskur ba bcu'i gnas su ltung/ /yod med gnyis las btsal byas nas/ /de snyed lung du ma bstan 'gyur/ /de phyir nam mkha' yod med ces/ /blun po gang zhig rtog par med//
433a6(rgyud 'grel): mkhas pas nam mkha' i rang bzhin la/ /med par mi 'dzin yod ma ni 'dzin/ /sems nyid yod med kun ngo bo/ /sgra tsam brjod rung don nyid kyi/ /ngo bo 'di zhes bstan dka' la/ /yod dang med ces ci byar yod/ /sems nyid ye nas
433a7(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas la/ /de min lta ba zlog pa'i phyir/ /gnyis med mnyam dang sangs rgyas dang/ /bdag nyid lhun grub chos dbyings dag /byang chub chos nyid stong bsam 'das/ /de bzhin nyid dang skye 'gag med/ /mdza' bral 'das dang grol
433b1(rgyud 'grel): sogs su/ /bla dags tsam du brjod pa yin/ /de nas tshig dngos tshig lam chad/ /sems nyid kun rang bzhin la/ /de dag sgra brjod skad ci dgos/ /brten rtag dka' bar rgyal bas gsungs/ /ma chags pad+ma 'dra ba'i/ /ye shes can gyi spyod yul
433b2(rgyud 'grel): te/ /kun dang thun mong de ma yin/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul te/ /skyes bu blo rtsal rab kyis rtogs/ /de phyir blo can rnams kyis btson/ /shes pa'i mtshan nyid dngos mi grangs/ /ngo bo rim pas phye ba yin/ /snga ma kha cig mngon
433b3(rgyud 'grel): sum la/ /drug gam brgyad gnyis gnas gyur phyir/ /shes rab dbang drug tshul nas brjod/ /nges par ma nor mthong ba yang/ /ye shes lnga ru gsal ba'i phyir/ /brgyad kyi ngo bo de nyid de/ /lnga dmigs byed pa med pa'i phyir/ /de bas yul med
433b4(rgyud 'grel): par gsal ba'o/ /dbyings dang rig pa gnyis med par/ /de bzhin nyid du rdo rje rigs/ /gzung 'dzin bral ba'i rang rig nyid/ /dmigs med tshul du der snang ngo/ /yangs shing rgya che lhun grub ni/ /phyi nang snod bcud ye nas dag/ dag rtogs nyid kyang dbyings nyid yin/ /'di ni rdo rje mnyam nyid yin/ /shes dang spyod yul gnyis med pas/ /thams cad ma lus cig pa'i dang/ /ma 'dres yongs rdzogs gsal stong gzugs/ /lta dang lta bar bya med par/ /phyogs bcu'i zhing khams thams cad
433b5(rgyud 'grel): mthong/ /gang duAng ma mthong spyan gyi mchog/ khyab gsal rang bzhin go ba'i sgra/ /thos pa med pa thos pa'i phul/ /dang bas tshim byed chos kyi dri/ /snom byed med par tshor ba'i shangs/ /don bcud nyams su myong ba'i ro/ /myong ba'i bya byed
433b6(rgyud 'grel): med nyid myong/ /yang dag don pa reg pa nyid/ /reg pa kun dngos reg la dang/ /chos khams sna tshogs kun mkhyen pa/ /rang rig rgyal po rang snang ba'o/ /de bas bdag 'dzin rang gsal la/ /bdag bcas bdag dang bral ba'i yid/ /don dang
434a1(rgyud 'grel): sems can rtog med gsal/ /rang 'byung ye shes thams cad mkhyen/ /yang ni rim pa don grags brjod/ /don dam kun rdzob gnyis med mthong/ /dngos byas rim par rtogs goms rim/ /rnam bzhi lam dang sgo bzhi
434a2(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /bsnyan bsgrubs lam grangs nyams g.yo thob/ /goms bstan mdza' ru phyin par 'phar/ /mnyam pa'i dang las mi skrag pas/ /mngon byas nges pa'i shes rab dang/ /rnam pa kun ldan stong chen mthong/ /rang rig snying rje ye shes gzigs
434a3(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya cig sku 'bras bu lta/ /thams cad gsal ba'i lta ba dang/ /bar chad med pa'i tshogs chen mthong/ /dbang sgyur mnyam nyid mi g.yo ba/ /ye shes kun mkhyen lta bu dgu/ thos bsam so sor rtogs sgoms dang/ /rnal 'byor rim pa'i
434a4(rgyud 'grel): rgyud las skyes/ /de bas shes rab gsum la 'bod/ /rgyud don gzungs kyis zin pa ni/ /dam tshig dam tshig ces bya ba/ /rang gi lta ba dam tshig yin/ /sdom pa rnam pa bcu gsum dang/ /spyi'i dam tshig mdza' yas pa/ /thig
434a5(rgyud 'grel): le chen po dang du gsal/ /ji ltar spyad kyang sdom mi 'da' / /spyod pa rnam pa gnyis po yang/ /thig le chen po'i dang du nges/ /ci la yang mi gnas kun la spyod/ /spyod pa byed dang spyod med mthong/ /bya byed med pa'i tshul gyis su/ /
434a6(rgyud 'grel): kun la thogs pa med par spyad/ /bzhi'i las dang cig po'ang/ /thig le chen po'i du gsal/ /mchod pa'i rgyan dang log spyod kun/ /reg pa byang chub sems chen po/ /cho 'phrul chen po'i dang du 'dus/ /phul ba med pa
434a7(rgyud 'grel): thams cad mnyes/ /gzhal yas khang dang dkyil 'khor dang/ /khre tshogs 'du 'phro mang po yang/ /sems kyi cho 'phrul chen po yin/ /de ba rnam 'dun ring ba'i dang/ /chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun/ /rang bzhin
434b1(rgyud 'grel): dang gis dag nyid phyir/ /dbang lnga ma brtsal lhun gyis rdzogs/ /bco brgyad rang rig cho 'phrul snang/ /e ma'o ma sgrubs sgrub chen po/ /grub chen po ye shes che/ /don du gnyer ba'i rnam grangs kun/ /rang rig byang chub sems chen po/ /ting 'dzin lta ba'i
434b2(rgyud 'grel): bye brag kun/ /rang rig snang phyir chu bur dang/ /nam mkha' lta bu'i rang bzhin pas/ /rang rig ye shes nyid las min/ /sngags dang phyag rgya sems nyid phyir/ /brag ca chu zla 'dra shes na/ /'chid brjod las nyid mya ngan 'das/ /de bas bya byed mnyam nyid
434b3(rgyud 'grel): rtogs/ /lta ba lta ba gtsor brjod mod/ /don du shes rab kun mnyam nyid/ /ded dpon rin chen ji bzhin du/ /'dod mdza' bye brag 'dir shes dgos/ /shes rab rtogs pa gnyer chub che/ /bdag dang gzhan phyir bya ba rnams/ /shes pa'i gzhi
434b4(rgyud 'grel): las kun kyang spyod/ /thos bsams bcu spyod chen du gnyer/ /'di yang rgyal pos sa khams dang/ /stobs can rtsal gyi drag zhan dang/ /mkha' yul che chung ji lta bar/ /gzhi cig stobs kyi khyad par 'gyur/ /ye nas dbyings su cig pa na/ /
434b5(rgyud 'grel): de la na dang bdag ma rtog /rang bzhin rnam par dag pa la/ /btsad dang rtse ba'i blo ma byed/ /thams cad bde gshegs snying po bas/ /rkyen gyi rdul gyis gang la 'go /shes rab mchog gis de ltar rtogs/ /ma lus kun 'dus dbyings shes
434b6(rgyud 'grel): byos/ /de bas shes par bya ba rnams/ /dam tshig sdom pa'i ngo bor byed/ /bdag dang gzhan phyir gtsor byed cing/ /dang po'i sdom pas kun kyang slob/ /shes rab chen po'i sbyin sreg gis/ /srid gsum sreg pa'i me yin te/ /yid kyis ye shes
434b7(rgyud 'grel): ma ru 'bar/ /raM tu kun kyang chos nyid dang bu spral/ /gdod mthar lam gnyer spros pa gcod/ /grub pa bsgrod dang 'jug pa'ang/ /bdag gzhan chos phyir dam bcas pas/ /bdag nyid la'ang gzhan don rdzogs/ /de bas byis par mi mtshungs te//
435a1(rgyud 'grel): kun lam skabs las shes par bya'o/ /gang zhig 'di 'drar mthong rtogs pa/ /dngos grub mchog gi snying po ste/ /chu srin phyag rgya de bzhin du/ /dang po don rtogs mdza' mi gtong/ /spyod yul kun tu tshad dpag med/ /
435a2(rgyud 'grel): kun nas nyon mongs spyod pa'ang grol/ /thun mong lam gnyis de bzhin bas/ /rnam smin gnyis med tshogs gnyis rdzogs/ /gang gis de ltar rtogs gyur pa/ /sgro skur mdza' gsum las grol te/ /'jug pa'i don rnams 'byin par
435a3(rgyud 'grel): byed/ /de bas bdag gzhan chos don rdzogs/ /rgya che zab yangs shes rab myur/ /zab pa'i don rtogs mi ldog pa de/ /nga dang bdag med spangs pa bde/ /brtsen pas rtogs pa lhur byed na/ /dbang thob bde ba dag mthong zhing/ /rtsa ba'i drod las yan
435a4(rgyud 'grel): lag kun/ /shugs kyis 'byung bar the tshom med/ /de las mtshan ma byung ba ni/ /stobs kyis rtogs pa'i rlung ldan la/ /'pho 'gyur mthong la 'jigs med cing/ /'khrul pa'i khams la skyo ba med/ /grub pa'i gnas la mi smon te/ /'dod pa'i longs
435a5(rgyud 'grel): spyod mnyam par sbyor/ /sdug bsngal nyon mongs bzod chen te/ /las rnams gang lta khur mi lta/ /tan ta'i khungs dang 'gal med spyod/ /tha mal sbyed pas lhag par 'gyur/ /spyod pa rgyun gyi tshogs gnyis rdzogs/ /mdo ldos tha dad brjod mi lang
435a6(rgyud 'grel): rgya mtsho dang pa'i gzugs brnyan ltar/ /sgra rten yid la byed min par/ /rang rig mngon sum dmigs bral bas/ /rang gsal gsum bral mi bskul bas/ /nges par rded? du gang byas pas/ /thos bsam rten pa'i lta mthar phyin/ /'on
435a7(rgyud 'grel): kyang sa dang sa'i rim ?/ /dbang po dang? pa'i spyod yul la/ /nye ring drung bzhin stobs 'phel bas/ /rgyu rkyen gong 'og 'bras bur 'brel/ /gsal ba'i bye brag rim par 'gro /de chas skabs ming brjod dngos cig /gong gi don ltar ma rtogs
435b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i/ /blo ngan mnyam par khungs phyung nas/ /ma gtogs le lo snyoms las byas/ /don ma grub par ngan song 'gro/ sems kyis mnyam pa ma rtogs na/ /tshig gi mnyam pas sangs mi rgya/ /de bas don tshig ldan par byos/ /'on tang the tshom med
435b2(rgyud 'grel): par 'grub/ /spyan bzangs lam zhugs ji bzhin phyir/ /lam kun zag cing 'chid pa'i rgyu/ /don du mi 'gyur phyir na klag /de bas don las 'grus par gyis/ /de ltar don mthong gang dang gang zhig gis/ /gzhan du mi bsam de la 'dris par byas/ /skyed
435b3(rgyud 'grel): bu dam pa mchog 'dod pas/ /de la rtags 'grub gsal bar gyis/ /lam she lam du 'jug bzhin phyir/ /'jug pa rnams dang rgyu 'bras tshul/ /rang gnas mthong ba'i le'u ste/ gnyis pa'o// //bdag nyid dang chen
435b4(rgyud 'grel): rtog pas mos/ /rdo rje goms byed bshad pas na/ /snga ma snga ma gang dang gang/ /phyi ma phyi ma'i thabs dang rgyu/ /de bzhin phyi ma phyi ma gang/ /snga ma snga ma las 'byung 'bras/ /de ltar rgyu 'bras thabs 'bral pa/ /srid pa'i 'khor lo tshul bzhin du/ /dbang
435b5(rgyud 'grel): po brtson 'grus bzang ngan gyis/ /rnam par 'byed pa'i lus bstan pa/ /srid pa rdzogs pa'i smin chul gyis/ /lhag par rnged? ldan skyes bu yis/ /bsgom pa rnam bzhi zung ldan par/ /gdon ma nyid nas goms par byed/ /thig le chen po'i rang bzhin
435b6(rgyud 'grel): la/ /bsgom pa rnam gsum dus cig rdzogs/ /de ni de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings/ /de ni kun tu snang gi dang/ /de ni rgyu'i rim par ldan/ /tshogs brgyad ye shes lngar rtogs pa/ /ting nge 'dzin gyis dbang sgyur nas/ /ye shes lnga ru gsal ba nyid//
435b7(rgyud 'grel): thugs kyi phyag rgya chen po'o/ /mnyam la mnyam par sbyor ba yi/ /mnyam pa'i dam tshig la gnas na/ /mnyan rdzogs chen po thob 'gyur bas/ /'das na sangs rgyas ma yin no/ /yang na dam tshig 'di lta bu/ /ji ltar spyad kyang sdom mi 'da' / /
436a1(rgyud 'grel): byed spyod tshogs chen gnyis su 'gyur/ /'gro dang 'dug dang nyal ba dang/ /ma nyams de'i dbyings na gnas/ /shes rab mchog gi rtag tu sbyang/ /dbyings nyid la ni mi spyod phyir/ /dbyings nyid mchog gi gnas la spyod/
436a2(rgyud 'grel): de nyid mi gnas mya ngan 'das/ /rtogs pa'i ye shes yid bzhin gter/ /thams cad la'ang me long bzhin/ /ltas kyang gzugs brnyan mi snang ngo/ /shes rgyud ci yin gang gis ngo shes shing/ /bya byed 'phags kyis 'dug byed pa/ /
436a3(rgyud 'grel): gang zhig slong la spyod pa byang chub thob/ /rnam par dag pa'i g.yung drung sangs rgyas la/ /thams cad ye nas mnyam par rnam dag cing/ /mi rtogs le gnas la rtog par mdzad/ /bsnyan du med pas sna tshogs 'byung ba yin/ /bdag med
436a4(rgyud 'grel): bdag chen thams cad 'byung ba'i gter/ /ma bkag pa las rgyu zhing 'byung med pa'i/ /rnam rtog nyid na ye shes rang bzhin te/ /rnam gsum snang ba rang bzhin stong nyid pas/ /rnam rtog mi skye ye shes brjod du med/ /thams cad sems
436a5(rgyud 'grel): kyi ngang ste sems zhes gdags su med/ /ma bcos lhun gnas ye shes byang chub cing/ /thob rgyu med pas ye nas bde gshegs yin/ /nam mkhar bzung bas sprin gyis khebs par 'gyur/ /nam mkha' med par gang gis shes pa ni/ /
436a6(rgyud 'grel): sbyin dag 'byung zhing khebs pas mi srid bzhin/ /bsgoms pa'i sems kyang de ltar lta bar bya/ /ma bcos lhun mnyam ji bzhin dang bzhag dang/ /rgyu 'bras lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor 'byung/ /de bzhin nyid la gnas byas na
436a7(rgyud 'grel): nyon mongs sdug bsngal mi 'gyur ste/ /rtag tu bde gnas byang chub nyid/ /mtshan dang dpe byad kun dang ldan/ /srid pa'i rims par smin tshul gyis/ /'jug pa'i yan lag lnga ru bzhag /gang dag dngos kun rang rig phyir/ /shi
436b1(rgyud 'grel): ba don dam bden pa ste/ /skye ba bar ma kun rdzob yin/ /skye ba'i rim gsum gnyis med do/ /dang po lam la rten byed pas/ /de bzhin nyid du goms par bya/ /sngon dgos thabs dang ngo bo dang/ /mi mthun bcos nyams spyod dam tshig /drod rtags
436b2(rgyud 'grel): mtshan yon 'da' ka ma/ /rang gi 'bras bu rdzogs par 'gyur/ /skyes bu seng ge bzhin rgyu bas/ /sngon du ri mo rim par rdzogs/ /ston pa mchod brtson rtogs pa gsal/ /dam tshig ting 'dzin shes rab dang/ /byang chub sems dang
436b3(rgyud 'grel): snying rje lnga/ /lhag pa'i yo byad lnga rdzogs bya/ /de nas me'i sems ldan pas/ /gnas drug thar par dgod dam bca' / /tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi sngon song bas/ /yid 'ong skyon med sa rtsal bslang/ /ran byas byi dor ldan byas
436b4(rgyud 'grel): bsrung/ /pi par stan dang ldan par bya/ /bar chad gsal zhing lam rdzogs phyir/ /tshogs dang sbyin sreg dbung tshogs 'bad/ /phyi nang 'brel chags thams cad kun/ /gzhan phyir dus rgyun sems kyis dor/ /khams dang
436b5(rgyud 'grel): ting 'dzin rkyen bsdus la/ /bar chad bsrung ba mngon rdzogs nas/ /longs spyod rig ma'ang ldan par bya/ /'tshe ba bzlog pa'ang nyer rdzogs nas/ /thun mong spyi'i mngon rdzogs nas/ /mchod rten nye ba'i gzugs brnyan bzhugs
436b6(rgyud 'grel): yan lag brgyad pa'i tshul bzung la/ /yongs 'gyur thim byas rjes la 'jug /dag pa rnam gsum ma nor zhing/ /rang rig rgyal po goms pa yis/ /byang chub mchog 'di rnyed par 'gyur/ /de phyir mthong rjes de bzhin nyid/ /
436b7(rgyud 'grel): snying rje 'byung ba'i bzhi ru gzhag /go rims 'byung ba'ang de bzhin nges/ /gang zag skal ldan cung sman pas/ /gzhan sel phyir dang don gnyer phyir/ /'jug pa'ang snga ma gnyis don du/ /ma rig 'khrul pa'i 'dam dbyings su
437a1(rgyud 'grel): ye shes sgron ma'i mnga' 'das nas/ /gti mug mun pa rnams gsal te/ /rang bzhin 'od gsal bde ba'i mchog /mdor na sgrib tshogs mun snang tshul/ /chos dbyings mkha' dkyil yangs pa la/ /
437a2(rgyud 'grel): shes rab myur du don 'gro ba'ang/ /'gro med 'od med mi gnas pa/ /byang chub sems mchog a rab bde/ /mun snang bdud rtsi tshul bzhin du/ /rtog pa'i dbang sgyur ting 'dzin yin/ /don du gnyer ba gang dag kun/ /ting 'dzin
437a3(rgyud 'grel): 'di yis byed par 'gyur/ /gal te rnal 'byor 'di min na/ /rgya mtsho gting gi pha bong ltar/ /bskal par lam la btsal byas kyang/ /don med snying po skams pa yin/ /de phyir lhag ma cha bsnyams pa'i/ /bde ldan brod pas
437a4(rgyud 'grel): chos bdun tshul/ /ldan byas rje btsun snang tshul bzhin/ /'dzin rtsol med pa'i sems kyis 'dug /de'ang gdams ngag shes rab kyis/ /stobs kyis bzhag pas goms par byed/ /sngon brjod bu des dben pa'i sar/ /rin
437a5(rgyud 'grel): chen lhab lhub longs spyod kyis/ /mnyes byas slob buAng 'phang du bzhag /bgegs skras dbu bas chu bur gtim/ /dngos grub myur du 'grub 'dod na/ /shin tu mi dmigs dbyings sgoms pas/ /phyi ma'ang spyi lugs mthong
437a6(rgyud 'grel): rjes gzhag /bdag dang bdag gi gzhan rnams ni/ /shin tu mi dmigs dbyings su sgom/ /rang rig nyid la gnas pa'i/ /sus kyang ma byas rang 'byung ste/ /thams cad de bzhin nyid du sbyor/ /gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang  
437a7(rgyud 'grel): du sbyor/ /rang 'byung ye shes dkyil 'khor gyis/ /ma lus de bzhin nyid du sdud/ /sdud dang mi sdud gnyis ka med/ /yang dag kho na nyid du'o/ /bsgom bya sgom byed ma skyes na/ /chos nyid sgom par bya ba'ang med/ /don
437b1(rgyud 'grel): dam sgom par byar med pas/ /gang la'ang mi 'jug zhugs pa'i mchog /bsam bya bsam par mi bya ste/ /mi bsam par yang mi bsam na/ /gang la rnam par mi sems pa/ /de ni rang rig mnyam yin no/ /byang chub sems kyi de bzhin nyid/ /shin
437b2(rgyud 'grel): tu mi dmigs brtag dka' ba/ /yangs la rgya che gting zab pas/ /shes rab zab pas rtogs 'gyur te/ /gang nas ma 'ongs gar mi 'gro/ 'gro dang 'ong bar bya ba min/ /shin tu rtag dka' mi dmigs pas/ /mdza' dang dbus
437b3(rgyud 'grel): kyang rtag tu med/ /gzung 'dzin bral ba'i rang rig nyid/ /dmigs med tshul du der snang ngo/ /dbyings dang dbyings kyi ye shes kyang/ /rang rig kho na tsam du zad/ /gang zhig dmigs nas 'jug pa ni/ /de srid 'jig rten rgyang
437b4(rgyud 'grel): 'phan pa/ /'jug med sangs rgyas yin par ni/ /dbang po nyid dang kun gyis gsungs/ /nges par bsam zhing dmigs yod na/ /phra rab 'then thag 'jud lta bus/ /de bzhin nyid 'di mi mthong ste/ /then thag 'jug sa mkha' 
437b5(rgyud 'grel): bzhin no/ /rnal 'byor mnyam pa de bzhin nyid/ /ngo bo bzhin du drangs 'jug cing/ /nges tshig rnam pa 'byung ba yin/ /de bas kun la 'byor par gyis/ /chen po sman pas mdza' gsal ba'i/ /ma skyes de bzhin nyid stong pa/ /
437b6(rgyud 'grel): sdong stod stong pa'i tha snyad bral/ /spros pa brgyad bral 'dod ma yin/ /gang gis rang sems mdza' dri ma/ /med pa de bzhin dag pa nyid/ /rnal 'byor mtshan med de bzhin nyid/ /gnyis med lhun mnyam de bzhin nyid/ /grangs bzhi'i
437b7(rgyud 'grel): rim pa tha ma nyid/ /byin brlabs yon tan ngo bos brlab/ /bla ma'ang skabs mi mnyam nyid dang/ /lhun grub mdza' bral tha snyad med/ /stong chen ma skyes chos dbyings sogs/ /yon tan cha re brjod par zad/ /re re'ang skabs
438a1(rgyud 'grel): kyi ngo bo dang/ /ming don nges tshig brjod pa dang/ /gtan tshigs yan lag du ldan pa/ /rnam gsum 'phrugs par 'byung ba yin/ /lhag pa'i don mchog gang yin pa/ /dngos rnams nyid na dngos med pas
438a2(rgyud 'grel): rtog pa'i smra bsam yul las 'das/ /de bzhin nyid dbyings ye shes te/ /de nyid rang gsal mi g.yo ba/ /zhi gnas lhag mthong zung du 'brel/ /thabs dang shes rab dbyings nyid de/ /dbyings la dbyings ni rnam par sbyor/ /
438a3(rgyud 'grel): shes rab dbyings nyid sbyor ba yis/ /byang chub rdo rje thig le yin/ /de yang so sor rtog sgom dang/ /mi dmigs shin tu mi dmigs dang/ /rjes su mi dmigs rim pa yis/ /mi gnas mi rtog rlob sems med/ /
438a4(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin ngang gis bdag med pas/ /bya byed gnyis ka mi dmigs phyir/ /mkha' ltar 'du byed kun bral ba/ /bsam med 'dug la sgom zhes brjod/ /'du shes gang duAng ma zhugs na/ /'dod chags med par
438a5(rgyud 'grel): 'du 'bral med/ /de ltar de ltar mnyam 'jog tshe/ /gnas dang spyod lam sgrib pa rnams/ /nor par zin na mi phrog par/ /bya phyir mdo tsam brjod par bya/ /dmigs pa rjed dang bying rgod drug /rtsol dang mi rtsol byed
438a6(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ /dogs pa log pa bcu gcig dang/ /thun mong bdun de bco brgyad do/ /de bzhin g.yeng ba rnam drug ste/ /ngo bos g.yeng ba rnam shes lnga/ /phyi rol yul lngar 'pho bas g.yeng/ /bying rgod ro myong nang
438a7(rgyud 'grel): yin te/ /gzhan phyir dge spyod mtshan ma'o/ /snyoms 'jug gzhan nam theg pa gzhan/ /de'i lugs la sems 'phro yin/ /nga'o snyam pas snyoms 'jug pa/ /gnas ngan len par the tshom med/ /dran 'byung
438b1(rgyud 'grel): rjes su 'brang ba dang/ /'gog dang ther zug phyal pa dang/ /ched du gsum 'chos yod la byed/ /myong dang 'du shes gnas dmigs dang/ /sdud dang mngon byed re ba dang/ /sgrib pa lnga bcu rtsa yan lag /'jig rten dang po bsam gtan
438b2(rgyud 'grel): bzhi/ /snyoms 'jug bzhir gol sa dgu ste/ /ther zug chad pa'i phyin ci log /bya ba mang la 'byung skyen zhing/ /ngang thung 'khrug dang du bshad thos/ /'khor zhing kha dog mthong ba dang/ /khams las gyur pa'i cha yang shes/ /
438b3(rgyud 'grel): de yis 'gro nyal 'dug sdod dang/ /longs spyod tshe na'ang rnal 'byor bral/ /'u tshe dur kun nya slar gnyid/ /skam chags tshong sems spre spyod rkyen/ /de ltar shes pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /spong ba'i 'du byed brgyad ston pa'am/ /so sor
438b4(rgyud 'grel): cung zad blta bya 'am/ yang na rang 'byung rang zhir bya/ /ji ltar byis pa shes ma phye/ /bya byed mang por g.yeng bar gnas/ /bya byed mang pos bdag med pas/ /ting nge 'dzin gyis dbang sgyur nas/ /mtshan ma mnyam pa'i dbyings
438b5(rgyud 'grel): su gnas/ /dgag dang bsgrub pa gang la yin/ /cung zad khams kyi cha nyams pa/ /mi gsal mthong dang mi 'jug rtsogs/ /zin nas spyod lam dga' rten dang/ /mthun pa'i cho gas gso bar bya/ /spyod lam rnal du ma sbyor bas/ /
438b6(rgyud 'grel): so mthas chod na dor bya zhing/ /dran pa'i thag pas bsdam bya ste/ /rnam pa kun tu mi nyams bya'o/ /de ltar nod rtson yun ring bar/ /gnas pa'i gdon mthar 'phel ba 'am/ /g.yo thob goms bstan mthar phyin pa/ /mu lngas yongs su
438b7(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs par 'gyur/ /gang zag gzar bo'i chu gnas tshe/ /kun rtags goms pa'i rdza mkhan gyis/ /mi sdod 'gro bas skyo bar byed/ /de tshe mgo la me 'bar bzhin/ /cung zad yod la de dag nyung/ /de tshe dal bus 'byung 'jug srid/ /
439a1(rgyud 'grel): de goms ched du byed sogs dang/ /btang snyoms dang po blang par bya/ /ngo bo lta bur mi sgul par/ /thun kyang nus na sun mi bya/ /ro myong dor bas de mthar phyin/ /shugs snang mthong la dga' brod med/ /gnyis
439a2(rgyud 'grel): pa bar 'ga' 'chor thob la/ /khams dang tshor ba rgyu rtags dor/ /shin tu yun rings brtson pa yis/ /gong nas gong du 'phel bar 'gyur/ /bdag dang gzhan phyir bya ba kun/ /slob g.yo nas bzung rlnga'i bar/ /rnam par rtog med
439a3(rgyud 'grel): tshul gyis ni/ /thams cad kun la chags med rol/ /spyod dgu dor ba'i cig cha yang/ /mi dmigs mthun pas spyod ces bya/ /'gro 'ong med las dgro dang 'ong/ /'gro 'ong nyid na 'gro 'ong med/ /gnas pa med las thams cad gnas//
439a4(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa nyid na gnas pa med/ /longs spyod med las thams cad spyod/ /spyod pa nyid na spyod pa med/ /nyams pa med spyod chags mi bya/ /mi 'gog mi zin tshogs gnyis ldan/ /bdag phyir kun la mi dmigs pa/ /rnal
439a5(rgyud 'grel): 'byor myur thob the tshom med/ /'gro nyal 'dug sdod longs spyod tshe/ /de ltar spyod pas chos nyid du/ /byin brlabs sgrol ba cig shos te/ /gang yang gzhan phyir sems la rdzogs/ /gzhung las grags pa'i spyod pa rnams/
439a6(rgyud 'grel): skye bo kun gyis spyad gsungs pas/ /mos slob ci rmos rkyen mthong na/ /de dag shes goms bzhi las spyod/ /shes 'jug kun kyang gzhan don du/ /las bzhi spyod cing bsgrub dbang che/ /lam kun skad cig chas sgoms nas/
439a7(rgyud 'grel): spyod pa'i 'khor lo mos sgom zhing/ /rang bzhin phab rdzogs mched mnyen nas/ /nus pa'i byin ldan rdzogs par byed/ /de tshe sdom pa thams cad kun/ /mos slob mi stong srung mod kyang/ /khyad par ting 'dzin dam tshig ldan/ /
439b1(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig dam tshig ces bya ba/ /logs na yod pa ma yin te/ /rang gi rta ba dam tshig yin/ /mi gtong phyir na dam zhes bya/ /sngar ldan de'ang 'dir goms byed/ /de bas rang sems rtogs byas te/ /le lo g.yeng ba yongs spangs la/ /
439b2(rgyud 'grel): nga dang bdag med mnyam par bsrung/ /de bzhin nyid las 'da' mi byed/ /de bzhin nyid ldan dam pa de/ /de las 'das na tshig par 'gyur/ /snga ma snga mar rdzogs byas pa/ /gong ma gong ma rgyud ldan pas/ /yongs su 'phar gyi sngon
439b3(rgyud 'grel): spyod min/ /'phar bas spyod kun mngon du sgyu/ /de bas so so'i lta bzhi las/ /spyod sogs nam mkha' i yul 'dra'o/ /zhing khams dbang po sa khams bzhin/ /stobs ni stobs ldan rtsal bsgyid 'dra'o/ /de lcar bya byed med srings
439b4(rgyud 'grel): na/ /lus ngag sems la drod 'byung ste/ /bzod pa 'phra mo thob pa dang/ /'gyu pa'i dbugs la dbang thob dang/ /don la snal du 'phebs pa ni/ /nges par drod gsum thob pa'o/ /gzhan du rdul phran phyi rol dang/ /zla
439b5(rgyud 'grel): tshes la sogs mtshan ma mthong/ /rig pa rlungs su 'bab pa dang/ /'dod pa'i yul la mi 'gro zhing/ /'phro 'gyur dag la ming ba/ /phyi nang chags yul zhen pa chung/ /snga bas spags pa nyams su 'byung/ /gzhan yul
439b6(rgyud 'grel): thugs sems phrogs pa dang/ /chos brgyad mnyam rtsogs phal cher 'byung/ /de yang dbye thob stan rims kyis/ /kun tu 'khor bar 'byung ba yin/ /gul ljong smin pa'i rigs de la/ /pha mas khyim thab ltas bstan nas//
439b7(rgyud 'grel): phrod? pas bsu zhing zang zing dag /don du gnyer la brtson bar byed/ /de bzhin rnal 'byor sde tshol ba/ /drod rtags mthong ba'i brong tshul gyi/ /shin tu lam la brtson byed 'gyur/ /de phyir 'di dag rjes su bstan/ /phyi ma bar
440a1(rgyud 'grel): lam gyi stobs cha las/ /rtags sngon rdzu 'phrul snang bar 'gyur/ /de ba snga ma phyi nang ste/ /phyi rol zad par skye mchog sngos/ /mthong dang padmo 'od sogs mthong/ /nang du bzod thob bye brag dang/ /chu lnga rgyun las bags
440a2(rgyud 'grel): kyis bcad/ /mi grogs myo krag dgar brod med/ /shugs snang brgyad po mthong ba 'byung/ /bco brgyad bdud yul cha yang 'byung/ /mngon par shes pa rnam pa drug /las kyi zag pa yod med pa/ /sngon la dmigs pa'i mngon shes dang/ /
440a3(rgyud 'grel): yongs su rdzogs pa'i mngon shes dang/ /bar chad med ba'i mngon shes so/ /dmigs pa 'gag dang 'phel ba dang/ /nyi shu lnga sogs yul khams mthong/ /gling grangs mthong thos rim bas phye/ /phyi ma stong gsum brgya yul dang/ /stong
440a4(rgyud 'grel): gsum stong sogs yul 'gyur sogs/ /stong gsum stong phrag bcu rdul snyed/ /grangs med brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul/ /de snyed yul 'gyur rgyal ba dang/ /mnyam pas phye bas lam rdzogs yin/ /de bas rgyu'i sems dpa' dang/ /skal
440a5(rgyud 'grel): mnyam phyir na brjod pa'i tshul/ /shes pa'i khyad par dgongs pa yi/ /bzhi yis phye bas rgyu 'bres nges/ /'di tshe rdzu 'phrul rjes brtan dang/ /chos snang kun brjod cig car la/ /rdzogs kyi 'di tshe 'byung ba'i rgyu/ /nyams thar bzhi char
440a6(rgyud 'grel): 'byung srid do/ /rnal 'byor rnams la rmi lam yang/ /gcer bur 'byung zhing dri ma dag /byang chub chen po'i mchod rten mthong/ /dam pa mthong dang dam pa yis/ /sras dang spun dgongs byin brlob phyir/ /rmi lam mtshan mar
440a7(rgyud 'grel): bla ma mgon/ /snang bas dbang bskur byin rlob sogs/ /lam du 'jug pa lnga byed cing/ /bar chad legs nyes rtson lung ston/ /de'ang bdud dang cha dbye ste/ /byin rlob lung ston ltar snang ba/ /'byung bas nyes byed bdud 'byung phyir/ /
440b1(rgyud 'grel): bdud dang cha btags kun tu ces/ /bar chad gsal phyir de dag kun/ /bla ma nyid las gzhan du min/ /de bzhin nyid du mthong goms na/ /dge dang mi dge gnyis su med/ /rnam rtog mtshan ma yongs mi 'dzin/ /rang bzhin ye nas 'od gsal ba'i/ /dge sdig
440b2(rgyud 'grel): med par shin tu bde/ /bde dang mi bde gnyis su med/ /ye shes chags med rnam par dag /thams cad dbyer med ye shes yin/ /sems nyid dad bas a rab bde/ /longs spyod lnga ldan thams cad la/ /gtsang dang rme ba'i blo ma 'dzin//
440b3(rgyud 'grel): thams cad chos nyid ro gcig pas/ /gnyis su med par shin tu bde/ /shes rab che chung ting 'dzin gyis/ /thams cad ma nor gzhung lugs bzhin/ /'khor ba ma spangs sdug bsngal med/ /gnyis med tshim pas a rab bde/ /thams
440b4(rgyud 'grel): cad ma lus cig pa'i ngang/ /lta dang lta ba gnyis ka med/ /ye shes sgron ma sbreng ba ni/ /phyogs bcu zhing khams thams cad mthong/ /'di dag pha rol gnyis med phyir/ /'gro dang 'ong bar bya ba min/ /yan lag stobs chen ma mchongs par//
440b5(rgyud 'grel): phyogs bcu'i stong khams thams cad gnan/ /'di tshe spyod yul 'gyur mthong na/ /g.yeng gsal stong nyid dang la 'dug /dran pas las kyi rgyun bcad de/ /'dod khams lha mi theg chen sbyor/ /yang na gsang ba'i gser sgrom du/ /mtshon
440b6(rgyud 'grel): gang 'od dang zla ba'i hUM/ /ring po brtsegs pa mig thob nas/ /rlung gi 'phro 'dus 'od brdal 'dug /snang stong dbyer med rnal 'byor mthu/ /mngon byas lhag pa'i chos skur sbyor/ /'bras bu nyid la lam phyir te/ /phyogs mthun brjod
440b7(rgyud 'grel): kyi ris ma yin/ /stong pa chen po'i rnal 'byor bstan pa'i le'u ste/ gsum pa'o// //chos kyi sku la phyag 'tshal te/ /snying rje chen po'i rnal 'byor bshad/ /rjes su mthun pa lus nyid kyis/ /yan lag
441a1(rgyud 'grel): sge nas shes par gyis/ /sngon du stong goms rnal 'byor pas/ /khams gsum thugs rjes bzung ba'i phyir/ /yan lag brgyad sngon bzhin byas nas/ /ye shes sgyu ma'i snying rje sgoms/ /bdag nyid
441a2(rgyud 'grel): dri ma gsal ba dang/ /stong pa'i mdud pa gshig pa dang/ /gdul bya sa la dgod pa dang/ /phyag rgya cig pa'i sgyur bya zhing/ /rnal 'byor 'di nyid gnyer ba dang/ /bden pa gnyis su mi stong phyir/ /rnal 'byor 'di la gnas
441a3(rgyud 'grel): byas te/ /'jug ba'i thun mtshams dus kyis bya'o/ /gang gis khams gsum 'das pa'i chos/ /thugs rje chen po'i ye shes su/ /mthong thos myong reg tshor ba'ang/ /so sor brtag rgyu 'am rjes la thob/ /de yis ma lus
441a4(rgyud 'grel): chos so cog /snying po yod pa ma yin te/ /sgyu ma mig g.yor sprul pa dang/ /mig rgyu 'ja' tshon chu zla bzhin/ /bdag dang 'gro ba ngo bo gcig /gsal dang rtags pas tha dad phyir/ /cig dang tha dad gnyis med pas/ /
441a5(rgyud 'grel): bya med bya ba 'gog med par/ /mthong ba ma shor tsam du bya/ /rjes sam rtog spyod sngon 'gro bya/ /de bas gnyis goms sgyu goms pas/ /dran pa'i spyi blugs ye shes gsal/ /sngon du btang ba gang yang med/ /nam
441a6(rgyud 'grel): mkha' nam mkha' ji bzhin du/ /lus ngag sems dang chos thams cad/ /gang na'ang mi gnas mi dmigs pa/ /dmig g.yor tshul du sbyor ba yis/ /nam mkha' la ni nam mkha' sgom/ /thams cad thabs kyi mtshan nyid de/ /
441a7(rgyud 'grel): thabs la thabs ni rnam par sbyor/ /thabs chen thabs las byung ba'i/ /des ni byang chub rdo rje'i mchog /thams cad du ni ye shes gsal/ /ye shes de ni ma yin pa/ /chos 'ga' tsam yang yod min pas/ /gdung 'dra ma
441b1(rgyud 'grel): sgral dus cig bsgral/ /bsod chen snying rje'i rang bzhin te/ /mi 'dod phan 'dogs byams chen po/ /mi 'gyod dga' mchog bral med snyoms/ /tshangs pa'i rgyu bzhi dus gcig rdzogs/ /mngon par gdung ba de la med/ /de phyir rgyu rkyen
441b2(rgyud 'grel): 'bras bu dang/ /dus dang rang bzhin 'khrul pa dang/ /tshul gyis nyams dang ngo bo dang/ /btson ra lta bu brgyad la dmigs/ /de yis cig shes bzhi 'byung bas/ /pha rol phyin dang mtshungs ma yin/ /de dag ngo bo nyid stan pa'ang/ /
441b3(rgyud 'grel): rnam grangs bzhin du 'jug pa ste/ /don dam rnal 'byor ngo bo yis/ /phye bas zung 'gyur nges tshig 'byung/ /de la log rtog sgyu ma ni/ /chos dang bdag dang dngos po rnams/ /ngo bo yod la sogs rtags pas/ /rtog pa sgyu ma'i
441b4(rgyud 'grel): rlung 'gyur ba/ /skye dang mi bden slu bas 'grub/ /rten cing 'brel pa'ang shing rta bzhin/ /'jig rten rnam rtog gzugs brnyan phyir/ /sgyu ma lta bur rkyen las skyes/ /'phral snang bya ba kun kyang byed/ /rtog can rnams la
441b5(rgyud 'grel): mthun par snang/ /gzugs brnyan 'dra phyir brtags pas dben/ /de phyir thams cad rdzun pa tsam/ /ming las dngos med 'dod pa min/ /yang dag nyid du grags so cog /gnyis snang nyid na gang min pas/ /sems phyir ci
441b6(rgyud 'grel): yang rgyu med shar/ /snang la ngo bo nges med cing/ /ji ltar bltas par snang ba ltar/ /snang bzhin ther zug chad dang bral/ /rgyal ba'i sku 'ang ma skyed par/ /rig pa'i ye shes sgyu mar shes/ /khams gsum pa'ang
441b7(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin pa/ /thabs chen sgyu ma kun ngo bo/ /ye shes la ni ye shes rol/ /ye shes rol pa nyid kyang gsob/ /rgyal ba mngon 'byung skyob pa dang/ /byin brlabs ston pa 'ang de bzhin te/ /rgyu rkyen rags pa med
442a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i phyir/ /sgyu ma rdo rje brtsan po mchog /'dus ma byas nyid 'dus byas snang/ /'dus byas sna tshogs rdo rje nyid/ /yin phyir ngo bos tha dad min/ /dman pa rnal du goms byed tsam/ /'gro la skad cig
442a2(rgyud 'grel): gnyis mi 'chang/ /rgyud cig ma 'gags ma skyes pas/ /gzung 'dzin bral ba'i rang rig nyid/ /ye shes sgyu mar mi g.yogs la/ /chu dang zla ba ji bzhin du/ /mtshungs par gsal bar ngo bor brjod/ /sems las
442a3(rgyud 'grel): ma rtogs chos med phyir/ /ye shes sgyu ma gzhan na med/ /sgyu ma nyid kyi chags bral ba/ /tha snyad tsam du sgom zhes bya/ /mi mthun sgrib pa'i dmigs gzung ba/ /rgyu dang ngo bo nyes pa ni/ /ma goms pa dang 'grus byed
442a4(rgyud 'grel): pas/ /me dang du pa'i tshul bzhin du/ /bdag du 'dzin pa rnam gnyis kyis/ /ting 'dzin bsgrib pa 'byung bar byed/ /sngon du ji bzhin nyid bstan mod/ /mtshams sbyor snying rje g.yung min pas/ /brjod kun 'bring dang
442a5(rgyud 'grel): nyung bar 'byung/ /skye spangs goms pas tha mal dkan/ /'on kyang 'di nyid 'phro sdu dang/ /ma nges sa phyogs mkhar bcas mthong/ /zad par mthong na ma nges mdog /me chu rlung sa'i cha 'khrul pas/ /mi gsal
442a6(rgyud 'grel): mdog mthong khams 'khrul ltar/ /sa g.yos mthong ba'ang cha dbye'o/ /sprin dang ling thog mun pa bzhin/ /gang de gzhung las grags pa'i skyon/ /phra rags cha yis sgyu ma'i don/ /mi gsal shin tu bul bar byed/ /
442a7(rgyud 'grel): sngon bzhin rtog pa'i nad bcos pa/ /shes bzhin so mdza' chod par bya/ /de ltar gyur na kun mo'i tshul/ /ma gsal rang bzhin dad bar 'gyur/ /rnam rtog mtshan ma ci skyes kyang/ /ye shes sgyu ma rang snang
442b1(rgyud 'grel): phyir/ /chags sdang re dogs mi 'byung ste/ /ye shes sgyu ma gzhan du min/ /de ltar ma ldan gang dag gis/ /tshor nas lo rgyud bcad pas zhi/ /yang na rtog pa'i gnas yul blta/ /de mthong mun pa rnam dag spangs/ /'dod min kha
442b2(rgyud 'grel): dog mthong ba ni/ /'byung ba bzhi'i gnyen pos gzhol/ /sngon bzhin sngar 'brangs phyis sngon byed/ /de ltar rang bzhin rkyen gyis skyes/ /tshor na thog ma'i nyes bsams te/ /skyo ba skyed la dor dran bcing/ /brong pas 'jug cing gzengs
442b3(rgyud 'grel): bstod bya/ /de lta de ltar brtson 'gyur pa'i/ /skabs su ye shes rnal 'byor nyid/ /'phel ba 'ang g.yo thob goms pa dang/ /bstan mthar 'gro ba ngo bo la/ /med kyang rab rim dag chas brjod/ /'bo dgyes thim pas ru drag
442b4(rgyud 'grel): chu/ /cung zad thun gyi sum char yod/ /bzhi cha lnga char de med thob/ /thun kyang nus shing gsal ldan na/ /chu klung dal 'bab tshul bzhin no/ /sgo rten rdzas ltar rtog rlung gis/ /mi bsgul bzhi la gnas pa'o/ /dbang po mngon sum
442b5(rgyud 'grel): gang byas pa/ /bskyed du bya med phyir mdza' 'o/ /snying rje chen po'i rnal 'byor pas/ /srid gsum sgyu ma 'dra bar ni/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub mkhas pas shes/ /'gro ba'i ched du go bsgos te/ /'gro ba de ltar snga nas shes/ /
442b6(rgyud 'grel): log par rtogs brtags rnam dag cing/ /ye shes dbyings las mi gzhan cing/ /thugs rje chen pos 'brel pas na/ /'gro drug dus gnas ma lus snang/ /rjes su 'jug pa'ang de bzhin shes/ /de bzhin nyid dbyings sna tshogs mang
442b7(rgyud 'grel): po thabs su snang/ /thabs nyid rgyu ma mig yor chu zla gzugs brnyan bzhin/ /de nyid rang rig ye shes chags med sna tshogs snang/ /thabs dang shes rab ldan pa mchog gi gnas gyur pas/ /ji ltar dpyad kyang zad med gnyis grub
443a1(rgyud 'grel): sgrib mi 'gyur/ /shes rab thabs chen mchog la ye nas rol pa yin/ /byang chub sems su rgyu gcig pas/ /rtsa ba'i snying rje chen po 'byung/ /sangs rgyas sems can cig rtogs na/ /snying rje
443a2(rgyud 'grel): chen po skye zhes bya/ /brdal chen blo ni kun tu snang/ /thabs chen kun mdzad 'od gsal byams/ /thams cad dgyes mdzad dbyings ma gdungs/ /sems can ma lus thams cad la/ /snying rje thag pa ma chad par/ /nyon
443a3(rgyud 'grel): mongs lam las sgrol byed cing/ /byams pa dag gis mnyes par gyis/ /de bzhin 'khor ba'i btson ra la/ /snying rje chags pa cher bskyangs nas/ /nyon mongs 'dam nas 'dren par byed/ /snying rje chen po skyo ba med/ /de
443a4(rgyud 'grel): bzhin skye bo phal pa rnams la/ /las kyi sgrib pas ma gos shing/ /thams cad mngon par sangs rgyas bar/ /dga' ba dag la 'gyod ma byed/ /sems can nga dang bdag med la/ /thugs rje gnyis rtogs mi 'byed
443a5(rgyud 'grel): de/ /bu gcig 'dra bar blo gzhag bya/ /thams cad dri ma med par bya/ /sngon rdzogs rkyen bral sngon bzhin te/ /rnal 'byor nyid la gzhan don rdzogs/ /dmigs pa bdun gnyis gdul bya dang/ /ngo bo las dang
443a6(rgyud 'grel): phan yon gyis/ /phyogs btang med de thun mong gi/ chen po dag las slar 'gyur yin/ /bdag phyir spyod yul thams cad kun/ /ye shes sgyu ma rang snang phyir/ /phyi nang sgrib med gsal ba'i ngang/ /ye shes blo
443a7(rgyud 'grel): bstan shin tu bde/ /longs spyod lnga ldan thams cad la/ /gtsang dang rme ba'i blo ma 'dzin/ /thams cad ye shes ro gcig pas/ /gnyis su med pas shin tu bde/ /de bas spyad dang mi spang len/ /'dod yon la
443b1(rgyud 'grel): sogs ye shes rol/ /thub chen ston pa'i spyod yul ni/ /ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub/ /chos rnams thams cad dmigs su med/ /ye shes sgyu ma cir yang 'grub/ /zag med zag pas rtog pa na/ /dag par ma gyur gang
443b2(rgyud 'grel): yang med/ /ye shes ma bcos kun tu gsal/ /rang bzhin rnam par dag pa'o/ /de phyir spyod lam thams cad kun/ /sgyu ma ye shes 'da' mi bya/ /rtsa ba yan lag thams cad kun/ /snga ma bzhin te nus pa 'phel/ /de ltar
443b3(rgyud 'grel): sgyu ma thob goms pas/ /'khor ba'i chos la tshad med pa'i/ /byang chub sems kyis 'phrogs par 'gyur/ /ma 'khrul 'khrul la ya mtshan skye/ /don med 'dug la de bzhin te/ /rnam gsum lnga las 'phel bar snang/
443b4(rgyud 'grel): nyams rims 'phel ba'i mdza' rtags ni/ /shing bal lta bur yang ba dang/ /lus kyi bzod pa 'phra thob ring/ /khams bde mi bde snyoms pa dang/ /phal cher yod cing chos brgyad snyoms/ /de bas mang dang 'bring la snyam
443b5(rgyud 'grel): kun kyang lnga las grangs 'phel zhing/ /ngo bo gsal la yun ring po'o/ /lhan cig drug 'dug phyi rol gyi/ /mngon shes 'phel dang cung zad bstan/ /gzhan pa'ang shes pa cung zad 'byung/ /de bas rnal 'byor bstan par bya/ /
443b6(rgyud 'grel): 'di tshe spyod yul thams cad kun/ /rmi lam duAng sgyu mar mthong/ /snying rje gang yang mthong ba dang/ /byin rlob dbang bskur mang mthong dang/ /bdud kyi spyod yul mtshan mar mthong/ /de sogs snang yang chags mi bya/ /snying
443b7(rgyud 'grel): rje chen po goms byas nas/ /rnal 'byor don chen rtogs pa yis/ /dus mdza' med par de ltar sgom/ /yon tan nam mkha' i mdza' dang mnyam/ /spyod yul sangs rgyas nyid dang cig /rgyu spyod bsod nams tshogs chen ldan/ /
444a1(rgyud 'grel): de ming ma chags ye shes che/ /rnal 'byor phyi ma btsal ba med/ /nyi 'od sa bon dkyus dgra bzhin/ /'pho ba med bzhin 'gyur snang tshe/ /sgyu ma bstan byas las rgyun spyod/ /'phel bas lam dang skol mi
444a2(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur/ /phyi ma'ang lan grangs gzhan dag la/ /mi ldog dbang sgyur rigs su nges/ /lam 'dir cha skyen rdzogs bsgrub na/ /mtshan dang dpe byad kun ldan pa'i/ /dbang phyug chen po'i gnas nyid du/ /mngon du 'byung bar the tshom
