444a3(rgyud 'grel): med/ /mi rtogs le lo snyoms las byas/ /don ma grub par ngan song 'gro/ /snying rje chen po'i rnal 'byor bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// //gnyis med ngang la phyag 'tshal nas/ /phyag
444a4(rgyud 'grel): rgya cig pa'i rnal 'byor bshad/ /gang dag rdo rje gsum sgom pa'ang/ /snga par 'das pa'i lus kyis shes/ /spyi'i sa las sngon rdzogs pa yis/ /'di nyid sgyu mthar mngon bya zhing/ /lugs sogs mtshan ma'i phyag rgya gzhan
444a5(rgyud 'grel): de la yan lag brgyad sngon bzhin/ /'bras bu yongs su rdzogs bya zhing/ /spras pa'i rgyu yis thob bya dang/ /rgyu stong rtog zhen dbang du bya/ /rtog pa'i phung sogs gnas bsgyur zhing/ /gzhan dag smin par bya ba'i phyir/ /phyag
444a6(rgyud 'grel): rgya'i rnal 'byor shin tu gces/ /de la 'jug thabs rnam gnyis te/ /sems sbyang ba dang lhar bskyed pa'o/ /snga ma gdams ngag shes rab kyis/ /'jug pa'i gzhi'o 'di nyid de/ /a/ rab tu brtan 'gyur a dkar las/ /
444a7(rgyud 'grel): shin tu 'phra ba'i a rnams spro/ /phyogs bcu gang bar gsal 'gyur nas/ /bsdus kyang 'phel 'grib med par bstan/ /de la 'am yang na thugs yig ste/ /de bzhin yang nas yang goms nas/ /phyi nang snod bcud hUM du bsdu/
444b1(rgyud 'grel): yan lag rnam shes ye shes phyir/ /yi ge hUM la shin tu bsdu/ /nri'i dmig gis bltar yod par/ /'dris nas bdag gzhan don phyir spro/ /mchod don rdzogs nas slar bsdus te/ /hUM nyid mi dmigs dbyings su gsal/ /goms par bya
444b2(rgyud 'grel): ba shin tu gces/ /phyi ma tshangs pa srin po'i tshul/ /rdzogs par bya ba zung du 'gyur/ /tshangs pa'i cha lugs rdzogs bya ba'ang/ /gang bsgrub yi ge so so ste/ /spyir ni gang bsgoms kun tu 'dra/ /rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du 'dus?/
444b3(rgyud 'grel): 'di ltar de nyid goms bya ba/ /sngon du mi dmigs dang nyid las/ /a dkar gsung gi phyag rgyar 'bar/ /shin tu 'tsher bar gsal sgoms la/ /thams cad ar ni gyur par sgom/ /de bzhin nyid du 'dris gyur nas/ /a las
444b4(rgyud 'grel): ma'i dkyil 'khor spro/ /a ma gsal bar 'byor gyur nas/ /h+ri gsal pad+ma chags mang sgom/ /rin chen 'bar ba'i gzhal yas bsgom/ /nyi zla gdan dang gzhal yas khang/ /thams cad bsdus shing gsal bar bsgom/ /
444b5(rgyud 'grel): de dkyil yi ge hUM gnas par/ /mthing kha 'tsher la gsal ba yi/ /'od zer 'phro ba rnam par bsgom/ /'od 'phros dbyings su bslar bsdus nas/ /shin tu rdo rje 'phra bar sgom/ /rdo rje 'od 'phros gsal 'bar nas/ /dbyings su
444b6(rgyud 'grel): yang ni bstim par bya/ /de nyid sems dpa' i skur gyur pas/ /shin tu 'phra zhing 'dus par bsgom/ /de bzhin gnyis med gsal gyur nas/ /sku gcig rdo rje dril 'bar bsgom/ /de bzhin nyid du gyur pa dang/ /dbu gsum
444b7(rgyud 'grel): phyag drug nyid du sgom/ /rdo rje 'khor lo ral gri 'bar/ /rin chen pad+ma dril bu 'bar/ /'phra ba'i gzhal yas gdan dang ldan/ /gnas gcig ye shes sems dpa' sgom/ /spyi mgrin tsi ta gnas gsum du/ /byin brlabs
445a1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje gsum sgom bya/ /dbu'i gnas lngar yi ge lnga/ /ye shes lnga dbang rdzogs pas rgyan/ /blo'i shes rab che chung gis/ /yang na phyag rgya chen po ste/ /chu las nya ldang ji bzhin du/ /bdag nyid phyag rgya chen po ste/ /
445a2(rgyud 'grel): zhal gsum phyag drug dag tu sgom/ /gzhal yas gdan sogs snga ma bzhin/ /yan lag lha dgu 'ang de bzhin no/ /de la shin tu goms par bya/ /rag sha cha lugs 'dzin pa'ang/ /rims dang gcig car mngon bzhin te/ /rdo rje
445a3(rgyud 'grel): cho ga kha dog dang/ /gzhal yas la sogs bsgyur te bsgom/ /thugs kyi rigs gzhan mos pa'ang/ /'bru bzhi sbyangs te gdan gnas cig /rdo rje rnam gsum rigs su bsgyur/ /sku dang yan lag de bzhin no/ /rim pa thob pa 'am cig car ba/ /
445a4(rgyud 'grel): brgyad mthar phyin phab ltar bskyed la/ /mchod pa'i byin rlabs skur bsgoms te/ /yan lag lhan rdzogs mchod stod bya/ /yan lag ma nyams sngags 'das pa'ang/ /bskyon bcu spangs te rnam gsum gyi/ /bzlas pa grags bzhin
445a5(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs par bya/ /spro bsdus bdag dang gzhan don rdzogs/ /phyi nang gsang ba gang mos su/ /bzlas brjod tshad du phyin par bya/ /dub na ye shes thig le blta/ /nyal bas nang par de nyid las/ /hUM sogs bsgyur te skur rdzogs pas/ /
445a6(rgyud 'grel): sngon bzhin brtson pas 'dris par bya/ /gzhal yas lha'i dkyil 'khor yang/ /sems kyi cho 'phrul rang snang phyir/ /lha la dmigs med rig pa nyid/ /bzhi rdzogs sku de rang snang ba'o/ /rgyal ba rgyal ba rnams kyi sku/ /kun tu rin chen lta bu
445a7(rgyud 'grel): ste/ /rdzogs par rtog med re ba skong/ /zad 'phel 'gro 'ong nye ring med/ /phyag rgya yod med grol ma grol/ /bdag phyir phyogs med blang dor med/ /bying rgod snyoms tsam mnyam gzhag pa'o/ /mi mthun 'di tshe dmigs bzung pa/ /
445b1(rgyud 'grel): yi ge nas gzung rdzogs pa'i bar/ /thun mong kun tu 'byung rags 'phra/ /tha ma 'di la so mdza' gcad/ /khyad par rab rib mag mog drib/ /gang tshod dmigs pa tshad dang tshul/ /grangs dang cha lugs mdog dbyibs dang/ /kha dog 'ba' zhig
445b2(rgyud 'grel): rim par nub/ /de ltar gyur pa tshor bya ste/ /'du byed rlung gis bskyod mi bya/ /de ltar zin pa de dag kun/ /khyad par gsum la'ang sgyu steng 'dug /rjes las thob pa ma sun 'dug /drug pa ri ltar sngos cher bya/ /bdun pa dbyibs dang sre bar bya/ /
445b3(rgyud 'grel): brgyad la spyi men bye brag gnas/ /bya min las kun dor byas te/ /spyod lam skyon rnams gtang bar bya/ /gnyis la khugs mod rgya cig la/ /goms pas 'phel ba gong ma bzhin/ /smig rgyu du ba srin me khyer/ /mar me nyi ma'i tshul dang sbyar
445b4(rgyud 'grel): btang snyoms rims dang brtson pa dag /skabs kyis blang dor nyams las shes/ /'bru bzhis rtag tu mtshams bcad de/ /bdag nyid chen po'i tshogs mchod bya/ /nang gi sbyin sreg blang bar bya/ /gzugs sogs thig le 'am lha mo drug /
445b5(rgyud 'grel): dbang po yul dang sbyor pa bya/ /zhi khro gang yin skabs kyis bsgyur/ /bdag nyid chen po'i mchod pa yis/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor ma lus mnyes/ /srid gsum sems can thams cad la/ /dga' ba chen pos khyab par 'gyur/ /'gro
445b6(rgyud 'grel): nyal 'dug sdod longs spyod kyang/ /nyon mongs sdug bsngal che? na'ang/ /theg chen phyag rgya mi btang ste/ /sngon bzhin sbyor bas myur du 'grub/ /rgyu 'bras mtshams sbyar bar skabs kun/ /chos spyod dgu'i spros pa dor/ /rgyud la
445b7(rgyud 'grel): ldan yang blang bya min/ /mtshan ma'i g.yeng ba yin phyir ro/ /rdo rje gsum sgo phyag mi bya/ /phyag rgya'i rnal 'byor spyod pa la/ /don ldan ma nyams dag byas nas/ /brtson 'grus cher bskyed myur bar 'grub/ /lha la lha rol bsod nams
446a1(rgyud 'grel): te/ /spyod lam chags gnyis med pa'o/ /gzhan phyir 'phro 'du rim par rdzogs/ /rkyen dang phrad pa'ang mi 'dor te/ /dus min gzhan phyir spros pa'ang len/ /gang 'tsham bar don rdzogs byed/ /bdag
446a2(rgyud 'grel): phyir thun mong mchog bsgrub rnams/ /'di bstan rnal 'byor the tshom med/ /'di tshe sa gzhi kun ldan no/ /gsung gi gzhi las lhun bya zhing/ /phyag rgya chen po'i rnal 'byor du/ /spyod yul kun tu bsdam par bya/ /phyi nang gsang
446a3(rgyud 'grel): ba shin tu 'phel/ /thob dang bstan pa'i char 'gyur te/ /longs spyod zhen pa med pa dang/ /dbang po yul du goms pa dang/ /rgyu ba chad dang thun mtshams thal/ /drod kyi bye brag kun dang ldan/ /rtags chen goms mthar mtshan
446a4(rgyud 'grel): ma lnga/ /dngos su mthong dang rdo rje gsum/ /skye mched mthong ba mtshan ma ste/ /grub pa dang po rtags zhes bya/ /dmigs pa rgya chen mngon shes kyang/ /grangs dang yul gyis bla na med/ /nyi shu rtsa lnga'i mngon shes kyang/ /g.yo
446a5(rgyud 'grel): thob 'byung bar the tshom med/ /lus ngag sems mthu'i rtag rnams kyang/ /cho 'phrul bzhi tshul g.yo thob byed/ /gzhan yang sngon pas gsal bstan pa/ /rnal 'byor lhag pa'i stobs kyis thob/ /spyod lam nyid du nyes legs
446a6(rgyud 'grel): kun /gsal bar 'byung zhes shin tu bstan/ /bsam gtan 'bad pa bzang ba yin/ /bsgrub pa bos ni rtag tu mthong/ /sangs rgyas mthu dang mtshungs par mthong/ /sangs rgyas longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku/ /bdag med par
446a7(rgyud 'grel): ni myur du mthong/ /sems dpa' chen po khams gsum pas/ /mchod par byed pa des mthong ngo/ /ye shes chen po 'od dri'i gzugs/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems pa yis/ /'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams kyis/ /rtag
446b1(rgyud 'grel): tu mchod pa byas pa mthong/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i gzugs chen dang/ /grangs chen rdo rje mchog dag tu/ /rmi lam dag tu rab gzugs mthong/ /grags chen rdo rje gsang ba dang/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'khor lo can/ /sangs rgyas chen po
446b2(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal ba'i/ /rmi lam 'di dag mthong 'gyur na/ /lus ngag sems kyi mthu las skyes/ /brgyad rnams thams cad yongs rdzogs pa'i/ /lha yi bu mo yid 'ong dang/ /khye'u dang bu mo dag mthong nas/ /de ni dngos grub thob par
446b3(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad rnams/ /zhing na gnas pa nges par mthong/ /thugs ni dgyes par gyur nas kyang/ /chos mthong yid du 'ong la sogs/ /chos kyi 'khor lo sgyur ba'i sku/ /sems can kun gyis
446b4(rgyud 'grel): yongs bskor ba/ /bsam gtan rdo rje la gnas pa'i/ /dam tshig sbyor ba mthong bar 'gyur/ /sna tshogs kun bdag skyed mod tshal/ /lha'i bu la sogs pas brgyan/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis byin brlab pa/ /bsam gtan
446b5(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig can gyis mthong/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yis/ /de ni mngon par dbang bskur mthong/ /rigs 'dzin rgyal po chen po yis/ /bskor ba byas pa de mthong ngo/ /rdo rje las byung sna tshogs pa'i/ /rmi lam
446b6(rgyud 'grel): dri med de mthong na/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las/ /skye ba bla na med pa 'grub/ /gdol pa khyi'i sbyor ba sogs/ /rdo rje 'dzin pas mthong nas ni/ /blo ldan rdo rje sems dpa' yi/ /sems kyi gnas ni grub par gsungs/ /
446b7(rgyud 'grel): yi ge phyag rgya rnams gnyis kyis/ /skye mched mthong ba de bzhi no/ /lha'i sku ni gsal bsgom na/ /bsod nams chen po thob par 'gyur/ /de nyid chu zla'i shes rab ni/ /ye shes tshogs ni rdzogs par gyur/ /bdag nyid
447a1(rgyud 'grel): lha dang mnyam sbyor bas/ /yon tan chung yang 'grub par 'gyur/ /ye nas mnyam nyid sbyor bas su/ /lha nyid du ni rtag tu bsgom/ /bde gshegs kun dang mnyam sbyor bas/ /dkyil 'khor kun dang mnyam par 'gyur
447a2(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor kun dang mnyam pa'i phyir/ /sku gsung ye shes lnga rdzogs 'grub/ /yi dam lha yi mtshan nyid ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ /sku gsung rdo rje bdag po'i phyir/ /lha spangs dge sbyong don med 'gyur/ /dam tshig bsrung
447a3(rgyud 'grel): dang sngags zlas dang/ /phyag rgya rgyun mi bcad pa gzhi'i/ /brtson 'grus che zhing brtan par bzung/ /rnal 'byor brtson 'grus chung 'gyur na/ /mi 'grub nyen yang med par gsungs/ /ji ltar ral gri'i so la nan tan du/ /legs
447a4(rgyud 'grel): par ma bzung lag pa tshod par 'gyur/ /de bzhin nan tan med pa'i gsang sngags la/ /phung ba 'am yang na 'bras bu med par 'gyur/ /de bas bar chad brtson med na/ /dper na sa bon tshig pa las/ /'bras bu 'dod pa dang 'dra
447a5(rgyud 'grel): ste/ /bsgrubs pa'i 'bras bu med par dang/ /mi khom 'khor bar brgyud par 'gyur/ /gang zhig zhal mthong mos pa yis/ /bsnyen bskur mched pa'i bsod nams kyis/ /mi dge mtshams med bco lnga sogs/ /las ngan
447a6(rgyud 'grel): sbyangs te rigs la sbyor/ /gang gis mi rtag mthong na'ang/ /phyag rgya ma nyams gsal bzung ste/ /las kyi mi 'khor gang 'dod du/ /a yi stobs kyis bskul bar bya/ /rnam smin rigs la the tshom med/ /'on te 'am ni
447a7(rgyud 'grel): rim pa yis/ /de nyid bar phyir lan grangs gzhan/ /che 'am? phyi ma 'am gzhan thob des/ /rnal 'byor las su rung rnams kyis/ /phyag rgya chen po rdzogs 'gyur zhing/ /gsal ba'i yid gnyis med pa na/ /dkyil 'khor
447b1(rgyud 'grel): chen po 'grub par 'gyur/ /de ltar bsgom zhing 'grub byas na/ /'bras bu mngon du ma byung yang/ /tshe rabs skye ba thams cad du/ /lha mi mtshan rdzogs sdug bsngal sel/ /bde gshegs 'byung dang mi skol zhing/ /theg pa
447b2(rgyud 'grel): sman la 'jug mi 'gyur/ /byang chub gzungs la zhugs pa yin/ /de bas lam 'di 'bral mi bya'o/ /phyag rgya bcing ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u ste lnga pa'o// //rang gi lha la phyag 'tshal te/ /spros pa'i
447b3(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor bshad par bya/ /spros pa bzhi po de lta bur/ /gzhan pa 'grol phyir rgyas par bshad/ /rnal 'byor rnam gsum mngon rdzogs nas/ /sa la sogs pa phyag rgyar byas/ /ri mo rgyu 'am 'bur lugs sam/ /'jim
447b4(rgyud 'grel): pa las byas dkyil 'khor ni/ /lhag pa gzugs brnyan khung bu dngos/ /ye shes byin ldan rten par bya/ /ma hA ba liM a mri ta/ /dmar chen phyi nang mchod pa bkram/ /rol mo mchod sogs cha rkyen rnams/ /ji ltar 'os pa
447b5(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du bya/ /phyogs bcing brgyad kyi rim rdzogs nas/ /las kyi lnga'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /mchod rdzas byin gyis brlabs par bya/ /bdud rtsi chus bsang bgegs bskrad 'dug /bsod nams yongs su rdzogs bya zhing/ /
447b6(rgyud 'grel): spyod yul byin gyis brlab pa dang/ /'khor los mthar dbyung ba dang/ /tshogs la dus kyi bsgrub phyir sgom/ /dgug gtang bcing sgrol? gso dang gsad/ /'pham rgyal ting 'dzin 'dis byed phyir/ /gang dag gdul bya ji snyed pa/ /
447b7(rgyud 'grel): spros pa'i las kyis gdon phyir ro/ /ci gnas spros pa'ang rnam gnyis te/ /rjes su mthun par zhi dang khro/ /de re re ngang? tshul gnyis kyis/ /blo dang ldan par mtshan ston yin/ /snga ma
448a1(rgyud 'grel): rim dang cig car ba/ /che bas phyi ma bzhin 'jug pa/ /nyi zla gza' skar dus gcig tu/ /chu dkyil dang bar gsal ba bzhin/ /sku gsal skad cig 'od du 'bar/ /snying po brjod pas 'khor lo
448a2(rgyud 'grel): shar/ /de sngon bstan pa bzhir 'jug pa/ /mthong dang snga ma'i rnal 'byor stobs/ /thob pas shes bya bslab tshul dang/ /du ma gcig gis gsal byed pa'ang/ /ma bsgyur rnal ma'i dkyil 'khor la/ /'khor lo tshom
448a3(rgyud 'grel): bu grangs zhal phyag /dang po bco brgyad bzhi bcu gnyis/ /rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor rim par bslab/ /gnyis pa'ang bdag cag yab yum gnyis/ /gnas pa'i 'khor lo gsal bya ste/ /gdan ldan dbus na bdag po
448a4(rgyud 'grel): gnas/ /de la sems dpa' khro bos bskor/ /bstan nas mdun rgyab sku gsung thugs/ /'khor lo rdzogs pa 'bru gsum brda'/ /mi'i dbang du tshom bu gsum/ /shin tu goms par bya ba yin/ /bstan na
448a5(rgyud 'grel): g.yas dang g.yon nyid du/ /yon tan 'phrin las dkyil 'khor gzhag /rnal 'byor dbang du tshom bu lnga/ /shin tu 'dris nas dus tshogs sbyar/ /gsum pa rtsa ba sku nyid du/ /bstan nas sku gsum gtso bor gsal/ /
448a6(rgyud 'grel): gsum tshor med na yon tan gsal/ /lnga rdzogs yab yum zung bstan nas/ /lnga po'i don spros bzhi bcu gnyis/ /ma bcos ngang gis gnas pa las/ /ye shes lhag pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgom/ /yan lag bzhi
448a7(rgyud 'grel): bcu rtsa gnyis ldan/ /de nyid yan lag spros bdag ste/ /bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis gsum 'phror 'gyur/ /stangs dbyal gnyis kyi phyag rgya dang/ /sangs rgyas stong gi dkyil 'khor yang/ /ri rab til 'bru'i tshul
448b1(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du/ /dpe byad mtshan gyis rnam spras pa'o/ /de ltar gtso mchog ldan byas nas/ /bya byed rigs bzhi'ang stong sgom bya/ /bcu gnyis drug gis 'od 'phro 'bar/ /nyi khri bzhi stong dus cig gsal/ /phyogs bcu ma lus gzhal yas
448b2(rgyud 'grel): khang/ /nyi zla gza' skar rgyan dang gdan/ /bde gshegs dkyil 'khor ma lus sgom/ /bsam yas lhun grub nyid la slob/ /bzhi pa cig zhal gsum phyag drug /bstan na gsum la'ang de bzhin te/ /lnga pa rjes
448b3(rgyud 'grel): su mthun goms nas/ /spros pa'i zhal phyag rdzogs gsal ba'o/ /bsgyur ba'i 'khor lo'ang de bzhin te/ /dang po lnga bcu brgyad goms nas/ /drug cu rtsa brgyad de bzhin te/ /dbus kyi he ru bzhi po la/ /sku gsung
448b4(rgyud 'grel): khro bo mdun rgyab gsal/ /de bstan 'khor dang bcas par bsgom/ /sku gsung thugs la bstan byas nas/ /g.yas g.yon pa 'phrin las khro bo/ /yab yum gsal nas 'khor lo lha/ /rdzogs par sgoms pa'i rims
448b5(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du/ /gang byas ma sun gyen du 'bar/ /rjes su mthun pas 'jigs byed kyang/ /gcig dang gnyis dang gsum bzhi lnga/ /yab yum mthar phyin 'khor lo'i chas/ /lnga bcu'i tshom bu gnas yul dang/ /sgom
448b6(rgyud 'grel): las? hUM chen brgya rtsa brgyad/ /yan lag bkod pa lnga bcu brgyad/ /tshes lnga'i grangs ni nyis brgya dang/ /dgu bcu'i lha rnams yan lag ldan/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis gsum drug dang/ /dgu dang bco brgyad kun ldan dang/ /
448b7(rgyud 'grel): nyi shu rtsa gcig bzhi bcu gnyis/ /dgu brgya stong brgyad brgya zhabs dang/ /grangs med bar du slob byed pa/ /rims thabs brjod kyi spyod yul ni/ /nyi shu gcig dang dgu brgya dang/ /grangs med mthar lam rim par ldan/ / 
449a1(rgyud 'grel): de ltar ldan pa'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /zhugs slob mthar phyin bar skabs su/ /rang bzhin yul nas dbab bya ste/ /bzhugs shing sngan sogs ldan byas te/ /rdzas dang ting 'dzin rim bzhin mchod/ /bstod smad ldan nas bsnyen pa bya/ /bar skabs lhag
449a2(rgyud 'grel): ma'i gnas skabs nas/ /dam bsgrags bcol zhing las la dgye/ /'khor lo bsdu srung spyod lam kun/ khro zhi man ngag gzhung bzhin bya/ /phung sogs dkyil 'khor lhar snang ba/ /rgya mtsho'i gzugs brnyan ji bzhin du/ /kun rdos rang
449a3(rgyud 'grel): rig lhar gsal ba/ /gcig dang du ma yongs kyis med/ /gsal la yul ni mi g.yo ba/ /rnal 'byor ngo bor rgyal bas gsungs/ /rang bzhin spros pas rnal 'byor spros/ /de yang gdug 'dul khro zhis spros/ /'khor lo spros
449a4(rgyud 'grel): dang phyag rgya spros/ /tshom bu spros dang zhal phyag spros/ /kun nas spros phyir 'bras buAng spros/ /spros pas nyams gsal rnal 'byor sgra'o/ /'di tshe le lo rnam gnyis dang/ /mtshan mdza' lnga dngos mthong 'dzin dang/ /
449a5(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor bdud kyi yul mthong ba/ /sprul pa grangs med dgye ba mthong/ /dam par mdun mthong dam par smra/ /rgyal bas gsungs kun gsal mthong dang/ /dus gsum gsal shes mthong ba dang/ /rgyud drug lam gnas kun
449a6(rgyud 'grel): mthong nas/ /de la snying rje'i shugs 'byung dang/ /kun kyang gsal bar mthong ba dang/ /ci la'ang thogs med 'gro ba dang/ /mkha' las gzhi 'dra 'dug dang/ /rgyal bas phyag brkyang lung ston dang/ /kun gyi skad du chos smra dang
449a7(rgyud 'grel): snod bcud sti gnas mthong ba dang/ /stong gsum mnyam par bkod pa dang/ /de nyid rang bzhin gsal snang dang/ /las su rung bas thogs med dang/ /dam pa'i don la sgom pa dang/ /'jig rten gtso bos mchod 'byung rnams/ /
449b1(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin rtogs na dam pa'i rtags/ /mi shes dga' brod byad pa bdud/ /khe dang grags pas phrogs pa dang/ /sngags pa thob bas mtshan ma g.yengs/ /re dang dogs pa cung zad yod/ /nga'am nga zhes che bas rgyal/ /tha mal ba'ang nyung la
449b2(rgyud 'grel): phra/ /rgyu ba'i gzung 'dzin bye brag shes/ /shes 'jug 'byor pas 'go thob cing/ /zung du 'brel pas bskyed mthar phyin/ /'bras bu lam shes bstan pa yis/ /bya ba med pa'i brtson 'grus blang/ /mtshan ma rang rig cho 'phrul
449b3(rgyud 'grel): pa/ /sems phyir mthong la re dogs med/ /dper na nam mkha' rang bzhin la/ /nyi zla gza' skar glog 'gyu dang/ /'ja' tshon sprin mnga' 'khrul 'gyur yang/ /nam mkha' i dbyings la 'gyur nyams med/ /chos kyi dbyings ni
449b4(rgyud 'grel): bsam yas par/ /sku gsung rmad 'byung ngo mtshar dang/ /mtshan ma sna tshogs snang 'gyur yang/ /de bzhin nyid la nyams 'gyur med/ /rnal 'byor stobs yon rdzogs 'gyur yang/ /bdag gnyis med shes nga rgyal
449b5(rgyud 'grel): med/ /spyod yul mtshan ma gang mthong yang/ /ye shes rang snang nyid du sbyar/ /snang byed spros pa'ang 'phel ba'i rims/ /bslab pa'i rim pa ji bzhin te/ /sngon brtan mod kyang 'di slob pa/ /ma goms dbang ni rnam
449b6(rgyud 'grel): lnga'o/ /gsum lnga lha gsal cung zad g.yo/ /bar chad 'byung ba'ang dang po'o/ /de gsal thun gyi bzhi cha gsum gsal ba mi g.yo gnyis pa ste/ /thun kyang drub? pa gsum pa'o/ /de nyid rkyen dbang mi 'gro ba/ /bzhi
449b7(rgyud 'grel): pa'o phyar bar gnas pa yin/ /shin tu mi 'phrogs lnga pa ste/ /grangs la sbyar na mthar thal 'gyur/ /de bas nyams tshod zin pa zhes/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i lta spyod ni/ /ji ltar spyad kyang rang bzhin med/ /mkha' la bya chen lding
450a1(rgyud 'grel): ba bzhin/ /chu la rkyal chen 'phyo ba bzhin/ /mkha' la rlung chen 'phyo ba bzhin/ /rnal 'byor lta? ba de lngar lta/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i spyod pa ni/ /thams cad kun la dbyer med spyod/ /bde ba'i ro mchog myong 'gyur te/ /de las su zhig chags
450a2(rgyud 'grel): par byed/ /spyod bzhin ma chags ye shes yin/ /bde ba mchog nyid bsod nams tshogs/ /de lta bu'i dang la spyod/ /'di ni spyod pa rlabs chen yin/ /lta spyod ya char ma gyur par/ /sngags 'chang rnams kyi rtag tu dpyad/ /lnga bzhi'i spang bya rmad spyod
450a3(rgyud 'grel): kun/ /bdag dang gzhan phyir 'jol nyog ste/ /gang yang byas la ma mthong zhing/ /tshogs 'gyur 'dam skyes bzhin spyod thabs/ /yan lag dbang po rnam shes kun/ /rnam smin oM du shes par bya/ /rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor nyid du
450a4(rgyud 'grel): sgom/ /yang na khros pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgom/ /gzugs sgra dri ro reg la sogs/ /rnam smin muM du shes par bya/ /yum gyi dkyil 'khor nyid du sgom/ /yang na khro mo'i de phyir sgom/ /spyod yul lha dang lha mor rol/ /'dod yon lnga po thams cad dang/ /sna
450a5(rgyud 'grel): tshogs snang ba thams cad kun/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor dang/ /gzugs mdzes lha dang lha mor brtag /thams cad kun tu bzang po yi/ /'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams la/ /thogs pa med par sbyang bya ste/ /
450a6(rgyud 'grel): bsod nams tshogs chen yin par brtag /de bzhin gshegs pa lngar yang brtag /gzhan yang stong khams thams cad na/ /shes rab dbyings dang 'dod yon rnams/ /rab 'bring tha ma thams cad dpyad/ /dang du blang dang mi
450a7(rgyud 'grel): blang ba/ /rnal 'byor pa yis rtag tu dpyad/ /chags pa med par gyur pa dang/ /dngos grub pa mtshan chen po ni/ /dam tshig mdo bshad nang nas 'byung/ /spyod yul mthong thos thams cad kun/ /'gro dang 'dug dang nyal
450b1(rgyud 'grel): ba na/ /dkyil 'khor gnyis kyi rnal 'byor pas/ /ma nyams pa'i dbyings na gnas/ /shes rab mchog gis brtag tu dpyad/ /yang na dam tshig 'di lta bu/ /ji ltar spyad kyang sdom mi 'da' / /thams cad ma lus sangs rgyas la/ /bsgrub
450b2(rgyud 'grel): cing srung bar bya ba med/ /dge dang mi dge gnyis kha med/ /de la bsrung du rdul tsam med/ /gzhan phyir dregs pa'i bsrungs bya kun/ /gang ltar 'tsham par gda' mi byed/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i bka' bshad pa'i/ /sdom pa'i rtsa ba thams cad
450b3(rgyud 'grel): kun/ /de bzhin nyid du ma srungs na/ /yag sha khro bo me dpal gyis/ /snying las drangs te khrag 'thungs nas/ /ngan song gsum du skye bar 'gyur/ /de'i sdug bsngal bzod glags med/ /de'i phyir lam bzhir ldog zag yod/ /shing
450b4(rgyud 'grel): bal lta bur shin tu yang/ /dbugs kyi rgyu ba yun rings bral/ /rnal 'byor mkha' la gza' skar bzhin/ /gsal la mi g.yo spyod yul med/ /zhor las byung bas rdzogs pa'i phyir/ /'di zhes grangs kyi cha las 'das/ /las su rung ba'i
450b5(rgyud 'grel): rtags rnams kyang/ /sngon byung stobs su 'phel ba dang/ /khams snyoms rang lus bde bas rgyas/ /'du ba bzhi bral bzod thob tshe/ /mngon shes drug dang rtsa lnga rdzogs/ /rab 'bring cha yis yul khams gling/ /tshun chad
450b6(rgyud 'grel): gsal zhing 'dul bar byed/ /tshigs drug dag pa'i stobs las gyur/ /rdzu 'phrul nyi shu cha g.yo thob/ /thams cad skad mthun chos ston rjes/ /sa g.yos chos snang byed pa dang/ /yi ge sgrar byed kun brjod pa'o/ /'di dag
450b7(rgyud 'grel): mthong dang bco brgyad dang/ /shugs snang brgyad mthong re dogs gzhag /rmi lam gcig dang chos mthun par/ /'byung pa gsal dang stan pas dbye/ /'byung ba lnga nyid rigs kyi yum/ /bzang po ltas su lung bstan kun/ /
451a1(rgyud 'grel): lam 'di rdzogs par 'byung ba yin/ /bsgrub pa'i rigs 'dzin lam 'di nyid/ /mthar phyin rigs kyi rgyu yin phyir/ /mtshan ma 'byung ba'i sa yin te/ /bar chad med tshogs skabs suAng 'di'o/ /phung po
451a2(rgyud 'grel): lnga nyid de bzhin gshegs/ /dbang po rnam shes byang chub sems/ /yul dus byang chub chen mo yin/ /bdag rtogs rnam bzhi khro bo yin/ /rtag chad mu bzhi khro mo'o/ /de sems rang rig nyid ces bya/ /de bzhin
451a3(rgyud 'grel): mnyam rdzogs lhun grub pa'i/ /de bzhin gshegs dang ye shes lnga/ /rang 'byung chen po'i dkyil 'khor sgom/ /rtog gnyis bral ba'i thabs mkhas kyis/ /lha gsal dngos po med sgoms nas/ /mthong thos la
451a4(rgyud 'grel): sogs med pa'i tshul/ /rang rig ye shes gsal sgoms na/ /rang bzhin med las cir yang 'grub/ /rkyen gyis 'gyur ba'i dus byung na/ /spros pa gang yin gzung ba yis/ /las ngan lam zhes rgyun bcad
451a5(rgyud 'grel): nas/ /bar ma 'am phyi mar gnyis sbyor 'dzin/ /gang zhig nus gzhan skabs med pa'o/ /'phen pa'i 'brel pas sa bon gyis/ /tshe rabs kun tu bde thob nas/ /gsum dang mi skol spyod pas thob/ /snyoms
451a6(rgyud 'grel): las med par brtson byas na/ /lam du rigs 'dzin thob pa yang/ /chos nyid dam tshig smon mthu dang/ /yan lag rdzogs par rigs 'dzin 'gyur/ /spros pa'i rnal 'byor rgyun chags pa'i/ /bsod nams ye
451a7(rgyud 'grel): shes longs sbyor gyi/ /mun snang dug 'gyur ji bzhin du/ /yi ge 'khor lo tshogs mchog bsnyes/ /spros pa'i rnal 'byor la slob pa'i le'u ste/ drug pa'o// //dkyil 'khor gnyis
451b1(rgyud 'grel): la phyag 'tshal nas/ /bar chad med par sbyor ba yi/ /bsgrub pa dus kyi tshogs bshad bya/ /bar chad med pa'i lam bsgrub pa'ang/ /bsnyen pa dang ni nye bsnyen dang/ /bsgrub pa dang ni bsgrub chen pos/ /rdzogs par skabs
451b2(rgyud 'grel): 'dir shes par bya/ /'di yang lam bsgrub sbyor ba yi/ /cha'i dang po bsnyen pa 'di/ /byang chub sems rtogs 'grus pa dang/ /bsnyen pa'i dam pa yin pa'i phyir/ /sems chas snying rje man chad do/ /phyag rgya gsal ba nye bsnyen pa//
451b3(rgyud 'grel): de phyir gcig dang spros pa'o/ /bsgrub pa nyid ni bar chad med/ /dus kyi tshogs mdza' bsgrub chen len/ /mthar lam gang thob grub pa po/ /gsum pa mchod pa'i skabs su shes/ /gnyis pa gtso bo 'dir bstan pa/ /bzhi dang gzhung
451b4(rgyud 'grel): gis rdzogs par 'gyur/ /phun sum tshogs pa lnga bzhi la/ /bsnyen bsgrub bzhi yis gzhung bsrangs pa'o/ /gang dag mos pa ji bzhin du/ /zhi dang khro bos bsgrub par bya/ /de la snga ma gnas dang dus/ /yo byad ston 'khor
451b5(rgyud 'grel): bsgrub pa po/ /bsgrub thabs phun sum tshogs pa yis/ /bzhi dang sbyor bas gzhung rdzogs bya/ /de la spros pa mthar phyin pas/ /cho ga lnga ni rdzogs byas shing/ /yo byad lnga ni rdzogs par ldan/ /sngags kyi yan lag lnga rdzogs
451b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i/ /rnal 'byor tshogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis/ /nges par legs pa'i dgongs pa 'grub/ /ston pa mdzod ldan chu bo rdzogs/ /gnyer ldan rgyud dang las la mkhas/ /man ngag drod 'chang brgyad 'chang ba/ /rnal 'byor
451b7(rgyud 'grel): mthar ldan shin tu bsten/ /ston pa mchod brtson rtogs pa gsal/ /dam tshig sngags dang phyag rgya rnams/ /ma nyams shes shing yo byad ldan/ /'khor gyis 'grub 'gyur mi ldan brlag /sde dpung chen pos mi tshugs shing
452a1(rgyud 'grel): tha dad? bar snang shis pa dang/ /lo rgyus rnam gnyis ldan pa dang/ /yid 'ong sa brtsal rgyas par bya/ /rnyed nas tshom bu'i grangs bzhin du/ /che chung rkyen du 'tsham par bya/ /'khor khang phyi nang ldan pa'i//
452a2(rgyud 'grel): rin chen byug pas bsrungs pa dang/ /rin chen spros pa'i gzhal yas khang/ /yid 'ong bya ba shin tu gces/ /tshes grangs yar gyi brgyad la rtsam/ /shin tu skar ma rgyal rnams la/ /byang chub spyod pa tshar spyod bya/ /
452a3(rgyud 'grel): gsang chen dngos grub myur ba'i phyir/ /gza' skar shis pas blang bar bya/ /zhag ni sum cu phrag drug gam/ /bcu gnyis bcu bzhi bcu drug gis/ /dbang sgyur rigs kyi mchog bsgrub phyir/ /rnal 'byor brtson chas
452a4(rgyud 'grel): rims bzhin bsgrub/ /gos brgyan bza' btung gsang ba dang/ /bsgrub pa'i yo byad lnga rnams dang/ /dkyil 'khor yo byang mchod pa'i rdzas/ /dngos grub rten dang bar chad bzlog /yo byad dag par bsdu byas te/ /
452a5(rgyud 'grel): tshe gsum bcad la byin gyis brlab/ /sgrub thabs yan lag bzhi sbyar ba/ /gnas dang longs spyod ci bde dang/ /ma nyams blo ni rab ldan pas/ /dang pa'i dam mnos bzhin du bya/ /dam bcas ldan pas 'dus
452a6(rgyud 'grel): te bsgrub/ /yang na dpag tshad rgyang grags tshad/ /so sor 'tsham pa'i gzugs brnyan bri/ /brgyan dang mchod sogs 'khor ba dang/ /phyi rol mchod pa la sogs te/ /phyin chad bsrung sgo rims bzhin bya/ /
452a7(rgyud 'grel): bsnyen pa'i don du sngon bya ba/ /rdzogs pa'i las rnams zin par bya/ /'dus pas phyogs bcing rdzas brlabs nas/ /spyi 'am yang na re re zhing/ /tshom bu'i dkyil 'khor rims bzhin sgom/ /rnal 'byor thabs
452b1(rgyud 'grel): dang shes rab kyis/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i yum du bsgom/ /sems dpa' sems ma nyid du bsgom/ /so so'i rigs dang phyag rgya dang/ /ting 'dzin yang dag so sor gsal/ /rigs kyi rigs te rigs kyi gtso/ /thugs kyi thugs
452b2(rgyud 'grel): te thugs kyi mchog /khro bo'i tshogs dang ldan pa yi/ /tshom bu gcig pa'i lha rnams bsgom/ /de bzhin rigs dang rdo rje'i rigs/ /pad+ma'i rigs te sku gsung thugs/ /khro bo'i tshogs dang ldan rig pa'i/ /tshom bu
452b3(rgyud 'grel): gsum pa'i lha rnams bsgom/ /lnga dang lnga'i sbyor ba yis/ /tshom bu lnga'i lha bkod la/ /khro bo bcu dang khro mo bcu/ /'khor lo'i tshul du rnam par bsgom/ /byin brlabs dbang dang ldan byas nas/ /rang bzhin gnas
452b4(rgyud 'grel): nas dbab byas te/ /bzhugs dang bstan byas rim bar mchod/ /rdzogs nas bstod de bsnyen pa bya/ /zin nas bsdu ste rnal 'byor tshogs/ /tshul bzhin mchod pa'i 'phrin las bya/ /nang nub mkha' 'gro lhag ma sbyin/ /
452b5(rgyud 'grel): bar chad zlog cing bsnyen pa bya/ /zla phyed phyed zhag nye bsnyen pa/ /lha gsal 'phro 'dus snod du rung/ /bco lnga mar phyed bsgrub pa ste/ /'phro 'du bsnol nas bsgrub par bya/ /zhag grangs tshangs nas rtags byung na/ /
452b6(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub bzlas bslang bsgrub chen po/ /de bzhin rgyud kyi zhag grangs bzhin/ /bar chad med par bsgrub par bya/ /spyod lam yo byad lnga spyod cing/ /dngos su mchod pa rnam gnyis po/ /gtso ru dgos pa gang yin pa/ /
452b7(rgyud 'grel): phyi ma'i gdug pa 'dul bar shes/ /snga ma rgyas par bshad par bya/ /gos brgyan bza' btung glu gar rnams/ /hUM du shes pas rab spyad na/ /ngo mtshar dkyil 'khor mnyes pa'i phyir/ /gsang sogs yo byad
453a1(rgyud 'grel): lnga po rnams/ /rig phyir ma skyes ye shes gsal/ /chos nyid ye shes rol par sgom/ /cig shos tshe yang di bzhin no/ /phyogs bcu mdza' yas dus bzhi'i/ /thams cad dbyer med ma 'da' la//
453a2(rgyud 'grel): nyi zla shar ba'i gzhal yas nang/ /pad+ma chags med gdan bting nas/ /rin chen zad med pho brang sa/ /che chung tshad dpag med pa'i/ /byang chub bde ldan dkyil 'khor la/ /bde ldan byang chub rab bkod nas/ /ma
453a3(rgyud 'grel): lus thams cad dbyings bsdus nas/ /lus bskyod yan lag bsgul gsigs nas/ /dpa' po lnga'i dkyil 'khor kun/ /phyag rgya chen po yin par bshad/ /lhag pa'i ting 'dzin 'ba' zhig ga/ /bro sogs
453a4(rgyud 'grel): tshe na sgom pa 'ang/ /'bruM dang tsakra'i dkyil 'khor du/ /pad+ma chags med gdan bting nas/ /thabs dang shes rab chags med tshul/ /yan lag lnga po thams cad kun/ /rang bzhin yongs kyis dag pa dang/ /ting
453a5(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'o/ /yin sa ma bcos yongs rdzogs kyis/ /lhag pa'i ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor gis/ /dbu la de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor/ /yan lag bzhi la rigs bzhi'i 'khor/ /
453a6(rgyud 'grel): kha dog dbyibs dang phyag rgya dang/ /thabs dang shes rab gsal bsgoms te/ /phyogs bcur spros shing ngan song sbyong/ /gnas su bsdu zhing dkyil 'khor bstim/ /'das dang ma 'das thams cad kun/ /bde
453a7(rgyud 'grel): gshegs zhing du rnam par sbyor/ /yan lag chen po lnga bskyod na/ /rigs lnga'i dkyil 'khor ma lus g.yo/ /'gro lnga byang chub lam du mdzad/ /snyigs ma lnga yang rnam par dag /bzang mdzes legs par go/ bgos na
453b1(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer sna tshogs 'phro bar 'gyur/ /de nas mthar thug med pa'i bar/ /ye shes lnga yis brgyan par 'gyur/ /brgyan mchog mdzes par lus brgyan nas/ /ting 'dzin 'od 'bar gsal bsgoms te/ /phyogs bcu gang bar dkyil
453b2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor sbros/ /bdag nyid chen po'i dkyil 'khor la/ /mi dmigs dbyings nas dkyil 'khor mchod/ /'dod lnga thabs shes rab gnas/ /bde mchog ro yang myong bar byed/ /bag chags tshogs chen gnyis dang/
453b3(rgyud 'grel): ldan/ /bro thabs gar gyi phyag rgya dang/ /glu dbyangs tshig gi sgra bsgrags na/ /phyogs bcu skye gnas ma lus kun/ /lhun grub rdo rje'i sku mthong zhing/ /chos kyi dung chen sga yang thos/ /sgrib gnyis byang nas byang chub 'grub/ /bden
453b4(rgyud 'grel): mthong snyan grags tshogs chen 'grub/ /mchags ye shes che dang ldan/ /thabs dang shes rab thams cad kun/ /dbus nas shar phyogs kha bstan te/ /seng+ge stobs chen mchod par bya/ /dbang po lnga la yi ge lnga/ /gsal
453b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i 'phro 'du mngon shes rdzogs/ /'dod pa lnga la chags med rol/ /bdag dang gzhan don rdzogs par byed/ /tshom bu gsal ba'i yab yum rnams/ /phan tshun 'od 'phro stim bya ste/ /dkyil 'khor 'bar ba gsal gyur
453b6(rgyud 'grel): nas/ /bdag dang phyogs bcu'i gnyis med sgom/ /phyogs phyogs rim bzhin kha ltas te/ /thugs sku gsung yon las kyi glu/ /bro tshig brjod dang ye shes rgyan/ /bra glu rigs lnga spyi glu bo/ /rnam lnga stan nas glu ldan
453b7(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /sreg ldan bra glus don gnyis rdzogs/ /bza' dang bca' dang btung myur rnams/ /thabs dang shes rab nyid gnas shing/ /bdag nyid chen po mchod pa yis/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor ma lus mnyes/ /srid
454a1(rgyud 'grel): gsum sems can thams cad la/ /bde ba chen pos khyab par 'gyur/ /bdud rtsir 'gyur zhing 'byung ba dang/ /bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'i nang sel cing/ /longs spyod 'byung zhing ngan song sbyong/ /cir yang gzhan du 'gyur
454a2(rgyud 'grel): bar 'grub/ /de ltar bzhi dang ldan pa yis/ /thabs dang shes rab ldan gyur na/ /byin brlabs cha rnams rdzogs par bya/ /bsnyen bsgrub gsang ba bzhi rim pa/ /thams cad gnyis med dbyings su sbyor/ /gnyis med dbyings nas
454a3(rgyud 'grel): byang chub 'bar/ /'od 'phro 'bar bas phyogs bcur gsal/ /bde bas thabs chen thabs kyi mchog /shes rab bde mchog brtan ldan rdzogs/ /rdo rje dril bu yang dag ldan/ /phyag rgya bzhi dang lha mo brgyad/ /rdzogs rol nyi zla
454a4(rgyud 'grel): dus cig ldan/ /gnyis med zung du 'brel 'gyur na/ /bde gshegs dkyil 'khor ma lus 'byung/ /thig le rdo rje'i gzugs su chags/ /mchod chen mkha' 'gro gsal bar 'gyur/ /sgyu 'phrul dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu
454a5(rgyud 'grel): gnyis/ /dra ba'i dkyil 'khor mngon rdzogs pas/ /phyogs bcu dus bzhi mngon rdzogs pa'i/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba brtan pa yis/ /
454a6(rgyud 'grel): / /phyogs bcu dus bzhi gshegs pa yi/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor ma lus dang/ /khams gsum 'gro rnams mngon du 'gyur/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba mngon rdzogs pa'i/ /dkyil 'khor brtan pa'i ting nge 'dzin/ /
454a7(rgyud 'grel): gyo? gar 'du 'phro'i phyag rgya yis/ /'tshul? lam nam mkha' 'gro bar 'gyur/ /glu tshig sgra'i phyag rgya yis/ /chos kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /brgyan dang 'go ba'i phyag rgya yis/ /'bar ba'i rgyal po thub med 'grub/ /
454b1(rgyud 'grel): bza' dang btung ba'i phyag rgya yis/ /yid bzhin sku dang bdud rtsi 'grub/ /A li kA li'i phyag rgya yis/ /thams cad thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /gdug pa'i tshogs rnams bsgrub bya ba/ /gnas dang zla dang rdzas rnams ni/ /tshogs kyi mchog tu dmigs
454b2(rgyud 'grel): par gzhag /nags tshal chen bo dben pa'i sar/ /gzhung dang mthun pa rnyed nas ni/ /gnod sprad sa gnan byin gyis brlab/ /sa gzhi mnyam pa rgyas par bya/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /dkyil 'khor lnga bcu brgyad bstan pa'i/ /cho ga
454b3(rgyud 'grel): yan lag rdzogs pa yi/ /rnal 'byor 'dus pas nges par 'grub/ /ston pa rdo rje rgyal dbang can/ /rgyal tshab rgyal por mtshungs pa dang/ /dkar ma 'dangs chen 'phred bar ldan/ /lngon cug sdong reg mtshan rdzogs dang/ /rnal 'byor ming
454b4(rgyud 'grel): srid /brtse gdung ldan/ /tshom bu lnga 'am zung gis 'grub/ /dkar rtsi dmar rtsi dri sha chen/ /rdo rje dung chen dmar gyis ba gang/ /dung dang srog shing gsar rnying dang/ /gzugs dang lugs chen dung mchog dang/ /rgyan chas bcu drug
454b5(rgyud 'grel): tshang ba dang/ /bsgrub po 'tsho ba'i yo byad dang/ /bsgrub pa rdzas kyi yo byad dag /zhing 'gyur mchog dang mchog phran dang/ /skyen bzlog yungs kar lce pog nag /gu gul sman dang bcas pa dang/ /rdo rje go mtshon bcas pa dang/ /ji snyed
454b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rdzas rnams kun/ /'jigs byed chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ /nyams pa med pa'i sems kyis spyad/ /bsdus te tshogs su bya ba'i phyir/ /ci 'dod snang ba bdag gis dgod/ /zhag ni sum cu phrag drug gam/ /drug cu dgu bcu rtsa drug tu/ /
454b7(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs byed chen po'i dkyil 'khor sgom/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i dkyil 'khor la/ /rdeng dang bcas pa'i bsam pa yis/ /re ba med par rab tu bsgrub/ /glu dang gar dang phyag rgya dang/ /byang chub sems kyis mchod pa dang/ /brda' la
455a1(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa'i yon tan dang/ /bza' dang bca' dang btung dang bgo /longs spyod lnga ldan thams cad kyis/ /mdor na tshogs rnams mngon du bsgrub/ /sbyi'i bsnyen bsgrub sngon bzhin shes/ /bsgrub pa'i thabs kyi bsnyen bsgrub
455a2(rgyud 'grel): bzhi/ /dang po'i tshen gnas chen der/ /rgyang grags dpag tshad la sogs dang/ /lus ngag lus ni gsum gyi tshang/ /rang gi rig pas ci nus par/ /phyag rgya gzugs brnyan snying po rnams/ /lnga yi tshon gyis bri bar bya/ /yo byad sngon bzhin
455a3(rgyud 'grel): byin brlabs nas/ /'phags rgyal mchod cing phyi rol pa/ /bcu bzhi mnyes dang gnyis po yang/ /sbyin pas tshim byas bgo bar bya/ /'jigs byed dbang du bdag zhugs nas/ /khro bo khro mo'i 'khor du bya/ /gdan du gzir zhing phur bus gdag/
455a4(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin phal ba mchod bstod/ /bar chad ting 'dzin mchog gis bzlog /thun mong bsrung ba'i 'khor lor bya/ /de nas gnyis pa rgyun rnams dang/ /bsgrub rdzas mchod pa dam rdzogs nas/ /phyi nang gsang bas bsrung byas te/ /srin
455a5(rgyud 'grel): po rgyal po tshul bzhin mtshan?/ rtags ldan rdzas la byin brlabs bya/ /de nas rdzas rnams byin gyis brlab/ /de nas 'khor lo gcig pa 'am/ /gsum dang lnga ru sgom bya ba/ /'khor lo bar 'khyams sgo na dang/ /'jigs byed 'khor?
455a6(rgyud 'grel): lo rigs kyi gtso/ /btsun mo'i tshogs dang ldan par bya/ /zhi dang drag po dbang dang rgyas/ /'jigs pa'i tshogs chen de dbus su/ /bdag nyid drag por bcos tshul du/ /sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor sgom/ /de bzhin rdo rje
455a7(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma dang/ /rin chen ral gri tshom bu sgom/ /cig la'o rdo rje gsum mos pa/ /sku gsung thugs kyi 'jigs byed do/ /'jigs byed lnga rdzogs dkyil 'khor ni/ /'dus pa'i tshom bu lnga'i rigs/ /nyi shu rtsa lnga sku gsung thugs/ /
455b1(rgyud 'grel): yon tan 'phrin las rdzogs par bsgom/ /rgyan dang cha lugs la sogs pa/ /'jigs pa'i tshogs ni ji bzhin par/ /spyi 'am yang na re re ru/ /tsham dam chen po'i cha lugs bsgom/ /lhag pa'i dkyil 'khor dgu bu ldan/ /byin dbang thob pa'i bdag dkyil la/
455b2(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin phab bkug gzhug cing brtan/ /dgyes na rim bzhin mchod par bya// //oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM su ra to/ /mahA ban tsa sh+ri hi ru ka/ man tra dzwa la ma hA man da la/ kA ya bAg tsi ta/ oM oM oM/ hUM hUM hUM/ swaM swaM swaM/ AM
455b3(rgyud 'grel): AM AM/ haM haM haM/ badzra ma hA kA pa la kha ra ga dan ta dan dzwa la sid+d+hi/ mahA sh+rI he ru ka a me du a sid dod b+ha be/ /sang ha ra na hUM hUM hUM mahA yo ga ang d+ha mahA sa ma ya/ ru lu ru lu/ a la la la ho/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM su ra to ka ma la/ mahA su ka
455b4(rgyud 'grel): ma phye/ ma nu sa ma na/ dza li d+ha na/ a ba spho ka kha'i/ a la la la ho/ mchod stong rdzogs nas bsnyen pa ni/ /ye shes mdun du lhag pa la/ /bzlas pa gsal ba gsum gyis bya/ /oM badzraM mahA sh+rI hi ru ka /badzra kro ti shwa ri sarba
455b5(rgyud 'grel): dus stan hUM phaT/ ru lu ru lu mahA sa ma ya hUM/ ru lu ru lu hUM b+hyo hUM// //de sogs bzlas bsnyen 'phro 'du yis/ /bdun par bskul dang snod byed pa/ /snyen pa'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa'o/ /de bsnyen dra bzhin
455b6(rgyud 'grel): bsgrub pa yang/ /'phro 'du bskul dang dngos grub sdud/ /skyon bcu spangs te bsgrub pa ni/ /bsgrub pa'i dus su shes bar bya/ /gcig la rdzas btar tshur 'du ba/ /bsgrub pa chen por shes bar bya/ /shel dang byu ru pur ba dang/ /
455b7(rgyud 'grel): mthing gi bur ba mang po dag /rim bzhin bur ba me tog dang/ /mtsho la ser chen 'bab bzhin no/ /'od dang dri dang sgra gzugs dang/ /'khor dang 'bar dang khol 'byung na/ /bar chad cha rnams brtag bya ste/ /bar chod bskrad
456a1(rgyud 'grel): de bdag bsrungs la/ /zhag grangs tshang zhing rtags byung na/ /dkyil 'khor 'thun pa nyid du sbyar/ /gnas su stim zhing bstan par bya/ /de nas sngon bzhin rnam gsum thob/ /gsang mchog rgyas par bshad bya ba
456a2(rgyud 'grel): zhing 'gyur mchog dang mchog phran rnams/ /nyi zla'i steng du mkhas pas gzhag/ nga rgyal lag gi 'du byed sgom/ /hUM du gyur pas rnam par dag /dbyings su thim nas phyag rgyar 'bar/ /skur
456a3(rgyud 'grel): gyur 'od zer 'phro bas brjid/ /gtsug tu rnam par rgyal ba bsgom/ /de bzhin gshegs par byin brlabs nas/ /rgyal ba'i sras su dbang yang bskur/ /shin tu khro bo chen po yis/ /thabs kyi lha chen bsgral ba ltar/ /chos
456a4(rgyud 'grel): nyid rtogs pa'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /gnyis med par thal gyis bsgral/ /thugs rje chen po'i byin brlabs kyis/ /lam lnga'i sems can kun bkug nas/ /thams cad ma lus bsgral bar bya/ /phyi nang snod bcud ji snyed pa/ /
456a5(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa'i sems can ma lus kun/ /bdag nyid chen po rtogs pa gis/ /dbyings su yang ni bsgral bar bya/ /ri rab chen po'i gling bzhi la/ /gnas pa'i sems can ma lus kun/ /thugs rje chen po'i byin brlabs
456a6(rgyud 'grel): kyis/ /ye shes me chen sgom bya ste/ /thams cad ma lus bsreg par bya/ /dbyings su yang ni bstim par bya/ /srid gsum sreg pa'i me yin te/ /yid kyi ye shes me ru 'bar/ /raM/ ngo mtshar ngan 'gro thar pa'i
456a7(rgyud 'grel): thabs/ /ye nas skye med de bzhin nyid/ /sgyu mar snang ba mig yor tshul/ /sbyor sgrol bya ba kun byas kyang/ /rdul cha tsam yang byas pa med/ /de ltar bsgral ba kun byas kyang/ /bsgral ba'i dngos po gang yang med/
456b1(rgyud 'grel): phung po lnga po gshig par bya/ /bshig nas 'byung ba'i bag la zha/ /ma zhig na yang 'byung ba yin/ /rnam shes med pas bsang byas nas/ /rmi lam srog bcad tshul bzhin du/ /gnas pa nyid na dngos po med/ /sems kyi rang
456b2(rgyud 'grel): bzhin de la ni/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas dgrar las kyang/ /sus kyang zin cing song pa med/ /'o na thugs rjes gang bsgral na/ /rnam rtog mtshan ma thams cad kun/ /phyin ci log las bzlog bya ste/ /ting 'dzin sngags dang phyag
456b3(rgyud 'grel): rgya dang/ /shin tu goms pas dbang bskur te/ /byang chub zhing la dgod par bya/ /de tsam las ni bsgral zhes gdags/ /bsgral ba nyid na sbyor ba yod/ /nyon mongs sdug bsngal rtsad bcad nas/ /byang chub gnas su bsgral bas na/ /
456b4(rgyud 'grel): gnyis med dbyings su sbyor ba yin/ /lha mo klu mo rigs ngan mo/ /dbye 'am yang na mi dbye bar/ /bsnyen pa dang ni nye bsnyen po/ /bsgrub pa dang ni bsgrub chen pos/ /shes rab dbyings ma khrus byas la/ /bder gshegs dkyil
456b5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor kun bkod/ /bdag nyid rig pa'i lhar sgoms nas/ /gnyis su med par ldan par bya/ /rdo rje dril bu ldan gyur nas/ /yum gyi pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor du/ /byang chub pad+ma'i bde thugs spros/ /sems lnga rim par zin pa yis
456b6(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor ma lus la/ /dgyes mnyam mchog gi sbyin pas bstim /phyogs dus dkyil 'khor gsum mnyes dang/ /'gro ba mang po de thob nas/ /slar yang gnyis med dbyings su thim/ /thim 'gyur dbyings
456b7(rgyud 'grel): nas phyag rgyar 'bar/ /bde gshegs thabs bar shes rab rdzogs/ /phyag rgya drug kyang yang dag rdzogs/ /bsod nams tshogs chen gnyis kyang rdzogs/ /bsgrub pa nyi zla'i snying po de/ /dkyil 'khor rdo rje lce yis blang/ /
457a1(rgyud 'grel): mkha' 'gro gsal 'bar tshe la sogs/ /yid bzhin sprin gyi bdag por 'gyur/ /'gro drug dus gnas de dag snang/ /mchod pa chen po mnyam sbyor zhing/ /thams cad dbyings su sbyor bas na/ /ngan 'gror mi
457a2(rgyud 'grel): ltung yang dag 'grub/ /'di ni bsgral ba chen po yin/ /bsgral ba nyid na sbyor ba yin/ /sbyor ba nyid na ma lus bsgral/ /ye nas lha dang lha mo yi/ /dkyil 'khor yang dag sbyor ba dang/ /dbang po yul dus sbyor ba'o/ /phung po lnga
457a3(rgyud 'grel): nyid de bzhin gshegs/ /'byung ba lnga nyid yum du sbyor/ /dus bzhi lha mo nyid du sbyor/ /rtag chad mu bzhi khro mo bzhi/ /thams cad ma lus 'byung ba kun/ /mnyam pa'i dbyings nyid rig par sbyor/ /thabs kyis srin mo rol pa
457a4(rgyud 'grel): ltar/ /sbyor ba nyid na chags pa med/ /ma chags pa la chags pa dang/ /chags pa nyid na zin chags med/ /'di ni tshangs mchog rgyal po ste/ /shin tu chags pa chen po yin/ /ma rtags pa yi spyad gyur na/ /yi dwags srin po'i
457a5(rgyud 'grel): gnas su skye/ /mchod pa 'am spyod lam thams cad du/ /chas brgyad brgyan rnams bgo byas te/ /bza' btung rjes su mthun par dpyad/ /bro gar glu tshig ldan par bya/ /dbang po yul dus rig pa rnams/ /thabs dang shes rab
457a6(rgyud 'grel): ldan 'gyur zhing/ /mnyam pa'i dang nyid rtogs gsal na/ /thams cad bde ba chen po'i rgya/ /bskyod chen 'khor lo'i gzhal yas su/ /khro bo khro mo thams cad kun/ /gsal zhing 'od zer 'phro bsgoms na/ /bsgul bskyod thams cad
457a7(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya yin/ /thabs dang shes rab ldan pa'i zhabs/ /rtag tu rdo rje 'bar bar 'gyur/ /thabs chen re re bskyod pa na/ /pad+ma chags med re re 'byung/ /rdo rje pad+ma de sbyor na/ /sems can thams cad bla na med/ /byang chub zhing du
457b1(rgyud 'grel): skye bar 'gyur/ /rang bzhin dkyil 'khor lha rnams dang/ /khro bo'i dkyil 'khor sgom bya ste/ /dbu'i dkyil 'khor bsgul bskyod na/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor thams cad g.yo/ /lag gi 'du byed bskyod byas na/ /rigs 'dzin zhing khams
457b2(rgyud 'grel): thams cad g.yo/ /rkang pa'i stabs chen mnan mchongs na/ /sdug bsngal mi bzad thams cad dang/ /bdud dang log 'dren thams cad mnan/ /yan lag thams cad bsgul bsigs na/ /ba sbu bu ga re re nas/ /khro bo rdul snyed grangs med spro/ /
457b3(rgyud 'grel): de'i sprul pa grangs med kyis/ /phyogs bcu khams rnams rdul snyed du/ /khro bo'i don rnams rdul phran snyed/ /thugs rjes 'dul zhing dbyings su bstim/ /bro gar glu tshig stangs stabs dang/ /ting 'dzin yo byad thams cad kun/ /zhi
457b4(rgyud 'grel): ba tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor las/ /bro gar rtse 'jo la sogs bsgyur/ /'khor gyi 'phra men tshim bya ste/ /dbang du bsdu dang sgom pa rnams/ /rgyas byas skye las bsdud te dpyad/ /de ltar bsgrubs pas the tshom med/ /thabs dang shes rab
457b5(rgyud 'grel): thams cad kyis/ /de lta bu'i longs spyod ni/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor ma lus mnyes/ /srid gsum 'gro ba thams cad la/ /dga' ba chen pos khyab par 'gyur/ /rtags chen sngon bzhin 'phel ba rten/ /gling grangs mthong ba drug
457b6(rgyud 'grel): kyang 'byung/ /sgra brnyan rmi lam dag tu yang/ /bde ba'i 'jig rten gnas rnams dang/ /skye ba gang dag 'dzin pa dang/ /rigs 'dzin lung sten brtag par bya/ /zhag grangs bcu drug tshun chad kyis/ /lus ma spangs par rigs
457b7(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin sa/ /yun rings chos kyi bde spyad nas/ /bla med rdo rje sems dpa' i sar/ /dpe byad mtshon gyis rnam par brgyan/ /mngon shes drug ldan thams cad mkhyen/ /tshogs chen gnyis kyang rdzogs par rol/ /sangs rgyas zhing la
458a1(rgyud 'grel): dbang sgyur te/ /spyod yul kun tu ma 'da' la/ /ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub/ /de bas las dus rag lus sems/ /dor byas brtson 'grus chen pos sbyor/ /mthong ba'i chos la mya ngan 'da' o/ /rnal 'byor
458a2(rgyud 'grel): las su rung rnams kyis/ /'di lta bu'i las byas na/ /'bras bu mngon du ma byung na/ /lus ngag yid la dbang thob nas/ /sangs rgyas 'byung dang skal mnyam 'gyur/ /las dang 'brel ba'i byin brlabs kyis/ /theg pa dman par yong mi skye/ /bsod nams
458a3(rgyud 'grel): ye shes dpung tshogs kyis/ /las kyi mun pa sbyangs pa'i phyir/ /ngan song gsum du yong mi ltung/ /gnas ngan longs spyod mi bde ba'i/ /ngan song brgyad du 'gro mi 'gyur/ /gzugs mchog dam pa ldan pa'i phyir/ /rdo rje theg mchog rjed mi 'gyur//  
458a4(rgyud 'grel): tshe ring bde ba phun sum tshogs/ /lha ma'i gnas mchog sa skabs der/ /lus byad bzang zhing yan lag rdzogs/ /dbang po tshang zhing lhag chad med/ /skad gdangs snyan cing 'gro don byed/ /bdag gi longs spyod thams cad kun/ /gzhan la gnang
458a5(rgyud 'grel): ba med par 'grub/ /tshan po che'i mthu stobs ldan/ /'gro ba'i don dang yang dag ldan/ /gzhan la gnod pa yong mi byed/ /snying rje che zhing shes rab ldan/ /mthu stobs che zhing thabs ldan pas/ /bdag dang gzhan don rdzogs par byed/ /
458a6(rgyud 'grel): mthar phyin skye shi med pa'i sa/ /sangs rgyas yon tan rin po che/ /bkod pa'i gzhal yas thams cad la/ /'dod lha drug pa ji lta bar/ /dbang sgyur dpyod pa'i dngos grub thob/ /de phyir dbang bsgyur phyi ma'i dus/ /nyid du sbyor bas smos
458a7(rgyud 'grel): ci dgos/ /de ltar brtson 'grus ldan pas ni/ /mthong dang phyi mar ma gyur na'ang/ /lan grangs gzhan duAng bdun nyid las/ /mi 'da' rigs kyi dam par 'gyur/ /cho ga sngags dang yo byad dag /bco lnga rdzogs nas ma nyams
458b1(rgyud 'grel): ldan/ /nges par tshogs te tshogs dpyad na/ /'bras bu sngon du ma byung yang/ /rgyal po bran mo ngan bshos kyang/ /'byung nur chags pa'i rigs 'dzin te/ /mthong na dmangs kyi slar 'gyur zhing/ /kun la dbang sgyur stobs ldan pas/ /lha
458b2(rgyud 'grel): rnams re ba'i mthu skye bas/ /bsrung rbed mchod pa byed pa ltar/ /rnal 'byor stobs ldan 'gyur ba na/ /rdo rje dam can mang po kun/ /de'i dbang gis khur bar byed/ /spyod yul dor nas phyag rgyar rdzogs/ /la la de ltar de nges na/ /de ltar
458b3(rgyud 'grel): ma gyur bsod nams sa/ /tshe rabs skye ba thams cad du/ /las ngan lnga bcu brgyad spyod pa'i/ /sa gnas kun tu skye mi 'gyur/ /nges 'byung bzhi 'ang spyod mi 'gyur/ /rdo rje rigs mchog 'dzin 'gyur te/ /rnam smin thob nas sngon bzhin te/
458b4(rgyud 'grel): 'di la the tshom ldan min pas/ /skal ldan kun gyis rtags 'grub bya'o/ /bar chad med pa'i lam/ tshogs bsgrub pa'i le'u ste/ bdun pa'o// //dngos grub lhag pa'i mchog nyid la/ /bsnyen bsgrub bzhi yis
458b5(rgyud 'grel): mos byas nas/ /bde chen sa la dgod pa'i phyir/ /mthar phyin 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid bshad/ /dus tshogs bar chad med sa nas/ /lhag ma med dang yod pa yi/ /mya ngan 'da' bas mthar sbyor ba/ /thun mong lta bur zung du 'gyur//
458b6(rgyud 'grel): de la thog ma bshad pa ni/ /gcig dang du ma'i rnal 'byor ma/ /brtan nyid sa 'am de thob nas/ /zla drug bcu drug bsnyen bsgrub tshe/ /rdo rje'i lus su ma gyur par/ /stobs chud rkyen smon zhan pa'i phyir/ /rnam rtog 'byung ba'i lhag lus
458b7(rgyud 'grel): gzhag /rdo rje 'chang sar rig pas 'gro/ /lha'i rnal 'byor gsal rdzogs smin/ /lus kyi dra bas bsgrib gyur pa'i/ /ka la ping ka mi 'jigs bzhin/ /bral nas snang byed de rnams smin/ /yid kyis lha'i gzugs bzung zhing/ /
459a1(rgyud 'grel): lus kyi rgya mdud draln 'gyur nas/ /phyag rgya'i sku nyid gsal 'gyur nas/ /rnam par smin ces de la bya/ /rgya dmig yrgyas ji lta bar/ /phyag rgya thob la ma rag po'o/ /gzugs rdzogs stobs chen de kho na'o/ /de yang dgongs
459a2(rgyud 'grel): sa khyad par gnyis/ /dgongs spyod rgya mtsho snga phyi dang/ /rgyud mthun stobs chas ming grags pa/ /lhag med 'byung med las lus med/ /mya ngan 'das pa 'am min ces brjod/ /dkyil 'khor rol pa'i tshul spyod pas/ /tshogs
459a3(rgyud 'grel): gnyis rdzogs pas bdag gi don/ /smin pas 'phrin las rdzogs byed pas/ /mi dor dgod pa gzhag kyi'o/ /de de'ang 'di dang phyi ma dang/ /lan grangs gzhan du rab 'bring gis/ /thob kyi skal bar ma 'gyang ste/ /dgongs spyod
459a4(rgyud 'grel): rtson pa gtso phyir ro/ /gang de bral ma thag par du/ /brgya bzhi rdzogs par bdag 'gyur ba/ /rdo rje lnga sogs rig pas 'dzin/ /phyag rgya chen po'i rigs 'bras bu/ /de phyir rgya che'i bar chad med/ /lam mchog dbye sa cig
459a5(rgyud 'grel): yin no/ /bar chad med pa 'am smin pa'i/ /mngon par shes pa'ang de ming can/ /mi 'gyur nges par 'gyur pa 'ang yin/ /dpag tshad gling khams yul la sbyor/ /phyi ma dus kyi tshogs bsgrubs pas/ /dgongs spyod brtson
459a6(rgyud 'grel): pa stobs rdzogs dang/ /yo byad thabs kyi stobs las skyes/ /gzhan pa'i yo byad rtags pa na/ /dngos grub rol pa'i mthu las byung/ /thabs rgyus che bas so so'ang/ /lam las skyes pas mchog yin te/ /de yang rgyu dus
459a7(rgyud 'grel): ngo bo grangs/ /dgongs spyod mngon shes sbyor ba'i tshul/ /gzhi gnyis lus kyis rdzogs par bshad/ /thabs dang grang ba sgyur bya ba/ /shes rab rnam gsum goms byas nas/ /ting 'dzin mnyam pa'i don rtogs te/
459b1(rgyud 'grel): kun tu yangs pa chen por sgom/ /shes 'jug lnga rtogs goms pas ni/ /zla zhag rgyud bzhin bsgrub byed pas/ /rdo rje'i lus su the tshom med/ /ming bzhi lus nyid de lta'o/ /zhag ni sum cu phrag drug gam/ /bcu gnyis bcu bzhi bcu drug
459b2(rgyud 'grel): gas?/ /rab 'bring ji bzhin mi slu par/ /dbang sgyur rigs kyi dam pa 'grub/ /rgyu 'bras dus gcig rdzogs pa'i/ /rang rig nyid la dbang thob ste/ /tshon bcu dang drug pa'i/ /brgya brgya dag tu snur zhing gnas/ /lus ma bor bar sangs rgyas
459b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /don mthong 'jug pa mthar phyin pa/ /tshogs spyod bsgrub pa'i dngos grub kyis/ /lus khams skye gnas zag pa zad/ /rdo rje'i lus 'gyur tshe'i rigs/ /mthong ba'i chos la mya ngan 'das/ /lus ma bor bar sangs rgyas sa/ /
459b4(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs pa kun bral cho 'phrul tshogs/ /lha mi'i rgyal po skye ba 'dzin/ /lha dang mi dang tshangs pa'i/ /skye ba rnam dag 'dzin mod kyang/ /khyad par sa la gnas 'gyur yin/ /cha byad de nyid kyis chos ston/ /gang dag mi 'jigs rtsi 'chad
459b5(rgyud 'grel): ltar/ /dbang sgyur 'jigs pa lnga sogs bral/ /drug bzhi'i yan lag kun rdzogs shing/ /rang dbang sgyur ba'i skye ba yis/ /stong gsum 'jig rten rgyar 'dul byed/ /sgyu'i dang por bskal mnyam pa'o/ /bdag phyir don du gnyer ba ni//
459b6(rgyud 'grel): brgya phrag bcu drug tshe yis rdzogs/ /gzhan du rang dbang thob pa'i phyir/ /bskal pa grangs med gnas 'gyur yang/ /sku ni shin tu gzhon pa'i tshul/ /'dul ba'i dus kyi 'pho 'dug byed/ /ngo bo sman dang thabs rigs 'dzin/ /
459b7(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor sgrol ma'i rigs 'dzin dang/ /lam mchog rdzogs pa'i rim pa'ang bzhi/ /bcu dbang dang por 'dra mod kyang/ /de nyid mthu zag mi zag /rgyu dang ngo bo rnam pa gnyis/ /de bas dgongs spyod smos ci dgos/ /gzhan las
460a1(rgyud 'grel): grub pas de rigs min/ /mchog la 'ang yon tan mtshan chas brjod/ /lus dang phung bor bcas pa yi/ /gnas par dbang ba'i rigs 'grub phyir/ /lhag rton 'byung las lus bcas 'das/ /zag kun zad pa'i
460a2(rgyud 'grel): rigs chen 'di/ /ji ltar spyad kyang ldog ma byed/ /rang dbang thob pas dbugs su phyung phyir/ /skabs 'dir bden pa bar mthong nas/ /mkhas rtegs goms spyod rig pa 'dzin/ /lha la sogs pa'i rdo rje 'dzin/ /ming rtog gzungs las
460a3(rgyud 'grel): ming thob pa/ /yon tan grangs kyis bsam mi khyab/ /bsngos sa zhing khams lung ston pa/ /rdo rje rdo rjer bos dbang bskur/ /mthong goms mthu ldan rig pa nyid/ /snang ba rig pa 'dzin pa'i gnas/ /rigs snang gnas la
460a4(rgyud 'grel): nges pa med/ /skye ba cha byad don gyis 'gyur/ /chos rnams bdag phyir dmigs med phyir/ /chos kun mi mthong chos nyid kyang/ /mi mthong sangs rgyas thugs mi mthong/ /snod bcud mi mthong gang mthong ba/ /des ni
460a5(rgyud 'grel): yang dag bden pa mthong/ /de bas thos myong reg sogs lam/ /shes 'jug bar chad med las skyes/ /de phyir mngon gsum rtogs mchog ni/ /rang dbang thob nas mngon bzhin te/ /zag gsum zag pa 'di la med/
460a6(rgyud 'grel): sngan chad lam gyi 'du byed med/ /de'i re dogs chags bral bas/ /rim pa 'am rim pa med tshul gyis/ /stong khri la sogs grang mang lha'i/ /'khor lo gsal rdzogs rnal 'byor gnas/ /dkyil 'khor gnyis kyis
460a7(rgyud 'grel): don grub mdzad/ /de ming dbang sgyur rnal 'byor de/ /brgya phrag cha rdzogs dus bar du/ /goms byas gnyis thob mdza' skad cig /cha'i rdo rje dpa' bos sbyor/ /rigs mthun mchog rgya sprul pa las/ /gsang thos
460b1(rgyud 'grel): bsam rig sgom sbyor bas/ /dkyus sar phyin pa cad shes bzhin/ /kun tu 'gro ba bdag po'i don/ /rdzu 'phrul chos snang rjes ston brjod/ /drug shes de ming ldan pa yis/ /dbang sgyur rtsa ba rdo rje'i sku/ /bya byed rdzogs par 'gyur ba
460b2(rgyud 'grel): yin/ /bzhi'i thog mas don spyod pas/ /nus mthu can gyur dbang can des/ /mkha' la 'phyo dang rigs 'dzin gnas/ /chu rgyun bzlog dang rlung mi 'gul/ /ri brag la sogs thogs med 'dzul/? /tshul mi 'dzing? mes mi tshig /
460b3(rgyud 'grel): dug dang mtshon gyis 'jigs mi 'gyur/ /mi snang ba dang mang por sprul/ /gzhan yang ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin/ /lha srin rnams la dbang sgyur dang/ /tshe dang dus la bsing btung dang/ /stong gsum nyung 'brur shong ba dang/ /nyung
460b4(rgyud 'grel): 'brus stong gsum gang ba dang/ /ba spu gang bsduAng de bzhin no/ /sreg pa'i bskal pa bzhil ba dang/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'bum dgye dang/ /skams sar chu 'byung bye ma gser/ /sol ba ljon shing dbyung ba dang/ /nam mkha' rdo rje sra?
460b5(rgyud 'grel): 'byung zhing/ /'bar na me'ang tshig pa dang/ /chur 'gyur 'bab pa'ang de bzhin no/ /'jig rten gtor lung bya ba'ang 'grub/ /dgug dang gtang dang bcing dang dgrol/ /gso dang bsad dang 'pha ma dang rgyal/ /ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du
460b6(rgyud 'grel): 'grub/ /sbrul dang gcan gzan gdug pa rnams/ /khyi bzhin phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur/ /bdud dang gdug pa sna tshogs rnams/ /tshugs bar mi 'gyur bran bzhin 'gyur/ /lus ma dor bar rigs 'dzin sar/ /thugs rjes sprul
460b7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i byin brlabs kyis/ /so so'i skad dang mthun pa yis/ /so sor thar pa'i lam yang ston/ /ngan song stongs shing bskul ba dang/ /lam stegs dgod cing de dag nyid/ /theg chen lam la dgod par mdzad/ /thar pa bskul zhing zhi ba
461a1(rgyud 'grel): slong/ /sa bcu shes bya sbyong byed cing/ /bde gshegs 'khor la'ang chos ston mdzad/ /stong gsum brgya bcu'i 'jig rten rnams/ /g.yo dang rab g.yo shin tu g.yo/ /mdzad pa snang bas de gnas rnams
461a2(rgyud 'grel): nang g.yos sa'i rim sbyor byed/ /gsang ba sngags kyi sgra bsgrags pas/ /kun kyang rmad 'byung sngags kyi sgrar/ /grags pas bdud 'dul ngan song sbyong/ /'gro ba ma lus don yang byed/ /las rnams thams cad kun byas nas/ /
461a3(rgyud 'grel): skye shi med pa'i g.yung drung thob/ /mtshan dang dpe byad kun gyis brgyan/ /mthar phyin bya ba med pa 'grub/ /rgyud las gsungs pa'i lnga bzhi'o/ /spyod pa bcu gnyis 'phrin las rnams/ /dbang sgyur nyid du thogs med par/ /
461a4(rgyud 'grel): sngon bzhin yul khyon 'dul bar byed/ /skye mched rang 'byung ye shes phyir/ /de nyid gcig dang du ma'i mdza' / /gnyis su med par mngon rtogs goms/ /mthong bas dri ma drug sbyangs phyir/ /de nyid gzugs sgra dri ro reg
461a5(rgyud 'grel): shes pa'i bye brag rtsa lngar bshad/ /gcig gis yul lnga gcod byed pas/ /tshang dang ma tshang 'jigs dogs med/ /gzhan du lta'i rna ba dang/ /spyan gyis mngon par shes pa dang/ /sngon gnas rjes su dran pa dang/ /
461a6(rgyud 'grel): pha rol rnams kyi sems shes dang/ /'chi 'pho skye ba mkhyen pa dang/ /rdzu 'phrul shes pa 'am zag zad shes/ /de rnyed tshul can yul shes pas/ /gang dang gang rnams 'dul bar mdzad/ /de ming mi ldog zag med dang/ /
461a7(rgyud 'grel): dbang sgyur rigs kyi mtshan las brjod/ /bdag gam gzhan phyir dbang can des/ /sku tshe'i tshad dam ji snyed par/ /bzhugs mdza' rang gi grub sbyor ba/ /sngon bzhin rims dang cig car ba'o/ /de 'ang snga ma mthong ba'i lam nyid du/
461b1(rgyud 'grel): rang gi shes rab gsum goms pas/ /rang lus rgyal ba'i phyag rgya che/ /gang sgoms mngon du gyur pa'i lha/ /phyag rgya chen po'i rigs 'dzin der/ /yongs 'gyur lhun grub thob nas gshegs/ /phyi ma rigs mchog de nyid nas/ /sngon bzhin goms?
461b2(rgyud 'grel): ba gsum byas pas/ /rgya dor cig car mthar 'gro ba/ /chos nyid dam tshig smon mthuAng yin /de nyid bar ma bshad bya ba'ang/ /sngon gyi lus kyis rdzogs par bya/ /gcig dang du ma'i rnal 'byor bas/ /'byung lus sems phyir rang bzhin
461b3(rgyud 'grel): lha/ /mthong goms bsags pa'i mthar bsgrub pas/ /kun 'gro'i bsgrib dag ngo bo'i rgyu/ /rnam smin tshal gyis 'grub pa med/ /snga phyi rgyu 'bras 'dod ba min/ /dus rims 'dod min cig 'dod phyir/ /cig pas de nyid lam byas pas/
461b4(rgyud 'grel): lhag ma bcas pas bsnur bsgrubs mdza' / /de nyid gyur pa nges pa med/ /rang sems phyag rgya chen po ste/ /goms pa mngon gyur lha'i sku/ /bsgoms pas gang yin mngon 'gyur sku/ /thun mong mchog gi mtshan dper ldan/ /
461b5(rgyud 'grel): longs spyod gnyis la phyag rgya'i rigs/ /rdo rje 'khor lo rin chen dang/ /padmo ral gri rigs 'dzin 'gyur/ /rang lus sdong nas phyag rgya che/ /bsgoms bas sngon du gyur pa'i lha/ /mtshan dpe bzhi dang mngon drug rdzogs/ /
461b6(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya chen po'i rigs su grags/ /ye shes sku'i cha lugs can/ /'byung ba rdo rje'i lus las grol/ /de phyir sku tshe tshad med de/ /bsnur zhing mngon du bya dang bral/ /de nyid rigs gsum rigs bzhi dang/ /lnga dang mchog
461b7(rgyud 'grel): lnga'i rigs 'dzin pas/ /rnam pa bzhi ru mngon bzhin 'gyur/ /mtshan gyi ming grangs gnyis dang gsum/ /mnyam pa nyid las mi g.yo zhing/ /dbang sgyur 'du byed dang bral bas/ /zag pa med pa'i sgom pa'i lam/ /
462a1(rgyud 'grel): mi g.yo rnal 'byor nyid duAng brjod/ /rgyal bas lung bstan sngon 'byung ba/ /brtag pa'i bye brag 'di la'ang med/ /ye shes sku'i rnal 'byor pa/ /sangs rgyas gnyis pa'i spyan dgongs kyang/ /rgyu mthun yod kyang mi g.yo thob/ /
462a2(rgyud 'grel): shin tu bstan pa'i rlung gnas pa/ /grangs can 'khor la mngon du snang/ /'on kyang rnal 'byor rtsol bcan/ /mnyam gzhag ngang las ma g.yos bzhin/ /stong gi 'jig rten brgya stong phrag /bcu'i rdul snyed 'jig rten dang/ /zhing grangs med
462a3(rgyud 'grel): pas brgya stong phrag /bcu'i rdul snyed zhing khams su/ /sngon dang smad 'tshong la sogs pa/ /sprul pa'i lus kyis 'dul bar byed/ /bzhi dang drug sogs de bzhin no/ /drug dang lnga'i yan lag bcus/ /shes pa'ang 'dra mong bzhi sogs
462a4(rgyud 'grel): kun/ /de rnyed yul gyi khyad par dang/ /sngon rdzogs mthu dang gdul byas spags/ /rang gi mi g.yo mthong goms dang/ /don du gnyer rims la sogs pa'i/ /lam kun rdzogs pa'i stobs byin gyis/ /rnal 'byor bral nas lhun
462a5(rgyud 'grel): gyis grub/ /lhan cig gnas pa'i dri ma dag /brtsal ba med par lhun grub mthong/ /de de mngon du byas pa yi/ /lhun gyis grub pa'i rig pas 'dzin/ /rang rgyud dag pa'i sangs rgyas de/ /sngon bzhin bzhi brgyad dgod par
462a6(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /snga ma'i rigs la mthu rdzogs pas/ /bshad pa bzhin du dri ma dag /sangs rgyas gnyis pa shes rab gsum/ /lhun gyis grub pa'i rigs su 'byung/ /gnas der sngon bzhin gsum rdzogs pa/ /longs spyod
462a7(rgyud 'grel): gsang ba'i lung thob cing/ /rang gi dgongs spyod nus pa can/ /mthar 'byung ba'i dus la bab/ /de ltar dag pa'i shes pa nyid/ /sku lnga lhun grub rdo rje 'dzin/ /lhun mnyam ngang la mi g.yo zhing/ /mi rtog nyid du bzhugs
462b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'ang/ /bag la nyal ba 'joms byed cing/ /skad cig rag las rigs 'dzin mdza' o/ /cha byad rgyal ba nyid du ste/ /lnga po lhun gyis grub phyir na/ /de 'dra de nyid rgyal tshab ston/ /de mi stong pas mi 'grub yin/ /nyid la skye shi mi mnga' phyir/ /rdo
462b2(rgyud 'grel): rje skuAng gdul bya la/ /sprul pa rnams ni 'da' tshul ston/ /don grub la sogs ji lta ba'o/ /bya ba lhun grub rnal 'byor gyi/ /rigs 'dzin chen po na rigs 'dzin/ /tha ma'i ming grangs mthar phyin lam/ /rang rgyud dag pa'i sangs rgyas dang/ /de nyid
462b3(rgyud 'grel): dang ni mthar sbyor lam/ /yang dag rdzogs pa'i rgyal tshab bo/ /snga ma gsum dang dang po bzhi'i/ /cha lugs rang gi rgyal chab sdud/ /bsam yas lhun gyis grub rdzogs pa'i/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i spyan mchog 'chang/ /yi ge 'khor lo'ang
462b4(rgyud 'grel): mngon gzigs pa/ /mi g.yo ba la mi rtog pas/ /da rung mngon par mi rgya ste/ /dus mdza' i skad cig nyid kyis gshegs/ /des na dgongs spyod rgya mtsho kun/ /ye shes rtsal sogs bya med pa'ang/ /mthar phyin bya bral la sogs pa'i/ /
462b5(rgyud 'grel): ming grangs cha las brjod par zad/ /nyid phyir rdo rje 'dzin sogs la/ /skad cig dus kyis brlab pa rdzogs/ /tha ma'i bag la nyal ba dang/ /bcom ldan 'das par gyur pa yin/ /de tshe de sgrib cha yod kyang/ /lhun grub rigs 'dzin
462b6(rgyud 'grel): par bzhugs nas/ /zhing khams thug pa med pa dag /gdul phyir sprul sku mdzad pa'ang/ /srid gsum 'gro ba bsam yas su/ /thugs rjes ston pa bsam mi khyab/ /don dang mthun pa 'ba' zhig ston/ /mi mthun zhags pas 'khor
462b7(rgyud 'grel): gcod/ /la lar lhums zhugs bltam pa dang/ /la lar rab byung dka' thub mdzad/ /la lar khab dang rgyal srid dang/ /chos ston mya ngan 'das sogs ston/ /res 'ga' zhi la res 'ga' drag /g.yem la g.yem ston sdang la sdang
463a1(rgyud 'grel): dregs la dregs dang mun la mun/ /rlung la'ang de bzhin mthun mi mthun/ /rgya mtsho lta bu thabs dpyod dang/ /'phrin las de bzhin pa yis dkrol/ /gsang ba'i tan+t+ra ston pa dang/ /de bzhin bsdu ba mdzad pa dang/ /
463a2(rgyud 'grel): dman lus bsod nams ldan gnas su/ /sna tshogs lus can rigs la bskor/ /mngon shes drug ldan mtshan bzangs spags/ /kun mkhyen ye shes mnga' ba'i phyir/ /yul dang tshad med? rgyal ba nyid/ /ji ltar me long lta bu'i
463a3(rgyud 'grel): tshul/ /mi mthun mtshan ma gzhom pa'i phyir/ /rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyis/ /bdag rtog mtshan ma kun bcom nas/ /rdo rje dbyings su thim par byed/ /bdag med rang rig ye shes kyis/ /dngos dang dngos med bag chags
463a4(rgyud 'grel): srogs/ /rang dang spyi'i chos rnams kun/ /sems kyi phrag dog thams cad kun/ /dngos po med par rtogs byas pas/ /dpa' bar 'gro ba'i rnal 'byor dang/ /rdo rje rtse mo'i mchog thob pas/ /yid tshod min dang bdud sde rnams
463a5(rgyud 'grel): tshar bcad dpa' bos der rjes la/ /rgyan gyi dkyil 'khor ma 'di la/ /bsam yas lhun rdzogs kun mkhyen mdzod/ /mnyam gzhag ye shes dbang skur zhing/ /don du gnyer pa'i smon lam mthus/ /nyi shu rtsa lnga gzhan
463a6(rgyud 'grel): las min/ /sku dang gsung thugs yon tan dang/ /'phrin las rmad 'byung kun grags pa/ /gzhan nas yod 'ongs ma yin te/ /rang 'byung ye shes gnas med yin/ /de bas ngo mtshar cho 'phrul chos/ /gzhan nas
463a7(rgyud 'grel): yod thob ma yin phyir/ /thabs la brten pas shes rab nyid/ /de lta bu'i ngang du byung/ /mun snang 'gyur rtsi ma ki ta/ /ji bzhin ma spangs de nyid 'gyur/ /'khor ba ma spangs rnam par dag /mya ngan mi 'da' ye nas gnas
463b1(rgyud 'grel): 'gro dang gnas par bya ba min/ /rtog pa thams cad ye shes tshogs/ /mnyam dang mi mnyam mi mnyam mnyam/ /bya dang mi bya bya med byas/ /grub dang ma grub thams cad grub/ /de phyir rigs 'dzin tha snyad bral/ /mthar phyin pa'i lam bstan pa'i
463b2(rgyud 'grel): le'u ste brgyad pa'o// //rang bzhin nyid du mngon rdzogs pa'i/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid la mos/ /srid pa rims dang rdzogs tshul gyis/ /mngon byas don yod bshad par bya/ /mtshan nyid tha ma'i tha ma ni/ /ngo bo tshul
463b3(rgyud 'grel): dang khyad par gyis/ /lus gsum don du snang ba rnams/ /ji lta ba bzhin shes par bya/ /lus gsum snga ma brjod bar bya/ /sku dang gsung dang thugs nyid dang/ /yon tan 'phrin las rmad 'byung la/ /lnga pa'ang lnga nyid ngo bor gnas/ /e ma'o
463b4(rgyud 'grel): yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /rgyal ba'i rgyal ba lha'i lha/ /'phags pa'i 'phags pa kun tu bzang/ /de bzhin gshegs las de bzhin gshegs/ /rin chen nor bu bzhin du bzhugs/ /chos drug nor bus mtshon pa na/ /gcig dang
463b5(rgyud 'grel): du ma kun bral ldan/ /de de rigs dngos rigs bral ba/ /nyi shu lngar ldan kun ngo bo/ /mos bzhin de rigs mthun snang la/ /yang dag nyid du 'di zhes med/ /lnga nyid lnga lngar ldan par snang/ /rigs bdag yang dag sangs rgyas pa/ /tha
463b6(rgyud 'grel): ma'i tha ma zhen bral ba/ /ye shes 'gro 'ong med kun khyab/ /gnyis med pa'i de bzhin nyid/ /ngang nyid 'gro 'ong med par shes/ /de bzhin bde chen ngang nyid du/ /zung du kun bral gnyis phyir gshegs/ /sangs rgyas sems can sems
463b7(rgyud 'grel): la son/ /dbang phyug chen po'i skur bzhugs pas/ /gsang ba'i dbang po 'du bral med/ /dngos po gnyis la bde longs spyod/ /de nyid cha re brjod pa ni/ /'jig rten 'das dang ma 'das kun/ /dus gsum chos kun cig pa yi/ /
464a1(rgyud 'grel): rgyal ba nyid phyir sna tshogs chos/ /snang la rang bzhin med pa'i phyir/ /de nyid d+harma ka yar gnas/ /thams cad rang rig mngon sum snang/ /zhen mdza' kun bral kun chub pa'i/ /rang 'byung ye shes tshon po nyid/
464a2(rgyud 'grel): kun gzhi 'dul snang phyir sku mchog /'dod khams mdza' nas rdzogs kyi bar/ /sdug bsngal kun dang 'dod bsams snyoms/ /'gog zhi stang snyoms bde chen sogs/ /yul med kun rol longs spyod che/ /rta bdun ri bong can nyid kyi//
464a3(rgyud 'grel): gzhal yas khang las ma g.yos bzhin/ /kun tu tha dad snang ba ltar/ /'gro 'ong med 'dul kun sbrul mchog /ji ltar mkha' la 'jig med ltar/ /mi rtog kun dngos rtag chen po/ /rdo rje sku mchog skye 'jig med/ /lnga pa nyid du bsgrags/ /so sor
464a4(rgyud 'grel): 'dul ba ye shes 'khor/ /rgya mtsho'i tshogs dang shes bya'i/ /sgrib pa mdza' sdong? sems dpa' che/ /rgyal po lnga sogs rgyud sbyangs dang/ /mos spyod dang po 'am dbang sgyur rigs/ /rdo rje tshogs mthong phyir ming 'grub/ /de la de'i dgongs
464a5(rgyud 'grel): bshad pa/ /brjod dang brjod 'drar phyir nges pa/ /yi ge med par 'byal ba bzhi/ /yi ge drug cu drug gsum brgyas/ /'byal ba lnga nyid tshul go ba/ /so so nyid dang gsang bdag gis/ /snyan cha lngar ldan phyir thos pa/ /
464a6(rgyud 'grel): gsang ba'i rgyud bshad thos zhes gsungs/ /rang bzhin 'brel dang dbang dang bas/ /dang ba'i chu la nyi zla bzhin/ /ma skyes don gyis gsung mchog gis/ /smra brjod med par snang bar mdzad/ /rig pa'i ye shes ming lnga pas/
464a7(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin 'brel ba'i byin brlabs kyis/ /rang bzhin gsang ba'i rgyud rnams kun/ /nyi ma lta bur gsal bar snang/ /me long lta bur chos brgyad kyis/ /mtshan pa'i dbang phyug sku mthong bas/ /byang chub sems dang sems
464b1(rgyud 'grel): dpa' che/ /rgyud la rdo rje'i don snang byed/ /grol thar lam dang 'khor ba'i sgra/ /drug gi rtsa ba yan lag tshul/ /tshangs pa'i ngag ltar las can la/ /snang ba sha'i rna bas thos/ /ji ltar go dang 'dul snang ba'i/ /gsung rnams ngos la sgras rkyen pa'i/ /
464b2(rgyud 'grel): sgra ltar grag stong dbyer med pa'i/ /mthong thos byed pa'ang de nyid mthu'o/ /dngos po gnyis chos yan lag bcas/ /sems can phyir na stong chen po'i/ /ye shes zung du bral ba'i/ /bde ba chen po mchog gi thugs/ /nam mkha' lta bur sems
464b3(rgyud 'grel): gsal stong/ /chos spyir rang mtshan dbyer med kun/ /yul med me long ltar gsal ba/ /mngon sum kun gyi mchog yin te/ /rnam par mi rtog mchog gi thugs/ /chen po lta bur thams cad la/ /mi 'byed blang dor med mnyam zhing/ /mnyam
464b4(rgyud 'grel): pa chen po mchog gi thugs/ /thugs rje chen pos 'brel pa dang/ /nyid kyi dbyings las mi zhan phyir/ /bya byed med pa rnam bzhi yis/ /'gro ba kun sgrol thugs chen yin/ /chos pa chos can kun bral bas/ /rang spyi dbyer med dus
464b5(rgyud 'grel): gcig tu/ /mkha' la 'ja' ltar gsal ba ni/ /mi phyed? rdo rje thugs mchog go /phyogs bcu ma lus mi lus pa/ /rang rgyud med par rig snang ba/ /sems kyi yid bzhin sprin tshogs kyis/ /phyogs bcu ma lus sangs rgyas zhing/ /lhun
464b6(rgyud 'grel): sogs rig pa rang snang ba'i/ /gzhal yas khang du gzung dang 'dzin/ /bral ba'i rang rig rten pa dang/ /rten can med pa kun gyi gnas/ /ma spangs lhun gyis rdzogs pa'i phyir/ /sna tshogs dkyil 'khor chen po'i rgyan/ /
464b7(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs 'od zer phyogs bcur gsal/ /stobs sogs 'bras bu kun rdzogs phyir/ /gdan lnga'i bye brag rang snang ba'o/ /'dul ba'i bye brag tha dad pa/ /zhi dang khro dang mi mos nyams/ /gzhi phyir rnam bzhi rol pa rnams/ /
465a1(rgyud 'grel): gang la mtshams par 'dul bar mdzad/ /rnam bzhi'i bye brag tha dad pa/ /re re'ang lnga lnga'i tshul gyis snang/ /de rigs bzhi'i cha 'dzin pa/ /las kyi rigs la lhun gyis grub/ /rnam pa bzhi yis 'du la mdzad pas/ /
465a2(rgyud 'grel): phyogs kyis 'dul ba'i rigs ma yin/ /de ltar sbyangs mdza' skyes bu pa/ /rigs la cha re 'dzin byed kyang/ /cig shos sangs rgyas kun ngo bo/ /nyid du snga phyi drang ba tsam/ /sangs rgyas sangs rgyas zhes brjod pa'i/ /tshul ni ? bsam
465a3(rgyud 'grel): brjod las 'das/ /de nod phyogs tsam brjod bya ba/ /drang don snga phyir sangs rgyas pa/ /don dam cig bu ma yin phyir/ /chu la chu ltar cig pa med/ /cig shos bden pa ma yin pas/ /so so tha dang cha rigs med/ /bden pa gnyis
465a4(rgyud 'grel): med dbang sgyur ba/ /bdag dang gzhan gyi gnyis med de/ /so sor med phyir der son pa/ /mdza' rnams kun dral kun ldan par/ /rang gnas zhen bral mngon bral ba/ /ming brjod 'di 'drar gnas smra dka' / /ngo bo gcig la
465a5(rgyud 'grel): rgyud 'dres min/ /shing gi me dpung ltar brjod pa/ /drang ba tsam ste de nyid min/ /chu la chu ltar 'dod pa'ang de'o/ /bden pa'i tshul gyis skyon brjod pa/ /dag pa'i ye shes gnas yin par/ /tan tra nyid las grags pa
465a6(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /bder gshegs mi gnas mnyam pa'i/ /ngang du byon gsung brjod pa'ang/ /mnyam pa gsum pa yin pa'i phyir/ /nges par rgyud 'dres ma 'dres pa'i/ /tha snyad bral ba'i tshul du gnas/ /thun mong min pa'i
465a7(rgyud 'grel): rgyal ming drang/ /bde gshegs de bzhin gshegs pa dang/ /bcom ldan 'das dang sangs rgyas dang/ /dgyes chen mchod sogs mdza' yas kyang/ /lus gsum grangs ming khyad par tsam/ /mdo ru brjod pa chub
465b1(rgyud 'grel): bar gyis/ /lnga dang lnga lngar lhun grub pa'i/ /rgyal ba gsung rdzogs so so'i/ /grub mdza' sa'i sangs rgyas las/ /grangs rdzogs ngo bo byin brlabs las/ /snang dang don byed che chung gis/ /pags pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis gsal/ /de
465b2(rgyud 'grel): tshul sa gzhi rgyal ba dag /rgyud cig 'dres dang grol smra ba/ /'dir drang tsam yin bshad pa bzhin/ /rgyud kyi khyad par bsam las 'das/ /ming grangs theg chen dman pa las/ /thun mong tshogs kyis bder gshegs shing/ /de
465b3(rgyud 'grel): bzhin nyid du gshegs pa'ang/ /dus kyi dbang phyir snga ma bzhin/ /gshegs pa nyid dam gsang ba'ang/ /bya ba'i lugs kyis shes rab dang/ /cho ga'i rnal 'byor grangs rdzogs pas/ /'bras bu lam byas bder gshegs pa/ /
465b4(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje 'dzin sar de bzhin gshegs/ /yang na bya rgod 'dab logs su/ /dgon phug bye ma 'dab sna ru/ /sa ri dbang skur ji bzhin nam/ /bar NA se'i bsil khang du/ /dam pa'i rigs can dbang bskur nas/ /rdo rje 'dzin thob ji
465b5(rgyud 'grel): bzhin no/ /thub pa'i dbang po de ji bzhin/ /gshegs pa rgyu dang bya ba dang/ /gnyis ka rgyud las grangs bzhin no/ /rnal 'byor gzhung gis don grub nyid/ /na ra dza ra 'gram logs su/ /dka' thub dka' ba spyod pa'i tshe/ /phyogs
465b6(rgyud 'grel): bcu sprul pa'i longs spyod skus/ /byang chug lnga stabs dbang bskur bas/ /'og min nyid du don grub ste/ /sprul pa'i dka' thub khog pa nas/ /ye shes snang mdzad tshul du gshegs/ /ri rab rtse mor 'khor lor bskor/ /de
465b7(rgyud 'grel): la ? pa'i gzugs sku yin/ /thabs dang shes rab lam nyid kyis/ /'gro 'ong med par bdar gshegs te/ /de bzhin lhun grub dang son pa/ /tshul dang ngo bos khyad par che/ /don grub dka' thub lus can la/ /phyogs bcu
466a1(rgyud 'grel): rgyal ba sprin bzhin du/ /'dus pa gsang ba'i longs spyod kyis/ /srod dang tho rangs dus nyid du/ /nyi zla gsang ba'i dbang sbyin dbang/ /rol ba'i ka ra bstan pa yis/ /ye shes stan rdzogs dbang thob pas/ /de bzhin
466a2(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa'o/ /de phyir thun mong rnam gsum las/ /byang ba bzhi dang chung pa bzhi/ /bde bar de bzhin gshegs par brgyad/ /grangs dang ngo bo rtsal gyis 'phags/ /de nas rgyal ba bcom ldan 'das/ /thun mong mchog
466a3(rgyud 'grel): lugs snga ma bzhin/ /so so lam thabs shes rab kyis/ /rdo rje lta bu bzhi bskyed pas/ /bdud bzhi nges bcom mya ngan bzhi/ /'das shing mdza' bzhi'ang 'das pa dang/ /mi mthun gzhung gis sangs rgyas pa/ /lta dpyod cing
466a4(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin lam rim bzhin/ /grub pa'i mdza' las khyad par ba/ /lta ba'i sgrib pas phye ba yin/ /de nas dgyes pa'i longs spyod kyang/ /mdo dang bya ba rnal 'byor gnyis/ /rgyud las ji ltar grags pa bzhin/ /gong gi dgyes
466a5(rgyud 'grel): chen yid tshod min/ /de phyir dgyes pa rim yod pas/ /sa'i sangs rgyas rims yod phyir/ /ming grangs yon tan cha min te/ /ngo bo nyid kyis rnam par 'phags// //lam gyi rtsol bas ngal ba rnams
466a6(rgyud 'grel): bred pa bskyed phyir kun tu 'od/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa drug po bkod par bstan/ /mthar thugs gsum cha las brjod// //de phyir skan che lta bu ste/ /thabs mkhas 'di yis gzhan pa yi/ /thabs la brten
466a7(rgyud 'grel): nas? mos ? cing/ /bsgyur bas 'dir grub rang thabs kyis/ /rangs thob las ngo bo nyid/ /gcig par smra ba mun sprul pa'o// //mthar byin pa'i 'bras bu bstan pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// //
466b1(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba lam log lam stor ba/ /lnga dang ldan rnams bkri ba'i phyir/ /mi gnyis lam mchog 'di bgyid pa'i/ /ngal pa'i dge rtsa kun grol shog /byang chub zhor byed khe grags gnyer/ /bcud chen 'dzag cing gzhogs ngom can/ /gtsug
466b2(rgyud 'grel): rgyal sgeg mo 'jag skyel dang/ /nags bya lta bur rkog g.yem sogs/ /tshal bsrung dam la mi gnas dang/ /gsang ba'i gzhung la sran mi tshugs/ /gzhung mangs bsgrub la yid ches dka' / /bla ma spyi bos mi len cing/ /zhes pas
466b3(rgyud 'grel): bskur zhing yongs la bskur/ /snod med rnams dang ma phrad cig/ / //mang yul khri babs su/ /dz+nyA na ku ma ras bsgyur ba/ lam rnam par bkod pa/ /sangs rgyas gsang ba'i man ngag rdzogs so// //
466b4(rgyud 'grel): */ (/sgyu 'phrul man ngag rnam bkod la sogs sgyu 'phrul gyi skor las tshogs dang bcas pa rnams dang/ mdo'i don bsdus dang skabs 'grel/ rgyan dam pa rim par phye ba ste bcu dbu bzhugs su//) //dpal rdo rje mi bskyod pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rang gi
466b5(rgyud 'grel): lha la phyag 'tshal nas/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyud dag las/ /dad can skal ldan don phyir du/ /man ngag rim pa brjod par bya/ /shar phyogs in+d+ra'i lung pa na/ /rgyal bu rdo rje brtsegs pa ru/ /rigs can in+d+ra po ti ngas/ /
466b6(rgyud 'grel): gsang ba'i bdag pos mngon bsten pa'i/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i bsgrub pa yang/ /tshom bu lnga bcu stong dang bcas/ /phyag na rdo rje mngon bsgrubs te/ /spong len brtul zhugs spyod pa'i dbang/ /dge bar bskul nas sdig pa med/ /
466b7(rgyud 'grel): de nas sa la sreg par byas/ /de bzhin pany+tsa a ba sha/ /rim par thob pa'i skal ldan bu/ /gdungs brtag rigs nges spyod kyang bstan/ /lhag sems ldan zhing bka' nyan pa/ /bla ma srog tu 'dzin byed dang/ /man ngag
467a1(rgyud 'grel): snying du 'chang byed pa'i/ /rnal 'byor pho mo spyod pa yis/ /gdungs ba ma spangs rnams ma sbyin/ /log pa u lu spra sha kas/ /'jug cing bcad pa'i nyams med ltar/ /'dod pas smon pa'i rnal 'byor pa/ /
467a2(rgyud 'grel): brjod bral tshig gi rtog min yang/ /'phrul gyi me long bstan pa ltar/ /rtogs byed tshig gi me long gis/ /mtshon rgyud spyan la snang byed pa'i/ /pa tre sha yi rim pa bstan/ /rgya mtsho chu las ngang pa bzhin/ /bka' yi bdud
467a3(rgyud 'grel): rtsi 'dud bsdus 'da' / /shi shi'i rgyud kyi mos rims gzhan/ /'tsham par bstan na chud mi gson/ /rim grogs grol 'dod brda' zhen la/ /de nyid 'grogs pa'i pa tre sha/ /bden pa'i tshig gis byin gyis brlab/ /des
467a4(rgyud 'grel): brlan rig pa chu skyes yod/ /de la dran rgyud man ngag sbyin/ /des rtogs pa yi sgrol ma yis/ /g.yangs la sgrol ma'i man ngag sbyin/ /rnam rtog chu rlung gis 'khyags la/ /thig le drod dbab pa tre sha /chags pa me yis
467a5(rgyud 'grel): gdungs pa la/ /khams gsum rol pa'i min ngag bstan/ /mtshan mas mtshan ma grol 'dod la/ /phyag rgya bsgom pa'i man ngag sbyin/ /de dag rnams smin re ba la/ /rgyu 'bras med par thob chul bstan/ /nges sngon mos
467a6(rgyud 'grel): 'bral thun mong gi /theg pas spos cher ma nges la/ /gsang ba'i yon tan khyad par can/ /ngo mtshar tshig gis 'du shes sgyur/ /rim pa brgyad tshul bzlog bstan pa/ /'jug pa'i rim pa mos pa 'dun/ /cig shos
467a7(rgyud 'grel): mthar bzhag gtsor smos kyang/ /de sngon bzhag ste brjod kyis rdung/ /thun mong smra yis spros 'tshal bas/ /mchog la bdag med gang zag la/ /khyad par spyad pas bsgyur ba'i tshig /de yang rgyud las 'di skad du/
467b1(rgyud 'grel): kha cig lta ba mnyam gnas kyang/ /spyod pa dag dang yang mi 'thun/ /kha cig spyod pa rdzogs byed kyang/ /nyams pa'i lta bas yong mi shes/ /kha cig lta spyod gnyis ka med/ /bla med theg pa'i nang nas ni/ /don dam du ni dbyer med/ /kun
467b2(rgyud 'grel): rdzob tsam du thams cad la/ /dag dang ma dag gnyi gar 'dzin/ /mnyam pa'i don nyid mi shes shing/ /kun rdzob don dam gnyis med la/ /chos dang gang zag bdag med na/ /'di ni byang chub sa pa yin/ /de sogs phyi nang rgyu 'phras dang//
467b3(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten thub par 'khrul par brjod/ /gsang chen nges par rgyud nyid las/ /yang dag skyes mchog dam pa yis/ /kun rdzob don dam dbyer med par/ /yang dag nyid du rab tu rtogs/ /thabs kyi lta spyod chen por ni/ /bla med theg pa las
467b4(rgyud 'grel): 'phags pa/ /don dam du ni nor bdun no/ /kun rdzob du ni nyams rdzogs so/ /thabs kyi theg pa chen po ni/ /rnam par byang dang sdug bsngal dag /kun rdzob duAng dbyer med de/ /lta ba mtho sman de tsam mo/ /zhes sogs tshig gi brjod skyed
467b5(rgyud 'grel): la/ /nges par ldem dgongs brgyad kyis gzhug /mtshan mas grol ba brgya byin pa/ /dkyil 'khor chen por zhugs pa'i tshe/ /gang la bab pa'i lha de 'am/ /yang na lha kun cig pa'i phyir/ /gang mos lha de yi dam bya/ /de'ang
467b6(rgyud 'grel): blo yis gnyis 'gyur ste/ /rims su skad cig spros bcad pa/ /de nas yi ge brgya pa dang/ /phyag rgya chen po'i rim par bsam/ /dbang skur la sogs lhag pa'i lha/ /dgur ldan spyan drang bstim brtan mchod/ /zin nas bcu spangs
467b7(rgyud 'grel): zlas pa bya/ /gsal ba gsum ldan drod rnyed 'gyur/ /yan lag sngon du bdun rdzogs nas/ /mchod pa byin gyis brlab par bya/ /rtag tu rgyun gyi ting 'dzin spyad/ /longs spyod ho dang bral mi bya/ /cig car pa na rang gi gzugs//
468a1(rgyud 'grel): rab gnas ldan pa bdun bzhag la/ /spros spyad khugs pa sngon byas la/ /gsal bar byed dang bye brag bstan/ /de ci 'dra ba bdun du bsam/ /shin tu goms nas rnam smin gzugs/ /bsgyur la de bstan nges par bya/ /de tshe
468a2(rgyud 'grel): bying rmugs skyon drug spang/ /rgod pa'i skyon gsum dor byas te/ /'gyur ba'i skyon bdun byung ba na/ /spyi la gnas mchog med 'gyur na/ /bye brag gang snang 'phrod la bzung/ /de na rtog pa'i gzer chen po/ /'gyur na ri ltar gdos
468a3(rgyud 'grel): chen bya/ /mi snang gzugs brnyan bslan par bya/ /mtshan snang rgyu ba de ru bya/ /shin tu gsal la mi g.yo bar/ /bsgyur thob ma lcogs med pa na/ /lha yi brtags dang lo rgyus kyis/ /zung du 'drel pa ched du bya/ /gdod ma'i
468a4(rgyud 'grel): mtshan ma sngar brtags te/ /nyams rims zin pas brtson 'grus sbyar/ /de yang rgyud lam 'di skad du/ /gsang ba'i snying po don nyid kyis/ /yi dam mi spang rtag bsgom zhing/ /yi dam lha yi mtshan nyid ni/ /de bzhin gshegs
