468a5(rgyud 'grel): pa thams cad kyi/ /lha spangs dge spyad don med 'gyur/ /bdag nyid lha dang mnyam sbyor na/ /yon tan chung yang 'grub par 'gyur/ /ye nas mnyam nyid sbyor bas su/ /lha nyid du ni rtag du bsgom/ /bde gshegs kun dang
468a6(rgyud 'grel): mnyam sbyor bas/ /dkyil 'khor kun dang mnyam pa'i phyir/ /sku gsung ye shes lnga rdzogs 'grub/ /yi dam lha ni rtag sgom nas/ /rgyu 'bras lhun gyis grub pa yi/ /bdag gis kun la dbang bskur ste/ /rigs 'dzin gnas
468a7(rgyud 'grel): su ? bar 'gyur/ /phyag rgya chen po rtag tu bzhag /sngags ni rtag tu brjod par bya/ /sngags dang phyag rgya rgyun mi bcad/ /rnal 'byor bsgrub pa'i lam yang yin/ /mi gtong sdom zhing 'dren pa yin/ /don mchog rdzogs
468b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i gnas yin no/ /rtag tu mnyam bzhag phyag rgya yin/ /dus gsum ting 'dzin 'byin sngags yin/ /yang dag don ched klu 'dod pas/ /dus mtshungs med par phyag rgya sngags/ /yid brtan drag tu bzlas bsgom bya/ /yon tan nam
468b2(rgyud 'grel): mkha' i mdza' dang mnyam/ /rdo rje sems dpa' sgrub 'dod pas/ /rtag tu mnyam bzhag don rtogs pa'i/ /sku ni 'ja' tshon tshul 'dra ba'i/ /snang la rang bzhin med par sgom/ /'khor rnams chu zla'i tshul shes par/ /gsang la rtog
468b3(rgyud 'grel): pa med par bsgom/ /lha yi sku ni gsal bsgoms ni/ /bsod nams tshogs chen thob par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gzugs brnyan tshul shes na/ /ye shes tshogs chen thob par 'gyur/ /yi dam lha ste spang byas na/ /ngan song ni nga de rtag tu myong
468b4(rgyud 'grel): bdag rten dbyer med phyag rgya che/ /gsal la brtson pa'i yon tan ldan/ /yid bzhin ma chags dbang bskur ste/ /goms shing brtan par bya ba yin/ /de bas bar chad rtson med de/ /dper nas ban tshig pa las/ /'bras bu 'dod pa
468b5(rgyud 'grel): dang 'dra ste/ /bsgrub pa'i 'bras bu med par 'gyur/ /mi khom 'khor bar gnas par 'gyur/ /dam tshig bsrung dang sngags bzlas dang/ /phyag rgya rgyun mi bcad pa bzhi/ /brtson 'grus che zhing brtan par bzung/ /rnal 'byor brtson
468b6(rgyud 'grel): 'grus chung gyur na/ /mi bsgrub nyan yang che bar gsungs/ /ji ltar ral gri'i so la nan tan du/ /skyes bu myur du ma bzung na/ /lag pa nges par chod par 'gyur/ /de bzhin nan tan med pa'i gsang sngags pa/ /'chi 'am yang
468b7(rgyud 'grel): na 'bras bu med par 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor dam pa rnams kyis ni/ /sngags kyi yan lag ma nyams gsal/ /don dam ma nyams dag byas shing/ /brtson 'grus cher bskyed myur bar 'grub/ /'di ltar bsgrubs shing bsgoms byas
469a1(rgyud 'grel): na/ /'bras bu tshe la ma sbyar kyang/ /dper na mngal dang sgo nga bzhin/ /rnam rtog lus ni bor ma thag /thams cad kun la dbang bsgyur zhing/ /rigs mchog dam pa thob par 'gyur/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dang mnyam pa'i/ /
469a2(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub mchog rnams yongs su rdzogs so// //chu rlung can la drod dbab pa/ /gnas pa'i 'khor lo drug gnas pa/ /sprul pa'i gnas su sor tshad la/ /rtsa gnyis ri bong can tshes 'dra/ /gnyis kyi bar du byang chub sems
469a3(rgyud 'grel): yungs kar tshad tsam rnal 'byor bya/ /yang na shing thig le gnyis/ /bskyang ba bsam bya sngon smos bas/ /dam pa'i lte ba sor bzhi tshad/ /thig le ldan dang mi ldan pa/ /rung ba rgyud pa mnad 'dra ba'i/ /ba? thag nyi zer rgyang 'dra bsgom/ /rjes su bstan pa de nyid du/ /
469a4(rgyud 'grel): sor phyed yul la kun rdzob sems/ /yungs 'bru'i tshad tsam 'od dang ni/ /kha dog la yang mi gnas par/ /sgom pa'i ye shes myur bas ste/ /sum cu phrag drug gis ni 'thob/ /dar ma tsakra'i pho brang du/ /mkha' 'gro yod med mdor bskul bzhi/ /
469a5(rgyud 'grel): nga la mkha' 'gro med pa ni/ /cita? rta bdun ba dang ni/ /ri bong lcam sbyar ga 'u na/ /byang sems yungs kar 'bring tshad tsam/ /de la 'phro 'du gang yin pa/ /ri bong can la tshangs pa yi/ /chung ngu snang ngo thig le la/ /na ta sgra yong da gnyis
469a6(rgyud 'grel): las/ /kha dog sna tshogs 'od ldan pa'i/ /sgron ma phyir 'byung tshe na gnas/ /de la brdubs pas 'dus pa'i tsha/ /bug chung 'phro bas gsal gdab bo/ /de bzhin yang nas yang bsgoms na/ /ye shes nam mkha' i gzugs su skye/ /
469a7(rgyud 'grel): de las bzlog pa gang yin pa/ /'khor lo 'dab brgyad lta dbus na/ /ye shes snang ba'i thig le bzhugs/ /phyogs bzhir rang bzhin mkha' 'gro bzhi/ /rigs dang mthun pa'i kha dog la/ /de las bzhi ste lam nas spro/ /ye shes
469b1(rgyud 'grel): snying po phog pas gsal/ /mdor sgom ye shes snying rtsa la/ /gnyis med byang sems bde chen po/ /rta bdun pa yi snying po ltar/ /'od dang kha dog ci yang snang/ /gang du ma des bsgom pa ni/ /khams gsum dga' ba'i snang bas 'gegs/ /de dag gang
469b2(rgyud 'grel): 'phrod phyir bstan mod/ /shin tu ye shes myur ba ni/ /bde chen longs spyod cho 'phrul rnams/ /gsal byas rig pas bskyod byas te/ /sprul thig bzhi las ma nyams pa/ /de tshad thig les chos la bskul/ /thim pas bde bskyed de bzhin
469b3(rgyud 'grel): du/ /longs spyod bde chen thug par bya/ /rim pas bde bskyed bde chen bdes/ /bde chen 'khor lo bzhu byas te/ /rim thim zhu ba bskyod byas te/ /don dam ye shes de ru mthong/ /de dag kun la'ang bying rgod kyi/ /rkyen sogs
469b4(rgyud 'grel): spangs pa sngon bzhin du/ /rang nyams g.yo thob bstan pa yi/ /tshad bzung rtsol dang mi rtsol bya/ /'jig rten ting 'dzin ro brgyad sogs/ /zhi 'gog la sogs ro brtags te/ /ma nor lhag pa'i shes rab kyis/ /spang dor blang ba'i
469b5(rgyud 'grel): bye brag shes/ /'di dag rtsom pa'i rnal 'byor la/ /rgyal ba sras bcas byin rlobs mdzad/ /thabs chen 'di dag gang thob kyang/ /rnal 'byor brtson 'grus mi ldan na/ /bul ba ra'i 'bras bu bzhin/ /nam yang don yod ma yin no/ /
469b6(rgyud 'grel): rtog rlung g.yo ba rlung bzung ba/ /zhi ba bul ba drag po sogs/ /sgron ma bzung ba'i thabs rnams kyis/ /dmigs pas rig pa'i phur pa gdab/ /de dag thabs dang mtshan nyid dang/ /zin nas phra ba bslab pa dang/ /dgag dang lus
469b7(rgyud 'grel): bzung spro ba rnams/ /mnyes byas bla ma'i zhal du zhus/ /mes tshig me yis gdungs pa yin/ /'tsho zhing chags pas chags bral yang/ /mngon du bya ba de brjod pa'i/ /rnal 'byor thabs dang ldan pa yis/ /yon tan kun ldan
470a1(rgyud 'grel): ?? dag /mun dang lkog? dang skye bo gnyis/ /rdzas dang sdug pas sems spros kyang/ /gar? dbab phrad par skye bo byed/ /dam tshig rnam smin sems 'jog cing/ /gtso la gdung ba'i phyag rgya rtsal/ /gtan du rigs pa snying 'dra na/ /
470a2(rgyud 'grel): 'di dag bstan la sbyar ba'i gnas/ /bud med yon tan kun yod kyang/ /gnyis kyis sems phrogs bskor dben du/ /'dod pa phyal bar spyod pa la/ /dam pa'i man ngag mi bstan te/ /'tsham par lha yi sku bstan no/ /gzungs su gyur pa
470a3(rgyud 'grel): de phyin chad/ /rnal 'byor pas kyang rgya mi dbral/ /mi yis sngon bzhin sems phrogs nas/ /'dod pa phyal spyod nyams byed pa/ /tshe 'di mi bde myong 'gyur nas/ /phyi mar dmyal bar ya re cha/ /de'i sdug bsngal bzod reg chad/ /
470a4(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje rgyal po ma yin pa/ /rnal 'byor pas ni de bzhin no/ /de bas mi mo gdam pa ces/ /yid 'ong gnyen gnas dbang bskur te/ /bslab pa'i rim pa bstan par bya/ /khrus byas gos rjes dam tshig sbyin/ /chos bshad 'du shes
470a5(rgyud 'grel): sgyur bar bya/ /gzhung bzhin bdag cag byin gyis brlab/ /nyed sdeb sprod dang tsu mi bya/ /rtse 'khyud sbyin pa sogs rnams kyis/ /yab yum snol mar cha skyed la/ /dgrol dang rgyas pa chog bya/ /ye shes dbab pa mngon rdzogs nges//
470a6(rgyud 'grel): cho ga? de yis las byas pas/ /mgo sprug smin langs mig mdog dmar/ /'dar dang smra mi shes sogs 'byung/ /de nas phyag rgya bzhi sogs pa/ /rgyud las gsungs pa 'di skad du/ /dgug dang 'dzin dang de bzhin te/ /bsdus
470a7(rgyud 'grel): dang 'khril bas don bsgrub phyir/ /bsdam dang mi stong dbang bsgyur te/ /bden pa sgra brnyan phyogs bcur sgrogs/ /shin tu sgeg pa'i gzi byin 'bar/ /yid bzhin rin chen 'phreng ba 'bar/ /dbyangs snyan yid 'phrog
470b1(rgyud 'grel): gzi ldan 'bar/ /gzugs mdzes skyod pas phyogs bcur g.yo/ /kun tu tshim byed bro gsungs thim/ /lta mdzes rin chen phung po 'phro/ /'od gsal 'phro bas kun tu 'bar/ /bdud rtsi gsil dro 'jam pa'i dbyings/ /'jug dang ldang dang gnas
470b2(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ /smon pa byang chub sems yin no/ /gsang dbang pad+mar ldan 'gyur na/ /chags pa med pa'i tshul gyis su/ /pha rol phyin bcu rgyu 'bram rdzogs/ /sa bcu rim gyis bgrod med rdzogs/ /kun tu 'od gsal pad+ma can yang rdzogs/ /
470b3(rgyud 'grel): yi ge 'phreng ba 'khor lo bsam mi khyab/ /yang dag rdzogs chen thabs dang ldan/ /shes rab bla med yang dag rdzogs/ /bsod nams ye shes tshogs chen rdzogs par rol/ /rig dang mnyam pa'i shugs ldan pas/ /bdag dang phyag rgya
470b4(rgyud 'grel): rigs 'bar phyir/ /rang snang shes nyams rol bya ste/ /sa rim re res bkug rlung bzung/ /gtsug tor zla shas 'od 'dres pa/ /ma lhung shes rab ye shes myong/ /cig shos shugs ldan de goms pas/ /bcu gnyis tshad phyin phyag rgya la/ /
470b5(rgyud 'grel): rak+ta byang chub dus cig 'bar/ /gnyis med zung du 'brel ba las/ /dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis 'byung/ /sems 'dres brdubs bas sa rim thob/ /ma he mo yi 'o ma dang/ /'ga' 'ga' i nyi shing bcud kyis so/ /de thabs rdzogs
470b6(rgyud 'grel): par mnyes byas la/ /bla ma'i zhal las shes par bya'o/ /rdzogs so// //rnam rtog grub mdza' ma sgyur ba'i/ /blo la brda' grol man ngag bstan/ /bden tshig brjod pas blo byin brlab/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i zhal
470b7(rgyud 'grel): bstan pa/ /dub thabs ngo bo khyad par yang/ /yon tan skyon gyis rdzogs par bya/ /ma nges sa 'am thun mong nas/ /sems cher skyes pa 'dir zhugs pa'i/ /mnyan gsan thun mong byin brlab pa/ /dbang lnga rdzogs pa'i shi sha la/ /
471a1(rgyud 'grel): lhag pa'i lta ba ces 'dzin yod/ /las kyi mdza' la 'jug 'dod tshe/ /brda''grol byin gyis brlab bar bya/ /dgrol thabs rnam grangs gzhal bya dang/ /grub mdza' i dngos po lus bzhag go /rnam par
471a2(rgyud 'grel): dbye ba rnam gnyis te/ /rgyud dang bstan la dbab pa'o/ /rgyud pa nye ring rnam gnyis te/ /gang zag so sor rtog pa'i sa/ /mthong mi ldan la sngon song pa'i/ /gsang ba'i zhi gnas bstan byas pas/ /shugs dang dpyad pa gnyi
471a3(rgyud 'grel): ga mthong/ /de min rgyu tsam sog med pa/ /rgyud las 'di skad gsungs pa ste/ /chos nyid rten cing 'brel bris na/ /chos nyid don rnams gsal 'gyur te/
471a4(rgyud 'grel): rang dang spyi yi don rtogs nas/ /skye rga na 'chi med rtogs 'gyur/ /ci phyir zhe na 'jig rten dang/ /sngags dang bdag rnams sems nyid phyir/ /ngo bo cig 'brel mthu ldan zhing/ /cig dang du ma rtogs par 'gyur/
471a5(rgyud 'grel): dngos po bstan la dbab bya ba/ /rim pas zlog ste gzhal bya ba/ /'jig rten 'di na ci yod pa'i/ /ming dang tha snyad 'dzin pa dag /so so'i mtshan nyid 'jig byas na/ /rang bzhin med de yang dag nyid/ /rang 'byung chen po'i
471a6(rgyud 'grel): ye shes kyis/ /thams cad sangs rgyas zhing du sbyor/ /ma bcos ma byas ngang gis gsal/ /ye nas 'od gsal sangs rgyas zhing/ /zhes pa rgyud las gsungs pa'i phyir/ /brtags pa'i spyod pa gnyis las gzhal/ /
471a7(rgyud 'grel): rnam par byang dang nyon mongs gnyis/ /so sor yod pa ma yin te/ /nyon mongs gnyen pos bcos su med/ /thams cad dbyings su ro cig pas/ /cis kyang mi tshugs gong na med/ /brgyad las gzhal bya rnams gnyis
471b1(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /sgrub thabs gtan tshigs bcas gsungs pas/ /'khor dang mya ngan 'das la brtag /'das pa spyod yul ma gyur phyir/ /brtag pa'i yul du ji ltar rig /sems la mya ngan 'das zhes pa/ /de nyid 'das par rung ma yin/ /gal te
471b2(rgyud 'grel): 'das pa'i snang ba la/ /gzhan nyid dang pos lkog tu 'gyur/ /de pa'i na 'khor dngos po yang/ /snang dang rtags pa gang la gzhal/ /snang ba rang gi mtshan nyid ni/ /brjod pa min te rigs snang phyir/ /gzhal byar rigs min skye bo yi/ /yul
471b3(rgyud 'grel): min grub pa'i mdza' ltar snang/ /rtags pa nang la spyad do zhes/ /rten spyad bzhi ru rigs pa min/ /'on te rang la nang du yang/ /ltas te dpyad zhe de nyid ni/ /log rtog spros pa'i skad cig ma/ /snga ma 'das dang phyi ma byung/ /de la rten
471b4(rgyud 'grel): par rtag mi rigs/ /de ltar skad cig mi brtan pa/ /so sor rtog par gnas 'gyur na/ /zhen 'gag rang la bstan mi rigs/ /nges par bzhag pa'i gzhal bya ni/ /'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa yi/ /rang gi mtshan nyid mi 'dod de/ /
471b5(rgyud 'grel): de ltar nang du zhen pa yis/ /phyi rol med la yod ltar nang/ /zhen dang lta ba gnyis la brten/ /de de shes pa skad cig ma/ /de ltar da ltar thad rang bcad/ /lta ba'i tshe na gnas gyur pa/ /gzhal bya med par dogs pa'ang/ /
471b6(rgyud 'grel): zhen pa shes kyi spyi yul yin/ /skad cig gnas 'gyur shes nyid do/ /de bas yul sems ma 'dres phyir/ /zhen snang 'jam la skyo ba med/ /'on te yid 'gyur zhen pa'ang/ /skad cig mnyam pas 'gag pa med/ /de tshe rtags
471b7(rgyud 'grel): gzhi yod mi rung/ /dogs na zhen pa'i yul rnams ni/ /gtan du dag pa ma yin phyir/ /so sor spyod kyang zhen yul mthong/ /rang dang spyi mtshan ma lus la/ /shes rab dbang po yul phyi smol/ /mdor na kun brtags dus
472a1(rgyud 'grel): bzhis dang/ /'das dang sdug bsngal kun ming la/ /don du zhen pa ltar snang la/ /rten te smal bas mdza' rnyed 'gyur/ /de ltar rang snang spyi la'ang/ /gnyis gnyis snang ste rgyud nyid las/ /spyi yi mtshan nyid brjod
472a2(rgyud 'grel): pa ni/ /yang dag nyid kyis rab brtags na/ /rnam par byang pa'i mtshan nyid de/ /de skad spyi tshan gnyis su brjod/ /rang gi mtshan nyid brjod pa ni/ /chos dang bdag dang dngos po rnams/ /ngo bo mo? la sogs brtags pas/ /rtog pa sgyu
472a3(rgyud 'grel): ma'i rlung 'gyur te/ /log rtog spros pa rgyun nyid la/ /ma rig de sogs nyon mongs lnga/ /rang mtshan kun ni rtags nyid bstan/ /so so'i rtsal rnams 'dzin gyur pas/ /thabs chen du ni rnam par 'phro/ /de skad rang rig rang snang
472a4(rgyud 'grel): phyir/ /rang gi mtshan nyid de bzhin nyid/ /de ltar rang spyi bzang dang ngan/ /gzhal bya grub mdza' lung bstan no/ /de rjes bstan la dbab bya ba/ /de nyid mtshon pa'i tha snyad pas/ /de nyid bstan la dbab pa dang/ /dngos
472a5(rgyud 'grel): po grags pa'i tha snyad la/ /brten te brtan la dbab pa'o/ /kha dog ma yin dbyibs ma yin/ /gnas su ma yin gang yang min/ /de la ji bzhin nyid dbab pa/ /gzhi bzhin brjod pa'i tshig rnams kyis/ /dkar po dkar por mtshon pa
472a6(rgyud 'grel): bzhin/ /bsam brjod 'das pas de nyid mtshon/ /de yang ji ltar rgyud las gsungs/ /gzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid ni/ /pho mo ma yin ma ning min/ /mtshan nyid ma yin rigs brgyud min/ /kha dog ma yin dbyibs ma yin//
472a7(rgyud 'grel): gnas su ma yin gang yang min/ /de bzhin nyid dbyings ye shes te/ /thabs kyi phyag rgya kun gyi rgyu/ /thabs las thabs byung thabs bsam yas/ /thams cad ma lus rnam par dag /nyid kyi dbyings las mi zhan phyir/ /bde
472b1(rgyud 'grel): dang mi bde gang yang med/ /thams cad dbyings su ro gcig ste/ /de bzhin nyid kyi ngang brtson par/ /yang dag nyid kyis de skad bshad/ /bshad dang nyan pa gnyis ka med/ /de bzhin nyid du yang dag 'du/ /kun gyi 'byung gnas byed pa'o/ /de
472b2(rgyud 'grel): yis ma byas gang yang med/ /kha dog dbyibs rigs gang yang min/ /shin tu brtag dka' sus mi rig /byang chub sems kyi theg pa ni/ /kun la khyab cing mi gnas pa/ /kha dog gnas dang dbyibs ma yin/ /yon tan mchog gi
472b3(rgyud 'grel): snying po ni/ /tog gi spyod yul de ma yin/ /byang chub sems zhes brjod pa ni/ /gang nas ma 'ongs gar mi 'gro /rtog med rang gi kho na tsam/ /mnyam pa'i don nyid ji lta bu/ /mnyam nyid rang bzhin gang yang min/ /dngos rnams
472b4(rgyud 'grel): nyid na dngos med pa'i/ /rtog pa'i smra bsam yul las 'das/ /de bzhin nyid dbyings ye shes te/ /de phyir dngos po dngos med do/ /sus kyang ma bcings bcings med de/ /bcings par bya ba yod ma yin/ /bcings med rnam
472b5(rgyud 'grel): par grol med pa'i/ /ye nas lhun grub sangs rgyas chos/ /rgyud las de ltar gsungs pa yis/ /bcings pa bdag nyid mi dmigs phyir/ /so sor rtog pa grol mi 'dod/ /gzhal med 'ching grol med bstan pas/ /ma nor go
472b6(rgyud 'grel): ba gzhal ba'i mchog /bden pa'i tha snyad de yang yin/ /chos nyid spros bral brjod bsam med/ /sangs rgyas byang chub bla dags rnams/ /mi bslu phyir na bden brtags tsam/ /ngo bos de ltar rtogs gnyid mdza' / /bshad
472b7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dngos la dmal bya ba/ /tha snyad bslu la brten nas ni/ /blo rgyu tshig rkyen ldan pas brtag /de yang brtan tshigs rnam bzhis dbab/ /de de'ang thun mong min dang yin/ /dpe dang stag gi lus bzhag go /dang po smos pa gzhal 
473a1(rgyud 'grel): bya ba/ /rtogs dag mnyam dben bdag gnyis rgyus/ /rang 'byung ye shes gtan la dbab/ /rtog ge yul min phyir na nges// //rtogs pas gzhal ba ci phyir na/ /rgyu cig pa dang yig
473a2(rgyud 'grel): 'bru'i tshul/ /byin gyis brlabs dang mngon sum pa/ /rab tu rtogs pa rnam bzhi yis/ /thams cad mngon rdzogs rgyal po che/ /rgyud las 'byung phyir de rmal rigs/ /dang po sangs rgyas sems can rnams/ /phyi nang snod
473a3(rgyud 'grel): bcud so so yi/ /rgyu las grub pa de yi phyir/ /mi cig rtog ngan sgrol bya'i phyir/ /rgyud las mngon du gsungs pa dang/ /gzhan yan gsungs pa 'di lta ste/ /phyogs bzhi mtshams bzhi steng 'og bcur/ /rang 'byung chen pos kun tu
473a4(rgyud 'grel): khyab/ /rang 'byung che nyid dngos med par/ /kun gyi phyag rgya'i rgyu yin no/ /ma bcos rgyun gyi skad cig ma/ /de yis ma byas gang yang med/ /gzhi rtsa med de rang bzhin stong/ /rigs dang rgyud du rtag tu med/ /rigs dang kha dog dbyibs med
473a5(rgyud 'grel): las/ /phyi nang snod bcud thams cad snang/ /'phro ba'i gzhi rtsa de bzhin nyid/ /de bas rnam rig 'byung ba ni/ /zhes pa la sogs des lung gi /gtan tshigs smos pas yid ches bya/ /de bas 'khor 'das snod bcud rnams/ /zhi
473a6(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur gzhi las g.yos med ltar/ /kun dngos rig pa dang snang phyir/ /ngo bo nyid kyi rgyu ru cig /bdag spyod yul dus snang ngo cog /rang gi kun gzhi'i de bzhin nyid/ /ji ltar ltas pa snang ba'i phyir/ /sems nyid 'od gsal cig
473a7(rgyud 'grel): pa la/ /don dam bden par rim pas bzhag /yig 'bru'i tshul ni a o a'oM/ /'bru gsum sgra dbyebs kyis mtshan nas/ /sku gsung thugs kyi 'bras bu rtog /de yang 'di skad gsungs pa ste/ /dngos kun ji ltar brtags
473b1(rgyud 'grel): bsam bzhin/ /'gyur bas sems snang kun ngo bo/ /sems nyid rig sogs gang min phyir/ /'di 'dra ma skyes skad cig med/ /ma skyes yi ge don gyi gsungs/ /brjod dang 'drar snang phyir nges pa'o/ /don dam nyid na thams cad du/ /'phro
473b2(rgyud 'grel): ba ma 'gags ye shes te/ /snang stong thams cad shes rab don/ /dbyer med o te chos kyi sku/ /de nyid ye shes lnga rdzogs te/ /stong pa'i ye shes dngos po med/ /me long ye shes rtog pa med/ /mnyam nyid ye shes bzang ngan med/ /
473b3(rgyud 'grel): so sor rtog pa ma 'dres gsal/ /bya ba nan tan mthar phyin pa'o/ /de phyir a'oM gyi don dbyibs mtshon/ /lhag pa'i don dam kun rdzob gnyis/ /rtogs pa'i lta ba'i byin rlabs kyis/ /bar na se'i ras mtshon ltar/ /rtog pa'i spyod yul
473b4(rgyud 'grel): zung 'jug par/ /byin rlob phyir na sgra 'jug ste/ /rgyud las 'byung ba 'di skad du/ /dkar po tshon gyis mdog bsgyur te/ /dug kyang sman du 'gyur ba dang/ /de bzhin dug gsum byang chub ste/ /'gro ba byang chub lam du sbyor/ /
473b5(rgyud 'grel): de ltar tshul gsum brjod pa yis/ /mthong ba gang yin shes rab spyan/ /de yang mngon sum gzhan spangs te/ /sgra tshig rten bral zhen tsam yin/ /yul min rang rig dben dbyer med/ /blo gting go bas mngon sum phul/ /ming
473b6(rgyud 'grel): tshig sgra la mi brten par/ /blo yi gting du go bar byos/ /rtogs par byed dang byas pa'i phyir/ /ming des tshul ni sgrar 'jug pa'o/ /'o na bden gsum rim pa yis/ /mthar phyin bar du rtogs rigs phyir/ /gtan tshigs 'jog
473b7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rigs pas 'gal/ /lta ba'i ngo bo'i rim par dogs/ /bsten pas gzhi mthong yod mod kyi/ /gsum gyis gsum mthong mthar byed phyir/ /byed la brjod pas the tsom med/ /rigs pa dam pa nyid du nges/ /des na don gyi gtan tshigs
474a1(rgyud 'grel): kyang/ /ngo bo cig la thabs kyis phye/ /dper na me dang tsha bzhin nam/ /chu dang rlan phyir ji bzhin no/ /lta ba'i rnam grangs brjod pa kun/ /rang bzhin ngo bo'i chos tshul gyis/ /mtshon cha cha re so sor bstan/ /ci
474a2(rgyud 'grel): brjod ming grangs ngo bos cig /dag pa gsum dang bzhis gzhal ba'ang/ /snod bcud rgyud rnams dag rtogs shing/ /dag mnyam rnam gsum don rtogs bsgoms byas shing/ /zhes gsungs phyir na 'di smos te/ /ngag gsum bden gsum
474a3(rgyud 'grel): bden bzhi dag /mnyam pa bzhi lnga'i skabs 'chad de/ /tshul gyis bdag mnyam so sor brtag /nyid la dbang sgyur nyid spyod phyir/ /bdag dang gzhan dang rtog pa'i rgyun/ /rnam dag bla med theg pa'i mchog /dag pas snang ba spong zhe na/ /
474a4(rgyud 'grel): thams cad dag ces bya ba dang/ /dngos po gsal dag ma yin te/ /snang spyod nyid ni rnam par dag /chos rnam yong gi dag pa yi/ /rnam bzhi tshul gyis don rtogs mngon/ /rgyu rnams rab tu dag pa dang/ /'bras bu yongs su dag
474a5(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur te/ /don dam dmigs med rang bzhin dang/ /kun rdzob sgyu mar ye nas dag /rgyu yi mtshan nyid dag pa ni/ /phyi rol chen po lnga rnams te/ /sems nyid gzung 'dzin gnyis snang ba/ /bzung ba'i yul nyid 'byung ba che/ /rgyu nyid rang gi sems
474a6(rgyud 'grel): yin pas/ /'byung ba chen po rgyu las dag /'bras bu yongs su dag pa ni/ /sems can kun gyi rus pa ste/ /rdo rje byang chub sems yin la/ /sha ni pad+ma rak+ta yin/ /dri chen dri chu gur gum chu/ /so so'i lus la gnas pa dag
474a7(rgyud 'grel): don dam dmigs med dag pa nyid/ /phyi nang chos rnams thams cad kyang/ /gang gi ngo bo 'ang ma yin te/ /skye 'gag med par ye nas dag /kun rdzob ye nas dag pa ni/ /sgyu ma'i rang bzhin thams cad snang/ /chu zla'i tshul du mi
474b1(rgyud 'grel): dmigs gnas/ /mi dmigs pa nyid sna tshogs snang/ /de bzhin gshegs dang ye nas mnyam/ /bla na med pa'i dkyil 'khor dang/ /ngan song gnas rnams ma lus kun/ /rgyud nyid rang bzhin gnyis ka dang/ /rang bzhin ye nas de bzhin no/ /
474b2(rgyud 'grel): 'bras bu rnam par dag pas na/ /'jig rten brtan g.yo la sogs pa/ /snang ba nyid na ngo bo med/ /de nyid chos sku chen po yin/ /gsum dang bzhi brjod dgos ched ni/ /rmongs pa gsum bzhi dag ma dag /'dzin pa'i lta na bzlog pa'i phyir/ /
474b3(rgyud 'grel): rnam grangs brjod kyis ngo bo cig /cis kyang ma go ma spangs pa'i/ /so sor snang zhing mthun pa'i gzugs/ /bdag dang bdag med tu rtogs pa/ /de lta bu yi ngang du snang/ /rnam par rtog pa mi mnga' ste/ /de yi mi mkhyen ci yang
474b4(rgyud 'grel): med/ /rnal 'byor lta ba de lta bu/ /tshig gis snga phyi yod mod kyang/ /don gyis cig par rdzogs par bsgom/ /mtho dman kun gyi gzugs snang dang/ /bla med byang chub skur snang ba/ /me long lta bu'i tshul bzhin du/ /sna
474b5(rgyud 'grel): tshogs kha dog dbyibs su snang/ /shes rab chen po rnam dag pa/ /spyod yul thams cad dag par 'gyur/ /shes dang spyod yul gnyis su med/ /de bzhin nyid du ro cig go /mnyam pa gsum bzhi lnga bshad pa/ /
474b6(rgyud 'grel): gnyis kyis chod bar sbyar ba ste/ /bdag gzhan che chung ltar dgrol phyir/ /mnyam nyid lhag pa'i mnyam nyid kyis/ /dkyil 'khor kun tu bzang po zhing/ /mnyam pa rnam bzhi don rtogs mchog gi gnas/ /zhes gsungs
474b7(rgyud 'grel): phyir na bzhi yis rmal/ /de yang thun mong gnyis gnyis las/ /lhag pa'i mnyam nyid spangs par 'grub/ /thun mong rgyu yis kun rdzob du/ /rkyen bzhi 'dus snang sgyu ma tsam/ /kun brtags spros pa chad pa'i phyir/ /rnam
475a1(rgyud 'grel): grangs don dam zhes kyang bya/ /skabs kyis yongs su 'grub par smra/ /de la rgyu rkyen cha phyed na/ /'dus snang dngos po ma skyes pa/ /don dam mnyam par 'dod ba de/ /rten cing 'brel pas bsgrubs pa'i
475a2(rgyud 'grel): mdza' o/ /yang dag sgyu ma'i tshul gnyis su/ /bdag dang bdag gi gzhan med de/ /de nyid ngo bo dbyings nyid las/ /rnam dag dbyings cig tshul nyid do/ /bdag dang bdag gi gzhan rnams ni/ /log par rtogs pa tsam nyid las//
475a3(rgyud 'grel): phra zhing zab pa'ang yi dam yin/ /log rtog nyid la nyid spyod de/ /gzhan du g.yo ba ci yang med/ /de bzhin bya ba dang ni yo ga ba/ /don dam rang rig gang yin pa/ /spros bral rang bzhin dag pa dang/ /rnam dag dbyings kyi
475a4(rgyud 'grel): ye shes lnga/ /don dam 'dod pa kun rdzob du/ /rigs gsum rigs ltar 'dod pa dag /bdag nyid chen por ma rtogs phyir/ /thun mong mnyam par nga smra'o/ /lhag pa'i kun rdzob tsam du yang/ /rang rig snang phyir
475a5(rgyud 'grel): 'bras bu lta/ /snang dang don nus ngang gi dben/ /de phyir lhag pa'i kun rdzob go /de nyid rang sems dbyings ye shes/ /'bras bu sngar rdzogs brjod bsam 'das/ /de phyir lhag pa'i don dam rgyu/ /ye shes rgyu mar snang
475a6(rgyud 'grel): ba dang/ /log rtog sgyu mar snang ba gnyis/ /sgyu ma yin phyir rang bzhin mnyam/ /mnyam pa nyid la mi gnas pa'i/ /bsod nams ye shes tshogs rdzogs te/ /ye shes gnyis kyi dkyil 'khor la/ /theg mchog
475a7(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje ma lus rdzogs/ /dpe byad mtshan rdzogs dpag tu med/ /thams cad mnyam pa'i dkyil 'khor la/ /rang 'byung ye shes 'pho ba yis/ /dbyings dang rig pa gnyis min pa'i/ /de bzhin nyid du rdo rje rig /
475b1(rgyud 'grel): 'on te kun kyang gnyis med na/ /mnyam zhes brjod pa ji lta bu/ /mi mnyam bltos pa rgyu ma yin/ /yang dag tha dad de yang rdzun/ /de yang kun brtags mi mnyam las/ /bltos nas de ldog mtshon phyir brtags/ /don tu ye nas
475b2(rgyud 'grel): mnyam nyid la/ /mnyam par zhes pas 'dod brjod bral/ /mnyam pa rnam lnga'i dam tshig ni/ /don dam skye 'gag med mnyam pa/ /chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun/ /de bzhin nyid dang stong pa mdza' / /yang dag nyid dang
475b3(rgyud 'grel): chos kyi dbyings/ /mtshan nyid med dang dmigs su med/ /gzung du med cing smon pa med/ /ye nas mya ngan 'das pa yin/ /thams cad nam mkha' i mtshan nyid de/ /nam mkha' la yang mtshan nyid med/ /kun rdzob sgyu
475b4(rgyud 'grel): mar mnyam pa ni/ /'dus byas dngos po sna tshogs ni/ /sgyu ma'i tshul du thams cad snang/ /'phral snang bya ba kun kyang byed/ /rtog pa kun gyi mtshan mar snang/ /'di dag thams cad gzugs brnyan te/ /bya byed snang zhing
475b5(rgyud 'grel): dngos po med/ /chu zla'i tshul du thams cad snang/ /thams cad snang la rang bzhin med/ /don dam kun rdzob dbyer med ni/ /chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun/ /gzhi rtsa med las thams cad 'byung/ /med dang yod
475b6(rgyud 'grel): pa gnyis ka min/ /don dam kun rdzob dbyer med de/ /'dus ma byas nyid 'dus byas snang/ /snang ba nyid na dngos po med/ /dngos med de ni sna tshogs pa/ /de nyid sgyu ma mig yor tshul/ /'byung ba chen po lnga rnams ni/ /
475b7(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa lngar mnyam pa/ /sa chu me rlung nam mkha' las/ /ya mtshan sna tshogs 'byung 'gyur ba/ /gzhi rtsa yod pa ma yin te/ /rang bzhin ngang gis de ltar 'byung/ /so so'i rigs tshogs snang ba ni/ /thabs
476a1(rgyud 'grel): chen dag tu brtags ba mnyam/ /mtshan nyid so sor gnas pa ni/ /shes rab dbyings kyi ngang du mnyam/ /tshogs brgyad ye shes lngar mnyam pa/ /rnam rtog kun gzhi ma yin pa/ /rang bzhin med pa don gyi
476a2(rgyud 'grel): gzhi/ /'di ni chos kyi dbyings zhes bya/ /de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes so/ /rnam par byang dang nyon mongs kyi/ /gzhi rten rnam rtog kun gyi gzhi/ /bag chags mun pa rang dangs pas/ /thams cad me long lta bu'i tshul/ /chos
476a3(rgyud 'grel): rnams ma lus thams cad kun/ /nga dang bdag tu mi 'dzin cing/ /kun kyang dbyer med ngang yin bas/ /thams cad mnyam nyid ye shes yin/ /thams cad kun la lung rtog cing/ /rtog dang brtag par bya ba med/ /dus
476a4(rgyud 'grel): gsum du yang mi dmigs pa/ /so sor rtog pa'i ye shes yin/ /log rtog dbang po'i spyod yul spangs/ /dbang po yul rnams dngos med bar/ /thams cad dbyer med de bzhin nyid/ /bya ba grub pa'i ye shes yin/ /
476a5(rgyud 'grel): mnyam pa rnam lnga de dag rtag /chos rnams ma lus thams cad la/ /ye nas rang bzhin med pa dang/ /thabs chen lhun gyis grub par brtag /'di ni yang dag rtogs pa yin/ /gdod nas ma skyes rnam dag byang chub sems/ /
476a6(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin dbyer med gdod mdza' mi 'byed cing/ /ye nas mnyam pas rgyal ba rgya mtsho yin/ /'gro 'ong med pas dus gsum cig par rdzogs/ /dbye bsal med phyir bzang ngan blang dor med/ /rnam rtog nyid na ye shes rang 'byung
476a7(rgyud 'grel): ste/ /rnam rtog mi skye ye shes brjod du med/ /ma spangs mtshan ma kun bral yod med pas/ /dran byed mi spong 'khor rgyun mi 'byed de/ /mi snyags mi 'byed mngon sum sangs rgyas la/ /blo yi rig pas spyod cing nan tan
476b1(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /mtshon cing bsten pas byang chub thob mngon te/ /shes rgyud ci yin gang yin ngo shes shing/ /bya byed las 'phags kyi rta 'dug byed pa/ /gang zhig blo la spyod pa byang chub 'thob/ /chen po yum lngar dag pa dang/ /phung po
476b2(rgyud 'grel): sems phyir rigs lngar dag /tshogs brgyad ye shes lngar mnyam pa/ /snod bcud rgyu yi kun brtags pa/ /bden pa kun rdzob don dam dang/ /gnyis su med dang rnam gsum yang/ /de gsum nyid du mnyam bas gsal/ /skabs
476b3(rgyud 'grel): kyis kun brtags yul rnams ni/ /ming tsam ngo bo'i rgyud med pa'i/ /rigs ba cir snang don byed dang/ /rtog mal mthun snang ma nges dang/ /phyag rgya'i dbyibs mdog gsal bas 'grub/ /skor bdun rdzogs dang bsam brjod
476b4(rgyud 'grel): 'das/ /ngo bo rgyus 'grub shes bya yi/ /mchog gyur shes rab dam pa yi/ /yul yin rtog ge'i ma yin dang/ /mi bslu nges pas sgra 'jug ste/ /thun mong stong brjod bral tsam min/ /lnga dgur rang rig rang snang phyir/ /
476b5(rgyud 'grel): tshul gyis phye ba'i ngo bo nyid/ /smra brjod bral te bsam yul min/ /phyogs bral ngo bo dbyer med pa/ /shes can yang rab yul yin phyir/ /de ni bden pa chen por bshad/ /bden pa gnyis ka dbyer med pas/ /'phrul dga' i tshul
476b6(rgyud 'grel): te tha dad min/ /de bzhin bzhi yang lhag pa'i gnyis/ /rjes mthun thun mong bden pa yang/ /skye bo'i yul 'das rigs pa yis/ /grub pa thun mong grags bar zad/ /bdag nyid chen po'i rkyen tshig gis/ /ji ltar gzhal bya
476b7(rgyud 'grel): 'dir brjod pa/ /log rtog rgyu 'bras bdag gzhan ltar/ /rnam pa 'di kun rang rang gi /rang bzhin med pa'i rnam shes nyid/ /rang 'byung ye shes gnas med snang/ /mdor na tshogs brgyad rtog snang ba'i/ /shes yul cig kyang
477a1(rgyud 'grel): ji lta bar/ /bsam pa bstan tshe de snang phyir/ /kun dngos gzhan bral bdag nyid che ho/ /thams cad rigs phyir bdag brjod kyi/ /snang bkag rnam pa cig ma yin/ /gang zag chos dang brtag pa'i
477a2(rgyud 'grel): bdag /rang rgyu spyod yul bral las bdag/ //rgyu 'bras yul lta bzlog phyir las/ /bdag nyid chen po 'di 'dra med/ /'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i/ /chos rnams sna tshogs snang ba yang//
477a3(rgyud 'grel): bdag las gzhan pa ma yin pas/ /kun la smod cing chags su med/ /sems dang sems nyid ji lta bur/ /byang chub de ni sems yin no/ /sems dang byang chub dbyer med pas/ /sems can ma lus thams cad dang/ /
477a4(rgyud 'grel): dus gsum chos rnams thams cad yin/ /thams cad ma lus chos so cog sems dang byang chub nyid du 'u ba/ /dbyings dang dbyings dang ye shes kyang/ /rang rig kho na tsam du zad/ /dgu dang stong phrag brgya bcu bzhi/ /
477a5(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems las gzhan du min/ /gzhal yas khang dang dkyil 'khor dang/ /khro tshogs 'du 'phro mang po yang/ /sems kyi cho 'phrul chen po yin/ /sems nyid rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pas/ /sangs rgyas gzhan
477a6(rgyud 'grel): ba? ma 'tshol cig /kun brtags lo rgyus brjod byas pas/ /ji bzhin nyid don rmal bya ba/ /dper na 'jig rten mi rnams dang/ /pha mes lo rgyus bshad byas na/ /rigs rgyud cig gis cig shes ltar/ /chos kun
477a7(rgyud 'grel): gzhi? ?? byas na/ /gser las tha dad dbyibs snang ltar/ /rang rig cir yang snang phyir gzhi/ /de nyid rtogs med rang snang las/ /rgyud med gzhi rtsa ga la rnyed/ /de nas lo rgyus rtags byas pas/ /gzhan bral
477b1(rgyud 'grel): rigs snang bzang ngan med/ /rtags pa'i dri bral ma 'dres bsal/ /don gsal so sos mtshon tshig phye/ /dngos tshig tshul sgras tha dad kyang/ /don du smra bsam bral ba cig /chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun/ /gzhi rtsa med las thams
477b2(rgyud 'grel): cad 'byung/ /gshegs sku sgyu mar snang ba dang/ /log rtog sgyu mar snang ba gnyis/ /gzhi rtsa med de rang bzhin stong/ /rigs dang rgyud du rtag tu med/ /rigs dang kha dog dbyibs med las/ /phyi nang snod bcud thams cad
477b3(rgyud 'grel): snang/ /snang ba nyid na chos kyi sku/ /cir yang 'gyur zhing thams cad 'grub// //gtan tshigs gnyis pa'i lus bzhag pa/ /rang bzhin rang spyi mdza' bral dang/ /rnam par dbye ba'i gtan tshigs kyis/ /
477b4(rgyud 'grel): rang 'byung ye shes snyan par smra?/ /de dngos dang rang bzhin la'ang/ /rang bzhin dngos dang rnam dbye ba'o/ /dngos ni spyi bshad chos so cog /rgyu rkyen byed pos byas min par/ /rang bzhin nyid kyi snang tshul gyis/ /phye ba'ang dang
477b5(rgyud 'grel): gis mdza' bral dang/ /rang bzhin yong gis mnyam pa dang/ /rang bzhin thams cad mkhyen sogs gsal/ /chos kun rang bzhin mi dmigs phyir/ /'khor ba yongs su dag par 'gyur/ /rang bzhin yong gis dag pa'i
477b6(rgyud 'grel): phyir/ /mnyam pa'i dbyings su yang dag rtogs/ /'khor ba'i rang bzhin mi dmigs phyir/ /mya ngan 'das pa yod ma yin/ /de bzhin nyid dang dbyer med phyir/ /rtag tu rang bzhin 'od gsal nas/ /'jig rten 'das dang 'jig
477b7(rgyud 'grel): rten pa'i/ /chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun/ /bdag dang bdag gi gzhan na med/ /rang bzhin dang gis bdag med pa'o/ /'di ltar snang ba thams cad kun/ /bdag la gud na cig kyang med/ /bdag nyid shin tu mi dmigs
478a1(rgyud 'grel): bas/ /nyon mongs nyid kyang byang chub shing/ /chos rnams thams cad bdag yin pas/ /gang du 'gro zhing gang du skye/ /'jig dang skye ba'i dngos po med/ /dngos med de la su zhig sad/ /rang bzhin
478a2(rgyud 'grel): rnam par dbye ba ni/ /de ltar gtan tshigs kun la'ang/ /khyad sbyor gzhan yang dngos po kun// //rang rgyud med de ming tsam dang/ /dngos po ma nges cir yang snang/ /rnam bzhi'o dang po rgyud las kyang//
478a3(rgyud 'grel): yang dag nyid dang log rtog nyid/ /ngo bo nyid kyis gnas 'gyur na/ /de las bcos shing sgyur du med/ /ye nas ngo bo yod yin na/ /nyon mongs spangs shing byang bsgrub med/ /zhes gsungs dngos po rnam nyid la/ /rigs
478a4(rgyud 'grel): rgyud yod na der red pas/ /skyon gnyis 'byung ngo rtag par gol/ /de phyir snod bcud 'gro ba'i rigs/ /snang ba tsam ste stan dred min/ /de phyir ming tsam rgyud med de/ /chos rnams ming du brtags pa tsam/ /'gro
478a5(rgyud 'grel): drug dus gnas ma lus snang/ /ming tshogs khyad par snang ba yi/ /zab chen spyod yul log par rtog brtags ming rtsam pa/ /thams cad ming tsam sangs rgyas kun/ /yi ge'i 'phreng ba nyid la gnas/ /bdag dang bdag
478a6(rgyud 'grel): gi gzhan rnams ni/ /log par rtog pa tsam nyid las/ /phra zhing zab pa yod ma yin/ /log rtog nyid la nyid spyod de/ /gzhan du g.yo ba cig kyang med/ /log rtog rgyu 'bras rgyun nyid kyang/ /gzhi rtsa med dbyings
478a7(rgyud 'grel): skad cig ma/ /rnam par dag pa dbyings nyid tshul/ /ma rig pa yi 'khrul rtog gis/ /nga dang bdag tu med pa la/ /so so'i mtshan ma dngos pos bzung/ /'dzin pa'i dngos po yod na de/ /chos rnams thams cad ming
478b1(rgyud 'grel): tshig tsam/ /so so'i rang bzhin nges zhes na/ /yang dag lam gyis bcos su med/ /thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas yin te/ /snang ba nyid na 'ja' tshon bzhin/ /rang bzhin med par kun tu snang/ /de nyid chos sku yin par bshad/ /de dag me yi
478b2(rgyud 'grel): tsha ba ltar/ /rang bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin te/ /chos kun rang spyi bstan pa'ang/ /skabs kyis rtags pa der red med/ /kha cig rang gi mtshan nyid du/ zhen pa snang ba lta bu la/ /sa sra chu gsher la sogs dang/ /nyon mongs rang ga'i
478b3(rgyud 'grel): mtshan nyid dang/ /snying rje skyob la gdung ba dang/ /byams pa mi byed phan 'dod spogs/ /mya ngan 'das lam 'bras bu yi/ /rang gi mtshan nyid so sor 'dod/ /zhen pa de nyid mi rtag sngal/ /stong bdag med pa'i spyi ru 'dod/ /la lar rang
478b4(rgyud 'grel): rig thabs chen du/ /ma 'gags snang ba rang mtshan te/ /dngos su rnam par byang ba yi/ /mtshan nyid yin pa ci ru 'dod/ /nyon mongs rang dang spyi bstan pa/ /mtshan nyid ma nor don rtogs na/ /rnam par byang ba'i lam du 'gyur/ /sku
478b5(rgyud 'grel): gsung thugs kyi dngos grub kyang/ /gang na med de de nyid yin/ /nang gi chen po lnga nyid kyang/ /rang dang spyi yi don rtog na/ /mtshan nyid med par rnam par dag /rang gi mtshan nyid brjod pa ni/ /chos dang gang zag bdag dngos rnams/ /ngo bo
478b6(rgyud 'grel): yod la sogs rtags pas/ /rtog pa sgyu ma'i rlung 'gyur te/ /phyi yi mtshan nyid brjod pa ni/ /mi rtag sdug bsngal stong bdag med/ /ma rig pa ni spang du med/ /ma rig yang dag bsgrub du med/ /thams cad dbyings ni gcig tu thim/ /
478b7(rgyud 'grel): so so'i rtsal rnams 'dzin gyur pas/ /thabs chen du ni rnam par 'phro/ /mtshan rnams rang bzhin mi gnas pas/ /shes rab dbyings su rnam par spyod/ /sgyu ma'i dngos po rtog pa ni/ /rtog pa de nyid mi dmigs phyir/ /mi dmigs de
479a1(rgyud 'grel): nyid sna tshogs snang/ /skyes pa nyid na chos nyid cig /zhe sdang spyi yi mtshan nyid ni/ /yang dag nyid kyis rab brtags na/ /rnam par byang ba'i mtshan nyid/ /gnyis med zhe sdang spang du med/ /'dod chags mtshan nyid rtogs pa ni/ /rnam
479a2(rgyud 'grel): par byang ba yin pa'i phyir/ /chags pa ma chags gnyis med pas/ /'dod chags mtshan nyid spang du med/ /phrag dog mtshan nyid rtog pa ni/ /rnam par byang ba'i mtshan nyid de/ /dog pa spangs med yangs bsgrub med/ /de bzhin mdza' bral gtan
479a3(rgyud 'grel): tshigs kyang/ /bltos nas mi rtag kun mdza' i phyir/ /yod med dbus dang rtag chad dang/ /cig dang du ma la sogs pa/ /mdza' gsum dang ni bzhir grags pa/ /thug pa thug mthar ci smos kyi/ /bral dang 'das dang med brjod sogs/ /bltos rtags
479a4(rgyud 'grel): phyogs zhen yod phyir mdza' o/ /de dag 'khrul phyir 'di skad du/ /yod las rtsal na sgros brtags 'gyur/ /med las brtsal na bkur btab ste/ /yod med gnyis las btsal byas na/ /de ni lung du ma bstan 'gyur/ /'di ltar snang ba
479a5(rgyud 'grel): thams cad la/ /mngon sum tshad mar rtags mthong yang/ /snang ba nyid na dngos po med/ /de bzhin yang dag nyid du rtogs/ /gang zhig stong pa'i ngang yod ces/ /med pa'i rang bzhin rtog pa ste/ /ri bong rwa dang mo sham bu/ /tshig tsam gdags
479a6(rgyud 'grel): su rung mod kyi/ /thams cad ming tsam stong nyid med/ /thams cad ma lus stong zhes te/ /dran med sdos pa ma yin pas/ /rtog med rang bzhin 'od gsal bas/ /'di ltar snang ba thams cad kun/ /gdos pa can gyi chos min te/ /
479a7(rgyud 'grel): shes rab 'ba' zhig kho na'o/ /thams cad ma lus de bzhin te/ /de ni gang yang dmigs med la/ /skye dang 'gag dang gnas pa dang/ /'od dang 'gro ba'i dngos po med/ /de bzhin rang gi rig pa yang/ /mdza' dang dbus med du ma
479b1(rgyud 'grel): yin/ /gang du mi 'gro kun tu khyab/ /kun la de bzhin mi gnas pa'o/ /gdos pa can gyi chos min pas/ /ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub/ /rig pa dbang du gyur pa na/ /stong par bya 'am mi stong bya/ /thams cad dbyer med ngang yin pas/ /kha dog
479b2(rgyud 'grel): dbyibs dang rin po che/ /thams cad khyab dang yungs 'bru'i tshul/ /bsam yas mdza' dbus med pa'o/ /yod med dbu mar mi dmigs shis/ /sgyu ma mig yor lta bu'i tshul/ /cig dang du mar bral ba yi/ /mdza' dang dbus med de bzhin nyid/ /sangs
479b3(rgyud 'grel): rgyas kyis kyang mi gzigs te/ /rang 'byung ye shes gnas med snang/ /phyogs 'dzin lta dang dgrol phyir dang/ /mdza' bral 'dod pa 'dir gzhug phyir/ /mdza' dang bral zhes bya mod kyi/ /mthu kun rang rig rang snang phyir/ /'di la bral dang ma bral dang/
479b4(rgyud 'grel): grol dang ma grol phyogs zhen med/ /ye nas mdza' gnyis ma bcings phyir/ /grol bar tha snyad 'dogs pa'ang med/ /rnam par dbye ba 'ang phung po dang/ /'byung ba la sogs dngos kun la/ /de dngos snang re'ang bye brag gi /brtsegs pas ril
479b5(rgyud 'grel): bor zhen grol nas/ /cig kyang dngos kun der re med/ /rang rig lhun grub bdag nyid dbyings/ /phung po lnga po gzhig par bya/ /bshig nas 'byung ba'i bag la zha/ /ma bshig na'ang 'byung ba yin/ /sa chu me rlung nam mkha' kun/ /rang
479b6(rgyud 'grel): bzhin med par bsheg pa'i phyir/ /gcig pa lnga lngar dbye bya zhing/ /mum gyi dbyings su thim bya zhing/ /dbang po yul dus snang ba kun/ /yul rnams yod pa ma yin zhing/ /kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa nyid/ /dngos po sna tshogs
479b7(rgyud 'grel): par snang? ste/ /snang ba'i dngos po rnams gzhigs na/ /so so mtshan nyid dngos med pas/ /gzhigs nas nam mkha' dang du zha/ /nam mkha' i de nyid lngas gzhigs na/ /mtshan nyid med pa'i dbyings su thim/ /'di la mos pa gzhug
480a1(rgyud 'grel): phyir dang/ /gsang chen don dam mthong bya'i phyir/ /brjod kyi dngos kun dbyer med la/ /rnam par dbye las gzhan nas min/ /de ltar de dag gang rung gis/ /chos kun gtan la phab gyur na/ /rang 'byung ye shes
480a2(rgyud 'grel): gnas med snang/ /rgyu rkyen ma byas ye nas gsal/ /chos nyid phyogs bral bsam brjod rnams/ /bral phyir mtshon par mi nus kyang/ /mtshan mas mtshon te bkri ba'i phyir/ /sbyin dang me long tshul lta bur/ /dngos kun gsang sngags
480a3(rgyud 'grel): nyid snar bas/ /mtshon par ma gyur med pa'i phyir/ /dngos kun mtshan nyid ji lta bar/ /rang 'byung theg chen shes rab kyis/ /nam mkha' gzung du med pa ltar/ /snang srid thams cad de dang 'dra/ /chos rnams thams cad
480a4(rgyud 'grel): sems yin te/ /sems ni nam mkha' i rang bzhin no/ /ji ltar sa gzhi chen po la/ /sems kyis zin dang ma zin pa'i/ /skye 'khrung ma lus thams cad kun/ /thams cad kun gyi gnas brten te/ /de bzhin bla med theg pa la/ /
480a5(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas byang chub kun kyang gnas/ /theg pa mtho sman thams cad 'byung/ /thams cad theg chen dbyings su 'dus/ /me yis thams cad kun bsreg lta/ /rtog tshogs ye shes dang du bsreg /chu yis sdud cing 'khru ba
480a6(rgyud 'grel): ltar/ /kun la de ltar rig par gyis/ /chos rnams ye nas rlung dang 'dra/ /de la bzung du med pa ltar/ /kun la de ltar 'byor bar gyis/ /ma btsongs nas ni de ltar gnas/ /thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas yin te/ /snang ba
480a7(rgyud 'grel): nyid? na 'ja' tshon 'dzin/ /rang bzhin med par kun tu snang/ /de nyid chos sku'i yin par bshad/ /sgra rnams ji snyed brjod pa yang/ /dngos po med las dngos po'i sgra/ /brjod dang sgra yi dngos po min/ /chos rnams sgra ltar
480b1(rgyud 'grel): shes par byos/ /bsnam bya dri yi dngos po yang/ /yod pa ma yin kun tu bzung/ /chos rnams thams cad dri dang 'dra/ /dngos med sna tshogs 'byung zhing 'phro/ /the tshom med pa'i shes rab kyis/ /chos kun de ltar shes par gyis/ /yul dang
480b2(rgyud 'grel): dbang shes dngos med par/ /'tshogs pa ro yi dngos grub ltar/ /chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun/ /gzhi rtsa med las thams cad 'byung/ /phung gzhi shes pas dbang 'gyur na/ /reg bya sna tshogs myong ba ltar/ /chos
480b3(rgyud 'grel): kun rig pa dbang 'gyur na/ /sna tshogs snang la dngos po med/ /yang na thabs dang theg pa'i phyir/ /dngos po dngos po bcos pas rtogs/ /nyon mongs dug lngas dug lnga sgrol/ /dug rgyu rkyen gyi ngo bo dag /rang 'byung ye shes
480b4(rgyud 'grel): rang snang phyir/ /de ltar sus dran nyid kyis grol/ /nga la 'dod chags 'dod yon lnga/ /mthong thos dngos dang rkyen bzhi kun/ /rig phyir rang snang mthong thos bral/ /mngon par chags pa'i gnyis 'dzin med/ /gzugs snang
480b5(rgyud 'grel): ye shes rang rig gzugs/ /sgra brjod rang snang rig pa sgra/ /dri zhim chos kyi yin na de/ /ro bro de bzhin nyid kyi ro/ /reg bya rang 'gyur ye shes rag /log rtog yul lnga ming tsam du/ /snang las rang rgyud med pa'i phyir/ /
480b6(rgyud 'grel): rang rig rang snang spyod yul med/ /kun la de ltar 'byor par gyis/ /yon tan thams cad tshogs gnyis 'gyur/ /de ltar rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /'di la mi bya cig kyang med/ /gzhan dag ting 'dzin bsgyur ba dang//
480b7(rgyud 'grel): spyod thabs 'dul dang ched byed dang/ /yang dag dug lngar byed sogs pa'ang/ /drang ba'i don de thar pa'i lam/ /sbyod dang spyad par bya med par/ /rang snang grol thar thabs chen mchog /de bzhin gzugs dang tshor ba dang/ / 
481a1(rgyud 'grel): mtshan 'dzin 'du byed rnam shes lnga'i/ /mtshan nyid rang rig nyid snang phyir/ /snang stong dbyer med tshor stong bral/ /mtshan nyid yod med bya byed med/ /dran stong dbyer med rang snang phyir/ /phung po bzhi
481a2(rgyud 'grel): po ye shes su/ /gcig pas rnam shes rang 'byung che/ /brtags kyang dbye ba bsam mi khyab/ /sman la mtshan pas grol bar byed/ /kun gyis yang dag rtogs bya'i phyir/ /de bzhin chos sku'i gzugs brnyan bstan/ /
481a3(rgyud 'grel): chos rnams ma lus thams cad la/ /ye shes lnga yi kun khyab kyang/ /rang rig rnam rtog sgrib bya ste/ /ye shes lnga yi don dam mthong/ /ma mthong rmongs pa thams cad la/ /ye shes lnga nyid bstan pa'i phyir/ /dkar dang
481a4(rgyud 'grel): dmar dang ser ba dang/ /ljang gu la sogs nag po bstan/ /byang chub sems nyid dag pa'i phyir/ /shin tu mdog ni dkar ba bstan/ /de rtogs bya phyir dkar ba'i mdog /chags dang chags par bya ba med/ /chags
481a5(rgyud 'grel): med rtogs phyir dmar pa'o/ /zad 'phel med pa rtogs bya'i phyir/ /mdog ni gser gyi mdog tu bstan/ /'phrin las kun rdzogs bya ba'i phyir/ /ljang khu'i mdog tu bstan pa yin/ /bsgyur du med pa rtogs bya'i phyir//
481a6(rgyud 'grel): kha dog nag por bstan pa yin/ /de bzhin kun la shes par byas/ /mdza' dbus med de de bzhin nyid/ /dbyer med dang du gnas pa la/ /ye shes rtogs pa don bya'i phyir/ /phyogs dang dbus su gnas par bya/ /
481a7(rgyud 'grel): nyon mongs gsal bar ye shes gsal/ /de phyir shar gyis mtshon pa yin/ /nyon mongs ma rig rgyu bral nub/ /rang byung ye shes bdag nyid dang/ /sdug bsngal gdod nas dag pa yi/ /don rtogs bya phyir de byang
481b1(rgyud 'grel): brjod/ /de ltar rang rig shar nub byang/ /yon tan rdzogs pa mtshon phyir lho/ /de ltar chos rnams ma lus kun/ /de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings su 'dus/ /phyogs rnams ma lus thams cad kun/ /de bzhin nyid de zlum ba'i tshul/ /
481b2(rgyud 'grel): phyogs rnams kun la de ltar lta/ /de bzhin rten dang brten can gyi/ /bye brag nang brtags phyir bstan pa/ /mtshon phyir rtags te de sgo nas/ /rang rig rang snang mjal bar gyis/ /gru thabs skabs su brjod zin te/ /lhag
481b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i mnyam nyid ye shes don/ /mi grangs cir yang bstan mod kyang/ /don du smra bsam yul las 'das/ /thabs de rtogs pa'i ngo bo nyid/ /phyin ci ma log shes rab spyan/ /ming grangs shes rab snyan shangs ljags/ /sku
481b4(rgyud 'grel): yis de nyid thob myong tshor/ /dan reg mthong sogs ma nges pa/ /kun yod yid nges byas pa'ang/ /yul med mngon sum mchog tu gsal/ /ming grangs dag dang mnyam bden nyid/ /tshul gyis brjod kyis tha dad min/ /de
481b5(rgyud 'grel): dag dbya ba'ang chos can gyi/ /grangs dang blo yi phyir bshad kyi/ /de la grangs su nges bzung med/ /da bas ngo bo cig par bden/ /skabs su gong 'ang ngo bo'i don/ /brjod de 'di ltar brjod pa'ang yul/ /med kyang mthong ba'i bye brag
481b6(rgyud 'grel): gis/ /brjod kyis don 'di 'jal bar gyis/ /kun rdzob sgyu mar zhal mthong ba'i/ /thams cad mig yor sgyu ma'i tshul/ /snang srid ma lus thams cad kun/ /chu zla'i tshul du 'drar shes shing/ /yul dang rtog pa gnyis med
481b7(rgyud 'grel): par/ /gang gis de ltar rig pa de/ /de nyid rdo rje'i zhal mthong yin/ /rang bzhin dkyil 'khor yang dag ni/ /chos dbyings bdag dang dbyer med par/ /mnyam par sbyor zhing dag pa'o/ /thams cad byang chub lhun grub cing/ /
482a1(rgyud 'grel): de ltar gang gis rtog 'gyur la/ /de ni ye shes mig can yin/ /de yis yang dag snying po mthong/ /gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor yang dag ni/ /chen po rags pa thabs su rtogs/ /so so'i mtshan nyid
482a2(rgyud 'grel): shes rab rtogs/ /gnyis med 'brel pa thabs chen yin/ /kun kyang shes rab dang du gnas/ /snang dang gnas pa thams cad kun/ /de bzhin nyid las ma g.yos phyir/ /yod dang med pa gnyis su med/ /gnas dang mi
482a3(rgyud 'grel): gnas dbye ru med/ /mnyam pa'i dbyings su thams cad 'dus/ /'dus med gnas su 'bebs pa yi/ /thams cad de lta bu yi dang/ /de rtogs rdo rje zhal mthong yin/ /rgyur byas phung po lnga rnams la/ /gzhi rtsa de
482a4(rgyud 'grel): bzhin nyid du cig /sgyu mar snang ba gzugs brnyan tshul/ /snang ba nyid nas dngos po med/ /dngos med de nyid snang tshogs ston/ /rtogs tshogs lha yi dkyil 'khor du/ /de sems rig pa nyid ces bya/ /thams cad
482a5(rgyud 'grel): dbyings 'gyur kun tu bzang/ /de rtogs rdo rje zhal mthong yin/ /kun kyang yi ge'i ming tshogs bzhin/ /gang yang dngos po yod ma yin/ /dngos med nyid de sna tshogs snang/ /snang ba nyid na gang yang min/ /bya byed sna
482a6(rgyud 'grel): tshogs kun kyang byed/ /dngos po med de yang dag nyid/ /de ni cis kyang mi tshugs pa'i/ /sa rdo dran med ma yin te/ /de nyid rten du 'od gsal yin/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de ltar gnas/ /rdo rje rigs dang dbyer med phyir/ /de
482a7(rgyud 'grel): nyid rdo rje zhal mthong yin/ /thams cad ma lus pa yi dang/ /blta dang lta bar bya med pa'i/ /ye shes sgron ma sbreng bar ni/ /phyogs bcu'i zhing khams thams cad mthong/ /thams cad lhun gyis grub pa dang/ /sgyu ma mig
482b1(rgyud 'grel): yor tshul shes pa/ /gnyis ka rang rig nyid du 'dus/ /de nyid yang dag yin par bshad/ /sgra dang tshig tu brjod pa ni/ /yang dag don gyi snying po min/ /ming tshig sgra la mi brten par/ /blo yi gting du go bar byos/ /thams cad ma lus chos
482b2(rgyud 'grel): so cog /sems las chos ni gzhan na med/ /sems dang chos su dbyer med pas/ /byang chub lam ni ri rab? min/ /byang chub sems zhes brjod pa ni/ /gang nas ma 'ongs gar mi 'gro /rtog med rang rig kho na tsam/ /sangs rgyas sems
482b3(rgyud 'grel): can sems la gnas/ /yangs shing rgya che lhun grub ni/ /phyi nang snod bcud ye nas dag /dag rtogs nyid kyang dbyings nyid yin/ /'di ni rdo rje mnyam nyid do/ /yul med slob par gzhi cig la/ /dang po bzod gsol nges pa gsum/ /mi
482b4(rgyud 'grel): dmigs ye shes lta ba dang/ /phyag rgya mi spro bar chad med/ /lhun grub slob pa'i mdza' lta gsum/ /rnal 'byor rim pas phye ba yin/ /khyad par rgyu yi theg pa dang/ /sngon du brjod do gzhan gsungs pa/ /theg pa bzhi'i
482b5(rgyud 'grel): nges 'byung la/ /theg pa cig gi 'bras bur gnas/ /sa rnams khyad par bkod pa las/ /gsang ba'i snying por 'gro ba'i lam/ /theg pa dang po bcu drug mgon/ /gnyis pa bzhi yi lta spyod srung/ /gsum pa bcu gnyis
482b6(rgyud 'grel): nges par bstan/ /bzhi pa theg pa'i mdor bsdus nas/ /bla med theg pa'i dbyings su rtsud/ /ma rtogs pa dang log par rtogs/ /phyogs rtogs yang dag nyid ma rtogs/ /'dul ba dgongs pa gsang ba rnams/ /rang bzhin
482b7(rgyud 'grel): gsang ba ma mthong phyir/ /log pa'i tshogs te lam stegs tsam/ /gnas thabs ji bzhin mthong ba med/ /ngan song 'gro drug sna tshogs rgyu ba yang/ /'khrul pa'i blo log rtog pa nyid snang ste/ /de bzhin nyid dbyings 'gyur ba med/ /
483a1(rgyud 'grel): bdag dang bdag gi gzhan rnams ni/ /log par rtogs pa tsam nyid las/ /phra zhing zab pa yod ma yin/ /dman dang khyad par yod par zad/ /bdag nyid ma mthong shes rgyud ma 'byongs pa/ /gzhan du 'tshol
483a2(rgyud 'grel): zhing rmongs pa'i sems can gyis/ /bstan kyang ma thos mtshon kyang ma mthong na/ /bdag dang gzhan du 'tsho bas sangs mi rgya/ /de dang ma bral ston pa mi mthong zhes/ /bgrong par 'dod pas phyin par mi nus te/ /rgyu 'bras
483a3(rgyud 'grel): gnyis med shes rab bsgribs phyir ro/ /'di la sna tshogs zhen pa dang/ /rtag chad bdag gi lta ba med/ /chos tsam rdzas med skad cig med/ /rgyu 'bras med de phyogs stong grol/ /dam par snang ba bral ba min/ /
483a4(rgyud 'grel): dmigs pa'i lha ru 'dod pa min/ /lhun grub rnam mkhyen rtogs pa yi/ /yon tan rgyud las 'di skad du/ /dngos grub mchog gi snying po ni/ /dang po don rtog mdza' mi stong/ /chu srin phyag rgya ji bzhin du/ /spyod
483a5(rgyud 'grel): yul kun tu tshad dpag med/ /rnal 'byor don dam ldan pa yis/ /nyon mongs 'chid pa'i chos spyad kyang/ /rnam par grol bar 'gyur pa yin/ /thabs dang shes rab rtogs pa yin/ /dug gsum sdug bsngal gnod
483a6(rgyud 'grel): mi 'gyur/ /thabs dang shes rab ldan gyur pas/ /phyin ci log nyid byang chub lam/ /don rtogs don bzhi rdzogs par 'gyur/ /thabs dang shes rab ma rtogs pas/ /ma grol khams gsum 'khor ba yi/ /
483a7(rgyud 'grel): thabs la mkhas pas ma zin na/ /lam gyi dge spyad sdig spyad kyang/ /mtho ris lha dang mi ru skye/ /skye shi med pa'i sa mi 'thob/ /chos rnams dag par mi shes te/ /thabs dang shes rab ma rtogs pas/ /nyon mongs bcad
483b1(rgyud 'grel): dang spangs kyang bcings/ /mnyam pa'i gsang don ma rtogs nas/ /dbu ma rang rgyal nyan thos dang/ /lha mi 'dod dang khams gnyis lta/ /sems can dug lnga spyod pa dag /rang rang lta spyod mo tshod tsam/ /smin thob thar dang lhung bas 'khrul
483b2(rgyud 'grel): de rtogs dben pa byin brlabs te/ /zab mo brjod pas don snang byed/ /slob ma lhun grub byin brlabs pa/ /chos rnams thams cad skye med pas/ /shin tu brtan pa'i dbang thob 'gyur/ /rang rig ye shes 'od gsal bas/ /
483b3(rgyud 'grel): thams cad mkhyen pa'i dbang yang thob/ /chos rnams thams cad dbyer med pas/ /kun la spyod phyir gsang dbang thob/ /spyod cing chags pa med pa'i tshul/ /kun kyang rang bzhin zlums pa'i phyir/ /phan tshun bco lnga'i dbang thob
483b4(rgyud 'grel): ste/ /thams cad bdag nyid chen po'i chus/ /yul lha dri dbyangs khrus kyi mchog /rang sems ye shes lnga sogs brgyan/ /rang rig thabs dang shes rab kyis/ /kun tu khyab pa cod pan mchog /bdag nyid 'bras bu lnga
483b5(rgyud 'grel): snying por/ /ye shes rgyal ba kun gyi bcud/ /rtog rgyan ye shes 'phreng bar bshad/ /stong chen bla med go cha'i mchog /kun gzhir 'gyur med rtog chen po/ /sdug bsngal gdung ba dang gis sangs/ /snang grags
483b6(rgyud 'grel): rnam rtog sku gsung thugs/ /sems phyir de nyid rgyas btab pa'o/ /rang 'byung zhal du kun brdubs phyir/ /ma lus longs spyod dbang phyug che/ /rang rig ma 'dres rdzogs gsal bshad/ /de nyid dang gsal mi g.yo
483b7(rgyud 'grel): bsgom/ /brjod 'drar thams cad rig gsal thos/ /'gro 'ong med par las rdzogs dbang/ /kun gyi bdag 'gyur sems nyid ni/ /dbang phyug rgyal po'i dbang rdzogs so/ /de sogs lam kun rang rdzogs phyir/ /'jug dang
484a1(rgyud 'grel): bya ba don gnyis med/ /rgyu 'bras ye nas dbyer med phyir/ /re dang dogs pa ga la yod/ /de brtan 'jam pa g.yo thob brtan/ /blo slabs 'byung bar the tshom med/ /des brlan rig pa'i me tog can/ /des dran rgyud gnyis
484a2(rgyud 'grel): sbyin te/ /spyod lam bzhir sgom man ngag dang/ /'da' ka'i dran pa sbyin pa'o/ /de ltar ldan pas grub bya'i phyir/ /spyod lam dran dang ngo bo dang/ /bcos nyams spyod dang lam 'grub pa'o/ /'gro nyal 'dug sdod longs spyod kyang//
484a3(rgyud 'grel): skad cig dran bskul rang snang du/ /yul med rang gsal mi g.yo ba/ /theg chen sgom las ma nyams pa'o/ /re dogs bral ba'i sems kyis bzung/ /'du 'bral med pa'i sems la brtan/ /gzung 'dzin bral ba'i rang rig nyid/ /dmigs med
484a4(rgyud 'grel): tshul du rab snang ngo/ /rnam rtog nyid ni ye shes phyir/ /gnyen pos gang yang byed med pa/ /ched du rten pa 'khrul pa'i lam/ /cir yang ma myong yul dras ba/ /yang dag don nyams myong ba ste/ /de bzhin zhen bal rim pa tsam/ /g.yo thob
484a5(rgyud 'grel): brtan par snang ba yin/ /thams cad mnyam nyid rgyas btab phyir/ /de che mnyam nyid 'da' mi bya/ /mnyam rdzogs ting 'dzin goms gyur na/ /rig pa 'dzin pa'i sa thob 'gyur/ /de yang rgyud las rim par gsungs/ /shes rgyud ci
484a6(rgyud 'grel): yin gang gis ngo shes shing bya byed las 'phags gyin 'dar 'dug byed pa/ /gang zhig blo la spyod pa byang chub 'thob/ /rnam par dag pa'i g.yung drung sangs rgyas la/ /thams cad ye nas rnam dag cing/ /mi rtogs thig ler gnas
484a7(rgyud 'grel): la rtogs pa mdzad/ /snyad? du med pas sna tshogs 'byung ba yin/ /nam mkhar bzung bas sprin gyis khabs par 'gyur/ /nam mkha' med par gang gis shes pa ni/ /sprin bzhin 'byung zhing khebs par mi spyod do/ /bdag med
484b1(rgyud 'grel): bdag chen thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas/ /ma bkag pa las 'ba' zhig 'byung med pa'i/ /thams cad sems kyi dang rten sems zhes bdag tu med/ /ma bcos lhun gnas ye nas byang chub cing/ /thob rgyu med pas ye nas bde gshegs yin/ /
484b2(rgyud 'grel): e ma'o ma bsgrubs sgrub chen po/ /blang dor med pa'i sa chen po/ /grub pa chen po ye shes che/ /mi g.yo 'du 'bral med pa'i gzungs/ /rtog pa'i ye shes yid bzhin gter/ /thams cad la'ang me long bzhin/ /ltas kyang gzugs brnyan
484b3(rgyud 'grel): mi snang ba'o/ /bya byed med pa'i brtson 'grus kyis/ /de nas byang chub snying po len/ /byang chub sems su rgyu cig pas/ /rtsa ba snying rje chen po 'byung/ /mnyam la mnyam par sbyor ba'i gzungs/ /mnyam pa'i dam tshig la gnas
484b4(rgyud 'grel): na/ /mnyam rdzogs chen po thob 'gyur bas/ /'das na sangs rgyas ma yin no/ /de bas rang sems rtogs byas te/ /le lo g.yeng ba yongs spangs nas/ /nga dang bdag med mnyam par bsrung/ /thams cad ma lus sangs rgyas
484b5(rgyud 'grel): la/ /bsgrubs shing bsrung bar bya ba med/ /de bzhin nyid la gnas bcas na/ /nyon mongs sdug bsngal mi 'byung ste/ /rtag tu bde gnas byang chub nyid/ /mtshan dang dpe byad kun dang ldan/ /shes rab rnam gsum goms
484b6(rgyud 'grel): byas nas/ /ting 'dzin mnyam pa'i don rtogs te/ /kun tu yangs pa chen po bsgom/ /rgyu 'bras bus cig rdzogs pa yi/ /rang rig nyid la dbang thob ste/ /tshe ni bcu drug drug pa yi/ /brgya brgya dag tu bsnur zhing
484b7(rgyud 'grel): gnas/ /lus ma bong? bar sangs rgyas sa/ /sngags 'chang sal por rtogs byas nas/ /bdag nyid chos nyid skye 'gag med/ /ngang las ma g.yos par gnas na/ /phyag rgya chen po thams cad kyang/ /rdzogs pa phyogs
485a1(rgyud 'grel): bcu dus gsum gyi/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gsung thugs/ /thams cad dbyer med ye mnyam la/ /ma 'dres rgya yongs ma chad pa'i/ /gzhal yas khang dang nyi zla yi/ /dkyil 'khor bsam
485a2(rgyud 'grel): yas lhun grub ni/ /sku gsung thugs ni bsam mi khyab/ /de bas yang dag skye mchog gi /spyod lam rnam pa thams cad du/ /rnam par rtog med tshul gyis ni/ /thams cad kun la chags med rol/ /mthong thos yul
485a3(rgyud 'grel): sogs gang snang yang/ /rang byung rang snang rang rig las/ /gzhan ba'i dran pa mi bya ste/ /spyod yul bral bas nyams mi bya'o/ /'pho zhing 'gyur bas mthong ba dang/ /bdag nyid dran bskul dang nyid las/ /mi g.yo
485a4(rgyud 'grel): dran pas rgyun tu zung/ /rang gnas mthong par 'gyur pa yin/ /skal ldan gzhan zhig 'pho ba na/ /bde ba'i tshig bshad byin gyis brlabs/ /dran pa ma nyams par du bya/ /las zang rang snang gnas 'thob 'gyur//
485a5(rgyud 'grel): yang na zla 'di thugs yig rnams/ /rim bsdus 'od zlum gsang lam nas/ /phyir byung brdal pas snang srid kun/ /rang sems chos nyid dang du gsal rdzogs so// //de ltar man ngag gang
485a6(rgyud 'grel): 'phrod las/ /'jug tshe sngon du lus bsrungs nas/ /rnam rtog 'byung ba'i lus ltas par/ /rdo rje drag pos srung byed cing/ /rab 'bring thun mtshams shes pa yis/ /legs par bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor pa//
485a7(rgyud 'grel): rgyu 'bras re ba ma chad la/ /rgyu 'bras med par bstan pa bshad/ /'thob tshul rgyud kyi 'dre tshul dang/ /thams cad mkhyen tshul don mdzad tshul/ /legs bshad dang po thob pa'i tshul/ /lta spyod gdeng can rnal
485b1(rgyud 'grel): 'byor bas/ /bsgoms pas zhen mdza' rim gsal sangs/ /mdza' dbus med pa'i ye shes gsal/ /bde ba chen po'i dang du byon/ /de bzhin nyid du bgrod med gshegs/ /bdud bzhi ma bsam bcos pas rgyal/ /lhun
485b2(rgyud 'grel): grub yon tan rdzogs lnga yang/ /rang gi ngo bo mdza' yul 'das/ /tshul gyis rnam par phye ba yin/ /lhun grub thams cad mkhyen pa yi/ /don mchog rang rig mthong goms pa/ /rgyu las 'bras bur gyur min gyi/ /'bras
485b3(rgyud 'grel): bu rang nyid shar bar zad/ /rgyal po phrug gu spyod log pa/ /na shed bye sa thams cad kyi/ /bdag gyur lta bur khams gsum pa/ /ye yin mthong goms rtags bral ba/ /longs spyod bral bas kun bdag nyid/ /ye
485b4(rgyud 'grel): yin mngon du byas par zad/ /kun rtags gnyis zad brjod pa'ang/ /dper na rmi lam bde sdug can/ /gnyen po mi dgos snying sangs pas/ /de bral nga yi bde ba thob/ /de bzhin bde dang sdug bsngal bas/ /nyams thag
485b5(rgyud 'grel): spang min/ /shes goms ma rig rang bral na/ /gdod nas lhun grub rnam mkhyen pa/ /grub zin dang gis mngon dga' ste/ /'bras bu rang shar kyer 'dod pa/ /rtog pa'i gyong bral rim pas brtags/ /men las
485b6(rgyud 'grel): yin par grub par med/ /thog mdza' bar du 'bras nyid phyir/ /'bras bu'i theg par brjod pa yin/ /kun btags zad nas nges byas la/ /thob ces rtags kyis gzhan nas min/ /e ma'o snying por lam bcas pas/ /
485b7(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs byed dbyings nyid kun bzangs phyag rgya'i mchog /rang bzhin sku gsung thugs chen po/ /byang chub lhun grub brdal ba yi/ /snying po nyid ni snying por bcas kun gnas/ /de nyid rdzogs pa'i dad las dngos grub kun
486a1(rgyud 'grel): shar kun tu gnas/ /dpag bsam shing dang yid bzhin gyi/ /rin po che dang 'byung ba kun/ /de dag rdzas yod ma yin te/ /rang sems bsod nams brtan pa yin/ /ngo mtshar cho 'phrul smad kyi chos /
486a2(rgyud 'grel): gzhan nas yod 'ongs ma yin te/ /thabs la brten pa'i shes rab nyid/ /de lta bu yi ngang du byung/ /de tshe bcu drug tshun chad kyis/ /sku lnga lhun gyis rdzogs pa ni/ /ye shes thig le de nyid la/ /ye shes thig le nyid snang ba/ /
486a3(rgyud 'grel): bsam gyis mi khyab mdza' yas mchog /mdor na rang rig kun gzhi nyid/ /byang chub snying po rang bzhin gyi/ /ye shes sku dngos kun bral ba/ /rgyal ba'i dngos gzhi thams cad du/ /mthong bzhin nges par ma byas la/ /gtor brtags
486a4(rgyud 'grel): nges la gnyid brtags zad/ /de thob rgyud tshul ji lta ba/ /so so'i rnal 'byor tha dad pas/ /bsgrub pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshe/ /rgyud dag lhun grub rgyal ba rnams/ /rgyud cig 'dres na'ang 'di skad 'byung/ /phyogs
486a5(rgyud 'grel): bcu dus bzhi rdzogs pa yi/ /zhing khams rnam dag bsam yas dang/ /rgyu dang bral ba'i gzhal yas khang/ /'khor lo'i rgyan dang rol mo'i tshogs/ /dkyil 'khor ma lus bsam yas kun/ /mthong nas nye bar mnyes pa
486a6(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /rgya chen gsung las don byung ba/ /mthun pa'i ye shes rang snang ba'o/ /rgyud drug 'khor ba'i lus snang ba/ /rnam rtog mthun pa'i las snang ngo/ /sku mchog rdo rje 'od snang ba/ /mthun pa'i ye shes rang snang ngo/ /de phyir
486a7(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas thams cad kyang/ /ye shes rgyud ni ma 'dres te/ /gcig na nges lung 'di dag 'gal/ /cig la mthun snang sgra mi 'jug /gal te snga phyi cig 'gro na/ /stong pa'i mur thim rigs pas 'gal/ /snang ba stong
486b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i skyon duAng 'gyur/ /mdza' la thug pa the tsom med/ /so so'i grub mdza' i khyad par yang/ /mi 'byung snyam pa'i skyon du 'byung/ /so sor bsgrubs phyir cig mi rung/ /gal te rgyal ba rang rgyud 'gyur/ /rang bzhin nyid kyis cig
486b2(rgyud 'grel): go zhe/ /sems can rgyud kyang de 'drar 'gyur/ /'on te de ltar mi cig na'ang/ /rang rig rang 'byung mngon byas la/ /snga phyir sangs rgyas bla dags btags/ /rang 'byung rang la shar bar zad/ /rang 'byung rigs pa rgyud med par/ /
486b3(rgyud 'grel): so sor ma 'dres gang gis rung/ /'on te rang 'byung cha gnyis 'gyur/ /de phyir cig pa'o rigs pas 'gal/ /don mdzad re mos 'byung bar 'gyur/ /spyan drangs byon dang ma byon 'byung/ /sangs rgyas sangs rgyas zhes brjod pa/ /dngos
486b4(rgyud 'grel): po rnams kyi de nyid ni/ /de la gnyis pa yod par 'gyur/ /de phyir gzhi yi don dang 'gal/ /mi cig gtan tshig rgyas pa med/ /lung las 'byung ba 'di skad du/ /mkha' la 'ja' tshon sprin yang mang/ /nam mkha' i dbyings su
486b5(rgyud 'grel): thams cad bsdus/ /thams cad mkhyen nyid bsam yas kyang/ /chos kyi dbyings su thams cad bsdus/ /rdo rje mnyam nyid thugs su chud pa'i sa/ /mnyam rdzogs chen po'i lhun la rol pa mdzad/ /bde gshegs dbyings
486b6(rgyud 'grel): nyid de bzhin nyid gnas pa/ /dus bzhi rgyal ba kun dang mnyam par 'ub/ /rang bzhin dbyer med gdod mdza' mi 'byed cing/ /ye nas mnyam pas rgyal ba rgya mtsho yin/ /nam mkha' gang ba'i rgyal ba dang/ /nyag gcig snang ba'i rgyal
486b7(rgyud 'grel): ba gnyis/ /sku dang gsung thugs cig las med/ /'dul ba'i po gang khyad par la/ /mi mthun so sor snang ba zad/ /de sogs mthun gsungs bka' dang 'gal/ /sangs rgyas du ma'i mthar 'gyur ro/ /de de'ang nges pa
487a1(rgyud 'grel): 'di ltar zhog /drang don nges don dbang du na/ /rigs lnga ye shes khye'u lngas/ /don grub snang byed bu las ni/ /shAkya thub 'gyur mya ngan 'das/ /me tog bkod par ma grags snang/ /thun mong sangs
487a2(rgyud 'grel): rgyas rgyud rer snang/ /ye shes skad cig go phye nas/ /don mdzad mthun 'dod ltar snang ba/ /drang ba'i don de nges pa yin/ /nges par rgyal ba thams cad kun/ /ngo bo cig de tha dad min/ /ngo bo nyid ni ci 'dra na/ /brjod bsam
487a3(rgyud 'grel): 'das kyang phyogs mtshon na/ /thabs chen ma 'dres cig stong 'das/ /shes rab dbyings cig du ma dang/ /yod bral 'di zhes bstan dka' ba'o/ /der cig bshad pa'i mdza' mi 'gyur/ /rgyal ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi//
487a4(rgyud 'grel): shes dang ye shes rig dang rgyud/ /dbyibs dang kha dog mchen gnas dang/ /rang bzhin nges par der med phyir/ /dngos po rnams kyi de kho na/ /sems kyi chos nyid rang 'byung gi /ye shes cha gnyis yod ma yin/ /cig po kun
487a5(rgyud 'grel): ldan kun bral ba'o/ /de nas ye shes rgyud 'gro med/ /de phyir sprul pa'ang 'gro 'ong bral/ /des na cig dang du ma'i mdza' / /dbus bral ma spangs ngo bor cig /de la la las cig par ni/ /cig bden du ma'i tshul gyis
487a6(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /mi cig the tsom za ba 'byung/ /de lta'i rgyud du 'dzin byed pa/ /'tsho nying brlabs ltar thams cad kun/ /gdod nas rang 'byung ye shes cig /ye shes 'di ni 'di 'drang? dka' / /mdza' mdzod ma lus der snang phyir
487a7(rgyud 'grel): du ma nyid du cig pa'o/ /du ma rgya chad yod 'gyur na/ /rang 'byung kun snang bden mi 'gyur/ /bde gshegs mi gnas mnyam nyid dang du byon/ /thabs chen ma 'dres rnam par thar pa yi/ /dmigs med bde bar
487b1(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa nyid/ /ye shes dbyings su thugs chung pa/ /thabs dang shes rab dbyings nyid dam pa'i mchog /rtog med ma 'dres yongs rdzogs pa/ /rigs su bstan dang thim pa med/ /dus bzhi phyogs kun bdag cig phyir/ /kun
487b2(rgyud 'grel): mkhyen thad ka'i dmigs yul grol/ /de phyir skad cig skye 'jigs med/ /'gro dang 'ong ba'ang de la med/ /log par rtogs rtags rnam dag cing/ /ye shes dbyings las mi gzhan phyir/ /thugs rje chen pos 'brel pas na/ /
487b3(rgyud 'grel): 'gro drug gnas rnams ma lus snang/ /dkyil 'khor gnas la dkyil 'khor nyid/ /rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor lhun gyis grub/ /brgyan du dkyil 'khor ma lus thogs/ /rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor mnyam sbyor las/ /
487b4(rgyud 'grel): thugs rje'i dkyil 'khor yongs rdzogs 'byung/ /phyogs dus dkyil 'khor 'dul ba'i mgon/ /sgyu ma'i dkyil 'khor sgrol ba yis/ /bya byed med par dkyil 'khor spyod/ /rnam par med pa'i tshul gyis ni/ /thams
487b5(rgyud 'grel): cad kun la chags med rol/ /gdul bya'i don ched bsam mi khyab/ /rgyal ba'i rgyal ba rnams kyi sku/ /sna tshogs cir yang snang mod kyang/ /kun tu rin chen lta bu ste/ /zad 'phel 'gro 'od 'dug par mdzad/ /
487b6(rgyud 'grel): dper na me long chu zla dang/ /gar mkhan lus dang brag ca dang/ /nyi 'od lta bur don mdzad pa/ /lhun grub dbyings las ma g.yos kyang/ /sku gsung thugs sprul cir snang ba/ /de la skad cig rgyun du ma bral ba/ /
487b7(rgyud 'grel): dmigs bya dmigs byed mi dmigs dpag med bsam mi khyab/ /ye shes rang rig dkyil 'khor sna tshogs brjod mi lang/ /mnyam dang mi mnyam kun khyab khyab med khyab pa'i dbyings/ /ye nas kun gsal dkyil 'khor
488a1(rgyud 'grel): rnam 'phro spros pa med/ /ye nas kun khyab dkyil 'khor bsam yas zhing gi rdul snyed du/ /ye nas rnam 'phros snying po kun gnas pa/ /de ltar ston pa'i bla ma yang/ /shes rab mchog brtan ting nge 'dzin/ /
488a2(rgyud 'grel): thob cing dam pa'i mdzod dang ldan/ /khungs su rgyud pa'i dbang phyug pa/ /dman pa'i 'du byed spangs shing dben/ /dang dal thugs rje chen gnyen srung/ /dam pa de dang phrad nas ni/ /gzhan gyi yul la mi 'jug par/ /rigs
488a3(rgyud 'grel): dang skyon la mi rtog par/ /snying du bzung zhing snying du bya/ /slob ma ma nor rigs can nam/ /rigs rgyud dag pa'i rnal 'byor pa/ /bla ma rigs 'dzin srog tu 'dzin/ /man ngag rin chen gter du 'chang/ /ting 'dzin shes
488a4(rgyud 'grel): rab rtsal du rdzogs/ /lhag pa'i ye shes nyi mar 'char/ /dad dang brtson 'grus rgyu 'bras rdzogs/ /rtsol bas lus ngag stong brlag kyang/ /mi skyo bla ma mi spong ba/ /bde ba thob pa'i yan lag yin/ /bla ma rdo rje srog
488a5(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur te/ /sgo gsum zol rgyu g.yo med pas/ /mi phyed rgyun tu bsten na 'grub/ /bla ma'i don gyis nyon mongs shing/ /sdug bsngal gyur pa pha rol la/ /mi sems 'di yis 'dod 'tshol bas/ /dngos dang thabs
488a6(rgyud 'grel): kyis 'bral byed cing/ /zhe gzhog dngos su bskur pa dang/ /de yi sdug bsngal bzod rlag chad/ /rdo rje bla ma sems can can/ /rgyal sras yid kyi blo can des/ /sgo gsum dregs dang ngan spyod pa/ /bgas kyi tshor na bla ma
488a7(rgyud 'grel): des/ /gter mdzod rig pa'i sgo sdom ste/ /man ngag mi thob rgyu yin pas/ /rgyu glang rkyen med mi 'grub ltar/ /man ngag med na 'grub mi 'gyur/ /des na bla ma srog yin pas/ /lus ngag sems kyis dus gsum
488b1(rgyud 'grel): du/ /rang srog bral ba'i las mi byed/ /grags rnyed 'dod pa'i sems log gis/ /nyams rab 'gyur ba'i las mi bya/ /de ltar byed pa'i slob bu gang/ /drag pos spang ngam yang na ni/ /tshig gis brid cing bgyangs la gtang/ /
488b2(rgyud 'grel): thugs kyi bde ba sro sro'o/ /bla med dkyil 'khor ston pa po/ /yon tan zad med sbyin pa yin/ /byang chub lam chen 'dren mdzad pa/ /chags med zhing du 'god pa yin/ /nyon mongs sdug bsngal rtsad gcod cing/ /'khor
488b3(rgyud 'grel): ba'i lam rnams stong par byed/ /ma rig mun sel sgron me yin/ /long ba rnams kyis dmigs su med/ /de la rtag tu mchod byas na/ /sangs rgyas byang chub thag mi ring/ /rdo rje slob dpon smad mi bya/ /byang chub
488b4(rgyud 'grel): ston pa'i 'dren pa po/ /long ba'i dmig bu 'dren dang 'dra/ /nyon mongs sdug bsngal mtsho skems yin/ /slob dpon de la smod pa ni/ /dper na mun khung sgron bsad na/ /mthong ba'i don mi rtogs pa bzhin/ /sdug bsngal
488b5(rgyud 'grel): nyams thag yun rings su/ /bskal pa mang por myong bar 'gyur/ /de bas gus pa rtag tu gyis/ /lus la dbang pa'i rgyal po bas/ /shin tu gtso bor blang bar bya/ /mi 'khrug blo zab rkyen thub cing/ /sems can ngang tshul
488b6(rgyud 'grel): kun bor nas/ /gang gis yid kyang mi 'khrugs cing/ /bud med 'gug pas gtso la 'bul/ /gzungs thub gsang la mkhas pa yi/ /nges pa can la shin tu gtad/ /thogs pa med par 'dod pa spyod/ /bud med yon tan
488b7(rgyud 'grel): kun yod kyang/ /'dod chags kun dang mthun spyod pa/ /nams kyang 'khor ba'i gting rdo ste/ /man ngag bstan pa'i gnas min pa/ /'di dag nams kyang sbyin mi bya/ /dad pa che zhing chos la gus/ /chags par ngan
489a1(rgyud 'grel): par bka' nyan zhing/ /gnas la dga' zhing lung nyan pa/ /rigs nges btung ba'i lag tu btang/ /dam tshig mi ldan spyod pa rtsing/ /spro thung 'dod chags rab tu che/ /gnyid med chang dad brtson 'grus chung/ /slob la mi gus nan tan
489a2(rgyud 'grel): med/ /slob dpon mi dran gdung sems chung/ /mun dang lkog dang skye bo la/ /gar dben 'phrad par 'dod spyod cing/ /'dod chags bsgal lam de dag la/ /tshig rnams gsang ba smra byed pa/ /'jig rten 'dod pa dga' rnams phyir/ /gal te smos pas byin na ni/ /
489a3(rgyud 'grel): rims dang nad kyis srog bcad de/ /sreg dang sbems par yun rings gnas/ /gsang ba'i don mchog 'di dag ni/ /lta ba dman la bshad byas na/ /dus min par ni srog zad nas/ /mgo 'gas snying yang 'tshig par 'gyur/ /khab len
489a4(rgyud 'grel): gyis ni lcags sdud ltar/ /mi 'dod bzhin du dbang med par/ /ngan song bskal bar ltung yang 'gyur/ /de bas rdo rje gsang mchog 'di/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i thugs rje yis/ /chos la skyon yon ma yin te/ /sems can
489a5(rgyud 'grel): don phyir shin tu gsang/ /theg pa dman dang phyin ci log /de la gsang ba bstan 'gyur na/ /rang bzhin gsang ba'i don mi shes/ /'phral gyi spyod yul de dag la/ /shin tu nges pa'i don bzung nas/ /ma rtogs de nyid dmyal
489a6(rgyud 'grel): bar 'gro /dper na gtsub shing me gtsubs na/ /gtsub shing nyid kyang 'tshig par snang/ /gzhan yang 'tshig par 'gyur ba bzhin/ /chos don zab mo me dang 'dra/ /skal chung shes rab sman pa dang/ /blo ngan rgyu 'bras rmongs
489a7(rgyud 'grel): ba rnams/ /gsang thos ma rtogs sdug bsngal myong/ /dam can rdo rje mkha' 'gro tshogs/ /mos pa bzhin du 'dug gyur nas/ /sha khrag zos te sdug bsngal 'gyur/ /de bas rab tu gsang bar bya/ /thos bsam sgom la rab
489b1(rgyud 'grel): spyangs pa'i/ /shes rab mig ldan rnams kyis ni/ /snod ldan ngang tshul bzang la bstan/ /lus dang longs spyod gtong la sbyin/ /shes rab rgya che blo yangs pa'i/ /blo brtan snying rje dang ldan dang/ /rang bzhin ngang tshul bzang la bstan/ /
489b2(rgyud 'grel): gzhan du sbyin par bya ba min/ /'di lta'i man ngag sbyin byed pa'i/ /bla ma rdo rje srog gyur te/ /gsung rab rgya mtsho ma bshad kyang/ /nam zhar snying du nan tan bya'o/ /'di thob de yi rgya nyams na/ /nam zhar thar pa'i khar ma byung
489b3(rgyud 'grel): gang zhig 'di la mos gyur pa/ /rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor thams cad kyis/ /phyogs dus kun nas thams cad du/ /dkyil 'khor ma lus bsnyen pa yi/ /nye ba'i sras su dgongs par 'gyur/ /rgyal ba'i rigs mchog 'dzin pa de/ /'jig
489b4(rgyud 'grel): rten gtso dang 'khor gyis bskor/ /dam pa mchog dang dam pa yis/ /sras dang spun dgongs byin gyis rlob/ /bde gshegs nyid kyis yul bzhugs pa/ /'jigs med kun tu bzang por sbyor/ /rgyud lung man ngag don bsdus pa'i/ /
489b5(rgyud 'grel): rgyal ba sngon 'byung ston byed pa/ /dus mdza' i skad cig de nyid la/ /rang 'byung ye shes sngon du ston/ /bstan pas rgyal ba'i gral du 'jog /ye shes 'phrul gyi lde mig gis/ /rdo rje'i tha tshig sgo phye nas/ /yid bzhin
489b6(rgyud 'grel): rin chen gter phyung ba/ /skal ldan mchog gi sbyad du gsol/ /khong na gnas pa'i yang khongs su/ /lcags kyi sgrom bu kha bsdam mo/ /gnas ni brag dang chu la bzhag /srog bral kha bzhin bsdam par bya'o/ /man ngag gi bcud
489b7(rgyud 'grel): rgyal ba'i shul/ /rigs 'dzin rnams kyi yum/ rnal 'byor pa'i lam/ man ngag rnam par bkod pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ tsit+ta bindu pa tre sha nA ma/ bod skad du/ /thugs kyi thigs pa zhes
490a1(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /bcom ldan dpal rdor sems dpa' gtso/ /kun mkhyen rgyal ba kun gyi thugs/ /'khor lo snying po ston mdzad la/ /gnyis med yid kyis phyag 'tshal lo/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba rdo rje sems/ /
490a2(rgyud 'grel): gsang ba'i snying po'i rgyud dag las/ /rin chen bcud thugs skal ldan phyir/ /legs par bsdus ste bstan par bya/ /rgya mtsho las ni chu thigs bzhin/ /ye shes rgya mtsho thugs kyi thugs/ /mi 'jigs phung po ji bzhin du/ /
490a3(rgyud 'grel): ye shes thugs kyi bcud gsum pa/ /rang bzhin bde gshegs gdul bya'i phyir/ /snang ba gsum gyi ngo bo la/ /rgyud kyi dbye ba rnam par bzhag /gcig la gsum gyi ngo bo yang/ /'khrul ba'i snang ba gsum du 'gyur/ /
490a4(rgyud 'grel): des na snang ba bzhi dag tu/ /lung rigs kun las gsal par bshad/ /yan lag rdo rje rnam bzhi pa/ /thog mar bstan pa byang chub sems/ /'gro ba mang po'i sems rgyud rnams/ /log rtog ngo bo rgyu rkyen gyis/ /tha
490a5(rgyud 'grel): dad dus na gser bzhin du/ /rang 'byung ye shes tha dad med/ /de yang 'ching grol gnyis ka bdag /me long dang pa'i g.ya' bzhin du/ /phan tshun spangs pa med pa la/ /byis pa bzhi dang rten zhes smras/ /mkhas
490a6(rgyud 'grel): lhun grub smra bsam las 'das/ /'di skad gsang ba'i rgyud nyid las/ /bde gshegs sgyu mar snang ba gnyis/ /rigs dang rgyud du brtag tu med/ /gzhi rtsa med de rang bzhin stong/ /rigs dang kha dog dbyings med pas/
490a7(rgyud 'grel): phyi nang snod bcud thams cad snang/ /yang ni sgyu 'phrul dra ba las/ /bcings med rnam par grol med pa'i/ /ye nas lhun rdzogs sangs rgyas chos/ /bstan phyir spro ba sna tshogs mdzad/ /gsungs pas rang bzhin rgyud nyid ni//
490b1(rgyud 'grel): ma rig ye shes tha dad med/ /nam mkha' dang pa'ang sprin gyi gnas/ /dang ris can gyis bgo ba ltar/ /rtog sems mi mthun sems nyid du/ /gcig pas rang sems thug med las/ /dper na Arya dzam+b+ha la/ /ne'u le'i rkyal pa rin chen  
490b2(rgyud 'grel): char/ /rgyal po yang dag don gyi gnas/ /bram ze dam pa rtse ra pa/ /dbul bo tan ta'i grong khyer dang/ /rigs ngan sha ta ra yi gnas/ /gdol pa'i grong du rin po che/ /sna tshogs rin chen phal pa lnga/ /bye tshub grang ba lhad?
490b3(rgyud 'grel): ras trul/ /sha khrag rus pa rin chen sil/ /gcig la so sor snang ba bzhin/ /spyod yul tha dad snang ba'ang/ /rang sems rkyen gyis snang ba tsam/ /ngo bo rigs rgyud phyogs med pas/ /de la de bsgyur snang btul lo/ /spyir ni
490b4(rgyud 'grel): log rtog bsam yas pa/ /ye nas yod pa ma yin te/ /so sor 'dzin rtog bag chags kyis/ /rang gis bsgribs shing rtag tu 'khor/ /'di skad gsungs pa'ang thog med nas/ /sems las logs su ma gyur cing/ /
490b5(rgyud 'grel): rgyu rkyen las ni glo bur ba'i/ /spyod yul snang dus thog mdza' med/ /sems rgyud gnyis kun lhun grub pa/ /nor bu rin chen lta bu la/ /'gal ba 'dus zhes theg sman brjod/ /phan tshun spangs par gang 'dod pa/ /dred
490b6(rgyud 'grel): mos rtsi sbrang byabs pa bzhin/ /gsang ba'i don mchog ga la yod/ /kun nas nyon mongs rnam par byang/ /ye nas ngo bo yod min na/ /nyon mongs spangs shing sbyad du med/ /so so rang bzhin nges she na/ /yang dag lam gyis
490b7(rgyud 'grel): bcos su med/ /de gsungs phyir ba ltung? gnas pa/ /shes blo gzhi zhes gnyis su smra/ /bsam pa chos nyid de bzhin ste/ /de la yod -pa de la med/ /phyogs su rtog pa bden zhe na/ /de dang de la 'brel med pas/ /
491a1(rgyud 'grel): nam yang sngon bzhin bden pa min/ /mi rtog pa yi sems rgyud ldan/ /thams cad dag ces bya ba'ang/ /dngos po gsal dag ma yin te/ /snang spyod nyid la rnam par dag /gsungs pas log rtog
491a2(rgyud 'grel): spang du med/ /sprin dang 'ja' tshon snang ba'i tshe/ /rang bzhin stong par ngang gis gnas/ /yang dag rgyu yi theg ba bas/ /kun tu rtog pa don dam pa/ /yod na nges tshig med dogs pas/ /dang zhing gsal dag gang 'dod pas/ /
491a3(rgyud 'grel): bsam pa dag la de yod ces/ /so sor ston pa rtog pa'i blo/ /dag pa mnyam nyid gnyis med dag /ldog pas phye ba ji bzhin sgrar/ /gang zhen bsgrub pa'i phyogs 'dod pa/ /gang ga dar rtsa'i mi bzhin du/ /spyod yul bral la 'dod bas
491a4(rgyud 'grel): gdungs/ /ye shes dang la gnyis rtogs lus/ /lhun grub ngang la ye dam za?/ /gang shes mi gtsang spos dri dang/ /tsher ma'i nang nas spos dri dang/ /thams cad rang rig byang chub sems/ /de ni lung gi tshad mar bshad/
491a5(rgyud 'grel): yed las btsal na sgro btags te/ /med las btsal nas bskur btab 'gyur/ /yod med gnyis las btsal byas na/ /de'i ni lung du ma bstan 'gyur/ /de gsungs phyir na rigs yod min/ /yod med dgag bsgrub blun po'i
491a6(rgyud 'grel): blo/ /de bas sems kyi de kho na/ /kun tu brtags dang gzhan gyi dbang/ /yongs su grub pa'i bye brag tu/ /bya ba de dang de med de/ /de ni smra bsam med mi 'jog /rang 'byung kun la rgyas btab pa/ /rang bzhin
491a7(rgyud 'grel): kun dang dbyer med pa/ /med pa bzhi ltar gnas pa med/ /bden pa rnam gnyis dbyer med phyir/ /dgag bsgrub med pa'i smra bsam grol/ /thams cad ye shes pa yi phyir/ /mi mthun 'dus par brtag tu med/ /'dod
491b1(rgyud 'grel): bzhin shing ltar gnas pa la/ /ji bzhin sgra ru rtog pa 'khrul/ /bden pa gnyis su med pa'ang/ /mkha' dang 'ja' sprin snang ba bzhin/ /snang stong kun tu rang gsal ba/ /rang bzhin ngag gis snang ba'o/ /bdag dang bdag du ma
491b2(rgyud 'grel): brtags pa'i/ /so sor snang bzhin mthun pa'i gzugs/ /de lta bu yi ngang du snang/ /des gsungs lung gi bgrod dang bla/ /phyin ci log gnyis yang dag ste/ /ma rig pa nyid ye shes gsal/ /nyon mongs sdug bsngal byang
491b3(rgyud 'grel): chub mchog /de gsum don gyis de 'phos med/ /mar me'i dus na mun ldan pa/ /blun po mun snang re mos mthong/ /mkhas pa ngo bos ri mi lta/ /'khor ba chos nyid de bzhin no/ /spangs pa
491b4(rgyud 'grel): med par kun bral ba/ /puN+Da ri ka lta bu'i don/ /lam dang 'bras bu'i chos tshang ba/ /'brel pa gsum gyi tan+t+ra'o// //thugs kyi thigs pa las/ /rang bzhin gyi rgyud snang ba'i le'u ste/ dang
491b5(rgyud 'grel): po'o// //'khrul bzhi tshul dang rang bzhin gyis/ /sdom des nges par shes par bya/ /drug gi 'gro ba thams cad kyi/ /sems nyid nor bu rin po che/ /ji ltar bsams par snang ba la/ /
491b6(rgyud 'grel): 'khrul bzhi yod dam sgro skur med/ /sgro 'dogs dbang skur gang zag rnams/ /sems nyid dmigs su med pa la/ /dngos po dran rgyud bzhir smra ba/ /de yid rigs rgyud rtag par ltung/ /bskur pa ba ni lhun grub la/ /de
491b7(rgyud 'grel): dang bsam pa so sor rtogs/ /de la de ni mi srid bzhin/ /bzhi la ye nas med ces smra/ /zhen blo ngo la yod do zhes/ /bskur ba gang yin chad lta ba/ /de dang de nyid chad lta ba/ /de dang de gnyis tha dad cing/ /mi srid kun
492a1(rgyud 'grel): 'byung thog ma 'byung/ /la las ldog pa gnyis med las/ /snang smra 'ang lhan cig med pa dang/ /brten pa mi btub gzhir mi btub/ /rgyu rkyen spong pas rigs pa med/ /don gnyis yod med rigs
492a2(rgyud 'grel): me las/ /de yi rgyu rkyen rang bzhin pas/ /sman gyi phan snod ji bzhin du/ /thams cad ma lus rgyu cig las/ /mi mthun khyad par so sor snang/ /de gsum phyir na rkyen gyis che/ /lung las kyang ni 'di skad du/ /rgyu drug
492a3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor ba'i lus snang ba/ /rnam rtog mthun pa'i las snang ngo/ /sku mchog rdo rje 'od snang ba/ /mthun pa'i ye shes rang snang ngo/ /de bas sems kyi de bzhin nyid/ /mthong ba dag dang ma dag gis/ /dbye bas spyod yul so sor
492a4(rgyud 'grel): snang/ /de la ma spang mi dmigs phyir/ /mtshon pa yod med 'dogs pa'ang med/ /dgag pa med pas glang med phyir/ /mdza' yi gzhung du bsgrub mi dgos/ /ma rig mtshungs par ldan pa'i phyir/ /dus gsum rgyun tu don
