492a6(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /phyin ci log la 'jol nyog spyad/ /gal te ma byung byung 'gyur na/ /'jig rten thog ma 'byung bar 'gyur/ /ngo bo nyid dang mtshungs pa dang/ /lhan cig byed pa nyer len 'phel/ /rang 'byung rigs rgyud med pa
492a7(rgyud 'grel): nyid/ /de yas snang phyir tan+t+ra las/ /sngar gsungs don gyi dang po'i rgyu/ /ngo bo nyid kyang gzhan du med/ /sngon gyi me long rnam gnyis ltar/ /gdod nas ldan pa gnyis med pa'o/ /kun tu rtog pa rnam gnyis po/ /goms pas mnyam
492b1(rgyud 'grel): du 'byung dang gsum/ /de yi rkyen gyis ltas snang bas/ /'od ma lta bur phyi mar snang/ /khams gsum 'di na gnas pa kun/ /dkar nag bcu yi dang po ste/ /tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsam gtan bzhis/ /bcu bdun gnas ris spyod
492b2(rgyud 'grel): yul snang/ /snyoms par 'jug pa'i mthu ldan na/ /rtse mo bzhi yi spyod yul snang/ /rgyud lnga lam du dug lnga ste/ /tan+t+ra'i sa ma ya las 'byung/ /phyi nang 'khor los gnas bskod ba'ang/ /khams gsum cha yis nges pa med/ /'phrul?
492b3(rgyud 'grel): rtog bsten pa'i spyod yul ni/ /so so'i phyi nang snod bcud dang/ /lus dang longs spyod tshe dang las/ /bde sdug par ma tha dad pa'o/ /sgyu mas bslus pa'i mi bzhin du/ /nor pa'i spyod yul rang bzhin snang/ /srid rtsa nyes pa bdag las
492b4(rgyud 'grel): phyir/ /sdug bsngal myong zhing lam dang bral/ /de lta bu yi rgyud gnyis las/ /nam mkha' i dbyings ni bsam yas par/ /nyi zla gza' skar glog 'gyu dang/ /'ja' tshon sprin mangs sna tshogs 'khrugs gyur kyang/ /nam mkha' i dbyings
492b5(rgyud 'grel): la 'gyur zhing nyams pa med/ /mi dmigs chos kyi dbyings ni bsam yas par/ /sku gsung yon tan 'phrin las rmad byung dang/ /'jig rten gtso mchog sna tshogs rnam mang yang/ /chos kyi dbyings la nyams shing 'gyur ba
492b6(rgyud 'grel): med/ /de dang bral ba'i spyan bzangs rnams/ /de dang de ni de nyid dang/ /gzhan du brjod du med zhes smra/ /gnyis su med pas kun tu 'brel/ /thugs kyi thegs pa las/ /'khrul pa'i le'u ste/ gnyis pa'o// //
492b7(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin las phye ba ni/ chos nyid bya byed rigs pa gnyis/ /mos snod bcud sbyar bsam yas pa'ang/ /gdul bya'i snad? ba zhes su brjod/ /de dang de rkyen de de yis/ /ji bzhin de bzhin mngon byed pa/ /rim pa bzhi dang
493a1(rgyud 'grel): lnga pa yis/ /rgyus stegs nyid du sbyor ba'i phyir/ /'di skad rgyud las gsungs pa ni/ /theg pa bzhi yi nges 'byung la/ /theg pa gcig gi 'bras bur gnas/ /gcig la gnyis la gnyis la drug /phyin
493a2(rgyud 'grel): ci log la mos bsogs la/ /rang bzhin grub mthar 'jug pa gnyis/ /tha ma log dang ma log pa/ /ma rtogs pa dang log par rtogs/ /phyogs rtogs yang dag nyid ma rtogs/ /'dul ba dgongs pa gsang ba dang/ /sku
493a3(rgyud 'grel): dang gsung dang thugs kyi rgyud/ /zhes gsungs thugs rje'i sar gyur pa/ /so so'i snang rkyen bsam yas na/ /mchog rkyen rgyud ni rnam gsum ste/ /gsang ba'i snying po rigs gnyis lta/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba rdo rjes sems/ /spyi gcod
493a4(rgyud 'grel): mngon bzhin bstan pa gsum/ /rkyen 'di yi ge las bskal snod/ /shes rab 'brel bzhi yod pa'i phyir/ /dbang po phye ba thugs thigs gsungs/ /dang por mtshon pa'i ming gsum ldan/ /nges pa lung ni rgyu 'dra'i phyir// //
493a5(rgyud 'grel): dngos po gnyis pa'i legs snang ba/ /bden pas 'brel pa gnyis su med/ /de nyid gnyis med 'jigs bral ba/ /gsal brtan las kyis lha yi ming// //de gnyis bstan pa'i dngos gzhi pas/ /spyi lung nges pa
493a6(rgyud 'grel): gnyis pa'i mtshan/ /brtags pa bstan pa'i don bcud de/ /bzhi yis kun la ni snar bas/ /kho na nyid gsum ldan bden pa'i/ /ming gis mtsho las lhag pa'i don/ /tshig rgyas kyis kyang mtshon mi nus/ /de bas gzhon nu'i

493b1(rgyud 'grel): rnams shes rab thabs/ /'bring la snang ba mched pa'i phyir/ /rgyas pa bye brag thigs par shar/ /rang bzhin las kyi snod gyur la/ /'grod thabs gnyis su yan lag rkyen/ /thog ma bar dang tha ma'i yul/ lnga dang gnyis dang gnyis bstan no/ /
493b2(rgyud 'grel): dang po'i yul la rgyu rkyen dang/ /bzhi bcu gtad pas rdzogs pa yin/ /thabs dang shes rab rgyu yang ni/ /snga ma'i stan pa gnas 'khor sdud/ /dus gsum drug nas rin chen sgron/ /gsang ba'i lag min gnas kyis phye/ /yi ge bzhi yis
493b3(rgyud 'grel): shes par 'gyur/ /gsang ba tshad ma gnyis dang 'brel/ /blo gros rgyu la thun mong mchog /bla ma rang sems ye shes che/ /gzhi dang las kyi gnas ston la/ /ye shes mang po shes pa'i bdag /bstan pa'i bcud thugs bsdus
493b4(rgyud 'grel): dngos po/ /bkra gsal lung la dus bzhi mnyam/ /de de yod de de rtog 'gyur/ /thun mong pa la mtshan nyid gzugs/ /ston pa rang 'byung rdo rje 'dzin/ /rgyal tshab rgyud ni skyes bu gnyis/ /rang bzhin dus gsum chos las
493b5(rgyud 'grel): med/ /longs spyod chen po kun tu zhal/ /mos pa mtshan grangs rdul snyed la/ /mnyam bzhag longs spyod chos ston pa/ /ming gzhi ldan pa'i skyil krung gnas/ /de yi rten pa rang bzhin bzhi/ /chos dbyings 'og min gsang ba na/ /lhan
493b6(rgyud 'grel): cig 'dus pa'i rin chen khang/ /ma spangs lhun gyis rdzogs pa'i phyir/ /dbyings tshad rtse mo sgo 'bur dang/ /'bur 'phang rtse mo rgyan gdan ni/ /bdag nyid dang ni bdag po dang/ /longs 'gul sgo dang phyi yi brgyan/ /snang ba dri za
493b7(rgyud 'grel): gnas bzhi bas/ /khyod khang spyod yul ba yi phyir/ /kun tu phyi rol de la med/ /chos kyi 'khor lo shes rab thabs/ /mchags res bkang 'bras bu'i gdan/ /ye shes du ma cig bral bas/ /sna tshogs snang la rang bzhin med/ /
494a1(rgyud 'grel): de nas de la de gus pa/ /rgyal tshab rgyud dang rgyal sras sems/ /'jigs byed thugs rjes sprul pa dang/ /dad pa 'brel pa brgyad sogs 'dod/ /de ni ston tshul 'bab pa dang/ /gyad thabs 'greng
494a2(rgyud 'grel): par bzhugs pa'o/ /tshad las 'das pa'i grangs 'dus pa/ /chos dbyings mu mdza' med par khyab/ /nor bu rin chen sku mnga' ba'i/ /gsang bdag de yi bdag po'i phyir/ /tan+t+ra thugs bsdus mos bzhin du/ /ku
494a3(rgyud 'grel): ma ra dang spyod tshor snang/ /de ni de yi thugs skyes phyir/ /de yi don ni des bsdus rigs/ /sku yis phye ba'i 'khor rnams la /so so bstan pa'i dus snang yang/ /lhan cig pa la dus cig snang/ /gang gis
494a4(rgyud 'grel): mthong rtogs tshogs tshe na'ang/ /dus bzhi mnyam las ma g.yos kyang/ /de'ang rang bzhin mnyam pa'i dus/ /rtag pa rgyun tu thugs rjes 'dzom/ /mthar phyin dag pa'i dus la 'byung/ /de tshe rang bzhin nges lung snang/ /
494a5(rgyud 'grel): gsung lnga tshul gyis cig las snang/ /mtshon byed bstan par de brjod de/ /de dag mtshon pas rang mtshan sgra'o/ /'gro ba gang gang gzugs snang yul/ /rigs mthun dga' byed mi mthun pa/ /sgyur med 'jigs gzugs
494a6(rgyud 'grel): snang pa ltar/ /rgyal ba'i gling bzhi'ang de bzhin no/ /de rjes rkyen gyi gleng bslang ba/ /ston pas snang dang 'khor gyis zhus/ /skabs las gleng bslang ston dang 'khor/ /gnad 'dri rkyen du gong gyur pas/ /de
494a7(rgyud 'grel): des gsungs la ma rag pa/ /nges pa'i tshig 'bru ngo bo ? de/ /skabs kyis dris pan smos ci dgos/ /dris lan brdo bas nges par grub/ /thabs sbyor shes rab gang tshe'ang/ /rkyen byed 'byung la ma reg pa/ /
494b1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor dang gzhan gyi don phyi ru/ /rgyu tshogs thugs rjes 'da' bar 'gyur/ /brjod bya rang bzhin gsang ba'i rgyud// //de ji bzhin du rjod byed dag /ston pa rgyud don lam dang tshig /'brel pa rim dang 'tshol
494b2(rgyud 'grel): 'khrugs pa/ /rgyu 'bras thabs dang thabs byung yin/ /gleng gzhi rjes su nges par 'gro /tan+t+ra le'u'i grangs bsdus pa/ /me long bcu yis mtshon sbyar ba/ /bcu yi 'dren par shes kyis bsdus/ /bye brag bdag dang gzhan

494b4(rgyud 'grel): 'phang gcod do/ /rus sbal 'gros kyi chos gnyis pas/ /'bru stong mi bzhag gzer bus gdab/ /dus kyi 'bru char chos gsum pos/ /bka' yi tshad gsum skabs sbyar snang/ /glag gi gzan gyi chos gnyis ltar na
494b5(rgyud 'grel): don gyis dmigs bzung gags gsal lo/ /sna phrug 'dzag pa'i chos gnyis ltar/ /ldem dgongs bsang ba brgyad kyis sbyor/ /dang po 'gros chos rnam gnyis ltar/ /gzhan don dbu zhabs le'u mtshams 'brel/ /
494b6(rgyud 'grel): me long chos ltar mtshon pa'i dpe/ /kun la des mtshon thog du dbab/ /ji 'jigs phrug gu rtsal sbyor ltar/ /'bru tshig don gyi go rim bsdebs/ /tshig don mos par bshad pa'i phyir/ /rnam par phye bas
494b7(rgyud 'grel): ma 'dres gsal/ /thabs dang don la rang bzhin la/ /tshig gi mtshon byas de snang byed// //ston pa gang gis gang zhig la/ /gtad pa gang ste gtad pa'i phyir/ /rgyal sras sdud mdzad ma 'ongs
495a1(rgyud 'grel): sogs/ /mi nub stan rtses phyir gtad pa/ /shes byed yul de bsgom bya med/ /de yi phyir na'ang shas dgongs mod/ /skabs su byung bas 'dir ma yin/ /bar du mos pas lam gzhol sdom/ /thun mong mchog ste tha ma gnyis/
495a2(rgyud 'grel): dngos spyod rjes su gzhol ba dang/ /pha rol phyin par shes rab gzhol/ /de de'ang cig rim sbyor ba/ /rjes su mthun par lung bzhin ston/ /snga yi sngon spyod rjes 'brang ba/ /lam snod skal bas phye ba la/ /mtshams bdag gis ni
495a3(rgyud 'grel): grol byed pa/ /gzhi dang rang bzhin stobs las 'byung/ /de las khams kyi spyod pa yis/ /phye bas dang po lhur gnas pa/ /rims dang rdzogs par smin tshul du/ /rim dang cig car snang ba ni/ /gzhir tsa gra a mi tsa/ /
495a4(rgyud 'grel): rang gnas grol ba gyen 'gro ba/ /de la brten pa'i rim pa yi/ /bye brag bskyed pa'i cha yin no/ /phyi ma dbang po gsang ba gnyis/ /nor bu skyes bur ldan gyur pa/ /bcu drug bzhi rdzogs phyag rgya bzhis/ /kha sbyor g.yo ba'i
495a5(rgyud 'grel): rten gnyis las/ /rten dang mthun pa'i bden mthong ba/ /mchod pa gsum dang bden mthong du/ /shes rab gsum gyis mi 'byang ba/ /rang dag sngon du rdzogs phyir thob/ /shes rab pha rol phyin sbyor ba'ang/ /gtso dang
495a6(rgyud 'grel): yan lag rnam bcu'o/ /kun gyis don du gnyer byed pa'ang/ /mchog tu bya ba sngo bzhin gnyis/ /cig ni blo mchog skal ldan rnams/ /nges par khong du chud gnas pa/ /gnyis su med par byang chub sems/ /sems
495a7(rgyud 'grel): bsgom rnam gsum dus gcig rdzogs/ /de las ldog pa brtel 'brel bzhin/ /lnga yi rim bstan don du gnyer/ /sngon du yan lag dang po sdom/ /dgos ched thabs dang ngo bo dang/ /skyon dang yon tan rim pas ni/ /
495b1(rgyud 'grel): dbang po mchog ni rdzogs par bshad/ /gzhan gyis lta mig gsal ba dang/ /mchog gis spyan rab mngon bya'i phyir/ /lta ngan go cha sdol byed pas/ /the tshom med pa'i mde thung ces/ /gling bzhi phal la re re bdun/ /lhun po gnas
495b2(rgyud 'grel): lta'i rim pa bzhin/ /rigs min rang bzhin bltos lta bas/ /phyogs bsgrung mi mthun 'gags pa dag/ /cha yod dug la mi reg bzhin/ /gang gis shes na mi gnas pa/ /bsam gyis mi khyab ma shes na/ /bsam med rnal
495b3(rgyud 'grel): 'byor gnyis don med/ /gang gis de ltar chub byas pa/ /stong rtog rnal 'byor rdzogs byang chub/ /gang gis thog mar rten pa'i thabs/ /ting 'dzin bye brag las spyod dang/ /yan lag mang po'ang rnam grangs kyi/ /
495b4(rgyud 'grel): gtan tshigs thun mong yin med pa/ /rgyud las grags pa rkyen byas te/ /ri rgyal lta bur mthong ba ce/ /rgyu rkyen gang gis nges bskyed pa'ang/ /the tshom yid gnyis som gnyis pa/ /med la brjod kyis des thogs med/ /
495b5(rgyud 'grel): dgag bsgrub med pa'i rgyu las byung// //dbang po drug gi char snang yang/ /spyan la mchog tu brjod pa ni/ /shes rab yul du dbyer med pas/ /mngon sum rtogs pa rtogs pa'i mchog /rang
495b6(rgyud 'grel): rig ye shes tshogs gcig po/ /shes rab spyan gyis dam pa bas/ /de la phyi nang med pa'i phyir/ /chos nyid rang gi mtshan nyid mthong/ /de lta'ang log rtog mi zad bas/ /'khor sgyur rgyal po'i stobs bzhin du/ /
495b7(rgyud 'grel): rang mtshan ar? yang de lta bas/ /'khor lo sgyur rig khyad par 'gyur/ /gsang ba'i rgyud la khyad par du/ /lta dang lta bya med pa'i phyir/ /ye shes sgron ma sbreng bar ni/ /phyogs bcu'i zhing khams thams cad mngon/ /
496a1(rgyud 'grel): de bas spyi la gang zhig zhen/ /gsang sngags yid yul gang gis snyed/ /rdo rje yid kyi sgra sgrol bas/ /'dus ma byas la dmigs pa dag /nges par 'di'o mnyam lta ba'i/ /rjes la rnal 'byor mi rtog
496a2(rgyud 'grel): ces/ /phyogs mthun rnal 'byor skyed 'dod pa/ /nges 'jog rtog pa'i gzung 'dzin can/ /kun tu rgyu dang gzhon nu ltar/ /go mchog thob pa'i khyad par ni/ /rigs brgyad mthong ba rtsa ba las/ /lta ba'i khyad par
496a3(rgyud 'grel): gsungs pa'ang yin/ /rnam grangs dam pa'i sgras gol ba/ /de yi sgra la ji bzhin rtog /de mi mthun pa ldog byed pa/ /dbul po lta ba kho na'o/ /bzhi ba 'di skad lung las 'byung/ /thabs la mkhas pa ma zin na/ /
496a4(rgyud 'grel): lam gyi dge spyad stegs bcas kyang/ /mtho ris lha dang mi ru skyes/ /skye shi med pa'i las mi thob/ /lnga pa'ang 'di skad bstan zhe na/ /dngos grub mchog gi snying po ni/ /dang po don rtogs mdza' mi stong/ /chu
496a5(rgyud 'grel): srin phyag rgya ji bzhin du/ /spyod yul kun tu dpag tshad med/ /de rjes gtso mchog goms byed pa/ /'byung rlung 'dus bral tshul bzhin pa'ang/ /rang la yan lag rdzogs pa yis/ /gang du 'du shes med gsal
496a6(rgyud 'grel): ba'ang/ /gang dag bcu dang ldan pa ni/ /snga ma las kyang gnas bsgyur ro/ /'pho ba med par bzhis snang bzhin// //de yi yan lag de bzhin bas/ /rgyu las thob par rang gnas pas/ /snang
496a7(rgyud 'grel): ba kun tu khyab par ni/ /phyi nang med par mthun rdzogs bya/ /de yi stobs las skyes ba ni/ /rten 'brel bzhi pa nas 'byung ba'ang/ /cig shos skye ba'ang ji bzhin pa/ /gnyis la gang mos gnyis tshul gyis/
496b1(rgyud 'grel): bzhi pa dgu dang ldan tshul gyis/ /rang gi cha rkyen tshang ba yis/ /de la zhen pa grol 'gyur zhing/ /bzhi lnga ldan na ldan tshul gyis/ /gang mi mthun pa'i rgyud 'phel bzhin/ /de yi gzhi las tshangs ya ma/ /gzugs can spyod
496b2(rgyud 'grel): par gnas pa ste/ /rgya mtsho gza' dang skar ma 'am/ /'brel bzhi rdo rje tshogs sam/ /bslab pa rang gi rkyen tshang bas/ /lung bcu ldan na des spro 'am/ /yang na de nas longs spyod sbyar/ /lnga pa rnal 'byor 'ba' zhig
496b3(rgyud 'grel): gis/ /'das tshul gnyis thob sa 'ang yod/ /de dang mi tshangs longs spyod lnga/ /rang gis bzhi bzhi thabs bzhi dang/ /ldan pas grangs tshangs rtags thung na/ /dkyil 'khor mthun 'byor thabs gnyis pos/ /yan
496b4(rgyud 'grel): lag tshad na zag pa med/ /de min lan grangs gzhan nyid do/ /rgya mtshor rin chen bzhi yi 'od/ /phog pas ji bzhin mthong 'gyur ba/ /'di ni thar lam mi sbyar nas/ /sangs rgyas sa la gdon mi za/ /yan lag
496b5(rgyud 'grel): gnyis pa 'dir shes ste/ /de dag las su rung byed pa/ /dgos ched rnam grangs dus dang ni/ /skyon dang yon tan sdom gyis rdzogs// //bdag dang gzhan gyi don gyi phyir/ /'bri sogs mi dgos
496b6(rgyud 'grel): goms par ces/ /gsang rgyud nyi las gsungs pa yi/ /glang po dam mdzes shas spyad dang/ /'dod yon nyon mongs nyi shu lnga/ /nag pos 'dul ba ji snyed pa/ /thun mong ming ste de ga dkar/ /khyad par lam dang mthun 
496b7(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /zhen pa'i lam la de nyid de/ /ji lar dug la dug nan bzhin/ /bdag dang gzhan dang gnyis ka la/ /che dang mkhas pa'i thabs kyis spyod/ /cig shos pa de dmangs rdo dang/ /bram ze rgyal po lnga rim bzhin/ /
497a1(rgyud 'grel): shes rab bslab bya mang po kun/ /brtson pa dor bya yod ma yin/ /de la de goms mtshon pa ltar/ /'jug pa gsum la yid tshangs thabs/ /cha mthun gdams ngag byid rgod dang/ /'bru sogs
497a2(rgyud 'grel): rims dang ldog la brten/ /gtsang ma rigs kyi mthun bzhin du/ /mthong goms bzhis mthus spyod yul spyod/ /lnga pa sri zhu rgyal chos ni/ /dang po bzhin du longs spyod lnga/ /shin tu spros spyod blang bar bya/ /
497a3(rgyud 'grel): lnga par lnga pa gtso bo yin/ /de nas bzhi ni zag bral nas/ /lcags zangs gser dngul go rim bzhin/ /bdag gzhan yul gyi khyad par 'gyur/ /snga ma rgyud ldan rtsol ba med/ /rang rang bslab pa gang yin
497a4(rgyud 'grel): pa/ /skabs su gces pa khyab par yin/ /lam dang sa yi rims sbyar nas/ /spyod par grags la mchod pa la/ /snga ma go mthar phyis 'jug che/ /des na rang rig spyod yul blang/ /khyad par dor ba
497a5(rgyud 'grel): mthar phyin med/ /glang po rang gar spyad pa ni/ /don du mi 'gyur gzhi dbang bas/ /so so'i rnam smin tshad las 'das/ /de la de yi de yod phyir/ /de des gnyis po mi ltung thob/ /so so'i ltung thob grags
497a6(rgyud 'grel): pa bzhin/ /bsag bya gnyis 'gyur bri bar 'gyur/ /bya ba'i sdom ni dgos ched dang/ /ngo bo rnam grangs nges tshig dang/ /bya thabs skabs dang khyad par dang/ /skyon yon dgu yis rdzogs pa yin/ /bdag
497a7(rgyud 'grel): dang gzhan dang gnyi ga dang/ /dam chos phyir na rnam lnga'o/ /shing la chu bzhin dang blang ba/ /rab 'bring tha ma nus tshad sbyar/ /gdul bya phyi nang zung bzhi bo/ /gdul bya'i mthu tshad rnam bzhi dang/ /cig gis
497b1(rgyud 'grel): kun 'dul mthu la sogs/ /lnga po gang yin ngo bo'o/ /zung du phyi nang bzhi phyir dang/ /'phel bya gnyis po 'phel phyir dang/ /dgug dbang bzhi bo sdud dbang bzhi/ /gdul bya rnam gnyis 'joms phyir dang/ /snga ma sngon du
497b2(rgyud 'grel): bstan zin phyir/ /nges tshig nges par 'grub pa yin/ /don gyi dmigs su gzung ba'i phyir/ /rang bzhin lam dang thugs rjes phye/ /bar ma thabs dang shes rab la/ /snga ma gnyis dang phyi ma la/ /shes rab ting
497b3(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin rnam gnyis dang/ /longs spyod lhag pa gzugs brnyan gnyis/ /de la phyi nang gsang bar bshad/ /ngo bo rjes su zhi ba gnyis/ /phyi la nad bgegs dgra zhi pa'o/ /nang la nyon mongs rtog zhi pa'o/ /rgyas par
497b4(rgyud 'grel): gnyis po gso dang 'brel/ /na shi lo thog rtsi zhu sogs/ /tshe dang rigs rgyud longs spyod dang/ /bsod nams bzhi po nang 'bras bu/ /dbang ni dgug dang sdud pa gnyis/ /phyi rol da ra'i rnam pa dgug /mi mthun
497b5(rgyud 'grel): rnam gnyis dbang po sgyur/ /rang sems 'bras lnga bsdu bar bya/ /mngon spyod bskrad dang mnan pa dang/ /smyo 'bog byang dang skam pa dang/ /rmongs dang gtan bor rgyud gzhan la'o/ /rang gi phyi nang dgra bgegs 'joms/ /
497b6(rgyud 'grel): thabs? ni thabs la gsang ba nang/ /khams bzhi khams gsum bas sbyar ba/ /shes rab phyi dang nang gnyis te/ /phyi rol tshad med gnyis las bzhi/ /lhag pa gzugs brnyan rnam gnyis dang/ /mchod rten sgo dang sbyin sreg
497b7(rgyud 'grel): ste/ /phyi ma la gnas bsgrub po dang/ /thab brgyad 'bru ba khung bcas dang/ /phyogs dang kha dog dus gnyis dang/ /phur pa lha dang sems dang yum/ /bsgrub po ling ga me mchod dang/ /dkyil 'khor yo byad tshang
498a1(rgyud 'grel): bar sbyar/ /bya thabs gtso bo sbyin sreg la/ /skabs su dgos pa'i ling ga gdab/ /bro stabs bcas pa'i cha rkyen no/ /de dag rtsa ba'i mchod mnyes so/ /gtan me mchod sbyin sreg ma rims/ /smon
498a2(rgyud 'grel): lam lhag ma'i las dag go /skabs ni dbang dang bsgrub pa dang/ /mchod bshags tshe dang dus bab tshe'o/ /khyad bar zag bcas bar chad med/ /mthar phyin lam gyis phye ba 'am/ /shes rab dbang po rnam gsum gyis/ /
498a3(rgyud 'grel): nus mthu byin rlabs yul ngo bo'o/ /thabs dang bzhi dang khyad bar ba/ /skas ka'i gdang bu'i ji lta ba'o/ /mi skongs mi 'phyang mi rdzogs dang/ /don gnyis mi 'grub de yi skyon/ /de las ldog pa'i tshul ldan pa/ /
498a4(rgyud 'grel): yon tan nyid du shes par bya/ /sa bzhi sdom ni ngo bo grangs/ /dgos ched dus dang che ba dang/ /yon tan rkang thabs skyon dag gi /nges par dmigs su shes par bya/ /gsang sgor zhugs pa thabs dngos kyis/ /sgo
498a5(rgyud 'grel): gsum rang gi srung bya las/ /rgyal po bka' rtags ji lta bar/ /mi 'dral sdom pa de ngo bo/ /thun mong gzhung gzhan 'gro don du/ /khyad par tsa ba yan lag de/ /mdo rgyas rab 'bring tha ma'i grangs/ /tan+t+rar
498a6(rgyud 'grel): gsungs pa bstan par bya/ /theg chen sa la khyad par ba/ /skabs kyi lam mchog mi mthun srung/ /skyon yon cha yis ched che ba/ /de dang de yi nges tshig 'grub/ /rang spyi'i gdul bya'i sbyang bsags pa'o/ /
498a7(rgyud 'grel): bsrung bya'i rim par yod pa'i phyir/ /sa lam gang thob de yi tshe/ /de la de dgos de bsrung pa/ /nyams su blang ba'i dus la bab/ /skabs dang 'byor na phan yon gnyis/ /bsrung bya mchog la bskur ba'i phyir// /
498b1(rgyud 'grel): smon ? med srung thub na/ /tshul khrims sdom pa thams cad rdzogs/ /bya byed med par nyams pa'ang med/ /ma nor gnas pa'i phan yon ni/ /rnam grangs rjes 'jug spyi rgyud grangs/ /gzungs dang thob pas dbye ba'ang/ /
498b2(rgyud 'grel): bdag dang gzhan dgos grangs rdzogs pa'o/ /de de zhig ral 'byung ba yi/ /dmigs shes gtso bo'i rtsa ba lnga/ /le lo med pas mos stsogs sbyor/ /de la nges par rdzogs gzung thob/ /phyal pa le lo log pa dang/
498b3(rgyud 'grel): zlas zhar nyon mongs dbang song dang/ /bdud kyis bslus dang rang bzhin ngan/ /brgyad rgyus dka' thub ral pa dang/ /dus 'di phyi mar grag zhan gyis/ /spyi dang sgo skyon gnod la gnod/ /bkod pa rgyu las bdun gsungs pa/ /
498b4(rgyud 'grel): sdom ni ngo bo khyad par grangs/ /dgos pa thabs dang dus nges tshig /yon tan skyon gyis gzhi ru bzhag /gnas skabs bdun du snying po len/ /bkod pa gang rdzogs de ngo bo/ /dang po rang bzhin nyid mthar phyin// //
498b5(rgyud 'grel): gdul byas zhi dang khro bo de/ /mos pa sku gsung thugs yon tan/ /'phrin las gtso bo phye bas lnga/ /rtsa ba de'ang skabs kyis grags/ /mchod pa dbang dang 'phrin las bsgrub/ /bzhi yang gtso bos grangs rjes mthun/ /
498b6(rgyud 'grel): kun las 'jug pa bcu bzhi dang/ /sum cu rtsa lngar gyur pa yin/ /de yi rjes su drug sbyor ba'o/ /bzhi po'i dus su bdag gzhan phyir// //drang dang rten dang 'brel pa dang/ /bsgom dang bsgrub rdzogs
498b7(rgyud 'grel): mchod bsgrub phyir/ /shin tu nan tan blang bar bya/ /sa yi sbyangs thabs go rim dang/ /de yi cho ga thabs dag ni/ /rang bzhin la sogs bdun dag la/ /gang la yod pa kun yod do/ /thabs dang shes rab las kyi bya/
499a1(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor mngon du 'grub par 'gyur/ /bdun gyi gtso snying gang gang la/ /de yi 'khor ldan nges pa'i tshig /lung las grags pas the tshom med/ /tha dad cig gis bcings dang bral/ /'phel 'grib phan yon
499a2(rgyud 'grel): thob 'grub bzhi/ /bye brag so so'i grangs bzhin no/ /de las bzlog pa'i skyon cha ni/ /grangs kyi rjes su nges par 'gro /mnyes par byed pa'i sdom tshig ni/ /dgos ched ngo bo grangs skabs dang/ /skyon dang yon tan la sogs
499a3(rgyud 'grel): pas/ /ji lta ba bzhin shes par bya// //bdag gzhan don rtogs mnyes skong ba/ /'di dang phyi mar thob pa dang/ /yon tan bka' las gsungs pa bzhin/ /che skyon mi 'byung bya phyir ro/ /bya byed bya ba byed 'dus
499a4(rgyud 'grel): pa/ /dgyes tshim 'gyur ba'i sdom pa nyid/ /'jig rten spyod yul mos bya'i phyir/ /phyag dang phyag rgya glu gar tshig /phyi nang gsang rdzas dgos spyod pa/ /srog dang ldan pas bden gsum tshul/ /mchod pa gsum las spros
499a5(rgyud 'grel): pa dag /dkyil 'khor gsum gyi gnas dag las/ /dbul phyir dgos ched rjes bzung bas/ /las spyod bsgrub dbang mchod tshe na/ /dus kyis rjes zhugs yon tan dag /spyi dang khyad par dus kyis na/ /'di dang phyi mar
499a6(rgyud 'grel): gang thob ba/ /bdag gzhan don gyis gnyis su 'gyur/ /de las bzlog dang mi bskong g.yel/ /nyams chad mthu byin bral bar 'gyur/ /thob par bya ba'i sdom tshig ni/ /dgos ched rgyu rkyen ngo bo grangs/ /thabs dang
499a7(rgyud 'grel): thob tshad dus snod dang/ /yon tan skyon dang dkyil 'khor sbyar/ /don 'gyur bzhi las khyad par du/ /bdag gzhan don nus tshogs las bsgrub/ /byang dang chub par 'gyur bas myur/ /de la de yod phyir nod bya/ /lung
499b1(rgyud 'grel): dang man ngag las 'byung ba/ /rgyu gnyis rkyen bzhi yan lag snyan/ /drug la gnas pa'i thob bya de/ /ngo bo nyid ces rnam par bshad/ /rtsa ba rnal ma lnga bco brgyad/ /sgyur ba lnga la sum cu drug /dkyil 'khor las kyi rjes zhugs pa/ /snod rim
499b2(rgyud 'grel): sbyor ba'i las rdzogs bya/ /sno la til mar ngar rim bzhin/ /nus mthu gzhan la nges par bzhag /lam gyi shes rab sngon 'gro ba/ /thabs la de nyid rim par bslab/ /gnyi ga'i sa yi dkyil 'khor gsum/ /dang po drod rnyed mi ldog
499b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i/ /rim pas las rig ye shes kyi/ /rim pas rol pa rgyud nyid las/ /dad brtson gsum dang btul zhugs gsum/ /gang la yod pa de yi snod/ /'di dang phyi ma'i phan yon grangs/ /rgyud las gsungs pa de bzhin te/ /
499b4(rgyud 'grel): de bzlog rang yan chos nyid dang/ /gsang ba ma nyams ltung 'jigs pa/ /so ma gtang ba'i rdzas spyad ltar/ /'gyur ba gsang pa'i rgyud kun ltos/ /don du gnyer bya thob bya yis// //phye ba gnyis sogs
499b5(rgyud 'grel): sdom pa'i tshig /dgos ched ngo bo grangs thabs dang/ /dus dang skyon yon grangs thabs dang/ /thun mong mchog gi dngos grub rnams/ /bdag gzhan thob nas don bzhi phyir/ /gang gis gang thob 'dod pa de/ /yan lag
499b6(rgyud 'grel): bcu ldan gnyer rdo ba'o/ /mngon shes tsho dang rdzu 'phrul las/ /sku gsung thugs kyi thun mong dag /bsgrub thabs mi mthun grags pa dag /zag med 'bras bu mchog lnga po// //bsgrub pa'i gnas su
499b7(rgyud 'grel): grags pa dag /sngags dang phyag rgya bstan pa dang/ /phun sum tshogs pa bzhi ldan nas/ /brtags shing byin gyis brlabs pa der/ /tshogs skyes bsnyen bsgrub drangs dus mtshan/ /so sor phye bas rgyud gsungs bzhin/ /
500a1(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor stobs goms 'byor pa dang/ /sngags dang phyag rgya stan ba dang/ /mi lcogs med ba gang yod pa/ /cha rkyen tshang pa dbang bsgyur mngon/ /yal bas mi 'byung mi thob bcu/ /bye brag rgya las gong du chud/ /de las bzlog
500a2(rgyud 'grel): pa de phyi mar/ /lnga lnga thob pas mngon nyid rdzogs/ /sngags dang phyag rgya'i dam tshig ni/ /dgos ched ngo bo grangs thabs dang/ /nges tshig gang du dgos pa dag /yon tan skyon dang spyod yul bshad/ /sbyang zhing nye bar bshad pa dang/ /thob
500a3(rgyud 'grel): ba lnga po rdzogs bya'i phyir/ /gnyi ga'i ched du shin tu ces/ /yi ge 'dus ba grub pa bzhis/ /mthu can red pa gang yin pa/ /bzhi rdzogs nyid las mi 'da' ba/ /gang la snang ba de ngo bo/ /drag sngags gzungs zhes bya ba dang/ /rtsa
500a4(rgyud 'grel): bskyed las bsnyen las rim dang/ /mchod ba sngags dang brgya bzhi la/ /chen po'i rang bzhin ting 'dzin dang/ /mtshon pa mtshan ma'i phyag rgya dang/ /yum dang 'dzin bsam bca' ba'i dam/ /bsam dang bca' dang rang bzhin
500a5(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /'phro 'du las kyi phyag rgya dang/ /bde bar rang bzhin bzlas bsam dag /las gyi phye ba grangs mang po/ /skyon bcu le lo dor ba dang/ /skyon brgyad pa'i brtson bas sbyar/ /mthu byin ldan zhing don mi 'da' / /de
500a6(rgyud 'grel): phyir ming gi sgra 'jug pa'o/ /dkyil 'khor dgos pa'i dug lnga dang/ /bsnyen bsgrub rnam bzhi tshe na'o/ /sngags dang phyag rgya rab bstan na/ /dngos grub ya mtshan cher 'gyur bas/ /yid la bsams pa thams cad 'grub/
500a7(rgyud 'grel): ral gri so la bzung nyes ltar/ /nan tan med pa gsang sngags pa/ /bung zhing 'bras rnams med par 'gyur/ /gsang ba gsum la mos rims dang/ /gang la spyod pa de yul lo/ /mdza' mar rig pa'i drod tshad pa/ /nye
500b1(rgyud 'grel): bar sbyor ba pa de ni/ /gang gis bsgrub dang ting 'dzin sbyor/ /zag lam sbyor ba tshogs gnyis grangs/ /thabs dang shes rab ting 'dzin grangs tshad gnyis las grags pa dang/ /legs sbyangs thob nas zag pa med/ /thigs pa tha ma snga ma'i rgyas/ /
500b2(rgyud 'grel): thog ma'i sdom tshig mthar phyin pa/ /bde gshegs rgyal ba nyid yin no/ /de phyir bcu yis 'bru sbyar ste/ /rus sbal bsnur shugs blang bar bya/ /de yul byas snyed don la 'dud/ /thugs kyi thigs pa las/ /gdul bya dag pa'i
500b3(rgyud 'grel): snang ba'i le'u ste/ gsum pa'o// //rdo rje yan lag bzhi po sdom/ /mtshan nyid tha ma lung bstan pa/ /rigs pa 'dzin dang rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /snga ma thob tshul rnam grangs dang/ /nges tshig gnas su rnam
500b4(rgyud 'grel): par bshad/ /lhag ma yod med 'da' tshul gyis/ /'di dang bar mar rnam par sbyor/ /rnam par smin pa bya btsan tshul/ /dbang bsgyur phung po 'jig pa med/ /phyag rgya chen por bdag lus snang/ /nyi shu rtsa lngar rang snang ba/ /
500b5(rgyud 'grel): de la de yi rtsol ba can/ /me chu rlung gi rigs gnas bzhin/ /gangs rigs zin pa mi gtong ba/ /dang po byung dang bya ba byed pa dang/ /tha mar rgyud 'dzin gsum gyis 'grub/ /de yi bzhugs gnas des med de/ /sems
500b6(rgyud 'grel): nyid gnas snang gang yang rung/ /bya ba bya ba'i grub pa dang/ /'thob tshul ngo bo 'bras bu grangs/ /spyod yul gzigs dang thugs rje sprul/ /mdzad ba ye shes bzhugs tshul sdom/ /bdag gi dbang du 'di skad du/ /dpag bsam
500b7(rgyud 'grel): shing dang rin po che/ /de dag rdzas yod ma yin te/ /rang sems bsod nams btan pa yin/ /ngo mtshar cho 'phrul smad kyi chos/ /gzhan nas yod 'ongs ma yin te/ /thabs rtsal bstan pa'i shes rab nyid/ /de lta bu'i ngang du
501a1(rgyud 'grel): 'byung/ /gzhan gyi don du 'di skad du/ /bya ba ma lus kun byas nas/ /mthar ni skye med rdo rje'i sku/ /gsungs pa'i srid pa tha ma la/ /rdo rje 'dzin sku'i rdor gsum las/ /sprul pa drug gi dbang
501a2(rgyud 'grel): po yis/ /mdzad pa rdzogs nas sangs rgyas tshul/ /gsang ba'i skabs la'ang shes par bya/ /gnyis med sems su mngon byas la/ /bden gnyis dbyer med rdo rje'i sku/ /chu yi zla ba lta bu la/ /rang bzhin kun
501a3(rgyud 'grel): dang tha mi dad/ /sku gsung thugs yon 'phrin las las/ /brgyan gyi 'khor lo rang bzhin gnas/ /thams cad mkhyen yul 'di skad du/ /log par rtog brtags rnam dag cing/ /ye shes dbyings las mi zhan
501a4(rgyud 'grel): phyir/ /thugs rje chen pos 'brel pas na/ /'gro drug dus gnas ma lus snang/ /yang na rnam rtog mi mnga' ste/ /sna tshogs kha dog dbyibs su snang/ /bde gshegs rang bzhin thams cad phyir/ /surya
501a5(rgyud 'grel): rtsa tra'i? gzugs brnyan bzhin/ /snang yang 'gro 'ong ga la yod/ /de yod na ni gzugs brnyan can/ /sgyu ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgral ba yis/ /bya byed med pa'i dkyil 'khor sbyong/ /dus gsum rig pa'i rdzogs
501a6(rgyud 'grel): sangs pa'i/ /log rtog tha dad dag pa yang/ /ye nas mdza' yas grol ba'i phyir/ /gcig dang mi cig brjod bsam 'das/ /gzung 'dzin bral ba'i ye shes ni/ /bde bar gshegs pa kun gyi gnas/ /rgyud
501a7(rgyud 'grel): las gsungs dang 'gro blo yi/ /rgya mtsho'i chu dang rlabs bzhin no// //mkha' la 'ja' bzhin rgyud don bkra gsal 'dis/ /mi shes nga rgyal snyol zhing nyon mongs dgra rgyal ba/ /dpa' bor
501b1(rgyud 'grel): mtshon ni rnam lcags shag ti 'dra/ /rgyud kyi don bcud 'khor lo ngang ltar ngang blangs pas/ /mi shes dra bar chud rnams gsang ba'i snying por shog /thugs kyi thigs pa las/ /bde gshegs kyi snang ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// //
501b2(rgyud 'grel): rgyu 'phrul spyi gcod rdzogs so// //sangs rgyas gsang bas mdzad pa'o// //bi ma la mi tras mdzad pa'o/ /dgeg pa rdo rjes mdzad pa'o/ /rma rin chen mchog gis bsgyur ba'o// //
501b3(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje sems dpal phyag btsal nas/ /rang gi las dang bla ma yi/ /man ngag thob dang rtogs pa'i/ /nus pa'i shes stabs ci yod pa/ /nang gi ling rtog shes rab mig/ /mdongs pa'i 'gro rnams sgrol bya'i phyir/ /sgyu 'phrul
501b4(rgyud 'grel): khog gzhung dbye brtsam/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyud dag gi /tshig don dgongs shugs bstan pa yang/ /yi ge gab pas mi mngon pa/ /bzhi po dngos po lus nyid dang/ /don du gnyer ba'i lam nyid dang/ /mngon 'gyur
501b5(rgyud 'grel): 'bras bu lus bzhag pa'o// //bstan chos thog ma'i mtshan nyid ni/ /'bru lngar 'dus pa'i thabs chen po/ /'gro ba kun la gnas pa'i phyir/ /rang bzhin rgyud kyi ngo bo las/ /'gro ba rnams kyang
501b6(rgyud 'grel): rgyud nyid de/ /gzhi phyir rgyu ru bstan pa yin/ /de yang ngo bo nges tshig dang/ /rnam par dbye ba gsum du 'gyur/ /thams cad rang rig byang chub sems/ /gsung lnga la sogs lhun grub pa/ /mdza' rnams kun las
501b7(rgyud 'grel): yongs grol de/ /ngo bo bzung du med pa ni/ /nam mkha' i chu skyes ji bzhin de/ /lung gi chad mar gyur pa ni/ /rgyu bzhi zhes su bstan pa'o// //thams cad rdzogs pa'i nges lung ni/ /rgyur gsum
502a1(rgyud 'grel): tshad dang nges 'brel pas/ /rang bzhin rgyud kyi ming du grags/ /mtshon byed rgyud kyang de bzhin no// //rigs dang rigs su nges pa'i sa/ /dbye ba rnam pa gnyis su gsungs/ /sems
502a2(rgyud 'grel): can skad cig shes pa nyid/ /bde gshegs 'bras bu snying po'i rgyud/ /ye nas yin phyir rigs rgyud de/ /chos nyid rang bzhin dkyil 'khor ni/ /'gro rnams kun la khyab phyir ro/ /g.yo ldang smon 'jug gnas mthar phyin/ /
502a3(rgyud 'grel): des skyes phyir mi ldog pa'i phyir/ /rigs su nges zhes grags pa yang/ /ngo bo'i tshul nas rang bzhin rgyud// //de yi ngang las rgyu rkyen bdun/ /'dzom pas 'khor bar snang ba yang/ /byed po nyes pa'i tshul
502a4(rgyud 'grel): dang yang/ /ngo bo snod bcud 'khor ba'i dus/ /ye nas chos kun sangs rgyas ste// //rgyu bzhi rang 'byung ye shes pas// //rgyu'i ngo bo gdod nas dag /ma rig pa nyid ye shes phyir/ /
502a5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor sgyu ma bcos rang bzhin mnyam/ /'phral du chags sdang ye shes lngar/ /ye nas ma bcos gsal ba ste/ /nyon mongs drang phyir sku gsung thugs/ /yin phyir rkyen yang sangs rgyas so/ /rgyu rkyen 'bras bu'i rang bzhin pas/ /
502a6(rgyud 'grel): ma byas 'bras bu sangs rgyas te/ /rdo rje bud sogs sangs rgyas pa'o/ /nyi ma'i snying pos mun pa bzhin/ /rang bzhin ngang la 'khor ba med/ /lus bzhag par ma lam rkyen de// //lam gyi ngo bo snang
502a7(rgyud 'grel): lugs dang/ /dgos? pa des tshig che ba dang/ /gzhung gi rnam drug bstan pa'o/ /mngon byed rkyen ye rnam pa gsum/ /ngo bo sems lnga skyes pa ste/ /mngon sum snang tshul dang ba'i chur/ /nyi zla 'char bzhin skad
502b1(rgyud 'grel): cig gis/ /byin rlabs rig pa snang ba dang/ /skal med rgyud nas thub pas ston/ /ye nas lhun grub sangs rgyas chos/ /gdul bya gnyis la rgyud pa dang/ /mngon sum sgo nas bstan pa'i phyir/ /byin gyis brlabs dang tshig gis
502b2(rgyud 'grel): bstan/ /rgyud gsum tshad dang tshig 'brel pas/ /mtshon byed yi ge'i rgyud ces bya/ /thun mong ma yin des rgyud phyir/ /gzhan las gsang ba'i che ba brgyad/ /rgya mtshor chu klung kun 'bab bzhin/ /theg pa kun 'dus
502b3(rgyud 'grel): yang rtser bstan/ /gsang ba'i snying po nges pa 'di/ /gsang ba kun gyi bdag nyid phyir/ /rgyud rnams kun gyi rgyal po'o/ /sde snod kun dang rgyud kun gyi/ /'byung gnas bstan la nges 'bebs phyir/ /bstan pa 'byung
502b4(rgyud 'grel): gnas lung gis 'grel/ /rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus la/ /'di las gsang ba'i nges don med/ /dgongs pa'i zhe pugs gnag pa'o// //sa rnams khyad par bkod pa yang/ /gsang ba'i
502b5(rgyud 'grel): snying por 'gro bas na/ /'bras bu rnams kyi thug sa'o/ /bde gshegs dkyil 'khor ma lus pa /brnyes nas sku lnga rdzogs pas na/ /lnga par 'das pa gshegs pa'i tshul/ /'byung dang ma 'ongs thams cad kun/
502b6(rgyud 'grel): 'di yis lhun gyis grub byed phyir/ /ma 'ongs rnal 'byor rnams kyi lam/ /de phyir 'bras bu nges 'byung 'di/ /thams cad rgyud las shin tu 'phags/ /gzhung gi dbye ba rnam pa gsum/ /rab la mtshan dang 'bring la
502b7(rgyud 'grel): dbye// //tha ma 'bru gnyer dgrol ba'o/ /rab mtshan tha snyad gsum du grags/ /rgyu 'phrul snying po lung spyi yi/ /lag gi rtsa bzhin dbul zhabs rtogs/ /bskal ba can gyi ched phyir ro/ /grangs
503a1(rgyud 'grel): ka 'bring gi don bstan pa/ /gleng gzhi bsleng ngang rgyud don dang/ /dgos 'brel bstan pa dpe rnams dang/ /skabs kyi dgos pa rdzogs par 'gyur// //gleng gzhi byed pa'i ngo bo dang//
503a2(rgyud 'grel): dgos pa byed pa'i don nyid ni/ /thun mong gleng gzhi rnam gnyis dang/ /thun mong men pa gsum du shes/ /grags pa thun mong ngo bo ni/ /thub drug ston pa stong gsum pa/ /khyad par shAkya thub pa nyid/ /rgyal srid btsun mo
503a3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor spangs nas/ /rab tu byung sogs mdzad pa yi/ /rgyu yi 'khor lo bstan pa sgrogs/ /'gro drug 'khor dang rnam bzhi sogs/ /shin tu bkod pa'i dus su gsungs/ /khyad par thun mong 'di nyid du/ /ston gnas dus
503a4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor sdud bstan sogs/ /mtshan nyid gnyis kyis dgrol 'gyur yang/ /'dul yang so sor snang 'dra'o/ /thun mong ma yin ston pa nyid/ /yab yum chags skul rol pa dang/ /gsang ba phun sum tshogs drug gis/
503a5(rgyud 'grel): yig bzhi'i sgo nas byin rlabs kyi/ /dbang skur ma brjod rgyud bshad pa/ /kun yum med pas gsal ba dang/ /ngo bo yang ni 'di lta ste/ /ston pa gnas dang sdud pa 'khor/ /dus dang ston pa rnam drug ste/ /ston pa'i
503a6(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin brgyad dang ldan/ /bdag nyid byed pa kun tu bzang/ /'chad pa'i skyes bu rigs lnga ste/ /mtshungs pa bzhi dang ldan pa'i phyir/ /lngas kyang bstan pa gsung mi 'gal/ /gnas kyi rang bzhin de bzhin nyid/ /
503a7(rgyud 'grel): ngo bor ni chen gzhal yas khang/ /ye shes rgyu dang gru bzhi dbyibs/ /rtse mo tshad med mtshan nyid sems/ /phyi dang nang med rgya ma chad/ /yon tan rdzogs rgyan rnam thar sgo/ /sna tshogs yon tan rgyan du go /rgyu
503b1(rgyud 'grel): 'bras brgyad nyid rta babs skad// //gsang bdag phyag na rdo rje yis/ /thun mong ma yin nges pa'i rgyud/ /dris lan mi mngon don gyis bsdus/ /byin brlabs mi yul grags pa yis/ /'khor gyi
503b2(rgyud 'grel): tshad dang mang dang khyab/ /brjod med nam mkha' i mdza' klas gang/ /ngo bo mi zhan rigs lnga dang/ /rig pa ye shes byang chub sems/ /dad pa nyan pa'i lha chen rnams/ /'gro ba 'dul ba sprul sogs so/ /dus kyi ngo bo  
503b3(rgyud 'grel): mnyam nyid do/ /skal pa can la kon pa dus/ /mtshon bya rang bzhin bzhi'i rgyud/ /sgro skur bral bar bstan pa ni/ /mtshon byed sgyu 'phrul dra ba ste/ /mdzub mo'i ri bong can bzhin no/ /dgos pa gleng gzhi rnam pa gnyis
503b4(rgyud 'grel): lhan cig 'khor la go phye ba/ /thun mongs ma yin khyad par gyis/ /thun mongs rnam gnyis bcas pa yin/ /'gro ba chags can spong med la/ /longs spyod rdzogs sku btsun mo dang/ /gnyis med rol sogs bstan pa dang/ /mthun bas mthun pa dgrol phyir ro//
503b5(rgyud 'grel): skye bo chags can spong 'dul la/ /byin rlabs shar ba'i thub pa nyid/ /mi yi skyes ba bzhes snang nas/ /bcu gnyis la sogs rdzogs mdzad de/ /rnam dag mchod rten rdo rje'i gdan/ /rang 'byung mngon par rdzogs
503b6(rgyud 'grel): tshul snang// //de bzhin gling bslad rnam pa gnyis/ /thun mong ma yin rnam pa gnyis/ /yab yum chags sku rol pa dang/ /dgyes ltar 'khor la dbang skur dang/ /rgyud don 'byung phyir
503b7(rgyud 'grel): bslad zhes bya/ /de yang skye bo chags can don/ /thun mong gleng bslad ston 'khor dang/ /thams cad snang nas dbang thob 'khor/ /nyid kyis rtogs nas 'gro don du/ /bka' stsal don gyis zhus dang lan/ /snang
504a1(rgyud 'grel): par don gyi tshig tu 'byung/ /sku gsung thugs kyi spro ba mdzad/ /de ni skye bo phal ba'i don/ /ngo bo don blang tshig phyung ba'o/ /rgyud don lam dang yan lag ste/ /de yi gdul bya bsam pa gnyis/ /
504a2(rgyud 'grel): dbang gi lam yang gnyis su brjod// //thun mong ma yin rnam lgnyis  te/ /thun mong lam stegs nyid tsam du/ /pha rol phyin bcu rgyu 'bras sbyong/ /ma yin pa yang bsam dbang gis/ /grol
504a3(rgyud 'grel): lam thabs su bstan pa yin/ /grol lam mthong dang sgom gnyis te/ /dag mnyam gsum bzhi bzhi dang lnga/ /bden pa gsum dang rtogs pa bzhi/ /ldan pas rang rig mngon sum du/ /nges par chod pas mthong ba'i
504a4(rgyud 'grel): lam/ /mtshan nyid dang por bshad pa yin/ /bsgom pa skye dang de bzhin nyid/ /skyed dbang srid pa'i chos lugs su/ /ye nas gnas mthun de zlog phyir/ /dang po ma skyes snying rje dang/ /phra rags mang por snang ba
504a5(rgyud 'grel): ste/ /dngos grub myur du grub 'dod pas/ /shin tu mi dmigs dbyings su bsgom/ /ting 'dzin de ni goms pa dang/ /thams cad sgyu ma mig yor dang/ /sprul pa'i tshul du shes par bya/ /ji bzhin yang dang
504a6(rgyud 'grel): yang goms nas/ /phyi nang snod bcud hUM du bsdu/ /gang bsgrub yi ge so so ste/ /phyir ni gang sgom kun tu 'dra/ /rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du bsdu/ /yang na zhal gcig phyag gnyis sam/ /zhal gsum phyag drug
504a7(rgyud 'grel): rtag tu bsgom/ /de yang phra dang ring ba dang/ /goms par re mos 'dris par bya/ /de bzhin goms nas rigs lngar bsgom/ /bzhi bcu gnyis dang stong tshogs slob/ /de goms tshe yi rigs 'dzin du/ /sbyar nas
504b1(rgyud 'grel): mngon bar sangs rgyas tshul/ /de yang lnga goms gsal phyir dang/ /ral gyis rim pa nges par bzhag /de kho nyid de cig car ba/ /bsgom pa'i rim pa bslab bya bral/ /ma bcos ji bzhin mnyam gzhag na/ /lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor
504b2(rgyud 'grel): 'byung/ /mi gnas gnas la gnas par bsgom// //thabs las rgyud dang rim par ni/ /man ngag ting 'dzin stobs 'gyur zhing/ /rlung 'gag las la goms par bya/ /shin tu bde ba 'byung ba'i
504b3(rgyud 'grel): rgyu/ /gsang dbang pad+mar ldan 'gyur na/ /chags pa med pa'i tshul gyis su/ /bcu dang gsum gyi rgyu 'bras rnams/ /rdzogs phyir rims dang zlog shes na/ /byin brlabs shugs kyi rang snang 'thob/ /dbang po yul sa
504b4(rgyud 'grel): ldan gyur nas/ /gsang ba mchog gi 'phrul chen po/ /dkyil 'khor rdul snyed grangs med dang/ /phun sum tshogs pa'i lhun grub rnams/ /gsang dbang mchog gis 'byin par byed/ /thabs kyi lam la 'bad par bya/ /
504b5(rgyud 'grel): 'jug dang thob phyir lam rjod de/ /skye bo nyid sgrol phyir bzhag ste/ /las su rung nas lam mthar phyin/ /lam gyi yan lag rkyen bshad pa/ /rjes mthun spyod pa lta ba dbang/ /bsgrub dang mchod pa 'phrin las ngang/ /
504b6(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor la sogs brgyad kyi rdzogs/ /skabs kyi gtso dang grogs pos bsdu/ /de yang bdag gzhan don du'o/ /rjes su mthun pa'i spyod pa yang/ /skabs kyis ting 'dzin stobs chen bshad/ /bya ba byed la bye med
504b7(rgyud 'grel): la/ /dang po dpyod par bshad pa yin/ /snying rjes chud ma zos par 'dzin/ /thabs kyi pha rol phyin spyod pa/ /gnyis pa lam dang mthun pa yin/ /chos spyod bcu yi cig cha la/ /gnas pa gsum pa brjod pa 
505a1(rgyud 'grel): yin/ /gnas dang longs spyod ci bde la/ /ma nyams blo dang ldan pa la/ /ting 'dzin langs te spyod pa ni/ /grangs kyi bzhi pa spros bcas pa'o/ /kun kyang dus ni nam langs tshe/ /sgo gsum phyir na nges tshig 'grub/ /bshad
505a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i gtan tshig ldan pa yis/ /lta dang lta bar bya med pa lhun grub shes rab sgron ma nyid/ /rang bzhin gsal ba spyan gyi mchog /ngo bo yang de ltar nyid du shes/ /yul med gsal phyir lta zhes spyad/ /rim par bgrod phyir dbang bshad pa/ /
505a3(rgyud 'grel): ngo bo nus phan gsal dbang shes shin tu bstan pa'i ngo bo lnga'o/ /dgos pa'i skabs kyis skabs phyed dang/ /bshad pa bzhin du shes par gyis/ /ngo bo bzhin du grangs 'jug pa/ /dbang lnga rdzogs bus bco brgyad rgyas/ /dus ni rnam pa
505a4(rgyud 'grel): gsum du ste/ /phyi nang dkyil 'khor rnam gsum du/ /rim par bskur ba dang po ru/ /ri mo bzhengs gsol phan nus bskur/ /skyed pa'i rim pa slob pa'i dus/ /rdzogs rim gdam ngag sbyor dus su/ /gsang dbang bskur ba song
505a5(rgyud 'grel): bzhi pa'o/ /dkyil 'khor bstan pa shes bstan phyir/ /ngo bo'i dus kyang lngar 'gyur ste/ /rno la ngar btags nus pa bzhin/ /nus pa skyes dang thob pa'i tshar/ //rgyu rkyen rgyu dang bdag po dang/ /yul dang
505a6(rgyud 'grel): de ma thog pa dang/ /ngo bo kun la skabs su sbyar/ /dad dang brtson 'grus gsum ldan dang/ /brtul zhugs sum ldan slob ma la/ /rgyu cig la 'am tha dad la/ /gang ldan chung ma zos pa sbyin/ /bskur bas rkyen gnas las
505a7(rgyud 'grel): nyon mongs/ /shes sgrib cha phra rnam dag pa/ /yon tan snang phyir ming du brjod/ /slob dpon mnyes par ma byas shing/ /dbang rnams thob par ma byas na/ /las rtsom 'bras med ltung bas rtsom/ /gang yang phan
505b1(rgyud 'grel): bsang dbang skur pa'i/ /dus 'di phyin chad rgyal ba'i sras/ /phyir mi ldog phyir yon tan no/ /lha mi yon tan yan chad nas/ /rdo rje 'dzin sogs skyabs kyi thob/ /bsgrub pa 'jig rten pa dang 'das/ /'jig rten pa yang 'di lta ste/ /ro langs
505b2(rgyud 'grel): tshe pra bsgrub pa dang/ /lha chen po dang rgyal po bzhi/ /gdug pa klu 'dul rgyal blon bzhin/ /chung ma dbang du bya ba gnyis/ /ro langs rkang mgyogs dam tshig bsgrub/ /mi snang gzugs bsgrub lha klu mo/ /rgyal blon dmag dpon zhing blon bsgrub
505b3(rgyud 'grel): tshe 'di'i ched phyir 'jig rten pa'o/ /yi ge sgyu 'phrul tshogs bsgrub pa'o/ /rdo rje sems dang sman bsgrub dang/ /rigs lnga bsgrub dang yul lnga sems/ /byin dbang bsgrub pa rnam gnyis sogs/ /phyag rgya rdzas dang thabs spyod la/ /rten pa'i
505b4(rgyud 'grel): bsgrub pa gsum du bsdu/ /don du gnyer phyir bsgrub mtshan nges/ /tshogs gnyis rdzogs phyir mchod pa ni/ /ting 'dzin sbyor sgrol dam rdzas dang/ /'dod yon blo dang sems kyi sprin/ /rol mo la sogs dbang bskur dbul/ /gnas su
505b5(rgyud 'grel): stabs phyir mchod pa ste/ /thun mong khyad par yon tan ldan/ /bdag gzhan don grub 'phrin las ni/ /mchod rten phyag rgya'i sgo dang ni/ /hoM bro klu dang rdzas kyis bya/ /na so gzhon dang rigs 'phel dang/ /skye rgyu med dang zla bral dang/ /
505b6(rgyud 'grel): las bzhi dus su sbyar bar shis/ /las kyi nus pa mthu cher ldan phyir/ /sngon nas btsal par rab tu gces/ /zhi la dang la rgyas la dga' / /dbang la chags dang drag khro sems/ /'di yang las kyi stobs cher 'gyur/ /rgyal
505b7(rgyud 'grel): ba cing bsgoms kun la sgrub/ /byed kyang skabs kyis lha yang bzhi/ /bsgrub gzhi'i gzung phyir dam tshig ni/ /ngo bo mdo rgyas gsum du shes/ /mnyam pa'i dam tshig gsum du mdor bstan pa/ /'bring du rtsa ba bco lnga ste//
506a1(rgyud 'grel): rgyas par sum rgya drug cu'o/ /yang na rtsa ba'i rtsa ba dang/ /rtsa ba'i yan lag yan lag rtsa/ /yan lag yan lag bzhi rub bsdu/ /byed pa'i ngo bo ji bzhin no/ /dgos pa spyi dang khyad par gnyis/ /rtog pa 'dul dang
506a2(rgyud 'grel): las don grub/ /'dul dang sdom dang dam tshig sogs/ /'dus par gsungs pa che ba'i mchog /dab yang skabs kyi rnam pa mang/ /sa bzhi so mtshams mkhar sogs pa'o/ /nyams skyon spyi dang khyad par gyi/ /gnyis 'gyur
506a3(rgyud 'grel): rgyud nas gsal bar ston/ /gso thabs rtsa ba yan lag gi /skabs dang sbyar te gzhung bzhin bsab/ /yon tan mdor bsdus spyi ru bstan/ /khyad par rang rang skabs su shes/ /rang bzhin ye nas sangs rgyas pa'o/ /des
506a4(rgyud 'grel): tshig skyon yon skabs kyis 'gyur/ /dkyil 'khor skabs kyis bdun gsungs te/ /thog mar rang bzhin dkyil 'khor ni/ /rang bzhin nyid dang lhun grub ni/ /'bras bu skabs kyi gsum du 'gyur/ /chos nyid rang
506a5(rgyud 'grel): bzhin sgos bral te/ /rang bzhin nyid kyi dkyil 'khor ro/ /dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu rtsa lnga nyid/ /khams dang skye mched la gnas pa'i/ /lhun gyis grub par rgyas pas gsungs/ /'bras bu mthar phyin 'og min na/ /
506a6(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs pa dkyil dang 'khor gyi tshul/ /de yang zhi khro rnam gnyis te/ /nges par sku gsung thugs su 'gyur/ /ngo bo du ma shes bral ba'i/ /nges tshig skabs kyis gnyis su 'gyur/ /mos blos len pa'i ting
506a7(rgyud 'grel): nge 'dzin/ /dkyil 'khor lhag pas gnyis su gsungs/ /rang bzhin de nyid 'dris pa'i phyir/ /de bzhin ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor gyis/ /phyi nang snod bcud ma lus kun/ /nyid kyi dbyings la thim bya ba/ /
506b1(rgyud 'grel): chos sku phyag rgya sgom pa nyid/ /rang rig mdza' dbus med pa'i dkyil/ /ye shes bzhi 'phro 'khor gyi tshul/ /'bras bu mthar phyin bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /lhag pa'i ting 'dzin rnam pa gnyis/ /gdul bya'i don phyir zhi khro dang//
506b2(rgyud 'grel): las dang bsod nams bsgrub pa lnga/ /de yang sku gsung thugs gsum ste/ /zhi ba sku dang gsung dang thugs/ /sku yi cha lugs bzhugs tshul dang/ /sku mdog brgyan sogs shes par bya/ /thugs kyang phyag rgya btsa' ba dang/ /
506b3(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin ngang bsam pa las sogs pa'o/ /gsung gi rtsa ba bskyed pa dang/ /bzlas pa spyan drang me tog dor/ /bstim dang dngos grub gsol ba'i sngags/ /byin rlabs dbang skur la sogs sngags/ /de dag ngo bo shes
506b4(rgyud 'grel): bar bya/ /khro bo lhag pa'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /sku gsung thugs bshad de bzhin sbyar/ /lhag pa gsum yang grangs ldan sbyar/ /ting 'dzin rten phyir gzugs brnyan ni/ /gnyis su bye brag shes par bya/ /gzugs
506b5(rgyud 'grel): brnyan dkyil 'khor yang dag ni/ /chen po rags pa thabs su gtogs/ /mtshan 'dzin yul gyi dkyil 'khor ste/ /ye shes snang phyir gzugs brnyan no/ /lhag pa'i gzugs brnyan rnam pa lnga/ /dbang ni phyi
506b6(rgyud 'grel): nang bsod nams tshogs/ /bsgrub dang 'phrin las dkyil 'khor ro/ /dbang la mdzub gang sor bzhi'o/ /zhi rgyas 'bring rnam gsum ste/ /khru bzhi brgyad dang bcu gnyis dang/ /bcu drug tha ma 'bring gi tshad/ /
506b7(rgyud 'grel): nyi shu 'am nyi shu rtsa lnga yi/ /rgyas pa'i tshul du gsungs pa ste/ /logs re tshad du gsungs pa'o/ /bsod nams rten ni mchod rten tshogs/ /tshogs la dpag tshad rgyang grags so/ /bsgrub pa tshe spra la sogs pa'o//
507a1(rgyud 'grel): skabs kyis dkyil 'khor gsum pa'o/ /de dag sa chog stegs rtsig dang/ /'go ma g.yeng dang thig sta bon/ /bri dang rgyan dang rab gnas dang/ /las kyi gzhung lugs bstan pa'o/ /khro bo
507a2(rgyud 'grel): skabs kyi de bzhin shes/ /'phrin las rnam bzhi dal brgyad dang/ /gzugs brnyan skabs su bshad pa yin/ /zab phyir byang sems dkyil 'khor ni/ /rten dang brten can tha snyad gnyis/ /dbye ba phyi nang mthar thug
507a3(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur/ /ye shes lnga yi ngo ldan pas/ /dkyil 'khor zhes su brjod pa ste/ /ngo bo gsang pa'i khams gsum mo/ /tshogs ni 'byor ba rnam gsum dang/ /tshom bu cig gsum lnga pa'o/ /de re'ang skabs kyis gsum
507a4(rgyud 'grel): gsum ste/ /dga' ldan lha dang dgyes ldan mi/ /'byor ldan yo byad lnga bsags pa'o/ /mthun dang tshad phyir tshogs su brjod/ /rnam grangs gnas dang longs spyod lha/ /ting 'dzin spyod yul 'bras bu lha/ /
507a5(rgyud 'grel): bdag gzhan don tshig la sogs kyis/ /tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor yan lag shes/ /mtshan nyid bar ma gnas dus su/ /bsgrub pa'i stobs kyi rkyen du gsungs/ /rgol ba po dag tshar bcad phyir/ /brjod
507a6(rgyud 'grel): dang 'brel pa dgos yang dgos/ /brjod pa brjod bya rjod byed dang/ /rang bzhin rgyud dang ston pa 'am/ /mtshon bya mtshon byed rgyus gnyis so/ /'brel pa yang ni 'di lta ste/ /dkyil 'khor gzungs mar
507a7(rgyud 'grel): 'brel ba dang/ /gzungs ma dbang dang 'brel pa ni/ /gsang dbang mchog ni non tu bshad/ /dbang thob bsgrub la nges bzhugs pa/ /dngos grub rnam gnyis thob pa'i mi/ /gdul bya zhing dang 'brel par
507b1(rgyud 'grel): gsungs/ /yang na rgyud gsum 'brel pa ste/ /mtshon bya mtshon byed rgyu 'bras tshul/ /shes dang yul du 'bras bu'o/ /dgos pa'i lam rkyen rnam pa brgyad/ /don du gnyer phyir dgos pa'o/ /dgos pa'i dgos pa 'bras
507b2(rgyud 'grel): bu nyid/ /dgos pa bsgrub phyir yang dgos so/ /rgyud la ldan phyi rgol ba bzlog /mi nub bstan rgyas yun ring phyir/ /gtad pa'i ngo bo rnam pa gsum/ /sdud pa po dang bud med sogs/ /rnal 'byor mig can la sogs
507b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i/ /rtogs dang bsrung dang gdam pa yi/ /tha snyad tsam du gtad ces bya/ /skabs kyi dpe yang rnam pa mang/ /rtsod pa che 'phra mi 'thad pa/ /sbyod mi 'tshogs pa gleng gzhi'i tshul/ /bden ba rdzun 'dran pa'i
507b4(rgyud 'grel): gleng bslang tshul/ /so sor rkang thabs rgyud bshad dpe/ /de gzhung bcos pa lam gyi tshul/ /tha tshig mi 'da' gtad pa bzhin/ /'dra phyir mtshon pa dpe ru grags/ /shes rab tha ma'i don bstan pa/ /
507b5(rgyud 'grel): bshad tshul snod dang sbyar ba ste/ /bshad tshul pha dang spyi dbang gnyis/ /pha yis 'bru gnas lan btab pa/ /khog dbub sa gcang bzhi por gsungs/ /spyi ni bzung bzhi gcig gi ste/ /thun mong khyad
507b6(rgyud 'grel): par slob pa'i sa/ /yon tan so so'i mtshan nyid ni/ /de yi bsam pa mthun phyogs su/ /rmad 'byung tshul gyis de bzhin no/ /tha ma don gyi lung bstan pa/ /ngo bo dbye ba rnam pa gnyis/ /lam du rgyu 'bras
507b7(rgyud 'grel): mthar thug 'bras/ /che la dbang dang phyag rgya che/ /lhun grub rigs 'dzin la sogs pa'o/ /lam dang 'bras bu thun mong brjod/ /mthar thug bskyed du bya ba med/ /'bras bu'i ngo bo sku gsung thugs/ /yon tan
508a1(rgyud 'grel): 'phrin la sogs pa'o/ /de yang skabs kyis lnga lnga ste/ /mtshan nyid cig dang du ma med/ /log par rtog dang sems cig pas/ /thugs rjes gzigs dang byin rlabs 'byung/ /de yang
508a2(rgyud 'grel): zhi khro la sogs sku/ /tha dad snang la snang ba med/ /bsgrub pa mthar phyin 'bras bu brjod/ /lam dang 'bras bu bcas pa yang/ /'phral du byas pas 'byung min ste/ /sems can dus na lhun rdzogs ste/ /rgyas par
508a3(rgyud 'grel): bdag gis ma bkod de/ /yig mangs 'jigs dang brjod 'das phyir/ /rnam par phye nas ma bstan no/ /rigs pas skabs su sbyar byas shing/ /tha snyad ji snyed gsum du bsdu'o/ /'gro mang lhan cig ling rtog gis/
508a4(rgyud 'grel): mdongs pa'i rgyud don ma shes 'dres/ /bdag gi yi ge 'di bskyod pas/ /sems can dmus long mig phye shog /'di rtog 'gro ba gzhan don du/ /bstan pa rgya cher dpel ba yin/ /kun kyang yang dag mig ldan la/
508a5(rgyud 'grel): log lta ma lus tshar gcod shog /sgyu 'phrul man ngag gsal ba'i sgron me zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //blo rno? zab dang myur ldan zhing/ /rgya che ba dang blo yangs dang/ /ral gri rgya mtsho'i ri bo dang/ /nam
508a6(rgyud 'grel): mkha' mkha' gong rdul phran 'dra/ /dad ring tshul shis rang bzhin bzang/ /dad pa snying rje ldan pa ni/ /chu bo dge slong rengs pa 'dra/ /nyi ma 'byor rtsi pham bzhin/ /mtshan nyid lnga gnyis cig ldan pas/ /de la log
508a7(rgyud 'grel): dang ma phrad cig/ athi// //bcom ldan 'das rdo rje thugs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyud mchog las/ /bskal mchog dbang mchog lnga ldan pa'i/ /dam pa'i yul lnga mthong
508b1(rgyud 'grel): gon sa mthar/ /byed phyir mtshan nyid gsum brjod bya'o/ /shes 'jug mtshan nyid 'byor pa'i gzungs/ /'bras bu smin byed rgyu dang rkyen/ /nus mthu can 'gyur bde gshegs rigs/ /yan lag 'byung ba'i bzhi ru
508b2(rgyud 'grel): bkod/ /bsgrub pa'i rnal 'byor rgyud bshad pa/ /dbang po yul du snang ba kun/ /yul rnams yod pa ma yin ste/ /kun gzhi rnam par shes pa nyid/ /dngos po sna tshogs par snang ba'o/ /dang po pa yi rtag bzhi ru/ /
508b3(rgyud 'grel): de bzod 'tshol dang 'phel rims dang/ /nges pa gsum dang thog ma'i tshe/ /so so rtogs rgyu gzhung thos pa'i/ /dbang mchog tshig yul byas la brten/ /phyed pas rgyu byas bsams thog tshe/ /gzhung las grags pa'i
508b4(rgyud 'grel): gtan tshigs lnga/ /sngon 'byung rjes sogs las nyid dang/ /mi mthun mthun pa'i gtan tshigs ces/ /des na rang spyi mtshan yul la/ /bshes gnyen bdag po rims 'di zag /dad pas 'dod dang bag chags rgyu/ /
508b5(rgyud 'grel): shes rab spyan mchog rang rig nyid/ /gdod nas shes rab lnga yis mtshungs/ /gces smos la sogs lhan cig byed/ /de dag sgo nas 'tshol byed pa/ /kun tu rgyu zhing 'dod smon byed/ /de yis gzung 'dzin spyod yul
508b6(rgyud 'grel): mdza' / /yod med lung du ma bstan las/ /tshol na skyon gsum 'du mi snyed/ /de dag mi 'dor bral la tshol/ /'on kyang gnyis rdzogs gnyis med don/ /kun yin gang kyang min pa'i phyir/ /phyogs bral phyogs
508b7(rgyud 'grel): bdag bsam brjod 'das/ /thams cad mkhyen don bco lnga bcod/ /sems chos ye nas dbyer med phyir/ /brgyad drug shes pa shes rab mchog /nges pa nyid du rgyal bas gsungs/ /de tshe g.yo smon 'jug pa'i 
509a1(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /ngo bos 'brel phyir gzhi nyid nas/ /'dir 'jug nges pa'i don du rung/ /la la thun mong lam rnams nas/ /rkyen rgyus 'dir zhugs slob par ngas/ /kha cig sems brgyad nas rgyud de/ /
509a2(rgyud 'grel): skal pa zhing gi rdul snyed nas/ /thun mong mchog lam sbyangs pas 'phrang/ /thun mongs mthar byas pa'i tshe/ /yang dag sku gsung thugs bco lngas/ /byin brlabs 'tshal bar mos snang bas/ /'khor los la 'gyur
509a3(rgyud 'grel): ba'ang nges/ /tha ma'i tshen gsung lnga yis/ /dngos ston sngon 'byung lam shes bya/ /rjes su 'jug pa'i shes 'tshol tshe/ /mos pa tha dad dbang gis na/ /bde gshegs sku gsung lnga tshul gyis/ /so sor 'tsham
509a4(rgyud 'grel): par bstan la dbab/ /bskal pa gsum na sbyangs pa yis/ /zab mo gsang thos bzod thob des/ /chos sku gsung gi tshul bzhin du/ /brjod med don gyis bstan la dbab/ /longs spyod rdzogs sku'i gsung lta bu/ /
509a5(rgyud 'grel): dgongs dang brda' yis gtan la dbab/ /sprul pa'i tshig gis gsung lta bu/ /brjod pa tshig gis rnal bar bya/ /mngon par byang chub gsung de bzhin/ /rig pa brlabs kyis gtan la dbab/ /rdo rje sku yi gsung lta bur//
509a6(rgyud 'grel): gnyis med mdza' bral don gyis dbab/ /la la ngo bo nyid gsung ltar/ /snang srid mthong thos nyid kyis 'bebs/ /gsang ba sku yi gsung lta bu/ /dpyod pa thabs kyis 'phebs bar 'gyur/ /la la sngon 'byung bstan pa
509a7(rgyud 'grel): bzhon/ /ji bzhin don dam nges pa'i tshig /rang rkyen mtshan ma'i gtan tshigs dang/ /ldem dgongs sbyor ba'i gtan tshigs dang/ /bkri dang rgyud pa'i gtan tshigs kyis/ /so so'i blo la nges byed cing/ /brtag yul yongs su
509b1(rgyud 'grel): bshig byed cing/ /de dag las kyi gtan tshigs 'gyur/ /des na gtan tshigs dbang brtsan bar/ /gtan tshigs ma gyur gang yang med/ /de las re zhig tshig dbang du/ /dngos po brtan la phebs mi phebs/ /dbab med ston
509b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'ang de yin te/ /mthong snyed byed phyir dgos yod la/ /so sor rtog pa'i yul du 'gyur/ /'tshol tshe dgos phyir de ltar nges/ /de la cig shos thun mong mchog /thun mong grags pa rnam bzhi sogs/ /thun mong min pa rnam pa gnyis/ /
509b3(rgyud 'grel): tshig don mthun par 'bebs pa dang/ /gtan tshigs don tshig mi mthun pas/ /gtan la 'bebs par byed pa'o/ /dang po tha snyad gtan la 'debs/ /de bzhin nyid 'bebs dag mnyam rtogs/ /bden bdag gnyis med la sogs pa'o/ /
509b4(rgyud 'grel): gnyis pa ci yang ma yin la/ /ci yang yin dang grub ma grub/ /de sogs don 'dod ci yang min/ /phyir yin phyir grub phyir ma grub/ /phyir brjod bstan tshigs la sogs pas/ /mi 'dra bltos rgyu ngo bo'i phyir/ /de dag gtan tshigs
509b5(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur bar nges/ /de yang skabs 'dir de la brten/ /de des yul dang shes pa dang/ /'das 'khor snang ba shig bya ba/ /med na mi 'byung tshul nyid dang/ /de ma grub pas de ldog dang/ /snang ba rang snang thabs chen de/ /snang bzhin  
509b6(rgyud 'grel): ma grub shes rab nyid/ /bar ma sems rtogs rnam par thar/ /lnga bzhi gnyis sogs snga phyi 'phel/ /lam grangs 'phel ba'ang 'dir shes te/ /skabs skabs nyid du the tshom med/ /de mthar bzhi mthar rdeng ldan pas/ /
509b7(rgyud 'grel): dbyings dang rig pa gnyis med par/ /de bzhin nyid su rdo rjes rig /gzung 'dzin bral ba'i rang rig nyid/ /dmigs med tshul du der snang ngo/ /byang chub sems snang thams cad ni/ /shin tu brtag dka' gting zab pas/ /
510a1(rgyud 'grel): ma dmigs mi dmigs dmigs su med/ /sems nyid de ni ji lta bur/ /byang chub de ni sems yin no/ /sems dang byang chub dbyer med pas/ /sems can ma lus thams cad dang/ /dus gsum
510a2(rgyud 'grel): chos rnams thams cad dang/ /thams cad ma lus chos so cog /sems dang byang chub nyid du 'ub/ /yangs shing rgya che lhun grub ni/ /phyi nang snod bcud ye nas dag /dag rtogs nyid kyang dbyings nyid yin/ /'di na rdo rje
510a3(rgyud 'grel): mnyam yin no/ /byang chub sems zhes brjod pa ni/ /gang nas ma 'ongs gar mi 'gro /rtog med rang rig kho na tsam/ /sangs rgyas sems can sems la gnas/ /mnyam pa'i don nyid ji lta bu/ /mnyam nyid rang bzhin gang yang min/
510a4(rgyud 'grel): mnyam dang rtog pa gnyis ka med/ /thams cad lhun gyis grub pa dang/ /sgyu ma mig yor tshul shes pa/ /gnyis ka rang rig nyid du 'dus/ /chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun/ /rang bzhin ye nas dag pa yis/ /sus kyang ma/
510a5(rgyud 'grel): byas dngags gsal/ /ma chags pad+ma 'dra ba yi/ /ye shes can gyi spyod yul ni/ /kun dang thun mong de ma yin/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul de/ /skyes bu blo rtsal rab kyis rtogs/ /thams cad ma lus cig
510a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dang/ /lta dang lta bar byar med pa'i/ /ye shes sgron mar spreng ba ni/ /phyogs bcu'i zhing khams thams cad mthong/ /thams cad ma lus don 'byung ba/ /tshig gis mtshon las gud na med/ /sgra nyid don
510a7(rgyud 'grel): gyi dngos po med/ /don nyid sgra las gud na med/ /sgra dang tshig tu brjod pa ni/ /yang dag don gyi snying po 'byin/ /ming tshig sgra la ma brten par/ /blo yi gting du go bar byos/ /dngos grub mchog gi snying po ni/ /dang po
510b1(rgyud 'grel): don rtogs mdza' mi gtong/ /chu srin phyag rgya ji bzhin phyir/ /skye bar grangs kyang lhung mi 'gyur/ /tshong dpon lam mdza' i bsam pa bzhin/ /bsgrub pa'i rigs 'di rigs 'dzin bzhi/ /shes rab dang po smos pa gsum/ /bar du rgyu
510b2(rgyud 'grel): 'tshams 'bras bu gnyis/ /bar tshad med sbyor shes rab rims/ /mdza' gsum kun 'gro mi g.yo dang/ /mthar phyin shes rab rims shes dgos/ /bdag nyid mi mthong shes rgyud la 'byongs pa/ /gzhan du 'tshongs shing
510b3(rgyud 'grel): rmongs pa'i sems can gyis/ /bstan kyang ma thos mtshon kyang ma mthong bas/ /bdag dang gzhan du 'tshol bas sangs mi rgya/ /ma g.yo bkod pa bsrung bar rel/ /mdzad pa gnas stobs rim don gnyer/ /'tshang zlos ting 'dzin
510b4(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor dang/ /dam tshig 'phrin las spyod pa dang/ /mchod pa dbang dang bsgrub pa dang/ /phyag rgya sngags kyis lta ba rnams/ /shes tshor bya'i tshig tsam min/ /de bas lam 'di bye brag mthong/ /thig le chen po'i rang
510b5(rgyud 'grel): bzhin la/ /bsgom pa rnam gsum dus gcig rdzogs/ /de nyid ma bcos mi g.yo'i phyir/ /de ni de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings/ /de nyid kun gsal ye shes phyir/ /de ni kun tu snang gi dang/ /'bras bu'i chos rnams
510b6(rgyud 'grel): kun dngos phyir/ /de ni rgyu yi rim par ldan/ /rang rig byang chub dkyil 'khor dang/ /thams cad kun la 'khyol bar gnas/ /gzung 'dzin bral ba'i ye shes ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas/ /gzhal
510b7(rgyud 'grel): yas khang dang dkyil 'khor dang/ /khro tshogs 'du 'phro mang po dang/ /sems kyi cho 'phrul chen po yin/ /dam tshig dam tshig zhes bya ba/ /gud na yod pa ma yin te/ /rang gi lta ba dam tshig yin/ /sbom pa rnam pa bcu
511a1(rgyud 'grel): gsum dang/ /spyi'i dam tshig mdza' yas pas/ /thig le chen po'i ngang du gsal/ /bya ba med pa'i tshul gyis su/ /kun la thogs pa med par sbyad/ /bzhi yi las dang cig po 'ang/ /thig le
511a2(rgyud 'grel): tshan po'i dang du gsal/ /dngos por zhen bcom bdag dbang bsdus/ /bdun rgyas zung ngu gnyis zhi mthong/ /spyod pa rnam pa gnyis po yang/ /thig le chen po'i ngang nges phyir/ /cig la mi gnas kun la sbyod/ /spyod
511a3(rgyud 'grel): par byed dang spyad par med/ /mchod pa'i brgyan dang longs spyod kun/ /bya byed gnyis rnams las de yang/ /rig pa byang chub sems chen po/ /cho 'phrul chen po'i dang du 'dus/ /bdag nyid chen po'i ye shes las/ /dbang lnga
511a4(rgyud 'grel): ma btsal dus cig rdzogs/ /thob bya thob byed thob byas pa/ /rig phyir gzhan nas thob pa med/ /bsgrub med spangs med chos nyid du/ /'gro med 'ong med de bzhin nyid/ /thams cad gnyis su med pa la/ /bsgrub dang bsgrub
511a5(rgyud 'grel): pa ga la yod/ /dper na sgyu ma'i cho 'phrul ltar/ /don du gnyer ba 'ang chud par byas/ /brag ca'i sgra dang chu zla bzhin/ /sgra gzugs mdza' dang bral bar rtogs/ /phyag rgya chen po'i mtshan nyid ni/ /phyogs bcu dus bzhir
511a6(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa yi/ /sku gsung thugs dang ye shes lnga/ /bdag dang dbyer med phyag rgya che/ /phyag rgya bzhi bcu gnyis po la/ /thig le nyid las gzhan pa med/ /sngags zhes rab tu brjod pa'ang/ /don dam kun rdzob dbyer
511a7(rgyud 'grel): med pa'i/ /mnyam pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po ru/ /sku gsung thugs kyi yi ge oM/ /de sogs yi ge bzhi bcu gnyis/ /rtag tu mnyam gzhag phyag rgya ni/ /dus gsum ting 'dzin phyir sngags yin/ /rnam par dbye
511b1(rgyud 'grel): ba de dag kun/ /thos bsam rten pa las byung dang/ /chags pa g.yas g.yon lam las skyes/ /rgyud pa'i rnal 'byor las skyes pa/ /sa'i cha yis phye na ni/ /nus pa thob dang ma thob kyis/ /mthong lam gnyis su gyur pa yin/ /
511b2(rgyud 'grel): zag yod zlog pa'ang gnyis yod de/ /mthu yis ngan 'gro ldog mi ldog /sngon gyi shes 'jug brgyad la yod/ /mthar zhes 'jug la ga la yod/ /skabs gnyis mthar phyin rnam pa gnyis/ /yod phyir cig la gsum
511b3(rgyud 'grel): gsum ldan/ /des na spyi dang bye brag shes/ /gong gi don ltar ma rtogs pa'i/ /blo ngan mnyam par khungs phyung nas/ /ma rtogs le lo snyoms las byas/ /don ma grub par ngan song 'gro/ /sems kyi mnyam pa ma
511b4(rgyud 'grel): gtogs na/ /tshig gi mnyam pa sangs mi rgya/ /de bas don tshig ldan par byos/ /'on tang the tshom med par 'grub/ /bsgrub pa'i rkyen 'jug rnal 'byor spyod/ /rnal 'byor rkyen yang rnam lnga ste/ /skor bdun dngos
511b5(rgyud 'grel): nyid rang rig pa/ /don dam kun gyi rgyu yin phyir/ /lhag pa'i rgyu de dang por bsgom/ /bsam bya bsam par mi bya ste/ /mi bsam par yang mi bsam mo/ /'du shes kun bral ting 'dzin mchog /de bas rang sems rtogs
511b6(rgyud 'grel): byas te/ /le lo g.yeng ba yongs spangs te/ /nga dang bdag med par mnyam bsrung/ /mnyam pa'i dam tshig 'bral mi bya/ /yid shes de bzhin nyid mi dmigs/ /ci smos 'tshogs brgyad spyod yul rnams/ /mi rtog gyur pas
511b7(rgyud 'grel): dus gcig gsal/ /de phyir thams cad mkhyen sgom yin/ /de ltar rgyu la rten pa yis/ /gnyis phyir 'tshams sbyor ting 'dzin bsgom/ /de yang gnyis te phyag rgya dngos/ /phyag rgya shes nas dus min phyir/ /mi sgom cig

512a2(rgyud 'grel): su yod pa/ /gnyis las gsum gyi skyo pa'ang 'byung/ /de la bstan par don bsgrub phyir/ /'bras bu'i ting 'dzin rims bzhin bsgom/ /sems nyid yi ge phyag rgya dang/ /sku yi ngo bo rang snang phyir/ /'bras bu rgya cig spros bsgoms pa'ang/ /

512a4(rgyud 'grel): gnyis rim brtan dang/ /yongs 'gyur rgya che zhal gcig pa/ /phyag gnyis yan lag tshang byas pas/ /rang bzhin phab mchod bzlas par bya/ /de gom drug la'ang de bzhin no/ /yang na mos pas khros pa bsgom/ /de yang
512a5(rgyud 'grel): de'i tshul bzhin bya/ /spyod yul drug nyid phyag rgya ldan/ /bstan nas spros pa'i rnal 'byor la/ /zhi khro gang la sngon byas pa'i/ /zhal phyag grangs dang phyag rgya'i grangs/ /gsum dang lnga dang dgu rtsa cig /dgu brgya la sogs zhal
512a6(rgyud 'grel): phyag dang/ /rigs gsum lnga dang bzhi bcu gnyis/ /rigs sam tshom bu'i grangs bzhin bslab/ /goms nas chu la nya ldang tshul/ /skad cig brjod pas 'od du 'bar/ /stong gi dkyil 'khor man chad du/ /rang rig gsal
512a7(rgyud 'grel): shar mthar phyin pa'o/ /stong khri ci smos tshem bu 'ang/ /shin tu bstan nas gnas khang dang/ /yo byad lnga sogs ldan byas te/ /bsgrub pa dus kyis tshogs la sbyar/ /zla drug bcu gnyis bcu bzhi drug /khams dang brtson
512b1(rgyud 'grel): 'grus shes rab dang/ /ting nge 'dzin 'bring mthar phye bas/ /dus der rnam smin lus de nyid/ /rdo rje lus gyur tshe la sbyor/ /mi ldog sa la nges par phyin/ /shes rab ting 'dzin min pa yi/ /sman sngags la sogs tshe las 'phags/ /
