516b6(rgyud 'grel): gshegs dang log pa gnyis/ /ngo bo nyid kyis gnas gyur na/ /de la bcos shin sgyur du med/ /ye nas rang bzhin dbyer med phyir/ /nyon mongs spangs zhing spyad sgrub med/ /so so'i rang bzhin nges zhe na/ /yang dag lam gyis
516b7(rgyud 'grel): bcos su med/ /de bas yang dag blo chen gyis/ /thams cad dngos po med par bshad/ /'khor ba sems phyir bdag med pas/ /de phyir de bzhin gshegs bsam yas/ /thabs dang shes rab ldan gyur na/ /phyin ci log
517a1(rgyud 'grel): nyid byang chub lam/ /'khor ba'i rang bzhin mi dmigs phyir/ /mya ngan 'das pa'ang yod ma yin/ /de shes bya phyir sgyu sogs dbye/ /ma rig lhan cig mtshungs pa'i rgyu/ /gti mug ming gi rnam grangs te/ /rang rig nyid la
517a2(rgyud 'grel): nyams med phyir/ /gnyis med don cig yin par bshad/ /chos dang bdag tu dngos po rnams/ /ngo bo yod sogs brtags pa yi/ /rtog pa sgyu ma'i rlung 'gyur bas/ /phyi nang rten 'brel gnyis 'khor phyir/ /srid pa'i nyes dmigs
517a3(rgyud 'grel): bdag las byung/ /rnam rtog rang gi sems yin phyir/ /chos rnams ma lus thams cad la/ /byang chub snying po yod par lta/ /rang bzhin ye nas 'od gsal ba'i/ /byang chub snying por thams cad thim/ /de phyir rang bzhin
517a4(rgyud 'grel): ma skyes pas/ /thams cad ming tsam stong nyid med/ /thams cad ma lus stong zhes te/ /sa rdo dran med ma yin pa/ /rtog med rang rig 'od gsal ba/ /'di ltar snang ba thams cad kun/ /brdos pa can gyi chos min te/ /shes
517a5(rgyud 'grel): ba 'ba' zhig kho na'o/ /de phyir brtan g.yo ma lus kun/ /sgyu ma'i rang bzhin bya byed kyang/ /snang ba nyid na ngo bo med/ /de nyid chos skur rang gnas pas/ /kun bzang rdo rje sems dpas gsungs/ /nyon mongs las kyis
517a6(rgyud 'grel): lhan cig byed/ /nyon mongs rang dang spyi bstan pa/ /mtshan nyid ma nor don rtogs na/ /rnam par byad pa'i lam du 'gyur/ /sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub kyang/ /gang na'ang med de de nyid yin/ /sgyu ma rtsal 'dzin thabs su
517a7(rgyud 'grel): 'phros/ /mtshan rnams mi dmigs shes rab sbyor/ /gnyis med ye shes byang chub sems/ /nyon mongs spyi yi mtshan nyid ni/ /mi rtag sdug bsngal stong bdag med/ /rang mtshan chags sogs snang ba ni/ /rnam rtog
517b1(rgyud 'grel): nyid na sems nyid de/ /rang bzhin rang rig 'di gsal phyir/ /nyon mongs ye shes spang bsgrub med/ /rtog zhen po la sgyu snang ba'ang/ /sems nyid rang bzhin ma skyes pas/ /de nyid yi ge sgras mtshon ste/ /snang stong gnyis med chos sku'i rgya/ /
517b2(rgyud 'grel): las rtog mi mthun tha dad phyir/ /rang mtshan sgyu ma lngar snang ba/ /rang bzhin dbyings las ma g.yos kyang/ /gdul bya so so'i don byed pa/ /cha gnyis ldan pa'i yig tshul gyis/ /gsung gi phyag rgya chen po yin/ /de ltar sgyu nas
517b3(rgyud 'grel): don lnga dag /rang rig sgyu ma lngas gsal ba/ /sems phyir cig dang du ma med/ /bden pa gnyis kar dbyer med phyir/ /de bzhin ting 'dzin dbang bsgyur na/ /ye shes lnga ru gsal ba nyid/ /yi ge rdzogs pa'i tshul nyid kyis/ /
517b4(rgyud 'grel): thugs kyi phyag rgya chen po yin/ /de ltar don lnga dag pa nyid/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i rang bzhin la/ /thabs dang shes rab ma rtogs bas/ /ma grol khams gsum 'khor ba yin/ /de ltar nges par cis mngon na/ /
517b5(rgyud 'grel): sngags kyis yongs su zin pa'i dug /kun la gnod pa byed mi nus/ /thabs dang shes rab rtog ba yis/ /dug gsum sdug bsngal gnod mi 'gyur/ /thabs dang shes rab ldan pa la/ /nyon mongs thams cad byang chub
517b6(rgyud 'grel): rgyu/ /lus ngag yid gsum rang bzhin ni/ /snang gtong gnyis med sku gsung rgya/ /chos kun rang bzhin dag pa'i phyir/ /las rnams yongs su dag par 'gyur/ /gsang sngags bla na med pa ni/ /thabs kyis ji ltar zin
517b7(rgyud 'grel): bzhin 'grub/ /bsam gyis mi khyab nges pa med/ /thabs la mkhas pas ma zin na/ /lam gyi dge spyad rdegs bcas kyang/ /mtho ris lha dang mi ru skye/ /skye shi med pa'i sa mi thob/ /thabs mkhas snying rjes zin
518a1(rgyud 'grel): pa ni/ /mtshams med sems can ma lus kun/ /byang chub snying rjes bsad na yang/ /bsod nams dpag tu med pa thob/ /nyon mongs phyin ci log gi las/ /thabs la mkhas pas zin gyur yang/
518a2(rgyud 'grel): grol lam thar bar mi 'gyur na/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kun gyis/ /'dul ba'i dbang gis bya byed pa/ /sngon dang smad 'tshong ston pa'ang lhung/ /byang chub sems dpa' spyod tshul bzang/ /phal la med par mi rung
518a3(rgyud 'grel): yang/ /sngags mchog shin tu zab pa yi/ /skye bo kun gyis bya bar nges/ /des na rang bzhin dag pa yin/ /de dag mngon par bsgrub pa ni/ /ma bcos rgyun gyi skad cig ma/ /de yis ma byas gang yang med/ /
518a4(rgyud 'grel): dbang po yul du snang ba kun/ /yul rnams yod pa ma yin te/ /kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa nyid/ /dngos po sna tshogs par snang ba'o/ /nang dang nang gi phyi rol gyi/ /rnam rtog sna tshogs snang ba yang/ /dngos po
518a5(rgyud 'grel): med dbyings skad cig ma/ /de nyid rnam par dag pa'i lam/ /yang dag gshegs dang log rtog dang/ /gzhan yang sprul pa mang po'i tshogs/ /phyogs bcu ma lus thams cad kyi/ /de la bsad cing bzung du
518a6(rgyud 'grel): med/ /kha dog gnas dang dbyibs rigs min/ /de nyid ye shes rang snang phyir/ /sna tshogs snang ba de bzhin lta/ /rang rig nyid las mi zhan phyir/ /snang stong gnyis med byang chub sems/ /skyes bu dam pa
518a7(rgyud 'grel): mchog 'dod pas/ /de la rtag 'grus gsal bar gyis/ /de yi 'bras bu mthar phyin ni/ /rgyu 'bras med pa'i dus cig ste/ /thams cad ming tsam mtshan nyid de/ /yi ge 'bru gsum rdzogs par 'gyur/ /mi
518b1(rgyud 'grel): zad brgyan gyi 'khor los bsdus/ /tshogs chen gnyis kyang rdzogs par rol/ /skye 'jig med pa'i dbyings la bzhugs/ /de dag ngo bo nyid bstan pa/ /sna tshogs lus dang longs spyod dang/ /gnas dang sdug bsngal la sogs
518b2(rgyud 'grel): pa/ /mi mthun bde sdug myong bar 'gyur/ /bdag dang bdag gi gzhan rnams ni/ /log par rtogs pa tsam nyid las/ /phra zhing zab pa yod ma yin/ /log rtog nyid la'ang nyid spyod de/ /gzhan du g.yo ba ci yang med/ /
518b3(rgyud 'grel): log rtog rang bzhin rang rig phyir/ /thams cad ma lus chos so cog /sems nyid las ni gzhan na med/ /sems dang byang chub dbyer med pas/ /byang chub lam de ring ba men/ /cig phyir rang rig rkyen 'brel pas/ /
518b4(rgyud 'grel): rnam par dag pa dbyings nyid tshul/ /nyid la dbang sgyur nyid spyod phyir/ /bdag dang gzhan dang rtog pa'i rgyun/ /rnam dag snod bcud rgyud mi dmigs/ /lnga dpung yan lag thams cad ni/ /'bru lngar 'dus pa'i byang chub sku/ /
518b5(rgyud 'grel): 'bru lnga ma skyes shes rab yum/ /skye mched khams rnams rdo rje'i tshogs/ /rnam shes ye shes dkyil 'khor du/ /dag phyir 'bras bu theg pa'i mchog /nges 'byung kun gyi bsgrub byar gsungs/ /dmigs bya dmigs
518b6(rgyud 'grel): byed med tshul gyis/ /shin tu gsal ba'i mngon sum pa/ /ngo bo nyid ni dmigs su med/ /de ltar 'khor ba ngo bos dag /de ltar de dag mdza' rtags na/ /'khor ba'i rang bzhin ma skyes phyir/ /'khor ba yongs su shes pa
518b7(rgyud 'grel): na/ /mya ngan 'das zhes de la bya/ /'jig rten 'di ni ci yod pa'i/ /ming dang tha snyad 'dzin pa dag /so so'i mtshan nyid bshig byas na/ /rang bzhin med de yang dag nyid/ /rang 'byung chen po'i ye shes kyis/ /thams
519a1(rgyud 'grel): cad sangs rgyas zhing du sbyor/ /ma bcos ma byas ngang gis gsal/ /ye nas 'od gsal sangs rgyas zhing/ /phung sogs ma skyes ye shes gsal/ /snang stong gnyis med byang chub sems/ /
519a2(rgyud 'grel): sku dang ye shes bsam mi khyab/ /gang gis de ltar mngon sum pa/ /mdza' rnams lta las yongs grol ste/ /spyod yul yongs su dag 'gyur ba/ /mtshan nyid dang por shes par bya/ /dpal gsang ba'i snying po
519a3(rgyud 'grel): de kho na nyid nges pa bsdus pa las/ /rang bzhin gyis gnas pa'i don rjes su shes pa'i mtshan nyid de/ /rim pa dang po'o// //de nas nyams su blang ba'i don/ /mtshan nyid bar ma bshad par
519a4(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /de nyid gzhi yi dpes mtshon ste/ /rgyu 'bras tshul gyis 'byung ba yi/ /srid pa skye ba'i rim pa ni/ /khams dang las kyi rkyen ngag gis/ /sum mdo snying lkog lte ba yi/ /'byung bzhi'i las rlung rim 'dus pas//
519a5(rgyud 'grel): don rnams snang ba 'bral 'gyur zhing/ /dangs ma'i snying por zhugs pa na/ /gnyis med 'dzin pa nyams pa yin/ /thams cad 'dzin bral snang ba'i mthus/ /bar ma sgyu ma'i sku thob ste/ /sdos dang bral bas sa sogs
519a6(rgyud 'grel): min/ /phyis 'byung cha byad yongs bzung bas/ /rdzu 'phrul thogs med las las byung/ /dbang po yan lag yongs rdzogs pas/ /dngos po kun la thogs med cing/ /'dod ldan snod bcud gsal bar snang/ /
519a7(rgyud 'grel): 'od kyis dpag tshad bye ba gsal/ /zhag bdun nyid du gnas par gsungs/ /de nyid rnam shes skad cig ma/ /nyon mongs las rlung 'phangs pa nyid/ /sa bon gnyis dang lhan cig pas/ /ming don gnyis su 'gyur ba
519b1(rgyud 'grel): yin/ /stong phrag bdun cu gnyis gnyis bcud/ /ma lus 'dus pa'i nus mthu can/ /gsum 'dres tha dad tshul cig pa/ /rang gi las kyis rab bskul ba'i/ /rlung gi 'jug pas 'phel byed des/ /rtun shing lta bur gyur pa dang/ /
519b2(rgyud 'grel): de la yang ni de bzhin pas/ /yan lag chos rnams rdzogs par byed/ /rlung gis bskul nas sngon gyur pa/ /gang yin de 'drar bdag 'dzin sems/ /nges par snying la gnas pa yin/ /rim gro las kyis lus smin cing/ /
519b3(rgyud 'grel): brda yis ngag kyang grol bar 'gyur/ /de nyid kyis ni rnam shes gsal/ /dngos po kun kyang shes pa nyid/ /yul zla zas nor dbang byed pas/ /chags gnyis la sogs 'jug par byed/ /rkyen ldan phung po rgyas pa des/ /
519b4(rgyud 'grel): rigs la sogs pa rgyas pa des/ /thams cad las la thogs med cing/ /gzhan gyi don yang byed par nus/ /kun tu kun nas rtags pa yi/ /'khor ba lhun grub nyid du snang/ /rang bzhin dag pa'i sangs rgyas kyang/ /
519b5(rgyud 'grel): thabs dang lhan cig mi gnas pas/ /gzung 'dzin 'ching ba bcings par 'gyur/ /de nyid tshul gyi 'jug sogs pa/ /rim pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir/ /lam gyi tshul yang de bzhin shes/ /rim par rjes 'jug
519b6(rgyud 'grel): don nyid ni/ /sngon du bya ba'i las byas nas/ /shin tu dben pa'i sa phyogs su/ /rang bzhin mnyam pa'i rjes mthun par/ /de bzhin nyid dang mnyam sbyor zhing/ /dam pa'i don gyis bsgom par bya/ /byang chub tshogs su gzung
519b7(rgyud 'grel): par gnas/ /mchog du bde ba'i zhi gnas pas/ /mnyam rdzogs chen po mthun sgom zhing/ /byang chub sems su brtan par bzung/ /bya ba med pas bya med bya/ /mi gnas pa la gnas par bsgom/ /gtan tshigs rgyas par lus
520a1(rgyud 'grel): bzhag na/ /dgos ched thabs dang mi mthun dang/ /bcos nyams rjes su spyod pa yis/ /rim 'di yongs su shes par bya/ /'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i/ /chos rnams ma lus rang
520a2(rgyud 'grel): bzhi ni/ /ma skyes sems las cir yang snang/ /de phyir bden gnyis rgyu 'bras tshul/ /gser las byas pa'i rdzas rnams kun/ /mi las mtshan ma so sor yang/ /thams cad gser gyi ngo bor cig /sems
520a3(rgyud 'grel): nyid rig dang ma rig las/ /'das dang ma 'das cir yang snang/ /thams cad rang rig ngo bo'i phyir/ /rang bzhin nyid kyis dag pas na/ /sgyu ma stong sogs rnam grangs dang/ /bden gnyis dbyer med ye shes dang/ /
520a4(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor la sogs don rnams kun/ /de nyid rjes su brjod pa yin/ /rang bzhin gtan tshigs sngon song ba/ /gsum sogs gtan tshigs tshig rjes su/ de rjes nyams blang dgos ched ni/ /dkyil 'khor
520a5(rgyud 'grel): bsam yas lhun grub pa/ /mi dmigs dbyings nas don 'byin byed/ /ma bcos ji bzhin nga bzha' dang/ /lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor 'byung/ /mi dmigs thugs kyi dkyil 'khor las/ /ting nge 'dzin gyi
520a6(rgyud 'grel): dbang bsgyur nas/ /ye shes sprul pa sna tshogs 'grub/ /spyod yul thams cad maN+Da la/ /longs rdzogs sku dang sangs rgyas zhing/ /ji ltar 'dod pa smon na 'grub/ /yangs shing rgya che lhun grub ni/ /phyi nang
520a7(rgyud 'grel): snod bcud ye nas dag /dag rtogs nyid kyang dbyings nyid yin/ /'di ni rdo rje mnyam yin no/ /lhun grub ji ltar 'dod snang ba/ /gnyis sogs mtshan mas bsgribs pa'i phyir/ /ji ltar byis pa shed ma phye/ /
520b1(rgyud 'grel): bya byed mang pos g.yeng bar gnas/ /bya byed mang po bdag med par/ /ting nge 'dzin gyis dbang sgyur nas/ /mtshan ma mnyam pa'i dbyings su gnas/ /de dag dang po'i lus zhes bya/ /dngos grub myur du grub 'dod na/ /shin tu phra
520b2(rgyud 'grel): zhing zab par bsgom/ /bdag dang bdag gi gzhan rnams ni/ /shin tu mi dmigs dbyings su bsgom/ /rang bzhin mthong las don med phyir/ /de nyid rjes su mngon byas pas/ /thabs kyi dam par de bshad de/ /yang dag
520b3(rgyud 'grel): gnyis med byang chub sems/ /snang stong gnyis sogs gang min zhing/ /phyogs dang gnas pa yod min pas/ /rjes su 'jug phyir mi bsam zhing/ /gang la 'ang gnas pa bya ba min/ /gang zhig dmigs nas gsal ba ni/ /
520b4(rgyud 'grel): bsgom par bya ba bsgom pa min/ /yod med la sogs mdza' dbus chos/ /gang yang dang du ma blangs zhing/ /sems kyis mngon par ma phyogs pa/ /tha snyad tsam du mnyam bzhag go /bsam bya dmigs su med pas na/ /
520b5(rgyud 'grel): bzung 'dzin bral ba'i rang bzhin nyid/ /dmigs med tshul du bar? snang ba/ /bsgom pa'i mchog tu 'di gsungs so/ /yid la byed dang bying rgod dang/ /myong gzugs 'god dang 'gags 'bras dang/ /chags bral re dogs bdag
520b6(rgyud 'grel): nyid dang/ /'chos dang gnas dmigs sdud pa dang/ /mngon byed ther zug phyal ba dag /bdag dbang 'du shes mtshan nyid de/ /'du shes stong pa ting 'dzin mchog /stong pa'i 'du shes ma rab sems/ /de phyir rgyu ba
520b7(rgyud 'grel): cing zhib sogs/ /g.yos 'khrul dbang gis cir snang yang/ /rang bzhin sems nyid yin par shes/ /mtshan nyid gang du 'ang mi dmigs na/ /las su bya ba med pa'i phyir/ /tha snyad kun las grol 'gyur te/ /
521a1(rgyud 'grel): mi rtog ye shes gzhan du min/ /gang zhig bsam zhig dmigs yod na/ /nges par de nyid g.yeng sa yin/ /ci yang yid la mi byed pas/ /gol sar lhung ba ci zhig ltung/ /rang bzhin gnas
521a2(rgyud 'grel): dmigs med gsungs la/ /zhen blos gnas dang dmigs byed pa/ /gzung 'dzin zhes ni de la brjod/ /mi dmigs bsam pa gang spong ba/ /de nyid rdzas mthun ting 'dzin yin/ /ring du byas pa'i rang nyams dag /
521a3(rgyud 'grel): drag dal chu dang mtsho gting gi /sems kyis brtan pa'i nyams bzung la/ /gzugs sgra reg dang rlung la sogs/ /snang yang dmigs par mi 'gyur na/ /gang yang zhen par ma gyur yin/ /lus sgra shin tu g.yeng
521a4(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur yang/ /cig shos 'jug med tshul gyis bstan/ /rang rig shin tu gsal ba yang/ /ngo bo dmigs su med par gsungs/ /de rjes mthun pa'i spyod pa yang/ /las dang sbyor pa thams cad la/ /rang bzhin
521a5(rgyud 'grel): bdag phyir mi dmigs shing/ /byas mthong zos pa ci yang med/ /gang yang bya med tshul gyis bya/ /shin tu 'ang zhi bar 'gyur ba'i rigs/ /dpal gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las bsdus pa/ /de bzhin
521a6(rgyud 'grel): nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rim pa ste gnyis pa'o// //de nas gsang ba bshad bya ba/ /ting 'dzin de ni goms pa dang/ /thams cad rang sems rnam pa'i phyir/ /thams cad sgyu ma mig yor dang?
521a7(rgyud 'grel): sprul pa'i tshul du shes par bya/ /de nyid shin tu goms par bsgom/ /de nyid rgyas pa'i lung bstan pa/ /rang bzhin ngo bo sgyur? pa lus/ /'jig rten sna tshogs snang ba yang/ /rang rig rnam rtog gzugs brnyan phyir/
521b1(rgyud 'grel): sgyu ma'i tshul du thams cad snang/ /'phral snang bya ba kun byed kyang/ /rtog pa kun gyi tshad mar snang/ /'di dag thams cad gzugs brnyan te/ /byas byed snang zhing dngos po med/ /chu zla'i tshul du thams cad gnas/ /
521b2(rgyud 'grel): thams cad snang la rang bzhin med/ /rjes su dran par byed pas kyang/ /thams cad sems kyi rnam pa ni/ /don gyi rtsa ba mchog yin te/ /thams cad dogs med ma chags pa'i/ /rang rig ye shes de bzhin nyid/ /
521b3(rgyud 'grel): phung sogs sna tshogs thabs snang ba/ /ye shes sgyu mar rang snang phyir/ /snang stong gnyis su ma yin pas/ /thabs dang shes rab ldan par gnas/ /goms blos ci sprod mi gos te/ /bsag bya gnyis su nges par 'gyur/
521b4(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin ye nas de bzhin no/ /sngon goms rang rig snang ba'i chos/ /sngos pa can gyi chos min pas/ /rig pa rang dbang sgyur ba yis/ /khams sogs ji ltar bltas bzhin snang/ /rgyu 'bras dbyer med snga phyi med/
521b5(rgyud 'grel): nga nyid lam phyir mnyam par sbyor/ /thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas yin te/ /kun kyang skabs las shes par bya/ /de nyid 'du bar 'gyur ba ni/ /gnyis snang bral ba mnyam pa'i dbyings/ /rang dbang 'gyur ba'i thabs
521b6(rgyud 'grel): nyid kyis/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad zad med 'phro/ /thams cad rang rig sgyu ma nyid/ /dmigs med tshul gyis snang ba yin/ /yan lag gsum pa bshad par bya/ /srid gsum sgyu ma 'dra bar ni/ /thugs rje'i spyan gyis
521b7(rgyud 'grel): gzigs par 'gyur/ /rjes mthun thugs rjes gsal mdzad kyang/ /rang rig nyid las mi zhen phyir/ /mngon par gdung bas non mi 'gyur/ /rtsa ba byang chub sems nyid rtogs/ /thabs kyis pha rol phyin par sbyod/ /
522a1(rgyud 'grel): dmigs med snying rje chung mi gsan/ /ma chags thabs mkhas spyod pa yis/ /don dang mthun pa 'ba' zhig byed/ /mi mthun zhags pas 'khor pa spyod/ /sa pa'i dpyod par de gsungs
522a2(rgyud 'grel): so// //dpal gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las bsdus pa/ sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rim pa ste/ gsum pa'o// //thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i/ /
522a3(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs sangs rgyas la phyag btsal nas/ /phra mo'i ting 'dzin bshad par bya/ /thams cad rang rig sgyu ma'i phyir/ /phyi nang snod bcud hUM du bsdu/ /gang bsgrub yi ge so so ste/ /spyir ni gang bsgoms kun tu 'dra/ /rdo rje sems dpa' 
522a4(rgyud 'grel): nyid du 'dus/ /yan lag lnga dang rnam shes nyid/ /yi ge hUM du shin tu bsdus/ /nri yi mig gis ltar yod pa/ /rab tu 'dris nas spro bar bya/ /phyogs bcu gang nas bslar bsdus bstim/ /hUM nyid mi dmigs dbyings su
522a5(rgyud 'grel): bstim/ /rnam shes lhums su zhugs par bshad/ /hUM nyid a 'am ma dang gnyis/ /shin tu gsal zhing 'tsher ba la/ /thams cad yi ger gyur byas te/ /bsdus nyi zla gang sgril bsgom/ /sa bon gnyis kyi bdag nyid
522a6(rgyud 'grel): pas/ /rang bzhin hUM gi bdag nyid de/ /'dres phyir ming gnyis thob pa yin/ /phyag mtshan h+ri las padmor snang/ /thams cad rang rig snang ba'i phyir/ /byin brlabs 'od zer gzhal yas khang/ /dang snyigs tshul gyis nyi zla gnyis/ /
522a7(rgyud 'grel): skabs 'dir mi 'byed tshul phyir rmos/ /shes rab cig las byung ba hUM/ /mthing ga 'tsher la gsal ba yi/ /'od zer phyogs bcu'i hUM bsdus pa/ /rlung gi mtshan mar shes par bya/ /mchig? gu lta bu rdo rje'i gzugs/ /
522b1(rgyud 'grel): rjes su mthun pa'i 'phro 'dur ldan/ /de nyid sems dpa' yab yum sku/ /shin tu phra zhing 'dus par bsgom/ /mtshan dang dpe byad thams cad ldan/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis yang na drug /rdo rje 'khor lo ral gri 'bar/ /rin chen
522b2(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma dril bu 'bar/ /phra ba'i gzhal yas nyi zla ldan/ /nges par snying la gnas par bya/ /der ni ye shes snying po ste/ /de ltar gnas cig gnas gsum dang/ /gnas lnga dag tu sgom par bya/ /sku gsung thugs kyi phyag rgya dang/ /
522b3(rgyud 'grel): ye shes lngas rgyas gdab par bya/ /de nyid shin tu gnas pa dang/ /de bzhin phyag rgya chen po ste/ /gzhal yas phyag mtshan gdan la sogs/ /phra ba'i tshul de snga ma bzhin/ /mtshan gang ye shes rdo rje'i sku/ /rtag tu snying la
522b4(rgyud 'grel): gnas par bya/ /sen zlum nyi zla gang ba la/ /yungs 'bru 'bar ba'i hUM gnas pa'o/ /rang bzhin sems dpa' spyan drangs la/ /ye shes dam tshig la mnyam bstim/ /bdag nyid chen po mchod par bya/ /rtag tu nang gi sbyin sreg
522b5(rgyud 'grel): gtang/ /rang sngags 'phreng ba'i 'khor lo yis/ /shin tu gsal zhing bde la gnas/ /'gro nyal 'dug sdod spyod lam kun/ /theg chen sgom las nyams pa med/ /chos spyod rnam dgu rab spangs nas/ /phyogs cig spyod la
522b6(rgyud 'grel): gang gnas pa/ /rtse cig ting 'dzin nyid du bshad/ /mchod sogs rang gi don du min/ /yan lag ma nyams sngags bzlas shing/ /'dod pa kun la longs spyod bya/ /lus dang ngag sems brtan 'gyur na/ /byang chub rab 'byams
522b7(rgyud 'grel): thob par 'gyur/ /don ldan ma nyams dag byas shing/ /brtson 'grus cher bskyed myur bar 'grub/ /sngags sgom ma nyams phyag rgya gsal/ /cho ga yo byad gtsor ma gsungs/ /lha yi sku rnams gsal sgoms pas/ /bsod
523a1(rgyud 'grel): nams tshogs chen rdzogs par 'gyur/ /de nyid chu zla'i tshul snang bas/ /ye shes tshogs chen rdzogs par 'gyur/ /gang gis mthong mos mchod pa yis/ /thun mong sdig las grol bar 'gyur/ /'di
523a2(rgyud 'grel): ltar bsgoms shing bsgrubs byas na/ /'bras bu mngon du ma gyur yang/ /tshe rabs skye ba thams cad du/ /lha mi mtshan rdzogs sdug bsngal sel/ /bde gshegs 'byung dang skol mi 'gyur/ /thog ma sman par 'jug mi 'gyur/
523a3(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje'i rigs su nges pa yin/ /dpal gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las bsdus pa/ phra mo'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rim pa ste bzhi pa'o// //de nas spros pa'i rnal 'byor bshad/ /de nyid nus mthu ldan pa ni/ /
523a4(rgyud 'grel): lta spyod 'brel par bstan pa'i phyir/ /de nyid sku gsung thugs kyi bdag /de nyid thabs dang shes rab ldan/ /longs spyod sprul mchog rdzogs pa'i phyir/ /byang chub mchog tu nyi zla shar/ /de nyid bzhugs gnas yin par
523a5(rgyud 'grel): gsungs/ /gzugs sogs rang bzhin spros bcas pa/ /'od zer 'phro ba'i 'bru gsum ste/ /yang na 'od zer phyag rgya lnga'o/ /lnga po'i don spros bzhi bcu gnyis/ /gzhan yang dkyil 'khor bsam yas mchog /khro
523a6(rgyud 'grel): 'dul sna tshogs de bzhin te/ /ma bcos ngang gsig gnas pa la/ /ye shes lhag pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgom/ /yan lag bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis ldan/ /de nyid yan lag spros bdag ste/ /cig la'ang bzhi bcu
523a7(rgyud 'grel): gnyis su 'phro/ /de ltar gtso mchog ldan byas nas/ /rigs bzhi rgyal mchog de bzhin ste/ /bcu gnyis gnyis kyang der shes nas/ /drug gi phyag rgya 'od 'phro 'bar/ /blo yi shes rab che chung gis/ /rim pa bzhin
523b1(rgyud 'grel): du bsgom par bya/ /phyogs bcu ma lus gzhal yas khang/ /nyi zla bza' skar rgyan dang gang na/ /bde gshegs dkyil 'khor ma lus bsgom/ /nyi zla gza' skar dus cig tu/ /rgya mtsho dangs par 'char ba ltar/ /de ltar
523b2(rgyud 'grel): rtogs goms rigs mchog des/ /ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub/ /mkha' la 'phyo dang rigs 'dzin gnas/ /chu rgyun bzlog dang rlung mi 'gul/ /ri brag la sogs thogs med 'dzul/ /dug mtshon 'byung bas tshugs
523b3(rgyud 'grel): mi 'gyur/ /'byung ba lnga la dbang sgyur zhing/ /lha srin rnams la dbang byed 'gyur/ /nad sel longs spyod ngan song sbyong/ /dgug gtang bcings sgrol gso bsad dang/ /yungs 'brur stong gsum dgang bsdu dang/ /bdud
523b4(rgyud 'grel): dang gcan zan la sogs pas/ /tshugs par mi 'gyur bran bzhin 'gyur/ /lus ma spangs par rigs 'dzin sa/ /bsod nams ye shes longs spyod kyis/ /yi ge 'khor lo tshogs chen mnyes/ /thugs rjes
523b5(rgyud 'grel): sprul sku byin rlabs kyis/ /so sor thar pa'i lam yang ston/ /zhi ba phyogs cig shes bya sbyod/ /sa bcu mnyam par sbyong byed cing/ /bde gshegs 'khor las yang dag byed/ /las rnams ma lus kun byas nas/ /
523b6(rgyud 'grel): skye shi med pa'i g.yung drung thob/ /mtshan dang dpe byad kun gyis brgyan/ /mthar phyin bya ba med par 'grub/ /de ltar cho ga rdzogs byas shing/ /sngags kyi yan lag lnga rdzogs pa'i/ /rnal 'byor 'tshogs pa'i dkyil 'khor
523b7(rgyud 'grel): gyi/ /nges par legs pa'i dgos pa 'grub/ /gsang ba la sogs yo byad lnga/ /dgon pa'i gnas su bsdu byas te/ /rin chen spras pa'i gzhal yas khang/ /'khor khang phyi nang ldan par bya/ /bde ba chen po skyed pa'i
524a1(rgyud 'grel): phyir/ /yo byad rol mo bde ldan dgod/ /yan lag dbang po rnam shes dang/ /gzugs sgra dri ro reg la sogs/ /dkyil 'khor bshad bzhin gsal bar bya/ /gos sogs yo byad bzhi po las/ /
524a2(rgyud 'grel): sems phyir ma skyes ye shes brtag /chags med tshul gyis rol byas na/ /ngo mtshar 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor mnyes/ /rgyan dang bgo bas lus brgyan nas/ /yan lag dkyil 'khor gsal rdzogs pas/ /bro gar
524a3(rgyud 'grel): glu tshig la sogs pa/ /thams cad gzhung bzhin rdzogs par bya/ /bza' dang btung ba'i tshogs rnams kun/ /chags med tshul gyis bstim par bya/ /bdag mchod kun mnyes thams cad 'grangs/ /kun la
524a4(rgyud 'grel): phan pa'i sman yin te/ /rnal 'byor bdag nyid chen po yis/ /thams cad bza' zhing brgyan par bya'o/ /lha mo klu mo rigs ngan mo/ /dbye 'am yang na mi dbye bar/ /bde ba'i gnas su spyad par bya/ /bsnyen
524a5(rgyud 'grel): pa dang ni nye bsnyen pa/ /bsgrub pa dang ni bsgrub chen pos/ /rtsa gnas pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor du/ /bde ba thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gnas/ /bdag nyid chen po mchod pa yis/ /sangs rgyas sprin tshogs ma lus
524a6(rgyud 'grel): mnyes/ /srid gsum 'gro ba thams cad la/ /dga' ba chen pos khyab par 'gyur/ /rang bzhin gnas pa'i dkyil 'khor yang/ /skad cig gis ni gsal bar byed/ /lam dang sa gsum yongs rdzogs
524a7(rgyud 'grel): phyir/ /thabs chen theg pa theg pa'i mchog /mchog dang mchog phran la sogs pa/ /chags med thugs rjes dor mi bya/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba mngon rdzogs pa'i/ /dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i ting nge 'dzin/ /
524b1(rgyud 'grel): bro gar 'du 'phro'i phyag rgya yis/ /'dzul lam nam mkhar 'gro bar 'gyur/ /glu tshig sgra yi phyag rgya yis/ /chos kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /rgyan dang 'go ba'i phyag rgya yis/ /'bar ba'i rgyal po thub med 'grub/ /
524b2(rgyud 'grel): bza' dang btung ba'i phyag rgya yis/ /yid bzhin sku dang bdud rtsis grub/ /a li ka li'i phyag rgya yis/ /thams cad thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /rdo rje pad+mar ldan pa yis/ /rak+ta byang chub dus cig 'bar/ /
524b3(rgyud 'grel): gnyis med zung du 'bral 'gyur na/ /bde gshegs dkyil 'khor ma lus 'byung/ /'gro ba'i don rnams lhun gyis 'grub/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i spyod pa ni/ /thams cad kun la dbyer med spyod/ /bde ba'i ro mchog
524b4(rgyud 'grel): myong 'gyur te/ /de phyir de la chags pa med/ /spyod bzhin ma chags ye shes yin/ /bde ba'i mchog nyid bsod nams tshogs/ /de bas lam 'di tshogs su bshad/ /lta spyod ya char ma gyur bas/ /sngags
524b5(rgyud 'grel): 'chang rnams kyis rtag tu spyad/ /bla med theg pa'i nang nas ni/ /don dam du ni dbyer med la/ /kun rdzob du ni thams cad la/ /dag dang ma dag gnyis kar 'dzin/ /thabs kyi theg pa chen po ni/ /rnam par byad dang
524b6(rgyud 'grel): sdug bsngal dag /kun rdzob du yang dbyar med na/ /lta ba mtho dman de tsam mo/ /thabs kyi theg pa chen po ni/ /bla med theg pa las 'phags pas/ /don dam du ni skor bdun la/ /kun rdzob du ni mnyam rdzogs so/ /
524b7(rgyud 'grel): de phyir bden gnyis dbye ba med/ /thams cad dag ces bya ba yang/ /dngos po gsal dag ma yin te/ /snang spyod nyid na rnam par dag /gdod nas de bzhin goms byed pa/ /lam gzhan rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor yin/ /tshom
525a1(rgyud 'grel): bu'i grangs ni ma nges ste/ /dang por dam nos bzhin du bya/ /le lo bgyid snyoms med pa yis/ /the tshom med par bsgrub byas na/ /bdag nyid chen po lhun grub pa/ /zhag ni sum cu phrag drug gam/ /
525a2(rgyud 'grel): bcu gnyis bcu bzhi bcu drug gis/ /dbang bsgyur rigs kyis dam pa thob/ /de tshe bcu dang drug pa yi/ /brgya brgya dag tu snur zhing gnas/ /lus ma bor bar sangs rgyas sa/ /mthong ba'i chos la mya ngan 'das/ /sku
525a3(rgyud 'grel): lnga lhun gyis rdzogs par 'gyur// //dpal gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las bsdus pa/ snang ba rnam par 'byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rim pas ste/ lnga pa'o// //
525a4(rgyud 'grel): de nas mthar gnas bshad par bya/ /ye shes rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor la /rim pa lnga yis mnyam sbyor bas/ /rang 'byung sku ngam lhun gyis grub/ /ngo mtshar cho 'phrul rmad kyi chos/ /gzhan nas yod 'ongs ma
525a5(rgyud 'grel): yin te/ /thabs la brten pa'i shes rab nyid/ /de lta bu'i ngang du 'byung/ /rang rig nyid la gnas pa ni/ /sus kyang ma byas rang 'byung ste/ /rang 'byung chen po'i ye shes kyis/ /ma lus de bzhin nyid du sbyor//
525a6(rgyud 'grel): sbyor dang sbyor ba gnyis ka med/ /gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du thim/ /nyid la mtshan nyid yod ma yin/ /shes rab dbyings kyi de bzhin nyid/ /thabs kyi phyag rgya rang snang ba/ /tha snyad ma lus ye shes dngos/ /ye shes
525a7(rgyud 'grel): ???/ /ma bdag tshul gyis rang snang ba/ /so sor don bzhin ro myong yang/ /rang rig nyid las gzhan med phyir/ /bde ba chen po'i ye shes la/ /bzung ba'i mtshan ma yod ma yin/ /mi rtog tshul gyis
525b1(rgyud 'grel): longs spyod pa/ /ma chags pad+ma dag gi sku/ /'das dang ma 'das dngos po kun/ /rang rig ye shes byang chub sems/ /snang stong gnyis su ma yin pas/ /ye shes dkyil 'khor lhun gyis grub/ /rang rig bsam yas
525b2(rgyud 'grel): phyir yang snang/ /gdul bya'i dbang gis brjod mi yang/ /byang sems lhun grub rang snang bas/ /'phro 'du'i tshul du bdar bstan no/ /spros bral thugs kyi chos thams cad/ /snyoms par khyab pas rje nyid de/ /'bras bu
525b3(rgyud 'grel): lhun grub byin ldan pas/ /mtsho yi rlabs tshul kun tu snang/ /bsam byas lhun gyis grub pa'i phyir/ /zhing khams rnams dang 'gro kun la/ /rdo rje 'dzin nas rtsi shing tshogs/ /so sor mthun pa'i sku snang yang/ /stong
525b4(rgyud 'grel): nyid dngos dang bya byed med/ /chu zla'i tshul du kun snang yang/ /byin rlabs khyab cing 'gro 'ong med/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa'i lus nyid ni/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi spyi gzugs ste/ /snang stong gnyis su ma yin zhing/ /grangs dang che
525b5(rgyud 'grel): chung mdza' dbus kyang/ /'di la sus kyang dmigs mi nus/ /nam mkha' lta bur mdza' bral ba/ /'od zer phyag rgya gdan rdzogs pa/ /ldan dang bral bas gnyis ka min/ /zhi khro la sogs sku gnyis tshogs/ /lhun
525b6(rgyud 'grel): gyis grub pas cir yang snang/ /rim pa 'am rim pa med tshul ni/ /gdul bya'i bsam pas phye ba yin/ /dus gsum du yang mi 'gyur phyir/ /rtag chen rdo rje'i sku zhes gsungs/ /bden pa gnyis kyi mdza' las 'das/ /
525b7(rgyud 'grel): dngos kun bdag phyir ming tshig tsam/ /thams cad tshig gi sgra ltar gnas/ /de nyid ma skyes sems yin phyir/ /rang bzhin brjod med don yin kyang/ /sgra rnams sems su lhun rdzogs phyir/ /gsung cig tshig tu ma brjod kyang//
526a1(rgyud 'grel): thar dang mthar thams cad la/ /ji ltar 'dod bzhin gsal bar snang/ /de phyir brjod nyid brjod pa med/ /gdul bya ma lus thams cad kun/ /de bzhin nyid las mi zhan phyir/ /gang zhig de nyid gyur pa
526a2(rgyud 'grel): yis/ /dus gsum sdug bsngal ma 'dres pas/ /log rtog rgyun tsam snang ba yang/ /rang snang tshul gyis rtog med par/ /sgyu ma'i tshul du gsal bar gsungs/ /de bas 'das dang ma 'das chos/ /rang rig byang sems
526a3(rgyud 'grel): ngo bo'i phyir/ /snga phyi cung zad yong min pas/ /mtshan nyid ma 'dres yongs rdzogs par/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi sngon nas mkhyen/ /so sor snang ba thams cad kyang/ /rang rig rgyal por yang dag 'du/ /rang rig de nyid thams
526a4(rgyud 'grel): cad yin/ /spyod yul rang rig ye shes phyir/ /rang snang ye shes ngo bos stong/ /mdza' rnams bral ba'i rang rig la/ /ma skyes don snang me long bzhin/ /thams cad bdag tu gyur pa'i phyir/ /tha snyad gnyis ka dang gis
526a5(rgyud 'grel): stong/ /mtshan nyid bsam yas snang ba yang/ /sems phyir so sor dmigs pa med/ /rang bzhin rnam dag ye shes ya/ /bya byed dmigs par yong mi 'gyur/ /gzung 'dzin bral ba'i ye shes ni/ /rtsa ba lnga zhes
526a6(rgyud 'grel): brjod mod kyang/ /brjod pa'i mtshan nyid yong med de/ /mtshan nyid med par so sor snang/ /de nyid thams cad mkhyen pa nyid/ /mtshan nyid gnyis med dmigs mi 'gyur/ /gnas pa med par kun tu khyab/ /
526a7(rgyud 'grel): phyogs bcu snang grags bsam yas pa/ /rang rig nyid las mi zhan phyir/ /yon tan rin chen bkod pa dang/ /ye shes brgyan gyis sprang ba yi/ /zhing gi yon tan bsam mi khyab/ /phyogs bcu dus bzhi zhing
526b1(rgyud 'grel): sbyor bas/ /dog yangs tshad kyang dpag tu med/ /sangs rgyas spyi gtsug lta bu'i mtshan/ /ye shes rgyu las grub pa'i phyir/ /'di zhes cig ces brjod du med/ /zag med bsod nams lhun grub pas/ /ji ltar bltas pa de ltar snang/
526b2(rgyud 'grel): gdos pa can gyi chos min zhing/ /thams cad rang rig dbang bsgyur pas/ /stong bar bya 'am mi stong bya/ /thams cad dbyer med dang nyid pas/ /rtog pa med las cir yang snang/ /gzhan gyis sprog du med pa yi/ /bo de'i skor ni
526b3(rgyud 'grel): rin po che/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis/ /bya byed med par rnam bzhi mdzad/ /sgyu ma'i tshul du rol mdzad kyang/ /bya ba byed dang dmigs su med/ /'das dang ma 'das bsam yas pa/ /ma lus sems phyir
526b4(rgyud 'grel): dmigs su med/ /gzung 'dzin bral ba'i ye shes ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas/ /gnas dang ngo bo dbyer med de/ /de nyid rig pa rang snang ba/ /sna tshogs mtshan nyid rnam par rol/ /thams cad mkhyen nyid
526b5(rgyud 'grel): bsam yas kyang/ /rang rig nyid du yang dag 'dus/ /de nyid thabs chen ma 'dres snang/ /spyod yul 'phrog med spyod mi lang/ /gnyis med thugs rje'i dbang gis na/ /'gro drug dus gnas snyoms par zhugs/ /rang
526b6(rgyud 'grel): rig nyid las mi zhan phyir/ /dus bzhi mnyam pa nyid du gsungs/ /nges sogs mtshan nyid yon tan grags/ /stong gsum cig dang thams cad kyi/ /mgo lus kha lce cig rdzogs pas/ /bskal pa mdza' klas par brjod
526b7(rgyud 'grel): kyang/ /de dag mthar thug yong mi 'gyur/ /mtshan nyid rmongs la mdor bsdus pa/ /bsgrub bya ma lus mngon gyur pas/ /bsam bya bslab pa kun las grol/ /thams cad ma spangs bdag nyid phyir/ /gang yang 'du
527a1(rgyud 'grel): shes thams cad spangs/ /gnyis med thugs rje chen po yis/ /mdzad pa gang yang 'gog pa med/ /sku gsung phyag rgya cir snang yang/ /rang bzhin rdzogs phyir 'gro 'ong med/ /yum sogs bde ba kun ldan yang/ /rang
527a2(rgyud 'grel): gi ngo bo mi dmigs pas/ /mdza' rnams kun las grol ba yin/ /khams gsum bdag nyid chen po'i phyir/ /sems can kun gyis sems la son/ /sems sogs zhen mthas ma reg pas/ /cig pu rab tu che ba'i lha/ /de bzhin
527a3(rgyud 'grel): nyid dang dbyer med phyir/ /'di la spyod yul yod ma yin// //dpal gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las bsdus pa/ /bsam yas lhun gyis grub pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rim pa ste drug pa'o// //
527a4(rgyud 'grel): yongs rdzogs rgya che mtshan nyid rtogs dka' rlabs ldan rang rgyud rgya mtsho yi/ /mtshan nyid rjes mthun gnyis bral yig gsum gnyis gab sbas te ra chod don/ /snying rjes goms shugs mthong nyams 'brel pa dgos don dang por phreng ba gsal
527a5(rgyud 'grel): byas pas/ /rjes 'jug la sogs gnyis bcings ma lus de nyid shes grol goms thar shog /rim pa drug pa/ slob dpon sgeg pa rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so// //dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
527a6(rgyud 'grel): gzhi lam 'bras bur bcas pa'i chos/ /dris lam dam bca' mthar dbyung ba/ /lung dang man ngag rigs sgo nas/ /rtogs par bya phyir rnam bshad bya/ /dang po rnam pa gnyis bstan te/ /ngo bo'i gzhi dang brtags pa'i gzhi/ /
527a7(rgyud 'grel): gzhi yi ngo bo mtshan nyid dang/ /nges tshig dpe yi rnam pa dang/ /snang tshul gnyer gyis rtogs par bya/ /ngo bo thams cad sems nyid de/ /gser gyi dpe bzhin gnyis su med/ /mtshan nyid mdza' rnams kun bral bas/ /ci
527b1(rgyud 'grel): yang bzung du med pa'o/ /tha snyad gnyis kyi chos rnams kun/ /ma lus 'byung phyir gzhi zhes bya/ /nam mkha' rgya mtsho rin chen sogs/ /nye ba'i dpe yis mtshon pa'o/ /rgyu rkyen bral ba'i skad cig ma/ /rang snang nyid du byung ba'o/ /lung
527b2(rgyud 'grel): dang man ngag gnyer dag gis/ /blo gting yid ches gyur par bya/ /brtags gzhi gnyis su bstan pa'i chos/ /'khor dang mya ngan 'das par gsungs/ /'khor ba'i rgyu rkyen ngo bo dang/ /dpe dang mtshan nyid byed po dang/ /'khor
527b3(rgyud 'grel): tshul nyes pa'i dus rnams su/ /nges par bstan phyir mgon pos bshad/ /'khor ba'i 'byung rgyu rnam pa bzhi/ /rgyud mtshungs lhan cig nyer len pa/ /bder gshegs snying po ma rig dang/ /rnam smin bag chags nyon mongs pa'o/ /
527b4(rgyud 'grel): rkyen gnyis bstan pa'i las gsum du/ /kun brtags ma rig nyon mongs lnga/ /ngo bo snod bcud 'jig rten gyi/ /snang dang zhen pa'i chos rnams so/ /zo cha tswa sogs me dpe bzhin/ /kun tu 'khor zhing mched pa'o/ /
527b5(rgyud 'grel): 'jig dang chags dang stongs dang gnas/ /rkye rga na 'chi bzhi ldan pas/ /mtshan nyid ther zug ma yin pa'o/ /rgyun dang bcas pa'i skad cig ma/ /las kyi byed par brjod pa'o/ /rten 'brel bcu gnyis tshul dag tu/ /
527b6(rgyud 'grel): phyi nang gnyis kar 'khor ba'o/ /'phags lam bral nas sdug bsngal myong/ /nyes pa rnam pa gnyis su gsungs/ /thog ma tha ma med dus nas/ /yang dag don ma rtogs pas nyams/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i mtshan nyid dang//
527b7(rgyud 'grel): nges tshig rnam grangs gang la snang/ /mtshon pa ma grub tshul don bstan/ /ngo bo med bzhin kun snang bas/ /cig dang du ma las grol te/ /mtshan brjod mdza' rnams kun bral ba'o/ /skye 'jig chos rnams bral ba'o/ /
528a1(rgyud 'grel): skye 'jig chos rnams bral 'gyur bas/ /mya ngan 'das par de brjod do/ /rnam grangs gnyis su brjod pa ste/ /theg pa mtho dman bye brag gis/ /phyogs gcig pa dang mi gnas pa'i/ /mya ngan
528a2(rgyud 'grel): 'das par de bstan pa'o/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i ngo bo nyid/ /de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba dang/ /de yi sprul ba rgya chen nyid/ /gdul bya 'khrul la snang ba'o/ /chu bo rgal ba'i gru bzhin du/ /'khor ba'i chu ngo rnam
528a3(rgyud 'grel): par rgal/ /brtson ra thar pa ji bzhin du/ /'ching ba'i mdud pa las grol ba'o/ /gzhi po sems nyid ma grub pas/ /sprul snang chos kun ma nges te/ /cir yang brjod du med pa'o/ /dbu ma rnam pa gnyis
528a4(rgyud 'grel): yin te/ /grol lam thabs su rnam par bstan/ /dbu ma'i dang po ngo bo dang/ /rkyen dang rnam grangs mtshon dpe dang/ /bslab tshul rim pa bstan pa dang/ /gong 'og dgos pa mthar phyin spyod/ /ngo bo shes rab rnam
528a5(rgyud 'grel): gsum gyis/ /sems bzhi skyes par bstan pa yin/ /tshig dang yi ge rkyen nyid las/ /brten dang rtog par byed pa yin/ /mtshan mar bsgom pa'i rim pa yang/ /de bzhin nyid du bsgom pa yi/ /bye brag
528a6(rgyud 'grel): rnam pa gnyis su gsungs/ /khron pa sgron ma'i dpe bzhin du/ /grol lam sgo nas rtogs sgom bya/ /thun mong lam lngar bslab pa dang/ /khyad la so so'i lam bzhin bslang/ /sngon du goms par gang byas pa/ /
528a7(rgyud 'grel): gong ma gsal bar 'gyad phyir ro/ /thun mong khyad par gnas skabs lam/ /ting 'dzin drod tshad nyams ldan na/ /lam mthar phyin pa zhes su bshad/ /ting 'dzin khyad par gyur pa'i phyir/ /rjes mthun spyod pa'i
528b1(rgyud 'grel): gzhung bzhin spyad/ /dbu ma gnyis pa bstan pa ni/ /rnam grangs gdam ngag thabs nyid de/ /rtogs tshul rgyu rkyen ldan pa yis/ /shugs kyi snang tshul gser 'gyur bzhin/ /gdam ngag steng dang 'og gi sgo/ /thig le rkyang par bcas pa
528b2(rgyud 'grel): nyid/ /thabs rnams sngon du goms byas pa/ /de bzhin nyid du 'gyur byed pa/ /ting 'dzin khyad par dbang gi rgyu/ /thabs kyi rgyu rkyen ngo bo dang/ /nges tshig bskur pa'i rim pa dang/ /mtshon dpe dgos pa bstan pa'o/ /
528b3(rgyud 'grel): khyad par rgyu rkyen lngar bshad de/ /bla ma'i dgongs dang blung gi dus/ /sbyor ba'i thabs dang bsod nams las/ /phyag rgya yon tan ldan gyur pas/ /dngos po lhan cig skyes pas myong/ /de phyir thabs su bstan pa yin/ /
528b4(rgyud 'grel): ngo bo nus phan gsang ba'i chos/ /shes rab ye shes bde chen po/ /'ching ba'i las rnams spyad pa yis/ /'gro bar 'gyur phyir ro ming du brjod/ /dad dang brtson 'grus gsum dang ldan/ /brtul shugs gsum la spyod pas
528b5(rgyud 'grel): go rim tshul du 'tsham par sbyin/ /rgyal po'i phru gu dug 'gyur bzhin/ /dbang thabs rnam gnyis nyams len bya/ /rim pa dbang gis bsgrong phyir dang/ /thun mong lam gyi khyad par gyis/ /sgo 'byed thob phyir bstan pa yin
528b6(rgyud 'grel): tha ma'i don la ngo bo dang/ /mtshan nyid yon tan bstan pa dang/ /mdzad spyod thugs rje'i snang tshul dang/ /gdul bya gzigs tshul don rnams kyis/ /'bras bu don bzhin rtogs par bya/ /dang po sku gsung thugs rnams
528b7(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /yon tan 'phrin las lngar bsdus pa'o/ /mtshan nyid bzhi dang ldan pa'i phyir/ /ma lus cig min tha dad min/ /'bras bu yon tan lhun grub pas/ /yid bzhin nor ltar snang ba'o/ /'phrin las rnam bzhi
529a1(rgyud 'grel): mdzad spyod kyis/ /bya ba med par don rnams rdzogs/ /thugs rje chen po'i gdul bya la/ /rtag rgyun rang bzhin shugs gsol dang/ /yul dang phrad pas 'byung bar snang/ /nyid las mi
529a2(rgyud 'grel): zhan don rnams kyis/ /me lor tshul du gzigs par 'gyur/ /bzhi lam 'bras shes bya ba rnams/ /bla ma mkhas nyams ldan pa la/ /dri ba drug gi tshul nyid las/ /rnam gsum tshul gyis zhu bar bya/ /
529a3(rgyud 'grel): bla ma mkhas ldan de nyid kyis/ /bu rnams mi shes mdud dgrol phyir/ /rnam gsum lan gdab gzhung nyid la/ /'go gcig rnam dbye'i dri tshul gyis/ /lan gdab yid ches gyur par bya/ /gal te gzhung las
529a4(rgyud 'grel): brtsod 'gyur na/ /dam bcas sgrub ste don nyid ni/ /dpe don gtan tshigs gsum ldan pas/ /shes bya de nyid mthar phyin bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i dgongs brgyud pa/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i don nyid las/ /rim
529a5(rgyud 'grel): gsum don nyid bsdus pa yis/ /ma lus mngon par sangs rgyas shog /de lta'i dge rtsa ci mchis pa/ /bdag gi rgyud la yongs smin te/ /bla med byang chub thob 'gyur nas/ /mdza' yas sems can 'dren par
529a6(rgyud 'grel): shog /bdag blo mun par 'phags pa yi/ /dgongs pa nyi ma shar ba yi/ /nyams dang lung la brten pa yi/ /brtsams nongs 'phags la bzod par gsol/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i man ngag rim pa gsum
529a7(rgyud 'grel): pa rdzogs so// //bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems rdo rje kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dad pa'i lha la phyag 'tshal nas/ /thams cad mkhyen nyid mngon dad pa'i/ /rnal 'byor chen
529b1(rgyud 'grel): po rnams don phyir/ /sems bskyed cho ga bshad par bya/ /brtsom pa'i dang po med pas na/ /dpag tu med pa'i sgo spyod kyang/ /sa bon rgya mtsho 'di med pas/ /mthar phyin 'bras bu mi snang ste/ /de nyid sdug bsngal sa bon 'gyur/ /de
529b2(rgyud 'grel): bas gzhi 'di goms par byos// //de la sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yon tan/ /'byung khungs kyi rtsa bar nges pa ni sems yin te/ /gzhung las/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi yang
529b3(rgyud 'grel): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu ni byang chub kyi sems so/ /rtsa ba ni snying rje chen po las byung ba'o/ /thabs kyi mthar phyin pa'o ces 'byung ba dang/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub kyi sems ni sangs rgyas kyi chos byang chub sems kyi sa bon lta bu'o/ /zhes pa
529b4(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /chos rnams kun gyi yo byad ni/ /snying rje byang chub sems yin te/ /yo byad de dang ma ldan na/ /don rnams grub par mi 'gyur ro/ /tshad med snying rje bskyed pa dang/ /byang chub sems la dga' ba ni/ /sngon du 'gro ba'i
529b5(rgyud 'grel): mchog yin te/ /bsgrub pa pos ni nan tan bya/ /rtsa ba byang chub sems nyid rtogs/ /thabs kyi pha rol phyin par spyod/ /snying rjes chud ma zos par zung/ /gdon mi za bar 'grub ces gsungs/ /zhes pa la sogs pa rgyas
529b6(rgyud 'grel): par gsungs so// //de dag gi khyad par ni/ /dper na sa chen po ni sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho ba ste/ 'gyur ba med cing lan du 'phan 'dogs pa la re ba med do/ /de bzhin du sems dang po skyed pa
529b7(rgyud 'grel): yang/ /snying po byang chub la thug gi bar du/ sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho ba ste /'gyur ba med cing lan du phan 'dogs pa la re ba med pa'o/ /dper na/ rdo rje rin po che chag kyang gser gyi rgyan khyad par can thams cad zil
530a1(rgyud 'grel): gyis gnon pa ste/ rdo rje rin po che'i ming yang mi dor la/ /dbul ba thams cad kyang bzlog ge /de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du skyed pa'i sems rin po che bsgrub pa dang ma ldan yang/ nyan
530a2(rgyud 'grel): thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad zil gyis gnon te/ byang chub sems dpa' i ming yang mi 'dor la/ /'khor ba'i 'bul ba las kyang bzlog go /dper na seng ge'i phru gu'i dri ma nam pa'i rdzi phyogs na gnas pa'i gcan zan
530a3(rgyud 'grel): thams cad kyang 'bros par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du sems bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang du phyin pa'i sa phyogs na gnas pa'i log par spyod pa'i sems can thams cad skrag par 'gyur ro/ /gnas 'dir bskyed
530a4(rgyud 'grel): pa rtsam gyis 'jig rten gsum po bla mar bcas pa'o/ /mchod nas nyan thos bdud kyi sde rnams zil gyis gnon zhes gsungs so/ /thabs chen byang chub sems dpa' i gsang ba'i spyod pa'ang 'di nyid de/ 'di med rgyal
530a5(rgyud 'grel): ba rnam par snang mdzad theg pa gsum ston mi srid do/ /skad cig tsam yang dad pa'i shugs skyed de yang myur du 'jam dpal gzhon nur 'gyur/ /dkyil 'khor gsang bar zhugs shing theg chen dam tshig mchog kyang
530a6(rgyud 'grel): srung ba yin/ /tshul khrims sdom pa kun kyang bsrungs shing sbyin gnas dam par rab tu bsngags/ /gang dag 'dir ni mngon spyod la/ /dga' ba'i yid kyis phyogs byed pa/ /de ni dngos dang 'dra ba ste/ /'bras
530a7(rgyud 'grel): bu la yang mtho dman med/ /byang chub sems kyi bsod nams gang/ /de la gal te gzugs yod na/ /nam mkha' i khams ni kun gang ste/ /de ni de las lhag par 'gyur/ /ces pa la sogs pa rgyas par
530b1(rgyud 'grel): gsungs so// //de la sems bskyed mdor bstan ste/ /dngos po gnyis dang rim pa bzhi/ /gzhi dang dbang po yo byad dang/ /chog rims sems bskyed sdom pa'i dngos/ /sgo gsum las kyis spyod pa
530b2(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /shes bzhin bshags pa rnam/ bcu gcig las kyi gtso bor gang len pa/ /de ni ldog par ma gsungs te/ /cung zad tsam gyi las rnam kyang/ /rgya mtsho bzhin du mi skam zhing/ /'bras bu bdag gzhan gnyis
530b3(rgyud 'grel): la snang/ /de bas nan tan snying pos gyis/ //kun rdzob sems ni snying rje'i mchog /sdug bsngal bcu gcig yul byas te/ /gdung bas bskyab pa'i sems bcas pas/ /mgon skyob
530b4(rgyud 'grel): bdag por yid la byed/ /bdag bde rje dang don 'dor ba/ /de ni ldog pa ma gsungs so/ /'khor los dpung gi tshogs 'dren bzhin/ /de ni sangs rgyas chos rnams 'dren/ /sa dang rgya mtsho nor bu bzhin/ /yon tan don
530b5(rgyud 'grel): dang snang ba rnams/ /snying rje chen po nyid las 'byung/ /me long chu bzhin bsgrib byas pa/ /dngos grub gags su bral gsungs so/ /bu dang zhe 'gras spyod pa yis/ /byang chub sems dpa' i ming med na/ /sangs rgyas mkhas
530b6(rgyud 'grel): ches rnal 'byor gyi// //don dam nges par rab bshad pa/ /ma g.yos kun gzhi'i ngang du bshad/ /rang bzhin snang ba'i gser tshul ltar/ /gnyis su med par rgyal bas bshad/ /dri dang ga pur
530b7(rgyud 'grel): nus pa bzhin/ /mtshan ma med par sems mi dmigs/ /sems nyid gang yin chos nyid de/ /chos nyid kyang ni de bzhin no/ /chos sems gnyis med ldan gyur pas/ /bla med byang chub chen por bshad/ /nam mkha' 
531a1(rgyud 'grel): gar khyab chos kyis khyab/ /chos nyid gar khab sems yin pas/ /phyi nang gnyis med sems su gsal/ /chos dang rgyun dran mngon 'gyur bar/ /yid la byed pa'i sems dag gis/ /don 'di
531a2(rgyud 'grel): yongs su rdzogs par brjod// //g.yo zhing smon par byed pa ni/ /rang bzhin mtshungs par ldan pa dang/ /zhar 'byung lhan cig byed pa dang/ /yon tan mthong thos rjes 'jug dang/ /byin
531a3(rgyud 'grel): rlabs shugs kyis 'brel pa bzhi/ /rkyen gyi rnam pa 'dus pa yin/ /skad cig cung zad sa bon las/ /btsa' me bzhin du skye bar gsungs/ /lhag par 'phel ba'i gang zag gis/ /snying rje skye dang ltar ldan pas/ /
531a4(rgyud 'grel): don gnyis rgyu ru 'di shes nas/ /goms par mang du byas pa yis/ /zla ba yar gyi ngo bzhin du/ /je che je mang mngon 'phel bar/ /dam bcas 'jug par bya ba yin/ /lhag pa'i bsam pa mngon byas te/ /'gyur ba
531a5(rgyud 'grel): med par gnas par bya'o/ /dngos gzhi gnyis la rab brtan pa/ /'jug pa'i skyes bur de bshad do/ /phyis 'byung sdom pa'i dngos po la/ /rgyun dang dum bur gang gnas pa/ /gnas pa'i sems su rab tu brtan/ /de nyams
531a6(rgyud 'grel): gsum du shes par bya/ /gnas pa mang po'i mthu rdzogs pas/ /mngon byas rkyen gyis mi 'phrogs shing/ /bsgrub bya rkyen gyis mthar phyin pa/ /klong yangs nam mkha' i dkyil 'khor la/ /sprin med nyi ma 'bum gyis
531a7(rgyud 'grel): brdal/ /mi skye mi 'gag ngo bo las/ /ji ltar bltas dgu'i der snang bas/ /don gnyis lhun grub rtog bral ba/ /mthar rdzogs sems su rgyal bas gsungs/ /bsngo gzhi sgrib bral nyid du bstan/ /yul nyid lnga
531b1(rgyud 'grel): yi dbang po ni/ /rim pa gsum gyi mtshan nyid can/ /snying rje chen po brlan ldan pas/ /khe grags 'dod pa'i sems gsum spangs/ /shes bya bar ma kun mkhyen pas/ /ma 'dres don gyi tha snyad rnams/ /nad dang sman gyi
531b2(rgyud 'grel): rim bzhin byed/ /ston pa'i mchog tu 'di gsungs pas/ /dang po'i rim la gnas pa'i mis/ /brtson 'grus dga' ba'i las rnams gyis/ /'du shes ston par bzhag ste blang/ /cung zad 'gal ba'i sems med par/ /rtag par gdung
531b3(rgyud 'grel): bas rmongs byed pa/ /de 'dra bral bas ma gsungs so// //dpang 'gyur rdo rje dam can rnams/ /byin rlabs gnyan pa'i sems dag gis/ /las kyi stongs su 'gyur ba'i phyir/ /zhing khams byed pa'i rdul 'das
531b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i/ /sangs rgyas 'khor bcas bzhugs par bya/ /de dag rtag tu mngon bsam ste/ /shes bzhin rang gi sdom pa bsngo/ /smon lam dbang gis gzigs par 'gyur/ /maN+Dal bdud rtsi'i dris byugs pa/ /tsan dan bdud rtsi'i
531b5(rgyud 'grel): chus sbyangs pa/ /dri zhim chas kyis rab brgyan ste/ /rin chen 'byor bas lag thogs bya/ /sna tshogs yol ba'i phyi rol 'dug /kha sbyar ban d+ha'i bum chu sbyin/ /dril bus rdo rje'i ming brtags bya/ /sangs rgyas 'khor bcas gzugs
531b6(rgyud 'grel): brnyan dgram/ /sna tshogs mchod pa rgyas pa dag /'khor gsum dag pa'i sems kyis dbul/ /khar gsil rol mo rgyas par sbyin/ /'byung po kun gyi gtor ma dang/ /'gro drug sbyin pa chen po'i ngang/ /dug gsum spangs
531b7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sems kyis gtang/ /sems skyed mtshon pa'i rdo rje yang/ /rtag tu bcang bar bya ba yin/ /dang po 'das dang 'jug 'dod dang/ /g.yo bar mkhan pos gsol btab pas/ /mkhan pos gsol ba btab nas ni/ /
532a1(rgyud 'grel): dad pa'i sems la gnas su gzhug /dgos pa'i yo byad rang 'byor nas/ /dge ba'i bar chad bzlog pa'i phyir/ /rdo rje mi shigs gur cing bya/ /bum chu gsum po byin brlab phyir/ /bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i dran pa yis/ /
532a2(rgyud 'grel): bgegs bskrad pa yi rang bzhin du/ /'bru lngas ye shes chu rgyun dgug /ma lus 'dus pa'i khro bzhin tshogs/ /bskyed dang spyan drangs mchod tshogs sbyar/ /sngags bzlos gsol btab bu byin brlab/ /khrus byas dri zhim
532a3(rgyud 'grel): rgyan ldan bu/ /yol phyir phyag byas thal sbyar te/ /dpal rdo rje 'dzin pa'i bdag /'khor ba 'don pa'i ded dpon che/ /sdug bsngal chu bo rgyun bzlog dang/ /don gnyis bdag gis mngon byas pa'i/ /thabs kyi las mdza' 
532a4(rgyud 'grel): gang lags pa/ /rim pa yang dag bstan pa'i phyir/ /thugs rje nye bar skyed mdzad de/ /de ring gnang ba mdzad par rigs/ /ma lus phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i/ /sngon gyi dbang po ji snyed pa'i/ /rgyas par spyan drangs mchod par bya/ /
532a5(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas lta ba'i mos byas pas/ /lag bzung nang du gnas par bya/ /thal sbyar zhing la lus dbul bya/ /bi shud+d+he dang sbyor sngags kyis/ /tsan dan bdud rtsi chu sbyar te/ /dad pa'i lhar skyes byin gyis brlab/ /rin chen
532a6(rgyud 'grel): bsnyen pas gsol btab pas/ /rgyal ba sras dang bcas rnams kyis/ /thugs rje nye bar bskyed mdzad de/ /dam tshig dam cas rim pa bzhin/ /bdag la byin gyis brlabs par rigs/ /rab tu gtor ste 'brel pa brtag/
532a7(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje'i ming yang sbyin par bya/ /ding khyod sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor gyis/ /rim par rab zhugs nges pa yin/ /dam tshig 'dod pa'i sems skyed cing/ /gzhan don rab dga' i sems ldan pas/ /bshags pa'i
532b1(rgyud 'grel): mchog gis rab shogs ste/ /dag pa'i sems kyis brlab par gyis/ /'dab brgyad pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor la/ /brtan nas sprad cing mos byed de/ /mdza' rnams bral ba'i byang chub sems/ /mi rtog mi gnas nam mkha' nyid/ /chos
532b2(rgyud 'grel): rnams de 'drar mos pa dang/ /mthong sgom lam la gnas pa dang/ /mthar phyin thams cad mnyam sbyor bas/ /dam bcas yid kyis bstan par bya/ /rgyun yang de bzhin bstan par gsungs/ /de yi yon tan dpe rnams kyi/ /
532b3(rgyud 'grel): nges par mtshon pa bzhi ru bshad/ /brtan pa'i byang chub sems bskyed do/ /ma rig bzhi dang bcas pa'i sems/ /skad cig rgyun gyi las nyon mongs/ /mthun par snang ba'i bltos pa'i chos/ /rmi lam bzhin du nyams thag rnams/
532b4(rgyud 'grel): dran pa'i snying rje gdung sems kyis/ /khud pa'i zhing du mngon byas pa/ /sdug bsngal rgya mtsho bzlog pa'i phyir/ /cho 'phrul las dang sku don rnams/ /rgyal bas grangs mdza' i mi rtogs so/ /mngon 'dod bya ba'i mos pa dag
532b5(rgyud 'grel): brtan par bskyed cing rgyun gnas pa/ /sems kyis sngon bzhin gnas par bya/ /thal sbyar gus pa'i lus gnas ste/ /dang por gsol pa'i tshig bshad bzhi/ /sngon du btang nas gtam par bya/ /dkyil 'khor mchod pa sbyin
532b6(rgyud 'grel): sreg bsogs/ /gzhan don grangs ma ji snyed pa/ /tshe 'di gnas tsam mthar thug par/ /nam yang rgyun chad ma gyur cig /thun mong thabs kyis spyod drug dang/ /mi mthun 'dul ba'i spyod pa rnams/ /de bzhin bstan par
532b7(rgyud 'grel): bsgrub pa yis/ /'gro ba mi 'dul med par shog /dam bcas rim pa'i sdom pa rnams/ /tshigs bshad bzhin du sems kyis bsgrub/ /don gnyis 'gyur ba'i lus spyod dag /lus kyi le lo spangs pas byas/ /
533a1(rgyud 'grel): don med spyod pa sems kyis gnan/ /snying po bshad dang phan pa'i gtam/ /ma gtogs pa'i rgyun bcad de/ /le lo spangs pas gsum bsgrub bya/ /ca co nam yang ma yin pa/ /sangs
533a2(rgyud 'grel): rgyas chos su de bshad do/ /bsam gtan shes rab rab ma dang/ /snying rje sdom pa bsnges? pa'i sems/ /g.yeng dang bying rmugs rnam spangs pas/ /bsam bya brtag par gang dran pa/ /sangs rgyas chos bzhir
533a3(rgyud 'grel): 'di bshad do/ /sgo gsum chung bar mos grub pas/ /rtag du rang nyams smod byed pa/ /dam tshig sdom pa'i gzhir shes bya/ /sangs rgyas sku gsung thugs thob 'gyur/ /rgyas par yon tan brjod mi
533a4(rgyud 'grel): lang// //khud pa'i zhing du gyur rnams la/ /sdug bsngal yin yang mthar phan spyad/ /stod cing mtho sems rab spangs pas/ /'khrul pa ji snyed brjod mi lang/ /'di 'dra ba yang snod ma
533a5(rgyud 'grel): smra/ /rgan po bla ma'i 'du shes byed/ /phrag dog can la sems ngan med/ /dpag tshad du ma'i mthar gnas bya/ /man ngag zang zing lan spangs sbyin/ /'gron gnyer rgos med dbang du bya/ /don yod sdig
533a6(rgyud 'grel): pa dang du blang/ /ma bsngos 'tsho ba rtag tu spang/ /grags dang 'gran nor dge ba dor/ /nyams la snying rje gtang snyoms spang/ /don 'gyur phyir na bdag dge spang/ /de ni ldog par ma gsungs so/ /'dzin
533a7(rgyud 'grel): spangs pa'i sbyin pa bzhi/ /'chang pas sbyin pa bzlog par bya/ /lus 'dod dum bu'i sems dag gis/ /sprul sku thob phyir sbyin par bya/ /nyam sod log lta sun dbyung phyir/ /skal pa'i sbyin pas bzlog par bya//
533b1(rgyud 'grel): bsam gtan ro mchog rlung gnas kyang/ /theg dman spyod pa dor ba med/ /'dod pa'i sems kyis grong mi gnyer/ /bzlog pa'i sems kyis grong rgyu ba/ /chos kyi skyes kyis 'gro bar bya'o// //nad dang sdug
533b2(rgyud 'grel): bsngal can g.yos byed/ /tshul khrims bsam spyod lhur mi 'dzin/ /mnyes dang bral na dag par gsungs/ /brtsod pa'i rtsa ba sems dran dang/ /rnam smin dran par bzlog par bya/ /khong khro nyes chen bral 'gyur ba/ /'di
533b3(rgyud 'grel): ldan byang chub sems dpa' med/ /chos spyod bcu la dam bcas nas/ /thun mong zhen pa bzlog par bya/ /sdug bsngal bsam pa nam mi 'dor/ /snod ma bltas la sems mi brtan/ /de la don 'gyur spang mi bya/ /phan
533b4(rgyud 'grel): byed rnams la lan mi glan/ /mya ngan ci yang bsang bar bya/ /sgro skur spangs te yon tan brjod/ /ngan byed mthong ba med smon dang/ /sngos ngan mthong ba de bzhin ste/ /smon lam bdag gi zhing du btab/ /bzang por
533b5(rgyud 'grel): spyod dang dngos po bzang/ /mchod rdzas mthong ba ji snyed pa/ /bdag zhing kun gyis spyod par smon/ /gdug pa sangs rgyas zhing gnas dang/ /'gro ba sprul pas don byed dang/ /byin pa bsam gtan bden pa rnams
533b6(rgyud 'grel): der/ /bsam gyis chos kyi bsam pa dang/ /'greng ba sems can don bstan dang/ /dpa' bo bdud bzhi g.yul 'joms dang/ /thams cad spyod bzhin mgos dang/ /srog gcod khro bo'i phrin las dang/ /'dod
533b7(rgyud 'grel): chags mnyam par sbyor ba dang/ /rku byed dngos grub len pa dang/ /ri bo rtog pas mi phrogs dang/ /chu rgyun chos spyod rgyun ldan dang/ /'bras bu sku dang ye shes dang/ /me tog rnam grol phung po dang/ /yul khams
534a1(rgyud 'grel): rnam dag 'jig rten dang/ /kha zas ting 'dzin ro mchog dang/ /skom dang snying rje chu 'thung ba sogs/ /khams gsum gnas pa'i sems can la/ /smon lam yid kyis zin par bya/ /gzhan phyir
534a2(rgyud 'grel): bdag kyang de bzhin smon/ /rtsa ba'i spyod pa gsum pa sogs pa/ /sems skyed sdom pa blangs nas mthong/ /nyams med bsam pa'i dran pa dang/ /shes bzhin lta bas brtag dngos te/ /gang zhig sngon goms dbang nyams pa/ /
534a3(rgyud 'grel): 'gyod dang bcas pas sor gzhug bya/ /yi ge la sogs bzo mdza' rnams/ /rtsol bas rgyun tu 'jug byed pa/ /goms te sla bar ma gyur pa'i/ /dngos sde gang yang yod ma yin/ /spyod lam rnam gsum dran bya ba/ /byang
534a4(rgyud 'grel): chub sems dpa' i ming thob ste/ /de ni ldog par mi 'gyur ro/ /dper na phyug po nor sdod pa/ /med par gyur pa sor 'jug bzhin/ /spyod pa mnyam pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /zhig pa bzhin du mi gnas te/ /gzhi'am 'on te
534a5(rgyud 'grel): gzhan dag gam/ /dbang por gyur pa'i rten dag la/ /sngon du maN+Dal mchod sbyar nas/ /me tog phyag 'tshal lus gus pas/ /'gyod sems dngos po gang gis bshags/ /de bzhin slar yang blang bar bya/ /bdag dang dngos
534a6(rgyud 'grel): po 'bras bu rnams ming migs sems kyi bshags bya bar/ /de ni nyes par ma gsungs so/ /'di ni shin tu gsang ba'i chos/ /bdag gzhan gnyis ka'i don 'gyur phyir/ /sdom pa rnam grangs 'phel mi bya/ /'dod
534a7(rgyud 'grel): pa sbyin pa'ang de bzhin no/ /thun mong rab tu zhen pa bzlog pa dang/ /bslab pa mthar chub de las grol ba'i phyir/ /las mdza' sems bskyed cho ga mdor bshad pas/ /'gro ba mdza' dag byang chub sems ldan shog /
534b1(rgyud 'grel): sems skyed pa'i cho ga mdor bshad pa rdzogs so// //rdo rje 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de ltar ston pa mchod byas nas/ /lam gyi rnal 'byor rnams don phyir/ /rgyud gsum nges par gsal byed cing/ /
534b2(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig chen po mdor bshad pa/ /lam gyi rgyud la zhugs pa rnams/ /bslab pa gsum la gnas byas nas/ /don gnyis mngon du byed pa yang/ /nang ris la la mun snang phyir/ /gcig gis 'thad pa ma yin la/ /la
534b3(rgyud 'grel): la cha mthun spyad pa'i rigs/ /gdul bya skabs kyis rim spyod pa/ /sangs rgyas mdzad pa 'di gsungs so// //gnyer 'di lung gis lus bzhag nas/ /ngo bo rnam grangs bsrung thabs dang/ /nyams
534b4(rgyud 'grel): rgyu snga rtags skyon yon gnyis/ /bskang thabs dpe dang mdo bcur bcad/ /ngo bo rtsa ba bzhi dang ni/ /thun min thun mong yan lag gnyis/ /rtsa ba chen po mdor 'brel lo/ /dam tshig rnam pa'i grangs dag ni/ /sems can
534b5(rgyud 'grel): drangs dang log rtog grangs/ /sangs rgyas nyid kyis mi ma ? phyir/ /rtog 'dul gnyen po dam tshig grangs/ /rgyal ba nyid kyis rdzogs pa las/ /'on kyang rmongs la mdor gzung ba/ /byang sems rnam gnyis slob dpon
534b6(rgyud 'grel): drug /mchod bzhi sngags gsum phyag rgya bzhi'i/ /gsang bcu rtsa bar shes par bya/ /spyad pa lnga dang mi spang lnga/ /dang du blang dang bsgrub de bzhin/ /shes bya lnga rnams thun min bshad/ /yan lag skabs su shes par
534b7(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /thun mong dam tshig mdor bshad pa/ /mdor bsdus bdag gzhan don gnyis so/ /rnam grangs skabs su shes par bya/ /bsrung ba'i thabs ni 'di lta ste/ /rang lus rgyal ba'i phyag rgya che/ /sems can khams kyang
535a1(rgyud 'grel): der shes shing/ /snang stong gnyis med ye shes sku/ /byas mthong zos pa thams cad la/ /sems phyir gang yang byas snang med/ /dran dang shes bzhin mngon bstad la/ /dus gsum rgyun du ma
535a2(rgyud 'grel): dran na/ /theg chen bsngags par ci zhig tshud/ /lta spyod dam tshig 'brel pa yi/ /spyi dang 'dren dang dam tshig dbang/ /nyams chag skong dang shes rgyud 'grol/ /man ngag lung gi slob dpon rnams/ /lus la
535a3(rgyud 'grel): dbang ba'i rgyal po dang/ /khu bo ma dang pha dang mig /snying bas lhag pa'i tshul ltas te/ /sgo gsum zol rgyu med pa ni/ /yi dam lha ltar rgyun du bsam/ /bsrung rim 'chad bzhin shes par bya/ /mdza' 
535a4(rgyud 'grel): yas sems can rang rig phyir/ /gang yang bdag las gzhan min dang/ /bde gshegs snying po yun ring phyir/ /ma 'ongs sangs rgyas rang bzhin yin/ /spyi yi mchod de pha tshan bzhi/ /sangs rgyas chos

535a6(rgyud 'grel): ma lta bur 'phangs pa med/ /gtan bting khur sogs las bya ba/ /bran bzhin nges par dang du blang/ /bla ma'i rigs 'khor de bzhin du/ /nor zas blangs ba rnam smin phyir/ /til phub tsam yang mi 'bag
535a7(rgyud 'grel): cing/ /mal gos chags sogs 'god mi bya/ /mchod rten bshig dang 'dra bar gsungs/ /brdeg bsang sku 'phrog spyod pa ni/ /dngos su bya ba ci smos kyi/ /rtsed mo las su bya ba min/ /bdag gis skyon

535b5(rgyud 'grel): pas 'bad de mi phyed pa/ /byang chub sa bon brlag pa yin/ /tshogs dang gtor ma de bzhin te/ /tha ma lo zla mi zla'o/ /lta zab spyod pa glang po dang/ /lha mi gzungs dang grub brtags rnams/ /spyi gsang rnam pa bzhir

536a2(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub mi yal bas/ /shin tu gsang na byang chub rgyu/ /gsang phyir gdam ngag sna tshogs gsungs/ /dam nyams dam las log pa dang/ /dam med dkyil 'khor ma mthong zhing/ /'dres dang ma 'dres thams cad la/ /

536a6(rgyud 'grel): dang 'khus pa dang/ /'dus par 'ongs dang yongs la gnod/ /dam dgra ngan pa'i ngang tshul can/ /ngan song gsum dang bcu bo ni/ /rnal 'byor kun gyis dang du blang/ /grangs kyis rtsa ba bcu bzhi'o/ /ting 'dzin sngags
536a7(rgyud 'grel): dang phyag rgya rnams/ /shin tu goms bas dbang bskur ro/ /byang chub zhing du dgod par bya/ /ting 'dzin sngags rgyas bag chags sbyangs/ /rnam shes lhar skyed 'og min 'phang/ /ye shes tshogs byang rdzogs par 'gyur/ /

536b2(rgyud 'grel): las ngan bar chad sdug yun thung/ /rang gis bsags med ngan song las/ /bde lam 'di las gzhan med do/ /thabs kyi spyod pas 'ching 'gyur na/ /byang chub sems dang 'dul dbang gis/ /sngon dang smad 'tshong ston yang ltung/ /

539a7(rgyud 'grel): 'grub/ /thugs kyis skyo dub med pa dang/ /man ngag snod 'grub dngos grub nye/ /dgongs zab don la mkhas pa dang/ /lha rnams kun gyis dbang skur 'gyur/ /yan lag dam tshig ma nyams na/ /rnal
539b1(rgyud 'grel): 'byor skyes bu chen po yis/ /skyon bzlog pa nyid yon tan ste/ /bdud bzhi 'joms shing ngan song sbyong/ /theg chen lta spyod gzhung srod pas/ /lha rnams 'go zhing bsam pa 'grub/ /don gnyis yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ /
539b2(rgyud 'grel): theg chen dam tshig la gnas shing/ /'og ma'i 'dul sdom dam tshig gsum/ /bsrungs pa med par thub pas na/ /dge slong byang chub sems dpa' dang/ /de ni rnal 'byor chen po yin/ /nyams na bskang ba'i thabs rnams ni/ /
539b3(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems kyi dam nyams na/ /mkhas la blangs te gnas par bya'o/ /sku yi dam tshig nyams 'gyur na/ /gang la nyams pa der song la/ /nor zas 'byor pa mnyes phul nas/ /gang nyes tshig du bshags byas la/ /
539b4(rgyud 'grel): phyin chad sdom pa legs par bca' / /gal te grongs chad gyur pas na/ /de yi slob dpon bzhugs pa la/ /de tshe gong ma bzhin du bshags/ /med na mnyam pa brgya la bshags/ /de yang rnyed par ma gyur na/ /de dang
539b5(rgyud 'grel): mnyam pa gsum bkug la/ /sbyin sreg me thab rab brtsigs la/ /dkyil 'khor lha la mchod rjes su/ /spyan drang gsang mtshan la sogs mchod/ /gong du smos pa'i yon rnams ni/ /dbang po gsum la dbul bar
539b6(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /gal te gus pas mi len na/ /gnyis ka rdo rje dmyal bar ltung/ /de bas myur du tshangs par bya/ /gsung gi dam tshig nyams 'gyur ma/ /sgo gsum sku gsung thugs nyid du/ /nges par shes na skongs
539b7(rgyud 'grel): par 'gyur/ /bslab pa bldab kyis bsab pa dang/ /bsgrub pa chen po gsum gyis bskang/ /thugs kyi dam tshig nyams 'gyur na/ /'gro drug sems su gsal rtogs na/ /bdag nyid bdag la gsang ba mod/ /
540a1(rgyud 'grel): mi rtog ting 'dzin klong zhugs te/ /ma yengs blo la 'dris par bya/ /yan lag dam tshig nyams gyur na/ /gang 'das de nyid sor bcug la/ /brgya rtsa brgyad kyis tshogs kyis bskad/ /
540a2(rgyud 'grel): de ltar nyams su blangs na 'grub/ /snga rtags sdug bsngal 'byung mi 'gyur// //dam tshig chen po'i dpe bstan pa/ /sa gzhi lta bu'i rang bzhin pas/ /las dang 'bras bu'i chos rnams
540a3(rgyud 'grel): kun/ /dam tshig med par 'byung ba srid/ /so mtshams dag gi rang bzhin pas/ /bsrung ba thub dang ma thub las/ /nyes legs stobs chen 'byed pa'o/ /rin chen lta bu'i rang bzhin bas/ /dngos grub dgos 'dod
540a4(rgyud 'grel): thams cad 'byung/ /nam mkha' lta bu'i rang bzhin bas/ /'di yod thams cad shor bar 'gyur/ /rno rbal mtshon gyi rang bzhin pas/ /'khor pa'i dra ba ma lus gcod/ /pha ma lta bu'i rang bzhin pas/ /dus
540a5(rgyud 'grel): gsum sangs rgyas ma lus bskyed/ /rgya mtsho lta bu'i rang bzhin pas/ /brlabs chen dus su 'byung bar byed/ /me dpung lta bu'i rang bzhin pas/ /gang mchongs thams cad 'tshig par byed/ /de bzhin rtsi sman rang
540a6(rgyud 'grel): bzhin pas/ /'khor ba'i gcong rnying ma lus 'byin/ /rgyal po lta bu'i rang bzhin pas/ /phyogs 'ga' bsten pas rim gyis 'tsho/ /rgya mtshor nor len tshong dpon bzhin/ /thog ma nas mthar 'di phyin pas/ /
540a7(rgyud 'grel): 'di la shin tu nan tan byos// //dam tshig dam tshig zhes bya ba/ /gud na yod pa ma yin te/ /rang gi sems nyid dam tshig yin/ /ji snyed snang ba'i chos rnams su/ /rang rig rkyen 'bras
540b1(rgyud 'grel): nyid snang bas/ /cir snang cir srid rang rig nyid/ /'gre log spyi gtsug gar 'gro yang/ /snying po'i don las 'da' mi srid/ /rang bzhin dam tshig chen por bshad/ /rang bzhin lhun grub dam tshig la/ /rig pas phyin ci ma
540b2(rgyud 'grel): log na/ /sngon snang rtags pa'i chos med pas/ /lta ba'i dam tshig chen por bshad/ /de don blo la 'dris pa yis/ /spyod lam kun tu ma nyams par/ /ting 'dzin rgyun gyi dam tshig ste/ /sangs rgyas nyid dang
540b3(rgyud 'grel): spyod yul cig /'di la bsrung ba ci yang med/ /nyams pa rdul tsam 'byung mi srid/ /nam mkha' spyod la 'dzin med pas/ /lhag pa'i dam tshig rnam bzhir ldan/ /srung bya ma lus 'dir 'dus phyir/ /dam tshig
540b4(rgyud 'grel): kun gyi mdo zhes bya// //sgyu 'phrul rnam bkod gtor tshogs rgya mtsho'i rgyud chen las/ /lam 'bras snying po me long bcu gcig gis mtshon pa/ 'khor lo ngag mchu'i tshul gyis bsgegs pa'i blos
540b5(rgyud 'grel): bsdus pa'i/ /dge ? kun kyang dam gnas 'gro/ kun byang chub myur thob shog /dam tshig gsal bkra zhes bya ba/ slob dpon chen po sgeg pa rdo rjes mdzad pa'o/ /rdzogs so// //bcom ldan 'das
540b6(rgyud 'grel): thugs rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rang gi lha la phyag btsal nas/ /lam bzhi dag yod bya ba'i phyir/ /las snod skal bas gnas gyur pa/ /dam tshig phra rgyas gsungs pa de/ /thun mong mchog gi srung bya rnams/ /
540b7(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor cha la gnas pa yi/ /bdag dang gzhan dang chos kyi phyir/ /gzhung tshul srung ba 'di mi bya/ /snga ma srung bar bya ba ni/ /mdza' yas gsungs pa mdo tsam du/ /nges 'byung bzhi yis gzhi rnams dang/ /
541a1(rgyud 'grel): dka' thub 'dzin med sems kyis bsrung/ /gzhi phyir gzhan yang lus ngag gi /brgyan po 'gyed rnams dor ba dang/ /mtshon thogs 'phong rtsed mchod rgyug dang/ /ma rabs thor bu'i spyod
541a2(rgyud 'grel): kun dor/ /ngag gi bzhi dang grol dag rnams/ /nam yang smra bar bya ba min/ /nyon mongs drug dang bying rgod bsogs/ /skyon sems bye brag bsam mi khyab/ /gang dag don med de len pa/ /kha na ma tho 'phel ba
541a3(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /skye bo'i gnas su mi 'gyur bas/ /'khor ba'i mdza' mar spyad thag yan/ /byang chub tshed phyir gang yang spyad/ /de dag las ldog spyod pa gsum/ /sems kyis zin par gang spyod pa/ /sangs
541a4(rgyud 'grel): rgyas sku gsung thob par 'gyur/ /phyi ma rtsa ba yan lag pas/ /lnga bcu'i brgya dang drug cu dang/ /nyis brgya'i srung bya ma lus pa/ /bka' lung gnyis kyi rjes su snyegs/ /pan tsi nying lag zhes bya ba'ang/ /
541a5(rgyud 'grel): dang po nyid nas thabs spyod dang/ /shes rab nyid kyis nyis 'gyur yin/ /de des srung bya bcu gsum ste/ /byang chub sems ni bla med lha/ /zhi khro'i lha dgu nyid dang bcu/ /bcu gnyis bsam las mi 'da' zhing/ /
541a6(rgyud 'grel): thun mong mchog gis tshad med pa/ /bden gnyis byang chub rnam pa bcu/ /bla med gsal bas nyams mi bya/ /lha spangs dge spyad don med 'gyur/ /bdag nyid lha dang mnyam sbyor na/ /yon tan chung yang 'grub
541a7(rgyud 'grel): par 'gyur/ /de phyir dus gsum 'da' mi bya/ /bla ma bskur ba 'ang sgo gsum gyis/ /lus kyi srung ba'ang bdeg sogs las/ /thing klad rtsa mduAng bya ba min/ /'dod yon lnga yi mchod pa dang/ /
541b1(rgyud 'grel): gsang ba'i snod du dug mi spyod/ /'gro ba grang po'i phyogs spang dang/ /gdan sa gdan sogs mi brlam dang/ /'greng 'dug ngan spyod la sogs spang/ /rgyan 'dogs ze ldir de bzhin ste/ /ma rabs spyod pa kun spangs la/ /spyod
541b2(rgyud 'grel): lam zon chag ste gnas bya/ /rdzun dang phra ma dag rtsub dang/ /'khyal pa nam yang mi bya ste/ /be phogs ma yin brda skad dor/ /lkog du tshul brjod nyams par 'gyur/ /yon tan brjod cing snyan par smra/ /ca co la sogs
541b3(rgyud 'grel): ma yin pa/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje gsung thob 'gyur/ /dam pa ston pa'i bla ma la/ /chags sdang gti mug nga rgyal dang/ /phra dog dug lnga'i sems mi bya/ /ngan du mi sems lci bar sems/ /pha ma yi dam 'dra bar bsam/ /
541b4(rgyud 'grel): rtag tu gdung ba rgyun mi bcad/ /byang chub gzungs la zhugs pa yin/ /sngags dang phyag rgya rgyun mi bcad/ /zhi khro'i phyag rgya bdun gnyis cig /phyogs bcing rten dang khang pa'i sngags/ /rtsa skyed las rnams bzhi yi
541b5(rgyud 'grel): sngags/ /dbang bskur byin bsdu gsang sngags dang/ /spyan drang stim brtan phyag 'tshal mchod/ /dus gsum rgyun du gzhi yin phyir/ /nam yang rgyun bcad spang mi bya/ /yang dag lam du zhugs pa'i grogs/ /snum  
541b6(rgyud 'grel): 'am? yin slang mi bya/ /zla zar ma yin gzungs mi spyad/ /lta spyod mtho ba'i gong mi bcad/ /dbang dang dam tshig de bzhin ste/ /kun tu yangs bag zon phrig can/ /skur stim mchod byed dga' bar spyod/ /rdzun sogs
541b7(rgyud 'grel): rnam bzhi spang ba dang/ /bya ba mi smra tshul mi brjod/ /snyan smra zhes pa gsod por smra/ /bden tshig sri zhu'i sgra byed pa'o/ /sems kyi sngon bzhin dug lnga dor/ /mngan spyad sems mi spang ba dang/ /mig 'drar lta zhing gdung
542a1(rgyud 'grel): bar bya/ /gnod sems spang dang rnam bcu'o/ /gsang ba'i phyir ni mi smra ba/ /spyi dang bar gsang bzhi bzhi dang/ /'os dang gnyer gtad rnam pa dbu/ /sems kyis brtan par mi bsam zhing/ /ngag gis brjod par
542a2(rgyud 'grel): yod mi bya/ /lus brdas brtan man sum cu'o/ /yan lag dam tshig lnga gnyis la/ /cig la bcu phrag gnyis su dbye/ /dbang du blang ba'i dam bsgrub rdzas/ /bsgrub rdzas lnga yang rtsa ba brgyad/ /brgyad cha re zhing dang snyigs lnga/ /re re'ang
542a3(rgyud 'grel): rnam pa bcu ru 'gyur/ /zhing bcu'i bdud rtsi'i de bzhin pas/ /rnam par dbye ba nyi shu'o/ /bdag gzhan rang bzhin zhi dang gnyis/ /rdzas bcu thabs spyod shes rab spyod/ /bcu bcus nyi shur 'gyur ba'ang rigs/ /mi spang lnga
542a4(rgyud 'grel): la bcu gnyis te/ /zhing bcu thabs kyi mdzad pas 'joms/ /shes rab rang bzhin med par grol/ /thabs dang shes rab zhe sdang gis/ /bdag gzhan don rnams rdzogs par byed/ /yan lag bcu yis dam tshig
542a5(rgyud 'grel): la/ /thabs kyi mdzad pa mi 'byed cing/ /shes rab gnyis med mi 'byed pa'i/ /gti mug bcu gnyis 'da' mi bya/ /de ltar thabs dang shes rab bcu/ /gnyis ni sdeng du gyur pa yi/ /lhag pa'i nga rgyal mi 'da' ba/ /da
542a6(rgyud 'grel): rgyal chen po'i dam tshig go /zhing bcu thugs rjes mi stong ba/ /rigs lnga'i yum la thabs kyis rol/ /ting 'dzin thabs? dbang rang bzhin sbyar/ /shes rab don dang 'du 'bral med/ /ma rtogs gnyis dang log rtogs gnyis/ /
542a7(rgyud 'grel): nyan thos rab rgyal byang chub sems/ /gsang sngags phyi yi theg pa gsum/ /gsang sgor mdzad pas mi chud cing/ /shes rab ngan bas mi chud pa/ /phra dog chen po'i dam tshig go /de ltar sum brgya drug cu rnams/ /
542b1(rgyud 'grel): bdag gi rdo rje mchog gsum pos/ /log par mi stong sdom pa'i dngos/ /sa gzhi lta bur srung ba yin/ /rgyas 'dring stong rtsa brgyad dang ni/ /sa la 'bum sde bdag gzhan phyir/ /srung ba'i rgyud dag las grags pa/ /gsum gyi srung ba sngon
542b2(rgyud 'grel): bzhin no/ /dam tshig 'di ni rdo rje che/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje'i bdag /'grub 'gyur 'dir bde rtag pa yi/ /dbang phyug chen po nyid du 'gyur/ /byin rlabs gsum gyis mdzad pa dang/ /nye 'du las byed rtag du srung/ /yid 'ong
542b3(rgyud 'grel): gter 'dod bsam 'grub cing/ /phun sum tshogs yon rgyud las 'byung/ /myong ya dam tshig rdo rje chu/ /bzhag cing go bas bskrags byas na/ /rgyud lnga tha tshigs bral 'gyur na/ /rab sha yag shar gyur nas kyang/ /bsad
542b4(rgyud 'grel): nas dmyal ba tshan por rgyud/ /de yi sdug bsngal bzod glags chad/ /sa ma ya'i nyan+t+ra las/ /nyes gsum thos pa 'ang nyam nga na/ /'di phyis mthong myong smos ci dgos/ /de bas rgyun du mdo bshags bsngo/ /gang dag sa gzhi
542b5(rgyud 'grel): med pa dag /tshul 'chos phyir na yon tan brjod/ /nyes smra rdo rje'i dam ldan min/ /lhag par bdag ldan smos phyir ro/ /rnal 'byor lam mthar phyin bya zhing/ /bdag gzhan don phyir phra rgyas bsdus/ /ngal ba'i dge rtsa gang yod
542b6(rgyud 'grel): pas/ /mdza' yas rdo rje gsum thob shog /dam tshig phra rgyas bstan pa rdzogs so// //dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gtan tshigs gnyis rjes rims 'brengs nas/ /rang nyams goms
542b7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rigs pa yis/ /rnam pa mtshan nyid 'bras bcas pa'i/ /sbyin sreg rim pa bshad par bya/ /las 'di lung gis bsgrubs byas na/ /sbyin sreg rnam pa nges tshig dang/ /yon tan rnam pa gsum du gsungs/ /dang
543a1(rgyud 'grel): po phyi nang gsang ba la/ /rang bzhin thugs rje chen po dang/ /lhag pa gzugs brnyan gsum du bshad/ /ting 'dzin lhag pa'i longs spyod nang/ /khams bzhi'i khams ni gsang bar bshad/ /rang
543a2(rgyud 'grel): rig ye shes rgyal po yis/ /phyogs bcu ma lus rgyas btab pas/ /mi dmigs mi dmigs dmigs su med/ /thams cad rang rig khro bor gsal/ /dmigs med nyid la dbang sgyur ba/ /ji ltar snang ba de ltar snang/ /
543a3(rgyud 'grel): thabs dang shes rab ldan pa la/ /mtshan ma'i spros pa ngang gis med/ /nam mkha' i mkha' dkyil dang ba yi/ /yid bzhin tshogs rnams kun byung ba/ /sna tshogs 'byung zhing 'od 'phro 'bar/ /thugs rje'i byin rlabs rmad
543a4(rgyud 'grel): po che/ /'gro ba sna tshogs don byed pa/ /'di ni byang chub mchog du gsungs/ /cig shos las kyi gtsor gyur pa/ /rgyas par phyi nang shes par bya/ /dbu ma dang po gnyis yin te/ /ye shes rang rig rtags kyi hoM/ /
543a5(rgyud 'grel): rang dang spyi ru bstan pa dang/ /sems kyi phrag dog thams cad kun/ /bdag med rang rig ye shes kyis/ /dngos po gnyis med rtogs byas pas/ /dngos dang dngos med bag chags sregs/ /de ming ye shes me zhes bya/ /
543a6(rgyud 'grel): srid gsum sreg pa me yin te/ /yid kyi ye shes me ru 'bar/ /sman bcud len gyis dug sbyong ltar/ /phyi dang nang gi dri ma dag /bdag med gnyis kyis bdag por byed/ /gsal zhing bzhag par bya ba med/ /rang
543a7(rgyud 'grel): snang ting 'dzin ye shes ram/ /ri rab gling sogs khams gsum sbyangs/ /rab rib dag pa'i rang rig gis/ /sku gsum rang bzhin mthong dbang sgyur/ /goms pas bzhi 'joms ngan song sbyong/ /ting 'dzin las kyi
543b1(rgyud 'grel): mchog tu bshad/ /shes rab dang ba'i dkyil 'khor du/ /spyod yul rdzas rnams bsdus nas ni/ /lhan ne lhang de 'od du zhu/ /zhi 'gyur dbyings nas phyag rgya 'bar/ /rigs tshogs lha yi dkyil 'khor du/ /gsal 'gyur kun kyang de bzhin
543b2(rgyud 'grel): pa/ /spyod yul dag pas nang du gsungs/ /rang lus 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor la/ /lus dang rtsa dang dur khrod kyi/ /gzhal yas khang la sogs par bsgom/ /myong byed kun gzhi'i zhal bsam ste/ /rdzogs dang bkod pa'i lha rnams bsgom/
543b3(rgyud 'grel): ting 'dzin gsal bar yid kyis sbyar/ /ye shes dkyil 'khor zhugs par bya/ /bsgrub bya 'od kyis nges sbyar ba'i/ /longs spyod yi ge lngas sbyangs pa'i/ /nri sbar rtse lnga'i sgang blugs kyis/ /las bzhi'i mchod pa rab tu sbyin/ /
543b4(rgyud 'grel): bsam gtan bzhi bcas las nyid kyi/ /'bras ldan spyod yul dag 'gyur zhing/ /yid bzhin sku dang longs spyod 'grub/ /mchod sbyin rgya che rnam gnyis kyis/ /tshogs gnyis rgyun du rdzogs par byed/ /sum mdo'i snying rkog lte
543b5(rgyud 'grel): 'byung bzhi/ /kha dog las bzhi'i dkyil 'khor la/ /ye shes snying po ma lus zhal/ /thabs las ye shes me 'bar bas/ /las kyi mes bskul bde ba dang/ /nges bar zhal du chud pa na/ /ma lus mnyes pa'i dgyel
543b6(rgyud 'grel): ba yis/ /phyogs bcu kun tu khyab par 'gyur/ /mtshan ma rnam rtog kun spyod zhing/ /rtogs dka' i ye shes mngon du 'gyur/ /khams gsum bco brgyad bdag nyid de/ /ma lus rtsa bar 'di shes bya/ /gsal
543b7(rgyud 'grel): ldan ma 'am byin rlabs la/ /las bzhi'i dbyibs ldan hoM khung du/ /las kyi bde ba'i lha bskyed cing/ /stong gsum nyungs 'brur 'jug tshul du/ /dbyings nas dkyil 'khor spyan drangs te/ !/nyung 'bru me lha'i zhal nyid du//
544a1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje sgang blugs bcas pa yis/ /dkar nag dmar gyi me mchod pas/ /rang bzhin rnam pa gnyis kyi lha/ /bsnyes dang 'gro mang bde thob 'gyur/ /dus bzhi'i sbyin sreg mchod sbyar bas/ /thun mong mchog gi yon
544a2(rgyud 'grel): tan rnams/ /dka' ba med par len par gsungs/ /'jig rten mang tshogs rnams spangs pa'i/ /ji bzhin don ston ming des tshig /de phyir sbyin gnyis stong dang thob/ /rdzas rgyun shes rab ting 'dzin dang/ byin rlabs stong dang
544a3(rgyud 'grel): rnam pa lnga/ /'dzin med blo ni don gyi ming/ /byin rlabs yon tan rnam pa gsum/ /gzugs brnyan me long tshul bzhin du/ /snang ba thob pas sbyin par bshad/ /rdzas dang spyod dang bdag gzhan gyi/ /spyod yul rgyu rkyen dang bcas pa'i//
544a4(rgyud 'grel): dag byed ming nges tshig ces bya/ /lhag par gzugs brnyan khas blangs pa'i/ /gnas rdzas thab kyi rnam pa dang/ /gzung dang tso sems bsgrub bya dang/ /phur pa lha dus las rim dang/ /lhag ma bcu gcig shes par bya/ /ri bo 'dus pa'i
544a5(rgyud 'grel): rtse rnams dang/ /chu gling 'jam pa'i sa phyogs su/ /dang bar byed pa'i las rnams rtsam/ /nags tshal ljon pa me tog tshal/ /lhun sdug ri bo rgyas par bshad/ /sum mdo chu bo 'dus pa dang/ /bzhi mdo'i khang stong sdud ces bya/ /dur khrod dang
544a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sa phyogs su/ /lhag ma btsams na nges par 'grub/ /rang bzhin nus mthu ldan pa'i phyir/ /shin tu gces par bstan pa yin/ /gnyis pa rnam pa lngar bshad de/ /me yi rdzas gnyis sreg shing ni/ /rtse mo zhi byed yan lag brgyas/ /sdong po
544a7(rgyud 'grel): dbang rtsa mngon spyod pa'o/ /kha dog las kyis sbyar bar bya/ /shug pa tsadan dkar po dang/ /u dumwa ra 'o ma'i shing/ /zhi rgyas yam shing shes par bya/ /dmar la dri zhim shing rnams dang/ /dug shing tsher ma can dag la/ /tshil byugs dbang drag me sbar ro/
544b1(rgyud 'grel): bsgrub bya'i dam rdzas gos bsogs dang/ /longs spyod de bzhin shes par bya/ /dug dang tsha bas gsum dang/ /sha chen ra dang ba lang sha/ /mchog du gsod par byed pa yin/ /skyur ba dbang ste ling ka'i rdzas/ /'o ma
544b2(rgyud 'grel): 'bras chan rdul phye dang/ /me tog dkar po gtor ma zhi/ /ldong ros dro chan zho dang phrum/ /me tog gser phye rgyas pa la'o/ /zabs phye bu ram 'bras dmar dang/ /ram bu pad+ma'i rak+tar sbyar/ /thams cad gdud pa'i gtor ma yin/ /
544b3(rgyud 'grel): dug rnams lcags phye rdo rje phye dang/ /ra kyi khrag dang sha chen dang/ /dur sol mud ka'i chan rnams ni/ /gsod par byed pa'i gtor ma yin/ /mar dkar til dkar nas dkar chan/ /mngar gsum tsan dan dkar po'i shing/ /thams
544b4(rgyud 'grel): cad ye shes bdud rtsis te/ /tha mas ye shes me skyed do/ /zho dang mar rnying bu ram 'bras/ /rgun 'brum sha chen star ka dang/ /dri zhim ser zhing rgyas pa la'o/ /dan ti shing la shad tse dang/ /dmar po'i shing tsha dag gis ni/ /
544b5(rgyud 'grel): thams cad 'gugs pa'i mchog du gsungs/ /dug dang tshil chen skye tshe mar/ /sran chan khrag sna sna tshogs dang/ /tsher ma ba lang sha chen gsod/ /'bras bu'i don phyir 'tshogs par bya/ /sa gzhi legs par spyad byas te/
544b6(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor zlum po rim pa gsum/ /khru gang spangs dang zheng du yin/ /zabs dang gyen du phyed du bshad/ /'khor lo oM kyi snying po can/ /rdo rje 'khor lo me 'od rim/ /mda' bzhi zhags pa dkar pos bre?/ /gzhan yang
544b7(rgyud 'grel): rtsibs bzhi'i 'khor lo la/ /rigs bzhi'i phyag rgya rims shes bya/ /oM dang gser mgo spel ma yis/ /mu khyud skor ba phyi ru bshad/ /thams cad zhi byed dkyil 'khor yin/ /ye shes phyogs bzhi dbus 'od 'bar/ /khru 
545a1(rgyud 'grel): gang tshad ba sogs rjes su mthun/ /rdo rje rin chen zhags pas bskor/ /dbus su pad+ma swa zer tri snying ldan/ /gzhan yang rin chen gnyis dbyibs su/ /rim pa la sogs rjes su sbyar/ /
545a2(rgyud 'grel): zhags pa ser pos skor bar bya/ /thams cad 'phel byed dkyil 'khor yin/ /ye shes phyogs bzhi dbus 'od 'bar/ /hoM khung zla kham sdengs pa la/ /rdo rje bad mo 'od 'bar dang/ /lcags sgrog gtams pas

545a4(rgyud 'grel): khrod sol bas khyab bar bya/ /rtse gsum rdo rje sdengs pa dang/ /thod pa lcags skyu bsdams pas bskor/ /hUM bcas rdo rje'i rnam pa yin/ /dbang phyug zhags pa nag po bri/ /gzhan yang sdang sbyan bsgrang ba yi/ /khro
545a5(rgyud 'grel): zhal zhing tu 'jigs pa bri/ /me dpung 'bar bas rab mdzes pa'i/ /'di ni gsod pa'i mchog tu gsungs/ /bong chung lus mdzes zla ba'i mdog /g.yas 'khyil lus la de bzhin shes/ /skad gsal
545a6(rgyud 'grel): sngags zlos yid mi skyo/ /khro pa spangs pa zhi la sbyar/ /ba lang ser mo gru bzhi la/ /rna ba 'gram glang ring sha rgyas/ /yan lag zla mang las la mkhas/ /dal zhing blo gros ldan pa ni/ /'phel ba'i dus su
