545b2(rgyud 'grel): phyir/ /bsgrub pa'i gtso bor 'di gsungs so/ ma lus sems ni mdza' bral phyir/ /rang bzhin rnam dag mngon byas pas/ /sems gter rtog sogs dkyil 'khor phyir/ /byin rlabs bsdus 'phel sngon du bsgom/ /
545b3(rgyud 'grel): thams cad bdag phyir tha mi dang/ /shin tu zhen pa nyid kyis 'grub/ /chags pa chen po nyid du bshad/ /rang bzhin cig phyir rdzogs med 'jig /log rtog khros pa'i sems kyis bskul/ /yang dag zhe sdang chen por gsungs/ /
545b4(rgyud 'grel): bdag gzhan gnod pa'i sems dang ni/ /sbyor ba ngan pa'i rig sngags las/ /khams rkyen las gyur sngos med ba/ /nyon mongs bag chags sdug bsngal rnams/ /thabs phyir cig kyang dor mi bya/ /yon tan 'phel
545b5(rgyud 'grel): med nyung ba'i phyir/ /tshe dang logs spyod sgo gsum gyi/ /yon tan mngon par mi ldan pa'i/ /'jig rten pa dang 'das pa yi/ /yon tan bsdus te bstim pa dang/ /sems ni rin chen gter gyi phyir/ /byin rlabs
545b6(rgyud 'grel): 'brel ba snang bar 'gyur/ /mos 'dud med pa las rkyen can/ /las gsum bdag gzhan don gyi phyir/ /gsum pa las la sbyar bya zhing/ /lha yang de bzhin gshegs par bya/ /zhing bcur gyur pa'i sems can
545b7(rgyud 'grel): rnams/ /dam pa'i chos 'jig ma rungs pa/ /dpa' bos dgos pa yod pa'i phyir/ /kun la phan pas de bya'o/ /dngul la ma dkar po'i shing rnams la/ /mgo bo rgya mdud rtse zlum po/ /steng 'og logs
546a1(rgyud 'grel): la khro bcu bsgom/ /'phro 'dus bder gshegs phur ba la/ /sngags dang phyag rgyas byin brlabs pas/ /mdza' skor yan lag gnyis la sbyar/ /gser ram ser po'i shing rnams la/ /

546a5(rgyud 'grel): la thogs med 'jug /sku mdog cha lugs las bzhin shes/ /bag+hu d+he sgrom zhags tri shul 'dzin/ /rigs kyi phyag rgya gdab par bya/ /oM tri h+ri hUM sa bon snying/ /agni de ba zhal bzhi'i sngags/ /'od 'phro
546a6(rgyud 'grel): 'bar bas 'khor bar bsgom/ /zhal bzhi sbyin pa'i lhar bshad do/ /gzugs brnyan lta bu'i gzhal yas ni/ /'od 'phro ba'i las khyab par sbyar/ /rgyal po'i lus mdzes 'khor lo 'chad/ /rgyan rnams zhi la
546a7(rgyud 'grel): dkar ba dang/ /'od zer 'bar lhan lha ne ner sgom/ /khro bo'i dkyil 'khor ma lus pa/ /kun kyang gti mug rdo rje'i tshul/ /'khor lo 'od zer ldan pa yi/ /khams gsum thams cad khyab par bya/ /sa bon oM

550a6(rgyud 'grel): gdung ba dag gis kyang/ /sgyu 'phrul rtogs dka' rngam pa rgya mtsho'i mdza' yas rgyud chen las bsdus pa'i/ /ngal ba'i dge rtsas 'gro drug rgya mtsho'i sems can bsngos bcas 'di kun zag med shog /sgyu 'phrul dra bar ro sreg
550a7(rgyud 'grel): las kyi phreng ba rdzogs so// //slob dpon bi ma la mi tras mdzad pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das ye shes rang gnas kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje 'dzin la phyag btsal nas/ /rnal 'byor rang
550b1(rgyud 'grel): gnas mngon 'dod pas/ /dngos dang bar ma rnam sbyang phyir/ /dpe chung rang gnas bshad par bya/ /rgyud dang rang bzhin rgyud nyid dang/ /rang bzhin nang gi dkyil 'khor dang/ /'pho tshul bar ma'i mtshan nyid dang/ /las bsnyen gsang ba'i
550b2(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor gsum/ /de dag ting 'dzin las rim dang/ /rang gnas sbyang ba'i rim pa dang/ /bdag nyid 'da' ka'i man ngag dang/ /mthar gnas tshul gyi tha snyad bcu/ /rang gnas rmongs pa'i don phyir dbye/ /dang por gnas gnyis
550b3(rgyud 'grel): de la yang gnyis/ /bde gshegs snying po ma rig la/ /ma rig bdag lta mtshungs pa'i rgyu/ /kun rtags ma rig nyon mongs las/ /lhan cig skye rgyu rgyu yi rgyu/ /gnyis la rkyen gyi rnam par 'dod/ /mtshams sbyor rnam bzhi zhan
550b4(rgyud 'grel): bcas pa/ /rlung gi rkyen gyis 'ongs mtshungs rgyu/ /rten sems len pa khrag dang bcas/ /pho mo 'dod skol sems kyis 'jug /len rten 'byung ba des ldan pas/ /thal ba 'bru mar sha rus ltar/ /mi 'gyur nges par
550b5(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ba yin/ /sum cu rtsa brgyad phrag bdun rlung/ /lhan cig byed rgyu rkyen du 'dod/ /las rlung dang po zho chags tshul/ /kun sdud ma yi rtsibs las 'byung/ /cung zad sra bar 'gyur ba yin/ /mdzod ces bya bas zlum
550b6(rgyud 'grel): par byed/ /rab 'byed khrags shing mi cha gu ltar/ /yang dag sdud pa yan lag gi /rtsa ba lnga po 'byung bar 'gyur/ /zas kyi 'phro lnga de bzhin 'byung/ /'khyim byed de bzhin lnga rdzogs byed/ /zlog rgyur byed pa nyid cig rdzogs//
550b7(rgyud 'grel): rnam par 'byed pa bu gu dod/ sra byed kun nas sgo mnyam pas/ /sra zhing rgyal ba lta bur 'gyur/ /rdo rje bug sbyong kha sna nas/ /gnag khrag chu 'byung dbang po zlog /yon po'i sgos ni nang khrol 'byung/ /zhor 'byung spu rgyus
551a1(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa'i las/ /rus pa'i tshig dang nang rnams ldan/ /skres skom byed pas de sems skyes/ /mas zos lte bar 'dzin cing phan/ /rgyus pa'i sgos ni rgyus pa g.yog /pad+ma nyi shu rtsa 'byung ste/ /
551a2(rgyud 'grel): phyogs bzhir lnga lnga cig la'ang brgya/ /nying lag phyogs cig nyi khril/ /mdun rgyabs ga stobs zhes bya/ /g.yas g.yon mthur ldan rten pa'o/ /de dag nying lag cig na'ang bdun/ /ngag gi bar te ba spu
551a3(rgyud 'grel): 'phel/ /kha dog dkar dmar ser por ldan/ /bdud rtsi dbang pos snying mig 'byed/ /dbugs rgyu dbang po rnams kyang rdzogs/ /'bri stong dbang po dang bar byed/ /snyan mgur dbang po'i lam mthur ldan/ /las
551a4(rgyud 'grel): byed dbang po gsum rdzogs byed/ /shin tu sra bas rus pa bstan/ /yang dag bskyed pas sha rnams bskyed/ /kun tu rgyal bas khrag rnams 'byung/ /yang dag 'dzin ni pags pa g.yogs/ /sprin 'dzin
551a5(rgyud 'grel): de nyid mdog ldan byed/ /grong khyer 'dzin pas khrag dangs byed/ /skye ba mngon grub spu rnams dang/ /rgyus pa sen mo 'brel par byed/ /phan yon chen pos las bzhin du/ /sgra don phyi'i yul grub ste/ /
551a6(rgyud 'grel): dmigs pa med pa'i rjes thob la/ /dpe yi tshul gyis bar mi ya/ /lus dang phyi ma'i spyod yul snang/ /de phyir 'pho ba'i tha snyad du/ /brtags pas yod par shes par bya/ /bar ma'i byang chub sems
551a7(rgyud 'grel): dpa' ni/ /rnam rtog 'byung ba'i lus spangs nas/ /dangs ma las byung yid kyi lus/ /phyis 'byung dbang po yan lag rdzogs/ /las kyi rdzu 'phrul shugs dang ldan/ /sgyu ma lta ba'i lus ngag gis/ /
551b1(rgyud 'grel): thogs pa med pa kun la 'jug /dpag tshad bye ba brgya stong yang/ /'od kyi rnam pas 'gengs par byed/ /'dod khams snod bcud ma lus pa/ /lha mig dag pas mthong bar 'gyur/ /'gro ba'i lam dag nges par shes/ /
551b2(rgyud 'grel): re dang dogs pa cung zad nyung/ /tshe ni zhag bdun 'gyur du gsungs/ /'chi ka'i man ngag rab shes pas/ /'di tshe nges par 'byung bar 'gyur/ /ma skyes rang bzhin ye shes la/ /e roM khoM su e dkyil 'khor/ /me
551b3(rgyud 'grel): dpung 'bar ba'i klong yangs su/ /rang rig ye shes rang snang ba/ /skye 'gro 'byung ba nags tshal kun/ ma lus khrag 'thung rdo rje'i rigs/ /mthing nag 'jigs pa'i mtshon cha can/ /lcer bu rngams mtshungs til gang
551b4(rgyud 'grel): sbyar/ /khros pas rngam langs khams gsum 'khrug /bsgrub bya'i dmigs su len par byed/ /dur khrod ras kyi dkyil 'khor la/ /khrag 'thung drug cu rtsa drug rnams/ /rim pa gsum du rtsegs pa ni/ /byin
551b5(rgyud 'grel): rlabs dbang gis mdzes pa yin/ /rngam tshul gzi byin ldan par bsgom/ /ye shes spyan drangs mchod gsum sbyar/ /zlas pa srog dang ldan par bya/ /thugs rje'i dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu gnyis/ /rang bzhin
551b6(rgyud 'grel): yid kyis dmigs byas te/ /gcig dang gnyis su med tshul gyis/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi ngo bor sgom/ /bsdu ba'i sbyor bas kun bsdus te/ /byin brlabs rtag par gsal bar bya/ /bsgrub bya khrus byas dri
551b7(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan/ /nges par shar sgo nyid du bzung/ /dkyil 'khor dang po gsal byas te/ /sprul pas mtshams bcad bum pa bzung/ /bshad pa bzhin du bsgrub bya dgug /nges par gzugs la phab ste bcing/ /dkyil
552a1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor gnyis pa 'dir shes te/ /'gro ba'i 'od zer thugs dam bskul/ /'dus pas bsgrub bya gnas sbyangs nas/ /rtog tshogs dkyil 'khor nyid du bslab/ /slob bu sbyangs pa'i rim par gsungs/ /bsnyen pa'i
552a2(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor sgo phye nas/ /phyag byas bskor te gsol ba gdab/ /sgrib sbyang rang gi lhar bskyed la/ /'khor lo'i phyag rgyas bsrung bar bya/ /ta krid la sogs nges sbyor ba'i/ /sngags dang nyungs kar sprul ba yis/ /nges grangs gtso bo'i
552a3(rgyud 'grel): mkha' la bzhag /de dag 'od zer mang po yis/ /nyon mongs mun pa dag byas nas/ /gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor mthong bar bya/ /rigs drug sbyong ba'i 'od zer gyis/ /sa bon rnam pa drug sbyangs te/ /ye shes chen po'i ros gang bas
552a4(rgyud 'grel): ma lus 'joms pas rgyas btab pa'o/ /'bru bzhi nges par bstan pa'i tshe/ /sgra dbyangs gsung gi bstan pa rnams/ /nges par ston phyir bzhi ru 'dod/ /thams cad rang rig byang chub sems/ /de ni lung gi tshad mar bshad/ /
552a5(rgyud 'grel): ched bzhis phab pa'i don bzhi ste/ /dag pa rnam gsum tshul gnas shing/ /'bru lnga 'dus pa'i thabs chen po/ /'gro ba kun la rang bzhin gnas/ /rang bzhin sngon du byed rgyu ni/ /ngo bo dang ni rkyen nyid de/ /'jug ldang
552a6(rgyud 'grel): la sogs byang sems lnga/ /nges par skye ba ngo bo yin/ /thabs dang shes rab ma ning rgyud/ /rtan pa'i yig lam rkyen du gsungs/ /khong nas gab sbas don 'byin pa/ /ston pa rdo rje'i thugs la gnas/ /rang
552a7(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor ni/ /dkyil 'khor snying po gser sgrom la/ /chos nyid ye shes yon tan dang/ /rang rgyud bzhi la yan lag brgyad/ /'od bzhi la gnas rnam shes bzhi/ /sgo lnga rtag min
552b1(rgyud 'grel): zhor la bshad/ /sa bon zung gsum nyid dang bzhi/ /'od dang snod bcud tshul du gnas/ /chos nyid lha min dud 'gro zlum/ /kun gzhi'i oM gyi snying por ldan/ /ye shes lha ni gru bzhi yid/ /snying po hUM ni bde gshegs thugs/ /yon
552b2(rgyud 'grel): tan dmyal ba yi dags aM/ /zla gam gsung gi rang bzhin yin/ /dmar nag sdong la og zhol dbyibs/ /de ni blo rmugs snod yin te/ /shes pa gsum la snyoms bar 'gogs/ /drag po nyid duAng bshad pa yin/ /
552b3(rgyud 'grel): de dbus snying po ye shes rgyu/ /dar skud mtshal khu gser gyi rlangs/ /nyi ma'i me long ngad dag ni/ /'byung ba bzhi yi dangs ma yin/ /bde ba'i dangs ma nam mkha' i khams/ /'byung lnga shes rab rigs kyi yum/ /chen po rigs
552b4(rgyud 'grel): kyi de bzhin gshegs/ /thabs dang shes rab las nyid kyi/ /dkyil 'khor kun kyang gsal bar byed/ /nam mkha' i khams kyi dkyil 'khor 'dis/ /thams cad nam mkhar byed pa'i phyir/ /thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dkyil
552b5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor mchog /lus can kun la yod par bshad/ /sgrub pa'i gzhi ru 'di shes bya/ /'khrul dbang mi gnas tha snyad du/ /rnam shes 'phos par gsungs pa ni/ /nyi 'od sa bon skur sgra bzhin/ /rgyu las 'bras
552b6(rgyud 'grel): bu gzhan min gyi/ /'di nas 'phro bar 'gyur ba'i chos/ /gdul bya tsam yang med par gsungs/ /sa chu me rlung bzhi yi rlung/ /sum mdo snying gi lte ba la/ /rigs rnams kun gyi rten yin te/ /las rgyu zad
552b7(rgyud 'grel): dang rten dag gi /sngon dbang yan lag nyams pa na/ /tshogs drug sar thim gsal mi 'gyur/ /sa dag tshur zhugs lus nyams med/ /de nyid mar zhugs bu ga skam/ /me rlung 'gro bas drod nyams 'gyur/ / 
553a1(rgyud 'grel): rlung gi snying po thig le'i rten/ /rdub cing tha ma 'don par 'gyur/ /thig le me long dbugs bzhin du/ /mdzes dang che chung gsal bar byed/ /rtog pas 'du shes brgyad skye'o/ /me tog 'phreng
553a2(rgyud 'grel): bas kha dog bsgyur/ /bags bgos spu dang sen mo 'phel/ /bdun phrag lnga bo yang byed kyis/ /mtshan ma thams cad 'phel bar byed/ /g.yo byed byung ba'i sems skye'o/ /dang bas phyin ci ma log pa'o/ /'du
553a3(rgyud 'grel): shes lnga po 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de dag rang bzhin gsang ba'i las/ /chags bsogs rang bzhin bzhi bcu gnyis/ /shin tu gsal bar byed par 'gyur/ /thogs med rkyen gyis mgo lus bsgyur/ /rang bzhin sems
553a4(rgyud 'grel): dpa' lhums nas 'byung/ /rang bzhin ye shes rdo rje yis/ /rdo rje phung bo zhes gsungs so/ /rang bzhin gnas rgyud rnam pa gnyis/ /sems ni rang rig ye shes te/ /ma bcos lhun gyi skad cig ma/ /de yis
553a5(rgyud 'grel): ma byas gang yang med/ /ma rig mun 'khor klad pa ni/ /ji snyed 'jig rten 'khrul pa'i chos/ /phyi nang rten 'brel gnyis su 'khor/ /mi mthun bde sdug myong 'gyur ba'i/ /dbang po yul du snang ba kun/ /
553a6(rgyud 'grel): rang rgyud yod ba ma yin te/ /kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa nyid/ /dngos po sna tshogs bar snang bas/ /gnyis snang chos kun rnam rtog bshad/ /rnam rtog nyid na ye shes te/ /ma skyes ye shes brjod du
553a7(rgyud 'grel): med/ /thams cad ma lus chos so cog /sems nyid las ni gzhan med phyir/ /'di ltar rnam pa thams cad kun/ /sdos pa can gyi chos med do/ /rtog med rang rig 'od gsal ba'i/ /shes
553b1(rgyud 'grel): pa 'ba' zhig kho na'i phyir/ /'jig rten brtan g.yo la sogs ba/ /snang ba nyid na ngo bo med/ /de nyid chos sku chen por gsungs/ /rnam dag rang bzhin rgyud nyid la/ /sgom dang sgom bar bya pa yi/ /mtshan ma'i nyes
553b2(rgyud 'grel): skyon ngang gis med/ /gnas dang 'byung ba ma lus kun/ /rang rig ye shes gzugs su skye/ /sku dang ye shes bsam mi khyab/ /rdo rje phung po yan lag ni/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lnga ru grags/ /sa chu spyan
553b3(rgyud 'grel): ngang ma ma ki /me rlung gos dkar sgrol mas te/ /nam mkha' i dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma/ /skye mched khams rnams mang po kun/ /sems dpa' sems ma'i dkyil 'khor yin/ /gsang yul dbang po rnam shes reg /
553b4(rgyud 'grel): ma lus 'joms phyir khro bor gsungs/ /rtog bcas mtshan ma las skyed phyir/ /yul te las kyis mi gnas bshad/ /yid chos bzang po bzang mo'i mkha' / /so drug las byung bde ba'i dus/ /chags sogs
553b5(rgyud 'grel): yang dag nyon mongs drug /ye shes drug gi sa bon drug /'dul phyir sprul pa nyid du gsungs/ /sku dang gsung thugs yon tan las/ /nyi shu rtsa lnga rang bzhin gnas/ /ye shes chos nyid yon tan ni/ /ting
553b6(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin gsum gyi ngo bo yin/ /de steng dangs ma'i thig le ni/ /bsnyen bsgrub bzhi ru shes par bya/ /de dbyings las bzhi'i dkyil 'khor te/ /bzhi brgyad rtsa ni 'khor lor gsungs/ /gsang ba'i skabs las shes
553b7(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ /bdes gang bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis rtsa/ /sa bon rgyus te yi ge gsung/ /bde thugs rdo rje sku gsung ldan/ /bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis gsum 'phror 'gyur/ /cig kyang khams kyi bde bar ldan/ /zung gsum
554a1(rgyud 'grel): 'od kyi gong bur gsungs/ /rnam thar sku gsung yig gsum gyis/ /kha dog rang rgyud bzhin du bsgyur/ /'od kyis sngon bzhin byin rlabs bstim/ /rnam shes thugs te yi ge gsung/ /'od ni
554a2(rgyud 'grel): sku yi rang bzhin la/ /dpa' sgeg byams pa gar byed rgyal/ /gsal ma chos nyid bdag mo la/ /sku gsung sgyu 'phrul ldan pa yi/ /thabs dang shes rab 'byor par bskyed/ /rnam thar dbu dang ye shes phyag /
554a3(rgyud 'grel): khams gsum sku gsung thugs rgyas btab/ /sa bcu gnyis la nges par phyin/ /byang chub sems dpa' i dbang skur te/ /rdo rje thugs las bur byung nas/ /che mchog rgyun gyi dbang skur
554a4(rgyud 'grel): nas/ /'gu ya yak+Sha rak+Sha gsum/ /thabs dang shes rab ldan gyur te/ /bdag gi 'od 'phros nam mkha' yi/ /bde gshegs rgyun gyis byin brlabs pas/ /che mchog dbang mchog
554a5(rgyud 'grel): dpal mchog gsum/ /thabs dang shes rab 'khyil par sgom/ /dbang mchog rol pa'i sems 'od nyid/ /che mchog mkha' la bsdu bar bya/ /de nyid dpal mchog la zhugs te/ /dpal mchog
554a6(rgyud 'grel): rang gi gsang lam nas/ /dangs ma'i ye shes snying po thim/ /gzhi yi sku gsung thugs nyid kyang/ /de bzhin 'dus pa nyid du bya/ /rtsa ba brgyad kyi snying po yis/ /dus bzhi'i bde ba mchog du bsdus/ /
554a7(rgyud 'grel): rten gyi rtsa nas thig le zhugs/ /mi shigs ye shes thig le ni/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje'i bdag /gcig dang du ma rnam spangs pa/ /sna tshogs snang ba mtshon du med/ /rang dbang sgyur ba'i hUM rings las/ /
554b1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje sems dpa' mtshon gang ba/ /dbu la ye shes sems dpa' bzhugs/ /dkyil 'khor mang po'i 'phro 'du can/ /gtsug byung thugs rje'i dbang thob nas/ /thabs dang shes rab ldan gyur pas/ /stong phrag gcig gi
554b2(rgyud 'grel): rtsa bcud rnams/ /sangs rgyas stong gi dkyil 'khor du/ /sngon byung rigs kyi bdag por 'gyur/ /nam mkha' i khams kyang de bzhin no/ /oM h+ri ma ha su ka badzra hUM ho/ /hUM ma sgrod yid kyis byon pa'i gnas mchog
554b3(rgyud 'grel): dam pa la/ /yid bzhin rin chen 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang/ /dus gsum 'gyur ba med pa'i gdan steng na/ /rtag pa chen po mchog gi sku bzhugs pa/ /mnyam rdzogs dpe la 'das pa'i rgyan mnga' zhing/ /yid bzhin
554b4(rgyud 'grel): rin chen gter la bde spyod pa/ /bde ba chen po bdag la bstan spyod pa/ /rtag pa chen po longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku/ /rdzogs chen 'gyur med g.yung drung bdal ba'i ngang/ /bde chen dbyings kyi yum dang mnyam sbyor bas/ /ting 'dzin bdud
554b5(rgyud 'grel): rtsi'i thugs ni 'gro ba yongs kyi bcud/ /rnam dag ye shes spyan gyis mun nag bsal/ /ye shes sgron ma'i thugs kyis bag chags sregs/ /rdo rje spu gri'i tshams kyis dug gsum bcad/ /rngam chen hUM nyid
554b6(rgyud 'grel): ring bos khro chen bskul/ /thugs dam mu la dza las dmyal khams sreg /ye shes rol bas rgyud drug gnas nas sgrol/ /srid gsum thig les zhal gyi rgyas spras spro ba skyed/ /ye shes byang chub sems
554b7(rgyud 'grel): dpa' sangs rgyas yongs kyi dpal/ /dpal chen bla med khro rgyal gsum gyi rje/ /kun tu bzang po rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs te/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas kun gyi lha phung yin/ /ma lus 'dod pa'i dpal
555a1(rgyud 'grel): du gyur par mdzod/ /spyod yul 'gyur bar mthong bas na/ /gsang ba'i gnas su nyon mongs yid/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gsal ba la/ /kun gzhi ye shes snying po yi/ /'od kyis khams gsum sbyangs
555a2(rgyud 'grel): bsdus te/ /mtshon gang 'od du gsal ba la/ /dkar po hUM gnas rnam shes so/ /de dag sku gsung thugs bdag ste/ /shin tuAng 'dris pa nyid du bya/ /rlung brtsegs bcud g.yo'i mtshan mthong na/ /ring po hUM gnyis
555a3(rgyud 'grel): nas sa nas/ /du ba'i tshul grangs 'od du bsdu/ /de bzhin zla ba yang shes par/ /'od zlum gsang ba'i lam zhugs te/ /phyir 'byung phyogs bcu khyab bdal bas/ /khams dag phyir mdza' dbus dang ni/ /phyi
555a4(rgyud 'grel): nang yul sems bral ba'i don/ /dran pas las kyi rgyun bcad de/ /rang gnas mthong bar gyur pa yin/ /gsang ba zhabs kyi rnam pa ni/ /gnyis kyang rnam shes gnyis 'dus te/ /lce rtse rkan la sbyar byas nas/ /
555a5(rgyud 'grel): hUM rings bslang ste he ru gyur/ /sna tshogs mchog ldan rgyan rdzogs pa/ /hUM brjod nas lam byung ste/ /'og min la sogs 'gro bar bya/ /'dod pa nges par 'grub par 'gyur/ /theg mchog gsang mdza' mngon byas nas/ /gzhi
555a6(rgyud 'grel): bzhin ma lus bdag nyid phyir/ /rgya bral cig dang du ma spangs/ /'das dang ma 'das dus gsum gyi/ /ro myong dag phyir rnam rtog bral/ /ye shes dbyings las mi zhan phyir/ /thugs rje chen pos ma lus mkhyen/ /
555a7(rgyud 'grel): sku dang gsung thugs yon tan las/ /khyab dang bde dang rtag dbang bskur/ /rkyen gyis skye 'jig med pa yi/ /rtag chen rdo rje'i sku zhes bya/ /rang bzhin gnas rgyud ye shes phyag /rgya khyon bsam yas mngon sum du/ /
555b1(rgyud 'grel): yul 'dra rang bzhin dang gnas pa/ /'khrul dang rnam par rgyud log pa'i/ /rtog gsum las rkyen rab rib zhen snang ba/ /thabs mkhas spyan mnga' rgyud bzhin sgro skur bral/ /rgyud gsum thur ma gsal phyir gab gsungs pa/ /spyad
555b2(rgyud 'grel): yig goms rnams snang rgyud nyams su shar/ /gsal byas 'das dang da ltar rang rig mig thob shog /sgyu 'phrul dpe chud rang gnas kyi rim pa'o/ /sgeg pa rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so// //dpal rdo
555b3(rgyud 'grel): rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gsang ba chen po'i rgyud dag las/ /sku gdung spel mchod rim pa zhig /bdag gzhan snang dang mi snang phyir/ /legs par bsdus te bstan par bya'o/ /pha dang ma yi sems ldan mis/ /
555b4(rgyud 'grel): mdza' yas bu yi sems bzhag ste/ /tshogs chen zung la lam bya'i phyir/ /mi rtog nyid du rtog med 'dug /de las skad cig las kyi lha/ /gsal bya dgu 'am bcu gcig ldan/ /'phro 'dus dbang byin thob pa dang/ /
555b5(rgyud 'grel): grangs te sngags kyi nga rgyal bskyed/ /sa man dza da e ha his/ /se gol kyo ta dza yis dgug /dza hUM baM hos stiM byas te/ /'bru brgyad sngags kyis bstan par bya/ /de ltar gsal ba'i rnal 'byor pas/ /thugs ka'i
555b6(rgyud 'grel): hUM gi 'od 'phros pas/ /skor por sbyangs la gnas gdan sngags/ /brjod pas gzhal yas gdan gsum ldan/ /'byung lnga'i rgyu nyid byin brlab pa/ /spyi dang khyad par lnga pa nyid/ /khong stong rgyan ldan rnam dag sngags/ /
555b7(rgyud 'grel): nga rgyal ldan brjod stong chen rgyu/ /lhun grub ci bsam snang byin brlab/ /phyi ma lnga yis dbyings phyug ma/ /khong stong brgyan ldan oM bi ra/ /dzra dang badzra swAhA yis/ /rdo rje ye shes srog ldan bya/ /de bzhin spyan la
556a1(rgyud 'grel): 'degs pa'i rgyas/ /oM dang badzra dir dza/ /a dang a ra swAhA yis/ /snga ma ji bzhin byin brlab bo/ /ma ma ki la rdo rje gdams/ /the chung sgreng ste oM rmri rin/ /da ra badzra swAhA yis/ /ting 'dzin srog dang ldan par bya/ /
556a2(rgyud 'grel): gos dkar khong stong sbyor spros pas/ /oM dang badzra ag ne a/ /ga sha swAhA'i gsang sngags kyis/ /gong ma bzhin du byin gyis brlab/ /sgrol ma thal mo brlab bya zhing/ /oM dang badzra a ni li/ /spra tsal mo hUM rgya/ /da ra swAhAs byin brlab bo/ /
556a3(rgyud 'grel): shes rab grangs 'dzin thabs kyis bdag hUM badzra gri ga/ /muM dwa du shwa ri stom gyi sngags brjod cing/ /'byung lnga ye shes rdo rje la/ /skor phor reg pas gzhal yas gdan/ /nang ngo phyi rol sku gdung dbyibs/ /mi bskyod yab yum 'khril zhugs pa'i/ /'od
556a4(rgyud 'grel): kyis don mdzad lha chen skor/ /de nyid 'byung lnga gang yin mkha' / /gang brlabs rang gi lha mos na'ang/ /so so'i gsang sngags brjod byas te/ /srog ldan rnal 'byor snga ma bzhin/ /'phrin las rnams las grub 'dod pas/ /rgyu lnga bzhi las
556a5(rgyud 'grel): rtsam pa na/ /zhi la snang mdzad gsang sngags ldan/ /shan ting ku ru swA hAs mdzes/ /chos sku thig le dkar 'od kyis/ /gzas dgu gdan byas 'od thim zhing/ /rgyas la 'byung ldan yab yum sngags/ /pus ting ku ru swAhA yis/ /sku gsung
556a6(rgyud 'grel): ser rgyas 'od zer 'phros/ /bkug gdan 'od thim bdag rgyas byas/ /dbang la rta mgrin mdza' yas sngags/ /che ge ba shaM ku ru yis/ /zla gam 'od 'bar 'phros bkug pas/ /gdan byas 'od thim dbang po bsgyur/ /drag po badzra he ru'i sngags/ /
556a7(rgyud 'grel): che ge gsod pa'i sngags brjod pas/ /chos sku gru gsum 'od nag gis/ /bkug ste gdan bstim bsgral bar bya'o/ /don yod grub pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /chos sku lhun grub lta gnas bya/ /chos rnams rang bzhin rtogs 'dod pas/ /mdza' 
556b1(rgyud 'grel): yas rnal 'byor rten 'brel sngags/ /'od kyi bsgrib sbyangs rtogs skal ldan/ /nang du gdan gtso bzhugs la'o/ /'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa yis/ /lha de nye bar bsgrub ba ni/ /lha'i snying po bris ? bcug brjod/ /lha de nye bar 'grub par 'gyur/ /'jig
556b2(rgyud 'grel): rten lha de dbang med bkug /mchod sogs rdzogs pa'i las bya'o/ /gang zhig 'phos pa'i las byed na/ /gang goms lha'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /btab ste ma tha gnyis mdza' ru/ /sarba tir ya ga te/ hUM phaT/ zhes brjod pas byol song gi rgyud sbyang ba'o/ /
556b3(rgyud 'grel): pa tsa gnyis dang/ /sarba spre ta ka te he duM hUM phaT/ kyis yi dags rgyud sbyangs so/ /da ha gnyis sarba na ra ga te he duM hUM phaT brjod 'od 'phros pas/ /sngon bzhin bkug la 'od kyis sbyang/ /yang na mi bskyod rnal 'byor ldan/ /rgyun bcad sngags kyis sbyang
556b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /de nas sku gdung byin brlab ste/ /rdo rje gdams la tho bor rtsegs/ /oM ye d+harmA he tu pra b+ha bA he tun+ti ShA naM ta thA ga to hya ba dang/ te ShA na tsa yo ni ro d+ha e bam bA dI mahA sh+ra ma Na ye swAhA/ /zhes brjod do/ /chos kyi skur byin gyis brlab bo//
556b5(rgyud 'grel): rgyu 'bras kyi chos sngags dang phyag rgyas byin gyis brlab pa ni/ /phyag rgya de nyid las/ oM badzra ku sha mi ta u pa da/ soM myag a ri te/ i tra ba la ag tya/ ma ga pa ri pu ra rnam phyi ti ku ru swAhA/ zhes rgyu'i chos rdzogs par byin gyis brlab
556b6(rgyud 'grel): bo/ /'bras bu'i chos rdzogs par byin gyis brlab pa ni/ /mnyam pa'i phyag rgya 'od 'phro ba ltar byas la/ /oM badzra dz+nya na ban tsa ka yA gu na gar khang/ /pu mi ta/ shi ti na ku ru swAhA/ dz+nya na pags man ta/ oM mo kis man ta/ a mo ka ya
556b7(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ zhes sku dang ye shes su gsal pa las/ /'bras bu'i chos thams cad rdzogs par bsam mo/ /de la rang bzhin gnas pa yang/ /spyan las byas pa brgya rtsa brgyad/ /stong khri 'bum sogs 'bad byas la/ /rab gnas sbyin sreg rgyas par 
557a1(rgyud 'grel): sbyar/ /yi dam nar ma'i sbyor ba la/ /rang bzhin mchod rten lhar bcas pas/ /snyan dbab spyan drang bstim brtan pas/ /sngon bzhin byas la phyag gis mchod/ /a ti pra ti pu ho yis/ /spyi spral phyag dang lan rdzogs
557a2(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /kun bzangs mchod pa nam mkha' i mdzod/ /sngags dang phyag rgyas mchod par bya'o/ /gzed zhal rgyan ldan a ha ras/ /phyag dang zhal bsil gsol bar bya/ /lha mo bzhi'i sngags phyag rgyas/ /spyan shangs sku la thim par bya/ /oM
557a3(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten brtan g.yo thams cad la/ /rang bzhin dkyil 'khor gnas mod kyang/ /bzung 'dzin rnam rtog zhags pa yis/ /rang gis bsgribs shing bdag tu bcings/ /kun gyis yang dag rtogs bya'i phyir/ /de bzhin chos sku'i gzugs
557a4(rgyud 'grel): brnyan bstan/ /yang dag thams cad rdzogs pa'i don/ /sna tshogs 'phrin las rnam par rol/ /don gyi snying po mchog gnas dang/ /byang chub chos rnams rab tu rdzogs/ /'jig rten gtso mchog rab tu bskor/ /a ho/ /ho chos sku'i /
557a5(rgyud 'grel): yon tan lhun gyis grub pa yi/ /thal sbyar bo de ka ya bag /tsi ta ti sta badzra stan/ /bdag gzhan gnyis ka'i don gyi phyir/ /'khor lo dang mchu'i tshul bzhin du/ /bka' yi bcud bsdus bsod nams kyis/ /mdza' yas mngon par
557a6(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas shog /sku gdung las kyi 'phreng ba rdzogs so// //bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /don dang bral ba'i 'jig rten na/ /snang srid bde ba'i longs
557a7(rgyud 'grel): sbyong la/ /chags pa sbyang bas 'khyams pa rnams/ /'di ltar spyad na grol zhes gsungs/ /lta ba byin brlabs bskyed pa dang/ /spyan dang mchod dang rol pa dang/ /lhag ma'i las dang bsngo ba brgyad/ /rgyun du mi stong rnal 'byor yin//
557b1(rgyud 'grel): dbang po yul dus rnam shes kun/ /shes rab thabs sbyor ye sangs rgyas/ /'byung ba yum gyi mkha' klong las/ /sprul pa rang 'byung longs spyod lha/ /byang chub sems kyi klong bdal bas/ /gnyis med cig pa'i longs spyod yin/ /lta ba ?
557b2(rgyud 'grel): 'di la gang gnas pa/ /sangs ma rgyas pa gcig kyang med/ /dang por longs spyod kun ldan nas/ /bdag nyid lung gi khrag 'thungs las/ /yig 'bru gsum 'phros thim tsam gyis/ /sbyang ba sngags kyis kha bskang pa'o/ /bdag nyid khrag 'thung
557b3(rgyud 'grel): gsal ba las/ /lto ba bruM las gzhal yas su/ /rim pa lnga yi dkyil 'khor lha/ /mi bskyod rdzogs pa'i tshul gyis bsgom/ /sa ma dza yi phyag rgya yis/ /'bar des 'phags pa 'khor dang bcas/ /nam mkha' i khams kun gang bar dmigs
557b4(rgyud 'grel): de nyid thig le'i tshul du bsgom/ /rim pa bzhin du gros te sbyang/ /sngags kyis lha mo rim pa bzhin/ /shes rab thabs tshul mnyes pas mchod/ /bla med dngos grub stsol bar bsam/ /a'oM na ma sarba ta thA ga ta a ba lo ke te a mri he hUM  
557b5(rgyud 'grel): a'oM ba lin ta kha ra ma kha raM Da ki ni/ kha roM yo gi ni/ dang hAM a la la ho/ /zhes rgyas par mchod do/ /de nas bdag nyid mnyam bzhag pas/ /rnam gsum tshul gyis rol par bya/ /bdag nyid rang gi lha mnyes pas/ /mchod sbyin yin te dngos
557b6(rgyud 'grel): grub bo/ /bdag nyid mnyam bzhag ta gi rgyal/ /ma tshogs dbang phyug dam la bsdu/ /sngags 'dis mchod la 'phrin las bcol/ /rang gi gnas su las la dgye/ /a'oM ta ki ni a gat+ta ya/ a gat+ta ya/ a be sha ya/ a be sha ya/
557b7(rgyud 'grel): pra be sha ya pra be sha ya/ /b+hand+ha ya b+hand+ha ya/ to sha ya/ to sha ya/ mo ha na/ mo ha na/ sarba DA ki ni nan/ h+ri da ya hUM dza/ dza hUM baM ho/ ta ki ni dza/ ces pa dang/ a'oM badzra ta ki ni/ pra ti dza man b+ha lin ha/ hUM phaT kha'i/
558a1(rgyud 'grel): a'oM traM h+ri ha/ /ces thim par mchod do/ /pham la sogs 'gro drug la/ /tshad med gtor ma 'di bsngos pas/ /longs spyod ldan zhing tshogs bsags nas/ /thams cad myur du sangs rgyas shog /a'oM sarba
558a2(rgyud 'grel): spra ti nan a mri te hUM/ zhes byams pa dang snying rjes dmigs la/ /ci 'dod pa 'byung bar bsam zhing gtor ro/ /'phrin las bcol ba ni/ sdang ba'i dgra thul/ gnod pa'i bgegs chom/ /zhing bcu gdul du lhogs/ /rnal 'byor pa'i bsam
558a3(rgyud 'grel): pa yid bzhin du 'grub par mdzad du gsol/ /ya hi g+ha dza/ a'oM ba lin te te dzo ba li ni ba la ba de gu he sa ma ye swAhA/ /rnal 'byor longs spyod gol ba'i phyi rabs la/ /ma spangs rol pas 'bras bu lhun grub pa/ /yid dam za tshogs gtor
558a4(rgyud 'grel): ma 'di btang bas/ /kun gyis rdo rje 'chang gi gral thob shog /za tshogs gtor ma'i lung rdzogs so// //bcom ldan 'das dpal sgrol byed thugs rje'i rgyal po shin tu rnam par grol ba nyid la phyag 'tshal lo/
558a5(rgyud 'grel): mnyam nyid chos sku gsang ba'i sku/ /longs spyod rdzogs sku sprul pa'i sku/ /sku lnga'i bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das/ /kun bzang dang la phyag 'tshal te/ /rgyal ba'i dgongs pa kun 'dus las/ /mdo don chos kyi rnam grol sgo/ /de shes
558a6(rgyud 'grel): de 'jug pa de bsgrub phyir/ /mi 'gal tsam du bsdus te bshad/ /kun bzang thugs rjes 'gro don du/ /theg pa gsum snang 'dul mdzad pa'i/ /don dam nges pa'i theg mchog las/ /gsang sgo mo tshon pa'i mdo rgyud don/ /rnam
558a7(rgyud 'grel): pa gsum du shes bya ste/ /bya ba'i gzhi dang byed pa'i rkyen/ /bya bral 'bras bu'i mthar phyin dag /ji snyed chos kyi rtsa bar bshad/ /phyi nang bye brag ji snyed pa'i/ /chos rnams thams cad byang chub sems/ /ji bzhin dang du ye gnas pa/
558b1(rgyud 'grel): shes par bya ba'i rgyu don yin/ /rtsol bcas spyod pas 'dres 'jug pa'i/ /theg pa de ni bya byed rkyen/ /gzhan du 'bras bu re rtsol med/ /bsgrub bya nyid la lam gnas pas/ /thabs chen theg 'di bya bral ba'o/ /de yang phyi nang nyid la'ang/
558b2(rgyud 'grel): gzhi dang thabs dang 'bras bu yi/ /tshul gsum bye brag chos su bshad/ /gzhi ni snga ma'i don nyid de/ /thabs ni lam yin rnam pa gsum/ /gol sgrib ngo bo yan lag ste/ /gol sa ltung ba'i sgo dgu dang/ /nyon mongs shes bya'i
558b3(rgyud 'grel): sgrib sogs dang/ /thun mong rtog pa brgya bcu gcig /dgu bcu la sogs skyon rnams dang/ /shes pa'i bye brag drug la sogs/ /mi mthun gol sgrib phyogs su bshad/ /ngo bo thabs dang shes rab ste/ /rol pa'i ka ra la sogs pa'i/ /man ngag
558b4(rgyud 'grel): thabs kyi bder 'jug dang/ /thos bsam sgom pa'i tshul 'gro ba'o/ /der ni 'jug pa rnam gsum ste/ /rtog dpyod don dang yi ge yi/ /rjes 'jug dang po sngon 'gro nyid/ /blo yi stobs kyis rnam pa gnyis/ /lus las snang ba'i chos rnams la/

559a1(rgyud 'grel): thang cig gnas pa dang/ /gsal bar bstan pa'i ring goms dang/ /rang dbang gyur nas ches bstan dang/ /spyod lam kun tu rlung gnas yin/ /de dag zag bcas bsam gtan te/ /gnyis med yul bral de mthong
559a2(rgyud 'grel): min/ /mnyam nyid gsang ba'i bde don la/ /dad dang mos dang der rtsol dang/ /des de g.yo dang cher g.yos dang/ /mthong dang 'dra bar 'gyur yin te/ /skar phran 'bring dang chen po dang/ gcig pa gnyis pa'i zla ba 'dra/ /rang gi mtshan

559a4(rgyud 'grel): bzhi pa 'dra/ /rang dang spyi yi tha snyad bral/ /dmigs med kun gsal ye shes nyid/ /g.yo dang thob dang brtan rdzogs pa'i/ /rim pas mthar phyin gsum du snang/ /lnga brgyad cu drug tshul du gsal/ /de dag sa dang rnal 'byor skabs/ /sems
559a5(rgyud 'grel): lam bcu dang lnga zhes bya/ /gang dag blo chen mngon rtogs pas/ /mnyam nyid yul bral rang gsal bar/ /mi g.yo cig car gang 'jug pa/ /sa dang lam gyi grangs rtsol med/ /yi ge mtshan ma'i rnal 'byor dag /blo yi khyad par che
559a6(rgyud 'grel): phra ba'i/ /thams cad gsal rdzogs cig car dang/ /lnga dang bcu la sogs par snang/ /lam lnga rnal 'byor rigs 'dzin gyi/ /sa dang gnas skabs ye shes dang/ /sgrib dang gol sa rtog pa dang/ /spyod dang ting 'dzin dam tshig dang/ /
559a7(rgyud 'grel): dus dang dngos grub mthar phyin dang/ /lta ba'i khyad par gnas 'gyur sogs/ /bye brag lam lnga'i chos su snang/ /rnal 'byor sa bcu'i lam rnams la'ang/ /khyad par de dag rnam bcud bsal/ /lha yi phyag rgya cig pa dang/ /gnyis
559b1(rgyud 'grel): 'brel yan lag rdzogs pa dang/ /'khor lo gcig dang rnam spros dang/ /shin tu rnam spros dkyil 'khor dang/ /gling gcig gang dang stong gsum dang/ /grangs med shin tu grangs med dang/ /chos dbyings mdza' yas rab gsal rdzogs/ /de dag
559b2(rgyud 'grel): rnam pa'i khyad par yang/ /rtog dang mtshan ma'i rnal 'byor dang/ /chu zla lta bur gzung med dang/ /gzung 'dzin gnyis bral de nyid dang/ /cis 'dra mi gnas mnyam nyid dang/ /rang gi mtshan nyid gsal nges dang/ /zag pa med dang lhun grub pa'i/
559b3(rgyud 'grel): rab 'bring tha ma'i rim pa yis/ /thob dang shin tu thob pa dang/ /brtan rdzogs nyid de rnam bcu'o/ /tshad kyang khru bzhi brgyad cu drug /sum cu gnyis dang drug cu bzhi/ /de bzhin 'gyur sogs chos dbyings rnams/ /lhar gsal 'phro 'du dbugs
559b4(rgyud 'grel): yul dang/ /dri sgra gzugs sogs rim bzhin 'phags/ /de dag blo yi rtsal yin te/ /shes rab la sogs kun de bzhin/ /khyad par gyur cing rnam par 'phel/ /don dang yi ge gang de'ang/ /so so'i gnas skabs lam bdag nyid/ /bgrod dang
559b5(rgyud 'grel): de chos ldan pa dang/ /rgyud mi gtong dang rten byed dang/ /dus de skabs dang 'bras bu dang/ /gags dang 'dra ba'i lhung gnas dang/ /rtsol zhing bgrod pa'i lam sems dang/ /spyod lam dang ni blo gnas dang/ /ma 'da' bsrung dang dus nyid dang/ /yon
559b6(rgyud 'grel): tan mthu dang bya bral dang/ /shes rab stobs dang khyad par las/ /tha snyad bye brag rnams su gsungs/ /gzhan yang sems bskyed sngags la sogs/ /lam gyi chos sgo tha snyad kun/ /lnga dang bcu sogs grags pa yin/ /dang po gnyis la gnas
559b7(rgyud 'grel): pa ni/ /gsang chen 'bras bu lam gyi rten/ /de bzhin rim par bgrod gnas na/ /ltung yang gzugs kyis zin pa dang/ /lus ngan mi srid bde 'gro yis/ /yang dag gnas dang 'dod rigs sogs/ /bde 'gro'i gnas ngan mi srid dang/ /
560a1(rgyud 'grel): khams gsum 'jig tshogs zag bral dang/ /mi ldog mi gnas phyir 'ong? ngal mi shes skyon bral mdza' rdzogs nas/ /sa bar mi ldog sangs rgyas sar/ /thog med mngon gyur lhun gyis grub/ /de phyir lam
560a2(rgyud 'grel): gyi mchog tu brjod/ /de rkyen yan lag rnam pa gnyis/ /sgrub byed rkyen dang shes byed pa'i/ /lam gyi yan lag sum cu gnyis/ /mdo dang bzhi dang bslab pa'i mdza' / /mdo ni bcu gnyis 'jug sgo dang/ /dam tshig lta ba ting 'dzin dang//
560a3(rgyud 'grel): dmigs pa zlas pa 'phrin las dang/ /spyod pa dang ni thob bya'i dbang/ /rigs 'dzin sa dang sangs rgyas sa/ /nges byed yan lag tu bshad/ /gzhi ni rnam bcu bsgrub pa dang/ /gsang sngags ming dang spyod pa dang/ /dngos grub gnas dang bzlas
560a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sgra/ /phyag rgya ting 'dzin lta ba dang/ /cho 'phrul dag ste de dag ston/ /dpe bcus mtshon nas rab tu shes/ /bslab pa'i mdza' ni rnam bcu ste/ /dam tshig bzhi dang rgyud dgrol dang/ /sgo mo bsdur dang phul dbyung dang/ /thag bcad
560a5(rgyud 'grel): pa dang nyams blang dang/ /la dor spyod dang dbang rim dang/ /man ngag don dang mdor bsdus rnams/ /rnal 'byor bslab pa'i mdza' bcur bcad/ /gzhi 'dzin pa ni dam tshig ste/ /sgo gsum sdom par gnas pa'i don/ /rtsa ba yan lag
560a6(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa'i/ /bsrung dang bsgrub pa de nyid do/ /rgyud 'grol ba ni thos bsam ste/ /mkhas ldan dam pa'i bla ma la/ /dad dang sri zhu gus pa yis/ /don gang nyan 'dzin rtogs byed 'grol/ /sgo bsdur ba ni theg pa rnams/ /shes par
560a7(rgyud 'grel): byed dang rtsol ba ste/ /gol sgrib phyogs su gang gsung dag /bcad phyir de dag rig shes byed/ /phul du dbyung ba 'di don nyid/ /mkhas shing rab tu shes pa'o/ /thag bcad pa ni lta ba ste/ /ji bzhin ma nor shes rab nyid/ /re dogs
560b1(rgyud 'grel): med par sngon 'gro don/ /nyams blangs pa ni ting 'dzin te/ /phyag rgya bzhis sogs spros pa dang/ /spros med la sogs bsam gtan yin/ /la dor ba ni spyod pa ste/ /dkyil 'khor bzhi dang las bzhi dang/ /bsgrub pa la sogs bye brag dang/ /thun
560b2(rgyud 'grel): mong thabs kyi mdza' spyod nyid/ /dbang ni rim par bgrong byed pa'i/ /lnga dang lnga sogs nus mthu bskyed/ /man ngag don bsgrub thabs kyi mchog /gser 'gyur bdud rtsi lta bu'i tshul/ /mdor bsdu ba ni sems kyi don/ /ji bzhin par rtogs kun 'dus
560b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /shes byed yan lag rnam pa gnyis/ /mtshon byed tshig don yi ge'i sgra/ /rgyud don yan lag rnam drug dang/ /de 'grel gtan la 'bebs byed pa'i/ /lde mig zhes su grags pa de/ /rgyud ni byin rlabs 'byung ba dang/ /lung bstan
560b4(rgyud 'grel): rgyud pa rnam gnyis phyir/ /de 'grel pa yang rnam pa gnyis/ /byin rlabs sku bzhi bstan pa dag /bshad thabs lde mig rnam gnyis te/ /dpyod pa'i 'dren sgo rnam 'grel gsum/ /'byed pa drug dang 'grol pa bzhi/ /nges par 'byin pa rnam
560b5(rgyud 'grel): gsum mo/ /sgo gnyis spyi dang khyad par ste/ /spyi'ang rnam gsum yan lag mdo/ /rtsa ba dag gis 'grel bar byed/ /khyad par gsang sgo'i rnam 'grel yang/ /yan lag mdo dang rtsa ba yis/ /'byed 'grel nges par 'byin par byed/ /
560b6(rgyud 'grel): 'byed pa rgyu dang rtsa ba dang/ /'brel dang tshig dang nges par sbyor/ /rgyu ni gleng gzhi drug yin te/ /don gang gang tshe gang nyid kyis/ /gang du gang la bshad brjod pa'o/ /rtsa ba gleng bslang rkyen nyid dang/ /ji ltar bslang nas zhus
560b7(rgyud 'grel): bshad tshul/ /'grel pa gang brjod gang gis brjod/ /gang phyir gang gi stobs kyis bshad/ /'drin pa brjod pa'i rgyu 'di dang/ /ji ltar bshad pa'i tshul bcu ste/ /rang bzhin lta ba'i nges don dang/ /spyi don bsdud dang rnam par
561a1(rgyud 'grel): dbye/ /tshig don 'grel dang 'brel shugs sbyor/ /rang lugs nyid dang brgal lan dang/ /ldem dgongs brda' dang dpes mtshon dang/ /man ngag gab sbas 'byin bsdebs rnams/ /dpe bcu lta bur
561a2(rgyud 'grel): bshad pa'o/ /nges pa gtan tshigs rnam bcu gnyis/ /snod sgo bzhi la bstan pa bzhi/ /'tsham bar so sor nges byed dang/ /lung dang don dang rigs pa dang/ /mtshon dpe gtan tshigs mdza' dag gis/ /snang dang mi 'gal
561a3(rgyud 'grel): rgyas 'thad sbyar/ /de dag re re 'ang dgos pa dang/ /ngo bo dam tshig dmigs bzung bcas/ /rnam bcu gnyis kyis nges 'byed shes/ /sbyor ba byang chub yan lag ste/ /rtogs pa bzhi dang mtshan nyid bzhi/ /dgos 'brel bzhi dang
561a4(rgyud 'grel): yan lag bzhi/ /der 'jug bzhi dang mtshon dpe bzhi/ /bsnyen bsgrub yan lag bzhi dag dang/ /mtshan nyid tshul dang sbyor ba ni/ /rnam pa sum tu rtsa gnyis rnams/ /gzhi nyid 'brel dang zeg bcas dang/ /mthong dang bsgom dang mthor phyin dang/ /sangs rgyas sa dang rnam drug du/ /bsdus te de yi
561a5(rgyud 'grel): yan lag yin/ /cho 'phrul bzhi dang mngon shis lnga/ /thabs dang thabs sbyar lnga lnga dang/ /rang bzhin lnga dang 'phrin las bzhi/ /gzhan don spyod pa'i yan lag ste/ /bla med sbyor ba'i chos 'grel yin/ /mdo bzhi thos mthong
561a6(rgyud 'grel): mngon sum dang/ /bya ba med dang rnam bzhir 'grel/ /rtsa ba nges pa'i man ngag gsum/ /mi mthun phyogs rnams bcad pa dang/ /don mthun 'gro ba'i dpe mtshon dang/ /nges pa'i don la gnas pa yi/ /don gsum tshul gyis
561a7(rgyud 'grel): rnam 'grel 'byin/ /lung bstan brgyud pa'i bstan pa yang/ /de bzhin tshul du 'grel ba ste/ /rgyud don rnam gsum khungs dang rgyu/ /ngo bo nyid de dang po ni/ /thun mong bcas gzhi spyi rgyud do/ /gdam ngag lung bstan rtsa
561b1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i rgyud/ /gleng bzhi spyi yi rgyud ces bya/ /'khor 'dus smres dang bskul zhes pa/ /bstan pa 'byung pa'i rgyu rkyen ste/ /ngo bo 'tshogs pa drug nyid do/ /gleng bslang la sogs drug rnams dang/ /mdo bzhi rtsa ba gsum la sogs/ /tshul bzhin rjes su sbyar
561b2(rgyud 'grel): bar bya/ /de dag 'bras bu'i lam du bshad/ /'bras bu nyid ni rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /sku gsung thugs dang yon tan lnga/ /nyi shu lngar bsdus mdza' yas rnams/ /lhun rdzogs rnam kun mkhyen pa'o/ /gsang mchog gsang bdag bka' lung mdo rgyud do/ /gsang
561b3(rgyud 'grel): bsdus gsal bshad mdo tsam phyogs brjod pa/ /ma nor mi 'gal tsam du nyams kyis bstan/ /de yi dge ba gang mchis yongs la bsngo/ /gsang ba'i mdo don bsdus pa/ slob dpon d+harma po des mdzad pa rdzogs so// //
561b4(rgyud 'grel): */ (/skabs 'grel bye brag tu bshad pa bzhugs//) //mi 'khrug pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rgyud las 'byung ba'i skabs bshad bya/ /de yang rgyud nyid las/ /sa dang gnas skabs ye shes dang/ /sgrib dang gol sa rtog pa dang/ /spyod dang ting 'dzin dam tshig
561b5(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /dus dang dngos grub mthar phyin dang/ /lta ba'i khyad par gnas 'gyur rnams/ /thams cad gcig las med na yang/ /grangs sam dbye ba'i bye brag rnams/ /snod kyi rtsal dang sbyar nas ni/ /chos rnams kun gzhir gcig pa la/ /kun gzhi'i
561b6(rgyud 'grel): gnas 'gyur rnam pa lnga/ /bye brag lam lnga'i chos su snang/ /zhes gsungs pas/ /lngar brjod pas 'di ni snod kyi/ /rim pas bcur yang 'gyur bar dgongs so/ /de la lngar drangs pa ni bcu'i yang rtsa bar 'gyur ba'i phyir/ blo rims su sbyor
561b7(rgyud 'grel): ba'i rab kyi ched du bstan te/ gang zhe na/ sa dang zhes pa/ 'gyur ba ma nges pa'i sa ni rkyen la rag lus pa dang/ rigs thams cad pa yin te/ /'jug ldog ltung dang bcas pa yis/ /kun tu 'khor zhing ma nges pa'o/ /zhes bka' las
562a1(rgyud 'grel): snang ngo/ /gnyis pa gal chen sbyor ba'i sa ni/ /ched du brtson 'grus lam 'bad na/ /legs nyes 'byung ba'i nyes dbang du 'gro bas/ /slab pa bcu la 'jug cing sbyor ba la brten pa'i phyir ro/ /de yang 'di skad du/ dge dang mi dge'i
562a2(rgyud 'grel): las rnams kun/ /gcod sbyong sbyor ba'i tshul nyid kyis/ /legs nyes stobs chen 'gyed pa'o zhes snang ngo/ /gsum pa mi ldog gnas pa 'am/ /rten pas khyad par 'gro ba'i sa ni/ /mthong lam thob pas 'jigs pa lnga dang bral ba'i phyir te/ mthong
562a3(rgyud 'grel): ba la brten nas/ /bogs su 'gro ba'i rten gnas nyid yin pa'i phyir ro/ /'di skad du/ bdun nyid rdzogs pas 'gro ba ste/ zhes pa dang/ ngal so ba las thams cad mthong/ /mi ldog pa la goms byar med/ /zhes snang ngo/ /bzhi pa dmigs pa
562a4(rgyud 'grel): 'bras bu skye ba'i sa ni/ bsgom pa'i lam ste/ 'dir gsang sngags kyi gzhung gis/ /spyod yul mi dmigs mod kyi/ dmigs par tha snyad 'dogs te/ mthong ba'i don la blo shin tu mi dmigs pa yis/ 'bras bu 'byin pa'i gzhi'i phyir te/
562a5(rgyud 'grel): 'di skad du/ khyad par rtsal 'phang kun rdzogs shing/ /ting nge 'dzin gyis sbyor ba'o/ /zhes snang ngo/ /lnga pa rtsal chen rdzogs pa'i sa ni/ /rgyal tshab skyes bur gyur pa'i phyir dang/ /mthar phyin pa'i lam pa yin pa'i phyir/ nus pa'i rtsal
562a6(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs pas/ sangs rgyas la sbyor bar byed pa'i gnas yin pa'i phyir ro/ /'di skad du/ /phyag rgya chen po sgyu ma yin/ /'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal tshan yin/ /mthong ba'i gnas na bcu drug sa/ zhes snang bas/ cho 'phrul 'gyed nus shing
562a7(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya chen po'i rigs 'dzin yang yin pa'i phyir ro/ /gnas skabs zhes pa/ rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi dbang du/ gnas dang skabs cig du ston ste/ bzhed tshig tu/ yon tan mthong thos rkyen phrad dang/ /byin brlabs 'brel cing mtshungs
562b1(rgyud 'grel): ldan pas/ /g.yo sems 'byung zhing 'dun skye ba'i/ /dus kyi thang la bab phyir skabs zhes bya'o/ /bslab pa 'jug pa'i skabs gnyis pa'ang/ 'di skad du/ g.yo smon rgyu yis bslab bcu la/ /der mi sdod par ldang sems kyis/ /bcu la 'jug
562b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i gzhi dang dus/ /thang du bab phyir ming thob pa'o/ /zhes bya'o/ gsum pa ro myong ba'i skabs ni/ 'di skad du/ sems gsum rgyu yis bslab rdzogs nas/ /'jug pa'i sems rgyus bden mthong ba/ /ji bzhin nyid kyi ro myong ba'i/ /gnas
562b3(rgyud 'grel): dus nges pas skabs su brjod zhes bya'o/ /bzhi pa yul la 'jug pa'i gnas skabs ni/ 'di skad du/ mthong ba'i shes yul nges pa la/ /dgra dbang mi 'gyur lhag sems kyis/ /rang rig gnyis med mi g.yo bar/ /byed la 'jug
562b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i skabs su smra zhes bya'o/ /lnga pa rtog chen la phebs pa'i gnas skabs ni/ /'jug pa'i rnal 'byor sngon sum rgyus/ /rang rig mngon sum rig sems skyes/ /yang dag don mthong thil phebs phyir/ /de la 'di skad brjod pa yin zhes bya'o/
562b5(rgyud 'grel): bshad rgyud kyi dbang du/ gnas dang skabs so so ste/ de la gnas zhes pa/ 'dod pa grub pa mthar phyin pa'i gnas ni/ ji skad du/ rkyen gyi rnal 'byor bya byed dang/ /phyi pa'i rtags lam rdzogs pa dang/ /'di nyid sngar spyad thams cad
562b6(rgyud 'grel): kyi/ /'dod pa'i gsang lam rnyed pa ni/ /las mthar phyin pas 'dir phrad cing/ /de la brten phyir gnas su brjod zhes bya'o/ /gnyis pa bzod pa grub 'phags pa'i gnas ni/ /ji skad du/ /yang dag don la mi skad bzod/ /
562b7(rgyud 'grel): de phyir rigs nges gzungs sngags yod/ /de phyir 'phags pa zhes bya ste/ /skye bo sa las 'das pa'i gnas/ zhes bya'o/ /gsum pa bden pa grub pa yang dag pa'i gnas ni/ /ji skad du/ sgro bskur med pa'i gnyis med don//
563a1(rgyud 'grel): mthong ba mthar phyin mi bslu zhing/ /phyin ci ma log la brten phyir/ /dang po'i dbugs chen phyin pa'i gnas/ zhes bya'o/ /bzhi pa las su rung ba'i sbyor ba'i gnas ni/ ji skad du/ mthong nas goms pa mi g.yo ba'i/ /gnyis
563a2(rgyud 'grel): med gsal la mi g.yo ba'i/ /ting 'dzin goms pas 'bras bur sbyor/ /mthar lam thob la ma rag pa'o/ /zhes bya'o/ /lnga pa lhun gyis grub pa mnyam pa'i gnas ni/ /ji skad du/ mthong goms stobs su gyur pa yis/ /'bras bu thob pa'i skabs yin
563a3(rgyud 'grel): zhing/ /shing 'bras tshogs kyi dpe lta bus/ /yon tan rdzogs pas blang dor med/ zhes bya'o/ /skabs zhes pa lnga ste/ sems can gyi skabs ni/ ras bal sa bon lta bu'i gzhi/ /g.yo bas sgra yi rnal 'byor gyi/ /bsgom bya yid la byed pa'i
563a4(rgyud 'grel): gzhi/ /da dung ma nges dran tsam mo/ /zhes bya'o/ /gnyis pa 'phags pa'i skabs ni/ ji skad du/ dad pas mos pas lam 'gro zhing/ /slob pa pa 'di bzod thob phyir/ /'du shes rigs des khyad par 'phags/ /yang dag rgyud du nges phyir ro/ /
563a5(rgyud 'grel): gsum pas thob pa'i skabs ni/ 'di skad du/ mi slob chos mig rdul bral zhing/ /dbugs chen phyin nas mi ldog pa'i/ /ting 'dzin thob pa'i dus nges phyir/ /de la mtshan du de skad brjod/ zhes bya'o/ /bzhi pa rigs 'dzin byang chub
563a6(rgyud 'grel): thob pa'i skabs ni/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems chen por/ /bdag phyir bzlog med gzhan don du/ /phyir 'ong rang dbang skyo spyod phyir/ /rgyal ba'i sras po gdung 'tsho ba skabs zhes bya'o/ /lnga pa 'bras bu thob pa'i skabs ni/ /
563a7(rgyud 'grel): ji skad du/ byang chub chen por rdzogs sems skyes/ /rgyal tshab skyes bur rtsal rdzogs pa/ /lam du gyur pa'i 'bras bu'i phyir/ /'bras bu'i skabs zhes mtshan nges pa'o/ /zhes bya'o/ /ye shes dang zhes bya ba ni/ /mnyam
563b1(rgyud 'grel): par bzhag pa re re la/ ye shes re re 'char ba'o zhes snang bas/ /skabs lngar sems lnga bsgom shar gyi ye shes lnga ste/ ji skad du/ yang dag bden pa gnyis med don/ /yid byed g.yo yi ye shes dang/ /bzod thob 'jug slob ye shes dang/ /ma
563b2(rgyud 'grel): nor mthong dga' i ye shes dang/ /de nyid mi 'gyur gnas ye shes/ /de mthar rdzogs sems ye shes so/ /zhes bya'o/ /bsgrib dang zhes pa 'di skad du/ /so so thun mong ma yin pa'i/ /sgrib las zhes rtsi byed cing zhes snang bas/ lnga ste/ 'di skad
563b3(rgyud 'grel): du/ sa 'am rnal 'byor rnam lnga po/ /rang rang mthong la zhen pa yis/ /gong ma gong ma ma mthong phyir/ /lam gyi dbye bas sgrib pa'ar lnga'o/ /zhes bya'o/ /gol sa zhes pa/ 'di skad du/ thun mong rgyu yi lam lngar gol/ /khyad par sgrib la
563b4(rgyud 'grel): bltos tshul gyis/ /lam lnga gong dmigs 'og lta can/ /ltung nor phyir na sgra 'jug pa'o/ /zhes bya'o/ /rtog pa dang zhes pa ni/ /ched du byas pa'i rtog pa ste/ 'di skad du/ sa lnga dang po tshig la rtog /gnyis pa yi ge gsum pa
563b5(rgyud 'grel): ming/ bzhi brda tha snyad lnga par rtogs/ /bag chags lnga yod sbyong ba'i phyir/ /bltos na phyag rgya 'phro 'du dang/ /shes yul rnams la gnas phyir rtog /zhes bya'o/ /spyod dang zhes pa ni/ bzhi phyir spyod pa'ang skabs kyis bdag dang gzhan don du/ sngon
563b6(rgyud 'grel): 'byung dang rjes 'jug tshul du 'gyur ro/ /de las dang por ni/ rtsol ba dang tshogs kyi sa lam yin pa'i phyir/ /rtsol tshogs gnyis la'ang shin tu 'bad/ /byin brlabs dbang sgyur thabs tshul gyis/ /gzhan don mdza' 'ga' stsol bas spyod/ /gnyis
563b7(rgyud 'grel): pa bdag phyir legs nyes la/ /gcod sbyong stobs phyir shin duAng/ /brtson spyod dben las phyogs gcig spyod/ /slob sbyong bdag gzhan don kyang byed/ /gsum par mi dmigs shar ba yis/ /'dod pa'i dngos po dbyings sbyor phyir/ /
564a1(rgyud 'grel): bdag phyir mi dmigs gzhan phyed du/ /'khor lo sgyur bas gsang sngags ston/ /bzhi bar bdag phyir rnal 'byor spyod/ /gzhan la phyir 'ong sa yin phyir/ /rang dbang can du skye zhes nas/ /ji ltar 'dod ltar thabs
564a2(rgyud 'grel): mchog sbyor/ /lnga bar ting 'dzin rtsal rdzogs phyir/ /dbang sgyur thabs kyi spyod pa yis/ /cho 'phrul bzhi sogs sna tshogs ston/ /gdul bya smin cing 'khor lo'ang skor/ zhes bya'o/ /dam tshig zhes bya ba/ skabs kyi ched du byed pa las /
564a3(rgyud 'grel): brtags kyi rtsa ba yan lag rnams/ /kun srung bye brag dang por ni/ /bdud lnga dgra bzhi bzlog pa dang/ /spyod pa rgyun nam bzhi la gnas/ /'dun cing yi rang mnyams byed/ /gnyis pa bslab pa bcu byed las/ /mi 'da' bzod las mi nyams
564a4(rgyud 'grel): byed/ /gsum par lta ba'i dam tshig byed/ /mthong ba mi gnas brtson par byed/ /'di skad du nam mkha' lta bu'i rnal 'byor pas/ /nam mkha' lta bu'i dam tshig srung/ /zhes gsungs so/ /bzhi pa la ting nge 'dzin gyi so nyid las/ mi nyams
564a5(rgyud 'grel): ma yengs mi 'da' ba' o/ /'di skad du/ brjed pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis/ /bsrung ba med pa'i ngang du bsdam/ zhes gsungs te/ gzhan du ni/ phyir 'ong bar dam bcas pa gang yin pa'o/ /lnga par med dang byal pa cig pu dang/ /lhun
564a6(rgyud 'grel): gyis grub ba rnam bzhi pa'o/ /ting 'dzin dang zhes pa'ang lnga ste/ rnam par mi rtog lha sgom pa 'ang/ /gang rung dang por yid la byed/ /gnyis pa 'phro 'du gcig pa dang/ /gsum pa yongs su mi ldog cing/ /bzhi par de bzhin nyid bsgom
564a7(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /lnga par kun tu snang bsgom/ /de phyir rnal 'byor rnal 'byor yin/ /zhes bya'o/ /dus dang zhes pa'ang lnga ste/ gsang sngags yid la byed tsam yod/ /de phyir dran pa thob par smra/ /gsang ba'i bslab bcu thob pa'i dus/ /gnyis
564b1(rgyud 'grel): med rtogs pa thob pa'i dus/ /de nyid bsgoms pa goms pa'i dus/ /de mngon gyur pas mthar phyin dus/ zhes bya'o/ dngos grub zhes pa/ dang po 'dod pa grub pa dang/ /gnyis pa bzod pa grub pa dang/ /gsum pa bden grub bzhi pa las/ /rung ba
564b2(rgyud 'grel): grub pa'o/ lnga pa ni/ /lhun gyis grub pa'i rigs thob pa'o/ /'on te dang po gnyis pa ni/ /dmigs pa grub pa'o/ /gsum pa ni/ don dam bcud kyi rnam shes rgyas/ /bzhi pa 'khor ba'i dbyings su 'grub/ /lnga pa thams cad 'grub par
564b3(rgyud 'grel): gsungs/ /mthar phyin dang zhes pa/ dge ba'i las mdza' gsang sngags la/ /'dir phrad dang po gnyis pa ni/ /bslab mdza' bcu la slob phyir ro/ /gsum pa mthong mthar gsang sngags mthong/ /de rgyus bzhi par gsang sngags don/ /mthong bgoms
564b4(rgyud 'grel): bya de nyid mthar/ /phyin pa'o lnga par mthar lam 'bras/ /rdzogs phyir 'bras bu kun gyi mthar/ /rtsal chen rdzogs pa thob pa'o/ /lta ba'i khyad par zhes pa lnga ste/ dang po 'dun pa'i rnal 'byor pa ni/ /g.yo smon gyis gsang sngags la nyan
564b5(rgyud 'grel): dbang nos nas/ slob du zad kyang/ tshig gi tshogs pa sgra'i rnal 'byor yin pa'i phyir/ /blo sman pas gsang sngags kyi don tshig tu smra zhing/ /mthong pa med de/ yid la byed pa'i lta ba'o/ /'on kyang phyogs las da dung bzod pa'ang ma thob bo/
564b6(rgyud 'grel): de yang 'di skad du/ brtsal ba las kyi rnal 'byor pas/ /'dun pa sems dpa' i rnal 'byor la/ /sogs pa'i rnal 'byor rnam drug po/ /shes rab rtsal gyi 'phang dams pas/ /ting 'dzin rtsal yang chung pa ste/ /don la mthong bar mi
564b7(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur bas/ zhes gsungs so/ /rigs chen 'byed pa'i lta ba ni/ /bcu yis sa gsum 'dus pa ste/ /'dir byed nas/ slob pa bcu'i tsha bzod pa thob ste/ bden pa rnam gnyis dbyer med pa bstan pa la/ /mi skrag cing slar sprod pas
565a1(rgyud 'grel): rang rig mtshan nyid du thos bsam gyi sgo nas shes te/ 'di skad du/ don la mi skrag ngo mtshar skye/ /dpyod sems 'jug pa'i sems dpa' de/ /ngan song mi ldog dgon par 'jug /zhes gsungs so/ /dbugs chen
565a2(rgyud 'grel): 'byin pa'i lta ba ni/ /sa lnga par bsgoms pas chos nyid ji lta bar mthong ste/ mi ldog pa'i lta ba'o/ /de yang nga la so ba yas thams cad mthong/ /zhes gsungs so/ /lung chen thob pa'i rnal 'byor gyi lta ba ni/ mi g.yo ba'i lta ba ste/ de ltar
565a3(rgyud 'grel): mthong ba'o/ /rtsal chen rdzogs pa'i lta ba ni/ rang 'byung ye shes su bsgoms pas mngon du 'gyur ba ste/ 'di skad du/ rang 'byung rang rig mngon sum snang dus na/ /rang 'byung ye shes de nyid mthong zhes pa/ /zhes gsungs so/ /la la
565a4(rgyud 'grel): dag ni 'di skad du/ /lta ba lnga ni shes pa lnga/ /gsang sngags 'dod pa 'dam shes dang/ /rnam par shes pa bslab bcu dang/ /bzod thob rang gi mtshan nyid shes/ /thams cad ma skyes ye shes dang/ /de las yongs su mi ? shes//
565a5(rgyud 'grel): shes pa chen po kun tu snang/ /mthong pa dam pa'i lta ba yin zhes smra'o/ /gnas 'gyur rnams zhes pa/ /skabs lnga kun zhi lnga bag chags lnga dang bcas pa gnas 'gyur ba ste/ /dran pa thob pa'i dus sems can gyi skabs su skye bo'i zhes
565a6(rgyud 'grel): pa ma rig pa las sems g.yo ba 'byung bas/ lam gyi gzhir gyur pas rkyen gyis bsgyur ba las kyi bag chags gnas te/ /sbyong zhing 'dod pa shes par 'gyur ba'i phyir dang po'o/ /spyod pa thob pa'i dus 'phags pa'i skabs su
565a7(rgyud 'grel): bskal pa bcu yang dag pa'i don la stor ba'i phyir/ sbyor ba bdun pa'i kun gzhir 'gyur ste/ mngon du rgyu ba gnas te sbyor ro/ /rtags pa thob pa'i dus sa thob pa'i skabs su / 'og gi 'bad bas bden pa mthong ba'i phyir/ /snang
565b1(rgyud 'grel): ba don gyi kun gzhir gnas 'gyur te/ /de'i tshe kun du rgyu'i bag chags gnas te sbyong ba'o/ /rigs 'dzin byang chub sems dpa' i skabs goms pa thob pa'i dus su/ mthong ba la goms pas sems mi g.yo ba'i phyir/ /'gyur med gnas pa'i kun ?
565b2(rgyud 'grel): gnas 'gyur ste/ bag chags lhan cig skyes pa'i gnas de sbyong ba'o/ /mthar phyin pa'i dus byang chub chen po'i 'bras bu thob pa'i skabs su/ /sngar goms pas mngon du gyur pa'i phyir/ btsal med gnas pa'i kun gzhir gnas 'gyur te/ bag la
565b3(rgyud 'grel): nyal gnas pa sbyong ba'o/ /zhes 'chad na /kho bo ni dang po rigs ma nges ba dang/ chos nyid ma shes pa'i phyir der 'gyur zhes mi 'dogs pa'i phyir/ /dang po nas gnyis par 'gyur ba nas/ lnga ba nas sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur pa dang lnga ste/ /lam
565b4(rgyud 'grel): lngar rang rig ting 'dzin brtan pas/ ye shes skyes pas sgrib pa re sbyangs pa skad cig ma phyi ma la lam lngar skabs lnga'i phyir/ kun gzhi'i gnas 'gyur rnam pa lngas/ bye brag lam lnga'i chos su bshad/ zhes gsungs so/ /bag chags lnga ni
565b5(rgyud 'grel): sgrig pa lngar yang gsungs te/ de dag ni rgyu 'bras kyi phyir khyad par yod de/ 'di skad du/ de dag re zhing rgyu 'bras gnyis/ /snga ma snga ma gang dang gang/ /phyi ma phyi ma smin pa'i rgyu/ /de bzhin kun tu 'khor bar 'byung/ zhes gsungs te/ 'chad pa'i
565b6(rgyud 'grel): bcu po? ? 'bras su 'gyur bar dgongs so/ /yang ma bcur bshad pa bya ba ni/ sa dang zhes pa /'gyur dbang ma nges pa'i sa dang/ rten pa gzhi'i sa dang/ gal chen spyod ba'i sa dang/ bslab pa rgyun gyi sa dang/ bsod nams gter gyi sa dang/
565b7(rgyud 'grel): rten pas khyad par du 'gro ba'i sa dang/ dmigs pas 'bras bu skye ba'i sa dang/ gnas pa mi 'gyur ba'i sa dang/ 'dul ba chos nyid kyi sa dang/ rdzogs pa spyir chib kyi sa'o/ /de yang bcur bstan pa ni/ gsang sngags rim 'jug gi 'bring gi
566a1(rgyud 'grel): yul lo/ /gzhi bcur de las spros pa ni/ tha ma'i dngang du gsungs pa'o/ /de la sa lnga ni lnga'i skabs su bshad de/ /sngar lnga'i skabs su ma bshad pa rnams cung zhig du dgrol ba ni gang zhe na/ dang po gnyis ba rten
566a2(rgyud 'grel): pa gzhi'i sa ni/ 'di skad du/ dang po gsang ba'i bslab pa la/ /rtsol bar sbyong ba la brten nas/ /dang po'i las kyi rnal 'byor te/ /sa rnams kun gyi gzhi rten no/ /zhes gsungs so/ /gal chen bshad zin to/ /de'i cha bslab pa rgyun gyi sa ni
566a3(rgyud 'grel): 'dir bslab pa bcu la zhugs nas mi gtong bar rgyun du 'bad pas bogs su byed ba'i gnas yin pa'i phyir ro/ /'di skad du/ bslab pa'i mdza' bcu mthar phyin cing/ /ji ltar zla ba yar gsal bzhin/ /bslab pa'i ye shes 'phel
566a4(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur te/ zhes gsungs te/ bsod nams gter gyi sa ni/ 'di skad du/ bslab pa bcu mthar phyin pa yi/ /bsod nams yon tan zad mi shes/ /slob pas mthar phyin bsgom pa'i sa/ /mthong lam thob la ma rag pa'o/ /zhes
566a5(rgyud 'grel): gsungs so/ /drug pa dang bdun pa dang brgyad pa gsum bshad zin to/ /dgu pa lnga pa las 'phros pa bdal ba chos nyid ni/ rang gi kun gzhi'i chos nyid dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med pa nges bgos pa med par kun khyab par rtogs pa'i gnas
566a6(rgyud 'grel): yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de yang yul don ye shes de sbyar bas/ shes par byas pa thams cad rdzogs/ zhes gsungs so/ /bcu pa rdzogs pa spyir chib pa ni/ 'di skad du/ bcu pa'i tha ma dang po las/ /mthar rdzogs kun gyi rtog
566a7(rgyud 'grel): yin te/ /klong yangs nam mkha' i snying po la/ /sprin med nyi ma 'bum gyis bdal/ /cir snang ci'ang ma yin pa'i/ /mi skye mi 'gag ngo bo las/ /ji ltar bltas dgu der snang bas/ /theg mchog spyi rgya rlabs kyis bcad/ zhes gsungs
566b1(rgyud 'grel): so/ /gnas skabs zhes pa de gnyis kun 'dus ltar/ /gnas skabs bcur yang sbyar te/ /bdun ba skye pa'i gnas skabs dang/ zhes pa la sogs pas mngon no/ /dgongs 'dus ltar so sor bshad na/ dang po bshad zin to/ /gnyis pa'i gnas ni/
566b2(rgyud 'grel): rten pa grub pa lam gyi gnas te/ lam rnams kyi gzhir gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /gsum pa bshad zin to/ /bzhi pa ni bzod pa grub pa slob pa'i gnas te/ zab mo'i don la bzod pa thob pas/ ye shes 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir/ bslab pa bcu la slong
566b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sa yin pa'i phyir ro/ /lnga pa bslab pa grub pa rtser chib pa'i gnas de bslab pa bcu khong du chud cing rtser chib pa'i sa yin pa'i phyir ro/ /drug pa bdun pa brgyad pa bshad zin to/ /rdeng du gyur pa chos nyid kyi gnas dgu par/ bsgoms pas
566b4(rgyud 'grel): phebs pa stobs su gyur pa de 'dir chos nyid rdeng du gyur pa'i phyir ro/ /bcu pa 'bras bu grub pa rdzogs pa'i gnas ni/ mthar phyin pa'i phyir ro/ /skabs zhes pa/ dang po bshad/ gnyis pa rtsol ba sbyor pa'i skabs te/ smon pas slob pa la
566b5(rgyud 'grel): rtsol ba'i phyir ro/ /gsum pa bshad/ bzhi pa 'du shes 'gyur ba'i skabs ni/ rigs byed pas sbyor ba'i sems kyis 'du shes yang dag pa'i ye shes su 'gyur te/ ye shes 'phel bar byed pa'i phyir ro/ /lnga pa sbyor chen la 'jug pa'i
566b6(rgyud 'grel): skabs ni/ bslab bcus chib pas thos bsam gyis mthong ba'i don bsgom pa la 'jug pa'i phyir ro/ /drug pa bdun pa brgyad pa bshad zin to/ /dgu pa rdeng du gyur pa'i skabs te/ rtags chen thob pa'i phyir ro/ /bcu pa las su
566b7(rgyud 'grel): rung pa'i skabs te/ rdzogs sems skyes pas bskyed du bya ba'i lam med pa'i phyir ro/ /ye shes dang zhes pa sngar brjod pa'i gtan tshigs kyis/ /skabs bcur sems bcu skyes pas sems dang chos 'phrad pa'i ye shes
567a1(rgyud 'grel): grol thar pa thar re'o/ /de la dang po brjod zin/ smon pas khong du chud 'dod pa'i/ /bden gnyis mgo mthong yid la byed/ /smod pa'i ye shes gong ma'i rgyu/ /de rgyus der mi brtan par ldang/ /bden gnyis rang gi
567a2(rgyud 'grel): mtshan nyid du/ /shes pa gcod sbyong sbyor ba yi/ /bslab pa'i ye shes ye shes gsum/ /bzhi pa de rgyus sbyor sems kyis/ /lhag pa'i bden gnyis dbyer med don/ /thos la mi skrag sbyod cing 'phel/ /bzod thob ye shes phyi ma'i rgyu/
567a3(rgyud 'grel): lnga pa de rgyus ye shes skyes/ /bden pa dbyer med thos bsams kyis/ /go ba'i don la 'jug sems pas/ /mthong la sbyor ba'i ye shes so/ /drug dang bdun pa brjod zin te/ /brgyad par 'di skad du/ mtshan ma'i chos rnams
567a4(rgyud 'grel): thams cad kun/ /mnyam pa chen po'i ngang du gsal/ zhes gsungs te/ rig pa'i sems kyis mnyam nyid mthong ba'i ye shes so/ /dgu par gnas pa'i sems kyis dbyings dang ye shes dbyer med pa'i don shar ba ste/ 'di skad du/ srid pa'i
567a5(rgyud 'grel): sems can thams cad dang/ /thar pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs kun/ /so sor thams cad snang ba ste/ /kun kyang mnyam pa'i ngang du gsal/ zhes gsungs so/ /bcu pa rdzogs pa'i sems kyis rang 'byung ye shes rdzogs par shar ba ste/ 'di
567a6(rgyud 'grel): skad du/ sa chu me rlung snod bcud rnams/ /kun kyang rang bzhin chos nyid don? chos nyid don las gzhan med pa/ /rang 'byung ye shes gsal ba'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /sgrib dang zhes pa bcu ste/ sa 'og ma bcus gong ma'i lta ba rnams yul du ma gyur
567a7(rgyud 'grel): par brjod zin te/ yang las kyi bag chags phra rags ni/ gnyis pa dang po dag la bsgrib/ /mngon du rgyu ba rab 'bring gsum/ /tshum pa bzhi dang lnga la sgrib/ /kun tu rgyu ba drug pa ste/ /lhan cig skyes pa bdun la gnas/ /bag la
567b1(rgyud 'grel): nyal ba phra rags 'bring/ /brgyad dang dgu dang bcu la gnas/ /zhes gsungs so/ /gol sa zhes pa/ 'di skad du/ rgyu yi tshogs dang drod rtse mo/ /bzod dang 'jig rten chos mchog dang/ /mthong sgom mthar lam rnams su gol/ /yang na 'og ma 'og
567b2(rgyud 'grel): ma nyid/ /zhes gsungs so/ /rtog pa dang zhes pa bcu ste/ 'di skad du/ bag chags lnga yi phra rags bcu/ /sa bcur ldan pas chos nyid la/ /ched du byed dang phyag rgya yang/ /khyon dang 'phro 'du'i rtog sogs bcu/ zhes gsungs so/ /spyod dang
567b3(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa bcu ste/ dang po bshad zin to/ /gnyis pa ni 'di skad du/ bslab pa spyod dang nges pa la/ /dag dang ma dag gis spyod pa'o/ /zhes 'byung bas/ phra men gyi spyod pa'o/ /gsum pa bshad zin to/ /bzhi pa ni ngal song mi ldog bdon?
567b4(rgyud 'grel): par 'jug /bar chad dag kyang de las 'byung/ zhes gsungs pas/ phyogs cig pa bsgom pa'i sbyong pa'o/ /lnga pa ni/ spyod pa rgyun gyi rnal 'byor yin/ /zhes 'byung bas/ rgyun gyi spyod pa'o/ /drug pa ni/ bdag don shes rab dang
567b5(rgyud 'grel): mthun pa'o/ /gzhan don du 'di skad du/ sgyu mas spyod pa'i skyes bu de/ /'khor lo sgyur ba'i cha byad du/ /rin chen bdun dang dpung tshogs kyis/ /dbang sgyur thabs kyi theg pa ston/ /zhes gsungs so/ /bdun pa ni ting nge 'dzin gyi sbyor ba'o//
567b6(rgyud 'grel): ?? bdag don gzhan don du 'di skad du/ de bas skyes bu dam pa de/ /'bras bu nyid la lam shes pas/ /lam gyi yan lag bde rdzogs te/ /gzhan dag smin par bya ba'i phyir/ /ji ltar 'dod par thabs mchog sbyor/ zhes
567b7(rgyud 'grel): gsungs so/ /?? sbyor ba'i spyod pa ste/ ting nge 'dzin mang po la bsgoms pa'i phyir ro/ /gzhan don du/ 'di skad du/ de bas rgyal ched skyes bu de/ /chos kyi rgyal po gang de yi/ /gdung 'tshob dga' ldan theg chen ston/ mi gnas
568a1(rgyud 'grel): bcu dus cho 'phrul snang/ zhes gsungs so/ /dgu pa ni/ sgyu ma 'ang sgyu ma yin spyod pa'o/ /zhes gsungs pas/ ye shes sgyu ma'i spyod pa'o/ /bcu pa ni lhun gyis grub pa'i spyod pa'o/ /yang kun 'dus las/ sa brgyad 'di
568a2(rgyud 'grel): skad du/ sbyor dang sgrol bar byed pa dang/ /ma byin len dang ngag sprul byed/ /rnal 'byor dam tshig spyod pa'i mchog /spyad par bya ba'i las yin no/ /zhes gsungs so/ /dgu pa ni/ thams cad mnyam pa'i ngang la gnas/ /ting nge 'dzin gyi cho
568a3(rgyud 'grel): 'phrul las/ /dngos su spyod pa thams cad bya/ /de ni dam tshig chen po yin zhes gsungs so/ /bcu pa ni/ spyod dang spyod pa bya med pas/ /srid dang mu stegs 'jig rten pa'i/ /spyod par snang ba thams cad kun/ /lhun gyis grub pa'i mdzad spyod
568a4(rgyud 'grel): do/ zhes gsungs so/ /dam tshig zhes pa bzhed tshig las/ /rang rang spyod las mi 'da' ba' i/ /dam bca' bcu ni dam tshig go zhes gsungs/ de'i phyir dang po bshad zin to/ /gnyis pa rtsol ba las mi 'da' / /bzhi pa slab pa las
568a5(rgyud 'grel): mi 'da' / /lnga pa 'jug sgom las mi 'da' / /dgu pa chos nyid dam tshig gsum/ /brgyad pa dngos po bzhi la spyod pa la mi 'da' / bcu pa bzhi las mi 'da' 'o/ /brgyad pa 'di skad du/ 'dod pas chags pas 'joms pa dang/ /gti mug
568a6(rgyud 'grel): nga rgyal phrag dog rnams/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i dam tshig ste/ /don dang ldan pa'i skyes bu spyod/ /dgu pa ni/ dam tshig dam pa gang zhe na/ /rtogs pa dam pas dam tshig ste/ /rtogs par byed pa gang yin pa/ /de ni dam tshig chen po'o/ /bcu pa ni
568a7(rgyud 'grel): med pa phyal ba cig pu dang/ /lhun gyis rdzogs pa'i dam tshig che/ /'di zhes ris su chad med pa/ /'di ni bsrung ba'i dam tshig go /zhes gsungs so/ /ting nge 'dzin zhes pa'ang bcu ste/ /dang po yid la byed thob nas/ /gnyis pa de goms
568b1(rgyud 'grel): brtan pa'o/ /gsum pa 'dro 'du gcig pa thob/ /bzhi ba de goms lnga par brtan/ /drug par mi ldog bdun de nyid/ /brgyad par kun snang thob nas ni/ /dgu pa goms nas bcu par ni/ /de brtan las su rung ba'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /slob dpon bde bar gsal mdzad kyis
568b2(rgyud 'grel): ni/ 'di skad du/ dang po yid la byed pa ste/ /rten pas yon tan 'byung gzhi'i phyir/ /rin chen myu gu'i ting 'dzin thob/ /gsum pa nyes pa gtsod sbyor phyir /dug 'joms sman gyi ting nge 'dzin/ /bzhi ba bar chad 'byung ba'i phyir/ /rtse gcig 'phro ba'i ting nge
568b3(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin/ /lnga pa bsod nams gter gyi phyir/ /tshogs chen rdzogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin/ /drug pa chos mig rdul bral phyir/ /mngon par rtogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin/ /bsgoms pas yon
568b4(rgyud 'grel): tan 'byung ba yi/ /mi bzad mdzod ni bdun pa'o/ /brgyad pa cho 'phrul 'byung ba'i phyi/ /'byung chen sprul pa'i ting nge 'dzin/ /dgu pa chos nyid bdal ba'i phyir/ /rnam dag dbyings kyi ting nge 'dzin/ /bcu par ma lus lhun rdzogs phyir/ /thams cad
568b5(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs pa'i ting 'dzin dang/ /snang gsal ye mtsho'i ting nge 'dzin /zhes gsungs pa'o/ /dus dang zhes pa/ lnga ni bshad pa dang yang mthun no/ /bzhed tshig las/ /dang po rjes su yi rang phyir/ /'dun pa skye ba'i 'dus nyes bya/ /gnyis pa slob pa la
568b6(rgyud 'grel): ? phyir/ /rtsol ba sbyor ba'i dus nyid do/ /gsum pa gal chen sbyong ba'i phyir/ /bslab pa 'jug pa'i dus su brjod/ /bzhi pa rigs chen 'byed pa'i phyir/ /bslab gnas 'du shes 'gyur ba'i dus/ /lnga pa mthong don sbyor ba'i phyir/ /spyod chen 'jug
568b7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dus chen yin/ /drug pa thams cad mthong ba'i phyir/ /dang po dbugs chen phyin pa'i dus/ /bdun po de don goms bya'i phyir/ /yul la 'jug pa'i dus su brjod/ /brgyad pa des don phebs pa'i phyir/ /rtogs chen nyid la phebs pa'i dus/ /dgu pa de
569a1(rgyud 'grel): stobs gyur pa'i phyir/ gdeng du gyur pa'i dus zhes bya/ /bcu ba shin tu mthar phyin phyir/ /las rung tha ma'i dbugs phyin dus/ zhes gsungs so/ /dngos grub zhes pa 'ang bcu ste/ /sa bcu 'og ma 'og ma yis/ /gong ma
569a2(rgyud 'grel): gong ma thob pa nyid/ /skabs kyi rgyu 'bras yod pa'i phyir/ /gnas skabs zhugs pa'i dngos grub po/ /'di ltar yang 'chad de/ dang pos 'dod pa'i dngos grub dang/ /gnyis pas sbyor ba'i dngos grub dang/ /gsum pas spyod spyod dngos grub dang/ /
569a3(rgyud 'grel): bzhi pas drod rtags dngos grub dang/ /lnga par bslab rdzogs dngos grub dang/ /drug par rtogs pa 'grub pa dang/ /bdun pa mi g.yo thob pa dang/ /brgyad par cho 'phrul 'grub pa dang/ /dgu par ye shes rgyu ma 'grub/ /bcu par rang 'byung
569a4(rgyud 'grel): ye shes nyid/ /zhes gsungs so/ /mthar phyin dang zhes pa/ 'dun pa'i nang nas 'dir 'dun dang/ /'bras bu bdun phyir mthar phyin pa'o/ /de bzhin rtsol ba thams cad kyi/ /mchog 'di stsol ba mthar phyin pa'o/ /nges don grub la brtson
569a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i phyir/ /brtson pa'i mthar phyin gsum par thob/ /bzod pa'i nang nas mchog 'gyur phyir/ /gsang don bzod pa mthar phyin mchog /bslab pa lhag pa bcu nyid phyir/ /bslab pa mthar phyin lnga pa nyid/ /gnyis med bden rtogs mchog
569a6(rgyud 'grel): yin phyir/ /drug pas mthong ba mthar phyin no/ /rang rig don goms mchog yin phyir/ /bdun par ting 'dzin goms mthar phyin/ /de nyid stobs kyis rang rig pa/ /rig pa'i nang na mthar phyin pa'o/ /dbyings dang ye shes gnyis
569a7(rgyud 'grel): med pa/ /rig pa rdeng gyur gnas mthar phyin/ /thams cad rang 'byung klod brdal phyir/ /gong na med pa'i 'bras mthar phyir/ /zhes gsungs so/ /lta ba'i khyad par zhes pa/ dang po tshig tshogs sgra'i rnal 'byor yin pa'i phyir/
569b1(rgyud 'grel): tshig tsam lta ba'o/ /gnyis pa lhag pa'i bden pa gnyis/ /yid la byed pa'i lta ba'o/ /gsum pas bden gnyis rang mtshan du/ /mgo mthod gnyis med bzod pa thob/ /bzhi pa gnyis su med pa la/ /mi skrag spel byed g.yo dang thob/ /lnga par bslab bcu spyir chib
569b2(rgyud 'grel): pas/ /gnyis med thag chod de la 'jug /drug pa de rgyus ji bzhin mthong/ /de yang 'di skad du/ rgyud nyid las/ chos kun mi mthong chos nyid kyang/ /mi mthong sems can sems mi mthong/ /sangs rgyas mi mthong gang mthong ba/ /des ni yang dag
569b3(rgyud 'grel): bden pa mthong/ /zhes gsungs so/ /bdun pa de nyid goms pa yis/ /mi g.yo lta ba shes rab can/ /brgyad pa rang rig 'bras bu sku gsung thugs kyi bdag nyid du goms pa'i rgyus mthong ste/ 'di skad du/ sangs rgyas sems can
569b4(rgyud 'grel): thams cad dang/ /dngos por brtags pa thams cad kun/ /don gyi ngang du gcig pa ste/ /de nyid sku gsung thugs kyi bdag /zhes gsungs so/ /dgu par dbyings dang ye shes yab yum dbyer med pa'i bde ba chen po rdeng du gyur
569b5(rgyud 'grel): te/ /'di skad du/ snod du gyur pa yum gyi dbyings/ /bcud rnams rgyal ba yab kyi mkha' / /'byung 'jug rig pas longs spyod ste/ /'di ni rdo rje'i dam tshig yin zhes gsungs so/ /bcu pa'i lta ba bza' gtad dang bral ba ste
569b6(rgyud 'grel): 'di skad du/ ma sbyangs bzhin du lhun grub pas/ /dbyer med ba ni chos kyi dbyings/ /dbyings las gzhan du lta yul med/ /'di ni lta ba'i dam tshig go /zhes gsungs so/ /gnas 'gyur rnams zhes pa/ lnga'i bzlas bcur
569b7(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur te/ bzhed tshig las/ sa bcur sems bcur skyes pa yis/ /ting 'dzin stobs bstan ye shes ro/ /shar pa'i skad cig snga ma yis/ /rang rang sgrib bcom phyi ma la/ /gong nas gong du sangs rgyas pa/ /gnas
570a1(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur bcu la lam rtegs bcu/ zhes gsungs so/ /'on te kun gzhi'i gnas 'gyur pa ni/ /skye bo nas 'dun pa'i rnal 'byor du/ gnas 'gyur na'ang/ de bzhin gshegs par rtsal chen rdzogs pa'i skad cig ma la bag la
570a2(rgyud 'grel): nyal/ /rdo rje lta bu'i ye shes kyis bcom nas/ phyi ma la sku lnga mngon du bya ste/ brtan du bar gnas 'gyur ba dang drug du 'gro bas/ /kun gzhi'i gnas 'gyur rnam pa lngas/ /bye brag lam lnga'i chos su snang/ zhes pa dang 'gal/ 'on
570a3(rgyud 'grel): te 'dun pa'i rnal 'byor du gnas ma 'gyur ro zhe na'ang/ 'dun pa'i rnal 'byor pa la/ yid la byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis lha'i sku rang gi chag tshang tsam du phyogs pa dang/ g.yo ba'i sems skyes pa/ glegs bam bcu gnyis kyi dbang thob
570a4(rgyud 'grel): pas/ /bdag nyid nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i ltas mthong bas/ de dag skye bo la med la/ sa 'di pa la yod pa'i phyir/ gnas ma 'gyur na rigs pa dang 'gal lo/ /zhes the tshom skye ba la/ de 'di ltar bcad par bya ste/ de ltar snang mod kyi/ 'dun pa
570a5(rgyud 'grel): pa ni skye bo las 'phags mod kyang/ der gnas 'gyur zhes mi bya ste/ skye bo'i tshe rgyu rkyen med pa ma yin yang/ nges pa'i shes pas sbyangs pas/ 'dun pa thob pa ma yin pa'i phyir/ der gnas 'gyur na/ gnas 'gyur 'bras bur
570a6(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ba'i dang drug du 'gyur bas/ gong du lngas zhes pa'i lung dang yang 'gal/ rigs pas lam lngar gnas 'gyur nas rtsal chen rdzogs par brjod na/ /de ni lhun gyis grub pa'i rigs 'dzin yin gyi/ /rgyal ba sangs rgyas nyid ma
570a7(rgyud 'grel): yin pa'i phyir/ rgyal bar 'gyur dgos pas/ rigs pa dang 'gal lo/ /de'i phyir 'dun pa pa de/ chos nyid la da dung bzod pa tsam yang ma thob ste/ ma mthong ba'i phyir/ skye bo las 'phags kyang gnas 'gyur zhes mi bya'o/ /des na
570b1(rgyud 'grel): 'dun par mos pa'i lha bstan par bsgoms pas/ mthu brtan tsam na/ 'du shes klungs su zhugs pas las bag chags bsra bas bkag sbyangs nas/ sbyor ba 'dun pa'i kun gzhi thob ba gnas 'gyur ba dang po'o/ /de bzhin du sa 'og nas gong du 'gyur bzhin/ rtsal
570b2(rgyud 'grel): chen nas bder gshegs su 'gyur ba dang lnga'o/ /de'i phyir 'dun pa nas yar sangs rgyas su kun gzhi lnga gnas lan lngar 'gyur ba'i phyir lam lngar snang ste/ der 'gyur ba byas pa'o/ /des na gong gi lung nyid dang mi 'gal la/ /mthar sangs rgyas chen po nyid
570b3(rgyud 'grel): du gnas 'gyur bas/ /rigs pa dang yang mi 'gal lo/ /dka' 'grel rgyud kyi skabs tshig dka' ba bkrol/ /lung dang rigs pas mdun bsu rgyab sbyar nas/ /dka' bas bsdus pa'i dge rtsa ci mchis pa/ /mdza' yas rgyud la smin cing grol
570b4(rgyud 'grel): thob shog /slob dpon stir ma stis sbyar ba'i/ skabs 'grel bye brag rnam par bshad pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //dpal rdo rje mi bskyod pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dang po las can rnal 'byor las/ /sogs pa'i rnal 'byor bcu po
570b5(rgyud 'grel): rnams/ yi ge rtog spyod don la 'jug /de 'dir nges pa rnam gnyis kyis/ /don 'jug byang chub ljon pa'i shing/ /bskyed phyir legs par bstan par bya'o/ /de la blo gros zhen can phyir/ /shes rab thabs kyis nges gsungs pa'i/ /thog mar blo
570b6(rgyud 'grel): gros ldan pa yis/ /so sor rtog pa mngon 'gro bas/ /mdza' bcu slob cing de nyid la/ /ngo bo nges tshig dgos pa dang/ /gal po re'ang chos rtags dang/ /ldan pas de 'dir thag gcad dgos/ /de yis don du 'gyur gzhi'i phyir/ /gnas dang cha rkyen
570b7(rgyud 'grel): ldan byas nas/ /sngon 'gro las rnams rdzogs byas te/ /ljon shing bskyed pa'i las la 'bad/ /rnal 'byor lnga'ang khyad par las/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i skabs bcu sems/ /snga ma phyi ma rgyu 'bras tshul/ /gyur pa bcu drug rgyun gyis rdzogs/ /'dun pa
571a1(rgyud 'grel): skye ba'i skabs dag la/ /mun pa'i sprin las skar phran gzer/ /snang ba lta bur gsal ba yis/ /don mchog thos dang rtog dpyod pas/ /lhag pa'i gsang ba'i bden gnyis tshul/ /rang min spyi yi mtshan nyid du/ /skra la brten nas
571a2(rgyud 'grel): g.yos la bsgom/ bdag don 'jug pa dang po'i tshe/ /bying rgod la sogs gnyen bos spong/ /nyams gsum mdza' la 'jug pa'i drug /nang du du bas gzer 'phro mthong/ /nyer mtshon rtags tshul gnyi kar sbyar/ /stsol ba spyod ba'i skabs dag la//
571a3(rgyud 'grel): mdza' bcu nyid la 'jug par stsol/ /g.yo yi rgyu yis chos rnams kun/ /bden gnyis rang gi mtshan nyid du/ /rtogs par smon pas khyad par phyir/ /ma nges sems las lhag par bsgom/ /de tshe rang mtshan nyams rims mdza' / /skar ma phal
571a4(rgyud 'grel): pa rab rib mthong/ /dang po las kyi rnal 'byor 'di/ /yang dag tshol la brtson bya dgos/ /sems skyen g.yeng spong bskrun byas nas/ /ngan song las rnams gcod par 'gyur/ /bslab pa 'jug pa'i skabs dag la/ /mdza' bcur zhugs te
571a5(rgyud 'grel): gcod sbyong zhing/ /de tshe lhag pa'i bden gnyis kyang/ /smon rgyu bcu rkyen ldan pa yis/ /gnyis med rtogs pa g.yo zhing ldang/ /dbyer med rang gi mtshan nyid du/ /ldang pa'i sems bsgoms 'phel stobs kyis/ /me gzer skar chen lta
571a6(rgyud 'grel): buAng mthong/ /'du shes 'gyur ba'i skabs dag la/ /bcu mthar gnas pas 'du shes kyang/ /don la bzod pa thob par 'gyur/ /gnyis med don la sbyor sems skye/ /yul dang dbang po rnams shes chos/ /'khor dang mya ngan 'das
571a7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i chos/ /rang rig snang phyir snang kun sems/ /yul med sems kyang dbyings mdog mtshan/ /yod med bral bas rigs rgyud min/ /de phyir ma skyes snad stong mdza' / /dbyer med bsgom pa'i nyams mdza' la/ /dgal med 'khor lo
571b1(rgyud 'grel): zla tshes snang/ /sbyor chen 'jug ba'i skabs dag la/ /ngan song mi ldog sngon thob cing/ /mdza' bcu rtser chib gnyis med don/ /rtogs mthar phyin la ma rag pa/ /bstan pas de don 'jug sems skye/ /nyams gsum mdza' la sgron me 'am/ /zla tshes gnyis pa'i
571b2(rgyud 'grel): rtags mthong 'gyur/ /dbugs phyin mthong la ma rag kyang/ /le los yul la ma brtson na/ /mthong lam mi thob lha mi yi/ /gnas bzlog zag bas cung zad 'khor/ /bsgrub pa'i rigs 'dzin gang de la'ang/ /bdag gi don 'jug sum cu gnyis/ /rang rang
571b3(rgyud 'grel): shes 'jug 'byor pa sngon/ /tshol thos bzhi bzhir skabs la'ang sbyar/ /'o na mod kyang sems lnga yi/ /rim pa ji bzhin khyad par 'gyur/ /ro myong ba'i skabs dag la/ /dga' ba lhag pa'i sems 'byung ste/ /ci phyir sngon du bcu mthar bas/ /mnyan

571b5(rgyud 'grel): bde ba'i sems/ /bsgom pa bum pa mar me'i tshul/ /de nyid mthong dang tshes gsum mthong/ /de nyid mthong ba'i khyad par gyis/ /spyod lam dngos gzhir gang spyad kyang/ /'ching bar mi 'gyur grol 'gyur thabs/ /thams cad der sbyangs lam gnas
571b6(rgyud 'grel): mchog /yul la 'jug ba'i skabs dag la/ /mi 'gyur lhag pa'i sems 'byung ba/ /ji ltar ji bzhin nyid mthong nas/ /shes rab dngos yul de nyid la/ /rnal 'byor yang dag 'jog pa'i tshe/ /gnyis med rang gi mi g.yo bar/ /mthong lam
571b7(rgyud 'grel): 'du byed dang bral ba/ /phra mo'i bying rgod dbang 'gyur bral/ /shin tu mi g.yo'i sems ldan pas/ /bzhi pa'i ri bong can mthong 'phel/ /lam byas pa yi snga ltas dag /rang 'byung chen po'i rtags mchog nye/ /gdul bya'i 'dod pa ji lta bar/
572a1(rgyud 'grel): phyir 'ong sngon dang smad 'chong ston/ /rtog chen dag gi skabs dag la/ /rig par lhag pa'i sems 'byung ste/ /rnal 'byor yang dag 'jog pa'i rgyus/ /dngos gnyis sems kyi cho 'phrul phyir/ /bdag nyid chen po gsal
572a2(rgyud 'grel): bar rig /rnal 'byor yul 'dam rig pa yi/ /mngon sum skabs kyis byas pa'i phyir/ /lam rim rdeng chud rtags chen po/ /rang 'byung ye shes nye bar bstan/ /gdung 'tshogs dga' ldan theg chen ston/ /rdeng du gyur pa'i skabs

574b1(rgyud 'grel): gshegs ngas ni gnas mchog 'di dag kun bsrungs pas/ /gnod byed bgegs kun 'di na ma gnas shig /hUM hUM hUM/ na mas man+ta/ badzra nan/ sarba ta thA ga ta/ a nu ga she/ banda si na ma hA sa ma ya /ni dzA te sma ra ni/ a pra ti ha te/ ka ta ka ta/ tsa ra tsa ra/ banda banda/

574b7(rgyud 'grel): bsrung bar bya/ /sa rnams gzhan gyis ma gtses dang/ /'bab chu rgya mtshor ma gyur la/ /nyi zla'i mig ngang yig 'bru'i tshogs/ /sbyang zhing spol ba'i las bya'o/ /kun rdzob don dam gnyis su brtag /gleng gzhi'i rgyu dang bsnyen pa dang/ /nges pa'i
