575a6(rgyud 'grel): gdan dag la/ /rnam gshegs zhes ni brgya byin zhus/ /ku sha phul dang dbang ldan gyis/ tshod 'dzin gzhug ces de bzhin no/ /phyag na rdo rjes ston pa la/ /balbi phul dang u du dang/ /a shwad twa yis tshig dbang sprul/ /phyag
575a7(rgyud 'grel): rgya rgya gram sku gsum las/ /yang na go cha'i phyag rgya dang/ /ldan pas pho g.yas mo g.yon dpung/ /de yis bdud las rgyal bar 'gyur/ /bdag po sngags g.yog dam bca' ste/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas ku sha brlab/ /oM
575b1(rgyud 'grel): badzra tsakra tra ki sh+na d+hi/ oM aM hUM a bi shin tsa a/ 'khor lo ral gri pad mar gyur/ /bzhad dang bsrung bas choms shing bslab/ /oM badzra ha sa pa sha traM h+ring/ /tshig dbang lha mos bkra shis rgyal/ /khro bo bcu yis bsrung skud brlab/ /oM badzra
575b2(rgyud 'grel): a mri ta kun da li ban d+ha rak+Sha haM/ /rdo rje 'bar ba'i go char ldan/ /'jig rten 'di 'am 'di nas gzhan/ /yod med ming nas bos nas bris/ /'phan dang nor bu gdugs ldan bya/ /cho ga ma rdzogs bar du ni/ /khams gsum bdag po rnams rgyal la//
575b3(rgyud 'grel): gtad pa'i las rnams byas 'gyur na/ /de ni bder gshegs 'dra bar 'gyur/ /de ltar gtang ba ma byas na/ /slob dpon de yi las rnams ni/ /myur du grub par mi 'gyur zhes/ /thub pa'i gtso bo nyid kyis gsungs/ /bcom ldan khams gsum rnam
575b4(rgyud 'grel): rgyal gyi/ /mtshan nyid bdag gis bsgrubs pas na/ /thugs rje bskul lo mthu mnga' ba'i/ /rgyal bas 'di la byin gyis rlobs/ /a'oM badzra kro ta/ tre loka pi dza ya sa ma ya ti shTa badzra hUM/ /g.yas g.yon mdun rgyab byang chub sems/ /spyan ras gzigs
575b5(rgyud 'grel): dang nam mkha' i mdzod/ /sbyong ba glang po bzhi rnams so/ /rnam rgyal las rnams ma byas na/ /sdig can de dag mi thar zhes/ /bde gshegs rgyal ba nyid kyis gsungs/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gdan du brlab/ /a'oM badzra du rba moM ga la ti shtha tsakra h+ri/ /
575b6(rgyud 'grel): lha grangs bzhin du d? nas dgod/ /ku sha'i steng nyal rmi ltas gdab/ /gzhad gsung tshig dbang lha mos brlab/ /a'oM badzra ha sa pa sha troM h+ri/ moM ga la tishtha hUM/ /ngag gi nyes bzhi dag par byed/ /bsrung ba chen po chen mos brlab/ /a'oM
575b7(rgyud 'grel): badzra banda rak+Sha haM/ badzro ga pa tsa man dung/ /lus kyi nyes gsum dag par byed/ /mchod pa yo byad bzhugs gnas rgyan/ /bla re 'phan gdugs rgyal ba ngan/ /lnga lnga tshon dang tshon skud bcas/ /mda' dang ral gri phur bu bum/ /ci bgyi
576a1(rgyud 'grel): khyad par che rtags so/ /dar dang do shal dril bu rnga/ /nor bu me long spyan nyi zla/ /yon chab bdug spos me tog dri/ /me bshes 'o sprang mar bu ram/ /bza' btung bca' pa sbyar legs sogs/ /gtor ma nas kyi
576a2(rgyud 'grel): thug pa dang/ /til dang yungs kar yos 'bras dang/ /'bras chen nas gro ma du ba/ /ga bur gtsang 'bob yam bud shing/ /shag te'u shug te'u dgang blugs gzar/ /phur bu gtun shing zhi ba'i rdzas/ /'o ma'i thug pa zho 'bras chan//
576a3(rgyud 'grel): nas dar mchan til sbyar gsum dang/ /nag pus pa'i bil ba'i 'bras/ /'bru rnams rnam lnga bu sbrang ser/ /sgron shing shag te'u sgron te'u dgang/ /blugs gzar yam shing bud shing rdzas/ /ba dang ra lug zho dag gis/ /
576a4(rgyud 'grel): bsrubs ma thag gi mar sar dang/ /zangs phye tsha rnams yungs kar dang/ /ske tshe til dang zhim thig la/ /la phug yungs nag rdog chung dang skyur ba'i shing tog thams cad dang/ /sprang ma'i gtor ma skyur ba dang/ /dmar po'i shing ngam
576a5(rgyud 'grel): tsan dan dmar/ /shag the'u tsan the'u yam bud shing/ /dbang gi phye ma ril bu la sogs/ /btsag dang rgya skyags gis byugs te/ /dbang gi mchod mar dgang blugs rdzas/ /sha dang rus pa khrag dang skra/ /yungs kar yungs nag
576a6(rgyud 'grel): ske tshe dug /dur khrod thal ba rdo phye lcags/ /ko ba btubs pa'i dum bu dang/ /mgal dum seng ldeng tsher nag la/ /yam shing bud shing a ri sta/ /shag te'u tsher te'u rtsubs par bya/ /drag shul spyod pa'i dgang blugs
576a7(rgyud 'grel): rdzas/ /rnam gsum phur bu gtun shing ni/ /so so'i shing la bya ba'o/ /zlum po gru bzhi zla gam dang/ /gru gsum por ni bya bar bshad/ /zhi rtse rgyas par dbang gis spoms/ /drag po drungs pa dag gi'o/ /zhi rgyas dbang grags
576b1(rgyud 'grel): bzhi yi stan/ /pad+ma ku sha khri dang gsum/ /drag po sa gzhi nyid la shis/ /rgyal thabs las rnams kun gyi mchog /rnam rgyal la sogs khro bo rnams/ /sbyin sreg kun gyi dang por bshad/ /rten yang phyogs phyogs khro bo la'o/ /sbyin
576b2(rgyud 'grel): sreg bum rgyan ldan bzhi yum/ /dpal rtse rtse gsum mda' gzhu sogs/ /kha dog chas gos g.yab dar dang/ /zhal khab la sogs byang phyogs sogs/ /gzhan yang las bzhi hom shing sogs/ /sogs pa nyid du bya ba yin/ /rgya bzang
576b3(rgyud 'grel): gsar las nyis 'gyur ro/ /kha dog lnga las 'brel ba yi/ /bde gshegs gtso bo sku tshad do/ /gdugs chen gser gyi yu bar ldan/ /dkyil 'khor yog ba sor bran can/ dkar nag dmar ser le brgan dud/ /khra bo ljang ser rgyan pa'o/
576b4(rgyud 'grel): khru brgyad spangs la khru bzhi lce/ /yu ? drang po ring po la/ /btags pa brgyad ni rgyal mtshan tshul/ /kha dog so sor gcig 'dra'o/ /kha dog sna tshogs nas 'bras tshul/ /gcus gcag rtsibs su 'brel pa'o/ /dkar po dmar po de bzhin
576b5(rgyud 'grel): ser/ /sngon po dang ni nag dang ldan/ /tshon sna lnga po de la ni/ /bde gshegs dkyil 'khor gang yin bsgom/ /thig skud dkyil 'khor gang yin pa/ /yum grangs bzhin du bsgril bar bya/ /rta babs brgyad dang dri zhim shing/ /chu srin khas bzung
576b6(rgyud 'grel): zlums gzugs/ /khru phyed bzhi mgo rgya mdud can/ /dkyil 'khor rnams kyi zur bzhi la/ /chags pa'i mtshan ma chags pa ni/ /rdo rje mda' bzhi khru do gzugs/ /thugs rje chags pas 'gro ba 'bren/ /mi shes rgya mo 'dral ba ni/ /mdza'

577a1(rgyud 'grel): dag gi mdza' ma yang/ /sngon po dmar po gang yod pa/ /mu tig me tog la sogs pa/ /bsdogs pa'i dbus na rin chen can/ /tsong tsong dag la sbyangs par bya/ /rta babs par ni tsong tsong las/ /gser dngul zangs

577a5(rgyud 'grel): dag la sbyangs pa'o/ /yon chab bdug spos dri chab bre/ /me tog mar me khal dag dang/ /lha ba shos khur ba lha grangs so/ /'o ma sbrang rtsi bu ram mar/ /bre re btud ba bca' ba'i tshogs/ /gtor ma'i rgyu cha sna tshogs dang/ /'byung po'i
577a6(rgyud 'grel): kha zas sogs par bya/ /gzhan yang zhi ba'i mchod rdzas ni/ /til dang yungs kar 'bras yos 'bras/ /nas dang gro dang ga bur rnams/ /phul gang yin no sran thug dang/ /'bras chan ma du bre gang shis/ /gzhan yang rgyas dbang drag po yi/
577a7(rgyud 'grel): thug pa thams cad bre ra'o/ /gzhan ma kun yang phul ra'o/ /lha bshos khur ba lde gu rnams/ /lha grangs bzhin du sogs par bya/ /pad+ma lhor gding ku sha'i nub/ /khri ni shar gyi gru gsum phyag /las bzhi gdan ni dgod par bya/ /rnam par

577b6(rgyud 'grel): yi ni lha grangs bzhin/ /yam shing mdzub gang bcag khru gang/ /brkyang khru gang du shes par bya/ /bud shing khru gang do bzhi'o/ /rgyas pa yis ni lha grangs bzhin/ /dbang gi yam bud zhi ba'i tshad/ /drag po'i yam bud rgyas pa'i tshad/ /zhi ba'i bris bsku

578a1(rgyud 'grel): sor gnyis rtsa ba bshus lha grangs/ /thabs kyi bye brag che chung las/ /zho can ser skyur rtsub shing la/ /yu ba spoms su mthe bo tsam/ /srid du khru do gang phyed gang/ /sor bzhi sgyu kha ran sor cig /zab? sor/

578b5(rgyud 'grel): bdud rtsi 'khyil pas byin gyis brlab/ /oM badzra kro d+ha tri lo ka /pi dza ya/ a'oM aM hUM a a a/ bla re gtsug tor rnam rgyal brlab/ /a'oM truM a'oM aM hUM/ /ba dan 'phan gtso des byin brlab/ /a'oM tso bo'i sa bon oM oM hUM/ /gdugs ni gtsug

580a6(rgyud 'grel): du shis pas rgyun mi bcad/ /shar du sdud pa tshigs su bcad/ /lhor ni bzang po spyod pa'o/ /nub du snang brgyad gsang pa'i mdo/ /byang du gser 'od dam pa gdon/ /gus par mchod cing bden par klag /tshon sna lnga skud bu mos bka' /
580a7(rgyud 'grel): de nyid kyis ni brgyar bzlas te/ /rgyu bzangs tshad la phebs pa dang/ /bzang po'i ltas dang sbyar nas ni/ /mkhas pas dkyil 'khor thig gdab po/ /lag na rdo rjes bgegs bskrad bya/ /srung ba chen mos bdag gzhan bsrung/ /phyogs bcu'i
580b1(rgyud 'grel): gtso la sogs pa yi/ /thugs dam bskul nas srad bu thim/ /de lnga'i rigs bzhi thugs las phyung/ /gtso bo gang yin thugs zhugs phyung/ /de nas gtso bo gang yin gyis/ /sangs rgyas zhing rnams sbyang ba dang/ /myur du sems can don bsgrub dang/
580b2(rgyud 'grel): las kyi bdag po gang byed pa'i/ /las rnams ma lus khyod kyis byos/ /las kyi rdo rje don yod grub/ /kha dog sna tshogs 'byung ba las/ /oM aM hUM/ swAhA karma zhes ni de la dbang bskur ro/ /bdag nyid shar lho mtshams 'greng ste/ /sngags g.yog
580b3(rgyud 'grel): byang shar mtshams su ni/ /dpung btsugs thal sbyar 'dug pa yis/ /dkyil 'khor gang bzhengs las rnams ni/ /gang bzhengs gtso bo bka' bzhin du/ /las kyi byed par bdag gyur pas/ /thams cad ma lus bdag gis bgyi/ /de nas thub dbang
580b4(rgyud 'grel): bskur byas nas/ /de nas sbyang bar bya ba ni/ /bdag po gang yin ting 'dzin las/ /yam gyis phrag dog gtor rlung gis/ /de las rdo rje rtse 'bar ba/ /'od 'phros dngos po'i mtshan ma bsreg /bdag nyid yi ge khaM gyur gtso/ /mnga' bdag de'i byin
580b5(rgyud 'grel): brlabs chu/ /rgyun gyi khams dag de nyid mer/ /de yi byin brlabs yon tan bcu/ /de mthus las byed las rnams 'grub/ /mkhas pas thig gdab tsa ta'i mig/ lha mos gshegs bskul skur la thim/ /hUM las rdo rje rtse lngar gyur/ /lte
580b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i thad kar thal bkan la/ /g.yas pa bkan bzhag mtheb ngos sbyar/ /de nas sbub log nam mkhar gdab/ /lan cig gnyis gsum btab pa'i mthus/ /dad bzhin byon dang ting 'dzin gsal/ /ngan song gsum bde zhus bshad stong/ /mchog
580b7(rgyud 'grel): gsum lha tshogs mchod phyag 'tshal/ /a'oM bruM shu n+ya ta gnya' na badzra swa b+ha ba at+ma ko haM/ zhes pas rang bzhin thig gdab par bya/ /bdag nyid shar lho'i mtshams song ste/ /las bdag byang shar mtshams 'dug ste/ /de nas dkyil 'khor
581a1(rgyud 'grel): thig gdab pa/ /dam tshig bskul dang las bya'o/ /oM badzra sa ma ya su tra ma ti kra ma hUM/ /tshad ldan sngags g.yog med phur mchog /sems can don byas bdag nyid kyis/ /slar yang thugs kar bsdu bar bya//
581a2(rgyud 'grel): a'oM badzra sang ha ra na hUM hUM hUM/ /sku dang gsung dang thugs dang ni/ /yon tan 'phrin las rigs lnga yi/ /gtso bo gang yin de nyid la/ /gsang gsum zhes su bsgrags pa'ang mchog /mtshon ni dri dang pan tsa dang/ /rin chen phung po gsum
581a3(rgyud 'grel): du bstan/ /yon tan sku 'dra las thugs bzhin/ /dbus kyi pho brang bskor ba yin/ /'khor lo rdo rjer ba ni/ /phye ma dkar po nyis rim bri/ /las kyi lha las ma gtogs pa'i/ /phal pa dang ni bsrung bkra shis/ /phye ma dkar po zhig kyang bri/ /sgo yi
581a4(rgyud 'grel): tshon sna pan tsa'o/ /gnyis pa tri la sgo khang rtsig /brkyang bris phyag rgya dgod pa yang/ /gtso bo'i gzugs la 'khor phyag rgya/ /phal la sogs pa'i yig 'bru'o/ /tha mal pa dag thig le'o/ /tshon la sogs pa'i las rnams kun/ /dbang ldan phyogs
581a5(rgyud 'grel): nas bya bar shis/ /dbang ldan 'dren pa'i lha dbang phyogs/ /tshon ni nang nas dgye bar bya/ /de nas phyag rgya nor bu bum/ /dgod pa nyid du bya ba yin/ /gzungs thag slob dpon gzung bar shis/ /de 'og tshon rnams rim gyis btang/ /de nas
581a6(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya 'am yig 'bru bzhag /tha mar bsgo yi tshon bkye nas/ /de'i 'og sgo ba'i phyag rgya dang/ /glang seng rnams kyang dgod par bya/ /maN+Dal thams cad byi dor ni/ /dang po pa lci de 'og tu/ /rnam lngas bskus nas de 'og du/ /dri chu'i chus ni
581a7(rgyud 'grel): byug par bya/ /tshon 'gyed dus su thugs dam bskul/ /sems can khams ni zhi byed pa'i/ /de ni chos dbyings ro yin pas/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis sngon gsungs te/ /da bas bdag gis bka' bzhin du/ /tshon 'gyed pa yi las
581b1(rgyud 'grel): bgyid na/ /rgyal bas kun byin dbang bskur cig /phyag rgya dgod phyir thugs dam bskul/ /sku gsung thugs rtags mtshan ma 'di/ /'gro la phan phyir dgod do zhes/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis sngon gsungs te/ /rgyal ba kun byin dbang bskur cig /rgyan rnams dang po nor bu
581b2(rgyud 'grel): ste/ /de la sogs pa dgod par bya/ /byin gyis brlabs pa'i rin po ches/ /dkyil 'khor 'di la byin gyis rlobs/ /sngags rnams gong ma de las ni/ /ti sh+ya badzra bsnan par pas/ /rin chen sna tshogs rgyu las byas/ /kha dog dbyibs su ldan pa yi/ /shes rab yum
581b3(rgyud 'grel): gyi bum pa 'dis/ /dkyil 'khor 'di la byin gyis rlobs/ /rten gyis 'bras bu mtshon 'brel rtags/ /ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin pas/ /thugs rjes gzungs thag chen po 'dis/ /dkyil 'khor 'di la byin gyis rlobs/ /'phrin las yon tan lhun grub pa'i
581b4(rgyud 'grel): bla re kun bzang dang nyid rtags/ /'bras bu rtags kyi phyag rgya yis/ /dkyil 'khor 'di la byin gyis rlobs/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas ma lus ba'i/ /sku yi phyag rgya mtshon mdzad cing/ /mtshan dang dpe byad phan chen gyis/ /dkyil 'khor 'di la byin gyis rlobs
581b5(rgyud 'grel): nyon mongs gdung ba sel mdzad cing/ /gdugs mdzes gser gyi yu bar ldan/ /skyabs chen byams pa chen po yis/ /dkyil 'khor 'di la byin gyis rlobs/ /nyon mongs bdud las rgyal mdzad pa'i/ /rgyal ba rgyal ba'i rgyal mtshan te/ /rtags kyi
581b6(rgyud 'grel): rgyal mtshan chen po yis/ /dkyil 'khor 'di la byin gyis rlobs/ /'phrin las cho 'phrul bzhi bzhi yis/ /las rnams rgya mtsho rdzogs mdzad pa'i/ /snyan pa'i ba dan gsung bsgoms pas/ /dkyil 'khor 'di la byin gyis rlobs/ /rgyu dang 'bras

582a1(rgyud 'grel): kyis/ /dkyil 'khor 'di la byin gyis rlobs/ /tshad med bzhi dang bsdu pa bzhis/ /'gro ba'i don rnams rdzogs mdzad pa'i/ /dri zhim rta babs phyag rgya yis/ /dkyil 'khor 'di la byin gyis rlobs/ /'gro rmongs 'khyams pa'i

583b7(rgyud 'grel): sems can sbyang ba dang/ /khyad par bdag dang yon bdag dang/ /dkyil 'khor 'di la byin brlabs don/ /rang bzhin rdzogs chen bzhugs gnas nas/ /ting 'dzin gzugs brnyan gzhal yas 'dir/ /thugs rjes byon dgongs spyan 'dren byon/

584b1(rgyud 'grel): brtan bdag /kun gyi chos bdag gyur pa yang/ /bran du yang ni gyur cing bzhugs/ /dza hUM ba ho/ /e hye hi ba ga ban ma ha k+Sha ru ni ka tri sha ho/ sa ma a dza hUM/ oM la sogs pa'i lha rnams sngags/ /rting la a gad dzas brgyan cing/ /so so sku
584b2(rgyud 'grel): gsung thugs kyi lha/ /ma lus pa rnams spyan drang ngo/ /mdor na 'jig rten khams rnams su/ /sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir/ /ji ltar 'dul ba sna tshogs kyis/ /rdo rje rin chen padmo dang/ /rgya gram 'khor los bskor du gsol/ /mgon po
584b3(rgyud 'grel): thugs rje cher ldan pa/ /thams cad kun mkhyen rgyud rig pa/ /'dul ba'i thabs ni sna tshogs kyis/ /'gro ba'i don rnams mdzad du gsol/ /gtor ma las rnams kun gyi mchog /las kyi sna la brtan pa ni/ /shar du bstan pa srung ba la//
584b4(rgyud 'grel): lhor ni srid pa mnyam pa yin/ /nub du klu gdug bzlog pa'o/ /byang nas las la gzhug pa'o/ /de dag so so srung mtshams bcad/ /e ha hi bos la las la gzhug/ byin gyis brlabs byas mchod stod cing smon lam btab cing slar
584b5(rgyud 'grel): nyid? gtang/ /lag ba'i phyag rgya bcas nas ni/ /snying po mjug la gdags pa ni/ /badzra sa twa sa ma ya karma gdags shing dbyangs dang sbyar pa'o/ /thugs brtser ldan pa'i dgongs pa can/ /ji ltar 'phrin las bcol ba bzhin/ /'khor ba yul
584b6(rgyud 'grel): der? sa de srid du/ don rnams mdzad cing brtan por bzhugs/ /leg pa'i phyag rgya bcas nas ni/ /snying? po mjug la gang yin/ /hUM baM ho/ sa ma ya stoM/ sa ma ya ho/ sa ma ya sa twa ti shtha badzra a gad dza/ na ma sarba ta thA ga ta band+ha nad ka ro ya mi/ oM sarba ta thA ga
584b7(rgyud 'grel): ta pu tsa pa shtha/ na ya at+ma naM nirya ta ya mi/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta badzra satwa a ti tishtha swa moM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pu tsa i rba? she ka ya/ at+ma noM nirya ta ya mi/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta badzra ratna a bi shin tsa mo/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta pu tsa pra
585a1(rgyud 'grel): brtan ya/ /at+ma noM nirya ta ya mi/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta badzra darma pra barta ya mi/ /oM sarba ta tha ga ta bu tsa karma naM/ /at+ma noM nirya ta ya mi/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta badzra karma ku ru maM/ /de nas mchod pa'i rim pa ni/ /dang por sbyin sreg las
585a2(rgyud 'grel): bzhi ste/ /de nas lhag pa'i mchod skyabs gsol/ /de nas thun mong mchod rnam lnga/ /de nas stod pa'i mchod pa'o/ /de nas mchod sprin bya bar bshad/ /de kun dag yid gdung dbyangs mchod/ mchod pa'i dang po 'di yin no/ /de 'og rdzas kyi
585a3(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa la/ /sbyin sreg mchog sbyin rnams kyi mchog /bsdebs sbyar mchog ni nyi ma'i lha/ /mi yi mchog ni rgyal po ste/ /rgya mtsho chu bo rnams kyi mchog zla ba rgyu skar rnams kyi mchog /nyi ma snang byed rnams kyi gtso/ /bsgrub pa'i
585a4(rgyud 'grel): mchog mi gsang sngags te/ /las kyi mchog ni rnam bzhi'o/ /gnas kyi mchog ni dkyil 'khor bzhi/ /steng dang 'og dang thad kar yang/ /'gro ba'i 'gro ba ji snyed pa/ /lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na/ /smra pa'i mchog ni rdzogs sangs rgyas
585a5(rgyud 'grel): bstan pa'i mchog ni rdzogs chen po/ /rdo rje'i rgyud du bsngags pa yin/ /bzlas pa bdun dang bar skabs dang/ /de bzhin bzlas pa'i 'og tu yang/ /bsngags pas sbyin sreg bya ba ni/ /thams cad du yang bsngags pa yin/ /sbyin sreg byas nas
585a6(rgyud 'grel): bzlas bya ba/ /dang por shin tu 'dod pa yin/ /bzlas dang sbyin sreg 'brel pa 'di/ /de ni bar du 'dod pa yin/ /bzlas pa'i 'jug gi byin sreg gang/ /de ni shin tu gtso bar bshad/ /dang pos bu lon rtog pa bsal/ /bar du lha rnams tshim
585a7(rgyud 'grel): bya'i phyir/ /tha mas lhag chad bskang ba'i don/ /bgyi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog /gsal ba'i gzi brjid 'tsher ba la/ /dang byams yid kyis mchod sbyin bya/ /las rnams brtsam par byas nas ni/ /gtum chen rngam yang lhan
585b1(rgyud 'grel): nor 'gyur/ /lha rnams dkar po byams dang ldan/ /zlum po dkyil 'khor rtsibs brgyad par/ /lha rnams 'khor bcas brgyan par bzhugs/ /ho ma mchog zlum gdengs pa la/ /rdo rje pad+mas rab brgyan te/ /phur pa dkar po drug gdab par/ /yid la
585b2(rgyud 'grel): shin tu gsal byas te/ /byin za dge ba'i dam spar bstan/ /yam shing dkar po rnams kyi me/ /ra spang rdo rje khro bo yis/ /dang byams bzhag ste snyoms zhugs la/ /til bsregs bzhin du sdig sreg shig /oM che ge mo sarba pA pa da ha ha na hUM phaT//
585b3(rgyud 'grel): dzwa la raM/ shar lho kha khyer de nyid la/ /dam tshig nyid kyi raM spros te/ /zhal gcig phyag bzhi zla dkar bzhin/ /zhi ba lus dang lta ba'i thabs/ /skyed chen dkar po'i gdan bzhugs bsam/ /ye shes agne thugs dam bskul/ /oM na mo badzra ba na
585b4(rgyud 'grel): sya/ oM na mo gnya' na sya twa a g+he ye de ba dzra ya raM/ /lan gsum brjod pas zhal phyogs shing/ /spyan gzigs thugs dgongs de nyid la/ /dam tshig pa yis lcags kyu bcas/ /gnyis min dbyings las bskul ba yi/ /ye shes drang srong chen po
585b5(rgyud 'grel): nyid/ /sngon gyi smon lam thugs rje yis/ /byin gyis rlob phyir gshegs su gsol/ /dzA hUM baM ho/ /e ha hi/ oM badzra ha ri baM ga ba dzi ba lo ki te ya sha de hi/ /de ba pa ta ya swAhA/ /na mo badzra pa na sye/ /oM gnya' na agne/ ki li ki li/ dind+he ? po
585b6(rgyud 'grel): tra/ i ha i ha/ A gad dzA hUM ta sha na ya swAhA/ ye shes me lha byon nas ni/ /dam tshig bskyed dang gcig gyur nas/ /mdun du bzhugs pa de nyid la/ /gnyis min drang srong igna la/ /bdug spos chung bcas gtsar ba ni/ /stong gsum kun tu
585b7(rgyud 'grel): ri mchog 'byung 'gyur ba'i/ /spos lnga sna sbyar tshu gtsang rgyal ba'i khrus/ /ye shes sprin phung mkha' las char 'bebs pa/ /mi gtsang dri ma'i tshogs kun dag gyur cig/ swa b+hA ba sarba d+harma shud+d+ho haM/ dag pa nyid du byas nas kyang/ /mchod
586a1(rgyud 'grel): pa lnga yis mchod de bzhag/ gnyis min drang srong agne la/ /bdug spos me tog me dri bshos/ /yon bdag don du 'bul la gsan/ /thugs rjes dgongs nas bzhes su gsol/ /oM dz+nya na sa twa sa ma ya/ sa twa sa ma ne ye
586a2(rgyud 'grel): d+hu pe puShpe/ a lo ke/ nan gan de pa ha ra sarba d+harma bu tsa ban tsa swAhA/ de na mchod snod shing rta la/ /bzhugs pa nyid du bya ba'am/ /kha khyer bzhag la las mchod bstod/ /de nas me yi dngos nyid pa'i/ /rang bzhin rnam rgyal khro bo phyogs//
586a3(rgyud 'grel): de la sogs pa gong nyid du/ /spyan drangs mdun du gsal bsgoms la/ /ting 'dzin gsal ba'i me nyid sbyang/ /rnam par rgyal ba bos nas ni/ /gzugs brnyan shar g.yas 'am 'phral ba'i/ /rnam rgyal de yi lus gnyis gcig/ de nyid
586a4(rgyud 'grel): na ni bzhugs bsam pa/ /dad pa dang ni dam tshig gis/ /tshugs gshegs khams gsum rnam rgyal gtso/ /'bar ba'i nang du bzhugs nas ni/ /sreg blugs zhal zas bzhes me sbyongs/ /dza hUM baM ho/ /e hye hi/ oM tre lokya b+hi dza ya sa ma ti mu tra
586a5(rgyud 'grel): hUM phaT a gad dza/ de ltar spyan drangs de nyid kyis/ /gdan mchog dam pa bstan pa ni/ /me tog lag du thogs nas ni/ /mya ngan mi 'da' thugs rje'i dang/ /nyon mongs mi spong gos pa med/ /ma chags rang bzhin dag pas na/ /pad+ma'i gdan la
586a6(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs su gsol/ /pad+ma sa ma ya haM/ /de ltar gdan la bzhugs pa yang/ /yang dag nyid ni dag mod kyi/ /dri ma'i mtshan ma med mod kyang/ /'jig rten sri zhu'i tshul gyis su/ /phyag dang zhabs ni bsil mdzod cig/ a ha ra bi shud+d+ha swa b+hA wa
586a7(rgyud 'grel): de nas mchod pa dbul ba ni/ /khro bo khams gsum rnam rgyal gyis/ /che ge mo zhig sdig gshegs nas/ /dkyil 'khor chen por dbang bskur te/ /yang dag nyid du bsgrub pa la/ /bar chad byed pa'i log rtog ni/ gnod sbyin skar mda' gdong la
586b1(rgyud 'grel): sogs/ /chad pa bcad cing bka' phab ste/ /bka' 'am sngags kyi tshig tsam gyis/ /zhi ba la sogs rnam bzhi ni/ /bran bzhin du ni byed par 'gyur/ /de phyir dang por khro bo mchod/ /de phyir rnam par rgyal sogs la/ /mar khu shag te'u shu gu 'di/ /yon bdag
586b2(rgyud 'grel): don du 'bul lags na/ /thugs rjes dgongs nas bzhes su gsol/ /snying ga'i thang ka nas 'bul bar bya/ /oM tre lokya b+hi dza ya kro d+ha ya ti bya ti bya na bu tsa na ye swAhA/ /lag g.yas ma theb srin nyi ma a/ /thabs dang shes rab ldan pa yis/ /blangs te
586b3(rgyud 'grel): sku gsung thugs mnyes phyir/ /mchod pa'i gnas dang mchod rdzas dang/ /mchod mkhan nyid las byang chub sems/ /dkar po shel dag byung ba yis/ /gang la dmigs pa der bstim pas/ /las dang nyon mongs bag chags zhi/ khro rgyal khams
586b4(rgyud 'grel): gsum rnam rgyal la/ /mngar gsum 'o thug nas kyi thug 'bras kyi lag pa na 'bras yos dang/ /'bru sna lnga la sogs pa 'bul/ /bdug spos me tog me dri bshog/ oM tre lokya b+hi dza ya kro d+ha ya/ du pe puspa/ a lo ke gan de/ a ha ra/ sarba d+harma da
586b5(rgyud 'grel): ra su tsa ba na tsa swAhA/ ti bya ti bya ye swAhA/ de nas stod de mchod pa ni/ /rdo rje dril bu dbyangs ldan la/ /sku la 'ging 'gyur bcas par bya/ /zhi rgyas gnyis la rdor dril nad/ /dbang drag rdor dril phyir bskor bsil/ /ye shes bskal pa'i me ltar
586b6(rgyud 'grel): 'bar ba'i 'od/ /ma rig 'dod pa'i bdud khams thams cad sreg sprin gnyis 'thabs bzhin khro gnyer brjid pa'i zhal/ zhe sdang gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad 'joms/ /dpa' bo chen po dpa' mtshan stag lpags can/ /log 'dren srin
586b7(rgyud 'grel): po'i bgegs kyi mdza' gnon pa'i/ /khro bo'i rgyal po dug gsum 'joms mdzad pa/ /khams gsum sems can ngan 'gro las sgrol ba/ /mdog sngon rdo rje pad+ma zhags pa bsnams/ /khams gsum rnam rgyal tshe la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /khro bo khams
587a1(rgyud 'grel): gsum rnam rgyal sogs/ /me nyid sbyang ba'i las mdzod bzhugs/ /tishtha badzra/ khro bo khams gsum rnam rgyal gyis/ /bdud rtsi lnga 'am zas lnga la/ /mtshan ma'i ming du bcas par bya/ /bkug nas rdo rje phur bus gdab/
587a2(rgyud 'grel): dum bur byas la tshogs la bstab/ /oM tre lokya b+hi dza ya/ ki li a mri ta ba na tsa pU tsa swAhA/ /bde gshegs khro chen rnam par rgyal/ /thugs rje che dang bdag 'brel pas/ /gzhal yas nyid du bzhugs nas kyang/ /ma nyid sbyang ba'i las bcol
587a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /de nas lag g.yas kha phar bstan/ /g.yon pa tshur bstan mkhrig ma snol/ /mtheg gnyis mthil bzhag sor brgyad bskyod/ /oM ki li ki li badzra pi ma li re'u tri pra tri ti/ mahA kro b+ha badzra a na dza ha gri na ta hUM phaT/ sbyangs pa'i las ni
587a4(rgyud 'grel): lha tshogs kyis/ /mdun du bya bar yang dag bshad/ /de nas dkon mchog gsum po ste/ /sbyang dang spyan 'dren gdan dag dang/ /mchod pa la sogs rnam rgyal bzhin/ /mgon po thugs rje chor ldan pa/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i ston pa po/ /bsod
587a5(rgyud 'grel): nams yon tan rgya mtsho bzhi/ /de bzhin gshegs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dag pas 'dod chags bral ba'i rgyu/ /dge bas ngan song las sgrol zhing/ /gcig du don dam mchog gyur pa/ /zhi gyur chos la phyag 'tshal lo/ /grol nas grol ba'i
587a6(rgyud 'grel): lam yang ston/ /bslab pa dag la rab du gus/ /zhing gi dam pa yon tan bzhi/ /dge 'dun la yang phyag 'tshal lo/ /bla med dkon mchog gsum po yi/ /zhi ba la sogs grub par gsol/ /bde bar gshegs so dkon mchog gsum
587a7(rgyud 'grel): khyed kyis byams pa'i las kun mdzad/ /dang ba'i yid kyis bskyed pa yi/ /gzhal yas nyid du gshegs su gsol/ /oM badzra be ga a gra ma ya hi ga tsa/ /me lha gnyis min spyan drang ba'i/ /mdun du ki lis me nyid sbyang/ /de nas g.yas
587b1(rgyud 'grel): pa mthe bo yis/ /mthe'u chung drung gtsugs g.yas nas ni/ /dad pa dang ni dam tshig gis/ /tshur gshegs zhes ni bos nas ni/ /dza hUM baM ho/ /e hye hi mahA b+hu ha de ba rik+Shi/ tad dzwa ma ni tri twa/ u ti mahA roM/ /a smi sa ni/ rtri to b+ha ba/ agne ye/ a gad dza/ ha bya ka
587b2(rgyud 'grel): bya/ ma hA na ya swAhA/ de nas bzhugs par bya ba ni/ /lha yi drang srong kun dang ni/ /sreg sbyin bstabs par zhal ches pa/ /thugs rje dam tshig brtan pas ni/ /pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs su gsol/ /agne ya sa ma ya stwaM/ /tishtha sa b+ha ba/ big ti b+ha/ dzi
587b3(rgyud 'grel): ba le hi ta ag sha di pa ya shud+d+ha swAhA/ /phyag zhal bsil ba byas nas ni/ /gnyis min drang srong me lha la/ /shag te'u la sogs bdun gsum 'bul/ /oM roM roM agne ye ha bya ka bya ti bya na ya pU tsa na swAhA/ /du pe puspe a lo ke gan de pu tsa pan tsa
587b4(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ /de nas rdo rje dril bur bcas/ /'ging gyur bas la bstod pa ni/ /tshangs pa 'jig rten mgon gyi sras/ /me lha'i rgyal po drang srong mchog/ 'byung po yongs la bskyabs pa'i phyir/ /thugs rje'i dbang gis skur skur sprul ba/ /rig pa grub pa'i drang
587b5(rgyud 'grel): srong mchog/ nyon mongs sogs pa'i shes rab 'od/ /bskal pa'i me bzhin gzi brjid 'bar/ /mngon shes rdzu 'phrul thabs ldan pa/ /thabs kyis sprul pa'i theg pa bcibs/ /bgrang phreng 'dzin cing rig sngags gsung/ /bdud rtsi bcud ldan gundi
587b6(rgyud 'grel): bsnams/ /chos kyi bdud rtsi yongs la bsil/ /nyes pa'i skyon bral tshangs par spyod/ /'jig rten gnas kyang mya ngan 'das/ /zhi ba brnyes kyang thugs rje che/ /de bas bstod de phyag kyang 'tshal/ /agne chen po'i thugs dam bzhin/ /me nyid ye shes
587b7(rgyud 'grel): mer byin rlobs/ /las kyi lta rnams mchod pa yis/ /sreg rdzas stobs pa'i las mdzod bzhugs/ /shing rtag cig la bzhugs gsol la/ /phyogs mtshams lha la bskor zhing mchod/ /bagne yi geng ka ra pU tsa ti shtha/ /las kyi lha rnams
588a1(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa yi/ /me spyad spyan drang gdan dbul bsil/ /las brtan phyag 'tshal mchod bstod dgu/ /snang ston mchod rten chos nyid mkha' / /chos dbyings ye shes rnam dag sku/ /byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya mdzad/ phyag
588a2(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal rnam par snang mdzad la'o/ /sra brtan rdo rje gzugs brnyan sa/ /me long ye shes thugs kyi sku/ /sa gnon chen po phyag rgya mdzad/ /phyag 'tshal sems dpa' mi bskyod la'o/ /sreg byed rin chen yig 'bru me/ /mnyam nyid ye
588a3(rgyud 'grel): shes yon tan sku/ /mchod sbyin chen po phyag rgya mdzad/ /phyag 'tshal 'byung ldan dpal khyod la'o/ /dgyes 'dzin pad+ma phyag mtshan chu/ /kun rtog ye shes gsung gi sku/ /chos sgrogs chen po phyag rgya mdzad/ /phyag 'tshal snang ba
588a4(rgyud 'grel): mdza' yas la'o/ /shugs bskyod rgya gram sku ste rlung/ /nan tan ye shes 'phrin las sku/ /skyabs sbyin chen po phyag rgya mdzad/ /phyag 'tshal don yod grub pa la'o/ /bgyi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du/ /lu gu rgyud du sbrel bsdebs
588a5(rgyud 'grel): bskyod/ /bcings 'gyur bskyod pas phyogs bcur g.yo/ /thams cad g.yo ba med par 'gyur/ /shan ting ku ru swAhA/ /dngul 'am dkar po'i shing rnams la/ /mgo bo rgyu 'dud rtse zlum po/ /ngos su lha rnams 'khor bcas
588a6(rgyud 'grel): bsgom/ /btab na gdug rtsu bzhi bar 'gyur/ /ki li ki li shan ting ku ru swAhA/ /ma mo rnams kyi dkyil 'khor du/ /lha yi grub pa bsgom byas te/ /byams bcas zhi ba'i tho ba yis/ /brdungs pas gdug rtsub zhi par 'gyur//
588a7(rgyud 'grel): sham pa ta shan ting ku ru swAhA/ /dngul phye 'bras mchan dkar po la/ /'o mas sbyar ba'i gtor ma yis/ /thams cad ma lus bsgom byas nas/ /gtor ma gdug rtsub zhi bar 'gyur/ /spar na shan ting ku ru swAhA/ /las rnams bya ba'i don
588b1(rgyud 'grel): bstan pa/ /bdag nyid byams pa chen po can/ /dkyil 'khor hoM khung mchod rdzas 'tshogs/ /dkar po nyid du bsgom dang bya/ /lha rnams thams cad dkar po ste/ /sku yi gzi 'bar yon tan brjid/ /thams cad kun kyang 'tsher zhing zhing/ /byams par bcas
588b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i lag pa nas/ /gtong ba thams cad byang chub sems/ /rgyun la 'chad par kun khyab bsgom/ /drang bas zhi gyur phur bus rgyas/ /brdung pas dbang mdzad gtor bas drag/ de ni spyi yi las su gsungs/ /phyogs bcu'i gdug pa ma lus kun/ /gdug
588b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sems ni rab bor te/ /lha ni dkar po'i 'od du 'gyur/ /bde ldan byang chub 'od 'phro 'bar/ /'jig rten gsum dang 'das gtum dang/ /'bru lnga byams dang ldan par byas na ni/ /gsol ba gdab par bya ba ni/ /lha dang lha min gnod sbyin dri za grul/ /lto 'phye
588b4(rgyud 'grel): dang ni nam mkha' lding dang 'dab/ /lus srul srin po gdon gyi rigs rnams dang/ /sa 'am mkha' la gnas pa'i rdzu 'phrul can/ /bu smad g.yog dang 'khor du bcas pa rnams/ /de rnams sdug bsngal zhi bar bya ba'i phyir/ /dad byams yid kyis
588b5(rgyud 'grel): lha rnams mchod byas te/ /lha yi byin brlabs sprul pa'i 'phro 'du yis/ /las dang nyon mongs sdug bsngal zhi gyur cig /na ma sa man ta bu ta nan/ oM a/ mahA shan ting ka tang shan ting/ ka ra bra sha ma d+ha ra na ri dza ta/ a b+ha ba/ d+har ma sa
588b6(rgyud 'grel): ta/ pra ba ta shan ting shi baM ku ru swAhA/ de ba shAn ting ku ru swAhA/ na ga shAM ting ku ru swAhA/ raksha shan ting ku ru swAhA/ yag sha shan ting ku ru swAhA/ kri ha shan ting ku ru swAhA/ gung hing gung hing shan ting ku ru swAhA ra tang ra tang pra tang
588b7(rgyud 'grel): pra tang shan ting ku ru swAhA/ na bi ra lan shan ting ku ru swAhA/ bi ha sa nan tan ting ku ru swAhA/ si pa ra na shan ting ku ru swAhA/ na mo be shan ting ku ru swAhA/ /sa nri su tri pra du shan ting ku ru swAhA/ kram ka ri kram ka ri shan ting ku ru swAhA
589a1(rgyud 'grel): mi tsi mi tsi/ ra ra sraM sraM/ gaM gaM guM guM/ a'oM a'oM/ iM iM/ a ra lan shan ting ku ru swA hA/ /sh+ri dur na mi tra shan ting ku ru swAhA/ de nas las sbyar rnam rgyal thabs/ /phyag mtshan nam mkhar phyar nas ni/ /gti mug rdo rje 'khor bcas
589a2(rgyud 'grel): pas/ /'jig rtan khams ni ram 'byam kun/ /skad cig yud la zhi mdzad de/ /zhi bar gyur pas dbyings su rol/ /bde bar gshegs so bcom ldan 'das/ /dang ba'i yid kyis bskyed pa yi/ /gzhal yas nyid du re zhig gshegs/ /slar yang
589a3(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba'i don la dgongs/ /de bzhin lha tshogs mang po kun/ /go rim de bzhin las bya'o/ /ma yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog /gsal ba'i gzi brjid 'tsher ba la/ /snying rje dga' bas mchod byas nas/ /las rnams brtsam par byas
589a4(rgyud 'grel): nas ni/ /tshe dang longs spyod dpal 'phel 'gyur/ /pu sting ku ru swAhA/ ya yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog /gsal ba'i gzi brjid 'tsher ba la/ /dga' chags yid kyis mchod sbyin bya/ /las rnams brtsam par byas nas ni/ /thams
589a5(rgyud 'grel): cad ma lus dbang du 'gyur/ /e yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog /gsal ba'i gzi brjid 'tsher ba la/ /btang snyoms khros pas mchod sbyin bya/ /las rnams brtsam par byas nas ni/ /thams cad ma lus rlag par 'gyur//
589a6(rgyud 'grel): gzhan yang rgyud las 'byung ba'i las/ /sdig pa bsreg dang tshe 'phel hoM/ /bsrung dang ro sreg bsgrub pa kun/ /cha shas com du bstan pa ni/ /hUM gi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog /ye shes tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog/ haM gi tshogs kyi
589a7(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor mchog/ ram gyi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog/ dkyil 'khor hoM ma tshad bstan pa/ /gsang gsum dkyil 'khor tha ma 'bring/ /rab ni bcu gnyis dgu dang bdun/ /khru gang thams cad sgo gang bya/ /yan lag thams cad
589b1(rgyud 'grel): tshad bstan pa/ /de khru gang nas brtsams nas ni/ /ji srid dpag tshad thug gi bar/ /'dul ba'i dbang gi khyad par gyis/ /yang na tshad ni nges pa med/ /hoM khung tha ma 'bring dang rab/ /khru gang khru ngo khru gsum ni/ /'byor pa'i dbang bya pad zla gam/ /gru gsum
589b2(rgyud 'grel): dang ni 'khor lo'i rtsi bas/ /brgyad pa'i steng du zla ba'i 'od/ /dkar po dgod de dbus rdo rje/ /rtse lnga shar lho rin chen lho/ /nub tu pad+ma byang rgya gram/ /de steng kha 'khor sor bzhi rdo rje ra/ /sems dpa' sems pad+ma khong yon/ /'jig rten pa ni ci rigs
589b3(rgyud 'grel): mdzes par bya/ /nub phyogs 'dug ste zhi las bya/ /bram ze'i khyim du yang dag bshad/ /lho phyogs rgyas pa nub dbang bya/ /byang du drag po hoM du bshad/ /dkyil 'khor drung ngam yang na ni/ /grong khyer phyi rol rje'u rigs dang/ /rgyal rigs smad
589b4(rgyud 'grel): 'tshod smig ma khyim/ /sngags pa nub dang lho shar lho/ /'dug la mchod pa'i don dag ni/ /gang gi gtso dang thabs dang ni/ /shes rab tshul du ldan pa'i don/ /ho ma khung gi bye brag kyang/ /de ci rigs par bya bar bshad/ /de la sogs te gtso yum
589b5(rgyud 'grel): ni// khung gi mthil du lhag par dgong/ /me 'od ngos la rdo rje kha/ /'khor rnams phyi rol yang dag dgod/ /ro sreg maN+Dal khru bcu gnyis/ /khru bzhi pa na khru do zabs/ /brkos pa'i dbus su 'khor lo ni/ /rtsibs brgyad pa la'ang byang chub kyi//
589b6(rgyud 'grel): mchod rten kun rig phyag rgya sogs/ /rigs bzhi dang ni yum bzhi yi/ /de mdza' rdo rje rtse lngas bskor/ /kha la me 'od pri bar bya/ /de mdza' pad+ma 'dab ma la/ /sems dpa' skal bzang la sogs rnams/ /bri bya gru la lha mo bri/ /'jig rten pa yi lha rnams
589b7(rgyud 'grel): kyang/ /phyi rim phyogs phyogs dag du bri/ /gzhung dang 'gal byas nyes sdig bshad/ /sdig pa chen po bskur btab yin/ /ston pa'i bstan pa dge ba'i las/ /pha ma mkhan po slon dpon dang/ /mchod dang lcam dral rnam lnga yis/ /dge ba
590a1(rgyud 'grel): mi dge dge mi dge/ rgyas pa'i las la bskur ba yin/ /sdig can de ni mi thar zhes/ /rnam par 'byed pa'i thub pas gsungs/ /dkyil 'khor 'jug 'dzud byed pa'i phyir/ /ri mo 'am ni de bzhin bzhan/ /ci bgyi tshad med
590a2(rgyud 'grel): bzhi bsgoms te/ /sha dang chang dang sgog btsong dang/ /rku dang bud med spyad byas na/ /de ni yan lag bskur btab yin/ /de la bshags pa byar yod thabs/ /ci bzhin dam la gnas byas sam/ /theg chen sde la mchod byed na/ /sdig can de ni
590a3(rgyud 'grel): myur du 'grol/ /pha ma bsad dang phrogs bcom dang/ /chos kyi mkhan po bsad pa dang/ /dam tshig lung dang shes rab rgyud/ /man ngag dbang gi slob dpon gsum/ /snying nas smad cing bsad pa dang/ /theg chen sde la gnas pa yi/ /mched
590a4(rgyud 'grel): dang lcam dral dbyen byas shing/ /dam las log cing 'khus ba ni/ /de ni mtshams me lnga zhes bya/ /de kun dkyil 'khor 'di 'dra bar/ /las bzhi sdig sreg byas bcug na/ /sdig can de yang myur du 'grel/ /sngags dang phyag rgya yig 'bru rnams
590a5(rgyud 'grel): lhag dang chad bar byas pa ni/ /de dang nye ba'i sdig pa yin/ /ci phyir dbyings dang rnam thar gyi/ /sgo rnams gzhan du gyur pas na/ /bskal par brjod kyang dngos grub ni/ /thob par mi 'gyur dpa' bos gsungs/ /shes bya'i sdig pa thams cad ni/
590a6(rgyud 'grel): mi shes sdig las bcu 'gyur che/ /shes bya'i sdig bshags thams cad la/ /'bum lnga dag gis 'byang ngo zhes/ /tsha tsha bskor ba phyag dang ni/ /srog 'don mdo sde lnga dag la/ /'bum 'bum dag du gsungs pa yin/ /de nas sdom la gnas
590a7(rgyud 'grel): pa yi/ /mchoms med lnga la sogs pa yi/ /sdig can de dag rnams dang ni/ /skad cig yud tsam smra mi bya/ /shes nas dam tshig gang nyams pa/ /de yi sdig pa brjod mi lang/ /gsol nyi bar mi brtson na/ /de dag dang yang smra mi bya/
590b1(rgyud 'grel): skad cig yud tsam smras pas kyang/ /don gyi dngos po gang yin yang/ /dmag la sogs don gcig pa bzhin/ /de yi bshags pa rgyud lngas so/ /pus 'gros thal dbung tsher lcag dang/ /'greng phyar srog sdom dag gis so/ /lhag dang chad pa'i kha skong
590b2(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /dkyil 'khor bdag po mnyes pa dang/ /tshe rabs slob dpon pha ma dang/ /slob ma'i sdig zhi dbang bskur dang/ /mdza' yas sems can don byas bsam/ /de yi sdig pa nges 'byad do/ /hom bzhi yi gtso bo gang/ /bsreg rdzas bdun gsum
590b3(rgyud 'grel): nyi shu gcig /mnyes par bya phyir dbul bar bya/ /de nas tshe rabs slob dpon don/ /dkon mchog gsum la dus gsum gsum/ /dbul ba nyid du bya bar bshad/ /tshe rabs pha ma'i don gyi phyir/ /rigs kyi gtso bo rnams la'o//
590b4(rgyud 'grel): de nas slob ma rim gyis ni/ /bgegs bsal phyir ni spros chus bkru/ /de nas g.yon phyogs tsog pur bzhag /lag g.yas slob dpon lag g.yon gyi/ /byams par bcas pas bzung nas ni/ /gtso bo dag gi sngags bdun bzlas/ /de nas
590b5(rgyud 'grel): sdig pa zad bya'i phyir/ /rigs yum lnga la bdun bdun no/ /de yis dbang bskur bsrung bar 'gyur/ /mdza' yas sems can kun don du/ /lha rnams kun la dbul bar bya/ /de dag bkra shis bya ba'i phyir/ /yum bzhi gzungs kyi bya ba ni//
590b6(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas spyan ni tshim byed ma/ /dbang po zhi ba zla ba 'dra/ /bstod tshig gis bskul sngags brjod bya/ /de nas bshags pa gus par bya/ /de nas sngags pas phyogs phyogs nas/ /oM badzra satwa sa ma ya/ ma nu pa la ya/ badzra satwa/ te no
590b7(rgyud 'grel): pa tiSh? Dri Dho me b+ha ba/ su to Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ a nu rak+to me b+ha ba/ su to Sh+yo me b+ha ba sarba sid+d+himma/ pra yats+tsha/ sarba d+harma su tsa me tsit+taM/ sh+ri yaM(rgyud 'grel): ku ru hUM/ ha ha ha ha ho(rgyud 'grel): b+ha ga ban/ sarba ta thA ga ta/ badzra mA me/ muny+tsa/ badzra b+ha ba/ mahA sa ma ya/
591a1(rgyud 'grel): satwa a:/ rigs lngar dbye zhing brjod nas ni/ /skar ma rab rib mar me dang/ /sgyu ma zil ba chu bur dang/ /rmi lam glog dang sprin lta bur/ /'dus byas chos kun de ltar lta/ /de ltar bsdu ba byas nas bzhag /de nas
591a2(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor chen po la bltas te/ lhag pa'i mchod pa dbul/ /e ma bdag nyid slob bcas pa'i/ /dri zhim ngo bo thams cad kun/ /sngon 'das dpyid kyi du per ni/ /byin rlabs mchod 'bul bzhes su gsol/ /de bi du pe pu tsa ho//
591a3(rgyud 'grel): e ma bdag nyid slob bcas pa'i/ /dbyibs legs mdzes pa thams cad kun/ /da ltar dbyar gyi pus per ni/ /byin brlabs mchod 'bul bzhes su gsol/ /de byi puspe pu tsa ho/ /e ma bdag nyid slob bcas pa'i/ /gsal dro ngo bo
591a4(rgyud 'grel): thams cad kun/ /byon ma rag ston a lo ke/ byin brlabs mchod 'bul bzhes su gsol/ /de bi a lo ke pu tsa ho/ /e ma bdag nyid slob bcas pa'i/ /brlan bcas dri zhim thams cad kun/ /ma byon dgun gyi gan der ni/ /byin
591a5(rgyud 'grel): brlabs mchod 'bul bzhes su gsol/ /de byi gan de bu tsa ho/ /de ltar mchod nas skyabs gsol ba/ /dkyil 'khor sangs rgyas rten nyid de/ /rnam dag sku las ting 'dzin dag pa'i sku/ /sprul sku phyag rgya mtshon pa'i lha tshogs kyi/
591a6(rgyud 'grel): grags pas 'jig rten gsum bkang lham me ba/ /mgon po mchog nyid la ni skyabs su mchi/ /smra bsam brjod med gsung gi sprul ba'i tshogs/ /mtshan nyid so so'i ye shes kun ston pa/ /dus gsum rgyal ba thams cad bskyed
591a7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i yum/ /dam chos mdo sde bzhi la skyabs su mchi/ /rab tu lam stor 'khor bar mig zum pa'i/ /'gro ba bskyabs med rnams kyi pha ma mdzad/ /'phrin las bzhi yis rtse gcig don mdzad gtso/ /theg chen dge 'dun tshogs
591b1(rgyud 'grel): la skyabs su mchi/ /de nas dkyil 'khor lha tshogs la/ /gus dang bcas pas phyag byas mchod/ /gtsang zhing gtsang mar bshams pa'i rdzas/ /khrus chab bdug spos ma dri bshos/ /dkyil 'khor lha tshogs rnams la 'bul/ /thugs rjes dgongs nas bzhes su
591b2(rgyud 'grel): gsol/ /na mas sa man+ta bud d+ha nan/ /ga gan sa ma ye swAhA/ oM bi sho bi shud d+he swAhA/ /na mas sa man+ta bud d+ha nan/ d+harma twat+tA nA nu ga te swAhA/ /na mass man+ta bud d+ha nan/ mahA man+ta butka te swAhA/ /na mass man+ta bud d+ha nan/ /da rtsi pa ra na/ /a ga ga sa ga ga
591b3(rgyud 'grel): ge ne 'u da ra ya swAhA/ /na mass man+ta bud d+ha nan/ b+hi shud d+ha gan+todb+ha ba ya swAhA/ na mass man+ta bud d+ha nan/ a ra ra/ sa ra ra/ ka ra ra/ ba laM ti/ ma ni swAhA/ snang stong mchod rten chos nyid mkha' / /chos dbyings ye shes rnam dag sku/ /byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya
591b4(rgyud 'grel): mdzad/ /phyag 'tshal rnam par mdzad la'o/ /de lta bu'i yon tan bcas pa la/ /rdo rje sems dpa' byams pa'i mchod/ /spos kyi sprin lding bdug pa 'phro/ /gtsug tor rgyal ba'i gdugs kyis khebs/ /byams pa thabs dang shes rab kyi/ /badzra d+hu pa'i
591b5(rgyud 'grel): mchod pas rol/ /rin chen 'byung ldan snying rje'i mchod/ /utpal mthing ga me tog 'thor/ /rin chen zla gam dbyings su sbyor/ /snying rje thabs dang shes rab kyi/ /ratna puShpe'i mchod pas rol/ /snang ba mdza' yas dga' ba'i mchod/ /dpal gyi sgron
591b6(rgyud 'grel): ma phyag na bsnams/ /chos kyi rgyal mtshan rab 'bar 'dzugs/ /dga' ba'i thabs dang shes rab kyis/ /pad+ma A lo'i mchod pas rol/ /don yod grub pa'i btang snyoms mchod/ /tsan dan bdud rtsi'i char 'bebs ma/ /dkyil 'khor gsang ba'i thig
591b7(rgyud 'grel): ler 'bebs/ /spos spor thabs dang shes rab kyis/ /karma gand+he'i mchod pas rol/ /de ltar rigs la nye ba'i gzungs/ /mchod ba phul ba'i lan dag du/ /rnam par snang mdzad chen po yis/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rtogs pa'i yul/ /dung mdog sgeg mo rdo rje
592a1(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin/ /sems dpa' dkar ba ye shes 'bebs/ /me long lta bu'i ye shes la/ /badzra la se'i mchod pas rol/ /rin chen 'byung ldan mnyam pa'i yul/ /yid bzhin rin chen gtsug 'bar ma/ /'jam dpal rnon po'i
592a2(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub 'dzin/ /mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes la/ /ratna ma le'i mchod pas rol/ /snang ba mdza' yas mkhyen pa'i yul/ /pad+ma dbyangs mkhan rma bya'i mgrin/ /spyan ras gzigs kyi shes rab bskyed/ /so sor rtog pa'i ye shes la/ /pad+ma girti'i
592a3(rgyud 'grel): mchod pas rol/ /don yod grub pa las kyi yul/ /gar mkhan 'gying ma gzi dang ldan/ /las kyi 'khor lo rnam par sgyur/ /bya ba nan tan ye shes la/ /karma nirti'i mchod pas rol/ /de ltar gzungs kyi mchod byas nas/ /rigs bzhi
592a4(rgyud 'grel): tshad med bsdu ba bzhi/ /mchod phyir dpal gyis gsungs pa'o/ /sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa'i rtags/ byams pa chen po'i ngo bo nyid/ /dpa' bar 'gro ba rnam dag la/ /badzra a gu sha'i mchod pas rol/ /don mthun phun sum tshogs
592a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rtags/ /snying rje chen po'i ngo bo nyid/ /rin chen phyag rgyas shes pa la/ /ratna pa sha'i mchod bas rol/ /don spyad phun sum tshogs pa'i rtags/ /dga' ba chen po'i ngo bo nyid/ /ye shes rab sgrol mas mdzad pa la/ /pad+ma spo
592a6(rgyud 'grel): ta'i mchod pas rol/ /snyan pa phun sum tshogs pa'i brtags/ /btang snyoms chen po'i ngo bo nyid/ /chos sten chen pos kun rig la/ /karma gand+he'i mchod pas rol/ /de ltar tshad med mchod byas
592a7(rgyud 'grel): nas/ /rigs rnams byin gyis rlobs pas mchod/ /zhe sdang ma skyes rdo rje dam tshig ma/ /ye shes me long pha rol phyin pa'i dang/ /gnyis med rgyas 'debs drin ldan phyag rgya ma/ /satwa badzra dbyings phyug mchod pas rol/ /nga
592b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyal bdag med rin chen dam tshig ma/ /ye shes mnyam nyid pha rol phyin pa'i dang/ /mi 'gyur rmongs byed drin ldan phyag rgya ma/ /ratna badzra dbyings phyug mchod pas rol/ /'dod chags mi dmigs chos kyi dam tshig ma/ /ye shes kun rtogs pha rol phyin pa'i ngang/
592b2(rgyud 'grel): mi rtog za byed dri ldan phyag rgya ma/ /pad+ma badzra dbyings phyug mchod pas rol/ /nga rgyal ma grub brgya gram dam tshig ma/ /ye shes nan tan pha rol phyin pa'i dang/ /mi skye tshe 'phel dri ldan phyag rgya ma/ /karma badzra dbyings phyug mchod pas rol/ /de ltar byin
592b3(rgyud 'grel): brlabs mchod byas nas/ /rgyan gyi mchod par gsungs pa ni/ /bde gshegs rgyal ba 'khor bcas ni/ /mchod gnas dam pa dpal gyi zhing/ /yid du 'ong ba'i mchod sprin dang/ /rol mo sil snyan 'phan gdugs dang/ /bla re rgyal mtshan lhab
592b4(rgyud 'grel): lhub dang/ /me tog 'phrad dang bdug spos sogs/ /mchod sprin sna tshogs phyogs bcur sbrul/ /mchod sprin rig sngags bden pa dang/ /nam mkha' i mdzod sngags ting 'dzin thugs/ /sangs rgyas zhing khams rab 'byams su/ /mchad sprin sna tshogs
592b5(rgyud 'grel): klubs gyur cig /na mo ratna tra ya ya/ na mo b+ha ga ba te/ /badzra sA ra bra marda ne/ ta thA ga tA ya/ arta te samyaksaM bud d+ha ya/ tadya thA/ oM badzre badzre mahA badzre/ mahA te dza badzre/ mahA bidya badzre/ mahA bo d+hi tsit+ta badzre/ mahA po d+hi maN+Do/ pra saM kra ma Na
592b6(rgyud 'grel): badzre/ sarba karma a wa ra Na/ bi sho d+ha na badzre swA hA/ na massarba ta thA ga te b+hyo/ bi shwa mu khe b+hya:/ sarbba thA khaM ud+ga te/ spha ra Na i maM ga ga na khaM swAhA/ de nas yum lnga las brtan mchod/ /shes rab dbyings phyug rigs yum lnga/ /phyag rgya'i
592b7(rgyud 'grel): tshogs la byin rlob cing/ /thams cad 'byung ba'i gzhir gyur bas/ /'gro ba'i don rnams mdzad du gsol/ /shes rab dbyings ma rigs kyi yum lnga ste/ /chos dbyings ye shes mkha' sogs gsal ba la/ /gsang chen bde ba'i longs spyod
593a1(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs pa'i dang/ /thabs ltar rol zhing brtan por bzhugs su gsol/ /yum rnams bdag la mchod thabs ni/ /bsgrub mchod bcu drug gzhung bzhin bya/ /bcom ldan rnam snang mdzad chen gyi/ /chos dbyings ye shes chen
593a2(rgyud 'grel): po'i yul/ /yum chen b+hud+d+ha lo tsa na/ thams cad zad par khas dbang bskur/ /bde gshegs kun gyi yum chen mo/ /phyag 'tshal kun tu bzang mo la'o/ /bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpa' yi/ /me long ye shes chen po'i yul/ /yum chen badzra lo tsa na//
593a3(rgyud 'grel): thams cad zad par sas dbang bskur/ /rdo rje rigs gtso mang po'i yum/ /phyag 'tshal sangs rgyas spyan khyod la'o/ /bcom ldan rin chen 'byung ldan gyis/ /mnyam nyid ye shes chen po'i yul/ /yum chen ratna lo tsa na/ /thams cad zad par
593a4(rgyud 'grel): mes dbang bskur/ /rin chen rigs gtso mang po'i yum/ /phyag 'tshal na bza' dkar mo la'o/ /bcom ldan snang ba mdza' yas kyi/ /kun rtogs ye shes chen po'i yul/ /yum chen pad+ma lo tsa na/ /thams cad zad par chus dbang bskur/ /padmo'i
593a5(rgyud 'grel): rigs gtso mang po'i yum/ /phyag 'tshal mA ma kI nyid la'o/ /bcom ldan don yod grub pa yi/ /nan tan ye shes chen po'i yul/ /yum chen karma lo tsa na/ /thams cad zad par rlung dbang bskur/ /las kyi rigs gtso mang po'i yum/ /phyag
593a6(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal dam tshig sgrol ma'o/ /de nas sems dpa' bcu drug kyang/ /ci rigs pa 'am yang na ni/ /mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa yis mchod/ /de nas la se la sogs brgyad/ /phyi nang gnyis kyi lha mo dam tshig ma/ /phyag rgya bzhi yi ye shes gsal
593a7(rgyud 'grel): ba la/ /rol pa chen pos mchod pas gtso bo yi/ /dgongs pa skongs la 'gro ba'i don rnams mdzod/ /ye shes dus bzhi gzugs nye gzungs/ /sprul sku 'khor bar mi ldog cing/ /mya ngan 'das la mi chags pa'i/ /don rnams mdzad
593b1(rgyud 'grel): cing brtan por bzhugs/ /rdo rje sgeg mo byang chub sems kyi dang/ /mchod sbyin smon byed gzi brjid 'bar zhing sdud/ /mdog dkar gser gyi khu tshur skur rten te/ /phyag 'tshal rdo rje smon byed sgeg mo la'o/ /rin chen dpal phreng gzungs dang ting nge 'dzin//
593b2(rgyud 'grel): yid bzhin mchog 'byung gzi brjid 'bar zhing skor/ /sdo bsangs rin chen phreng bas re 'dod skongs/ /phyag 'tshal bdud rtsi char 'bebs phreng ba la'o/ /pad+ma dbyangs mkhan gsung rab rgya mtshor sgrogs/ /snyan pas yid 'phrog gzi brjid 'bar
593b3(rgyud 'grel): ldan skongs/ /mdog dmar gser gyi pi bang phyag na bsnams/ /phyag 'tshal thabs kyis yid 'phrog gi ra ti la'o/ /las kyi gar mkhan 'phrin las rgya mtsho sgrol/ /gzugs mdzes skyod pas rol mo phyogs bcur mdzad/ /mdog ljang sna tshogs
593b4(rgyud 'grel): skur ston gzi brjid 'bar/ /phyag 'tshal yid 'ong mdzes bskyod ni rti la'o/ /spos kyi sprin lding bdug pa 'phro/ /kun tu tshim byed dri bsung thim/ /mthon skya gser gyi bog phor bsnams/ /phyag 'tshal rnam dag bdug pa la'o/ /bltas mdzes rin chen
593b5(rgyud 'grel): phung po 'phro/ /byang chub yan lag me tog rgyan/ /mthong tid me tog gzhong bu bsnams/ /phyag 'tshal skyon med me tog la'o/ /'od gsal 'phros pas kun tu khyab/ /gti mug thibs po sel mdzad pa/ /dmar skya chos kyi mar me bsnams/ /phyag 'tshal sgron 'bar mar me la'o//
593b6(rgyud 'grel): tsan dan bdud rtsi char 'bebs ma/ /bdud rtsi bsil dro 'jam pa'i dbyangs/ /ljang sngon dung por phyag na bsnams/ /phyag 'tshal reg bya dri chu la'o/ /rdzu 'phrul che ba'i bskal bzangs dang/ /phyogs skyong bcu dang bkra shis brgyad/ /rdo rje lcags kyu
593b7(rgyud 'grel): 'gugs byed dang/ /rin chen zhags pa gsol ka dang/ /pad+ma lcags sgrog pho nya'i las/ /rgya gram dril bu shes rab mchog /dpe med rgyas sras rang rgyal dang/ /dgra bcom rgyal chen lha chen dang/ /lha klu gnod sbyin dri za dang/ /lha ma yin dang
594a1(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha' lding/ /mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye che/ /sa bdag gza' skar rigs 'dzin dang/ /srin po log 'dren sha za dang/ /rgyu drug ngag gi mthu can sogs/ /thams cad ci rigs pa yis mchod/ /dkyil 'khor bdag po de nyid kyis//
594a2(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor lha yi ting 'dzin zhugs/ /lce thog a las zla dkyil te/ /oM bsgoms rdo rje ye shes bsam/ /rdo rje lcags kyu bsgoms nas ni/ /chos kyi phyag rgya can gyis ni/ /slob ma de la bshad par bya/ /oM d+harma/ hUM d+harma/ traM d+harma/ h+ri d+harma/ a
594a3(rgyud 'grel): d+harma/ sa ma ya stwoM/ d+harma/ ya na ya swA d+harma/ a ho su ka d+harma/ sa du sa du/ su pa haM/ swA d+harma/ ru bo he te d+harma/ a rta pra ba ti d+harma/ ha ha hUM ha d+harma/ sarba ka ri d+harma/ du ka tshe da d+harma/ bu da b+ho di d+harma/ pra ti sha ba ta d+harma/ su ba shid traM d+harma/ ni pa
594a4(rgyud 'grel): ya stoM d+harma/ shud tru baksha d+harma/ sarba sid d+ha d+harma/ ma ha ra ti d+harma/ ru pa sho be d+harma/ shu rod tra be'u d+harma/ sarba bu rtse d+harma/ pra ha ta ni d+harma/ pra te d+harma/ tsa gri d+harma/ su gan dang gi d+harma/ a ya hi dza dza d+harma/ a ya hi hUM hUM d+harma/ ho sbo
594a5(rgyud 'grel): ta boM boM d+harma/ gan d+ha a a d+harma/ de ltar lha tshogs sku gsung thugs/ /dkyil 'khor gang yin thams cad kyi/ so sor snying po tha mar ni/ d+harmas btags la brjod pas ni/ /lha rnams thugs dgongs dngos grub stsol/ /kun rdzob dang ni
594a6(rgyud 'grel): don dam gyi/ /byang chub sems ni bskyed par bya/ /sdom pa yi ni dam tshig dang/ dge ba'i chos rnams sdud pa dang/ /sems can don byar bcas pa yi/ /rnam pa gsum dang ldan par bshad/ /rdo rje go cha'i phyag rgyar bcas/ /oM badzra
594a7(rgyud 'grel): ka ba tsa raksha a ti ti sta haM/ de nas sku gsung thugs kyis brlab/ /ka ya oM/ bag aM/ tsi ta hUM/ /'khor lo phyag rgya ting 'dzin sngags/ /bar du gcod pa gsal bar bya/ /oM dz+nya na tsakra phaT/ /da yis bshad phog thams cad ni/ /dam pas
594b1(rgyud 'grel): gsungs pa'i tshig yin pas/ /khyod kyang de las ma 'da' zhig /oM badzra sa ma ad+h+ri tha a/ /byang chub rigs can nyid du ni/ /sngags ni brjod pas gyur pa'o/ /oM b+ho d+hi tsi ta a saM me/ /tri sa ma me/ ma ha sa ma ya swAhA/ /hUM hUM hUM/ gsum pa dkyil 'khor mjug gzhug
594b2(rgyud 'grel): pa/ /slob dpon zhugs dang slob ma gzhug /gshegs dang lhag chad kha bskang dang/ /mthun par slar gshegs gsol ba dang/ /las bzhi mchod nas bdag nyid kyis/ /dkyil 'khor sems kyis nam mkha' la/ /bteg nas byang chub sems kyis ni/ /zhugs
594b3(rgyud 'grel): pa nyid du thub pas gsungs/ /bdug spos lag du thogs nas su/ /blo gros ldan pas lha rnams la/ /gus pas gsol ba legs par gdab/ /de 'og sgo bzhi dbye bar bshad/ /zhugs lha gnyis su med bsgoms la/ /'gro ba drang ba'i las bya'o//
594b4(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan nam mkha' i sangs rgyas kun/ /thugs rje chen po mthu ldan lags/ /bdag nyid rab tu bsgral ba'i phyir/ /rang bzhin ting 'dzin gzugs brnyan ltas/ /bdag la dbang mchog 'dir stsol cig /dkyil 'khor la ni 'khor lor bshad//
594b5(rgyud 'grel): de nyid dam tshig yin par bshad/ /sangs rgyas bka' yi dkyil 'khor du/ /bdag nyid dang pas 'jug lags na/ /dkyil 'khor bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis/ /bdag la byin gyis brlab du gsol/ /bde bar gshegs so bcom ldan 'das/ /bsod nams
594b6(rgyud 'grel): can du bdag nyid 'gyur/ /sngon gyi las kyis 'brel ba lags/ /thugs rjes sras su dgongs par mdzod/ /at+ma ko haM/ maN+Da la sarba a be sha swa b+hA ba/ /rdo rje mdzub sogs legs par ni/ /sbyar la bkan te bsdebs nas su/ /khros nas rab tu dbye ba ni/ /sgo
594b7(rgyud 'grel): dkyil yi mtshan nyid do/ /gnas rab sgo bzhi zhe sdang dang/ /nga rgyal 'dod chags phrag dog bzhis/ /sngon med dus nas bcad lags na/ /tshad med bsdu brgyad rigs bzhi yis/ /thugs rje thabs la sprul pa yi/ /lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog
595a1(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /dril bu phyag rgya'i mchog nyid kyis/ /ding nyid thar sgo dbye ru gsol/ /oM badzra ratna pad+ma karma/ kro da ga dod sa ma ya tsa twa ra/ pra be sha shi gran mA ra ya/ /hUM phaT/ /de nas bdag rdo rje rin chen dang/ /pad+ma rgya
595a2(rgyud 'grel): gram shugs kyis ni/ /rab tu gal te zhugs nas ni/ /gnyis su med par sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /snying rjes slob ma la sogs la/ /lha mo sprul sras bsgom byas drang/ /de nas sngags g.yog dag gis ni/ /slob ma'i las rnams brtson
595a3(rgyud 'grel): bya ba/ /phyag 'tshal gsol 'jug khrus bkra shis/ dam bca' me tog gtor mig dbye/ /slob dpon lan stsal lhas dbang bskur/ /dam tshig dbog dang dbang bskur dang/ /smon lam lha ngo bstan yon dbul/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo ba'o//
595a4(rgyud 'grel): de nas shar sgo dag du ni/ /bdug spos lag du thog nas ni/ /shar phyogs mngon dga' i pho brang 'di/ /bcom ldan rdo rje sems la sogs/ /skal ldan rgyal sras dag pa zhig /ngag yid dang bas gus phyag 'tshal/ /lho phyogs dpal
595a5(rgyud 'grel): ldan pho brang 'di'i/ /bcom ldan rin chen 'byung ldan sogs/ /skal ldan rgyal sras dag pa zhig /nub phyogs bde ldan pho brang 'di'i/ /bcom ldan snang ba mdza' yas sogs/ /skal ldan rgyal sras dag pa zhig /byang phyogs rnam dag
595a6(rgyud 'grel): pho brang 'di'i/ /bcom ldan don yod grub pa sogs/ /skal ldan rgyal sras dag pa zhig /bcom ldan snying po'i pho brang 'di'i/ /bcom ldan rnam par snang mdzad sogs/ /skal ldan rgyal sras dag pa zhig /ngag yid dang bas gus phyag
595a7(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal/ /bdag nyid dam tshig rdo rje ste/ /rdo rje sems dpa' yin pa'i phyir/ /rdo rje bla na med pa 'di/ /de ring bdag la dbab du gsol/ /bdag ni dam tshig rin chen ste/ /bdag ni dam tshig padmo ste/ /bdag ni dam tshig rgya gram ste/ /bdag
595b1(rgyud 'grel): ni dam tshig 'khor lo ste/ /rnam par snang mdzad yin par grags/ /'khor lo bla na med pa 'di/ /de ring bdag la dbab du gsol/ /shar phyogs mngon dga' i pho brang 'dir/ /bla med byang chub sems bskyed de/ /dngos grub dam ba sgrub pa'i phyir/ /bdag
595b2(rgyud 'grel): gis dad pas 'jug par bgyi/ /lho phyogs dpal ldan pho brang 'dir/ /nub phyogs bde ldan pho brang 'dir/ /byang phyogs rnam dag pho brang 'dir/ /bcom ldan snying po'i pho brang 'dir/ /bdag gis slob ma gzhug par bgyi/ /phyogs su lta ba dgrol 
595b3(rgyud 'grel): ba'i phyir/ /mdza' las 'das la gnas par bgyi/ /rdo rje sems dpa' me long yul/ /kun bzang phyag rgya'i bum pa ste/ /gnyis min byang chub sems rtags chus/ /zhe sdang rnam smin dag gyur cig /rin chen 'byung ldan mnyam shes yul/ /na bza' i phyag
595b4(rgyud 'grel): rgya bum pa ste/ /gnyis med byang chub sems rtags chus/ /nga rgyal rnam smin dag gyur cig /snang ba mdza' yas kun rtog yul/ /ma ma'i phyag rgya bum pa ste/ /gnyis min byang chub sems rtags chus/ /'dod chags rnam smin dag gyur cig /don grub
595b5(rgyud 'grel): nan tan yo shes yul/ /sgrol ma'i phyag rgya bum pa ste/ /gnyis min byang chub sems rtags chus/ /phrag dog rnam smin dag gyur cig /rnam snang chos dbyings ye shes yul/ /spyan gyi phyag rgya bum pa ste/ /gnyis min byang chub sems rtags
595b6(rgyud 'grel): chus/ /gti mug rnam smin dag gyur cig /mi 'khrugs rgyal po'i srid dang gti mug rnam sbyong ba/ /mgon po yon tan mdza' dag rdzogs pa'i bkra shis dang/ /dge mnyam bsam sems ldan pa'i bkra shis gang yin pa/ /bkra shis des ni
595b7(rgyud 'grel): deng 'dir zhi byed legs gyur shog /sangs rgyas kun gyi yon tan rgyan gyis brgyan byas shing/ /yang dag 'byor pa'i sbyin pas sbyin mdzad mi bslu ba/ /rin tshan 'byung zhes bya ba'i bkra shis gang yin pa/ /bsam gtan dam pa ting 'dzin pha rol
596a1(rgyud 'grel): phyin gnas shing/ /ye shes pad+ma'i steng bzhugs dpag med tshe ldan zhing/ /tshe grangs med par byin gyis brlabs pa'i bkra shis gang yin pa/ /sems can don phyir las la thugs ni sbyor mdzad cing/ /'gro ba
596a2(rgyud 'grel): thams cad bcings pa bcings las grol gyur pa/ /thub mchog don yod thub pa'i bkra shis gang yin pa/ /rnam par snang mdzad ye shes dam pa mcho chen ldan/ /zla ba nya 'dra sku mda' srid pa'i mthar 'byin ba/ /dgongs pa mdza' 
596a3(rgyud 'grel): dag rdzogs pa'i bkra shis gang yin pa/ /bkra shis des ni deng 'dir zhi byed legs gyur shog /yan ma gA lan shu ba sha man to sa ya dzin ta ka sha sye ag sho bya ra tsa/ /bi shi na ta sye/ sarba ku na/ ma ga la sya/ na Na maM gA la da/ b+ha b+ha du
596a4(rgyud 'grel): shan te/ ka sa pra dz+nyA na ta ban/ du tyaM/ yan man dga' lan ma ni ku lan/ hi na bu ha ra/ /pa pa du sha sha tsi na se ta/ no te ne/ /ba la na/ pi pi pu ti na/ ta na mang 'ga' lan/ b+ha b+ha du shan te/ ka ra na ba da na tya/ yan mang 'ga' lan/ a ga ni/ a
596a5(rgyud 'grel): yur byed de sa sye/ ma ne pu ra ta la ya sa sye/ 'ga' rna badzra/ pa ri ga te/ sa sye/ ta thA ga te/ ya mi/ tan mang 'ga' lan/ b+ha b+ha du shan te/ kar na dya phaT/ tyaM/ yan man 'ga' lan/ ma ma mu ne/ ba ra sha sye/ ka a mo ka sid ti/ swA twa ta ra/
596a6(rgyud 'grel): kar ma na ne/ bu da sha ba na/ sha ta la sye/ yo tsi ta man sa sa sye/ mun sa sye/ b+han d+ha b+han d+ha b+han d+ha me bya/ tan man 'ga' lan/ b+ha b+ha du shan te/ kar rna ta tyaM/ yan mang 'ga' lan/ sa ga la pu rarna/ ma to ra ta sa sye/ be ro tsa na sye/ ba rta?
596a7(rgyud 'grel): nyarni/ ma ha ra rna ba se/ sa bu ra rarna/ tsatra bu she/ hi ban da ka se/ tan mang 'ga' lan/ /b+ha b+ha du shan he ka rna ta bad tyaM/ /de la de bzhin gshegs gtso dang/ /chos rnams kun la dbang bskur ro/ /rdo rje rigs gtso chen po dang/ /khams
596b1(rgyud 'grel): gsum bdag por dbang bskur ro/ /rin chen rigs gtso chen po dang/ /lha mis mchod par dbang bskur ro/ /pad+ma'i rigs gtso chen po dang/ /chos kyi rgyal po chen por dbang bskur ro/ /las kyi rigs gtso chen po dang/ /las bzhis gzhan don spyod dbang bskur/
596b2(rgyud 'grel): bkra shis brjod pa'i byin rlabs kyis/ /'jig rten dag tu mi rnams kun/ /grags pa rnams sprel bgegs kyang med/ /sems nyid bder 'gro nges byed la/ /mthar yang nges pa kho nar ni/ /zhi ba'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur/ /de nas dam bca' bya ba ni//
596b3(rgyud 'grel): dpa' po chen po rgyud dag las/ /sdom pa chen po legs par blang bar bya/ /je la sdom pa'i yon tan ni/ /dang pos sdom pas rgyud gnyis sbyang/ /tha ma'i sdom pas lha min sbyong/ /rdo rje rin chen pad+ma yi/ /sdom pa yis ni ngan 'gro spyod/ /de bas sdom
596b4(rgyud 'grel): pa mnod pa mchog /de 'og dam bca' yang dag bya/ /sangs rgyas rnal 'byor sdom pa la/ /tshul khrims kyi ni bslab pa dang/ /dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang/ /sems can don byed brtan par gzung/ /de ni spyi yi tshul khrims so/ /rdo rje rigs mchog
596b5(rgyud 'grel): chen po la/ /rdo rje dril dang phyag rgya dang/ /yang dag nyid du gzung bar bya/ /slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar bgyi/ /rin chen rigs mchog chen po yi/ /dam tshig yid du 'ong pa la/ /nyin re bzhin nam dus drug tu/ /sbyin pa rnam bzhi rab tu sbyin/ /
596b6(rgyud 'grel): byang chub chen po las byung ba/ /pad+ma rigs mchog dag pa la/ /phyi nang gsang ba'i theg pa gsum/ /dam pa'i chos kyang gzung bar bgyi/ /las kyi rigs mchog chen po la/ /sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni/ /yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi//
596b7(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bya/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun dang/ /bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum/ /ding nas brtsams te gzung bar bgyi/ /nam du yang ni mi spong ngo/ /sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /bdag gi sdom pa ma lus gzung//
597a1(rgyud 'grel): de nas shar sgo gnas pa de/ /na bza' stod smad dar dmar dkri/ rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgya 'char/ /btsug la lag du rin chen dang/ /me tog phreng ba la sogs thogs/ /gdong g.yogs dar dkar gyis g.yogs nas/ /a sa me
597a2(rgyud 'grel): tri sa me/ ma ha sa ma ya hUM/ oM badzra i ta tishtha hUM/ oM badzra sa ma ya hUM/ sngon gyi tshe rabs grangs med nas/ /dge ba'i las kyis bsnyen pa'i lha/ /lhag pa'i lha ni gang yin pa/ /da lta nyid du bab par shog /sangs rgyas dngos grub thob bya'i phyir//
597a3(rgyud 'grel): bdag la thugs brtser dgongs nas kyang/ /'gro la phan pa'i gtso chen gyis/ /sman par dgongs nas bzhes su gsol/ /oM badzra pra ti gri ha na hUM/ oM badzra pra ti tsa sa ma ya sa stwoM/ /bo de tsi ta pu tsa ho/ /me tog rin chen la sogs pa/ /gar las
597a4(rgyud 'grel): bab pa rigs kyi lha/ /gtso bo'i rigs de bsgrubs nas ni/ dngos grub myur de the tshom med/ /de nas lcags kyu'i phyag rgya yis/ /rin chen lhar bcas blangs nas ni/ /slob ma'i spyir bzhag thim gyur nas/ /mi gnyis gcig pa'i lhar bsams nas/
597a5(rgyud 'grel): oM badzra sa ma ya/ rhi tha ya me/ oM A hUM/ a b+hi shin tsa a/ /da ni dad pa rab tu bskyed/ /dkyil 'khor bzang po 'di la ltos/ /khyod ni theg chen 'di nyid la/ /gsang ba chen po'i snod du 'gyur/ /rnyed pa mnyam med de yi rnyed/ /thob pa mnyam med
597a6(rgyud 'grel): de ring thob/ /dam tshig gong 'og ma 'da' zhig/ bla med byang chub chen po thob/ /oM badzra ha song ga ta ya hUM/ oM badzra pra be sha ya hUM phaT/ /slob dpon lan gnyis dbyangs sbyar te/ rdo rje phyag rgya bcas la/ nga yi dam tshig rdo rje ste/ /rdo rje sems
597a7(rgyud 'grel): dpa' yin par grags/ /rdo rje ye shes bla med 'od/ /de ring khyod la sbyin par bya/ /oM badzra sa ma ya a b+hi shin tsa a a/ nga ni dam tshig rin chen te/ /nga ni dam tshig pad+ma ste/ /nga ni dam tshig rgya gram ste/ /nga ni dam tshig 'khor lo ste//
597b1(rgyud 'grel): snying po 'khor lo ye shes bla med 'di/ /de ring khyod la sbyin par bya/ /oM ratna pad+ma karma tsakra/ a b+hi shin tsa a a/ sa ma yarh+ri tha/ 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu/ /dam las 'das na sreg par byed/ /dam tshig srungs na dngos grub ni/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi
597b2(rgyud 'grel): chu yis 'grub/ /ji snye dam tshig 'das na ni/ /de ma thag tu bkas nas gshegs/ /rdo rje 'dzin rgyal khros nas kyang/ /bdun rgyud rigs ni rlag par mdzad/ /de bas rtag du bu khyod kyis/ /rgyal bas gsungs pa'i dam tshig dang/ /sgom pa dang
597b3(rgyud 'grel): ni bla ma'i bka' / /shin tu mos pas bsrung bar bya/ /khyod kyis srog chags gsad mi bya/ /ma byin par yang blang mi bya/ /brdzun dang 'dod la spyod pa rnams/ /dngos grub 'dod pas bya ba men/ /chang ni btung bar mi bya zhing/ /sha la sogs pa bza' mi
597b4(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /sems can gnod bar sbyor ba ni/ /nam yang bya ba ma yin te/ dkon mchog gsum ni yong mi spang/ /dus kun tu ni byang chub sems/ /snying po sngags dang phyag rgya dang/ /lha dang bla ma de bzhin no/ sdig la sogs pa gang yin dang/ /bla ma'i
597b5(rgyud 'grel): bka' las 'da' mi bya/ /lha la phul ba'i snying po dang/ /de yi grib mar 'gom mi bya/ /phyag rgya'i gzugs la'ang de bzhin no/ /sngags dang lha la smad mi bya/ /gdon gyi la sogs bya ba man/ /mu stegs can la'ang smad mi bya/ /mdor na yid gnyis dogs
597b6(rgyud 'grel): mi bya/ /bdag gi de nyid sngags dang ni/ /thams cad 'dra bas de bzhin no/ /de nas dbang mchog bskur ba ni/ /ba gci slob ma'i phyogs dag tu/ /khru gang pa'i dkyil 'khor la/ pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa bri/ tshon ni dmar pos legs bris la/ /bkra shis
597b7(rgyud 'grel): brgyad kyi phyag rgya bgod/ /dbu rgyan cod pan me tog phreng/ phyag rgya bzhi dang rin chen bdun/ /gser byas thur ma 'khor me long/ dung dang bkra shis ras thog bzhag /bdug spos ram sar gdugs sham can/ /rnga yab bsil yab zho phor gang/ bum pa bzhi sogs
598a1(rgyud 'grel): mi res gzung/ /mchod pa la sogs bkra shis brjod/ /oM bri ta bri ta sarba a ra na ni hUM phaT/ /oM tra tha tra tha sarba a ba ra na ni hUM phaT/ /oM bi tra bi tra ba sarba a pa twad twa na ni hUM phaT/ sku gsung thugs su byin gyis brlab/ de nas thur ma me long dung/ /'khor lo rtsa ba'i
598a2(rgyud 'grel): yig 'brus bskur/ /phreng ba bum pa nyan pa dang/ /gsang sngags phyag rgya cod pan dang/ /'khor sgyur mi dbang dbu rgyan dang/ /las dang bcu'i gzungs rje'o/ /bcu gsum sa ni non dbang bskur/ /'khor lo rin chen bstabs pas ni/ /sa bcu kun la dbang ba dang/ /theg pa
598a3(rgyud 'grel): mdza' dag ston pa yi/ /chos kyi rgyal po chen por shog glang po rin chen bstabs pas ni/ /theg ba kun gyi don rtogs nas/ /stobs bcu kun la dbang thob nas/ /byang chub 'bras bu thob par shog /rta mchog rin chen bstabs pas ni/ /rdzu 'phrul rkang bzhi'i dbang thob nas/ /nyon mongs
598a4(rgyud 'grel): rgya mtsho brgal ba yi/ /thar pa'i 'bras bu thob par shog /nor bu rin chen bstabs bas ni/ /'jig rten dag tu de bzhin gshegs/ /dpe byad mtshan gyis brgyan pa yi/ gser gyi sku mdog thob par shog /dmag mi rin chen bstabs pas ni/ /mi 'jigs bzhi yi dbang
598a5(rgyud 'grel): thob nas/ /phas kyi rgol ba tshar gcod ba'i/ /go cha chen po bgos par shog /blon po rin chen bstabs pas ni/ /sum cu rtsa gsum dbang phyug rje/ /rdzu 'phrul che ba'i brgya byin gyi/ lha yi rgyal po thob par shog/ btsun mo rin chen bstabs pas ni/ shes rab yum gyi dbang
598a6(rgyud 'grel): thob cing/ /skye 'gag med pa'i don rtogs nas/ bla med 'bras bu thob par shog /de bzhin gshegs pas byin brlabs pa'i/ /nyon mongs sel ba'i grub rdzas dpa' bo 'di/ /bar chad bgegs kyi tshogs rnams rnam 'jig cing/ /dngos grub mchog thob ding 'dir bkra
598a7(rgyud 'grel): shis shog /ji ltar lha yi dbang po brgya byin gyis/ /byin gyis brlabs pa'i rtswa mchog pu da na/ /du rba'i gdan la rdzogs nas bdud btul ltar/ /ding 'dir bkra shis phun sum tshogs par shog/ ji ltar sngon gyi drang srong a ga stis/ /byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyugs
598b1(rgyud 'grel): kyi dngos grub 'di/ /khyim bdag dbang phyug che la byin pa yi/ /skye dgu'i sos gyur bcud ldan bkra shis shog /rdo rje dang ni rin chen chu skyes dang/ /de bzhin las kyi sems dpa' dbang sgyur ba'i/ /li kris 'jig rten gsum po dbang bsdus shing/ /dngos grub mchog thob ding 'dir bkra shis
598b2(rgyud 'grel): shog /ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyi chos kyi dung/ /na ra ya na ra dung sgra bsgrags pa ltar/ /bu khyod dam pa'i chos sgra rab sgrogs shing/ /'gro ba 'dren mdzad ding 'dir bkra shis shog /chos rnams thams cad gzugs brnyan lta bu ste/ /smig rgyu lta bur yang dag rtog pa'i mthus
598b3(rgyud 'grel): ma rig mun sel ye shes thob gyur nas/ dngos grub mchog thob ding 'dir bkra shis shog/ /ji ltar glang po chen po a ga stis/ /'gi'u wang srog gi dbang por gyur pa ltar/ /de bzhin bu khyod chos srog 'dzin gyur nas/ /dngos grub mchog thob ding 'dir bkra shis shog/
598b4(rgyud 'grel): ji ltar rgyu dang sa bon chu dus las/ /'bras bu cher smin shing tog bilba ltar/ /de bzhin bsod nams rgyu tshogs chung dus las/ /'bras bu bla med byang chub thob par shog /gtsug tor spyan ljags go chas bskur/ /lag gnyis bcings te gung gshibs bsgred/ /mdzub gnyis
598b5(rgyud 'grel): bkug sbyar gtsug tor ro/ /na ma sa man tha bud d+ha nan/ hUM hUM hUM/ lag gnyis bcings te gung srin lag/ brkyang ste mthe bo nar bcug mig/ na ma sa man ta bud d+ha nan/ /ga ga na ba ra la ksha na/ ga ru na ma ya/ ta thA ga ta tsak+Shu swAhA/ /lag gnyis thal mo khong stong sbyar/ /mdzub gnyis
598b6(rgyud 'grel): dkris la srin lag gtug /mthe bong gnyis gshibs ljags su bshad/ /na ma sa man ta bud d+ha nan/ ta thA ga ta dzi nywa sarba d+harma pra ti ti sh+rwa/ /lag pa gnyis ni khong stong sbyar/ /mdzub gnyis ngos nas dkris pa ni/ /go cha'i phyag rgya zhes su bshad/ /na ma sa man ta bud d+ha nan//
598b7(rgyud 'grel): pra tsan d+ha badzra la ya bi ra hUM/ /de nas slob ma'i thog dag du/ /gdugs mdzes gser gyi yu ba can/ /theg chen chos kyi ngo bo ste/ nyon mongs gdung ba sel byed pa'i/ /dbang mchog dam pa'i dbang bskur ro/ /sum cu rtsa lngas legs dbang bskur/ /de nas dag pa bsgo
599a1(rgyud 'grel): bzhi nas/ /sgra yi rjes su legs sbyar zhing/ /blo dang ldan pas smon lam gdab/ /shar phyogs bsgol purba bsdu/ /sngon dang thog ma purba bsdu/ /de mthun rdo rje sems la sogs/
599a2(rgyud 'grel): sgrib gnyis byang bas tshogs gnyis rdzogs/ /de bzhin slob ma tshogs rdzogs nas/ /me long ye shes thob bar shog /lho sgo da shi na bsdu'o/ /sbyin gnas la yang da shi bsdu'o/ /nub sgo bas
599a3(rgyud 'grel): tsa mis bsdu'o/ /phyi ma'i ma 'ongs pas cis bsdu/ /byang sgo u da ra mi bsdu/ /thugs rje gzungs la u da bsdu/ /gong gi rigs dang ye shes 'dra/ /sngon gyi smon lam don bstan pa/ /dri
599a4(rgyud 'grel): ma med pa'i dpe bzhin no/ /dkyil 'khor rang bzhin lha dag kyang/ /ci rigs par ni bstan par bya/ /tan+ta rgya mtsho dbyings kyi gting rum nas/ /don mchog cha shas btus pa'i nying khu
599a5(rgyud 'grel): ste/ /sbyor ba'i lam rgyud phyogs 'ga' 'grel pa yis/ /mchog thob rnam snang mdzad kyi zhal mthong shog /rgya gar gyi mkhan po sti ra ma tis/ yo ga'i gzhung rgyud phyi nang las/ /nges don
599a6(rgyud 'grel): mdo bsdus te mdzad pa/ rgyan dam pa'i le'u// //bam po gcig du byas pa rdzogs so// //cog ro klu'i rgyal mtshan gyis/ /skad phyi mo dang thug pa'o/ //
599a7(rgyud 'grel): sarba mang+ga laM
